You want and deserve: The best advice from knowledgeable & skilled agents To be treated professionally and confidently To make the entire experience a pleasurable one! With over 75 years of combined experience and a long history in Naples, the A Team can help you achieve the above objectives. In addition to being long term residents of Naples (Adrienne is a native and Anthony first moved here in 1978), our areas of expertise include: Construction experience and knowledge (Anthony has a Florida General Contractors license and a degree in Building Construction, and Adrienne just built her own home). Property management (Adrienne manages her family's real estate assets and Anthony has a Florida Community Condo Managers license and owned a property management company). We are both qualified to assist in transactions from a negotiating, marketing, and financial aspect, as well as having extensive market knowledge. Our success and long list of satisfied clients is based on our ability to accurately analyze current market trends and leverage this to our customer's best interests. This results in you achieving your desires and objectives. Please call, text or email to discuss how we can help you! &amp;lt;br&amp;gt; Families Served <br>
title: Naples Luxury Agents

description: About At Home with Erin, Roberta, & Scott With more than 45 years of combined real estate sales in Washington DC and close-in suburbs, our team knows that no two transactions are the same. Every client is given a personalized plan for selling or buying your home. This client-centric approach has earned us year-over-year recognition as top-selling agents and five star reviews. As long-time residents of Georgetown, Foxhall, and Glover Park, we take pride in the city and enjoy sharing it with clients. Regardless of your real estate needs, we are ready to serve you.

About Atlas Group If you don’t believe that real estate can be fun, then you’ve never worked with the Atlas Group. Atlas creates tailored experiences for every client they serve, while infusing each part of the process with just the right amount of humor and cheer. For Atlas, clients quickly become lifelong friends who they support and guide through each of life’s most notable real estate milestones— from a first home purchase, to the decision to downsize years later. Characterized by an unrelenting poise and deep sense of professionalism, the team is revered—by both clients and industry professionals—as leaders and experts in the communities they serve, a role they don’t take lightly. They prioritize collaboration and innovation, believing in the power of sharing ideas and in challenging outdated norms to strengthen client outcomes. Wherever your next real estate journey may take you, you can count on Atlas to help you navigate it with ease while guiding you to the results you deserve.
title: Atlas Group

description: About Sara Sara brings over 20 years of experience to the world of real estate, commencing her journey with the esteemed home builder NVR. With an intimate understanding of the local real estate landscape, Sara is determined to guide every client through the intricate processes of buying or selling a home. Sara’s unwavering commitment to market research, cutting-edge marketing methodologies, digital and social media prowess, staging finesse, and highly effective pricing strategies. Sara's educational background is equally impressive, holding a Master's degree in Business Administration and Marketing from University of Maryland, equipping her with the indispensable skills to excel in the realms of exceptional marketing and negotiation.
title: REALTOR®

description: About Abdul I have been a resident of the Washington DC metro area for 25 years and think it's one of the best places to live in the country. My wife and I have 3 children who keep us busy with Soccer, MMA, Dance and other activities. We are avid music fans who love attending live shows whenever possible at venues like the Kennedy Center, Wolf Trap, Capitol One Arena and Howard Theater. We also enjoy attending community functions and eating at some of the diverse restaurants our area has to offer. I established Focus Real Estate Group in 2005. We began by working almost exclusively with buyers in the Northern Virginia Area but then expanded to Washington DC and Maryland. In 2009 I obtained my MBA in Real Estate and Urban Development from George Washington University. Using that knowledge I turned Focus Real Estate Group into a full service firm focusing on buyers and sellers in both residential and commercial markets.. We are licensed and ready to service clients in MD, VA, and DC. Our creative home search and listing marketing techniques make us a great choice for buyers and sellers looking to find the best home at a good price or sell their home for top dollar. We have been successful in working with investors to locate, analyze and purchase investment properties. We are ranked in the top 2% of agents in Northern Virginia. On average we are responsible for helping 50 families sell and/or buy a home yearly. This is accomplished by our great marketing and negotiation skills. We truly go above and beyond to get our clients properties sold for top dollar. We are a one stop shop offering every service needed to get you and your home ready to sell. For example, we have funded the renovation of clients homes to help them get maximum return on their sale. Let us show you what full service real estate looks and feels like.
title: Realtor®

description: About Arash As the son of a successful civil engineer, Arash's childhood and adolescence were entangled with blueprints and various construction manuals. Analyzing blueprints for condominiums and houses while picking and choosing the right materials became one of the many highlights of spending time with his father. The time he devoted to learning from his father allowed him to develop a precise understanding of scales and floor plans while mastering an appreciation and awareness for design. As his life progressed, his undergraduate and graduate degrees in law enhanced his attention to details, analytical skills, and of course his knowledge in real estate law. Upon the completion of his graduate degree from Georgetown Law Center, his professional background further strengthened while working in various sectors with an emphasis of managing marketing platforms for numerous clients in different fields. Additionally, Arash’s experiences cultivated a large network of professionals over nearly two decades of living in the DMV region. Since the start of his career as a realtor, Arash has served numerous clients focusing on their needs while providing his regional and professional knowledge. Without any hesitation, Arash keeps his clients as a priority by assisting them with their real estate needs, dreams and investments.
title: REALTOR® licensed in DC, MD & VA

description: About Margaret Margaret is a native Washingtonian who is passionate about the growth and development of the community that raised her. As a top-performing real estate agent since 2007, she has built enduring connections with nearly every DC neighborhood. Margaret's clients include first-time home buyers and sellers, experienced property owners, savvy investors and experienced developers. She's a skilled marketer and negotiator, and understands what it takes to get her clients the maximum value for their money. Most importantly, Margaret is a successful entrepreneur who excels at building and growing a team -- by supporting each member in both their professional and their home lives. She has created a strong, connected group that works together seamlessly. Beyond her busy life in real estate, Margaret is a wife and mother of two -- her daughter is a Junior at the University of Maryland, her son is a Senior at St Johns College High School, and they have a home at Rehoboth Beach in Delaware. Margaret is an active fundraiser for Breast Cancer Awareness and an avid supporter of The Pink Agenda.
title: Mollaan Babbington Group | Senior Vice President

description: About Dillon Dillon Babington is a DMV resident of over 35 years. She enjoys tailoring each search to her buyers’ individual lifestyles, aesthetic tastes, and finances, and advising sellers how get the most ease and value out of their sale. Dillon delights in the “thrill of the hunt” with her buyers, and demystifying the buying and selling processes for first-timers. She does not, however, delight in talking about herself in the third person, so she will let some past clients take it from here: "I've worked with at least four real estate agents through the years, I can say without reservation that Dillon was an entirely different class. She was exceptionally responsive, unfailingly thoughtful, relentlessly detail-oriented — though it might not seem as important to some — just a real pleasure spend a not insignificant number of working hours with. Whether it was staging our home, strategizing about negotiations or a gentle call at 9 pm remind us about the paperwork we failed send, we always felt like we were sure hands. I can't recommend her highly enough." - Z.G. "Dillon is approachable, honest, has robust knowledge of the DMV housing market, and has the unique ability to translate complex home buying jargon into simple language for her clients. She and the Rebecca Weiner team made the home buying process truly enjoyable. We highly recommend Dillon and the Rebecca Weiner Group!" - A.J. "Dillon is a total pro and felt more like a member of our family than our realtor. She is friendly, chill, smart, funny, and has some very serious shark-like instincts when necessary. She helped us find the right house and masterfully walked us through the process of putting in an offer, worked closely with our lender to ensure we were comfortable with the offer, and made every move necessary to ensure we'd get the house." - K.C "Dillon's strength is her ability connect with her clients as humans. We felt that she had our best interests at heart while we were buying. More than just our agent, she took on the older sister/guidance counselor role we didn't know we needed as first-time buyers. We closed on the property over a month ago we are still touch with Dillon to get her insights as we fix the place up and to prepare move . We highly recommend her." - A.M. "Dillon is one of the coolest and most genuinely caring people you will ever meet. But don't let her chill demeanor and great sense of humor make you think she isn't also a real estate BOSS! She will fight hard and never quit until she has won. She went above and beyond to find us the house of our dreams during a very competitive time (Fall 2020 - Winter 2021) with a very limited budget! The market was nuts, but her attitude was nothing but positive and hopeful, which made us feel confident we would find a place that worked for us. She greatly exceeded our expectations, and we really enjoyed house-hunting with her. She's the kind of person you'll end up inviting over for a beer after you close because you just made a new friend." - L.J "DILLON BABINGTON IS DC'S BEST AND MOST FABULOUS REAL ESTATE AGENT!!!!! (I UNDERSTAND THAT ALL CAPS = YELLING! DILLON IS WORTH YELLING ABOUT!!!)" - T.M.
title: Realtor®

description: About Jessica Jessica Bachay has called DC home since 2009, when she moved here from Miami to work in international development. In 2014, Jessica gained extensive experience leading a major renovation of her first home and immediately fell in love with real estate. She later founded a real estate development company and is one of Capitol Hill’s top builders, transforming her community with complete renovations and ground-up new construction. Jessica’s expertise helps sellers position their homes strategically and buyers make smart, well-informed home purchases. When not working, Jessica is hanging out with her husband and three young boys. She loves checking out new activities in the city as well as playing tourist. She calls the H St / Capitol Hill neighborhood home. Jessica holds a Bachelor’s degree in Economics and Latin American Studies from Smith College and a Master’s degree from the University of Florida in Latin American Business Environment. She is fluent in Spanish and likes to practice her Portuguese.
title: Realtor®

description: About Mitchell Real estate is often our largest single investment. Your real estate advisor should understand how and why the world -- and your neighborhood -- is changing to facilitate strategic decisions for you to navigate the market today, and tomorrow.
title: Realtor®

description: About Zeno Zeno Bain has a B.S. in Environmental Engineering from Massachusetts Institute of Technology and has a background in analyzing and regulating drinking water contaminants; managing and registering antimicrobial pesticides; and advising on sustainable approaches to increase resiliency of communities and infrastructure after disasters. Zeno has over twenty years experience in the real estate industry, particularly focused on the real estate trends of Washington, DC with a sagacious discernment for the investment potential of Washington, DC real estate. He has a passion for real estate that he enjoys sharing with his clients, and knowledge invaluable to the first-time buyer or seasoned developer. Zeno’s clients appreciate and trust the unique combination of his personal attention and analytical evaluations through a service-oriented approach. Zeno is particularly poised to support development projects from conception to delivery, offering insight for development options to increase product performance, including commercial real estate. He is also supported by an experienced team of professionals to facilitate solutions to any obstacle in the process. Experiencing the value of real estate first-hand, Zeno’s goal is to develop generational wealth through real estate and facilitate others in doing the same. As Zeno says, “I started investing in real estate with less money than the cost of security deposit for an apartment and within a few years, had enough equity to buy and rehab my second investment property.” At the age of 21, with no experience or mentors in real estate, he reflects on the importance of professional real estate agents and the trust he placed in a diligent real estate agent in buying his first piece of real estate, a condo during a depressed 1998 market in Alexandria, VA. The navigation this real estate agent provided was especially invaluable, since this purchase was made after a weekend road trip to DC from Boston, during finals week at MIT and prior to moving for his first real job as a consultant for Accenture. Zeno became licensed and bought his second property, a fixer-upper in 2002 in the Petworth neighborhood of DC. Interestingly, in 2013, Petworth was named “the best neighborhood in the country to flip a house”, according to a report from Redfin, at least when looking at raw profits. He continued to invest in real estate and managed acquisition, development and sales for the team of his first condominium development in 2006, in the Columbia Heights neighborhood just prior to its major revitalization. Zeno and his team’s recent condominium project, the RyZen ( www.ryzen.com ), near U Street in truly magnificent. Zeno was born in St. Croix, U.S. Virgin Islands and made Washington, DC his home, spending the majority of his life in this beautiful city and witnessing the transitions of neighborhoods through this time. An investment in real estate is also an investment in the neighborhood, the city and the region. Zeno will not sell you anything that he has not bought into and he has bought into real estate investing in this city. He loves all that DC has to offer from the architectural beauties and serene green spaces, the intellectual depths of museums and artistic masterpieces of galleries, and the mixing of international cultures and history of this city in American culture.
title: REALTOR®

description: About Christy Christy brings a wealth of experience to the real estate market. Her proficient communication and negotiating skills were defined during her career at the White House and tenure on several Boards of the City of Los Angeles's leading cultural and medical foundations and institutions. She worked extensively with high-level political figures and business leaders, and spearheaded media campaigns for national and international conferences. During her 20 years in Real Estate, Christy has completed 301 transactions and has over $300 million in sales. She has also been recognized as one of Washington's Top Producers in Real Estate in the Washingtonian and Bethesda magazines. She continues to deliver the same level of first-class service and results her clients have known over the last decade. Christy appreciates the fine art of relocation and is highly cognizant of the professional demands and skills required to purchase and sell in the Washington DC metro area's competitive real estate market. 5471 Wisconsin Avenue, #300, Chevy Chase, MD 20815
title: Vice President | Licensed in MD & DC

description: About Johanna With over two decades of experience, Johanna Baker has built her real estate career on trust, dedication, and a genuine passion for helping people find their perfect place to call home. Whether you're buying, selling, or developing, Johanna is all about making the process smooth, enjoyable, and successful. As an Associate Broker and member of the Alliance Home Group, she’s been a consistent top producer since she launched her career in 2001. A proud native of Virginia, Johanna knows the region like the back of her hand. From the vibrant neighborhoods of Northern Virginia to the charming Eastern Shore, Johanna uses her deep, local knowledge to give her clients an insider’s edge when navigating the market. Outside of real estate, Johanna’s life is all about family, friends, and fun. She loves spending time at the beach with her crew, trying out the newest culiary restaurants and catching the local art events. With a Master’s in History of Modern Art and Architecture from the School of the Art Institute of Chicago, she also brings a unique eye for design and aesthetics to her work. For Johanna, it’s not just about closing deals—it’s about building relationships and helping people find a place where they can truly thrive. Client Testimonials "Johanna spent many hours with us while we were looking for our new home. We learned so much in our buying experience that I am sure we will never forget. Most important we learned what a good person Johanna is." - Shinya & Jim, McLean, VA "Johanna Baker is excellent! She explained everything and did a great job negotiating for us." - Zachary & Lindsey, Washington, DC "Johanna, your knowledge, experience and professionalism have been invaluable through all of the twists and turns." - Nancy, Washington, DC
title: Vice President

description: About Kelly Kelly understands that buying or selling a home is more than just a transaction; it is a life-changing experience. That is why taking the time to assess each client’s personal needs and provide outstanding, individualized service is key. She takes great pride in the relationships she builds and always works relentlessly on her client’s behalf to help them achieve their real estate goals. Whether it is prepping a home for the market, educating and showing homes to buyers, working through contract negotiations, or representing clients throughout contingencies to settlement; Kelly personally manages each transaction from initial meeting to final closing. Today’s buyers and sellers need a trusted resource that can guide them through the complex world of real estate. With Kelly's expertise and commitment to providing only the best and most timely information to clients, Kelly is your go-to source for all your real estate needs.
title: Mollaan Babbington Group | Vice President

description: About Catarina Catarina is a transplant from Berlin, Germany. Born and raised in the shadow of the Wall, she has always felt a keen sense of history and its impact on everyday life. Urban housing has fascinated her since the day right out of high school when she negotiated her first real estate transaction: the lease of a rent-controlled Berlin apartment that had been abandoned on purpose. Today, she takes a similar stand on behalf her clients. Cati's first career was in print journalism, as a reporter and editor at a large newspaper. After moving to DC in the 1990s, and buying her first home she became fascinated with real estate. She has been a full-time licensed Realtor and consultant since 2003, and in 2011 joined forces with Marcie Sandalow to build a team . As a contributor to several real estate blogs, including the Washington Post, Cati has been able to join her old passion with the new one. Her special expertise has been in house history, specifically the DC area’s historic kit houses. As a collaborator with several historical societies, most recently CPHS in Cleveland Park and HCCDC in Chevy Chase , she has helped authenticate DC’s unique inventory of these homes and has been interviewed as an expert by WTOP , the Post and the Wall Street Journal . Cati lives right on the District line with her husband and one of their three adult children. She speaks—of course!—German in addition to English and has welcomed many international newcomers among her clients. And she has a little nighttime secret: She is a nationally registered EMT and volunteers with the Bethesda-Chevy Chase Rescue Squad , responding to 911 calls for at least one shift each week. That said, she'd much rather meet you when you don't need an ambulance!
title: Realtor® Licensed in DC, MD, VA

description: About Barkin Group Peter Barkin has been successfully supporting the real estate dreams of buyer and sellers in South Florida for 28 years. Originally from Brookline, Massachusetts, Peter maintains strong ties to the greater Boston area, but has proudly called Fort Lauderdale, Florida home for more than 39 years, acquiring thorough knowledge of the local area that he skillfully passes on to his clients. The Barkin Group, led by Peter Barkin, achieved $135,989,795 in closed sales in 2024. The team was ranked the #1 Large Team by Sales Volume in Fort Lauderdale, as recognized by the 2025 and 2024 Wall Street Journal’s REAL Trends rankings. This impressive leading team continues to achieve record breaking sales; for the past consecutive 9 years the team has recorded closed sales in excess of 100 Million Dollars and is ranked among the top 1/2 of 1% of real estate agents nationwide. Peter Barkin believes real estate is more than a business; it’s his passion. A proven track record, longevity in selling luxury estates and the ability to recreate himself in a constantly evolving South Florida real estate market sets the Barkin Group apart. Their clients benefit from customized marketing plans utilizing the newest technology to expose their listings to buyers and sellers from all over the world. Their local, International and global marketing plans and affiliated partnerships access a broader audience delivering proven results. Peter Barkin’s real estate memberships include: The Private Client Network, an unrivaled network of top real estate brokerage professionals that operate in every luxury real estate market throughout the country sharing listings and the latest real estate marketing platforms. The Summers Global Team is a 17 agent worldwide team (USA, UK, France, Spain, Portugal, Italy, Singapore, Berlin and Dubai) working to bring more International buyers to properties and buyers have easier access to purchase homes around the world. Under Peter Barkin’s skilled leadership, the Barkin Group achieves top results by prioritizing ethical practices, unparalleled customer service, strong negotiating skills, and extensive knowledge of the neighborhoods which they work. Whether you are looking to navigate Fort Lauderdale’s Intracoastal and waterways or locate the ideal subdivision, Peter Barkin lives and loves the lifestyle he sells and will help you find your way. Areas of Expertise include luxury estates, waterfront estates, waterfront condominiums, condominiums, beachfront residences, waterfront and non-waterfront townhomes and luxury new construction. The Barkin Group’s success lies in their extensive knowledge of subdivisions including Harbor Beach, Harbor Inlet, Rio Vista, Rio Vista Isles, Lauderdale Harbors, Las Olas Isles, Colee Hammock, Victoria Park, Sunrise Key, Sunrise Intracoastal, Coral Ridge, Coral Ridge Country Club, The Landings, Bay Colony, Sea Ranch Lakes, Wilton Manors, Fort Lauderdale Beach and the new downtown development area. The Barkin Group is a privileged member of the Master Broker’s Forum of Broward County and members of the Broward, Palm Beaches and Saint Lucie Realtors Board of Realtor

About Sheryl Sheryl and her family are long-time residents of Chevy Chase, DC. After her tenure as an English teacher for over 10 years, she embarked on a second career in real estate investment and historical property restoration. Real estate brokerage licensure was a natural next step, and since 2000, she has been helping clients make the right choices. With 90% of her new business coming from client referrals, she says, “My clients always refer me, because they know I will give my best service for each transaction, be it a starter home for a first-time buyer, or a multi-million dollar resale.” Call or email Sheryl for expert advice on all real estate matters, anytime.
title: Licensed Real Estate Agent

description: About Haywood Haywood Barney is a seasoned real estate agent who has been selling and investing in the DC metropolitan real estate since 2004. With a deep-rooted connection to the community, he is passionate about helping families create the vision they have for their lives through real estate. What sets Haywood apart is his genuine love for the industry. He thrives on the opportunity to guide clients through the intricate process of buying or selling a home, ensuring their dreams become a reality. The diversity and richness of the area are what Haywood finds particularly captivating. In this vibrant melting pot, cultures intertwine, creating a unique tapestry where everyone shops and cohabitates in the same area Haywood's success as a real estate agent is a testament to his local expertise and unwavering commitment to his clients. Having helped 75 families achieve their goals, he has built a thriving business, with 60% of his clients coming from referrals from past satisfied clients. His market knowledge is second to none, allowing him to navigate the complexities of the Washington DC real estate market with ease. Beyond his professional life, Haywood is a sports fanatic, finding joy in cheering for his favorite teams. His passion for architecture and photography fuels his appreciation for the beauty of the homes he represents. Haywood's family roots are in the Richmond, VA area, and he cherishes the importance of family values in his personal and professional interactions. With his friendly and professional demeanor, Haywood is dedicated to serving the real estate needs of the community he calls home. Whether clients are looking to buy or sell, Haywood Barney is the agent who will go above and beyond to ensure a smooth and successful transaction.
title: REALTOR®

description: About Michele Michele comes from a family of real estate professionals and is continuing that legacy with Compass. Originally born and raised in Texas, Michele moved to Virginia in 2015 with her husband, a Marine of 15 years. She gained her own passion for real estate while working as a property manager, helping tenants and landlords maintain their homes. After two years in property management, Michele decided to become a licensed transaction coordinator, aiding buyers, sellers, and investors in the steps that come after a home is under contract. After joining Compass, Michele transitioned into a full-time agent role, with a background in excelling at administrative tasks, vendor relations, and the unique perspective as a military spouse. Whether you are inclined to upgrading your luxury home before hitting the market, or seeking renters for your investment property, Michele's focus is providing incomparable service to each and every client and referral. Her promise is competence with commitment to every client. Licensed in DC/MD/VA.
title: Realtor®

description: About Jay As an established agent, Jay Barry understands how important each transaction is to his clients, and strives to bring their distinct goals to life. A home owner and investor himself, Jay leverages his over 20 years of experience—both personally and professionally—to help his clients seamlessly navigate every stage of the process. Jay focuses on helping clients purchase and sell all types of residential and investment throughout the District of Columbia, Northern Virginia, and Maryland regions. He offers unrivaled insight into the local market, as well as tenacious negotiating skills and an unmatched ability to help clients envision their new lives in a home. Whether you’re a first time seller or tenured investor, Jay will be there at every step of your real estate journey. Jay is an avid sports fan and a devoted follower of the Duke Blue Devils, Carolina Panthers, and Atlanta Braves, although the Nationals are slowly sneaking up the ranks! He enthusiastically volunteers in the community his local Little League and is a supporter of multiple local animal charity organizations. Jay enjoys spending quality time with his wife and two kids, and of course the occasional 18 holes!
title: Realtor®

description: About Paul Paul joined in 2018. His guiding principle in real estate is “enjoy the process.” He has always had a passion for real estate and his dreams finally came true in 2015. He first moved to DC in 2010. After living in DuPont four years he a comprehensive knowledge many of the neighborhoods that he now serves. He currently resides a condo that he renovated DC's U Street neighborhood. Paul is customer-driven, and always dedicated to exceptional service and results his clients. He cultivated his negotiation and sales skills years while working at a leading procurement platform selling software to the military in DoD West. Paul's clients consistently cite his tireless work ethic, his keen eye for detail and design, and intimate knowledge of modern techniques. Visit Paul's Website
title: Realtor®

description: About Jacqueline Jacqueline has maintained a successful career in Real Estate for several years. She is licensed in DC and Virginia, and has helped countless clients achieve their goals. A “natural born listener” with a degree in Psychology, Jacqueline works to truly understand her clients’ needs and then advocates fiercely on their behalf from beginning to end. Jacqueline believes the key to success is turning one time clients into lifelong friends, and loves spending time catching up over coffee, sending holiday cookies, or enjoying a meal prepared in her own home. This attention to relationships has helped her build a business based primarily on referrals, and she is always ready to help a new friend whether they be a first time homebuyer, a seasoned investor, or local developer.
title: Realtor®

description: About Jay A northeast native, I’ve called the D.C. metro area home for over 2 decades. I’ve always had a passion for real estate. Even as a kid, I’d ask my parents if I could join them while they toured model homes. Little did I know that 20 years later I’d be the one bringing clients through model homes and negotiating sales on their behalf! As a Realtor, I’m customer-driven, and always dedicated to exceptional service and results for my clients. I’m licensed in D.C., Maryland, and Virginia, and I specialize in representing both buyers and sellers in the purchase and sale of single-family homes, row homes, townhouses, and condos throughout the D.C. metro area. I’m a graduate of Walt Whitman High School in Bethesda and I hold a degree in communications from the University of Delaware. My hobbies include biking, D.C.-area sporting and social events, boating (especially when I have the opportunity to take clients out on the Potomac), hiking, and helping out where I can in the community. I truly love the D.C. area, and I put my passion and deep knowledge of the area, along with 17 years of real estate experience, to work for each and every client. For me it's always been more than simply selling a home, but rather a deeper dive into understanding clients needs and then helping them find where they are meant to be. Where are you meant to BE?
title: Vice President/Realtor

description: About Tom Prior to beginning his real estate career, Tom Bauer was a manager in multiple community and regional banks. Both experiences left him with the core values of community, customer service and attention to detail. Each of these attributes are integral in the day-to-day service Tom offers his clients. Tom puts himself in the seat of the client and feels you must live a brand—one of superior service. He grasps their point of view and makes each client feel like they have someone who really cares about their needs, not someone simply trying to make a . At the end of the day, Tom knows that treating people the right way is the only way. Tom is an avid runner who enjoys working out and spending time outdoors. In winter months he straps on skis and attempts not to break any bones, and during the summer he enjoys boating, but no matter what time of year, Tom enjoys spending time with family and friends.
title: Realtor

description: About B/C Group The B/C Group Group is an award winning team specializing in selling real estate in Maryland, Virginia, Washington, DC, Maryland's famous Eastern Shore and the Beaches. Our pledge to you, the client: “Specializing in superior customer service, extensive market knowledge and confidentiality." Selling or buying a home is one of life’s major undertakings, and can be an emotional one for many. As longtime residents of the area and experienced Realtors, we can help ease the process and smooth the experience — whether you’re in the market to sell or buy.
title: Licensed in Maryland, Virginia, Washington DC, Eastern Shore of Maryland & The Beaches

description: About Jordan Jordan is passionate about helping clients successfully navigate the home buying or selling process. With personal experience of moving a dozen times both across the United States and internationally, Jordan truly understands the complexities and challenges of relocating. Whether you're buying, selling, renting, or leasing, Jordan is dedicated to guiding you through every life transition, ensuring a smooth and informed transaction. Having lived in Washington, D.C., Maryland, and now Virginia for over a decade, Jordan brings a wealth of local knowledge and insight. This local expertise, combined with a robust network of partners, equips Jordan to assist in preparing your home for the market or making your new house feel like home. As an experienced investor, Jordan is adept at identifying profitable properties for e ach client's needs . Community involvement is a cornerstone of Jordan's values, providing a strong sense of purpose and pride. In her free time, she enjoys walking her dogs, getting messy in the ceramics studio, and volunteering with at-risk youth as a Court Appointed Special Advocate (CASA). Jordan's dedication to her community has been recognized through various accolades, including being named one of Alexandria's most inspirational women by VIP Magazine and receiving the "Rising Star" award from Real Producers in 2024. When working with Jordan, you can expect reliable, local expertise and a commitment to achieving your real estate goals.
title: ADVISORY of Compass - Realtor® licensed in DC/MD/VA

description: About Jim Jim Begg, a native Washingtonian, uses integrity and candor to achieve his results-driven approach earning him the respect of his clients and colleagues. Applying his 22 years of real estate experience, Jim has honed unprecedented negotiating skills, an eye for detail and style, as well as an unwavering commitment to his customer’s satisfaction. A crucial part of Jim’s job is streamlining communication and relieving the anxieties from his clients. Alleviating stress means understanding the client’s requirements and choices. Jim’s perspective is that he and his clients work as a team; the result is bringing their desires to fruition. As a client, you want a realtor who has the tenacity, dedication, commitment to communication with his customers, to fulfill their desires. Jim is well-known for his tireless determination, perseverance, and deliberation. Choosing a realtor is time-consuming, but if you want one whose conviction fulfills your goals, regardless of how complex they may be, Jim Begg is the realtor for you.
title: Realtor®

description: About Phoebe Phoebe Bejarano brings a diverse background in real estate to the table. Phoebe began her real estate career in property management, which allows her to employ her knowledge of the rental market on behalf of investors. As a DC resident herself, Phoebe understands the local market intimately. Her own experiences as a home buyer inform her bespoke work for buyers and sellers, and she prides herself on the personal relationships she builds with clients. A native of Westchester County in New York, Phoebe moved to DC to attend George Washington University and study fine arts, psychology and communications. In her free time, you’ll find her creating a beautiful meal for family and friends with her long-time boyfriend Matt. She loves perfecting her home with interior design and her own flower arrangements. A fitness fanatic, Phoebe enjoys Barry's and [solidcore] classes, the driving range and volleyball.
title: Realtor® Licensed in DC, MD & VA

description: About Carl Having sold over $100 million in real estate across a decade in the industry, Carl Bender has been honored to have been named to Washingtonian Magazine’s “Top Agents” list every year since its creation in 2015, as well as named a “Lifetime Top Producer” by the Northern Virginia Association of Realtors. A lifelong native of the DC area, Carl takes pleasure in getting to know each and every one of his clients as he assists them in navigating the Washington and Northern Virginia real estate markets. In contrast to the trend towards larger teams, his philosophy has always been to stay personally engaged, involved, and available to his clients at every step of the way. From home finding/negotiation, to staging/price positioning, to being present for home inspections and meetings with contractors… From the beginning of a transaction to its successful conclusion, Carl strives to make every one of his clients feel like they are his only clients. Individuals and organizations he has had the pleasure to work with have included everything from first-time homebuyers on a limited budget to Fortune 500 companies relocating employees out of million dollar homes. From the highly educated professionals that live and work here, to officers serving in our armed forces, to members of the diplomatic corps, Carl has enjoyed representing a pool of buyers and sellers as diverse and dynamic as the region we all call home.
title: Realtor®

description: About Katina Katina Benenate is your fiercest advocate in real estate. A powerful negotiator with a deep understanding of the market, she represents clients of all calibers, from first-time homebuyers and seasoned investors to sellers managing multiple properties. An emotionally intelligent negotiator, Katina leverages cutting-edge technology and data-driven insights to guide her clients through the process with ease, integrity, and a touch of fun. Her entrepreneurial mindset and “get-it-done” attitude consistently deliver exceptional results in any market. With over 16 years as an interior architect and designer, Katina brings a rare advantage to the table. Her background in staging, renovations, and design strategy allows her clients to maximize value, minimize stress, and unlock the hidden potential of every property. What truly sets Katina apart is her ability to listen deeply and align with her clients’ vision. Her detail-oriented and analytical approach ensures buyers find homes that perfectly reflect their next chapter, and sellers position their properties to command attention. Katina’s business is built on trust, strategy, and lasting relationships. The genuine connections she forges extend far beyond the closing table, a testament to her care, expertise, and unwavering commitment to client success.
title: Realtor®

description: About Max Max pairs a formal background in finance and commercial real estate with a childhood of following his parents as they worked in residential real estate. Having completed many renovations, Max has built an understanding of how projects get done, and problem-solving skills. Even though early in his career, Max has already worked with a number of high-net-worth clientele and is familiar with the luxury market. He believes that the relationship is more important than the transaction, and finding the right investment/perfect home for his client is the number one priority. When Max isn't working, he enjoys cooking for friends and spending time in his gardens. As the son of two immigrants, family is not nearby, so his friends have become his family. These relationships he has built are the most important thing to Max and help make him a better agent Client Testimonials ★★★★★ We had such a great experience working with Max while searching for our first home in DC. Right from the start, Max took the time to truly listen and understand what we were looking for — not just in terms of square footage and amenities, but what would make a place feel like home and best align with our lifestyle. As first-time buyers, the process was naturally stressful at times, but Max’s steady guidance, responsiveness, and regular check-ins made everything feel far more manageable. In the tough and competitive DC market for single-family homes, that’s no easy feat. What we appreciated most was how patient, upbeat, and hard-working Max was throughout. Even when we got outbid or things didn’t go our way, he kept us encouraged and focused, and was always ready to jump in with a new idea or opportunity. Thanks to his persistence and support, we ended up in a home we truly love. Our family is incredibly grateful to have had Max as our agent, and we’d recommend him to anyone — especially if you want someone in your corner who’s thoughtful, trustworthy, and genuinely wants the best for you and your family. -Lawrence & Blair ★★★★★ Working with Max was such a pleasure. I went into the process never having bought property before, and Max made everything easy, simple, and low-stress. He has deep knowledge of the DC market; he was extremely generous in sharing his knowledge and time; and he consistently anticipated (and addressed) questions and concerns I had as a first-time buyer. I feel very lucky to have met Max and to have had the opportunity to work with him on my first home purchase. I would absolutely recommend him to anyone looking to buy or sell a home! -Fred ★★★★★ "Working with Max at Compass has been an absolute pleasure! From start to finish and beyond, we are so fortunate to have had the guidance of Max throughout the process. My husband and I appreciated all the effort and time that was spent by the team on our perfect first home search. From viewings to negotiations to closing - you want to use them! I know we only just purchased a home, but we will definitely be using them in the future too! Thank you to Max, Lindsey and Daniel - we appreciate you so much!" ★★★★★ " Moving to an old folks home once one reaches 80 is a pretty traumatic experience but Max and Daniel held my hand and coached me to bid farewell to my beloved Beekman Place condo after living there over 20 years and loving every minute but I found I could no longer physically navigate the steps. Rather than roll their eyes at how dated the unit had become, they both offered incredibly useful suggestions as to what needed to be renovated, found me the best moving company in the area that handled my artwork with care, put no pressure on me timewise so that I could pack based on my own schedule, found an outstanding renovation crew to update and modernize my unit that has one of the best views of the US Capitol and the Washington Monument in all of DC, found a staging company that would put the best face possible on the completed unit, offered me updates on its progress and best of all, never made me feel like a bother when I needed a quick question answered or wanted another word of advice about the sale. They are honest, they know the real estate market so well and Max has a vested interest in Beekman because he own two units there and sits on the BOD as Treasurer. What more can any homeowner ask for in a realtor?" -Kathy
title: Realtor®

description: About Camilo Camilo is passionate about helping others reach their goals. A residential real estate specialist licensed in DC, MD, and VA, Camilo began his career in 2005 at RE/MAX Allegiance. He joined District One Properties in 2012. The company is now District Partners and is part of the Compass family. Born in Bogota, Colombia, Camilo specializes in buyer and seller representation, focusing on first-time home buyers and individuals upgrading their ownership experience. He is multilingual and versed in all the tools and technologies in the real estate industry, all qualities necessary for the ever-evolving international landscape of the Washington Metro area. Camilo’s goal is to turn the Real Estate experience into something fun, memorable, and satisfying for every one of his clients. In his free time, he enjoys spending time with his family, creating memories as they venture into parenting, and incorporating their passions for the outdoors and sports.
title: Realtor®

description: About Joseph Meet Joseph Bernstein, an award-winning realtor and managing partner of the Bernstein Group at Compass Real Estate, consistently ranking in the top 1% in annual sales volume nationwide. Joseph's impressive real estate career began in 2008, and since then, he has consistently increased his annual sales volume. His expertise spans from investment and distressed properties to high-end single-family homes and luxury condos, catering to a diverse range of clients. Joseph's accolades include being awarded the Master's Club achievement in 2021, 2022, and 2023, solidifying his position as one of the industry's leading sales associates. Beyond his role in real estate, Joseph is the managing member of Bernstein Bros LLC, a residential developer in the DMV focused on restoration and redevelopment, with a remarkable track record of over 400 transactions worth over $200,000,000 in volume. As a Bethesda resident and Montgomery County MD native, Joseph brings an insider's perspective on the various neighborhoods within the DMV. His upbringing in a family of builders and developers gives him a unique advantage in assessing the quality and craftsmanship of local properties. Joseph's commitment to staying ahead of market trends and providing unparalleled service has earned him the respect of colleagues and clients alike, leading to strong and long-lasting relationships. Before embarking on his real estate career, Joseph excelled in sports as a College Football player for the Wesley College Wolverines from 2004-2006. He later graduated from Florida Atlantic University with a BBA in Business Administration and a minor in Real Estate, where he also served as the Vice President of his fraternity PI Kappa Alpha. Joseph's multifaceted background, from sports to real estate education and extensive experience, reflects his dedication to excellence and his ability to meet the challenges of today's complex real estate market with skill and competitiveness.
title: Realtor®

description: About Antonina Meet Antonina "Nina" Bernstein, a dedicated real estate professional licensed in DC & MD, committed to serving the DMV community. Nina's journey in real estate began in 2013, when she played a vital role in a successful team, overseeing sales and listings to ensure smooth closings for clients. As the team leader's right hand, she expertly coordinated contracts and managed the "contract to close" process, guiding sellers and buyers through deadlines, inspections, and contingencies. In 2017, Nina joined forces with her husband and brother-in-law, forming The Bernstein Group, a top-producing team rooted in a multigenerational real estate family of investors, builders, and developers. With over a decade of experience in the local real estate market, Nina brings a wealth of knowledge and expertise to each client interaction. Her love for the dynamic nature of real estate and the joy of matching clients with their dream properties shine through in every transaction. Nina's commitment to excellence and integrity is evident in her genuine passion for helping clients find their perfect home. She prides herself on offering the highest level of professionalism, addressing individual client needs, and infusing every transaction with heart. Nina's personal approach reflects her dedication to building meaningful connections in both business and life, turning clients into friends and treating friends like family. Antonina was born in Fort Belvoir Virginia, and is currently a Bethesda Maryland resident. For many years she lived in Warsaw, Poland where she used to teach both English & Spanish. In early 2013, he received her Master's Degree from Warsaw University, before moving back to the United States and the DMV.
title: Realtor®

description: About Eric B. Eric Bernstein has worked in the Real Estate industry for 15+ years. He is the 3rd generation of Bernstein Real Estate experts born and raised in the DMV area. As a D.C. native Eric knows the market extremely well, as he has been immersed in it his entire life. He is currently licensed in Washington D.C. and Maryland, and his team, The Bernstein Group, has the ability to assist in buying and selling in Virginia and Florida as well. Eric is the Vice President of Bradbern Construction Company. Bradbern specializes in luxury builds, which is where Eric has learned a great deal about investing in real estate and the entire building process. Having this experience in the construction/development world separates Eric from other realtors as it provides him a vast knowledge about the homes his clients are buying, and about the homes he is selling for them. Whether it be the specific materials in the homes, or how the homes themselves have been constructed, his clients appreciate his expertise in the residential real estate/construction world. With Erics construction prowess, he has the ability to seamlessly help sellers fix up their homes before a sale or help his buyers make changes and additions to the homes they are buying
title: Realtor® licensed in DC & MD

description: About Beth Hughes Team - DC The Domo team puts our skill and knowledge, acquired over two decades, to work for you! Trusted, experienced agents with diverse talents + combined DC/MD/VA/DE market acumen to represent your real estate interests. We have you covered from DC to the suburbs of Virginia & Maryland to the Eastern Shore & Delaware Beaches. BUY Our agents have successfully guided hundreds of buyers through the home purchase process. From first-time homebuyers and move-up buyers to luxury buyers and investors, we have the experience and resources to help you realize your homeownership goals. SELL The market is constantly shifting. Work with agents who focus on solutions and strategies that help you gain advantage. Domo agents are known for achieving low days on market + above-list and record sales prices. We're proven negotiators and closers. INVEST Whether your aim is to acquire a single income property or build a portfolio, the DOMO team is well-equipped to guide you through the process. Valued by investors. Trusted by top builders in the DMV. LIVE DOMO means home. Let's meet and discuss your real estate needs!

About Holly Holly Beville is a woman in-the-know whose friendly smile will make you feel like an old friend during your home sale or search. A resident of Old Town, Holly takes pride in being the local real estate expert and uses her deep local connections, and expert negotiation skills to find clients the perfect home purchase or sale at a perfect price. In this fast-paced world, staying current is key. Clients working with Holly not only benefit from her extensive knowledge of the community, but also her constant thirst for staying ahead of community news, restaurant/retail plans, school redistricting and residential/commercial development plans on the horizon…all knowledge which translates into dollars and cents for her clients. Whether you are looking to sell for top dollar, buy a home that supports your lifestyle or are simply in need of the best coffeehouse, cocktail or tailor in the area, Holly has you covered. Holly’s career in real estate began after nearly a decade of executive-level , communications, and business development experience on an MBA and BS from Florida State University. Her background especially serves her sellers, often securing offers within days after conducting multi-step, professional-level PR campaigns to market client listings. Her business background and up-to-the-minute local knowledge drives her ability to successfully connect clients with their dream home.
title: Realtor®, Licensed in Virginia

description: About Libby Licensed in VA, DC, and MD Over $225m in sales in 7 years. CEO and Founder, Bish Properties www.bishproperties.com Libby Bish isn't your average real estate agent. With a voracious appetite for knowledge and a knack for connecting with people, she's quickly made a name for herself in the industry. Her positive attitude, enthusiasm, and love for friendly competition not only earned her the title of Arlington Magazine's Top Real Estate Producer in 2021 and 2022 but led her to become the Senior Vice President of Compass' Arlington branch and the founder and CEO of her firm, Bish Properties. As a graduate of Langley High School, Libby has always had strong ties to the community. At Langley, she played soccer on the varsity team for four years. Participating in team sports helped Libby become the competitive leader she is today. After high school, Libby graduated from Virginia Tech with a Bachelor of Arts degree in Business Management and Marketing, and a Minor in Leadership. Libby then returned to McLean, Virginia, to pursue a career in business. In 2012, Libby worked at Booz Allen Hamilton, where she was responsible for onboarding candidates from start to finish. Following her time at Booz Allen Hamilton, Libby accepted a position as a manager of an insurance association in Washington, D.C. There, Libby spearheaded the organization's membership program, managing the relationship and communication between the company and more than 200 firms in the insurance community. Nearly three years later, Libby realized she wanted to help clients in a bigger way and decided to switch gears and begin a career in real estate. Whenever she's not working, you can find Libby cheering on Washington sports teams or spending time with her husband and family. She adores her two nephews who also keep her busy on the weekends. She also enjoys volunteering and helping out the local community. In 2018, Libby was nominated for the Leukemia and Lymphoma Society (LLS) Woman of the Year campaign. Thanks to her volunteer work raising money for blood cancer research, she raised over $88K for the cause! She also is the founder of Frontline Fuel and raised thousands to support local restaurants during the pandemic while feeding hospital workers. She was even recognized by President Trump and invited to the White House for her work.
title: Founder & CEO, Bish Properties | SVP, Compass

description: About Todd Todd is passionate about real estate. He got into the business two decades ago, teaming up with his dad and turning his passion for all things real estate into a career he loves. Todd is committed to helping his clients achieve and exceed their real estate goals. Todd has an uncanny ability to mentally catalog properties and their attributes. His block--block knowledge and understanding of a neighborhood’s broader context gives Todd’s clients an enviable advantage when searching for the perfect property or when positioning a home to its greatest advantage for sale. He firmly believes that the best Realtors serve their clients through deep expertise and focus, and he brings that focused attention to the streets, the neighborhoods, and the properties of DC, getting to know their people and their histories. Using that expertise, Todd has developed an unrivaled ability to price properties for sale; in fact, he was recognized in 2018 as the best agent at pricing properties his fellow DC-area Compass agents. Todd lives on Capitol Hill, where he takes his love of real estate home with him—constantly improving his row house and other properties.
title: Realtor®

description: About Stan Stan received his engineering degree in Aeronautics and Astronomics at Purdue University. After completing his MBA at the University of Michigan, Stan joined a management consulting firm, where he specialized in hospital operations and construction. This eventually brought him to DC, where he met his wife Jeanie, settled down, and had two children: Todd & Scott. Right after they were married and before kids, they moved to an English basement apartment on Capitol Hill. It was on the Hill where Stan got involved in renovations, construction & real estate. At first it was on a part time basis, but it wasn't long before general contracting, renovating homes, developing commercial properties & residential condominiums became a full time business. In the 1980s & early 1990s he teamed up with well-known developer Bob Herrema and developed the Logan School Condo, Kentucky Manor Condo, the Tuscany Condo, the Carbery School Condo and the Hawthorne Condo to name a few. These were a handful of the condo conversion projects they developed on Capitol Hill, which were bold and risky moves at the time, but through some creative sales strategies they all sold out. These creative sales strategies involved selling the condos as investment properties to friends, family members, fraternity brothers, high school friends, relatives and the like. Since the majority of these buyers were out of town, there was a need for a local property management company. Stan & Jeanie started a property management company, which they ran for a decade or so. After which time they turned their management portfolio over to another management company. After his not-so-brief stint in property management, Stan started focusing on residential & commercial real estate sales and leasing. Shortly thereafter in 2001, his son Todd joined him in the business. The Bissey Team was formed. Stan's engineering and construction background coupled with Todd's sales and marketing background allow them to be great advocates and real estate consultants for both their buyer and seller clients. What sets them aside from their competition is their ability to prepare properties for the market. Together with their contractors, landscapers & stagers, they will work to transform their clients' properties, so that they can get top dollar. Their discerning eye(s) for correct construction practices and acute market knowledge make them invaluable resources for their buyer clients as well. You can find Stan & Todd all over DC, as they sell in every neighborhood, but more often than not you will find them on Capitol Hill.
title: Realtor®

description: About Douglas Douglas Blocker is a second-generation Realtor, a lifelong resident of the DMV, and a professional committed to delivering exceptional client outcomes. With over two decades of industry expertise, Douglas brings an unparalleled level of knowledge, integrity, and experience to the table. Douglas takes pride in understanding the unique aspirations and desires of each individual he serves, listening attentively, and striving to surpass client expectations by providing unwavering support throughout their buying or selling process. Leveraging his market insights, an extensive network of local industry connections, and Compass’ cutting-edge technology, Douglas empowers his clients with a competitive edge, leading them toward well-informed decisions. His strong negotiation skills, attention to detail, and commitment to transparency has earned him a sterling reputation among his clients and his colleagues. Whether you're a first-time homebuyer, a seasoned investor, or looking to sell your property, Douglas's expertise and guidance will exceed your expectations. Growing up in a family that included agents, appraisers, and loan officers, Douglas gained valuable insights into the inner workings of the real estate industry at an early age. After earning a Bachelor of Science degree in Economics from the University of Virginia, he was a Certified Appraiser in Virginia for 10 years. It allowed him to see countless properties, both existing and under construction, and built in him a deep knowledge of the area’s markets, construction practices and local amenities. Watching the long-term changes in buyer preferences, property standards and transaction details has been a life-long interest. When he is not busy helping his clients, Douglas enjoys spending time out dining in DC with friends, or entertaining them in his Logan Circle home. He especially enjoys time at his family's Loudoun Virginia farm, where he and his husband Scott have revived his grandmother’s flower and vegetable gardens, adding several hundred new peony plants to the heirloom peonies already there. Their dog Dash especially loves the quiet in contrast to the bustle on the streets around Logan Circle. Douglas is fortunate to have family in the area, and loves spending time with them, as well as visiting his sister Kelly in California, the family’s West Coast Compass agent. Partner with Douglas Blocker, and gain an exceptional real estate advisor who combines practical knowledge, market acumen, and a genuine commitment to your success. You can contact Douglas with confidence, knowing you have an advocate who will go above and beyond for you.

About Dayna For DMV Realtor Dayna Blumel, real estate is about more than sales — it’s about building lifelong relationships. As a trusted advisor, she goes above and beyond to be there for her clients through it all, helping every buyer and seller navigate the major milestones of their lives with confidence and success. Born into a family with deep roots in real estate, Dayna got her license in 2004 after a successful stint working as a senior client manager for DDC, a political technology firm based in Old Town Alexandria. Two short years later, she was selected as one of Realtor Magazine’s 30 Under 30 — and she hasn’t lost momentum since. Today, Dayna is an experienced agent who’s known for her vast industry knowledge, handy resourcefulness, and infinite network of connections. Adept at managing the many nuances of the search and sale process, Dayna has cultivated a full-service approach defined by a persistent accessibility to her clients — whether they’re in the middle of a transaction or returning to her for advice years later. As Dayna likes to say, in many ways, getting your property under contract in a market like ours is the easy part. Getting to the closing table successfully, however, requires first-hand expertise, credible industry contacts, and the reputation of a revered agent like Dayna on your side. Originally from Annapolis, Maryland before relocating to Alexandria, VA after college as an esteemed professional, Dayna brings an insider’s perspective to the areas she serves — from Northern VA to Anne Arundel County, Montgomery County, Calvert County, and select pockets of DC. She currently resides on her horse farm in Davidsonville, MD and loves guiding her clients through the unique process of buying or selling farms of their own. When she’s not pulling out all the stops for clients, you can find Dayna running her farm, training off-the-track thoroughbreds, and competing in equestrian events.
title: Realtor®

description: About Katie Katie Bocock is not your average real estate agent. With a genuine passion for the industry and an unwavering commitment to her clients, Katie has become a trusted name in the DC and Maryland real estate market. Katie is a life-long Washingtonian who grew up in Cleveland Park (NW DC) and has been a proud resident of Montgomery County Maryland since 2003, where she lives with her husband, four sons, and her rescue dogs, Georgia and Coral in Takoma Park. It was here that she discovered her love for real estate, drawn to the relationships she forms with her clients, the art of negotiating, and the excitement of staging a home to perfection. But it wasn't just the real estate industry that captivated Katie; it was the area itself. From the world-class museums and eclectic restaurants to the serene beauty of Sligo Creek and the awe-inspiring National Cathedral, Katie fell head over heels for the DC and Maryland region. Katie has honed her skills and built an impressive portfolio of achievements. Her dedication and expertise have earned her the prestigious title of Washingtonian Top Agent for four consecutive years, from 2020 to 2024. Additionally, Katie is a Senior Relocation Services Expert, a Diversity Champion, and has been certified At Home with Diversity, showcasing her commitment to inclusivity and serving diverse communities. Katie received Gold Recognition Award from Greater Capitol Area Association of Realtors® in 2021, and in 2022 won a Pathways Award for her pro bono work. She is also a regular Top Producer recognized by both Washingtonian and Bethesda Magazines. Katie has been trained in Equity, Inclusion & Diversity, achieving the National Association of Realtors specialty designation of At Home With Diversity accreditation. She is also a Senior Relocation Specialist. Beyond her professional life, Katie finds joy in her personal pursuits. She is an avid yoga practitioner, finding solace and balance on the mat. When she's not helping clients or perfecting her Warrior pose, you can find her lost in the pages of a great book or enjoying a movie marathon with her beloved family. Speaking of family, Katie is a proud wife to her husband Piers and a devoted mother to her four sons - Miles, Toby, Leo, and Alex. Fluent in French, Katie's worldly perspective and multicultural understanding allow her to connect with clients from all walks of life. Her warm and approachable demeanor, coupled with her market knowledge and local expertise, make her an invaluable asset to anyone looking to buy or sell in the DC and Maryland area. A graduate of Sidwell Friends and Drew University with a BA in French Language, Katie was formerly Director of HR & Finance for a DC-based consulting firm. Working with both sellers and buyers, Katie's career has thrived and grown tremendously. While knowing the local market as only a native can, Katie has not only lived and worked in the area, but she has traveled internationally and understands the excitement and challenges of relocations. She has the drive to provide the smoothest experience possible for those going through the momentous step of buying, selling, or even both at the same time!
title: Realtor®

description: About Spencer With deep family roots in Miami dating back to the 1940s and a proven track record in real estate, Spencer Bodian brings a unique combination of market expertise and hands-on investment knowledge to South Florida’s dynamic real estate landscape. Born and raised outside Washington, D.C., Spencer’s diverse experience spans multiple regions, allowing him to offer insight into comparable thriving markets along with unparalleled service in both the D.C. metro region and Miami, one of the fastest-growing and most desirable markets in the world. Spencer’s comprehensive background includes leadership roles in development, leasing, and marketing with Acropolis Development in New York, where he gained expertise working with both residential and commercial clients. Now, as a top-producing agent, advisor, and investor, he offers clients deep insight into Miami’s market trends, guiding them to make intelligent, lifestyle-focused investment decisions. Whether navigating the booming luxury condo market, finding the perfect home to raise your family in, or securing prime commercial opportunities, Spencer uses his extensive network and creative problem-solving skills to deliver consistent results. After building his business in D.C., Spencer expanded into Miami & South Florida. Collaborating with two of Miami’s top realtors, Mathieu Rochette & Matt Crane, as well as Chris Deitz in Palm Beach, Spencer has established his presence in South Florida's competitive real estate market, catering to high-net-worth buyers, sellers, and international investors. In business, Spencer has always taken the long-term, relationship approach, as opposed to being transactional. His commitment to bringing the right parties together to create synergy, while preserving the best interests of all in order to get to the finish line remains his differentiator. His deep knowledge of both the Washington, D.C., and Miami / South Florida markets allows him to provide a sophisticated and multi-faceted real estate experience, delivering white-glove service and ensuring his clients’ success across multiple markets, domestically and internationally.
title: Real Estate Advisor

description: About Kelly Prior to entering the real estate world, Kelly spent her time in the technology industry selling software and services. Her prior experience is an asset to her clients as they can be assured she is connected to technology that provides fast and accurate information. Kelly made the career change into real estate in 2002 because she wanted to be part of a process that makes a personal difference. Kelly has created valuable relationships and resources to assist her clients in locating trusted mortgage lenders, relocation services, inspectors, title companies, legal services, and contractors. Her service is second to none and has earned her a valuable source of referrals. Having the right agent working on your behalf can make a huge difference in the outcome of your home purchase or sale in time, stress, liability, price, and happiness. While aggressively representing her client's interests, Kelly is dedicated to making their needs her priority and she works hard to achieve the best possible price and terms. Working with clients relocating to the Washington, DC Metro area has been part of her business since the beginning. She understands the complexities that involve a cross-country move. She is able to bridge the gap between the relocation company and the client. Relocation can be stressful for individuals and families. Kelly is experienced and skilled at guiding clients through the many components involved in this process. Her goal is to have the home buying, or selling process to be one that is enjoyable and successful for all involved. If you are considering a real estate professional, she would appreciate the opportunity to earn your business.
title: Realtor®

description: About Danny Danny Boitel is a trusted expert in luxury and investment real estate across Washington, DC, Maryland, and Northern Virginia, known for helping high-net-worth buyers, sellers, and investors navigate the DMV’s most competitive neighborhoods with precision, strategy, and results. With a reputation built on deep local market knowledge, a data-driven approach, and a client-first mindset, Danny brings a rare combination of real-world experience and hyperlocal insight to every transaction. Recognized among America’s Best Real Estate Professionals by RealTrends (Top 1.5% Nationwide in 2023 and 2025), he has also been named a Washingtonian Magazine Elite Producer (2023, 2024, 2025) and a Best of Bethesda 2023 honoree. Danny’s real estate career began during the 2007–2008 financial crisis, a challenging era that sharpened his ability to spot true value, manage complex deals, and stay cool under pressure. He went on to manage luxury real estate portfolios across the DC metro area, gaining a unique edge in understanding investment-grade assets, appreciation potential, and the finer details that separate great homes from good ones. Over the past 4.5 years, Danny has been part of more than $100 million in real estate transactions, representing a diverse client base — from first-time luxury buyers and relocating executives to seasoned investors building wealth through DMV real estate. His ability to analyze market trends, forecast returns, and create customized buying and selling strategies makes him a go-to advisor in the $1M+ space. Born and raised in Friendship Heights, with deep ties to Chevy Chase, Bethesda, Georgetown — and now living in Rock Creek Palisades, Kensington with his wife Meggie — Danny brings more than expertise. He brings roots, relationships, and a real commitment to his clients’ long-term success. Whether you're looking to sell a high-value home, buy into a top-performing zip code, or scale your real estate portfolio, Danny delivers expert guidance and white-glove service — from first showing to final closing.
title: REALTOR® licensed in DC, MD & VA

description: About Beth Born and raised along the scenic beaches of Southern California, Beth decided to relocate to the DC region 12 years ago and has never looked back. No stranger to the stress of moving, Beth’s passion is to help others find their home just as she has found hers. With a clear understanding that a home purchase is not just a financial investment, but an emotional one, Beth helps her clients to seamlessly navigate the complexities of the real estate process placing emphasis on every detail along the way. Thanks to her unparalleled compassion and unique insight into her clients’ distinct needs, Beth delivers hassle-free, personalized, and fun experiences for each client she works with. When she's not working, Beth enjoys spending time with her family and exploring the many vibrant neighborhoods her city has to offer. Client Testimonials: "Buying or selling a house can be a daunting experience. If you are looking for someone extremely knowledgeable about the local real estate market---can guide you through the process from A-Z with real practical advice---has great patience, humor, and is a joy to work with--then you should hire Beth Borenstein." - J. Marlin "Beth has helped us with our real estate needs for several years. Because we have had to out of the area, she was our person on the ground to handle everything, and I mean everything. Initially, she helped my daughter find an appropriate rental and negotiate successfully with her landlord. Later, she helped us renovate and then sell our house, a process that was absolutely horrible for us to handle long distance. She went way above and beyond for us: meeting workers at the house, negotiating prices for repairs - the whole shebang. And then the house us a fair price." - Jean Carr "Beth was extremely patient and helpful our search our dream home. She had a deep understanding of our wish list as well as what we were and were not willing to compromise on. Overall, anyone searching a home would be lucky to have Beth as their guide." - D. Welch
title: Realtor® SRS, AHWD

description: About Elana It means the world to me to be trusted with something as meaningful as the place people call home—where memories are made, chapters are written, and life unfolds. I absolutely love what I do. Real estate, for me, isn’t just about transactions or listings—it’s about people, connection, and helping you move from one chapter of your life to the next with clarity, confidence, and care. Every home has a story, and it’s my honor to help tell yours in a way that attracts the right buyer and creates a smooth, rewarding experience from start to finish. Before real estate, I spent years as a creative producer in New York, Chicago and Philadelphia, which taught me how to bring ideas to life, craft meaningful experiences, and connect people through intention. Those same skills shape how I serve my clients today — from thoughtfully preparing a home for sale to designing events and workshops that empower buyers and sellers to move forward with confidence. I’m grateful for the trust my clients place in me and for the community that continually inspires my work. Together, we’re not just buying or selling homes — we’re building stronger, more connected communities, one closing at a time. www.elanaboulos.com
title: REALTOR®

description: About Kimberly Kimberly’s prime impetus is to be an invaluable partner to sellers, buyers, builders, and investors of residential property in Maryland, Washington D.C. and Virginia. Kimberly’s extensive background in customer service, sales, and operations provide a unique perspective in driving the most favorable results for her clients. Her aggressive negotiation tactics and superior focus on customer satisfaction work toward securing the most auspicious terms for her clients. Clients respect and appreciate her honest, and straight-forward approach to providing decisive advice and feedback, her keen attention to detail, and her astute understanding of what homebuyers look for when purchasing a home. As an expert in the DMV real estate market, Kimberly’s priority is to use her knowledge to prepare and educate her clients to confidently make smart, critical decisions throughout the real estate transaction. Kimberly’s clients consistently remark on her unwavering integrity, her patience throughout the decision-making process, and her dedication to meeting their individual needs. There is never a question as to whose team she is on; it is always her clients’, and they feel it. Along with her MBA and BA degrees in Business and Psychology, earned at the University of Miami and American University respectively, Kimberly maintains the following designations, issued by the National Realtor Association (NAR): Accredited Buyer's Representative (ABR), Seller Representative Specialist (SRS), and Pricing Strategy Advisor (PSA). Kimberly knows the highest compliment she can receive is a referral from friends, family, clients and customers, colleagues and teammates. She strives to establish strong client relationships that extend past the culmination of the transaction and to continually reinforce her commitment to those relationships.
title: Realtor®

description: About Rocky As a second-generation Realtor®, Rocky has been around and excited real estate since a child. This passion for real estate has led him to amazing success in his career and he is consistently ranked in the top 10 in the Bethesda area based on sales volume as well as top 1% Nationwide for all Realtors®! He loves working with both buyers and sellers, whether looking in the luxury market or a first-time home buyer he is equally committed to giving you the expertise, passion, and results that you deserve! Rocky is also uniquely gifted in finding off-market properties and great investment opportunities for his clients.
