He has sold many millions in the Luxury Market and uses the same passion, expertise, and cutting-edge when selling a $2,000,0000 home as he does when selling a $200,000 home. He is passionate not only about real estate but also about providing the best customer service for each and every client!
title: Realtor®

description: About Laura Laura is committed to using her experience and knowledge of the real estate market to help her clients buy and sell wisely. She routinely goes above and beyond to provide the exceptional service that she strongly believes her clients deserve. Laura particularly enjoys working with first time home buyers and helping them navigate the buying process. She remembers going through that sometimes confusing process herself more than a decade ago when she bought her home with the help of the District's Home Purchase Assistance Program (HPAP). In fact, it was that experience that inspired her to get her real estate license. Before shifting her career to real estate, Laura was a dedicated nonprofit manager. Whether raising money for housing programs for people with disabilities, managing a residential program for homeless youth, advising homeowners facing foreclosure, or educating residents about environmental issues in their homes, her work has always focused in some way on housing. Laura believes that owning real estate is an important component of strong, stable communities and a tool for building individual wealth. She believes that everyone deserves to live in a home that is affordable, healthy, efficient and resilient to the impacts of climate change. Laura loves her little blue bungalow in the NE DC neighborhood of Woodridge. When she’s not working on real estate, she's raising two amazing boys, cooking, seeking out unforgettable food experiences, working her way through the list of home maintenance/improvement projects, meeting up with her writing group at local coffee shops, trying to wrangle her rescue beagle Penny on a dog walk or traversing nearby rivers and trails on foot, bike or kayak. A few spots that Laura enjoys around the DMV: The Franciscan Monastery in Brookland The Anacostia River (the whole thing really but specifically near the Bladensburg Waterfront Park ) The REACH at the Kennedy Center A few of Laura's Favorite Restaurants in the DMV: La Cosecha Food Hall (specifically Arepa Zone and La Casita Pupuseria) Call Your Mother Deli Mecho's Dominican Kitchen
title: Realtor

description: About Avery Avery grew up on Capitol Hill in the heart of DC. After leaving for college in Los Angeles she had careers in theater, brain research at Johns Hopkins, and started and ran an e-commerce company before settling on real estate as the field best suited to her insatiable curiosity and love of helping people. In the first 6 years, Avery completed over 100 transactions across DC, Maryland and Virginia. Avery’s clients rely on and refer her because of her vast knowledge base, and patient, fun approach to determining exactly what their priorities are. She then applies well developed processes to deliver results.
title: Realtor

description: About Jason Jason Bradley, a fourth-generation Washingtonian, possesses a profound passion for real estate. With 19 years of dedicated experience, he has successfully transformed homeownership dreams into reality for numerous individuals. Jason approaches each client with unwavering commitment and integrity, leveraging his extensive industry background and local area knowledge. As an accomplished Realtor, Jason accomplished his first property sale at the young age of 20. With his years of experience and innovative marketing skills, he strives to provide a seamless and stress-free home buying/selling experience. Jason consistently exceeds expectations by representing the best interests of his clients with compassion, consideration, and dependability. His ultimate objective is to ensure that every client feels at ease, confident, and supported throughout their decision-making process. Motivated by a deep sense of family, community, and a genuine desire to assist others, Jason creates a welcoming and nurturing environment for his clients, simplifying the reality process. When not fulfilling clients' homeownership aspirations, he actively supports the Washington Commanders, cherishes quality moments with family and friends, or embarks on picturesque cycling adventures through Rock Creek Park. My Website
title: Realtor®

description: About Sarah Sarah grew up in the DMV area and fell in love with the city as a teenager. Following her graduation from the University of Maryland, she made the exciting move to D.C. where she enjoyed city living for 15 years. Eventually, she relocated to Bethesda to be closer to work and has lived there ever since. Prior to her career in real estate, Sarah worked in corporate eCommerce and Marketing, leading teams and helping create elegant, seamless customer experiences. The turning point in her career occurred when she assisted her parents in downsizing and selling her childhood home. This experience ignited her passion for real estate, prompting her to get her license and help others with their real estate goals. Now, she focuses on helping clients across the spectrum, whether they are looking for their first condo or need to downsize from their long-time home. When she is not working with clients, Sarah can be found running on the Capital Crescent Trail, exploring the C&O Canal with her husband and daughter, or trying one of the many new restaurants across the city!
title: Realtor® | Licensed in MD

description: About Dee Dee I was born and raised in Chicago and am often quickly identified as a Midwesterner. I welcome the designation, as it connotes friendliness, warmth and a value system that rewards richness of character rather than holdings. My degrees are in psychology and marketing, and I credit them for my understanding of the need for and appreciation of finding one’s home. Real estate is a passion for me. The decision to purchase a home is the most significant one many of us ever make, and it impacts us on so many levels, including financial, intellectual, and emotional. To have a role in such an important time in the lives of others is a sincere privilege and a welcomed responsibility! While I am licensed and practice in the wide DC metro area, Capitol Hill is my home and my specialty. Many years ago (too many to mention) we purchased our first historic Capitol Hill home and lovingly restored it. We then moved through a series of historic Hill home projects on our own and today continue our purchase and renovate avocation with our children and my wonderful friends and clients. I know the DC market, particularly the Hill, in great detail, and especially enjoy sharing that knowledge with first-time buyers. Their joy in finding that first perfect nest is profound and infectious. In working with all my buyer clients, I love the challenge of finding the right home, of crafting a persuasive and attractive offer, and of designing one that can prevail in competitive bidding situations. For my seller clients, I love getting their home market-ready, establishing the right price point, and then presenting their beloved home in a compelling manner. My husband and I have three children, all raised on the Hill. They went to St. Peter’s, Gonzaga and Visitation, then Babson, Georgetown, and the University of Michigan. All of them are active in real estate (I still help out with their tile, masonry, and paintwork), and they are three of my favorite people on earth. What else holds my interest and energy besides real estate and family? Well, traveling with family to the some of the world’s most beautiful real estate. I am also devoted to our 11-year-old Chesapeake Bay Retriever, Ripken. He travels with us on our cherished family adventures and has been known to pull his weight on demolition days during our Hill renovation projects. In the service of my clients, I strive for excellence and leverage my talent, experience, and expertise on their behalf. While I have been blessed with awards and recognition based on industry metrics, the essence of my success is that I truly love what I do and the people with whom I do it.
title: Realtor®

description: About Brand Insider Group At Brand Insider Group, our clients aren't just clients—they become Insiders. We treat you like family, ensuring you receive full-service care and attention while saving money every step of the way. As lifelong Northern Virginia residents, we know the local market inside and out. Our experience and commitment mean you get the best results with a personal touch. Whether you are selling, buying, or building a custom property, our collaborative approach provides you with the comprehensive knowledge and informed decision-making support necessary to navigate the complexities of the market effectively. Together, we strive to uphold the highest standards of service excellence, empowering our clients to achieve their real estate goals with confidence. Reach out to our team and experience the Insider difference!

About Erica Erica fell in love with D.C. while studying at Georgetown University and has called the District home for over 20 years. She has worked for several D.C. startups, where she maintained a focus on helping clients to achieve their goals. With over 13 years of client services experience, a background in data and analytics and a commitment to quick and responsive communication, she ensures her buyers and sellers feel informed and supported throughout the process. She is an advocate for her clients and works to achieve the best possible outcome in every transaction. In her free time, Erica can be found checking out new restaurants or taking fitness classes around the city. She loves exploring D.C.’s ever-changing neighborhoods and all they have to offer. After several years living in Shaw and Petworth, Erica and her husband recently purchased a home in Colonial Village.
title: Realtor®

description: About Stephanie Stephanie is driven to provide as a ‘stress-free’ real estate experience as possible. She prides herself on attention to detail and the ability to multitask ensuring a smooth and efficient real estate transaction. Stephanie’s midwestern values of honesty, dedication and a strong work ethic were instilled in her while growing up in Michigan and attending Michigan State University's School of Hospitality within the Eli Broad College of Business. After graduating in 2003, she began her real estate career in Chicago, Illinois, with Koenig & Strey, one of Chicago's premier real estate firms, and Toll Brothers, a luxury home builder. Stephanie relocated to the Nation’s Capital in 2010 and after a decade with Washington Fine Properties, she relocated to Compass at the beginning of 2023. She has worked with the most discerning clients and has successfully executed many complex transactions. Known for her creative strategies and strong negotiation skills, she provides her clients success in every market condition. Stephanie knows what it takes, and she invites you to put her extensive knowledge of the greater DC area and her professional sensibility to work. Outside of real estate, Stephanie enjoys wine, all things Peloton, spending time with her family, including her yellow labrador Stella, and getting her Jeep Wrangler out on the trails. She is an active member of the Junior League of Washington and living where she works, Stephanie resides in Maryland.
title: Realtor®

description: About Michael Michael specializes in Georgetown area real estate. With the support of three experienced associates, Michael has achieved over $600 million in sales and more than 600 closed transactions. Michael and his team are committed to providing their clients with exceptional service and skillful counsel through all phases of the buying and selling processes. For his sellers, Michael's approach is simple: generate the largest return possible, and negotiate the best terms of sale. Michael aggressively markets all of his listings with extensive print, electronic, video, and social media campaigns. Michael's local expertise and decade-long track record of success guarantee his sellers an accurate valuation of their properties and professional execution from start to finish. Buyers engaged with Michael and his team benefit from an unrivaled working knowledge of single-family homes, condominium buildings, and investment opportunities in the Georgetown area. The team works tirelessly to secure target properties their buyers and deftly navigates them through every element of the purchase contract. Michael also calls Georgetown home. After growing up in suburban Boston, he attended American University. Michael has been a proud Washingtonian ever since. He now resides in the Georgetown area with his wife and three young daughters.
title: Executive Vice President

description: About Leslie Leslie is a highly dedicated and experienced real estate professional, known for her unwavering commitment to serving clients with integrity and hard work. Leslie has a superior ability to listen to, understand, and deliver on clients' needs with a strategic focus on meeting their goals. When working with Leslie, clients can expect a personalized and strategic approach to their real estate needs. Her dedication to delivering exceptional service, combined with her deep knowledge of the local market, makes Leslie the ideal choice for buyers and sellers seeking a trustworthy and results-driven real estate partner. With an undergraduate degree from the University of Michigan and graduate studies at the University of Maryland, Leslie brings a wealth of knowledge and expertise to her real estate career. Prior to entering the industry, she worked as a public relations consultant for health-related organizations, honing her communication and persuasion skills. As a long-time Washingtonian, Leslie has a deep interest in the history and development of local neighborhoods. Her personal experience of living in a 1909 Columbia Heights row house gives her unique insights into the area's real estate stock. Outside of work, she is an animal lover who is actively involved in her community and enjoys walking in Rock Creek Park, traveling, and exploring the local dining scene. Leslie is a proud member of Arrow Group, a team of professional Realtors with 40+ years of combined experience and a reputation for excellence in the industry. With access to off-market properties and opportunities that most agents cannot provide, Leslie and the team are dedicated to providing their clients with a competitive edge. Arrow Group agents believe in empowering their clients with the knowledge and tools to make the best-informed decisions. This commitment to educating clients has contributed to their success, with annual sales in excess of $100 million and consistent recognition in Real Trends America's Best Real Estate Professionals and The Best of Washingtonian.
title: Realtor®

description: About Peggy Originally from New York, Peggy has been living and working in the DC area 28 years. She brings a diverse background to her real estate business, with experience ranging from photojournalism to home renovation. Her creativity, attention to detail and knowledge of houses, from the ground up, have been invaluable to her real estate clients. Licensed in MD, DC and VA, Peggy represents clients from across the real estate spectrum, from first time buyers to seasoned investors. All of her clients appreciate her systematic approach to understanding their needs and her ability to educate them on the market and ever-changing real estate process. She is an excellent problem solver, and will do whatever it takes to ensure that her clients attain their real estate goals. When not with clients you will find Peggy with family, donating her time to art education, on the tennis court or running around with her Bernese Mountain Dog, Bella. Client Testimonials: ★★★★★ Peggy is by leaps and bounds the best realtor my husband and I have ever worked with. She helped us buy a new home and sell our old one under very challenging circumstances. We did everything possible to drive her crazy and failed! She is super smart, always calm, insightful, kind, compassionate and has the patience of a saint. Her understanding of the market is incomparable. Her laser focus on every detail and asking the right questions was indispensable in difficult negotiations. We were deeply grateful the hundreds of hours she spent talking us through tough decisions, advising us on options, and going way beyond the call of duty to help us stage and sell our house in a difficult market. Peggy directed us towards the house we ultimately bought and really love—because she really knows her clients. We couldn’t have done this without her and cannot recommend her enough!” - Deb and Frank ★★★★★ Saying Peggy did an amazing job during our house hunting is an understatement. She was on top of everything, if it wasn't for her, I do not think we would have bought a house yet. Most importantly for us, Peggy was NEVER pushy. Every question/concern we had was addressed immediately, and she helped us every step of the way. Peggy also pointed it in a direction of great finance people that helped us get our ducks in a row. She is an all star! We will definitely use her next time we decide to buy or sell a place! | Buyer, Filip Popovic ★★★★★ Peggy did a fantastic job in helping us buy our first home. She provided excellent guidance to help us determine what exactly we were looking for, and was patient as we looked at a wide variety of houses in order to narrow down our preferences. Peggy is very knowledgeable of the area and was extremely resourceful when it came to answering the more difficult questions. She is very reachable and responsive, and was an excellent communicator when we were making difficult decisions. Peggy goes above and beyond as an agent; we couldn't recommend her enough! | Buyer, A Kravitt ★★★★★ Peggy is a great agent. She's sold two houses for me. . .both sold the first weekend they were on the market. She's organized, methodical, thorough and VERY knowledgable about market conditions. Great judgment on all aspects of buying and selling. | Buyer. Adam Strochak
title: Realtor - SRES - | Licensed in DC, MD & VA

description: About Daniel Daniel has a discerning eye and an unwavering commitment to exceptional customer service. By blending his business savvy, extensive design expertise, and innate understanding of people, he seamlessly matches buyers with their ideal homes and transforms sellers’ properties to show at their absolute best. His clients range from first-time homebuyers, empty nesters, growing families, and investors to Members of the United States Congress and Senate, a U.S. Vice President, an Attorney General, a Solicitor General, award-winning doctors, and international news anchors. Daniel has become the trusted real estate advisor for clients across Washington, D.C., Maryland, Virginia, and the Delaware Beaches who are seeking a refined, ethical, and discreet concierge-level service. He is also highly respected within the brokerage community—an advantage that helps his sellers during negotiations and allows his buyer clients to secure homes, no matter the competition. His stellar reputation for transparency, candor, and unflinching honesty—all delivered with his signature wit—extends well beyond his long-standing clients and onto his newest ones. Daniel lives in a historic Dupont Circle row house with his husband and their two Chihuahua mixes, Chico and Céline. In their free time, they enjoy contemporary art, karaoke, independent films, opera, bone-dry red wines, and spending time with family—locally in Maryland and Virginia, and globally in Seoul and Berlin.
title: Senior Vice President | Daniel Brewer Advisory Partners

description: About Felicia Originally from Ohio, Felicia relocated to D.C. in 2016 to pursue a new career. She quickly fell in love with real estate and the vibrant DMV area. A proud graduate of Tiffin University, Felicia is an award-winning professional with over a decade of experience in client relations, communications, and sales support. She has successfully served hundreds of clients looking to buy, sell, or rent in the DMV. Felicia is dedicated to giving back to her community. She volunteers weekly with her local Senior Services Meals on Wheels and Grocery Program. She is an active member of the Alexandria Affordable Housing Committee and the Eisenhower West/Landmark Van Dorn Implementation Advisory Group. Her commitment to the real estate profession is evident through her extensive involvement with the Association of Realtors at local, state, and national levels. She has served on various committees, including: National Association of Realtors : Risk Management Committee (2023), Insurance Committee (2024 & 2025) Maryland Association of Realtors : Housing Opportunity Committee (2022 - Current) Northern Virginia Association of Realtors : Board of Directors (2025), Young Professionals Network (2020-2023) Vice-Chair (2021), Chair (2022); CARES Committee (2021-Current) Vice-Chair (2023), Chair (2024); Leadership Institute Graduate (2021); Nominating Committee (2022); Professionalism and Ethics Advisory Group (2023); NVAR Grievance Committee (2024), NV/PAC (2025) Virginia Association of Realtors : Risk Management Committee (2022); Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion (DEI) (2023-2024) As a DMV transplant, Felicia understands the importance of finding a place that feels like home, driving her passion to ensure her clients have the same fulfilling experience.
title: Realtor®

description: About Jeff As one of the most respected agents the DC area, Jeff Brier seamlessly blends unrivaled experience with personalized service. Prior to moving to DC in 1982, Jeff worked in sales, where he cultivated the tenacity and negotiating skills that serve him so well in his enduring career as a Realtor. Today, Jeff is proud to call a diverse, prominent group of people his clients—including national, local, and international business executives, high-ranking government officials such as members of Congress and various embassies, as well as World Bank executives and university presidents. Jeff’s business approach is driven results, but also his love of people and the connections he forges along the way. In fact, it’s not all uncommon for Jeff to guide his clients through each of life’s most momentous milestones—from the purchase of a first home to the decision to downsize years later. Jeff specializes in the sale and resale of historic and single family homes, condominiums, cooperatives, and multi-unit buildings, although he expertly partners with clients at all price points and in all stages of life. In his spare time, Jeff can be found in Dupont Circle enjoying time with his dog, Tessa. Check out The Martin & Jeff Group's website following this link!
title: Realtor®

description: About Amanda Representing DMV homeowners and future homeowners, Amanda is committed to listening to her clients’ needs and utilizing her keen negotiating skills to ensure a successful transaction. Her business is built on dedication, determination, communication and trust while embodying the ability to cater to and adapt to all of her clients’ Real Estate needs. Amanda's fun spirit, creative outlook and warm, personable approach have helped establish her as one of the areas most sought after agents. Relationships are the cornerstone of her business and she lives by the motto "who you work with matters". A DC native for over 25 years, Amanda understands the intangible benefits of life in the DC region with its culture, bustle, views and diversity. Amanda graduated from the University of Connecticut with a BA in Sociology and holds her Master's degree in Social Work from Catholic University. She and her husband also own a restaurant in the Navy Yard neighborhood of DC, strengthening her close ties to the community. The customer service and sales skills she forged as a small business owner helped Amanda discover her true passion, real estate, and led her to pursue a successful career with Compass. Over the past several years, Amanda has become an esteemed realtor, highly regarded by her clients and professionals in the field. A current Capitol Hill resident, she is well connected and actively involved in the community. Her contacts and long term residency leverage her enthusiasm and expertise. Amanda showcases her homes on her website and utilizes a team of professional service providers to assist with her clients’ buying and selling needs including painters, stagers, designers, handymen and inspectors. She is communicative, detail oriented and thorough and she’ll be alongside you every step of the way. “Rest assured, I’ll listen to you! With an understanding of your needs and wants, I’ll do everything within my power to ensure you achieve them all”. When she’s not working with clients, Amanda spends time with her husband, 2 sons and extremely exuberant dog. In our search for an investment property, Amanda was patient as we explored different neighborhoods, candid in her impressions of homes we toured, and shared valuable insight in terms of both neighborhoods and home sales. We found her sense of aesthetics and ability to reimagine a space invaluable as we contemplated renovations to the properties. She was always responsive and quick to meet deadlines. She is the friend and professional you want to have on your side when making one of the biggest decisions in your life." – Sylvia S. ★★★★★ "Amanda and I have been working together for over a year, as I am preparing to put my house on the market. Amanda was extremely professional with regards to appointments, returning calls, suggestions for making the home more salable and securing needed assistance in getting the home ready for market. If there were problems she was there to provide assistance and smooth the way. The advertising of the homes and MLS listing presented the homes attractively both of the homes sold for over asking price. If you are considering selling your home, I would highly recommend Amanda and I feel you will be pleasantly surprised at what she can do for you." - Brenda F. ★★★★★ "Amanda made my homebuying experience a joy! She was flexible and patient as I learned the lay of the land as a first time homebuyer, and she dealt with the difficult buyer expertly! I would definitely recommend Amanda to anyone looking to buy a home in DC!" - Amanda M. ★★★★★ "Amanda was great to work with when selling our condo in Capitol Hill! She had an understanding of the neighborhood, values, and market better than anybody else. She answered a million questions for us as first time home sellers, and was easy to get in touch with, super responsive, and got us well over our asking price!" - Cassie S. ★★★★★ "Amanda was a pleasure to work with when selling my house but, more importantly, really knew her stuff - from the neighborhood to the process. Everything went as smooth as it possibly could, and I got a great result." - Adam B. ★★★★★ "Amanda helped us with our first house sale, and by 'helped us,' I mean she took care of EVERYTHING. No matter what the issue was, no matter the time of day, Amanda was right on top of it the whole way through. Our house sold in the first weekend and we could not be happier. If you're selling your house and can get Amanda on your team, do it. You can't go wrong." - Matt N. ★★★★★ "We truly enjoyed working with Amanda and her team! She was totally "in" when it came to meeting our needs on the sake of our home. Our agent, Amanda Briggs, was helpful getting us the legal counsel needed to navigate this issue and was patient as we did so. She had a buyer for us immediately after the TOPA issue as resolved." - Kay F.
title: Realtor® | Who You Work With Matters

description: About Jan Jan Brito – Your Trusted Real Estate Partner With deep expertise in the DC metro area market, as well as the US Virgin Islands, and an unwavering commitment to her clients, Jan Brito has built her reputation on three pillars: exceptional knowledge, genuine care, and seamless execution. What Sets Jan Apart: Jan's approach goes far beyond transactions. She specializes in supporting clients through life's most significant transitions—whether you're a first-time buyer, downsizing from a longtime family home, or navigating complex situations like estate sales or remote relocations. Her particular expertise with senior clients and their families has earned her a reputation for patience, integrity, and the ability to guide people through emotionally challenging moves with compassion and clarity. Full-Service Excellence: Jan doesn't just list your property—she orchestrates every detail. Drawing on an extensive network of trusted contractors, stagers, movers, and service providers, she transforms homes to achieve top-dollar results, often securing above-asking prices and multiple offers within days. For buyers, she connects you with the right mortgage brokers, inspectors, and resources to ensure a smooth path to closing. Always Available, Always Advocating: Clients consistently praise Jan's responsiveness—whether it's a late-night question or a weekend showing, she's there. Her communication is clear, proactive, and reassuring, even when unexpected challenges arise. She anticipates next steps, catches critical contract details others miss, and fiercely advocates to protect your interests. Results That Speak Volumes: Quick sales at exceptional prices. Complex problems solved with grace. Remote transactions handled seamlessly. First-time buyers guided with confidence. Longtime homeowners supported with dignity. Jan's track record reflects not just her market knowledge, but her dedication to making you feel like her only client—every single time. When you work with Jan, you gain more than a realtor. You gain a trusted advisor, a tireless advocate, and a partner who will be there for you long after closing. Client Testimonials ★★★★★ " Jan was responsive to my questions and needs in selling the property. She provided to update and get the house ready for which was a real godsend. The house 2-3 weeks from the time it went on the traditionally one of the worst times to sell a house. " - S Shapiro ★★★★★ " Jan worked with our firm regarding probate administration where property needed to be . She made the process seamless and took care of every detail, including assisting one of the heirs in finding a new place to live to selling/disposing of the personal property. Her advice on how to handle multiple offers was excellent. I highly recommend Jan to any law firm working on probate administration. " - S Eckstein ★★★★★ " Jan came recommended my attorney and everyone else I encountered who knew her. She was so good at being our buy-side that we engaged her to be our sell-side on our current house. She has great instincts and knowledge of the , and keeps us on a schedule selling our house soon. She is a friendly and kind and patient. Highly recommended. " - H Kaplan ★★★★★ " Jan is an amazing realtor. She made the long, stressful process of finding and closing on my first home so much easier. She came highly recommended from my colleague and from my first correspondence with her, I knew I was in good hands. Jan is extremely responsive, knowledgeable, punctual, well connected and goes above and beyond to ensure your needs are met. She truly provides boutique service as if you're her only client. I am eternally grateful having Jan my side during this process. Highly recommended - I can't say enough other than you want Jan on your team! " - C St. Clair
title: Associate Broker in MD, Realtor - Licensed in DC

description: About Eric Principal and Co-Owner of the Vassar Broermann Group of Compass Real Estate. The Vassar Broermann Group has closed over $875M+ in total team sales and assisted hundreds of clients successfully navigating buying and selling residential real estate. With over 17 years of experience, Eric brings keen attention to detail, knowledge of the local area, outstanding customer service and candor to each and every client he works with. His professionalism, creative negotiation, and unwavering drive to satisfy his clients are what set him apart from other agents. Eric has a genuine concern for his clients' best interests and works tirelessly to ensure they are satisfied with his service before, during, and after closing. Eric works in all facets of residential real estate from the purchase and sale of single-family residences, to selling luxury condominiums, and everything in between. He has unparalleled insight into the neighborhoods he serves, from Capitol Hill to 16th Street Heights, Petworth, Logan Circle, and U Street, as well as Northern Virginia and Maryland. A prior Military Officer in the US Air Force, Eric came to DC in 2004. He was recruited for the US State Department prior to finding his home in real estate. Eric's diverse experience and vast knowledge in both new home sales and the resale market allows him to council his clients on innovative strategies and provide unparalleled market insights for every kind of project. Eric is an avid cook who loves to entertain friends and family as well as explore the ever growing food scene of DC. In 2021, he started competing in triathlons completing a 70.3 Ironman, his first race ever. Eric lives in 16th Street Heights, with his partner and their chocolate lab, Abbey. He can often be found running and cycling through Rock Creek Park.
title: Executive Vice President

description: About Brenda Gail Brenda Gail enjoys a successful real estate career by shepherding clients through selling and buying with thought, care, attention to detail and frequent communication. She keeps her finger on the pulse of the market, and clients benefit from her depth of knowledge, negotiating and problem solving ability. During her long career she has honed her negotiating skills and amassed considerable knowledge about neighborhoods and houses in the DMV, and her finance background is often useful. She maintains a list of valued professionals including mortgage lenders, attorneys, home inspectors and others to whom she refers those who need such services. Buying and selling property, one of the largest financial transactions many people make, can cause intense emotions. Brenda Gail's sellers and buyers appreciate her upbeat and calm demeanor, and show it by their repeat business and referrals which comprises 80% of her business.
title: REALTOR® | Licensed in DC, VA, & MD

description: About Terry I am focused on providing you with the best results and service in the industry. I listen carefully to understand your real estate goals and work hard to create solutions that make sense for you. Whether you are new to the market or an experienced investor, I have the expertise, proven track record, and resources to help you achieve your real estate goals. As is often said, real estate is about location,location, location. I have extensive knowledge of the Washington, DC area and can help you find the right home for you or the right buyer for your home. Client Testimonials Scroll down for more ★★★★★ “ I used Terry Brown Realty Team to purchase 2 homes and to sell 2. The team took the time to really understand me and my needs and help me find the perfect house that met all of my needs. They are patient and care more about the client than just making a sale.. “ - Cindy ★★★★★ “ ...If you want a true partner in getting your house ready and most importantly selling your house, then I recommend this team highly. Terry and his wife were true partners with us throughout and they took great care to make the process seamless and the experience as non-stressful as possible... “ - Jennifer ★★★★★ “ You’ll have my gratitude forever! Unless, of course, I discover ghosts in the house wanting to share my precious space, or the roof falls in or something to that effect! But, seriously, you did go above and beyond the call of duty and I do appreciate that. “ - Marguarite
title: Associate Broker

description: About Hilary Hilary is fourth-generation Washingtonian with deep roots in the area. She has lived throughout the Washington D.C. region—from growing up in Potomac to attending middle and high school in Bethesda, and later graduating from the University of Maryland. Now a resident of D.C., Hilary’s strong connection to her hometown inspired her to shift from a career in marketing to real estate in 2018. Hilary brings a wealth of knowledge and understanding of what it takes to sell a home in today's modern age. Her experience working in marketing gives her a unique perspective that sets her apart from other realtors from a listing perspective. For buyers, Hilary's years of client-facing roles have honed her skills to quickly pick up on their needs. She takes pride in developing meaningful connections with her clients that go beyond the transaction. She deeply cares about her clients. Known for her thoughtful and strategic approach, Hilary is a strong negotiator who advocates fiercely but respectfully on behalf of her clients. Her work is grounded in integrity—earning the trust of her clients through transparency and honesty. Hilary is exceptionally detail oriented. She will be one step ahead of you throughout the entire process. Hilary's achievements speak for themselves—she was placed in the top 25% of Realtors by Homesnap early on in her career and received a Top Agent award from Compass Real Estate in 2021, 2022, and 2023. Hilary is deeply involved in the community and holds several charity positions. Hilary is passionate about helping her clients discover and cultivate their own connections with the city she calls home. Click here for a link to Hilary's Zillow Reviews. Click here for a link to Hilary's Instagram . Click here for a link to Hilary's Homes.com page.
title: Realtor® Licensed in DC/MD/VA

description: About Grace Dedicated DMV Realtor Grace Buck does more than guide her clients — she fights for them. Her mission? To ensure every client walks away on closing day with a smile, a result she'll go above and beyond to deliver. Whether you're looking to buy, sell, or invest, you can always count on Grace to arm you with the knowledge you need to make the best decision for your future. Looking back, Grace's personal investment in real estate emerged at a young age — a discovery she attributes to being raised by a mother who helmed her own brokerage. It was a passion that would only flourish with time. Today, Grace is known for her vast industry expertise, unyielding commitment to her clients, and emphasis on making lifelong connections. Powered by her proven negotiating skills, Grace has mastered the art of getting top-dollar for sellers and helping buyers win while in a competitive market — and she'd be honored to do the same for you. Outside of work, Grace enjoys DC restaurants and sporting events, as well as spending time with her family. Connect with Grace now for an experience that always delivers. See below to read what her clients say!
title: REALTOR®

description: About Damian With over 30 years of real estate sales and in the United States and Europe, Damian is recognized for his skills in analyzing and evaluating real estate, , and financial operations. Damian is a superior choice for buying or selling homes in the D.C. area. Damian is a Realtor® licensed in the District of Columbia, Maryland, and Virginia. His extensive experience in listings and sales, representing both buyers and sellers, has made him exceptionally successful within the local and international community. Damian is associated with and has greatly contributed to national record-breaking sales within his field. With his fluency in Spanish and some knowledge of French, and his real estate designations, SRES and GRI (Seniors Real Estate Specialist, and a Graduate of the Realtor Institute), as well as additional memberships in the British Institute of ; The Institute of Sales and the Chaîne des Rôtisseurs, Damian is the superior choice to help you achieve success in your real estate transaction. Damian will be happy to provide all the information you need to buy or sell real estate in Washington DC, Bethesda, Potomac, and surrounding areas.
title: REALTOR®

description: About Thomas Tom arrived in the DC metro area in 1992 after graduating from the University of Richmond. He worked in the tech consulting industry for three years before returning to earn his MBA at the University of Texas at Austin in 1997. After business school, Tom returned to our nation's capital to continue in his tech consulting career for a few years, until beginning to yearn for a more passionate life’s work. In the beginning of 2003, Tom left the tech world to begin a more meaningful career path—helping people find "a place to call home.” Since Tom became a licensed realtor in DC, MD, and VA, he has proudly helped his clients buy or sell homes, and generally pursue their pursuit of personal happiness. Tom believes purchasing a home should be a fun and exciting process for buyers while selling a house should be an easy and streamlined process for every seller. From 2006 to 2014, Tom was the number one agent in the Washington, DC RE/MAX network when he formed his own elite team of passionate realtors. Since joining Compass, The Tom Buerger Team has continued to deliver a world-class customer experience predicated on hard work, compassion, and loyalty. For Tom and his team, helping people buy and sell real estate is more than just a job. It's our calling, passion, and preferred way of life!
title: Senior Vice President

description: About Matthew Matthew has over five years of experience in the real estate industry as a real estate advisor and property manager, both residential and commercial. He was raised in Pittsburg and graduated from the University of Notre Dame’s College of Science with a degree in Science-Business. After graduation, Matthew jumped right into his real estate career in the DMV. Matthew brings a care and precision to evaluating properties that allows any home buyer or seller to feel at ease while they benefit from his expertise. He is especially passionate about helping first-time home buyers navigate the complex DMV market. In his free time, Matthew enjoys swimming, golfing, biking, and activities around the National Mall. Bringing different communities together for entertainment and memorable experiences is one of his greatest passions.
title: Realtor

description: About Christopher Since 2011, Christopher Bulka has guided clients through the complexities of buying and selling residential real estate. Part science and part art, his method blends data-driven strategy, consultative service, and keen insight into consumer behavior to deliver results tailored to each client’s goals and stage of life. Before moving to South Florida, Christopher built a widely respected real estate practice in the Washington, DC metro area, earning a reputation for knowledgeable, reliable, and trustworthy representation. He applies this same approach when working with owner-occupants, investors, move-up buyers, downsizers, and luxury clients throughout Greater Fort Lauderdale, with a focus on East Fort Lauderdale, Wilton Manors, Oakland Park, and the downtown corridor. An award-winning REALTOR® at Compass, Christopher has closed more than $258M in career sales and has been recognized in the Top 1.5% of Agents Nationwide by RealTrends, earned multiple Top Agent awards at Compass, and achieved the International President’s Elite distinction (Top 3% Globally) at his previous brokerage. Christopher’s analysis of market trends, buyer and seller motivations, and neighborhood dynamics consistently positions his clients for success. His renovation experience and design-minded perspective allow buyers to visualize potential while helping sellers present their homes for maximum appeal. Known for his calm professionalism, sharp market insight, and caring guidance, he brings clarity and confidence to every stage of the process. Christopher owns and operates two highly rated short-term rental properties, including one in Lake Ridge, which give him firsthand insight into home preparation, investment properties, and the short-term rental landscape in East Fort Lauderdale. At home in Wilton Manors with his husband, Andrew, and their two dogs, Huckleberry and Dashiel, Christopher embraces his belief that the spaces we inhabit and the experiences we share with the people we love shape the most meaningful parts of our lives.
title: Vice President

description: About Mary Mary understands what her clients need and expect from a real estate agent, learning first-hand having relocated twice with her family. After moving numerous times, she has found a welcoming home for her and her family in the DC metro area. Mary lives in Bethesda, MD with her husband, Dean, and their three children; Dylan, Anna, and David. Mary brings to the real estate market her knowledge in serving clients and providing consistently positive experiences. Before entering real estate, Mary was a CPA with Ernst & Young for more than fourteen years serving multinational clients. While there, Mary obtained a wealth of knowledge and experience, developing a strong attention to detail and an analytical mindset that has carried over into the home selling and buying process. Using these skills, she advocates for her clients’ best interests throughout the entire process. Mary provides her clients with the best, value-added service possible. She keeps her clients informed throughout every step of the process. Mary’s dedication to her clients’ needs starts the first time they meet and goes beyond the closing.
title: Realtor®

description: About Don As a trusted real estate professional, Don Bunuan brings honesty, insight, and deep local knowledge to every transaction. He works with both buyers and sellers, guiding them through every step of the process with care and clarity. A lifelong resident of the DC area, Don specializes in Hyattsville and the Route 1 corridor—communities he knows, loves and calls home himself. Before beginning his career in real estate, Don was a high school teacher and later managed grants and contracts for the U.S. Department of Education. His background gives him a unique edge when it comes to negotiation and contract writing, and his clients benefit from his calm, confident approach and detail-oriented mindset. Born in the Philippines and a proud U.S. citizen since his 20s, Don is also an active member of his community, serving on the leadership board of his children's school. When he’s not working, you’ll likely find him enjoying time with his family.
title: REALTOR®

description: About Annabel Annabel works with Sellers and Buyers in all price ranges in MD, DC and VA. Since 2005 Annabel has been a Top Producer in the DMV's residential real estate market and has hundreds of successful transactions to her credit. She has been recognized repeatedly, both locally and nationally, for her industry accomplishments. She has been one of the top 1.5% of Realtor's in the US since 2014 as recognized by Real Trends, as well as one of Washingtonian Magazine’s “Best Real Estate Agents” 2014-2025. In 2019 she was voted by the readers of Washingtonian Magazine as one of the "100 Best" Real Estate Agents in the DMV and she has been repeatedly recognized by Bethesda Magazine for 11+ years as a Top Producer. Prior to her life in Real Estate, she was one of the top Media Sales professional in the DC market for over 15 years. Annabel is known in our market for her high standard of professional ethics. She has a well-earned reputation as a strong negotiator, client advocate, and manager and often guides her clients through the complicated process of selling and buying at the same time. She measures her success in how many clients over the years have chosen to work with her multiple times and referred her with their family, friends, and colleagues. Annabel has an innate ability to quickly and calmly interpret and negotiate difficult situations. Her tireless enthusiasm, her innovative and hands-on approach, and her always positive demeanor have earned her a spot as among the best in the DMV. Annabel is a devoted Mom to both her 2 and 4-legged babies and can't go more than 48 hours without yoga. She lives in Chevy Chase with her husband and 21-year-old twins in their junior year in college. #TigerMom #CofC Check out her 100+ 5-star reviews at JustAnnabel.com .
title: Realtor®

description: About JT JT is a third-generation Washingtonian and lifelong resident of Montgomery County. With intimate knowledge of the Washington, DC metro area, he is an invaluable source of information on area neighborhoods, market activity, and creative strategies for buying and selling real estate. At just 30 years old, JT had already sold $30 million in real estate and remains a top-producing agent. JT has been recognized as a leading instructor in Bethesda Gateway’s “LAUNCH” program, providing innovative training to new agents both in the classroom and out in the field. JT currently serves as President of Bethesda Gateway’s Agent Council, acting as a liaison between agents and management. Despite his full schedule with work and family, JT maintains strong ties to the community. Former coach of the Bethesda-Chevy Chase varsity ice hockey team, he left the position after 15 years to devote more time to real estate and now fundraises for the team. JT lives in Potomac with his wife Katie, twin boys Patrick and Tyler, and little girl, Madeline. He has practiced real estate in Maryland, DC, and Virginia since 2005.
title: Realtor®

description: About E. L.
title: Realtor® licensed in DC

description: About Erich <br> Erich Cabe’s career has taken him from the great outdoors to the great indoors. Raised in the mountains of Western Pennsylvania, Erich learned to ski as soon as he could walk. His love for the sport led him to ski and teach others at a world- level. He traversed the world, tackling first descents in Alaska, and visiting Chile, Austria, New Zealand, and other countries to compete and train instructors. Stateside, he managed 135 instructors as the owner of a ski and snowboard school. After his fourth knee replacement, Erich had to shift gears. He came to Washington, D.C., to embark on a new adventure: real estate. He helped a friend start a finance company in the 1990s, buying, remodeling, and selling homes, and discovered his next passion. Erich learned quickly that real estate, like skiing, requires patience, dedication, and a steady hand to navigate the terrain. And like teaching, it requires a different plan for every person—and every home. The best part for Erich? Working closely with his clients to facilitate transactions. Tailoring his approach for each engagement, Erich negotiates optimal outcomes while his calming presence and easy communication style keep clients steady. Erich’s knack for closing deals has helped him become one of the region's top-producing agents, with over 90 percent of business coming from referrals. You can still spot Erich on the slopes these days, now with his sons, or surfing from coast to coast. He and his wife Amanda chose to raise their family in the DC–Metro area, a community they both love.
title: Executive Vice President | Realtor®

description: About Christina A long-time area resident, Christina has a comprehensive knowledge of the Greater DC real estate market. Christina's professional work in home renovations and marketing led her to pursue work as a full-time real estate agent representing both buyers and sellers. Her project management background offers a unique benefit to her clients, as she’s able to work seamlessly with both sellers who may need additional help getting their home “polished” for sale, and buyers who are considering purchasing a home that may need a little TLC. Christina is also a savvy investor, who purchased her first investment home in the Petworth neighborhood of DC in 2001, which she currently manages as a rental property. A graduate of Spelman College, Christina puts her decades of marketing experience to work for her clients in the form of creative campaigns and effective communication. In her free time, she enjoys playing pickleball, volunteering with her Riverdale Community Association and movie nights with her teenaged daughter, Sahana.
title: Realtor®

description: About Susan Susan is a multi million dollar producing real estate professional who has used her expertise in negotiation, and advertising to achieve hundreds of smooth and successful real estate transactions for her sellers and buyers since 2004. Prior to her career in real estate, Susan followed her passion for helping others as a shock trauma and neonatal nurse for over 25 years. It was in this career that she learned important skills she brings to real estate including collaboration with her colleagues, multi-tasking, compassionate listening, honesty and professionalism. Her attention to detail, energy, drive and enthusiasm is unmatched. Following her career in nursing, the transition to real estate was easy. Susan has personally bought and sold properties throughout Virginia, Maryland and DC since 1982 and has an extensive knowledge of the area as well as a keen sense of how to get her clients the maximum value for their money. Susan is extremely dedicated to her clients and her service to them continues far beyond the end of each transaction. She is always available to help in any way she can. Susan is licensed in Virginia, Maryland and DC
title: Realtor®

description: About Tony Experience. Communication. Trust. My fourteen years of real estate sales experience follows a decade in executive-level positions in the national and international news media, another eight years on Capitol Hill as a legislative consultant, and three years as a multifamily housing developer. These experiences forged an a ability to look well beyond the obvious to understand the actual wants and needs of my clients - and the most effective way to achieve success for them. The Washington, D.C. metro area has been home for nearly all of my life. My children were born here. I walk my dog every morning on the same field I played football on as an "ankle-biter". I put everything into making sure your experience as a buyer or seller is the best it can be. Awards & Designations Modern Luxury DC Power Player 2021 | ​Top Producer DC Magazine 2021 | 2020 GCAAR Award Winner SRES, RENE
title: Associate Broker

description: About Capital Collective Capital Collective is a new and dynamic team at Compass Real Estate. On this team, we believe in the power of the collective, where individual strengths combine to create a force greater than the sum of its parts. It’s through this emphasis on collaboration, unity, and shared goals that our team provides unparalleled services and access to our clients. When navigating the DC Metropolitan market, choosing an experienced Realtor is of the utmost importance because the process is complex and the neighborhoods are nuanced. Our team will help you understand local laws and contracts, negotiate in competitive offer situations, and help you manage unforeseen circumstances that arise. We understand that to garner the best results, client advisement needs to be personalized and innovative. It also needs to be sophisticated. Backed by the cutting-edge technology and resources of Compass, Capital Collective is at the forefront of the market, equipped with the tools and insights to offer our clients a competitive advantage with the highest level of service. Whether you are buying, selling, or investing in real estate, our team is ready to collaborate with you to achieve your goals. Contact us today to discuss your real estate needs or to learn how we have facilitated transactions totaling well over half a billion dollars, collectively .
title: Capital Collective

description: About Marshall Marshall Carey is a seasoned real estate professional dedicated to helping clients build wealth and secure their futures. Since 2013, he has guided individuals and families through the complexities of real estate transactions, consistently providing a wealth of options and empowering clients with knowledge. Marshall’s approach is rooted in a calm, methodical demeanor, ensuring clients make informed, strategic decisions, even in the most emotional of situations. With a strong background as a financial advisor and mortgage broker, Marshall brings unparalleled expertise and insight to every transaction, navigating clients through every step of the process. His deep understanding of the financial landscape ensures his clients are positioned for long-term success. Outside of his real estate career, Marshall is an entrepreneur, owning a men’s health clinic that provides veterans and others with a safe, confidential space to discuss their health needs. He is also passionate about travel, soccer and family activities, enjoying quality time with his wife, Natalie, and their two boys. Marshall is an avid supporter of local sports, frequently attending DC United games and cheering on his boys in their team sports endeavors. A proud South Florida native, Marshall has witnessed Washington, DC’s transformation into a world-class metropolitan city. His commitment to both the area and his clients has solidified his reputation as a trusted and results-driven real estate expert.
title: Realtor®

description: About Allison Allison is dedicated and responsive to her clients and knows how to help them achieve their real estate goals. She honed these skills practicing law for more than a decade, primarily litigating for Fortune 100 companies, as well as working for two United States Senators. Allison grew up in Chevy Chase, Maryland and is a second generation realtor. She lived in Friendship Heights, Cleveland Park, Logan Circle and Chevy Chase before moving to Potomac, MD to raise her two sons with her husband who is an architect. She is thrilled to sell real estate in her hometown which she knows well and believes is a dynamic and exciting area to live. Allison loves cooking for her family and friends, traveling to Florida and New Jersey to visit family, watching sports, and supporting theater, including serving on the honorary board of the Contemporary American Theater Festival. Allison is a Sidwell Friends School alumna, a former member of the school’s Alumni Association Board, and remains involved in alumni activities. She graduated from the University of Pennsylvania and earned her JD from the Washington College of Law at American University.
title: Associate Broker | Licensed in DC & MD

FOR BUYERS: The DMV market moves fast. I help you stay ahead of it with clear guidance, local insight, and a hands-on approach so you feel confident every step of the way. FOR SELLERS: From strategic pricing to marketing that actually gets attention, I position your home to stand out and attract serious buyers. My goal is simple: maximize your results. INVESTORS & DEVELOPERS: I track the data, trends, and opportunities that matter. Whether you’re growing a portfolio or evaluating your next project, you’ll get the information and direction you need to make profitable decisions CONSIDERING BUYING/SELLING IN THE DMV? Explore my comprehensive downloadable guides below: Ultimate Home Buying Guide Ultimate Home Selling Guide Or visit my website for more information: www.kevincarlsonrealestate.com LET’S CONNECT: My approach is straightforward: real advice, real strategy, and the support you need to move assertively in today’s market. Whether you're thinking about buying, selling, or just want a clearer read on the market, I’m here to help you make a smart, confident move.
title: Realtor®

description: About Carmen Fontecilla Group The Carmen Fontecilla Group is dedicated to providing highest quality service and ensuring the finest experience for our clients. Together we serve Washington, DC; Maryland; Virginia; and Delaware. Our collective knowledge of the local area and market conditions combined with our honesty and commitment to our clients allows us to make the home buying and selling experience a truly gratifying and stress-free one. Our vast network of referrals and real estate support teams allow us to provide a full-service all-inclusive listing and buying package. If you are a first-time home buyer new to the process of applying for a mortgage we are here to facilitate all aspects of your purchase from start to finish. If you are a homeowner hoping to sell quickly for top dollar, we will help you maximize the appeal of your house, exhausting all marketing tools to reach your goals. We strive to exceed your expectations with our service and to be your Realtor team for life.

About Taylor With over $100 million in sales and 11 years of experience, Taylor Carney has built a reputation for delivering exceptional results for buyers and sellers in the D.C. region and beyond. Licensed in four states, Taylor combines his background in sales, marketing, and contract negotiations to help clients navigate the market with confidence. Known for his clear communication and creative problem-solving, he’s especially skilled at securing competitive offers, uncovering off-market opportunities, and guiding sellers to maximize their returns. Taylor’s career began in communications, with roles at the Department of Defense, Hilton Hotels, and small businesses — experience that shaped his ability to advocate for his clients and keep deals moving smoothly. Clients often describe him as approachable, sharp, and unwaveringly dedicated to getting the best outcome. Originally from Newport, Rhode Island, Taylor has always had an appreciation for architecture and design. Follow his real estate journey on Instagram: @TaylortheRealtor .
title: VP & Realtor®  Lic: DC, MD, & VA

description: About Edward Ed moved to Washington from Long Island, NY in the summer of 1992. In 1997 Ed bought a 3,000 sq. ft. office space at the corner of Kalorama and Champlain Streets in Adams Morgan (just off 18th St.) He slowly turned the office space into a pretty cool, industrial loft-type home and loved every minute of it. Buying and renovating that place changed Ed’s financial life, and he began talking various friends into buying real estate. In 2000, he quit his job and went into real estate full time. His goal wasn’t just to become another real estate agent but to be a resource for first-time buyers and take some of the fear out of buying a home. Ed is extremely proud of the way he has developed his business. Ed has a very committed cadre of clients, many of whom refer him to their friends, eliminating the need to advertise for new clients. With sincere respect for his clients, Ed tries to always be mindful of what a daunting process buying or selling a home can be. Ed feels very lucky to have found real estate as a career and doesn’t take any of its benefits for granted. Ed said that he truly likes real estate and that is why he does well at it. In his free time Ed loves to travel: the more exotic the place the better. He has been to Sri Lanka, Pakistan, Dubai, Istanbul, Tokyo, Iceland, Bangkok, Singapore, India as well as many European countries. He has a friend that teaches at Oxford University, and he finds himself traveling to England often, he loves everything British. Still on his list of places to visit are Shanghai, Zanzibar and the Arctic Circle. Most of Ed’s clients are also a well-traveled group. Ed has been named a Top Agent by Washingtonian Magazine every year since 2017, and has been recognized as a Washingtonian Magazine ”Best Agent” (there are only one hundred named annually in the Greater Capital area,) since 2021.
title: Realtor®

description: About Drew Drew is a relentless real estate agent based in Arlington, Virginia with 9+ years of experience helping people buy, sell & invest in DC & Northern Virginia. Originally from upstate New York, he moved south in 2008 to attend Virginia Tech. After graduating, he relocated to the Washington, D.C. area and quickly fell in love with all it had to offer. So much so, that he bought an investment property & a home of his own to put down roots with his wife in Arlington. To this day, he still gets excited driving across the Memorial Bridge, as the monuments come into view. From the world-class museums to the vibrant food scene, the District really does have it all. His career accomplishments include over 150 transactions ranging from studio condos, land deals & new construction homes. While stats matter, he takes even greater pride in the bespoke white-glove service he provides to his clients & the relationships he has developed along the way. It’s made the DC area an easy place to call home. When he is not working, you can find him running around the Fairlington neighborhood with his Australian Shepherd, Wilson, or playing golf whenever & wherever he can.
title: Realtor®

description: About Kara Kara is a native Washingtonian with a love for the area and a great understanding of the residential real estate market. She developed a deep interest in real estate early, learning the business from her father, an architect, and her mother, a real estate agent. After graduating from the Bullis School in Potomac, MD she went on to Trinity College in Hartford, CT. She studied English at Trinity, where she captained her college lacrosse team, wrote for the student newspaper, and studied abroad in Rome. With a background in sales, marketing, lighting design, interiors, and staging, Kara brings to each client excellent communication, discretion, professionalism, and a keen eye. Kara has lived in NW DC, Bethesda, and Chevy Chase. She currently resides in Bethesda, MD with her husband and two children. In her free time she enjoys hiking local trails, the beach, and volunteering at her children's schools. Kara is licensed in DC and Maryland.
title: Realtor®

description: About Stuart Managing Partner, Venture Group at Compass Stuart is dedicated to delivering personalized service, exceptional communication and professional expertise that will give you successful results. To satisfy online home buyers, his listings have multiple photos and detailed property information. With his Internet marketing program, he is determined to generate broad online exposure for home sellers which selling homes quickly and for the best possible price. Stuart has the technology and resources to generate demand for your property, provide buyers with the detailed information they desire and have the ability to respond instantly to online inquiries. Originally hailing from the UK, Stuart brings a touch of British humor to his work. His career has taken him around the globe, and he's now firmly rooted in the United States. With a background in real estate and a diverse career history, including running a successful personal training business in London and working as a professional ski instructor, Stuart brings a unique blend of talents to the real estate industry. Stuart's skills extend beyond real estate. He possesses a keen eye for home renovations and interior design, and he excels in connecting with people from all corners of the world. Currently, Stuart resides in Chevy Chase, Maryland, with his wife, Wendi, and their two children, Elijah and Amira. Choose Stuart as your trusted real estate partner for a truly international perspective and a personalized, successful home buying or selling experience.
title: REALTOR® – Licensed in DC & MD

description: About Mercedes Mercedes is an active, detail oriented agent in the DC Metropolitan area, working with buyers and sellers across the DMV and considers her integral role in these important transactions for her clients to be a real privilege. Her keen eye and high level of professionalism is readily evident in everything she does, whether working with clients or colleagues. Mercedes lives the Golden rule; she always treats the people with whom she works, the way she would want to be treated. It is this driving principle that helps Mercedes to win deals, while allowing her customers to always enjoy the Real Estate process. A Washington, DC resident, Mercedes is well connected and actively involved in her community. Her contacts and lifelong residency leverage the knowledge of the area to ensure that whether she is working with first time buyers, or navigating the luxury market, all of her clients will receive exceptional representation.
title: Realtor®

description: About Ethan Ethan is a seasoned real estate professional who offers his clients exclusive access to the dynamic real estate market of Washington, D.C. With a keen eye on the evolving landscape of the city, he leverages his well-established relationships to facilitate transactions that align with the unique real estate goals of his buyers and sellers. His extensive experience working with top developers has resulted in the successful sale and renovation of numerous properties across the city, transforming shells into stunning homes. Originally hailing from North Carolina, Ethan's connection to the District began during his time at Howard University. Throughout the years, he has called various neighborhoods in the city home, including Columbia Heights, Capitol Hill, LeDroit Park, the Southwest Waterfront, and his current residence in the historic townhouse he personally renovated in Kalorama Triangle. Ethan's expertise goes far beyond traditional market comparables, and his clients attest to his unparalleled neighborhood knowledge. A ride around the city with Ethan is not just a tour of properties; it's an opportunity to discover the rich cultural and historical fabric of Washington, D.C. His ability to share fascinating tidbits, such as the location of Duke Ellington's first club or where Nina Simone once performed, adds an extra layer of value to his client relationships. Ethan's dedication to staying attuned to the ever-changing Washington landscape and his commitment to providing exceptional service based on deep-rooted local knowledge make him an invaluable resource for anyone navigating the real estate market in the nation's capital.
title: Realtor

description: About Jinean L.
title: REALTOR®

description: About Connie Connie Carter is a seasoned real estate agent with a true passion for her craft. She started her 32-year real estate career in 1987 with Barbara Corcoran's firm in New York City. Although she is a born and raised 10th generation Washingtonian, she has lived around the globe, including New York, London, Tokyo, and Melbourne, Australia. " Having moved 25+ times since college, I really understand what it means to relocate, it is so important buyers feel fully informed about their future neighborhood, city surrounds. I am so proud of the great homes I have located for my clients, and am honored when asked to resell them." Before delving into the world of real estate, Connie excelled in the media world, first in production at ABC News and 20/20 and then a Creative Director at Burson-Marsteller Public Relations. While living in Australia, she founded Australian Great Estates, a premium wine importing company and sold it in 2006. She graduated from Northwestern University in 1979 with a degree in Broadcast Journalism. She is happily married, mother of 3 adult children, 2 step children and now a grandmother of four. Connie is committed to her DC hometown roots, focused on her love for architecture and the arts. Currently, the 11th Street Bridge Project and the Phillips Collection (Chair Legacy Giving committee) are central to her giving plan. She was President of a National Trust property, Woodrow Wilson House from 2001-2009, served on the Choral Arts Society Board 2001-2008, the Culver Academy Legion Board of Directors in 2000-2004, and has chaired the Choral Arts Gala and Washington Ballet’s Cinderella Ball—both a resounding philanthropic success raising more than $500,000 for each event. Connie has become an avid gardener since she and her husband purchased an historic home in Middleburg Virginia where they have completed building a glass greenhouse for their horticultural pursuits. She practices yoga and Pilates, keen on staying fit, loves to entertain for friends and family. In addition to her active hobbies, she has a passion for art and architecture that led her to renovate her mid-century modern home with D.C. architects Robert F. Gurney and Mark McInturff. Connie’s combination of deep D.C. and Middleburg Hunt Country knowledge with the experience of living in multiples homes throughout the world, and personal creativity will help you find not only the perfect neighborhood but the perfect home. “Where we choose to live, eat, and sleep greatly impacts our ability to be our best selves, live up to our purpose.” — Connie Carter
title: Realtor® | Licensed in DC, MD, & VA

description: About Elysia Elysia Casaday is a trusted real estate advisor with over 20 years of experience serving buyers and sellers across Washington, DC, Montgomery County, and Northern Virginia. Known for her strategic insight, strong negotiation skills, and calm guidance, Elysia delivers a high-touch, results-driven experience tailored to each client’s goals. Elysia began her real estate career in 2004 with Wydler Brothers , where she was the first agent hired and was mentored by Hans and Steve Wydler. After 14 years with the team, she co-founded the Casaday Allison Group at Compass, building one of the most successful teams in the DMV. Following years of top production and leadership, Elysia made the intentional decision to reunite with Wydler Brothers, returning to the team where her career began and combining her entrepreneurial experience with the strength of the region’s #1 large team . Her business is built almost entirely on referrals and repeat clients — a reflection of the trust she builds and the long-term relationships she values. Elysia works with first-time buyers, move-up and downsizing sellers, and experienced homeowners navigating complex transitions. She is particularly skilled at pricing strategy, market positioning, and guiding clients through competitive or shifting market conditions. Elysia is a Top Producer and has been recognized by Washingtonian , Bethesda Magazine , and DC Magazine , and is part of a team ranked #1 in Washington, DC by the Wall Street Journal and RealTrends . Outside of real estate, Elysia enjoys spending time with her husband, Nathan, and their daughters, Claire and Eliza. She loves being part of the community she serves and brings that same care and commitment to every client relationship.
title: Senior Vice President

description: About Melanie Introducing Melanie, a passionate and dedicated real estate professional with an unwavering commitment to excellence in the vibrant Washington DC Metropolitan area. With a career built on trust, integrity, and personalized service, Melanie has established herself as a go-to agent for those seeking a seamless and rewarding real estate experience. Melanie's love for the real estate business stems from her deep appreciation for the unique charm and diversity that the DC area offers. Her keen eye for perfection in staging and design, coupled with her trusted network, gives her clients a distinct advantage in both the buying and selling process. She believes that the process of buying or selling a home is one of the most significant transactions in life and is dedicated to providing individualized attention and thorough knowledge to ensure her clients' success. With an impressive track record and in-depth market knowledge, Melanie has consistently delivered outstanding results for her clients. Her understanding of the local market trends, neighborhoods, and amenities enables her to provide invaluable insights to her clients, empowering them to make informed decisions. Outside of her professional endeavors, Melanie finds joy in spending quality time with her family and engaging in hobbies that rejuvenate her spirit. She understands the importance of work-life balance and strives to bring that same sense of fulfillment to her clients as they navigate the real estate landscape. Melanie's unwavering dedication to serving the real estate needs of the community is a testament to her commitment to building lasting relationships and ensuring the utmost satisfaction of those she serves. With Melanie, your real estate journey is not just a transaction – it's a partnership built on trust, respect, and shared success.
title: Realtor®

description: About Steve Steve’s love for DC and its vibrant neighborhoods runs deep. With more than a decade of experience in real estate and over 250 successful transactions across D.C., Maryland, and Virginia, Steve has earned a reputation for his expertise, professionalism, and commitment to his clients. Growing up outside of Boston, surrounded by a family of tradesmen, Steve was taught from an early age to appreciate the craftsmanship, quality, and construction that go into building a home. This hands-on background has given him a keen eye for detail and a thorough understanding of what makes a home truly stand out. Whether it's the structural integrity of a building or the finishes that elevate a space, Steve knows what to look for and ensures his clients are equipped with all the information they need to make an informed decision. He loves the opportunity to carefully evaluate a property and educate his clients about its condition. From foundation to roof, Steve ensures that nothing is overlooked, empowering his clients to move forward with confidence—or to make the necessary adjustments before making a commitment. Having lived in D.C. since 2000, Steve has a strong, personal connection to the region. His years of experience navigating the area's ever-evolving real estate landscape mean he is uniquely qualified to guide clients through the buying or selling process. Whether you are a first-time buyer, seasoned investor, or looking to sell your home his mission is simple: to guide you through the entire real estate journey, educating you and empowering you to make the best decision for your life and your future. After attending American University, Steve now resides in Chevy Chase, D.C., with his wife and son. When he’s not helping clients find their dream homes, he can be found exploring the great outdoors, diving into a (sometimes questionable) sci-fi or fantasy novel, or perfecting his grilling skills.
title: Realtor®

description: About Joanna As a Maryland, DC, & Virginia real estate agent, Joanna is a driven, well-rounded individual who is willing to put in the hard work and time for each client. She accomplishes tasks in a timely manner within deadlines, and is self-driven, task-oriented, communicative, and focused. Joanna works great in a team, but able to work independently. Fast learner, and punctual. Excellent customer service and negotiating skills and is able to meet all her clients' needs to the best of her abilities. Joanna puts her clients and their needs first to make sure they have a smooth transaction. Probate Specialist Short Sale & Foreclosure Specialist Call or Email Joanna to get the job done! 240.351.4788 or joannacmolina@compass.com. $9 million in sales in 2020! GCAAR 2021 Bronze Award Winner
title: Realtor®

description: About Rabih Through his extensive knowledge, expertise, and comprehensive understanding of the trends within the DC, Virginia and Maryland real estate market, Rabih Chamas’ proficient counsel, keen insights and the highest level of integrity and resourcefulness are highly valued.
