As a specialist in the Acquisition and Marketing of Residential, Luxury, and Investment Properties, together with Developer Services, Rabih serves each client with sophisticated, first-class service, true advocacy and full-service resources that markedly result in an extremely impressive and heightened real estate experience. Rabih elevates the real estate experience by offering his clients a smart, solution-oriented, consultative approach. When working with sellers, he designs and executes on an impactful presentation that skillfully heightens each listing’s visibility to stand out from the competition by utilizing professionally produced photography together with a presentation in print and on numerous websites. When working with buyers, he carefully listens and diligently aligns and applies himself so that he may locate a residence and distinguished setting that meets their lifestyle requirements. in addition, Rabih specializes in serving the specific needs of seniors and is highly attuned to their unique requirements and is very attentive to meeting all of their expectations. Whether it is educating first-time buyers on each step of the home buying process, preparing, and staging a seller’s home and making it shine with the appropriate colors, appointments, or conducting further research to disclose all facts that may affect or influence a property; being proactive, Rabih delivers remarkable results by covering and clearly anticipating every angle found in the multitude of details in each transaction. Rabih’s clients trust in his highly principled approach and value his timely guidance and counsel in addressing all aspects of the transaction with professional competence. He is a connector who cherishes the rich and personal interaction of bringing people and the community together. It is truly his joy to ultimately fulfill his client’s request throughout the transaction and graciously serve them. With a wonderful global perspective, his life journey has taken her from Lebanon to Paris, Dubai and now the capital DC. As a multilingual agent, he is fluent in English, Spanish, French and Arabic. In recognition of his dedication to his clients and the valued relationships developed with them, he serves an enthusiastic referral base. Delivering responsive, confident results with a strategic, impactful approach are all part of Rabih’s distinguished style in always accomplishing truly elevated achievements for his clients. Expressing his gratitude and desire to give back, Rabih is an active contributor and sponsor for the following community events: Sponsorship for Petworth Porch Fest 2021 and 2022, Petworth farmer’s market (music section) 2021, Petworth festival several years and the replanting of Grant circle in Petworth 2021 Contact Rabih to serve you and your personal real estate interests.
title: Realtor®

description: About Cindy Cindy has been providing professional real estate consultation in the Washington DC area for over 30 years. Given her expertise and insight, she anticipates her clients' needs and tailors her services to each individual. Her #1 objective is to have each client conclude the process with maximum satisfaction while respecting their preferred pace and style. A former special needs teacher in Atlanta, Cindy relocated to DC in 1976 with Jimmy Carter's administration and spent 8 years as an education policy advisor. Enamored with her new city and as a relative newcomer herself, Cindy became the go-to advisor to other newly arrived young professionals exploring all things DC, particularly homes and neighborhoods. She loved helping her friends, her friends' friends, and so it began. In addition to the past 27 years in Chevy Chase where she raised her family, Cindy has resided in a variety of neighborhoods including Capitol Hill, Cleveland Park, Takoma Park, and Bethesda. She's renovated numerous houses and loves giving ideas to others. Her dedication to serving the best interests of her clients is sustained by extensive experience, professional integrity, insight, and understanding.
title: Realtor®

description: About Jennifer Jennifer was raised in Northern Virginia, and currently resides in the Washington, D.C. Metropolitan area. She has a B.A. in Economics, and an M.A. in International Business. Her education and multi-cultural upbringing, have provided the foundation for her to thrive in one of the most diverse areas in the country. Jennifer has built her business on referrals, and by earning the trust of her clients. She genuinely cares about her clients, and knows that a home is one of your most important investments. It is not about finding a property, but finding a safe haven, and ultimately your dream home. She works hard to ensure her clients receive unparalleled treatment, and always goes the extra mile for her clients. She speaks Spanish fluently. Jennifer's team has built relationships with hundreds of agents nationwide. Combining these tools with an intimate knowledge of the market, she is able to match the right buyer with the right seller with incredible success. Jennifer is a passionate supporter of nonprofit organizations including UNICEF, Kiva, Feeding America, World Central Kitchen, and the Sheldrick Wildlife Trust. *When Jennifer is not working, you can find her hanging with family or friends, playing soccer, doing pilates, daydreaming about living with elephants, and probably eating or traveling.
title: REALTOR®

description: About Josh Since his first year selling real estate, Joshua Chapman has been recognized as one of the region's top producers. In less than 5 years, he has become a part of the nations top 1% of real estate agents, and has been featured in Washingtonian Magazine as one of the regions ‘Best Agents' for over 5+ years. His extreme dedication to his client's satisfaction is what has gotten him to this point, and it's his passion for helping others that keeps him there. Growing up as the son of two Naval officers has instilled Josh with a tremendous amount of discipline and work ethic that is unrivaled in the real estate world. His willingness to go the extra mile for every one of his clients is a testament to this, and is the reason why his clients continue to trust him with what is often the largest investment of their life. -Washingtonian Magazine's Top Agents 17', 18', 19', 21', 22', 23', 24' -Arlington Magazine Top Producer 21' -Northern Virginia Magazine Top Producer 21', 22', 23', 24' -NVAR Multi-Million Dollar Club, Top Producer 2013-24
title: Realtor®

description: About Claude Having been a successful entrepreneur, Al possesses an abundance of first-hand business and real estate knowledge. Over the years he has developed an extensive network of resources. With over 35 years of experience in residential and commercial real estate, Al is renowned for his negotiation skills and integrity. Al keeps an excellent track record in the industry, making every transaction go as smoothly as possible, from the introduction to settlement. His clients' needs, privacy, and concerns come first, and he will always go above and beyond their expectations. Engaging, creative, and detail oriented, Al offers a full range of premiere customized real estate services in the Washington DC metropolitan area, including sales, relocations, and leasing. For more information about the team, please see www.dcaddress.com .
title: Realtor® licensed in DC/MD/VA

description: About Adam With more than a decade as a top-producing real estate agent, Adam Chasen combines deep market expertise, strategic insight, and a client-first approach that has made him one of the most trusted advisors in the Washington, D.C. region. A fourth-generation Washingtonian and lifelong Maryland resident, Adam leads the Chasen Homes Team of Compass , where he has guided hundreds of buyers and sellers through successful transactions across the DMV. From earning “Rookie of the Year” in his first year to consistently receiving high-achiever awards throughout his career, Adam’s success is rooted in his unmatched knowledge of local development, neighborhood trends, and broader national and international market dynamics. His background in both mortgage and title provides his clients with an additional layer of confidence and clarity—an advantage especially valued by those relocating to the area. Adam’s roots run deep in the region. Raised in Montgomery County, he attended Walter Johnson High School—continuing a family tradition that spans generations of Washingtonians. His extended family’s involvement in real estate development and law helped shape his early understanding of the industry and cultivated his long-standing passion for property, community, and the future growth of the DMV. Now residing in Rockville with his wife, Georgia, and their son, Tate, Adam is a dedicated father, animal advocate, and sports enthusiast. A level-one sommelier and avid traveler, he’s always ready with a restaurant recommendation or travel tip. His experience coaching youth football and training dogs pairs surprisingly well with real estate: patience, communication, and the ability to stay two steps ahead. Whether helping a family find their first home or advising a seller on positioning their property in a competitive market, Adam approaches real estate like a game of chess—every move strategic, every detail meaningful. He customizes each marketing and negotiation plan with precision, creativity, and an unwavering commitment to achieving the best possible outcome. Above all, Adam’s favorite part of his work is the people. He thrives on building relationships that last long after the transaction closes, serving as both a trusted advisor and a lifelong resource for his clients.
title: REALTOR®

description: About Chasen Homes The Chasen Homes Team of Compass specializes in a concierge approach to client care. Serving Maryland, Washington, D.C, and Virginia, our agents bring a deep knowledge of local geography and are expert in all facets of real estate business. Whether you are a buyer or seller, the Chasen Homes team will provide an outstanding experience. We help our clients prepare their home for sale to maximize the financial return while minimizing their stress, and we navigate the market to help our clients secure their perfect property.

About Pierre Pierre is a dedicated and versatile professional in the real estate industry, proudly serving the vibrant communities of the DMV. With a profound understanding of our area's "micro markets," he excels in building strong client relationships and matching clients with their ideal properties or achieving optimal sales prices. Pierre's journey in real estate is enriched by his analytical prowess, honed during his earlier career as an auditor and CPA. This strong analytical foundation enables him to navigate complex transactions with ease and provide strategic solutions tailored to his clients' needs. Known for his creativity and negotiation skills, Pierre adeptly overcomes challenges to secure the best terms for his clients. His deep roots in the DC community are evident through his family's restaurant business, his culinary education, and his local upbringing, all of which contribute to his extensive regional knowledge. As a graduate of the Culinary Institute of America in Hyde Park, NY, Pierre combines his culinary passion with his real estate expertise, creating unique connections within the community. Licensed in DC, Maryland, and Virginia, he offers comprehensive support and representation across the region, earning a reputation as a true advocate in the real estate industry. Outside of real estate, Pierre resides with his wife and two daughters in Chevy Chase, where he enjoys parties and dinners for family and friends. His passion for the community and its culture drives his personal and professional endeavors, making him not only a dedicated professional but also a dynamic individual with a zest for life. For those seeking a real estate partner who combines expertise with a personalized approach, Pierre is here to help turn real estate aspirations into reality.
title: Realtor®

description: About Janay Janay is a dedicated Real Estate professional with a passion for design and a mission to help her clients find their perfect place in the world. With a deep understanding of the DC Metro area and a unique flair for aesthetics honed through her international recognition as a bridal makeup artist, Janay is your trusted partner for all your real estate needs. Janay’s real estate experience is a natural progression from her world of beauty and aesthetics. As an internationally acclaimed bridal makeup artist, she’s gained an exceptional eye for detail and an appreciation for the profound impact that aesthetics can have on emotions and experiences. Her unique ability to enhance beauty in every aspect of life extends seamlessly to the world of real estate, where she envisions properties not just as houses but as the canvas for her client’s dreams. Beyond her artistic talents, Janay is deeply committed to her client’s well-being. She believes that real estate is more than just transactions; it’s about making a lasting impact on people’s lives. Her warm and approachable demeanor instantly puts clients at ease, allowing her to truly understand their needs and desires. Janay values her clients as partners in her mission to help them find their place in the world. Janay’s expertise in the DC, Virginia, and Maryland areas is unparalleled. She possesses an in-depth knowledge of the local market dynamics, ensuring that her clients receive the best advice and insights for their real estate journeys. Whether you’re a first-time homebuyer embarking on an exciting adventure, a seasoned investor seeking lucrative opportunities, or someone looking to sell your home at its highest value, Janay is your dedicated partner. With Janay by your side, you’re not just securing a real estate agent; you’re gaining a trusted advisor who is passionate about design, aesthetics, and helping you find your place in the world. Contact Janay today and let her artistic expertise and genuine care guide you to your dream home and real estate success!
title: REALTOR® licensed in DC, VA & MD

description: About Steven Steven Chen is a dedicated real estate agent based in Arlington, VA, with a passion for helping clients find their dream homes. Originally from Rockville, MD, Steven brings a deep understanding of the local area and market trends to his profession. Prior to residential real estate, Steven spent a number of years in commercial construction, building some of the most high profile projects in the area. This unique construction background allows him to provide his clients with insights that other agents often overlook. Currently, Steven’s business is split equally between DC, MD and VA. Outside of work, Steven enjoys staying active and can often be found on the golf course perfecting his swing or on the pickleball court for a competitive match. He values quality time with his wife, Christina, and their dog, Ollie, exploring the vibrant communities in the DMV. Their favorite place to visit is Charleston, SC or abroad in Italy. With his expertise in real estate and love for his community, Steven is committed to delivering exceptional service and making every client's home buying or selling experience as seamless as possible.
title: Realtor®

description: About Matt With two decades’ experience navigating DC and nearby Virginia and Maryland real estate, Matt Cheney is widely respected as an exceptional leader in all aspects of today’s luxury home sales. A trusted client advocate, Matt has skillfully guided buyers and sellers through over a thousand successful transactions. His calm personality and razor-sharp negotiation prowess ensure success in an increasingly competitive high-end market. Those who partner with Matt benefit from his savvy marketing skills, discretion, and vast local knowledge. His promotional toolkit includes effective online marketing and targeted social media placement. In addition, his passion for video production brings next-level exposure to his sellers’ properties. Licensed in Washington D.C., Maryland and Virginia, Matt has twice been named a GALA Salesperson of the Year. He’s also been recognized by Washingtonian, Bethesda, and Arlington Magazine s as a Top Producer. Matt was raised in Bethesda. He lives in Wesley Heights with his wife, Natalia, their two daughters, Penelope and Charlie, and their chocolate lab, Duke.
title: Vice President

description: About Amy A Chinese-American born in Taiwan, and Hawaii native, Amy Chen Scharpf has been a long-time DMV resident delivering full-spectrum residential real estate sales service to her valued clients since 2003. Amy’s success comes from her high-touch approach in representing buyers and sellers in the sought-after areas of Bethesda, Potomac, McLean, Arlington and DC. Her impressive understanding of the nuances of each of these submarkets serves as an invaluable source of information on each community - from schools, to local hidden gems, and the specific amenities offered by each neighborhood and area. She earns the respect of her clients by tirelessly working on their behalf and always offering candid advice. Her success is based almost exclusively on positive referrals. Amy is one of few agents in the area who is bilingual in Chinese and English and possesses an entrepreneurial mindset with excellent negotiation skills. Purchasing her first condo after college, she is a firm believer that everyone should own/invest in real estate. S he now owns multiple homes in the DMV area and takes pride in her community. Whether you are up-sizing, down-sizing, investing, selling, or a first time home buyer, Amy can guide you through your journey. She is a part of a strong and diverse team at Ferris Levin Collaborative at Compass. Amy loves the outdoors and enjoys skiing, swimming and hiking the numerous trails along the Potomac River. She is very active in her community from volunteering in Pyle Middle School and Walt Whitman High School, to being a Girl Scout “Cookie Mom” for many years. She is a graduate of James Madison University (Roll Dukes!). Her beautiful family includes her husband Sam who’s a native Washingtonian, two daughters, and two rescue dogs Winnie and Amber. 长版本 Amy 陈正蓉是一位出生于台湾的华裔美国人，也是一名土生土长的夏威夷人，自 2003 年以来她一直是 DMV 的长期居民，并持续为她尊贵的客户提供全方位的住宅和房地产销售服务。她的成功是由于她在销售时能设身处地的为顾客着想，因为她在贝塞斯达、波托马克、麦克莱恩、阿灵顿和哥伦比亚特区等热门地区既是买家也是卖家。她对每个社区最宝贵的信息来源于她对每个子市场的细微差别的深刻理解——从学校（备受好评的惠特曼集群）到当地隐藏的瑰宝，以及每个社区和地区提供的特定便利设施。她通过为客户不懈努力并始终提供坦诚的建议赢得了客户的尊重。她的成功几乎完全基于积极的推荐。 Amy 是该地区为数不多的中英文双语经纪人之一，并且具有企业家思维和出色的谈判技巧。大学毕业后她购买了她的第一套公寓，并坚信每个人都应该拥有或投资房地产。从那时起，她在 DMV 地区就拥有多处住宅，并为她的社区感到自豪。无论您是扩大规模、缩小规模、投资、出售还是首次购房者，她都可以指导您完成您的个性化旅程。她是 Ferris Levin Collaborative at Compass 中强大而多元化团队中的一员，并全心全意地为这个团队而努力。他们致力于确保您梦想中的房子像家一样。 Amy 喜欢户外活动，喜欢滑雪、游泳和沿着波托马克河的众多小径远足。她在她的社区非常活跃，从在派尔中学和沃尔特惠特曼高中做志愿者，到多年担任女童子军“饼干妈妈”。她毕业于詹姆斯麦迪逊大学。她幸福的家庭包括土生土长的华盛顿人丈夫山姆、两个女儿和两只救援犬温妮和安伯。
title: Realtor®

description: About Grace Meet Grace, a dynamic and experienced real estate professional based in the Greater Washington, D.C. area. As a bilingual native of Northern Virginia, Grace possesses a deep understanding of the local market and is passionate about helping clients achieve their real estate goals. With a customer-centric approach and a keen eye for creative solutions, Grace is known for her outstanding customer service and her ability to navigate complex transactions with ease. She has a strong background in technology and negotiation, which allows her to leverage the latest tools and techniques to maximize results for her clients. Grace's track record speaks for itself. In her very first year in production, she was named Rookie of The Year, and she has since gone on to earn numerous accolades, including being recognized by Washingtonian Magazine as a Top Producer in 2021 and 2022, and winning the NVAR's 2018-2022 Top Producer's Club. She consistently places in the top 10% of her market center and has even taken on coaching roles to help others achieve success in the field. Whether you're a seller in the DMV area, a first-time buyer, a retiree looking to downsize, or an investor seeking new opportunities, Grace has the expertise and experience to guide you through the process. With her resilient mindset and unwavering commitment to her clients, Grace is ready to help you navigate the real estate landscape and make the most of life's biggest investments. &lt;br&gt; &lt;br&gt; &lt;br&gt; TEXT OR IMAGE TO BE HYPERLINKED
title: Realtor®

description: About Jeffrey Jeff moved to Washington, D.C. from his native Boston, MA in 2012. In addition to working with The CityScape Group as an agent, he also serves as the managing member of a D.C.-based residential real estate firm. With experience as an agent, developer, and homeowner in the Bloomingdale neighborhood of D.C., Jeff brings a well-rounded perspective to every real estate transaction. After graduating from Boston College with a B.A. in Political Science, Jeff began his career as a project manager for a Boston-based company specializing in residential renovations, particularly income-producing properties. Drawing on this expertise, Jeff helps his clients bridge the gap between a fixer-upper and a dream home—or find the perfect investment property. In his free time, Jeff enjoys running, training for marathons, and cheering on all of his hometown sports teams.
title: Realtor

description: About Gail Buying and selling a home is more than just a financial transaction. Whether you are selling a beloved family home to downsize , moving from a condo to a single family home because you ’ r e expecting your first baby , or relocating to an entirely new region, real estate deals can feel overwhelming. Thankfully, Gail is all about making a potentially difficult experience feel easy and stress-free. A therapist, nurse, and patient advocate in her past life, Gail is an excellent listener as well as an empathetic, honest and direct communicator. Her goal is not simply to sell houses; she is interested in supporting and educating her clients in their quest to find a home that truly suits their lifestyle and means. A recipient of Washingtonian magazine’s Top 100 Realtors That You Want on Your Side , Gail puts her whole heart into every client, into every transaction. She is responsive, knowledgeable, and hardworking. This client centered approach has resulted in a business fueled by referrals from past clients. Gail has been successfully selling real estate for the past ten years in the DC Metro area as well as in Anne Arundel County and the Eastern Shore. If it is any indication of this dedication, Gail’s clients have a lot to say about her integrity . When reviewing his experience with Gail, one client writes, “To be perfectly honest, I was wary going into the process given the financial incentives realtors have to achieve a high volume of sales. But it quickly became clear to me that Gail’s business strategy is focused on building a base of clients who are happy with their purchases and who provide glowing reviews and recommendations rather than trying to make faster sales or push her clients into higher priced sales.” When she is not working, Gail has volunteered with The Homeless Children’s Playtime Project and The Humane Rescue Alliance, two non-profit organizations in Washington, DC. In her free time, she is an avid traveler, with a particular affinity for scuba diving and swimming in the ocean.
title: Realtor®

description: About Jeff Growing up in a family of real estate entrepreneurs, Jeff knew from a young age that he would have his hand in real estate sooner than later. He graduated magna cum laude with a degree in Finance from the University of Miami, and began his career at Marcus & Millichap in commercial real estate, where he supported the Tiktin Commercial Real Estate Group of South Florida. While in Miami, Jeff played semi-pro soccer for Miami FC briefly before starting his residential real estate career. He received his Florida real estate license and joined The Thomson Team at Coldwell Banker, a top team in South Florida in terms of units sold. Initially, Jeff focused on rentals, single-family homes and foreclosure properties. He developed a student housing page for the University of Miami that is still widely used today. Later, joining RE/MAX, he specialized in condominium units throughout the Downtown Miami and Brickell areas for several years before relocating back home to Potomac, Maryland. Jeff co-opened 1831 Bar & Lounge in July of 2015; since then he received his DC real estate license and became a proud member of the Babbington Team at Compass. With his diverse real estate background, entrepreneurial endeavors, and deep relationships with multiple local communities, Jeff continues to expand his successes in the DC, Maryland, Virginia and Florida real estate industries. Now having over a decade of experience working in real estate, Jeff has grown to become a top agent and Senior Vice President at the #1 brokerage in the DMV, Compass. As a partner of the Babbington Team with over $200 million sold over the last six years, Jeff has accrued local relationships with many homeowners, top lenders, licensed contractors, and title attorneys. Known for his competitive nature in tense offer situations and knack for negotiating, he strives to win his clients their dream homes and to make the process as seamless as possible during the process. His hobbies include soccer, traveling, fishing, hiking, watching sports & live music and spending time with family and friends.
title: Mollaan Babbington Group | Senior Vice President

description: About CityScape Group At the CityScape Group, our veteran team has come together to use their decades of experience to provide our clients with an exceptional suite of real estate services tailored to every specific need. With agents proficient in every facet of the industry throughout DC, MD, and VA, and backed by innovative Compass technology, there’s nothing that will stop us from helping you achieve your residential real estate dreams.

About City & Sky Working with City & Sky on the sale or purchase of your home means that you have hired an advocate. We pride ourselves on listening first, then collaborating with you on a plan to get the most important results - whether that's a low-stress experience or the best deal possible. Our strategies and tactics have been honed over 100 transactions, giving you access to a true professional that knows how to go beyond inventory and contract knowledge to be creative and leverage relationships within the business. Maybe most importantly, we bring enthusiasm, humor and care to the process - critical when facing some of the big questions home ownership transitions can bring up. Beyond the deal, our mission is to make DC a more vibrant place to live. We provide opportunities for our clients to experience the hidden gems of DC and get to know each other. We support organizations that enhance life in the District - whether through art or by helping those in need. The DMV area has incredible diversity that we believe should be supported and brought up to the surface where it's easier for all to see. Website

About Lindsay Lindsay is a top-producing agent in the DC area and Principal of the Clark and Van Wye Group at Compass . Lindsay sells real estate in DC, MD and VA, working with buyers, sellers, and developers. Lindsay brings an analytical mind, sharp negotiation skills, and in-depth market knowledge to each transaction and she is a true partner and advocate for every client. Additionally, her professional and collaborative approach with colleagues keeps the process moving forward for her clients. Lindsay has won various awards, including Best of Washingtonian, Top Individual Agent and Top Team at Compass, and GCAAR Recognition Awards. Lindsay is also active in the real estate community and has served on the DC Association of Realtors Board of Directors and as the vice chair of the DCAR public policy committee. Lindsay currently serves on the board of the Family & Youth Initiative , a non-profit focused on supporting teens in foster care, as well as young adults who have aged out of care. Prior to becoming a full-time Realtor, Lindsay had a successful career in public policy working on economic development, housing, and tax policy issues at the Brookings Institution, DC Fiscal Policy Institute, and the District’s Chief Financial Officer. Lindsay lives in the Shepherd Park neighborhood of DC with her husband, four daughters, and two dogs. She loves running, traveling, and spending time with family and friends. Hear what Lindsay's clients say about her and her team on Google !
title: Realtor® Licensed in DC, MD & VA

description: About Melanie As a 5th-generation native Washingtonian, Melanie loves living in DC, is extremely knowledgeable about the DC Metro Area, and is a licensed Realtor® in DC, MD, and VA. She enjoys working with both buyers and sellers, leveraging her strong background in art and design to assist clients in showcasing the best in a property for sale, or seeing the potential in a possible new home. She is a tireless advocate for her clients' best interests and will always go the extra mile. Before becoming a Realtor®, Melanie worked in theatre, design consulting, and arts education. She enjoys working on various artistic, crafting, and home repair projects, along with spending time with her wife, family and friends, discovering new things that the DMV has to offer, and hanging out near the water. She prides herself on being handy with a wide assortment of tools and believes she would be a very capable survivor in the unlikely event of a zombie apocalypse.
title: Realtor® | Momentum Group at Compass

description: About Emily Emily Clark serves as the Director of Operations at Sarah Hake Residential with Compass, where she combines strategic leadership with a deep passion for helping clients achieve their real estate goals. Licensed in Washington, DC and Maryland, Emily brings a thoughtful and service-driven approach to every transaction. She plays a pivotal role in managing the day to day operations, ensuring a seamless client experience through smart systems, marketing excellence, and logistical precision. Emily’s strengths lie in her ability to balance behind-the-scenes coordination with hands-on client support. Her in-depth knowledge of the local market, paired with her calm professionalism, makes her a trusted resource for both buyers and sellers navigating the DC and Maryland real estate market. Outside of work, Emily enjoys exploring the region’s neighborhoods, spending time with family and friends, and giving back to her community. She is a member of the Greater Capital Area Association of Realtors. Client Testimonial: "We worked with Sarah to both buy and sell our home. We were impressed by her professionalism, knowledge/expertise, client-centered approach and incredible network in all aspects of the buying and selling process. She was patient, kind and responsive at all hours of the day and worked tirelessly and expertly for us, her client. She helped us find our dream home and sell our previous home within a short time frame by focusing on the prep work and marketing to her network before the house even went formally on the market. Her team, including Emily and Pablo, were amazing as well! We highly recommend Sarah!" - Buyer and Seller
title: REALTOR®

description: About Clark and Van Wye At the Clark & Van Wye Group at Compass , we believe that excellence is not a big thing—it’s a million little things. We have a proven track record selling homes across DC, Maryland, and Virginia because we understand buyer and seller perspectives and what it takes to make a property sale successful. We are experts in the local market with sharp negotiation skills, and we leverage data-driven insights to empower our clients' decision making. We are passionate about client advocacy and exceptional customer service. With decades of experience living in the DMV, we use our local knowledge to help our clients meet and exceed their real estate goals. Investing in our community is also important to us, so for every sale, we donate to a cause that moves us and to a cause that moves our clients. The Clark & Van Wye Group at Compass includes Lindsay Clark , Brian Van Wye , Oris Rintala , and Rachel Fisher.

About Libby Libby Clarke, founding partner of the JLC Team, started her real estate career in 2004 in Washington, DC. With a strong track record of success, she and her team are consistently recognized as top residential real estate advisors. One of Libby's greatest joys is meeting new people and guiding them through the intricacies of the real estate process, whether it involves buying a new home or selling a cherished property they have called home for decades. Throughout her real estate career, Libby has seamlessly merged her ability to build strong relationships with her sharp business acumen, providing clients with a highly responsive and friendly service that consistently helps them achieve their goals. Libby is a founding member of REALE (Real Estate Agents Leading on Electrification) . REALE's mission is to educate the real estate profession, clients, and communities about using their homes as tools to combat climate change while increasing value, health, and comfort, and ensuring sustainability for all communities and future generations. Born and raised in Denver, Colorado, Libby grew up alongside her ten siblings. She graduated from St. Mary's College of California with a degree in communications and subsequently launched her career with a position in the Senate Finance Committee and non profit organizations. Since 1988, she has resided on Capitol Hill with her husband, where they have raised their four daughters. Actively involved in the community as a volunteer and neighbor, Libby cherishes the city and its vibrant atmosphere and is excited to share her knowledge with you.
title: Realtor

description: About Juli I am a Philadelphia transplant who calls Arlington my home since 1989. Juli comes from a family that stressed a strong work ethic – if you made a commitment, then you honored that commitment. Before embarking on her real estate career, I owned and operated a successful catering business, Juli Lieberman Fine Catering which won the year 2000 Small Business of the Year Award from the Arlington Chamber of Commerce. I also opened a local restaurant, Café, Café in Arlington. Café Café was reviewed and written up by The Washington Post and many local publications. I gave back to her community through her restaurant by providing weekly dinners to the local fire station. Customer service is always the major focus with my businesses and I always strive for excellence in all my endeavors. I decided she wanted her next challenge to be in real estate, so in 2010 I was asked to join a team as a buyer’s agent. I learned how to do business the right and ethical way through my mentor. After a short time with the team, I knew it was time for her to break out and launch my own real estate business. I saw the revolution of real estate coming and knew my focus was going to be web-based with an emphasis on social media. With my strong customer service ethic, I know the importance of delivering exceptional customer service to each client. Once I uncover the goals of my clients, I provides solutions that get maximum results for my clients. I love the Metro DC area and am familiar with many of the local neighborhoods. In my free time, I enjoy golf and served for 6 years as the Market Leader for the Metro DC area’s Women on Course, the fastest growing national community for business professionals and lifestyle enthusiasts interested in connecting through the game of golf. I also co-chair a dog rescue fundraiser, the Bichon Bash that raises thousands of dollars to vet and foster dogs so they can be adopted to their forever homes. My husband Kyle and I have fostered over 30 dogs since 2010. I am proud to be associated with Compass because of their state-of-the-art marketing products and their dedication to community service and a culture of honesty, kindness, inclusivity and just plain doing what’s right.
title: Realtor®

description: About Craig I’m not sure if I found real estate, or if real estate found me, but one thing I know for certain, it is the most rewarding career I have ever had. After years in the corporate world of international sales, I have discovered that helping somebody find or sell a home is one of the most rewarding transactions of which I can be a part. I sincerely believe anyone entering into this profession should have a degree in psychology. When thinking of the decisions being made by my clients (both from a financial as well as emotional perspective) I feel it is my job to help navigate the twists and turns along the way. During the process I also believe in having fun. I have been fortunate that many clients have become personal friends….likely because we get to know each other so well and on so many levels. I am thrilled to be part of the growing Compass team here in DC, and equally excited to be teaming with Sheila Hazzan as part of The Craig and Sheila Group. We love what we do and we have a great time while we do it.
title: Realtor®

description: About Jason A tenured real estate agent who has served the DC region for many years, Jason Cohen is passionate about connecting people with homes that inspire them. Thanks to unparalleled local expertise and a commitment to exceeding expectations, Jason empowers his clients to navigate the search and sell process more seamlessly than ever before. Born and raised in Silver Spring, Maryland, Jason is an active member of the Washington DC community that he has called home for 18 years. Jason lives in DC with his wife Debbie and their two sons.
title: Realtor

description: About Dennis The of your home is a process with many roads to pick from. Dennis is committed to helping you navigate through the process, making sure you always know the advantages and disadvantages of each path. Dennis became a Realtor in 1985 and received the Top First Year Licensee Award for Bethesda/Chevy Chase. Continuing his aptitude and love of teaching, he has been a Branch Trainer and Mentor for new agents. Since 1986 Dennis has been a member of the Million Dollar Club, Platinum Club and is now consistently in the Top 1% of Realtors Nationwide. Dennis has lived in Georgetown, American University Park, College Park, Silver Spring, Bethesda, Chevy Chase, Garrett Park and Rockville. He is knowledgeable about the entire Metropolitan area and is licensed in both Maryland and the District of Columbia. He is also a Certified Buyers Agent. He has excellent negotiating skills, is a problem solver and, more importantly, a problem preventer and is very well respected his peers. A native of Manhattan, Dennis came to Washington, D.C, to attend George Washington University, receiving a B.A. in Psychology. He went on to Catholic University and was the first recipient of a Masters in Performance in Classical Guitar. Dennis taught and played classical and jazz guitar in the Washington area for many years and taught classical guitar at Montgomery College for ten years prior to becoming a real estate agent.
title: Realtor®

description: About Olivia I am the oldest of three girls in a loud Italian family, which means I learned early how to stay calm in the middle of chaos—and that same sense of calm and focus is what I bring to every real estate transaction. Buying or selling a home can feel overwhelming, but my goal is to bring peace to the process by educating my clients, offering clear guidance, and empowering you to feel confident in your decisions. My strengths lie in my ability to diffuse stress, stay organized, and adapt to the unique needs of every client. I’m detail-oriented, communicative, and always focused on making the experience as smooth and enjoyable as possible. Whether you’re a first-time buyer or navigating your next big move, I’m here to support you at every step. When I’m not working, you’ll probably find me walking my dog, Peanut, with my husband, James, through Old Town, hosting a dinner party, or trying out a new recipe. In the summer, you might even spot me stuck in Bay Bridge traffic on my way to Rehoboth Beach. I am licensed in the District of Columbia, Maryland, Virginia, and Delaware, and I’d love to help you find your next home.
title: REALTOR®

description: About Megan Megan Conway is a fifth-generation Washingtonian, with a major love for all things DC, real estate, and design related. Having lived here since birth, Megan’s block--block knowledge gives her clients an enviable advantage when honing in on the perfect property or when positioning a home to its greatest advantage. With more than 15 years of sales and experience and an MBA from Georgetown, Megan brings the perfect blend of strategic planning to the process. Not to mention a keen eye for design and an instinct of what sells. Whether its help with design, your selling strategy, , sourcing , or aggressively hunting for your next home, Megan is excited to bring her skills to work for you. Megan will seamlessly guide you through one of the most important processes of your life –making it fun along the way. She leads the Conway Group along with her husband, Jack Conway - and is proud to be part of Compass real estate. Megan, her husband, and three young kids live in a 90+ year-old townhome in Mount Pleasant and are very active in their community. You can often find them hiking through Rock Creek Park, at the Zoo, or just hanging out on the back deck (be it sun or snow).
title: Senior Vice President | Realtor®

description: About Jack A third generation Washingtonian, Jack has always called DC home. Growing up in Mount pleasant, he acquired an appreciation and an intuitive feel for many of DC's unique neighborhoods. Drawing on more than fifteen years of experience in business contract negotiations from small cap to Fortune 500, Jack provides exceptional client-based services ranging from proactive buyer searches to full-suite servicing for his listings, including multifaceted marketing campaigns, selling strategies, comprehensive planning, contractor sourcing, and more. Jack recognizes that every client and sales process is special and unique. Buying or selling a home is a moment of great change, a major investment, a critical decision in a family's future. He enjoys working with individuals and helping them manage their way through this important moment in their lives, making lasting friendships along the way. An active member of his community, Jack lives with this wife and three children in Mt Pleasant and can frequently be found hiking in Rock Creek, visiting museums with his children, or just hanging out with family and friends.
title: Realtor®

description: About Conway Group As a team led by DC natives, the Conway Group offers local expertise paralleled by personal service for both sellers and buyers alike. Megan, Jack, Sylvia, Sean & Chiara work together to promote a seamless real estate journey by gleaning from their careers in sales, marketing, capital ventures, interior design and overall area knowledge. With an extensive network at their fingertips, the Conway Group has developed trusted relationships to provide a streamlined experience from start to finish, while keeping clients at the forefront of every step toward success. With over $63M in 2022 sales volume, #CGDC is as dynamic as the people and properties they serve across the DMV.

About Nikki After 20+ years in the real estate business, Nikki is the person who people are most comfortable trusting with their residential, investment and rental transactions. Due to her amazing interpersonal skills and strong talent for negotiations, she has sold close to $225M in the DC/MD area. Born and raised in Alabama, she graduated from Florida A&M University, moved to DC and made it her home for the past 25 years. She knows the DMV very well and knows how to match a neighborhood with a client, whether they are looking for DC city living or something tucked away in the suburbs of Maryland. Nikki can handle high-pressure deals, can multitask like a pro and pays meticulous attention to detail. She has a referral database for almost every situation (and not just for real estate). Above all, she is proud say the majority of her business comes from referrals. Her clients know they can always count her to assist them with making decisions in their best interests with the highest of trust. She is a problem solver and steadfast voice of reason in all transactions.. When she is not selling homes, you can find her giving back to the community with her favorite charity Project GiveBack, eating at one of the best restaurants in town or on a plane traveling to some of the worlds most amazing destinations.
title: Realtor®

description: About Whitney Whitney Cooper has been a licensed real estate agent in Washington, DC since 2017. She specializes in guiding first-time homebuyers through the exciting process of finding their perfect place and helping sellers price and present their homes to sell quickly and for the highest possible price. A proud DC resident for over 15 years and an avid biker, Whitney knows the ins and outs of the city’s ever-evolving neighborhoods—along with the best bike trails and hidden gems in every corner of the District. Outside of real estate, Whitney enjoys life with her husband and their two-year-old daughter. Her favorite thing about DC? All the incredible free experiences for kids—museums, playgrounds, and more. Whether she’s biking to a new playground or cooking up a meal for friends and family, Whitney brings energy, warmth, and a community-first mindset to everything she does.
title: Realtor®

description: About Morghan As a Realtor®, Morghan’s first priority is creating an exceptional experience for her clients. She provides thoughtful, personalized service, builds lasting relationships, and maintains them through clear and consistent communication. By truly listening to her clients’ goals, Morghan ensures every transaction is not only successful but also seamless and stress-free. With a passion for serving the D.C. Metro area, Morghan blends market expertise with a lifestyle-driven approach that makes the home-buying and selling journey both enjoyable and empowering. For her clients, it’s never just a transaction—it’s an experience. Morghan is dedicated to guiding clients at every stage of life, while ensuring the journey feels effortless and inspiring. Outside of real estate, she enjoys spending time with her family, traveling, and finding inspiration in everyday moments that reflect balance, beauty, and intention.
title: REALTOR®

description: About Chris Utilizing his years of professional experience and education in architecture and real estate development, Chris provides clients with unparalleled market knowledge and a uniquely tailored experience when buying or selling their new home or investment property. Chris grew up in the Boston suburb of Needham, Massachusetts. He graduated from Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute in Troy, New York with a Bachelor of Architecture and minor in Marketing. While attending RPI Chris took on his first job in Real Estate, working as the Portfolio Manager for a Manhattan-based investment group, managing their six upstate properties. Prior to taking on a full time career in Real Estate, Chris spent five years as the Project Architect and Marketing Director for a Baltimore-based real estate developer, working on a wide range of design & development projects with a focus in restaurant & hospitality, large scale residential, and renewable energy facilities. The value of Chris’ past work experiences in design and construction is passed on to his clients, allowing them to be better informed to make smarter decisions and achieve maximum value. Prior to joining in 2016, Chris was recognized as a top-producing agent in Coldwell Banker’s Dupont Circle office, ranking in the company’s Top 6% of Agents Worldwide in 2015. Chris operates on a business philosophy of proficiency, knowledge, and a commitment to excellence, in all aspects, on every Real Estate transaction. From consult to closing, Chris' attention to detail and commitment to an individually tailored experience ensures his client's goals can become reality.
title: Realtor

description: About Charles Charles Cornell is a dynamic and highly motivated real estate professional with outstanding analytic, oral, and written communication skills. Raised just south of Annapolis, Maryland, Charles completed his Bachelor's degree in southern California, undertaking studies in business administration, economics, and real estate development. Upon his return to the area, he completed his Master’s degree at Georgetown University. When it comes to his work, Charles is very detail oriented and has a passion for negotiating. He is always ready and willing to take on a challenge in order to make the house buying or selling process easier for his clients. Charles has lived in Logan Circle for the past six years with his Brussels Griffon, Kris. When not at work, he loves to travel with friends and spend time with family in Annapolis. Charles also enjoys being active in the community, including participating in many Georgetown alumni events and fund raising activities for a variety of causes.
title: Realtor

description: About Patty Patty Couto | Top Northern Virginia Real Estate Agent | Multilingual Relocation Expert Patty Couto understands the challenges and opportunities that come with relocating. As the child of business executives, she has lived in Singapore, Mexico, Brazil, Texas, and Northern Virginia before earning her degree from The College of William & Mary. Her well-traveled background gives her a unique perspective and deep empathy for home buyers and sellers navigating a move—whether across town or across continents. Today, Patty is a trusted real estate agent in Northern Virginia, helping clients buy and sell homes in Arlington, Alexandria, Fairfax, Falls Church, and surrounding DMV neighborhoods. Fluent in English, Spanish, and Portuguese, she specializes in serving international clients, relocation buyers, and first-time homebuyers, as well as advising home sellers on how to prepare, price, and market their homes effectively. Rated and voted year over year as a high-performing and top real estate agent, Patty brings a proven track record of excellence and client satisfaction to every transaction. Patty began her real estate career on a top-producing team in Northern Virginia and later joined Compass in 2018. She is licensed in Virginia, Washington, DC, and Texas. Before entering real estate, she worked in finance at Revolution, a Washington, DC-based venture capital firm. When she's not showing homes, you can find her exploring Arlington’s neighborhoods or discovering far-away places with her husband, Will, and their sweet pup, Lucy. Whether you’re looking to buy your first home, upsize, downsize, or relocate to Northern Virginia, Patty combines market expertise with a personal touch and a passion for helping people feel at home. REVIEWS Cameron M. Patty was amazing. She really went above and beyond for us and was always there whenever we had questions or wanted to see a place. She was super patient and I never felt rushed at any point in the process. What I appreciated most was that she gave her honest opinion instead of trying to push us into buying something just to make a sale. I always felt like she genuinely had our best interests in mind. I truly appreciated working with her and I’ll definitely be recommending her to my friends! " Caitlin C. We worked with Patty as first-time home buyers and she was the best! She was incredibly patient with us and took the time to explain every step of the home buying process, which made us feel confident throughout the whole experience. Patty knows the area very well and connected us with great contacts, including our lender, which was a huge help. She’s professional, knowledgeable, and genuinely wonderful to work with. Gayathri M. Working with Patty has been an exceptional experience! As a first-time home buyer, I had literally 0 knowledge about the market, the home buying process, negotiation strategies, etc... Patty truly guided me through this journey, making it as smooth and seamless as possible, and I am now a homeowner with 0 regrets or worries. See more...
title: Realtor® in VA, DC & TX

description: About Marc Marc transitioned to the real estate industry following a distinguished career in the military and intelligence community. His previous roles required perseverance, tenacity, highly developed communication and negotiation skill, often working with diverse multi-national organizations. Today, as a real estate professional, he applies these talents to a broad spectrum of discerning clients. Marc enjoys a stellar reputation his integrity and diligence and provides outstanding service, complemented by a contagious enthusiasm. He is a focused listener and a formidable advocate for his clients. With core values of professionalism and genuine concern for the best interests of his clients and their families, Marc works tirelessly to find the right home for his buyers and get the best price for his sellers. When Marc is not working with families to discover that special place called home, he enjoys outdoor adventures in the mountains, and the abundance of cultural, recreational and social opportunities offered in the Washington, DC Metro area. Click here to view Marc's website What Marc's Clients are saying: "Marc Cowan = Wow! My wife and I call the DMV home and decided that continuing to rent was money down the drain. We finally made up our minds to purchase our first home. Buying a home is a daunting task. There were so many hoops to jump through that it seemed almost impossible. With Marc, though, we were able to rest assured that things would get done. While interviewing agents, we wanted someone who had the savvy and knowledge to navigate the waters of buying a home. Along with that, we needed a realtor with the endurance to push through the challenges first time buyers can bring and the grit to fight in a very competitive market. We interviewed several agents and Marc was our one and only unanimous decision. From the time, we met during our initial interview, we knew this was someone we could count on and who would put our best interest first. He arrived early for our initial meeting, looking dapper as always, with plenty of information for first time home buyers, and we could tell he really wanted to get to know our family and our needs for our first home. The questions he asked and the information he gathered proved invaluable in finding the right home for our family. Looking for homes can be exhilarating and gruesome at the same time. Marc made it easy by sharing updated information about homes as quickly as possible. He always promptly responded to queries, even late at night. My wife had him on speed dial and often had many questions. Marc had no problem with this at all and gladly maintained constant contact to keep us updated on any happenings. He also guided us through the tough breaks when homes were listed and went under the same day and explained the market trends in terms that made sense to us. When we finally found the home we wanted, he wasted no time in pulling comps, calling the agent to get as much information as possible, and walking us through the possible scenarios we would face in our offer. At the end of the day, if you do not have a realtor who can negotiate on your behalf with both professionalism and tenacity, you may see homes slipping through your fingers. Marc’s ability to gain insight into the seller allowed us to make a reasonable offer on the home that we wanted. He had us write a personal letter explaining why we wanted the home and encouraged us to include a picture of our family to go with the offer letter. Pure genius! We ended up having our offer accepted even though we were not the highest bidders. We know that if we’d had a different agent or tried to tackle this on our own, we would not be in the we are in today. Marc managed to negotiate hard after the inspection was done and all major points of contention were taken care of by the seller and listing agent. Marc is extremely professional, dependable, attentive, patient, and overall a pleasure to work with. He is the complete package in an agent. Without doubt we felt he was representing us and was constantly looking out for our best interests. He also has extensive contacts with different vendors such as inspectors, appraisers, title companies, and other professionals that you’ll need to work with during the process of buying a home. All the vendors that he recommended have also been very dependable and great to work with. We are so grateful to Marc and have already highly recommended him to many of our friends and colleagues. You won’t regret choosing Marc for any of your realty needs!" - Lance and Luz Mercier
title: Realtor

description: About Latoya LaToya “LC” Cox is a highly experienced real estate agent who has spent the last several years specializing in the Montgomery County region, while providing expert guidance to her clients throughout the DC metropolitan area. She deeply understands the local real estate market and uses her knowledge to ensure her clients find their dream homes or the perfect properties for investment. As a proud military wife and mother of three, LC possesses a natural skill for understanding people's needs in their home search. Her empathy and patience enable her to pinpoint her clients' tastes and preferences accurately. Her years of experience running a small business have also given her in-depth knowledge of the financial aspects of real estate, which helps her clients make informed decisions. LC epitomizes diligence, hard work, and professionalism, which has helped her establish a loyal and satisfied clientele base. Her clients appreciate her ability to give them accurate and honest advice, regardless of the situation, providing them with a high level of peace of mind. She makes it a priority always to keep her clients' best interests in mind when working with them, no matter how complex the situation might be. LC received her under graduate degree in Organizational Leadership from Wright State University. When not working, she loves spending time with her family, exploring new dining experiences, and enjoying relaxing moments by the beach. She is also an active member of her community, serving as the PTA President of a local elementary school.
title: REALTOR® licensed in MD

description: About Kacey Kacey, a Northern VA native, has called Oakton, Arlington, and DC home – uniquely positioning her to assist buyers and sellers throughout DC and close-in Virginia and Maryland. She prides herself on being hands-on, a clear communicator, and a solid listener. From representing first-time home buyers to seasoned homeowners, Kacey is a competent Realtor to have on your side. In her free time, when not taking advantage of her energetic NW DC neighborhood, Kacey enjoys spending time with her senior rescue dog and working out.
title: Realtor® | licensed in DC, MD & VA

description: About Tianni Tianni has been a skilled & sought after buying & selling agent in the DC metro area since 2012. A long-time District resident, she offers 25 years of local expertise. She's committed to helping clients strategize, find the right investment opportunities and build wealth. Whether it’s buying or selling your next home or project or your current home or project, she’ll work with you for a win and make sure you have fun doing it. Tianni started in real estate in Hawaii after serving in the Navy. She holds a bachelor’s degree from The George Washington University and a master’s degree from Georgetown University. She lives in Chevy Chase, DC with her husband and two sons.
title: Realtor®

description: About John John has been working with the Capital Park Realty Team since 2013, and is licensed in the District of Columbia, Virginia, and Maryland. He has helped more than 100 clients buy and sell their homes worth a total of more than $55 million. John first lived in the DC area as a student at Georgetown University in 2000, where he earned a degree from the School of Foreign Service in Culture and Politics in 2004. He has lived in Georgetown, Burleith, Silver Spring, Arlington, and Capitol Hill (where he currently resides), and as such knows different parts of the DC area well. John also holds a masters degree in Broadcast Journalism from Syracuse University. Prior to becoming a real estate agent, he spent seven years in sports media relations and television production, working for the Baltimore Orioles, Duke University's Athletic Department, and ESPN. John is a big Georgetown basketball, Capitals, Nationals, and Boston Red Sox fan. He likes to travel when he's not enjoying all that DC has to offer. John has been to all 30 Major League Baseball parks and counts his favorite U.S. destinations as San Francisco, New Orleans, and Key West. If you have questions for John, send him an e-mail at john@cparkre.com.
title: Realtor®

description: About Crystal Crystal is a graduate of Virginia Tech and Georgetown University who discovered a passion DC real estate when she moved to the city 2000. Before long, she was buying and renovating homes in her spare time while working as an import trade enforcement officer with the U.S. Department of Commerce. In 2004, Crystal left the Feds and became a real estate consultant. Working with the JLC Team, she has enthusiastically served DC buyers and sellers, combining her proficient analytical abilities and attention to detail with her knowledge of old homes and renovations to guide buyers when comparing homes for purchase and sellers when preparing homes for sale. Crystal's negotiation skills and ability to assess the value of a home through her vast understanding of the DC market have helped numerous buyers achieve their real estate goals. She values a personal approach and prides herself on her experiences as a DC home buyer, seller, renovator, and mom of two DC public school graduates (now at Ohio State and Iowa University). Crystal aims to empathetically treat each client based on their specific needs to tailor a client-specific plan for every purchase or sale.
title: Realtor

description: About Sherilee the real estate and interior design fields, Sherilee Cronin is renowned among colleagues and clients alike for her ability to view and market real estate in a completely unique and revolutionary manner - merging interior design, home staging and real estate, the results on home sales are often top-dollar, faster sales and satisfied clients. Sherilee is an agent with skilled negotiating techniques, market knowledge and is committed to providing the highest quality representation and professionalism along with superb customer service and individualized strategies. Since becoming a Realtor and design professional in 2012, Sherilee has been involved in multi-million dollars worth of transactions in the real estate business and countless interior design and home staging projects. Sherilee prides herself on being a one-stop-shop for buyers and sellers, providing an experience to her clientele that is completely unique from most other agent's service offering.
title: Realtor®

description: About David David Crossland is a distinguished Washingtonian renowned for his boundless enthusiasm, innate curiosity, and genuine passion in all his endeavors. An alumnus of St. Albans school with advanced studies in arts and architecture in New York and Paris, David has seamlessly turned his hobby into a thriving carer, expertly matching impeccable properties with discerning clients. As a Certified International Property Specialist, David has held the prestigious role of exclusive Washington agent for the Royal Norwegian Military since 2013. His professional journey includes notable tenures at the development offices at the John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts and The Washington Ballet. His diverse experience extends to serving as Jane Fonda's aide-de-camp in Atlanta, Georgia, working as a freelance market editor and fashion director in New York, and spending over two years as a baker at the Esalen Institute in Big Sur, California during his early 20's. In the realm of luxury real estate, David has carved out a niche for himself in the prestigious markets of Washington, DC, McLean and the greater DC area. His keen eye for detail and unwavering commitment to excellence enable him to navigate these competitive markets with finesse, consistently delivering outstanding results for his clients. From historic estate in Georgetown to modern masterpieces in McLean, David's portfolio showcases the finest properties in the region. An accomplushed tennis enthusiast, David was honored with an induction into the United States Tennis Association's Hall of Fame in 2023. His business, built entirely on referrals, is a testament to his impeccable reputation as a compassionate listener and innovative problem solver, qualities that shine through both personally and professionally. David's clients trust his expertise and discretion, knowing that he will provide unparalleled service.
title: Realtor®

description: About James Welcome to my website! I am James Crowe, and I have been a full-time real estate agent since November of 2003. Though born in Massachusetts, I came to the DC area to attend the University of Maryland in 1991 and haven’t looked back (except that one cold winter outside Boston, but that is another story). With years of experience working in the Metro DC area, I have done it all and worked with all types of clients, from first-time homebuyers to seasoned multi-unit investors, from owners of multi-million dollar estates to buyers of one-bedroom condos. No matter what your needs, I am here to help.
title: Realtor®

description: About Shane As a Compass agent, real estate developer, and native Washingtonian, Shane brings a uniquely comprehensive perspective to the D.C. real estate market. His legal training allows him to negotiate with precision, while his development experience gives clients an insider’s understanding of construction quality, long-term value, and design. Having grown up in the area — and with a wife who owns an educational consulting business — he also serves as a trusted resource for families navigating private schools, healthcare providers, and the nuances of different neighborhoods. Whether his clients are buying, selling, or investing, Shane focuses on delivering strategic advice, concierge-level service, and a seamless experience tailored to their goals and lifestyle.
title: REALTOR®

description: About Gabby As a Silver Spring native who has lived in the area her whole life, Gabriela enjoys sharing her knowledge of local communities with her clients and helping them find the best fit for their lifestyle. She was introduced to real estate at an early age, her father who is a contractor and investor, and having grown up in and around the industry she couldn’t wait to get started building her own career in real estate. Gabriela loves being a Realtor because it integrates many of her passions such as developing, investing, interior design, socializing, and having fun! Gabriela brings a customer service background to the Koki Associates and her strong work ethic, responsiveness, and dedication are are key attributes that both her clients and the team benefit from. When she’s not in the office you can catch her at Corepower yoga, biking through DC, or hunting down the DMV’s best plate of nachos.
title: Team Koki of Compass | Realtor®

description: About Pat Growing up in two different continents, Europe and Tennessee, Pat discovered early on the excitement and disruption moving causes. That experience, alongside her advertising and marketing background with high-profile clients such as Amtrak, Freddie Mac, Marriott, Sheraton Hotels, and major airlines, provided Pat with the perfect combination of understanding and marketing experience to sell your home and negotiate your new home purchase. Her entrepreneurial spirit, marketing savvy, creative eye, high energy and love of real estate all fuel her passion to represent her clients' best interests. Pat, a trusted and highly sought-after realtor at Compass, and a longtime N Virginia resident, specializes in the Metro DC real estate market. A tenacious negotiator, Pat stays up to date on industry and mortgage trends in order to equip buyers wi th the right information and obtain the highest possible price for sellers. Committed to always learning, Pat completed the Harvard Business School Online Negotiation Mastery Course in 2023. With her unwavering persistence, work ethic, and genuine love for a successful experience for her clients, Pat has been recognized as one of the top Agents in the DC area by Washingtonian and Northern Virginia Magazine, and has been the recipient of the Five Star Professional Award. Her tireless dedication to prioritizing her clients’ best interests has led to a remarkable 90% of her business coming from repeat clients and referrals. Deeply committed to giving back to her community, Pat actively supports various non-profit organizations, with a special fondness for Kidsave and Poplar Spring Animal Sanctuary. In her leisure time, she enjoys entertaining family and friends, practicing yoga, tennis, exploring the great outdoors and embarking on exciting travel adventures. Client Testimonials "At each step Pat was responsive, organized, prepared and expressed an uncanny ability to problem solve under some extreme circumstances. " Jamie Lester | Burke VA " We highly recommend Pat. The experience from start to finish was beyond our expectations. She provided prompt and wise guidance on pricing, timing, and improvements needed prior to putting the house on the market. With her successful strategy we had our home under contract in only 10 days. We're thankful that we had the opportunity to work with Pat and she will be our first call if we have real estate needs in the future. " - Deepak Madala | Alexandria VA " Pat is without a doubt one of the most professional, efficient, and effective people I’ve had the privilege to work with. I wholeheartedly recommend her to anyone looking to buy or sell a home. As my real estate agent, Pat was not only eager to achieve the goals I had laid out, but also highly protective of my needs as a buyer, and always willing to go the extra mile. She has unquestionable integrity and creates a team atmosphere with her clients. Flexible, dynamic, and very enthusiastic about her profession, Pat is a total pleasure to work with, and very good at her job. Hire her! " - Manny Goefeller Georgetown | Washington DC " Our experience with Pat was excellent! She knows the market extremely well; she precisely assessed the market and set the correct home value. She walked us through the paperwork and clearly laid out expectations. She did a good job of answering our questions as well. She is highly responsive - responding to requests quickly. We recommend Pat without any reservation. " - Elizabeth Boudrie | Falls Church VA " We couldn't have asked for a better experience! From the moment we decided to list and started interviewing realtors, Pat was our clear choice. Her presentation was professional, clear and she immediately set us at ease. From staging to through selling, contingencies and closing, Pat was a delight to work with. Her proactive approach and negotiation skills are terrific and communication with us was always timely, informative and reassuring. She made us feel like we were her only client and we knew she truly our best interests. If you need a realtor we highly recommend you contact Pat! " - Heather Allen | Alexandria VA " Pat helped us throughout the entire process of prepping, and selling our home of 30 years, helping us successfully navigate what easily could have been a traumatic and stressful experience for us. Though she was somewhat new to our neighborhood, she was thorough in her research and very open to our "local knowledge" in helping to set a good price. We found her honest, straightforward, extremely easy to work with, and very responsive to our questions and concerns. We were always confident she had our very best interests in mind. Her advice proved to be spot on and helped us to understand what to expect at each stage of the process. She was very perceptive in sizing up potential buyers and . She always followed up and delivered on what she promised. Perhaps what we most appreciated was her confident, patient and calming presence, which greatly put our minds at ease. We can't thank her enough! " - Bill Dietrich | Rockville " Pat recently assisted me with the sale of my condo in Washington, DC. I thought the process would be complicated since I live out of state, but Pat assured me that she would see that everything went smoothly - and she did! She offered realistic suggestions for preparing the property for sale, and handled all aspects of the preparation, including contacting utilities, arranging for painting and cleaning, coordinating roof and hvac repairs, staging, professional photography, and and public open houses. She located qualified buyers, researched sales and suggested a realistic sales strategy and price. Thanks to her thorough and thoughtful preparation, my condo sold in matter of weeks and I was very pleased with the final price! Pat provided further assistance throughout the sale process to ensure that everything stayed on track. Pat's help didn't end with the sale - she assisted with donating and selling unwanted furniture, and used her extensive network of local professionals to help me with other details related to the sale. I would highly recommend Pat - she is a dedicated professional who always made me feel like I was her top priority! " - Cathy Pauly | Logan Circle Washington DC
title: Realtor® - Licensed DC, VA, MD

description: About Brad Brad Custer excels at communicating clearly with clients and overcoming any challenge that comes his way. As a former health administrator and consultant to the Department of Veteran Affairs, Brad learned how to quickly navigate any situation and effectively solve any problem that arose. He combines those skills with his outgoing personality, making each real estate transaction as smooth as possible for his clients. Brad grew up in the Shenandoah Valley, studied health administration at George Mason University, then moved to the DC area in 2016. He’s dedicated to personal fitness and plays in a local sports league. He also enjoys traveling with his partner, trying new food, spending time with friends, and growing unique tropical plants.
title: Realtor® licensed in DC

description: About Catherine Catherine's reputation for preparing and delivering exceptional homes for market is well known throughout the region, as is her high volume of sales no matter the market conditions. She is committed to presenting a property's full potential and to fully supporting buyers in search of the best home for the best price. Thoroughly engaged and focused on details, Catherine consistently exceeds her clients' expectations with her high level of service and responsiveness. Her enthusiasm and energy throughout each step support her dedication to helping clients establish their own sense of place. Though she originally dreamed of becoming a wilderness ranger, a career in business beckoned and she honed her skills as a business manager, then as a director for a real estate company specializing in multi-family properties. She turned her attention to residential sales in 2002 and founded the Czuba Group in 2008. In 2015, Catherine was appointed Senior Vice President of Compass DC. That same year she was named among the top 1% agents nationwide Real Trends and the Wall Street Journal. She is also a recipient of the Compass Integrity Award and has been recognized the Washingtonian as one of Washington's Top Realtors for six consecutive years. Catherine's love of international travel has taken her around the globe, and she has lived in Japan and Australia. If she's not working or traveling, she can likely be found at the theater, engaging in a fitness activity, or exploring nature. She currently lives in Mount Pleasant where she is inspired every day the ever-changing cityscape and Rock Creek National Park, both of which are right outside her door. She is the founder of the Czuba Group.
title: Senior Vice President

description: About Paul Paul joined the Czuba Group in 2016 after working in sales and for the Ritz-Carlton and the Four Seasons for 30 years. His transition into the residential real estate business from the luxury hotel business was a natural progression — he used the skills he developed as a resort director to quickly establish himself as a Realtor with an eye for detail, expertise in preparing properties for sale and talent for using strategic to maximize exposure, value, and profit. He employs his analytic acumen when working with buyers, keeping them informed and competitive all times. And he is committed to being a careful listener and his clients’ biggest advocate; their goals become his goals. Whether he is working with buyers or sellers, his approach remains constant, thorough and hands-on with an unwavering drive to support their success and exceed expectations. Paul began his hotel career working for the Willard Hotel in DC, and later spent nearly two decades hotels and resorts around the world, including properties in Hawaii, Qatar and Egypt. On assignment in Bali, he ended up falling in love with the island and staying for 20 years. A frequent traveler and entertainer, Paul is an avid and adventurous cook who thinks the more complicated the recipe, the better. He currently lives in Petworth.
title: Realtor

description: About Czuba Group Relationships are the heart of our business. We are committed to building collaborative partnerships with our clients, no matter the size of the home or the budget. Our goals are to provide a high level of service and to secure your success. Our commitment is to help you into a home you love. Our team’s distinct professional backgrounds, combined with our collective years of experience in the real estate industry, allow Czuba Group to offer an unrivaled advantage throughout each process and every negotiation; we are tenacious advocates for our clients. We stay keenly aware of current market trends while offering comprehensive knowledge of the DC Metropolitan area and its diverse neighborhoods, houses, condos and cooperative apartment buildings. Our familiarity with the Metro area allows us to consistently connect buyers with neighborhoods that match their lifestyles and budgets, while our reputation for preparing and presenting exceptional homes enables us to effectively—and successfully—market and sell every seller’s property. What also sets us apart: we continue to offer support and guidance long after a transaction is complete. We assist and advise on moving day logistics and home renovations and help clients establish connections in their new communities. We are dedicated to assisting our clients immediately following their move and as their housing needs evolve over the years. We build relationships for life. www.CzubaGroup.com
