About Sami Specializing in high-end and luxury properties throughout the Washington, D.C. metropolitan area. For over seven years, Sami has guided clients through every stage of the real estate journey—from first-time homebuyers and seasoned investors to those relocating domestically and internationally—earning a reputation for her exceptional service, market insight, and strategic approach. Sami’s diverse portfolio reflects her versatility and commitment to delivering tailored solutions. She excels at crafting winning offers in highly competitive markets and navigating efficient closings under tight timelines. Her ability to anticipate challenges before they arise, combined with a proactive mindset and refined negotiation skills, ensures her clients are always a step ahead. Whether helping a family settle into their first home or identifying a high-performing investment opportunity, Sami approaches each transaction with focus, care, and precision. She is deeply knowledgeable about the local market across Northern Virginia, D.C., and Maryland, and has a particular talent for uncovering the best on- and off-market opportunities. Sami loves the process of helping clients find their perfect home and believes that buying real estate—no matter the price point—should be an exciting, enjoyable experience. Her calm, solutions-oriented demeanor and hands-on guidance bring clarity and confidence to every step of the process.
title: Realtor®

description: About Teyana Teyana Daley became a licensed agent in DC and MD after flourishing as an assistant to our senior partner Donnell Kearney. As a bilingual agent, Teyana serves many Spanish-speaking clients and loves helping people fulfill their dreams of home ownership. Teyana was drawn to real estate after spending her childhood tagging along to houses with her mom, who was a part-time agent. She grew up in Silver Spring before attending William & Mary, where she majored in Hispanic studies and minored in management and organizational leadership. She learned Spanish in high school when she spent a year in Spain in an immersive program. After college, she participated in a year-long leadership development program, where she honed her business skills. Teyana enjoys long walks in nature and Pilates and spends her time at home being entertained by her dog and cat.
title: Realtor® Licensed in DC & MD

description: About Vlad Vlad Dallenbach is an Associate Broker & Vice President with Compass Real Estate. Vlad started his career in real estate industry in 2003, working in Market Development and Market Research. He did work in the Mortgage Industry and rapidly became a top producer. In 2009 he was one of the founders of District One Properties, a real estate boutique brokerage firm in Alexandria VA. From there he joined TTR Sotheby’s International Realty as an Associate Broker & Vice President where he worked for 4 years. Vlad has 10 + years of corporate professional background, where he developed strong ethics and best business practices. In Nestle he developed the Import - Export Department for the Northern South -American Region and in Dupont, he led Market Development Strategies and New Business and Opportunities for the Andean Markets. Vlad’s perspective and real estate approach helps his clients exceed their real estate goals and add immeasurable value to their entire home buying or selling process. When he is not busy selling real estate, Vlad enjoys life with his wife and two young kids, traveling, golfing, playing tennis, skiing, and actively participating in his local community. Vlad holds an MBA from ESSEC Business School in Paris, France and an Economist Degree from Universidad Santa Maria in Caracas, Venezuela. Vlad is licensed to practice real estate in Washington DC, Maryland and Virginia. He is fluent in Spanish, English, French and conversational Portuguese.
title: Vice President - Associate Broker

description: About Dana Rice Group Go ahead --- get to know us! The Dana Rice Group team brings more than 45 years' combined expertise to work for our clients. Dana, Kcrystal, Brian, and Whitney work as interchangeable parts so our buyers and sellers always have access to personal, hands-on support. With varying backgrounds in architecture, staging, marketing, sales and communications, we have unique perspectives on the market -- servicing both first time buyers and those looking at properties in the upper brackets with diligence, care and excellence. With decades of living in Maryland and D.C. between us, we work together to ensure that clients achieve success.

About Candace Let’s talk about your real estate goals. I’m Candace Dantzler of COMPASS. I service clients in DC, MD, and VA and am here to turn your real estate dreams into reality. It all starts with a conversation, so we can craft a personalized game plan aligned with your goals. Whether you’re buying your first home, selling, or investing to build wealth through real estate, I’m dedicated to guiding you every step of the way. Originally from metro Detroit suburbs and a proud Howard University alumna, I bring energy, strong communication skills, and genuine dedication to every client’s journey. With over 15 years of experience in the DMV market, I leverage a strong background in contract negotiations and project management to ensure my team seamlessly supports your goals and provides a 5-star experience. I’m passionate about giving back to my community, and as a member of Alpha Kappa Alpha Sorority, Inc., I dedicate myself to empowering others through education, fundraising initiatives, seminars, and training sessions focused on opening doors to generational wealth and financial literacy. When I’m not working, I love spending quality time with my family, enjoying a good glass of wine, and attending Howard University homecomings with my closest friends. If you’re ready to buy, sell, or invest—and want an agent who listens, educates, and delivers results—give me a call. I’d be thrilled to connect, help you take the next step, and build wealth through real estate! Let’s get started!
title: Realtor®

description: About Ryan Ryan is an enthusiastic agent with a unique background; offering nearly ten years of experience as an architectural designer and two years as a financial consultant. This knowledge allows Ryan to provide his client's expertise from two of the most important facets in the real estate industry; helping you find a quality home and how to budget for it. Having lived in both Maryland and DC for nearly 20 years, Ryan brings an intimate knowledge of the Washington DC metro area. With an undeniable passion and knowledge of all things real estate, Ryan champions his approach to providing superior service to all of his clients. Ryan focuses on educating his clients about the entire process, from the initial consultation to settlement Ryan makes sure his clients know exactly what they are getting into. Ryan holds a bachelor's degree from the nearby University of Maryland and a Master's of Architecture degree from the Catholic University of America here in Washington DC. Currently, Ryan lives in Petworth with his wife, Ryan Jr & newly arrived twin boys. When he is not with my family or friends, Ryan's hobbies include the arts, architecture, travel and playing with his toys.
title: Realtor®

description: About Heather A Boston native, Heather fell in love with DC and real estate nearly two decades ago. She now lives in Chevy Chase, D.C., with her husband and three active children and, as such, has an innate understanding of the relocation-related issues that families face. As a creative problem solver, Heather thrives in finding innovative solutions to the myriad challenges that may arise during the buying or selling process. Her resourcefulness, combined with an unwavering commitment to client satisfaction, sets her apart. She has earned a reputation with both clients and peers as a compassionate listener, effective communicator, and trusted advisor. In those rare moments when Heather is not busy with real estate, she enjoys reading, cooking, or volunteering at her children's school. You can also often find her walking her energetic dog, Doolin. Heather is a proud graduate of Northwestern University. Find out more here Client Testimonials Scroll down for more " Heather is an amazing real estate agent. She helped us with the successful sale of our condo, and was knowledgeable about the market, professional, creative, and an incredible asset in the process. When we got into a tricky multiple offer situation, she had strong relationships and was able to help us manage it strategically in a way that worked out in our favor. I recommend her highly and without reservation! " - Emmy ★★★★★ " Heather was fantastic- after meeting with us once she took us out one day and we got our perfect house that weekend which was the first house we'd made an offer on. The entire process could not have gone better! "
title: Vice President | Realtor® | Licensed in DC, MD & VA

description: About Ryan Your local DMV real estate expert, Ryan, first launched his career in property management and served as a settlement assistant in the title industry before becoming a full-time Realtor. Having lived in various DC neighborhoods - Bloomingdale, DuPont Circle, Logan Circle, and Columbia Heights - he holds a wealth of knowledge about the most coveted DC areas. Before moving to DC, Ryan spent 12 years training standardbred racehorses. During this time, he rescued his own standardbred racehorse, Coopersmith, who has become a part of his family. As a Delaware native, Ryan has expanded his business to include its beautiful beaches. If you are looking in Rehoboth for a new home or a vacation property, his knowledge and connections will make the transaction a breeze. In addition to his expertise in the DC and Rehoboth Beach real estate markets, Ryan is also a military relocation expert. He understands the unique challenges that military families face when buying or selling a home. He is committed to providing personalized and comprehensive service to make the process as smooth as possible. In his spare time, he enjoys caring for Coopersmith, spending time with family and friends, and exploring all that DC offers. Whether you’re a seasoned seller or first-time buyer looking along the Delaware coastline or in the heart of DC, Ryan is ready to exceed all your real estate expectations and make your experience easy and fun!
title: Real Estate Sales Person

description: About Eva Eva Davis loves meeting new people and building long-term relationships. The fun of making friends started at a young age while playing basketball in her hometown of Houston, TX and as a camper and counselor at Camp Judaea in Hendersonville, NC. Eva started collecting her best friends early and some of them are still around her today! Ever since leaving Texas to study abroad on gap year in Israel before college and then heading to Washington, D.C. to attend GW as a psych major, Eva has continued building her social network. Eva fell in love with DC, and after college worked in the mortgage industry at Fannie Mae working with technology and then credit risk, during which time she earned a Master of Science in of Information Systems from Johns Hopkins. Eva brings significant business experience to her Real Estate career from her time in the mortgage industry, positioning her for great success in the greater Washington, D.C. market. In her first year as an Agent, Eva was awarded the prestigious Rookie of the Year Award - an impressive feat which few achieve. Now 10 years later, leading the #2 team at Compass DC, she still gets as excited to show houses, negotiate offers and work with her clients every step of the way. Her high touch service, tough negotiating skills, ongoing hustle and sense of humor have helped her build a deep referral business. In addition to her professional career, Eva focuses on volunteer work for mission-driven organizations she cares about, holding leadership positions, developing advocacy and fundraising skills and influencing her peers. Eva serves on a myriad of non-profit boards and has served in leadership roles with the Jewish Federation of Greater Washington, the Edlavitch DC Jewish Community Center, the Anti-Defamation League, Israel Bonds, Gather DC, and the American Jewish World Service. Beyond her full life in DC, Eva loves traveling the world, exploring different cultures and of course, staying in touch with the people she's met. The year in Israel led to a desire for travel to Europe, South America, Asia, and Africa. Eva currently lives in downtown Bethesda with her University of Michigan-loving husband (Go Blue!) and her two little kids, with whom she enjoys exploring the food scene in DC and taking advantage of playgrounds, parks, theatre, and happenings around town! View Eva's Video Bio
title: Executive Vice President | DC | MD | VA

description: About Stacie Originally from New Jersey, Stacie spent much of her childhood moving to new places as her father’s career in pharmaceuticals took the family to Ireland, Germany, Puerto Rico, North Carolina, and beyond. Experiencing so many different homes and communities at a young age gave her a deep appreciation for the emotional and logistical challenges of moving—insight she brings to every client she serves. Stacie moved to the Washington, DC area in 1997 and has been proud to call Reston home since 2003. Her introduction to real estate came in high school while working at a local firm in Raleigh, sparking a passion for helping people find the right home. Before returning to real estate full-time in 2005, Stacie built a strong professional foundation in accounting and consulting. Armed with a Bachelor’s and Master’s degrees in Accounting from East Carolina University, she worked with industry leaders PWC, KPMG, and Accenture. This experience sharpened her skills in analysis, problem-solving, and precision—qualities that now serve her clients every day. Stacie runs a 100% referral-based business built on trust, relationships, and results. She personally manages every client interaction from start to finish, supported by her experienced listing and transaction coordinators. Her approach is simple: every decision is guided by what is best for the client, not by making a sale. Clients describe Stacie as “the epitome of what a real estate professional should be,” a “calm, steady advocate” who “goes above and beyond” and “handles every detail with care, precision, and integrity.” Whether helping a family buy their first home, managing a cross-country relocation, or coordinating multiple transactions at once, she is known for her professionalism, market expertise, and tireless work ethic. Many clients mention her ability to anticipate needs before they arise, solve problems quickly, and make what could be a stressful process feel effortless. Stacie lives in Reston with her husband, Kirk, and their overly-spoiled yellow lab, Zac. She loves spending time outdoors, traveling to new places, and exploring the local restaurant scene—or cooking at home with Kirk. Her greatest professional satisfaction comes from knowing that the trust her clients place in her is repaid with results, lasting relationships, and a smooth, confident path to the next chapter in their lives. Client Testimonials ★★★★★ Stacie recently helped us sell our home and the entire experience was AMAZING! We had to relocate quickly for a job and wanted to sell immediately. Neighbors referred us to Stacie. From the time we first contacted her, we were on the market within 2 weeks and had 2 offers within 2 days. We got over asking price. She understood we wanted to move fast, and she delivered! So efficient and helpful every step of the way. Because of work schedules, it wasn’t easy for us to schedule a time for the closing. Stacie arranged an evening closing at our house and it was beyond easy! During our move, the movers damaged a wall and she had someone out the next day to fix it. Very knowledgeable, hardworking, and responsive. We could not have asked for a better experience. Thank you Stacie!! ★★★★★ We had the absolute pleasure of working with Stacie, and simply put, she is the epitome of what a real estate professional should be. From start to finish, Stacie went above and beyond to ensure every detail was handled with care, precision, and integrity. Not only did she successfully sell our home, but she also managed the sale of our parents’ condo and helped them purchase their beautiful new one—all with seamless coordination and constant communication. Navigating multiple transactions can be stressful, but Stacie made it feel effortless. Her knowledge of the market, calm confidence, and tireless work ethic set her apart. More than just a realtor, Stacie was our advisor, advocate, and steady guide throughout the entire process. Always one step ahead, she anticipated our needs before we even voiced them. Truly, a rare find in the industry—a real gem. We can’t recommend Stacie highly enough and will absolutely be calling her for any future real estate needs. Thank you, Stacie, for everything! ★★★★★ Stacie is truly exceptional and made all the difference in our home-buying experience. This was a major undertaking, as we were literally moving across the country. We were not familiar with the area and needed someone we could trust completely. Stacie worked tirelessly to ensure we were well-informed, demonstrating an exceptional level of knowledge and expertise. We toured countless houses together, both in-person and virtually. Stacie was honest with us throughout and extremely patient, having no desire to rush us into a house we wouldn't love. Ultimately, we found the perfect property and Stacie guided us smoothly through the buying process. She has remained in frequent contact as we settle, and continues to be our guide for services in the area. We cannot recommend Stacie highly enough! ★★★★★ I could not have asked for a better realtor! Stacie was extremely proactive and helpful from the first day I met her. She made me feel like I was walking through this process with someone who had my best interests at heart. Stacie always demonstrated exceptional professionalism, deep knowledge of the market, and a genuine commitment to helping me sell my home. I thoroughly enjoyed working with her. ★★★★★ The best accolade I can give Stacie is that she has now handled 3 real estate transactions for me, and I wouldn’t even consider someone else in the D.C. area should another one arise. When Stacie takes on a client, she takes them on 100 percent, handling everything from the dreaded paperwork to necessary repairs, market analysis, lining up movers, legal necessities, and I could keep going. If a stress-free, best financial outcome, and always available Realtor is what you are seeking, just look up Stacie Hennig Davis, and relax from that point on. ★★★★★ Stacie was a DREAM to work with. After having some not-so-great experiences with other agents, I decided to work with Stacie after being referred through my favorite lender! She truly listened to what WE wanted rather than telling us like my prior agent did. There were times when I felt like a frazzled hot mess during this crazy housing market, and Stacie was always able to reel me back in. I was always kept in the loop and walked through every step of the process. I never needed to micromanage my home sale because I trusted Stacie so much. She helped me stage my home beautifully and truly put in the extra effort and time as if we were family. I would recommend her to absolutely everyone. I felt such a great connection with Stacie and will truly miss working with her now that we have moved away. She was also able to manage my ELEVEN offers with ease by creating the most organized spreadsheet and negotiating to get me the best offer. I'm SO SO happy that I went with Stacie and I believe she played a huge part in putting more money in our pocket to put towards our next purchase. ★★★★★ Stacie met and exceeded my wife's and my expectations in all aspects related to helping us find our new home. My wife and I lived most of our lives in the Midwest, and we both landed new jobs in the Washington, D.C., area. Neither of us was very familiar with the Northern Virginia area or what areas would have everything we were looking for. Stacie listened to our needs and wants for a new home and quickly started suggesting areas and providing feedback on the pros and cons of each area. Stacie was extremely helpful, especially since we were not able to visit the locations ourselves due to still living in the Midwest. She was willing to visit any location we had a slight interest in within the first day or two that we saw the home on the market. She wasn't afraid to tell us when something didn't match up with the listing expectations. Stacie really gave us the impression that she wanted to find the home that was perfect for us, even if that meant extending the search or visiting more places than we initially expected to. She seems to have a great understanding of the Northern Virginia area and is always quick to answer questions via phone or email. We hope to work with Stacie in the future when our housing needs change. I strongly recommend connecting with Stacie and discussing what type of home options you are looking for. I'm sure she will lead you in the right direction! ★★★★★ We were absolutely thrilled working with Stacie. She took her time to explain all the pros and cons of every home we looked at. She was completely honest and gave us a professional opinion, which we truly appreciated. She followed up with essential information about our home and helpful timelines for when we needed things done. She is very organized and on top of everything! We highly recommend her! ★★★★★ Stacie Hennig Davis is extremely responsive and dedicated to her clients. Her relationship with mortgage lenders, title companies, and other realtors has allowed us recently to purchase the home we wanted during an extremely competitive sellers’ market. Over the last 12 years, Stacie has helped us with multiple transactions. We have bought three homes with Stacie and sold one with her. She helped me with my first home purchase (condo); then my first single-family when I was married, and also my second and third home as our family and needs grew. She has always found the balance between our needs, wants, and budget. The most important thing is that we can trust her. ★★★★★ Stacie was an efficient, expedient, and skilled realtor. She helped us by coaching us on helpful updates to our townhouse and had a plethora of contacts to help do the jobs. She expertly fielded each offer and objectively stated the pros and cons of each. In the end, there were many offers, and all were above the asking price. We could not have been more pleased with her service. She is a competent class act. We highly recommend her. ★★★★★ My husband and I had the pleasure of working with Stacie in finding our first home. She is knowledgeable and excellent at explaining real estate concepts to newbies like us. We started out going to tour houses with a couple of realtors, but many of them hesitated or gave us a very vague "it depends" when we asked for their opinion, and it is frustrating for inexperienced first-time home buyers to hear that. Stacie, on the other hand, gave honest, detailed, constructive feedback even though some of them weren't pleasant to hear. We were expecting at the time, so it was a lot of pressure for a nest, not to mention the crazy seller's market. But Stacie didn't rush us into overbidding or waiving all contingencies regardless of the house's condition. For a period of almost 4 months, we toured 3-4 houses almost every weekend. She remained patient and understanding. She wanted to make sure that the house we were getting would be in good condition, have good resell value and that we wouldn't have to worry about the big ticket items in the short future of moving in. We ended up with a lovely house that exceeded our expectations. Stacie does care that we get the house that we'll be happy living in. Overall, I would recommend Stacie to everyone I know because of her professionalism, knowledge, and ethics. ★★★★★ Stacie has been our realtor from a rental 10 years ago to our first home purchase and 2022 sale. She was fantastic on both ends of the transaction - patient and educated, helpful in advising us through processes we were unfamiliar with. We bought our most recent home 8 years ago and invested a fair amount over the years, making it a home we loved. We were not planning on leaving, but when my job took us elsewhere we knew Stacie would help us get the most from our property. She helped us prepare the home for sale, advising us on minor fixes and employing her own staging company to present the home in the most flattering light. We ended up getting multiple offers all well over ask and most importantly, exceeded what we hoped to achieve. Stacie helped us analyze the various offers and select the best one for our needs, which included a 2-month rent back. She continued to be on top of things through the sale, ensuring we received our rent deposit in a timely fashion. We felt comfortable throughout the experience, knowing Stacie was on top of every detail. I wouldn’t hesitate to use her again in the future! ★★★★★ Going above and beyond her duties as a broker, Stacie provided superior customer service. this is the second time I worked with stacie. this time, purchasing a home in Reston. Stacie is the definition of great customer service. When I was ready to buy, she helped me every step of the way. from finding the right place, putting together the offer, inspection, and reviewing documents to the closing, stacie provides timely information. most important of all, she kept in mind my interest above everything else. ★★★★★ I went to Stacie to purchase my first home after my mom hired her to sell her home. Stacie has been my agent twice, and both times, she went above and beyond. She is professional, has a wealth of information, and knows her stuff. She cares about her clients, and she will fight for you to get the best deal and be honest with you when she thinks something may fall short of your best interest. I highly recommend stacie. ★★★★★ Stacie has helped us buy our home, sell it, and buy another. we wouldn't want to go through it without her expertise and guidance. She stays right on top of things, explains everything, and pays close attention to every detail. Stacie is an outstanding real estate agent! ★★★★★ Stacie helped me to find my first home at the age of 24. she worked with me to find not only the location and amenities that I hoped for but also a place I felt safe in. now, 7 years later, she helped my husband, and I find our first single-family home. we could not be more thankful for her time, patience, and expertise. if you are looking for a fair and honest realtor, Stacie is definitely highly recommended by us! thank you so much for all that you do. ★★★★★ Stacie was such a great realtor to work with in both the sale of our old home and the purchase of a new one. she is professional, friendly, and extremely knowledgeable. I truly felt that she wanted us to find the home that we loved and didn't feel any pressure to put offers on houses. She showed her true value in so many ways - from helping us show our home in the best possible light (and getting above the asking price) to helping us navigate contracts and closing - explaining everything at each step of the way.
title: Realtor®

description: About Kat Meet Kat Davis, your trusted partner in the dynamic world of Washington DC real estate. With a warm and approachable demeanor, Kat brings a unique blend of skills and experiences to the table, ensuring a seamless and rewarding journey for every client. As a skilled negotiator, Kat has honed her abilities through years of successfully navigating complex deals. Her knack for finding common ground and her dedication to achieving optimal outcomes make her an invaluable asset in the world of real estate. Clients can count on Kat to fiercely advocate for their interests, all while maintaining open lines of communication and a solution-oriented mindset. Kat's background in accounting adds a layer of financial expertise that sets her apart. She understands that a real estate transaction is not just about finding the perfect property—it's about making a sound investment. Her keen attention to financial details ensures that clients are empowered to make informed decisions that align with their long-term goals. Before her career in real estate, Kat's time as a flight attendant instilled in her the art of exceptional service. Her ability to anticipate needs, adapt to changing circumstances, and provide a comfortable, stress-free experience translates seamlessly into her work with clients. She's not just helping them find a home; she's helping them embark on a new chapter with confidence and excitement. Kat's extensive network of connections within the industry, from fellow agents to trusted vendors, is a testament to her reputation as a collaborative professional. Her relationships empower her to navigate the DC real estate landscape with finesse, accessing off-market opportunities and leveraging resources to the advantage of her clients. When it comes to buying, Kat's proven strategies in competing bid situations give her clients the upper hand in securing their dream homes. Her creative problem-solving skills come to the forefront as she crafts personalized approaches that stand out in a competitive market. As a listing agent, Kat's attention to detail and marketing prowess ensure that every property shines in its best light. From staging to professional photography, her commitment to showcasing a property's unique charm leads to swift and successful sales. Outside of real estate, Kat's love for adventure and exploration fuels her curiosity about the world. Whether it's helping clients settle into a new neighborhood or sharing tips for local hidden gems, her enthusiasm for community engagement shines through. If you're seeking a real estate partner who combines warmth, expertise, and a dedication to achieving your goals, Kat Davis is the agent you've been looking for. Get ready to embark on a memorable journey with Kat by your side, turning your real estate dreams into reality.
title: Realtor® | Licensed in DC, MD, & VA

description: About Ari Ari Davis is a dynamic real estate agent who brought her passion for interior design and love for helping people find their dream homes to Washington, DC in 2023. With a keen eye for aesthetics and a genuine commitment to supporting people's financial goals, Ari has quickly become a trusted resource in the real estate industry. What Ari adores about real estate, is the opportunity to merge her love for creativity with her dedication to helping individuals and families discover the perfect place to call home. She finds immense fulfillment in guiding her clients through the intricate process of buying or selling a property, knowing that she's playing a part in shaping their future. Ari's connection to the Washington, DC area runs deep, as she is captivated by the city's vibrant energy and the endless array of activities it offers. Her local expertise is bolstered by a genuine affection for the community, and she takes pride in sharing her in-depth knowledge of the area with her clients. Among her many achievements, Ari is an Emmy Award-winning Producer with numerous other award nominations, and a track record of creating one of top 10 ads of all time. Her creative spirit extends itself through real estate and beyond. She finds joy in art, film, and traveling the world. These hobbies enrich her understanding of design and space. As a proud member of the Your P&rtners team at Compass, the #2 team at the #1 brokerage, Ari is thrilled to collaborate with her sister, Eva Davis, further solidifying her commitment to exceptional service and personal connections within the community. With a warm and professional demeanor, Ari Davis is dedicated to serving the real estate needs of Washington, DC, and looks forward to helping you find your perfect place in this remarkable city. View Ari's Video Bio
title: Realtor®

description: About Behtel Behtel has always had real estate in her life. Growing up in Ottawa, her family made investments in real estate. With this familial experience combined with a background in financial services and wealth management, Behtel Dawit understands how to guide clients through important, and often stressful, financial decisions. She prides herself on being patient and empathetic. As a real estate agent licensed in Virginia and DC, Behtel strives to be an advisor for her clients rather than a salesperson, giving them the time and information they need to feel comfortable. Behtel received a bachelor’s degree from Carleton University in Ottawa and a master’s from Hult International Business School. She currently lives in Alexandria with her husband and Bernedoodle, Luka. In her free time, she enjoys exploring on foot and visiting local businesses including a fondness for coffee shops, whether locally or in a new city.
title: Realtor® | Licensed in DC, MD & VA

description: About Maria Paula Licensed in Washington, D.C., Maryland, and Virginia, Paula Daza is a trusted residential real estate advisor known for helping clients secure the best terms, avoid costly mistakes, and make confident, well-timed decisions in competitive DMV markets. She is recognized for her deep local market knowledge, strong negotiation skills, and ability to anticipate what’s coming—ensuring her clients don’t miss opportunities, overpay, or undersell. Paula’s approach is highly strategic and proactive. She closely monitors pricing trends, market conditions, and opportunities while clearly explaining each step of the process so clients feel informed and prepared at all times. Clients consistently share that they feel exceptionally well guided throughout the entire transaction and frequently refer Paula to friends and family as a result. As a leader in her field, Paula works alongside a trusted and support team to deliver a seamless, full-service experience tailored to each client’s needs. This collaborative approach allows her to handle even complex transactions with clarity, efficiency, and care. What further distinguishes Paula is her ability to pair market expertise with a refined eye for design. She helps sellers strategically prepare homes to maximize value and guides buyers in seeing a property’s full potential—often turning uncertainty into confidence. Born in South America and raised in Houston, Paula brings a global perspective shaped by her studies in International Business and experience in New York City and Europe. Today, she is firmly rooted in the DMV community and deeply knowledgeable about its neighborhoods and housing market. When she’s not working with clients, Paula enjoys traveling, exploring design and architecture, and spending time with her husband, son, and their Dachshund, Jack.
title: REALTOR®

description: About DC House Smarts DC House Smarts Team: Marcie Sandalow and Catarina Bannier have been working together as a team since 2011, though together they have been in the business for over 34 combined years. In previous lives they were in the marketing and journalism fields, and bring these areas of expertise into play while promoting their listings. Over the years they have helped hundreds of clients both buy and sell properties in the local DC/MD/VA marketplace.

About DCMDVAHomes Group If you are looking to buy or sell real estate in DC, MD or VA it’s best to be well informed and work with a professional real estate agent who has the knowledge and experience you need. We have over 28 years of combined experience, and are full time, active agents working by referral in the DC metro area. Licensed in all 3 jurisdictions, we are hyper-local where we live, yet are knowledgeable across the region. Our team approach benefits our clients in competitive markets from intense negotiations to the smallest detail. We are mindful of real estate as an investment for your sale or purchase, be it a 1031 exchange, specific ROI, rental property or finding homes off-market. If you are just looking for that place to call home, we’ve sold everything from studios to multi-million dollar properties. It isn’t about just liking a house, it is about your quality of life, the lifestyle you want to live and finding joy on day to day basis in the place you call home.
title: DCMDVAHomes

description: About Kristy Highly energetic and creative, Kristy is a person always on the run . Born and raised in New Jersey, she studied Fine Arts Drexel University where she continues to demonstate success with her listings, buyers and more. For Kristy, real estate was a perfect choice. She has lived in 15 cities and knows first-hand the trials and stresses experienced during a transaction. She has boundless energy for clients, and her artistic eye will be put to great use in staging properties for the market and well as getting clients to receive top dollar for one of their largest investments. Kristy has a broad range of interests outside of real estate. She a skilled tennis player, pickleball player, skier, cycling enthusiast, yoga lover, and traveler. She is CPR certified, an SAT tutor, and volunteers for A Wider Circle, Rotary, Habitat for Humanity and S.O.M.E. (So Others May Eat). Kristy and her family live in the heart of downtown Bethesda and enjoy being in the thick of it all. Over the past eight years, Kristy has been awarded Best of Bethesda (consecutively), Real Producers, Top 5% in the DMV area, Washingtonian Awards and recently a GCAAR Recognition.
title: Broker Associate

description: About Steven Meet Steve Dean – Your Trusted Washington, DC Compass Agent With over 24 years of experience in the real estate industry, Steve Dean is your go-to expert for all things real estate in Washington, DC. Growing up in Northern Virginia and graduating from St. John's College , Steve has deep roots in the area, with a unique educational background spanning Annapolis, Maryland, and Santa Fe, New Mexico. Steve's passion lies in meticulously handling the intricate details of real estate transactions, ensuring a seamless experience for his clients. He prides himself on demystifying the process, making it accessible and understandable for everyone he works with. Before diving into real estate, Steve had a successful career managing ad operations for washingtonpost.com and serving as the usability manager for newsweek.com. This tech-savvy background gives him an edge in today's digital real estate market. Outside of real estate, Steve enjoys the art of baking fermented sourdough bread and practicing Reiki, bringing a balanced and holistic approach to his life and work. Steve holds several prestigious certifications, including being a Graduate of the REALTOR Institute and a Short-Sales and Foreclosure Resource . His expertise spans across various real estate transactions, from buying and selling homes in neighborhoods like Cleveland Park and Southwest Waterfront to navigating short sales, foreclosures, estate sales, and more. Steve is also a recipient of the At Home with Diversity® certification from the National Association of REALTORS®, reflecting his commitment to promoting fair housing and expanding homeownership opportunities. Together with Eddie , Steve operates at the intersection of professionalism and enthusiasm. They strive to make the buying and selling process manageable and stress-free, always prioritizing their clients' best interests. Whether it's single-family homes, condos, co-operatives, or more complex transactions like 1031 exchanges and trustee sales, Steve and Eddie provide comprehensive and dedicated service. Licensed solely in Washington, DC, Steve and Eddie have lived and worked in various neighborhoods, including Downtown, Dupont Circle, Eastern Market, Forest Hills, Georgetown, and West End. When you choose to work with them, you benefit from the expertise of two professionals who offer distinct perspectives while speaking with one unified voice on your behalf. Experience the difference of working with Steve Dean and Eddie Rangel — where professionalism meets passion, and your real estate goals become reality. Write Steve or schedule a time for a video or phone call .
title: Realtor®
REALTOR® | Licensed in DC, MD & VA

description: About Angela My philosophy is simple: clients come first. I don’t measure success through achievements or awards but through the complete satisfaction of my clients. Let my eye for detail and commitment to excellent service help guide you on the journey of selling or owning a home. Sweet Dreams are Made of Keys! Along with honesty and integrity, communication is key to a successful transaction. By leveraging my successful sales experience, you will benefit from my savvy negotiation skills, consistent communication, acute attention to detail, market-centric approach, and relationship-driven foundation. I pride myself on my ability to listen precisely and work efficiently to find my clients the home that will take their breath away. My experience as an Ironman athlete has prepared me to be relentless in getting my clients to the finish line, whether buying or selling. Developing professional and personal relationships is at the core of my business, providing my buyers and sellers with a trustworthy guide throughout the process that continues past the transaction. Consider me a resource for life. I am a great fit for sellers, first-time homebuyers, VA buyers, move-up or move-down buyers, and buyers interested in new construction. As a longtime resident of Northern Virginia (30+ years), my knowledge of the area is in-depth and valuable. I am more than just a REALTOR®. I am: A proud momma to my daughter, Sedona, aka my favorite human, who’s living her best life in the Colorado mountains with my grandkitties, Suki and Re. Fur mom to Shadow, an inherited Maltese cuddle bug, and Momma Mei, a tortie cat I rescued from the streets. She’s super lovey-dovey and can’t resist a good game of catch with her squid toy! 3X IRONMAN triathlon finisher who continues to train and compete. Not always 140.6 distance, though! Lover of wine and all its glory! Especially enjoy visiting local wineries. Julia Child wanna-be. Love to cook and try new recipes. Avid reader of the printed word-the old fashioned kind. In search of dirt on my Gravel bike. I find my Zen on the yoga mat. Live music is my jam. Travel junkie. I am humbled and honored to be named an ELITE PRODUCER in Washingtonian Magazine and a PLATINUM TOP PRODUCER by NVAR (Northern Virginia Association of Realtors). I am a licensed REALTOR® in Virginia, Maryland, and DC. I am a member of the National Association of Realtors (NAR) and the Northern Virginia Association of Realtors (NVAR).
title: REALTOR®

description: About Max As a real estate agent, Max works and lives for the love of home. He is your trusted advisor, your practiced negotiator, your skilled house-hunter, and your neighborhood expert. Whether you’re buying, selling, renting, or just looking, He will diligently work for you every step of your journey home.
title: Realtor®

description: About Joy Joy Deevy is a highly experienced and accomplished real estate agent, licensed since 1999, with over two decades of expertise in the industry. Recognized as one of the top-selling agents in the Washington DC/Northern Virginia area, Joy has built an exceptional reputation for her in-depth market knowledge, dedication to client success, and personalized service. Her career has been marked by a consistent track record of helping clients buy and sell properties with ease, whether they are first-time homebuyers, seasoned investors, or families looking to upgrade. Before transitioning to real estate, Joy managed corporate relocations with Marriott International, which, alongside her experiences living abroad from Europe to South America gives her a unique perspective and a deep sense of calling a place home. Her extensive network and intimate knowledge of the local market enable her to stay ahead of trends, giving her clients a competitive edge in buying or selling homes. She prides herself on her integrity, attention to detail, and hands-on approach, which has earned her a loyal client base and numerous referrals over the years. Joy’s dedication to her clients, strong negotiation skills, and local insight have established her as a trusted advisor and a top-performing agent in her community, delivering exceptional results for her clients year after year. Outside of work, Joy is active in her community and is involved with Operation Renewed Hope Foundation, a local non-profit working to end veteran homelessness. Joy calls Northern Virginia home where she lives with her husband and two sons.
title: Senior Vice President

description: About Joe Born and raised in southern West Virginia, Joe was brought up on the core values of hard work, trustworthiness, and compassion—principles that continue to guide him today. He holds dual degrees in Marketing and Communications with a minor in Economics from the University of Pittsburgh, which laid the foundation for his strategic, client-first approach to real estate. Joe launched his real estate career in Washington, DC, where he’s spent over a decade immersed in the city's diverse and dynamic neighborhoods. His deep-rooted knowledge of the DMV area—combined with an intuitive ability to understand his clients’ needs—enables him to find the perfect property to match each client’s lifestyle and goals. Joe has also personally successfully renovated two investment projects, giving him hands-on experience with renovation, budgeting, and the design decisions that add real value. This perspective allows him to guide both buyers and investors with confidence—whether they’re looking for a move-in-ready home or a property with potential. A consistent top performer, Joe has been named one of Washingtonian’s Top 100 Agents and voted Best Real Estate Agent in DC by Washington City Paper—testament to the trust he’s earned from clients and peers alike. Known for his same-day response policy, Joe is a firm believer that accessibility, flexibility, and dedication are essential in today’s fast-paced market. As both a Maryland homeowner and a DC landlord, he brings firsthand experience to the buying, selling, and investing process, and works to make every transaction seamless, stress-free, and hopefully even fun. Clients appreciate Joe’s thoughtful communication style, expert local insights, and his ability to make even the most complex transactions feel effortless. His background in marketing also means your property is always positioned to stand out—whether it’s a starter condo or a million-dollar listing. Joe currently resides in Mt. Rainier with his fiancé Cody and their dog Rosie. Outside of real estate, he is an avid tennis player, lover of international travel, and unapologetic fan of bad reality TV. His passion for food frequently turns showings into impromptu culinary tours of DC’s best hidden gems
title: Realtor®

description: About Jane Jane believes you can work hard and have fun while doing it. The team comprised of Jane and her two Transaction Coordinators, Debbie and Joyce, are treated like family, and her clients become friends. That's because we're doing more than just buying and selling houses, we're building lasting relationships formed by a genuine desire to help others and making sure that their biggest investments are working for them. Jane thrives on helping people achieve their real estate dreams, whether it's finding the right home to buy or getting the best price to sell. It's a dedication that has not only rewarded her as a Gold Team Member, but has gifted her with lasting client relationships, long after the deals are done.
title: Realtor®

description: About Jean-Rodolphe Introducing Jean-Rodolphe, the epitome of French sophistication and business acumen, now making waves in the vibrant Washington DC real estate scene. With a license to operate in Maryland, DC, and Virginia, Jean-Rodolphe offers an extensive range of services, from selling and buying to renting residential properties. Hailing from France, Jean-Rodolphe brings a wealth of experience as a former business owner, honing his expertise in marketing, finance, and market analysis. His track record speaks for itself, having conducted numerous successful transactions. When it comes to your most valuable asset, he's unwaveringly transparent, honest, and wholeheartedly dedicated. But Jean-Rodolphe is more than just a professional. He's a devoted family man with strong values, actively engaged in serving the community. In his downtime, you'll find him relishing in sports, games, and savoring a breathtaking sunset with a glass of wine or champagne. Here's to a bright future – Santé!
title: REALTOR®

description: About Rosina Rosina del Monaco has been practicing residential real estate since 2004. She is currently an Associate Broker – Vice President at Compass Real Estate. Prior to joining Compass, Rosina was with TTR Sotheby’s International Realty for 4 years. She joined TTR Sotheby's International Realty after working for seven years as a Principal Broker with District One Properties a boutique real estate brokerage in Alexandria VA. She started her real estate career with REMAX Allegiance representing real estate buyers and sellers in the Washington Metropolitan Area. She holds an active broker license in Maryland, Virginia and Washington D.C. Rosina has in-depth knowledge of the local Washington DC Metro Area real estate market. Her Real Estate production has gained her the Washingtonian Top Agents 2020, 2019 & 2018; Northern Virginia Magazine 2020, 2019 & 2018 NVAR Top Producer and Multi-Million Dollar Sales Club consistently since 2008. Prior to her real estate career, Rosina spent more than 8 years in the corporate world with a successful professional career in finance, working for Corporations such as J. P. Morgan Chase Bank, Standard Chartered Bank, CEMEX and Phillip Morris. Rosina graduated from Universidad Metropolitana in Caracas Venezuela with a Bachelor's degree in Business Administration. While working in the corporate world she always loved the real estate industry and when she decided to make the move it was a perfect combination of her acquired corporate business best practices, her outgoing and friendly personality and international background. Her great negotiation, and communication skills are an extremely important asset for her clients. She has a direct, analytical and friendly approach that understands her client’s needs. Rosina’s focus is meeting her client’s needs, always trying to find the perfect home or helping them sell their current home.
title: Realtor®

description: About Alex Alex has built a reputation among buyers and sellers as a trusted advisor and strong advocate. A skilled negotiator and problem solver, she will go above and beyond to make sure her buyers and sellers have the information they need to make smart real estate decisions. Born and raised in New York, Alex has called the DC area home for the past 15 years. After earning an MPA from American University, she worked for various government and non-profit organizations, including the American Red Cross, before she decided to shift her career to real estate. Alex has lived in many DC neighborhoods over the years including Dupont Circle, Shaw, Columbia Heights and Capitol Hill. Currently, she loves living in LeDroit Park, a peaceful oasis with a great neighborhood vibe in the middle of a bustling city. When she's not focused on real estate, Alex enjoys exploring the city’s many green spaces with her dog Chelsea and supports DC’s thriving local theater scene.
title: Realtor

description: About DeLorme Pimentel Team Friends since college, Alex and Laura entered real estate with a shared commitment to advocating for their clients and providing them with the information they need to make informed, responsible, and rewarding decisions about homeownership. They help sellers translate the emotional connection they have to a home into powerful marketing, guide them through the pricing process, help prepare properties for the best possible sale, and provide guidance in choosing the right buyer. And they are committed to helping buyers find the perfect home, serving as trusted advisors about neighborhoods, market conditions, and strategies for making an offer. Alex and Laura understand that buying or selling a house represents so much more than bricks and mortar. They are driven and inspired by the unique way that real estate shapes the way we live, work, and build community. Alex and Laura came to real estate from a background of social services and nonprofit management. After sharing a job at a community-based nonprofit helping homeowners facing foreclosure, they decided to translate their social service skills to real estate. They pride themselves on their expertise in community based housing resources. Laura is proud to live in NE DC. She bought her home in Woodridge 13 years ago. When she’s not focused on real estate, she’s raising two rapidly growing sons, cooking up a storm and seeking out local food experiences or meeting up with her writing accountability group. She loves being outside exploring new parks, kayaking or just taking her rescue beagle, Penny, for a walk around the neighborhood. Originally from New York, Alex has lived in many neighborhoods over her 20+ years in the DMV including Dupont Circle, Shaw, Ledroit Park, Columbia Heights, Capitol Hill, and Takoma Park, MD. Currently, she enjoys living in Hyattsville, a rapidly growing community just over the DC border in Prince George's County. When she’s not focused on real estate, Alex enjoys exploring the city's many green spaces with her dog Chelsea and supports DC’s thriving local theater scene.

About Leslie Growing up in a military family, Leslie moved extensively from place to place. As a result. she has come to know the importance of being in the right place for the right time in your life. Leslie has spent much of her adult life around the Washington DC metro area - from the Virginia suburbs to Dupont Circle, to Upper Northwest, DC where she has lived for 27 years. Prior to real estate, Leslie enjoyed a career helping people find their career paths - first, in New Orleans (her favorite city!) with Tulane Law School graduates and later as a recruiter and account manager for a DC creative staffing agency. Leslie has taken great pride in her career as a Realtor®. Her "happy place" is always helping her clients find their “place” - by listening to their needs, and providing uncompromising customer service. It’s her honest, straight-forward approach, attention to detail and down-to-earth manner that make Leslie a smart, professional, fun business partner. Leslie is also a certified Interior Redecorator, trained in New York by famed ‘Use What You Have' designer Lauri Ward. When you’re selling, buying or simply feel it's time to rejuvenate your home, Leslie can work with you to offer common design solutions - from re-arranging what you have for maximum appeal to optimum staging for stellar marketing results . When it comes to managing what is most important to you - your home - you are in good hands with Leslie.
title: Realtor®

description: About Will Will Denton is a Washington native and a proud DC resident. He believes DC, bursting with diversity, intelligence, creativity, and overall spirit, is one of the best global cities to call home. Will's real-estate profession began even before his first open house. His family has been extensively involved in the DC real-estate arena for over 40 years. His long-standing ties to the community only add to his powerful, experienced, and loyal network in DC. In his free time, you can find Will cheering on the Washington Wizards as a season ticket holder, traveling, playing competitive tennis, having dinner with his family, or performing marriages for his lifelong friends (he has recently become an ordained minister through a request of one of his friends). ​
title: Realtor®

description: About VJ For VJ Derbarghamian , every real estate journey is like a blank canvas. His job? To fill each one with possibilities that help his clients find their way home. A seasoned Realtor® with over a decade of industry experience, VJ has earned his reputation as a dynamic, insightful agent on the DMV scene. Fusing his vast financial background with an enduring eye for design, he arms his clients with a balanced knowledge base that ensures they will always be one step ahead. His penchant for balance extends to his work as Principal of a design-build company, a role which magnifies his ability to identify quality spaces for his buyers. Whether it's uncovering the ideal lot for a new project or reimagining an existing home to match your discerning needs, VJ is the strategic visionary you want on your side. Since he knows what buyers want, he also knows which renovations, improvements, and staging schemes will yield the greatest ROI when it's time to sell. VJ currently resides in Montgomery County with his wife Leana, a local attorney who specializes in healthcare, and their three daughters.
title: Realtor®

description: About Suzanne Thanks for visiting. How can I help? I sell real estate in DC and Maryland, primarily representing sellers of condos, co-ops, and historic houses. I have over 20 years of active and consistent experience in both jurisdictions. I work very closely with clients, which means that I personally take on only a few projects at a time. I am supported by my team at Arrow Group, which provides admin and other hands on assistance. Comprehensive listing service includes: -consultation on preparing your property for sale -market valuation based upon data and week to week trends -supervision of pre-listing prep quotes, and project management of seller approved work -marketing strategy -supervision of staging, professional photography, and marketing collateral -direct networking with agents representing buyers in your immediate market area -Distribution of listing information through targeted hyperlocal marketing, as well as broader social media channels -management of property access, open houses, and follow up communication with showing agents -detailed contract review, and negotiation strategy -support and guidance throughout the contract to close period International clients I often work with World Bank and foreign service clients. I can assist with international and domestic referrals, as I actively build my network with brokers abroad and throughout the United States. -Pied a Terre in Washington, DC -Investment real estate in Washington, DC -Equestrian, Ranch and Land anywhere in the US Real estate developers, builders, investors I have represented developers in DC for over 20 years, on acquisitions, new construction strategy, new construction sales, and affordable (IZ and ADU) sales.
title: Realtor

description: About Susan Susan is a Realtor® with Compass and the third-generation of woman real estate investors in her family. In addition to working with buyers and sellers, Susan has executed numerous renovations and full-gut condo conversions. Susan thrives in an environment that connects consumers with the home of their dreams. On the home buying side, Susan has a keen eye that offers prospective buyers key insights into what their future home might look like and how to buy a home in today’s competitive market. On the listing side, she applies a business-savvy approach and expertise in all areas of home building to help clients bring their homes to life. Susan grew up in the Washington, DC metro area where she has experienced living in many different neighborhoods in the DMV. A graduate of the University of Richmond, prior to starting her career in real estate, Susan had a successful 32-year career in the Federal government. When Susan is not working, she and her husband Mike enjoy riding their bikes, visiting museums, the Kennedy Center, and local wineries, traveling, and greeting neighbors while porch-sitting with their Boxer puppy, Rocky, and kitten, Chloe. Mollaan Babbington Group
title: Mollaan Babbington Group | Realtor®

description: About Kimberly Kimberly Diggs is a highly accomplished Associate Broker with an impressive track record spanning over 17 years. Prior to joining Compass as a Vice President, she co- founded a thriving residential real estate brokerage, successfully closing over 300 transactions across the Washington, DC metro region. Licensed as a full-service Realtor in the District of Columbia, Maryland, and Virginia, Kimberly's ability to cater to the full spectrum of her clients' real estate requirements is unparalleled. Kimberly's journey in real estate began over 20 years ago during the purchase of her first home. Since 2007, she has been a dynamic force in the industry, holding diverse roles in sales and leadership within the region's prominent brokerages. Beyond her prowess as a top agent, Kimberly's leadership is evident. She capably led a 17-agent team, achieving over $500 million in sales volume within a year. This accomplishment earned her the esteemed title of Platinum Producer by Washingtonian. Her comprehensive expertise across diverse real estate facets solidifies her standing as an industry leader. A New York native, Kimberly has called the Washington DC Metro area her home for over 25 years. She pursued her business studies at the University of Maryland, College Park. Outside of her professional pursuits, she can be found cruising the Potomac River with her family. Through her unwavering commitment to excellence and her adept navigation of the complexities of the Washington DC real estate market, Kimberly Diggs stands as a consummate professional. Her commitment to realizing her clients' real estate dreams, coupled with her unmatched expertise and integrity, truly sets her apart.
title: Vice President & Associate Broker

description: About Kathryn Kathryn has been honing her expertise in real estate since moving to Washington, DC a decade ago. Having an appreciation for art and architecture from a young age, it is no surprise that the DMV area quickly became her home and residential real estate her chosen profession. This area of the country is truly special and Kathryn is dedicated to helping her clients find their place here. As a full-time Realtor®, Kathryn is a strong negotiator and detail-oriented. What sets her apart from other top-tier agents though, is empathy. She takes the time to listen to her client’s needs and wants, and the circumstances influencing their sale or purchase to inform the best path forward in achieving their real estate goals. Throughout the process, she protects her client's interests as if they are her own without compromise. These qualities and level of client service account for Kathryn’s strong referral base and repeat clients. Kathryn lives in Bethesda, MD with her husband, toddler, and doodle dog. You will often find her spending time with family and friends, or out for a walk on the Capital Crescent Trail. Having earned her undergraduate degree from Tulane University and having family ties there, she also has a love for the city of New Orleans and spends time getting ready to ride in a Mardi Gras parade every year!
title: Realtor®

description: About District Partners From its history as the nation’s capital to its diverse network of communities, the Washington DC Metropolitan area is truly unique. That is why District Partners at Compass offers a dedicated team of real estate professionals with areas of specialized focus as well as well-rounded expertise. Our job is to cover the bases in a region that is rich in tradition yet constantly evolving. The areas we serve range from quiet suburbs to high-energy urban enclaves. Similarly, property types vary from condominiums to estates and from historic to brand-new. In keeping with the region’s many choices, our select team is balanced and highly qualified. We use the most modern tools and technology while never forgetting that personalized attention is key to a successful transaction. Ultimately, our goal is to make your experience the best it can be.

About District Property Group With unparalleled market knowledge and consistent access to emerging information, District Property Group leads clients to their best real estate results. We merge over 100 years of local real estate experience with the cutting-edge technology of the Compass platform. Individually, we have each established ourselves among the top-producing realtors in the area. Our work spans multiple neighborhoods and transaction types. Whether buying, selling or developing, we would be happy to discuss your real estate questions and needs at your convenience.

About District Spotlight Group The District Spotlight Group is a dynamic and investment-conscious real estate team, renowned for local knowledge and expertise in guiding clients through the Washington, D.C., Maryland, and Virginia real estate markets. Composed of a carefully selected group of dedicated professionals with a passion for real estate, we are committed to providing personalized and unparalleled service to our diverse clientele. Our Mission: At the District Spotlight Group, our mission is two-fold: to unlock the dreams of home ownership, and empower sellers and investors in expanding and maximizing the returns of their real estate investments. With an unwavering focus on both lifestyle and investment value, we tailor our services to cater to the unique needs and aspirations of each client. We understand that real estate is not just about finding a place to live but also a vehicle for financial growth. Whether you are looking for a property to call home or an investment opportunity with substantial ROI potential, our investment-conscious approach ensures that every decision aligns with your long-term financial goals. Experience and Expertise: Led by a team of seasoned industry veterans, our collective experience spans two decades, encompassing a wide spectrum of real estate transactions. From navigating the complexities of luxury property sales to assisting first-time buyers in finding their perfect starter homes, our comprehensive knowledge of the local market positions us as trailblazers in the industry. Market Insights and Innovation: Staying ahead in the ever-evolving real estate landscape is a cornerstone of our success. The District Spotlight Group is at the forefront of market trends and leverages cutting-edge technology and data analytics to deliver unparalleled market insights. This information empowers our clients to make informed decisions, enhancing their competitive edge. Client-Centered Service: Our team takes pride in establishing lasting relationships with our clients. We prioritize effective communication, active listening, and understanding your unique requirements to provide a tailored experience. No matter the budget or property type, we work tirelessly to deliver optimal results and exceed expectations. Let's embark on this exciting real estate journey together. Contact The District Spotlight Group today and experience the epitome of personalized, lifestyle focused & investment conscious real estate.

About Helen Helen is a seasoned real estate professional with over four decades of experience helping clients buy and sell homes in Washington DC and Maryland. Her deep knowledge of the local neighborhoods and dedication to guiding clients through every step of the transaction process have led to hundreds of successful sales and grateful clients who contribute to her repeat and referral business. With a passion for selling homes and a commitment to excellence, Helen leverages her marketing skills, market knowledge, and negotiating expertise to help clients make smart decisions and achieve their goals. She embraces new technology to optimize results for her clients and is dedicated to delivering excellence with compassion and integrity. Helen holds an impressive track record as a consistent top producer with experience in estate properties, conservatorships, downsizing, and first time home buyers. She holds advanced Realtor designations, including Certified Residential Specialists (CRS) and Graduate of the Realtor Institute (GRI), showcasing her expertise in the field. As a native and life-long resident of Washington DC, Helen's volunteer service to the community as a mayoral appointee on the DC Real Estate Commission demonstrates her dedication to protecting the public through the licensing and education of real estate agents. With a tailored approach to each client's unique situation and needs, Helen is dedicated to delivering results that meet their individual goals and improve their lives through real estate
title: Realtor®

description: About Lauren As a homeowner and investor herself, Lauren understands that buying or selling a home is one of the most significant events in her clients’ lives. Her goal is to ease the stress by setting expectations for a seamless transition. Lauren combines her economics background, industry experience, and goal-driven mindset to make sure her clients have a superior experience in their real estate transaction whether they are a first time home buyer, a seller, or a seasoned investor. Lauren finds deep satisfaction in helping her clients achieve their goals. Her motto is “Plant yourself where you can grow” and since 2013, Lauren has done just that, selling more than $90 million worth of real estate and helping hundreds of clients. Lauren closely guides her clients through every stage of the process, beginning with an in-depth analysis of their individual needs and wishes, and culminating with the purchase or sale of their home. Her in-depth market knowledge and forward-looking mindset continue to set her business apart and ensure a superior experience for her clients. Licensed in DC, Maryland, and Virginia, Lauren has built a stellar reputation as a hard-working, and adaptive and skilled agent. She finds that each neighborhood in the DMV area has its own unique charm, and loves exploring with her clients. She has cultivated a robust referral network over the course of her career, which accounts for much of her business today. ​ Lauren lives in 16th Street Heights, DC, with her husband, their three kids, and dog. A native of Easton, Pennsylvania, she moved to the DC area to work at the General Services Administration as a Contract Specialist after graduating from Bucknell University with a double major in Economics and Spanish. Lauren earned her Master’s Degree in Public Policy from The George Washington University while working full time at GSA. Upon graduation, she moved to the Department of Transportation to accept a position as an Industry Economist. In 2013, she decided to align her career with her passion of helping people through this important transition, and she has excelled in the industry ever since. Some of Lauren's awards and accomplishments include: Washingtonian Top Agent each year since 2016 Rising star from DC Metro Real Producers, 2019 Rookie of the year 2014
title: Vice President | Realtor® - DC, MD, & VA

description: About Claudia Claudia came to Washington, D.C. as a college student and has never looked back. After studying drama as a graduate student at Catholic University she adopted D.C. as her new hometown and has worked in residential real estate for more than 35 years. Claudia is a highly recognized name in the real estate market in DC and is known for her stellar reputation. Part of a very small circle of agents who can rightfully claim they have truly seen the market through all of its various ups and downs, her experience is vast. This experience translates into incredible negotiating skills, unparalleled advice and strategy, and a reputation that draws clients to want to work with her and have her on their side. Claudia takes pride in serving clients throughout the city and close-in Maryland suburbs and holds several sales records, constantly ranking in the area's top tier of producers. Claudia has been committed over the years to making Washington a better place to live. She has supported the Northwest Neighbors Village which helps upper Northwest residents remain independent in their own homes as they age, has been involved in a number of community organizations over the years, and is an active supporter of the DC art scene. A native of Long Island, she brought her love of sailing south with her. A favorite way to relax is with and friends sailing the waters of Annapolis and Onancock. Chevy Chase DC is her home where she has raised two children and lives with her husband, Peter, and their dog Cooper. A few things about Claudia: Grew up on Long Island but long time DC Resident Theater major at Catholic University Mother to two grown children also in DC
title: Senior Vice President

description: About Nicholas Nick grew up a quaint, little, “one-horse” town of only 1,800 people in Berlin, PA where your reputation means everything and a handshake is your word! Berlin is where Nick still calls home and where he spent the first 19 years of his life with his family, lifelong friends, and neighbors, who all taught him the important values he lives today. Starting his work career age 12, mowing lawns & shoveling snow in the neighborhood is where Nick learned the importance of community and helping your neighbor. The town of Berlin exudes a culture of helping one another and that is what inspired Nick to pursue his first career in education as a Middle School Counselor, then Dean of Students at Lake Braddock Secondary school in Burke, VA. Nick's entrepreneurial spirit finally took over in 2006 where he began his real estate career with Coldwell Banker in Arlington. Seven years later Nick joined Long & Foster's Commercial Division where he developed strong analytical skill sets in working on large scale office, retail, industrial and land development transactions. However, Nick's love for homes and helping people soon led him back to the residential side of real estate and ultimately to Compass in June of 2017 where he is flourishing! Nick currently resides in North Arlington but has lived and worked as a Realtor all over the Northern Va area for the past 14 years. Nick has developed a keen insight into the DMV real estate market, created an endless database of contacts, and has a multitude of experience helping buyers and sellers achieve their real estate goals. If you want to work with someone who comes from a culture of helping others, who will listen to your needs, look out for your best interests, treat you like family, and find solutions to problems, choose Nick to represent you in achieving your next real estate goal!
title: Realtor®

description: About Ayana Ayana was born and raised in Fort Washington, MD, a suburb just outside of DC. Her intimate knowledge of DC and its surrounding neighborhoods allows her to think outside the box to find the perfect property for her clients. Ayana’s passion for real estate began when she purchased her first property in DC at the age of 23 in Columbia Heights. She has since purchased and sold several properties for investment purposes and is able to offer a unique perspective to clients during one of the most pivotal decisions of their lives. Ayana is a cum laude graduate of Spelman College with a degree in Economics. Her analytical and problem solving skills are an important asset to her clients when deciding on an offer or asking price. She holds the designation of Certified Negotiation Expert (CNE) as negotiations are the most important aspect of a real estate transaction. She is also a Certified Probate Real Estate Specialist (CPRES), supporting and guiding clients through the probate process. Ayana has held positions in both commercial and residential real estate in her 20+ year career. Ayana’s mission is to create and build wealth through real estate for all clients across the spectrum. She works with developers to identify and analyze properties and enjoys being on construction sites and providing value-add solutions to her clients. To say that Ayana loves all things real estate is an understatement! In addition to the sale and marketing of real estate, Ayana loves to spend time with her husband and two daughters, cook, travel and explore. She is also an avid reader and volunteers her time in her community of Columbia Heights/Mount Pleasant to increase literacy. She also works daily to acquire and perfect the Spanish language.
title: Realtor

description: About Calvin Hi — I’m Calvin Dretske, a DC based real estate agent focused on making the buying and selling process clear, data-driven, and straightforward. With years of experience navigating the DC area housing market, I bring strong market insight, responsive communication, and steady guidance from search to closing. Before real estate, I studied political science at Macalester College, a background that shaped the analytical mindset and problem-solving style I bring to my work today. Clients describe me as steady, accessible, and detail-oriented — someone who listens closely, anticipates needs, and offers clear guidance from the first meeting through closing. If you’re exploring your options or preparing for your next move, I’d love to be a resource and help you navigate each step with clarity and confidence
title: Mollaan Babbington Group

description: About Nathan Nathan joined the Compass from the construction, engineering, and development side of real estate. He started his real estate career in land development as a civil engineer where he learned real estate from the ground up designing utilities, roads, and stormwater management for new communities. When he moved to DC, he joined the urban development world as a construction manager, where he negotiated project budgets while coordinating architects and contractors. He uses these experiences to not only help clients understand their properties but also help them through the negotiation and contract process.
title: REALTOR®

description: About Chad For Chad, the real estate industry has always felt like home. With a grandfather who was a Realtor and a father who worked in the lending business, Chad grew up visiting open houses on the weekends and learning the ins and outs of the search and sell process. Today, that experience and enduring passion shines through as Chad advises each client with ease and insight. For Chad, real estate is about much more than just the transaction, which is why he strives to go above and beyond every client to help them achieve their distinct goals. As a lifelong resident of the Washington, D.C. Area, Chad brings expansive market knowledge to every transaction, and loves helping his clients discover the city he has always called home. Thanks to his attention to detail, expertise in prepping and staging a listing, and savvy negotiating skills, Chad delivers unrivaled results for sellers and buyers alike. It’s no surprise, then, that Chad’s business is comprised largely of referrals and repeat clients—in fact, it’s not at all uncommon for him to work with clients spanning multiple generations of one family. Throughout his fourteen years as a Realtor, Chad’s favorite part of his job has always been the same—helping sellers to maximize their yield and connecting buyers with the right home.
