In his spare time, Chad enjoys playing basketball, golf and spending time with his wife, Erica and his three sons in Bethany Beach.
title: The Dudley Group of Compass

description: About Aidan Aidan grew up in Northern New Jersey and moved to Maryland to attend Towson University where she received her Sports degree. After spending almost ten years in the Sports Industry, she decided to take the skills that she learned in and customer service and apply them to a career in real estate. Working in real estate gives Aidan the opportunity to work with friends, make new ones, and make their dreams of owning a home come true.
title: Realtor®

description: About Meg I am a native of Chicago, Illinois, and have lived in DC for over 14 years. Having lived in three of four quadrants, I am intimately familiar with DC’s unique neighborhoods and what each has to offer. My background is in Early Childhood Special Education, and forming trusting and lasting relationships is in my second nature. My interest in DC real estate blossomed when we bought our first home in 2013 and I am grateful to be part of The Navigate Group, one of Compass’s top teams of 2022. I am deeply dedicated to understanding my client’s concerns, wants, and needs. I pride myself on being resourceful, knowledgeable, accessible, and will go above and beyond to help meet your real estate goals. I am a graduate of Indiana University and received my master’s degree from George Washington University. When I am not building my real estate career, I enjoy being active in and around my community.
title: Realtor® | Licensed in DC, MD, & VA

description: About Arthur Arte Dunning is a highly accomplished real estate agent with a genuine passion for helping clients discover their dream homes. With an impressive track record spanning over two decades, Arte consistently delivers exceptional results and surpasses client expectations. Whether working with first-time homebuyers or experienced investors, he is dedicated to ensuring a seamless and successful real estate journey. Arte's extensive experience encompasses various transaction types, including residential construction and condominium development. This diverse background has endowed him with a deep understanding of the complexities of the market. A lifelong DMV resident and licensed professional in DC, MD, and VA, Arte possesses unparalleled local insight, enabling him to provide invaluable guidance and assistance in identifying communities that align with his clients' unique lifestyles and goals. Throughout his career, Arte has cultivated long-lasting relationships with clients, many of whom have become lifelong friends. Guided by unwavering honesty and integrity, he prioritizes his clients' best interests and ensures transparency and trust at every step of the process. Outside of his professional endeavors, Arte is committed to giving back to the community as a dedicated tutor for elementary school kids in DC public schools. In his personal time, Arte finds solace in practicing taichi, yoga, meditation and mindfulness. Additionally, he and his wife take great pleasure in hosting dinner parties for friends and family. And as a dad to three amazing now-adult children, Arte has moved on to arranging playdates for his beloved dog Frankie. <br> <br> <br> <br>
title: Principal

description: About Katie Katie is a Washington, D.C. native and is licensed in DC, Maryland, and Virginia. She was born in Alexandria, graduated from Marymount University, and currently resides in the Kalorama neighborhood. When it comes to her approach to real estate she focuses her attention on her relationships with her clients. Katie's local expertise, passion for her work, attention to detail and communication help her to create an unforgettable experience and life long connection with the clients she serves. Katie is also passionate about serving her community, you can find her volunteering every week with Community of Hope, an organization that provides stable housing and healthcare to the most vulnerable families in the district. She is also involved with the Social Justice Committee serving the homeless through her parish The Cathedral of Saint Matthew the Apostle.
title: Partner | Realtor®

description: About Tamara Tamara Easley is a passion-driven real estate professional serving the DC Metro area. As a fourth-generation Washingtonian, she takes pride in sharing the rich beauty, history, and opportunities that the city and its surrounding communities offer. Guided by her belief that real estate begins with honesty and trust, and continues with education and execution, Tamara empowers her clients with the knowledge and confidence to make informed decisions every step of the way. As a trusted, full-service real estate advisor, Tamara provides concierge-level guidance and access to her preferred vendor network, ensuring a seamless and efficient buying and selling process. This tailored approach not only saves her clients time and money but also ensures they feel supported at every stage of their real estate journey. Her deep understanding of the ever-changing DC market, paired with her commitment to keeping clients educated, has earned her a reputation for integrity, expertise, and results. Whether working with first-time homebuyers, seasoned investors, or sellers at any price point, Tamara is known for her unwavering dedication, skilled negotiations, and exceptional service. She has also built strong relationships with some of the industry’s top agents and brokers, giving her clients access to exclusive listings and opportunities. Before real estate, Tamara owned a successful Speech and Language Pathology practice. She holds a Bachelor’s degree from Towson University and a Master’s degree from Michigan State University. Outside of real estate, she is passionate about spending time with her family traveling and creating core memories. Tamara further enjoys advocacy and service—volunteering locally and abroad to equip educators and professionals with resources and specialized skills to better support students with disabilities, while also working to break down stigmas and discriminatory practices that children often face.
title: Realtor®

description: About Kathleen Kathleen represents a new generation of educated, deeply devoted real-estate professionals. Since she began her residential real estate career in 2000, she’s been ranked among the top Realtors nationwide. The foundation of her thriving practice is her substantive knowledge about the D.C. and the complexities of real estate transactions, and her high level of service to every client, including sellers, buyers, and alike. Before joining Compass, Kathleen founded her own successful brokerage, Towne Residential. In moving her group to Compass, she saw the opportunity to focus more of her energy on the parts of the job she loves the most—providing personal attention and careful guidance to each client. Before she entered the residential real estate field, Kathleen was the Director of National for Core Location, a Bethesda-based real estate development company. She holds a B.A. in business administration and a B.S. in information systems management from the University of Maryland. In addition to her real estate work, Kathleen is a managing director in Cityscape Development, a D.C.-based residential real estate development company. Over the years, Kathleen has called many of the District’s neighborhoods home. She currently resides in a 1930s colonial in Crestwood with her husband, two daughters, and two mini-dachshunds. In her spare time Kathleen enjoys Pilates and yoga, travel, and skiing. www.kathleeneder.com
title: Vice President

description: About Tori With an impressive career spanning back to 2014, Tori has honed her expertise in various facets of the field, establishing herself as a trusted and knowledgeable resource. Whether it's securing favorable lease terms for clients or facilitating successful property transactions, Tori consistently delivers outstanding results through her adept negotiation strategies. She has a deep understanding of market trends and can perform comprehensive assessments to determine optimal sale pricing or rental rates for both long and short-term rentals. Her analytical approach ensures that clients maximize their returns while maintaining competitive rates within the market. Tori excels at promoting properties and attracting qualified tenants. Tori's creative and targeted marketing campaigns have consistently proven successful in generating high-quality leads and minimizing vacancies. She is well-versed in property maintenance and inspection protocols, ensuring that properties under her management are well-maintained and compliant with industry standards. Furthermore, Tori possesses a comprehensive understanding of legal and regulatory requirements, ensuring that her clients remain in full compliance throughout their real estate endeavors.
title: Realtor®

description: About Carol Carol is an advocate for her clients in each step of the home buying and home selling process. With top credentials in real estate and negotiation and a background in advocacy, in addition to real estate, Carol knows the market and how to serve your best interests. Carol specializes in working with buyers and sellers across the metro DC area, those relocating to the area and real estate investors. Carol’s skills and experience enable her to provide clients with superior service. A current long-time resident and activist in the Bethesda/Chevy Chase community and a long-time resident of Capitol Hill, her knowledge of the area is beyond compare.
title: REALTOR® | Momentum Group at Compass

description: About Yasseen With multiple years of real estate expertise, Yasseen is your go-to Realtor for the vibrant Virginia and D.C. markets. Fluent in English and Arabic, Yasseen offers a global perspective and a deep understanding of diverse client needs. Whether buying, selling, or investing, Yasseen is dedicated to helping you find your perfect property and achieve your real estate dreams. Contact Yasseen today, and let's start your journey home.
title: Realtor®

description: About Patrick Patrick Emad has been a DMV native his entire life, hailing from Potomac, MD. Patrick then went to receive a Dual Degree in Finance and Operations Management from the University of Maryland. Upon graduation, Patrick moved to DC and has resided in Georgetown for the majority of his post-college life. Patrick specializes in everything Georgetown area real estate. From off-market purchases to investment properties to student housing, Patrick is your local expert. He also owns, manages, and rents his three properties in West Georgetown. Outside of Real Estate, Patrick has served his community as a volunteer Firefighter and EMT since 2008. Patrick also enjoys all things fitness, snowboarding, mountain biking, and cooking.
title: Realtor®

description: About John John Eric is a Californian by birth, a Washingtonian by choice, and a Londoner by heart and soul. Raised in Los Angeles, he was introduced early to publishing and media through his father’s company. After heading east for college, he entered politics, working on a winning presidential campaign, the Presidential Inaugural Committee, and within an administration, where he gained first-hand experience in high-level negotiations and discretion. He later moved into national media, working across television, radio, and print for some of the largest companies in America. This grounding in marketing, brand positioning, and client strategy, combined with his extensive political and media relationships, made his transition into real estate seamless. For more than two decades, John has been a trusted advisor in Washington, DC’s most prestigious real estate circles, having held senior roles at Sotheby’s, Washington Fine Properties, and now at Compass as a founding agent, Executive Vice President, and Senior Advisor. His reputation is built on discretion, confidentiality, and white glove client care. Known for his adept negotiation skills and unwavering commitment to clients, he represents high-net-worth individuals, politicians, athletes, and media personalities with the same attention to detail and strategic guidance. Internationally, John serves as the Director of The Luxury Collective UK, the only London-based real estate firm created specifically to cater to American and international buyers with US-style fiduciary services, market intelligence, and a global reach. Working alongside his London team, he provides strategic leadership and vision, guiding clients at every price point with the same hallmark discretion and high-touch service. Beyond real estate, John is the publisher of John Eric Home & Lifestyle , an acclaimed magazine covering real estate, design, travel, and culture. He is also the creator and host of The Property Diplomat , a podcast exploring the intersection of real estate, politics, culture, and global influence. His marketing efforts and expertise have been recognized nationally and internationally, with features in The Washington Post, The New York Times, The Wall Street Journal, The Financial Times, and numerous other publications. John is frequently invited to speak at industry gatherings and conferences in the United States and worldwide. His in-depth knowledge and hands-on experience with family offices and wealth managers enable him to offer unique insights into global property markets, cross-border investment strategies, and the evolving needs of high-net-worth and ultra-high-net-worth clients. As a member of the Compass Sports and Entertainment Division, John is part of an elite nationwide network that provides his clients unparalleled access to off-market opportunities, high-profile collaborations, and targeted marketing strategies. When not advising clients, John devotes time to his family and community. He is an ardent supporter of pet adoption, an enthusiastic though modest tennis player, a passionate foodie, and an adventurous traveler who seeks inspiration in every corner of the globe. John Eric Home & Lifestyle Magazine In 2025, we proudly celebrate the thirteenth anniversary of John Eric Home and Lifestyle , my award-winning quarterly magazine. A global showcase of elegance and inspiration, John Eric Home and Lifestyle celebrates people, art, culture, design, and the art of living well worldwide. Each issue features compelling profiles, beautiful interiors, curated travel experiences, and thought-provoking commentary on life and style across continents. It is a window into the extraordinary, a celebration of how we live, create, and connect. Explore the latest edition and discover past issues at johnerichome.com .
title: Executive Vice President and Senior Advisor | Member - Sports & Entertainment Division

description: About Erich Cabe Team Led by one of the region’s top producing agents, The Erich Cabe Team combines an extensive knowledge of the local real estate market with a wealth of experience to consistently exceed client expectations. Savvy negotiating skills, meticulous attention to detail and dedication to our clients’ goals are top priorities. Establishing lifelong relationships that go beyond the settlement table is how we measure our success.

About Chad Chad started his passion for real estate in Washington, DC. He grew up a short drive from the district in Springfield, VA and went to school nearby at James Madison University (JMU). In 2005, the pull of the city was strong, Chad and his wife sold their condo in Shirlington, VA and bought their first mixed use property on H St. NE in Washington, DC. Chad has been pursuing his love of real estate ever since. The experience gained from renovation projects and his interest in the history of buildings, stoked his desire to do even more in real estate. Becoming a licensed real estate agent enabled Chad to leverage his skills and interests to help people in their journey to buy real estate. Before becoming a real estate professional, Chad enjoyed a career as a Forensic Scientist. Upon graduation from JMU Chad chose a career as a DNA analyst. First in a paternity laboratory in McLean, VA and then at the Armed Forces DNA Identification Laboratory in Rockville, MD. Having accomplished much in the forensic field from lectures to identifications of missing military personnel to putting the bad guys away, Chad decided to turn his forensic analytical skills and attention to detail to the real estate market.
title: Principal, Chadwick Residential

description: About Edwin In 2007, Edwin, made a life-changing decision to settle in the vibrant DMV Area, a place rich with history and cultural significance as the nation's capital. This dynamic environment has not only been a backdrop for their personal growth but also a fertile ground for their professional achievements in real estate. With a genuine passion for connecting with people and learning about their unique stories, Edwin thrives in the real estate industry. This passion fuels their dedication to helping clients find not just a house, but a home where memories are made. The DMV Area, with its unique blend of historical charm and modern vibrancy, provides the perfect setting for Edwin to apply their skills and passion. As a Rising Star in the real estate world, Edwin leverages their extensive local knowledge and market expertise to deliver exceptional results for every client. Their deep understanding of the local market trends and neighborhood nuances makes them a trusted advisor in the community. Beyond their professional endeavors, Edwin cherishes time spent with their beautiful wife and two energetic boys. Family life in the DMV Area offers endless opportunities for exploration and adventure. In their spare time, Edwin enjoys playing the piano, an activity that brings harmony and balance to their busy life. Driven by a commitment to excellence, Edwin is dedicated to serving the real estate needs of the community, embracing each opportunity to make a positive impact on the lives they touch. Whether buying or selling, Edwin is your go-to agent in the DMV Area, ready to guide you every step of the way.
title: REALTOR®

description: About Sia Sia Etminan has been a DMV resident since he was 6 years old, and he's lived in all three areas, DC, Maryland and Virginia. He has a skillset that enhances his value as a real estate agent -- background in construction (from his Dad) and engineering (from his education). This knowledge and experience give him the ability to see more than the surface of properties, and his clients benefit from his expertise. With over 8 years in residential real estate, Sia has worked with buyers and sellers, first-timers and savvy investors. He loves learning about other people, and his genuine interest in his clients shows. Currently living in Montgomery County, Sia focuses his personal time on a healthy lifestyle, a challenging stock market, and a rebuilding Capitals hockey team. But it's mostly about the business -- Sia Etminan enjoys real estate. He has a soft spot for clients with lots of questions, he's patient with them. "There's so much to know, and it's my business to know it and explain it to them, so they understand it." That is his secret to success. Sia is excited to be part of the Mollaan Babbington Group at Compass, where he is licensed in Maryland and DC, and soon in Virginia.
title: Realtor®

description: About David A native Washingtonian, David uses his intimate knowledge of DC to help his clients find their perfect home. He reflects his own extensive experience as a real estate consumer and investor back to his clients because he's been in their shoes and understands how to turn property acquisition into a solid stepping stone to wealth. During his previous career as a documentary filmmaker, National Geographic photographer, and International Election Observer for The Carter Center, David worked in over 50 countries and had over 40 mailing addresses on three continents and several U.S. states. He always comes back to DC, the place he knows and loves best, and he's been back this time for over 20 years. After buying and selling four DC homes with the Mandy and David Team, David realized that his love of property had transformed from a personal hobby into a genuine passion and he jumped at the opportunity to work with them. In his spare time, David enjoys traveling to his vacation homes in North Carolina and the Venezuelan Andes. With his global perspective and local expertise, David Evans is the perfect choice for an agent to help you find your place in the world.
title: Realtor® Licensed in DC & MD

description: About Chloe Chloe's love for real estate stems from riding in cars with boys - her father and grandfather. They shared a passion for architecture and design, which they passed down to her in the back seat. Chloe couples real estate with her expertise in construction, which is her dual career as a general contractor. Chloe's strengths include the ability to visualize the potential of any property. She specializes in a collaborative approach with clients to deliver wants and needs in a seamless process. Her intention when working with any client is to identify the values of the client, then incorporate those values into the real estate transaction. Chloe grew up between Potomac, MD and Los Angeles, CA. She attended Fordham University in New York City and moved back to the DC area after graduating in 2008. She bought her first home in 2010 in Washington DC and is an active participant in her community. For fun, Chloe' enjoys working out, travel, time with family, and any setting that involves great food and wine.
title: Realtor®

description: About Megan Megan works with Washington, DC area clients that have a real estate need and seek representation to prepare for the market, navigate the process, negotiate competitive situations and deliver on expectations. After years in management consulting at global consultancies where client service became the foundation of her career, Megan joined Compass. With brokerage offerings such as Compass Concierge and Private Exclusives, Megan pairs individualized client service with technology to make the home search and sell experience rewarding and seamless for each client. Originally a New England native, Megan lives and works in Northwest Washington, DC. When Megan is not working she is spending time outside, with her family, in the community, or finishing a DIY project at home.
title: Realtor DC / MD

description: About Jessica For Jessica Evans, real estate is more than a job — it’s a way of life. Pairing her analytical prowess with the drive to make a difference, Jessica designs seamless client experiences powered by personalization and process. Growing up, Jessica was always fascinated with the concept of home. Inspired by the happenings she routinely tuned in for on HGTV, she would dream of the houses lit up on her screen and the lives led within their walls. She hoped that one day, she would grow up to become a Realtor who others could trust with a decision as momentous as the one to buy or sell a home of their own. Luckily for her clients, Jessica got exactly what she wished for. Today, as founder of The Love Live DC Real Estate Team, Jessica brings over 15 years of industry experience to each transaction, along with a lifetime of passion for real estate that shapes lives. An Economics Major with a penchant for people, Jessica arms her clients with the knowledge needed to weigh the impact of any real estate decision on their financial reality, while always remembering that a little compassion can make a world of difference. Empathetic and intuitive, Jessica connects with clients across all price points and milestones — whether you’re a first-time buyer looking to build a brighter future or a seller investing in strategic improvements to maximize your bottom line. Guided by the belief that the client always comes first, Jessica and her team go above and beyond to deliver the best support, tools, and systems around to make every experience both stress-free and rewarding. After her studies at The University of Maryland first brought her to the region years ago, Jessica instantly fell in love with the DMV and everything it has to offer — from the atmosphere to the architecture. Fittingly, the local expertise she’s gained over the past 14 years knows no bounds, spanning the vibrant quadrants of NW and NE, along with the charming suburbs just beyond city limits. When she’s not working for her clients, you can find Jessica hiking with her Goldendoodles, Piper and Lucie, working on home renovation projects, and experimenting with new recipes in the kitchen.
title: Realtor®

description: About Maseeh Real estate is more than just transactions—it's about vision, strategy, and execution. As a seasoned real estate professional, builder, and investor, I bring a multifaceted approach to the industry, combining expertise in luxury home construction, property development, and strategic investing . My experience extends far beyond buying and selling homes—I actively build, renovate, and transform properties, ensuring that every project I take on meets the highest standards of craftsmanship and design. With a deep understanding of market trends, construction quality, and investment potential, I help my clients navigate the complexities of real estate with confidence. Whether identifying high-value opportunities, overseeing renovations, or developing custom homes from the ground up, my focus is always on maximizing value and delivering exceptional results. Every project is approached with precision, attention to detail, and a commitment to excellence. I firmly believe that trust, transparency, and clear communication are the foundation of strong client relationships. By offering honest insights and straightforward guidance, I empower my clients to make informed decisions that align with their goals—whether they’re purchasing their dream home, selling a valuable asset, or strategically investing in the market. Having spent nearly a decade in the DMV area, I have a deep appreciation for its dynamic real estate landscape and a keen eye for spotting opportunities. Beyond real estate, I enjoy exploring Great Falls Park, engaging with the luxury real estate and supercar communities. If you’re looking for a real estate expert who not only understands the market but also has the hands-on experience of building and investing, I’d love to connect. Let’s work together to turn your real estate goals into reality.
title: Realtor®

description: About Susan Susan, a native of Dublin, Ireland, has made Washington her home for over thirty years. Susan resides in Cleveland Park however she also has lived and still owns property in American University Park. Licensed in Washington, DC and Maryland since 2003, Susan attributes her success as a consistent top producer to truly advocating for her clients and striving to make the transaction as smooth as possible for her buyers and sellers. Previously, Susan has managed numerous high end stores including Neiman Marcus, Burberry, Hugo Boss and Jaeger. Her strong background in sales, management and marketing benefits her clients.
title: Realtor

description: About Melissa Melissa is a 4th generation Washingtonian with a very personal connection to DC real estate, dating to the moment her great-grandparents decided to turn their modest row home on Connecticut and Calvert into shops and restaurants, helping to create the thriving Woodley Park area we all know today. From there they went on to build several residential properties throughout NW DC. She has played an active role in her family business, giving her years of experience with DC’s unique market. Melissa believes the benefits of DC real estate are endless and loves helping her clients through the process with that goal in mind. She has a hands-on approach and takes pride in being there for her clients every step of the way.
title: Realtor®

description: About Kathleen Kathleen "Katie" Farrar, is a top-rated real estate professional serving Arlington, Virginia, Washington, DC, and the greater DMV area. With years of experience guiding buyers and sellers through competitive markets, she is recognized among the best real estate agents in the region for her market expertise, client advocacy, and proven results. As a proud Washingtonian for over a decade, Katie's passion for real estate extends beyond just finding her clients the perfect home, she also strives to make the experience as enjoyable as possible. Having lived in both Washington, DC and Arlington, VA, Katie brings firsthand knowledge of neighborhoods across the DMV. She specializes in helping clients find the right home—whether it’s a first condo purchase, a family home in Northern Virginia, or a luxury property near downtown DC. Her clients value her strong negotiation skills, tailored marketing strategies, and commitment to delivering a seamless real estate experience. Katie has been consistently praised by her clients for her responsiveness, attention to detail, and ability to turn complex transactions into smooth closings. When she’s not helping clients, she enjoys exploring DC’s restaurants, hiking in the Shenandoah Valley, skiing, and traveling. If you’re looking for one of the best Realtors in Arlington, VA and the DC metro area, connect with Katie to start your real estate journey. Katie is a member of the Capital Collective Group at Compass.
title: Realtor®

description: About Olivia As a Northern Virginia resident for the past thirteen years, Olivia initially called this area home while working in the software sales industry. It was during her years as a top Sales Executive, selling to Fortune 500 companies, that she mastered her negotiation skills. It was also during this time that she was able to watch Arlington, Falls Church, and their surrounding neighborhoods grow, expand, and continue to change. Her fascination with the evolving real estate footprint, combined with her sales background eventually catapulted her into the best, most gratifying career she has ever known. Today, Olivia manages a team of unbelievably talented agents. The team mission statement embodies hard work, putting client relationships first, having deep knowledge of neighborhoods and the contract, and being available for our clients. This determined attitude continues to breed success for Olivia’s team, and has allowed the team incredible growth year over year, with over $250 Million in lifetime sales. In 2024, The Olivia Properties Team proudly served 59 buyers and sellers. You will often hear Olivia saying “You can ask me absolutely anything - I am an open book” and she fully means that. She lives life genuinely, transparently, and unapologetically.
title: Vice President

description: About Mary Choose Mary: In the world of real estate, Alexandria agent Mary Farrell lives by the golden rule: to treat every transaction as if it were her own. For Mary, that means leaving no stone unturned during any purchase or sale, polishing every detail with an enduring focus on each client's needs and goals. Throughout her 24-year real estate career, Mary has established a reputation as the devoted advisor clients can trust with one of life's biggest milestones. She'll stop at nothing to earn that trust time and time again, which she does by creating stress-free experiences that culminate in unrivaled outcomes and lifelong relationships. Fittingly, then, Mary's clients know best what sets her apart in today's competitive market landscape. In the words of Jen B., a recent buyer, "Moving is a big moment. And for myself and my kids, it could have been a rocky, stressful, fraught transition. But it wasn’t — and it was Mary who made all the difference." Visit ChooseMary.com today to see how Mary's dedication can make a difference for you.
title: Realtor®

description: About John Born in Delray Beach, Florida, Mr. Fazio was raised on the beach and in the ocean. He spent countless days during his youth deep-sea fishing along Florida's Atlantic coast and in the Bahamas, as well as in the Caribbean Sea and the Gulf of Mexico. He attended Episcopal High School in Alexandria, Virginia, where he played varsity lacrosse and soccer. Mr. Fazio was awarded a scholarship to attend Southern Methodist University in Dallas, Texas, where he majored in public policy. He also joined the Delta Tau chapter of the International Fraternity of Phi Gamma Delta at SMU. In 2011, Mr. Fazio moved to Washington, DC, to take a job with Capitol Partners, Inc., a DC-based boutique lobbying firm. Spending much of his time working on naval, healthcare, and education appropriations, he was integral in the creation, organization, and development of the American Shipbuilding Suppliers Association. In the fall of 2012, Mr. Fazio began working as a Realtor. His business focuses primarily in the resale and buyer representation of single-family houses in Crestwood, 16th Street Heights, and Georgetown, among other Washington neighborhoods, as well as finding value-add opportunities for investment-driven clientele. His past clients include prominent attorneys, World Bank employees, embassy staff, and well-regarded real estate developers. In 2017, he and John Mahshie formed the Mahshie Fazio Partnership, which has been a top-producing team since it was founded. As Senior Vice President, he works with the Compass leadership and associates to increase their knowledge and understanding of residential and commercial architecture. He is also a contributing member of the Washington Mid Atlantic Chapter of the Institute of Classical Architecture & Art (ICAA), a non-profit organization dedicated to advancing the practice and appreciation of the classical tradition in architecture and the allied arts, where he formerly served as the chapter’s National Coordinator. In 2024, the partnership planned, developed, and implemented the ICAA’s “New Heights” program, conducted from April 17-19 for 25 select students from the Washington Latin Public Charter School. The program included lectures by well-known local architects, landscape architects, designers, and academics and comprised lectures, field trips, and studio exercises to help the students gain an understanding and appreciation of the classical architecture tradition. The Mahshie Fazio Partnership has also represented several developers including Dilan Homes. In March 2024, we completed working with Dilan and architect Christian Zapatka on three new luxury residences in Georgetown. Both Messrs. Mahshie and Fazio have served as docents for the Georgetown House Tour for several years. Personally, Mr. Fazio and his wife Aida have undertaken two significant renovations and restorations of detached houses in Washington, DC’s, 16th Street Heights and Brookland neighborhoods. The projects comprise nearly all facets of construction, from underpinning and basement waterproofing, to building envelope improvement, full MEP replacement, kitchen and bathroom design and renovation, comprehensive interior design, exterior site work and landscape design, solar installation, and a detached garage to Additional Dwelling Unit (ADU) conversion. Mr. Fazio and his wife were involved directly with the architect, contractors, and the Department of Buildings (formerly DCRA) in the design, permitting, and build-out for both properties. Due to the quality of its design and finish, their ADU was featured by Reuters and Dwell magazine, among other publications, in May 2019. The Fazios can be often be found enjoying Rock Creek Park with their daughters, Mila and Emma. They also travel annually to Mexico to visit Aida’s family, among other destinations.
title: Senior Vice President

description: About Luis For Luis Febles, real estate isn’t just about properties and pricing — it’s about people. Combining unrivaled customer support, streamlined communication, and cutting-edge analytics, Luis creates personalized client experiences rooted in relationships and results. Ever since Luis can remember, architecture has been a foundational part of his life. Growing up with an aunt who ran a reputable architectural firm in Central America had its perks; Luis spent his days touring projects and helping to put the finishing touches on properties. Despite his enduring connection to the industry, though, he never knew that one day, he would go on to pursue a real estate career of his own. After a successful 15-year stint leading tech start-up teams and managing large-scale projects as a Software Architect, Luis found his way back home to the industry he never really left behind in the first place. Now a dedicated Realtor, Luis offers extensive insight into the DMV market where he was born and raised. He’s passionate about helping others find their place in these vibrant communities, tailoring each search experience based on even the most specific of criteria and marketing listings to reflect the advantages of location. Known for his direct approach, dedication, and penchant for navigating complex transactions, Luis is the agent clients know they can always count on — whether they’re selling their first home, buying their third, or adding a new property to their portfolio. A Certified Pricing Strategy Advisor, Luis is an expert on building comparative market analyses that give his clients the competitive edge during negotiations. Even at the height of today’s fast-paced market, when working with Luis, clients never need to worry about paying over asking price for a home thanks to his ability to evaluate properties effectively and consistently deliver the winning offer. For buyers, Luis taps into his expansive network to connect them with the most exclusive listings and off-market deals. He’s also part of a carefully curated financial community spanning private lenders and local banks that have each been hand-selected to help clients increase their bottom line. Wherever you are in your journey to buy or sell, you can rest assured that Luis’ informative communication style and nuanced expertise will arm you with the knowledge you need to make the best decisions for your future. Ultimately, Luis recognizes that buying or selling is a momentous milestone, and it’s not one he takes lightly. That’s why he’s built a proven process designed to mitigate risks, maximize outcomes, and forge lifelong friendships along the way. For Luis, the client always comes first, and he will go above and beyond to make every experience as seamless as it is rewarding. In his spare time, you can find Luis hitting the gym, staying up to date on the latest interior design trends, and sampling the best restaurants in town. He couldn’t live without his faith or his family and friends, who keep him grounded no matter what. He currently resides in Silver Spring, MD.
title: Realtor®

description: About Kaitlin As a full time real estate agent licensed in DC, Virginia, and Maryland, Kaitlin is passionately focused on helping her clients achieve their real estate goals. In a dynamic and evolving market, where client preferences and concise planning are paramount, Kaitlin taps into and utilizes leading edge technology, exclusive home buyer and seller programs, and an extensive network of resources to put her clients in a winning position. With experience as a realtor, transaction manager, and an extensive background in project management and logistics, Kaitlin has a profound understanding of the importance of developing a mutual vision and goal while maintaining open communication with clients throughout a process to ensure expectations are exceeded. Throughout her real estate career, she has worked closely with buyers and sellers learning that all clients and transactions are unique. Kaitlin believes in curating a customized approach for each client and delivering consistent knowledge throughout the process is key to fostering success in an ever changing market like today. Kaitlin is eager to start her journey at Compass alongside Elizabeth Emery who is a premier agent at Compass with 5+ years of experience and recognized by Washingtonian Magazine as a “Top Producer” for 2018, 2019, and 2020. After graduating from James Madison University, Kaitlin moved from her southern New Jersey hometown to Virginia. Currently, Kaitlin calls Old Town, Alexandria home. She settled into the community after spending time residing in both Fairfax and Arlington Counties. The exposure to all of the unique communities within the greater Northern Virginia area has resonated greatly, and has helped her build her passion for helping to continue grow these communities she is now so closely connected with.
title: Realtor®

description: About Lena As a licensed real estate professional with Compass , I bring nearly a decade of experience helping buyers, sellers, and investors navigate the ever-evolving DC, Maryland, and Virginia real estate market . Born in DC, raised in Montgomery County, Maryland, and now living in Northern Virginia, I have a deep-rooted understanding of the entire DMV region . My intimate knowledge of neighborhoods, market trends, and investment opportunities gives my clients a strategic advantage—whether they’re finding their dream home, selling for top dollar, or expanding their real estate portfolio . Tailored Service & Expert Negotiation I believe real estate isn’t a one-size-fits-all experience. Every client has unique needs, and my approach is designed to be custom, stress-free, and results-driven . With sharp negotiation skills, strategic marketing, and a deep understanding of market analytics , I ensure my clients get the best possible outcome. Over the past two years, I’ve helped buyers secure homes 2.3% below list price on average, while my sellers have achieved 1.4% over list price —proving that having the right advocate in your corner makes all the difference. Market Expertise & Investment Insight With a background in property management and investment strategy , I offer clients more than just transactional support—I provide data-driven insights on market value, neighborhood trends, and long-term investment potential . Whether you’re a first-time homebuyer, seasoned investor, or looking to sell in today’s dynamic market , I’m here to guide you through the process with expertise, transparency, and a commitment to your success . Relocation & Referral Network My support goes beyond the DMV. If you’re moving across the country or even internationally , I can connect you with a trusted real estate professional in your new city—at no cost to you. Through Compass’s extensive network and global partnerships , I’ll ensure you’re paired with an agent who provides the same level of care and expertise I’m known for. I also stay involved throughout the process to make sure your transition is as smooth as possible. Wherever life takes you, I’m here to help. Beyond Real Estate When I’m not helping clients achieve their real estate goals, you’ll find me on the golf course, in a yoga class, or riding my Peloton . I also love exploring DC’s incredible food scene over a great glass of red wine—so if you ever need a restaurant recommendation , I’ve got you covered! If you’re thinking about buying, selling, or investing , let’s connect—I’d love to help make your next move a smooth and rewarding experience .
title: Realtor®

description: About Fariba Fariba’s approach to buying and selling residential real estate is as colorful as the people she represents. She believes her cultural knowledge for the diverse populations within Washington Metro area is an asset in servicing her clients and provides her with the sensitivity, flexibility, and assertiveness necessary in negotiating successful transactions and genuine care. She has lived on 3 continents, travelled to over 50 countries and is fluent in English and (Persian) Farsi. She is astute in her dealings with agents, attorneys, builders, home inspectors, contractors, and others in specialized fields and understands it takes successful coordination of all these disciplines to close a transaction. Fariba is licensed in VA, DC and MD since 2005. Fariba’s clients have described her as she “is kind and genuinely cares about her clients and conducts business with the utmost integrity and honestly. She is the unique combination of confident, calm, and reserved while being a POWERHOUSE in negotiations” and “My husband and I fondly call her the “master negotiator. She negotiated terms for us that we didn’t even know were an option.”
title: Realtor® | Licensed in DC, MD, and VA

description: About Peter Peter Ferguson has been a trusted real estate advisor since 2015, known for his straightforward communication, strategic thinking, and deep commitment to his client's success. With a background in business ownership and deal negotiation, Peter brings both experience and creative problem-solving to every transaction—whether helping a family move up, downsize, or relocate with confidence. Clients appreciate Peter’s honesty, responsiveness, and calm, solutions-focused approach. He makes himself available when it counts, keeps communication clear and timely, and removes as much stress from the process as possible. His goal is simple: make every client feel fully supported and well-prepared, every step of the way. A longtime resident of Montgomery County, Maryland , Peter has a strong focus on serving communities like North Potomac, Rockville, Bethesda, and the surrounding areas. His deep local knowledge, strong network of contacts, and personal investment in the community allow him to deliver a level of service that goes beyond just the transaction. He's proud to be a trusted resource to both new and returning clients who rely on his expertise, transparency, and follow-through. Peter lives in North Potomac with his wife Shirin and their four children—Ari, Noah, Leela, and Kiyaan. As a father and committed local, he understands the importance of finding a home that fits not just your current lifestyle, but your long-term vision. He brings that same care and attention to each of his clients, always focused on helping them move forward with clarity and peace of mind. “Doing a great job for my clients is what drives me,” Peter says. “Buying or selling a home is often the biggest financial decision people make, and I don’t take that trust lightly.”
title: Realtor®

description: About Leah After graduating from Syracuse University, Leah Fernandez began her career in digital advertising at Ogilvy & Mather in York . There, she excelled creating digital campaign strategies buying digital media for Dupont, Pfizer, Live Nation and Qualcomm. Leah developed a keen ability to understand her client’s needs, and make the daunting, and ever-evolving, digital media landscape, easy to understand and digestible. With this skillset Leah offers unparalleled customer service, and will be the trusted partner you need to navigate the fast-paced DC Real Estate Market. Upon relocating from New York to Washington DC, Leah and her husband began their joint real estate venture, renovating town homes from the ground up, developing them into multi-unit rental properties. As a result Leah has a keen eye for detail and understanding of potential improvement opportunities. Leah has a passion for design and craftmanship, and is an expert in evaluating homes and helping buyers avoid potential pitfalls, and guiding sellers to invest in their homes where they will see the most profit during resale. Whether you are a first time home buyer, investor, or looking to downsize, Leah’s dedication, enthusiasm and tenacity ensure that every client receives highly personal and profitable guidance.
title: Realtor® Licensed in DC, VA & MD

description: About Maria DC area resident since 2004, this Ohio native was trained in education at Kent State and Johns Hopkins University. Maria began her career as an educator, which served as a natural launching pad her career real estate—the communication, listening, and educational skills of a respected teacher is an asset to every one of her interactions, ensuring that her clients are well-informed participants in making critical decisions. Maria’s client advocacy and expertise earned her accolades as one of Washingtonian Magazine’s Top Real Estate Agents in 2016, 2017, 2018 and 2019. In one of the nation’s fastest-growing regions, Maria helps buyers respond to ever-changing conditions, connect with top service providers and achieve their real estate goals. A full-time REALTOR® since 2010, she and her husband, John, founded Moore Homes in 2019, with the express desire to create the preeminent boutique real estate company, providing extraordinary service to home sellers, buyers, and investors in the DC Metro area. Maria currently resides in Falls Church, Virginia with her husband John and their two kids, Alex and Madison and dogs, Rocky and Gracie. She enjoys exploring new and undiscovered local restaurants, as well as hiking and running along the area’s extensive network of trails.
title: REALTOR®

description: About Ray With an impressive track record spanning over a decade of unparalleled success in the dynamic DMV real estate market, Ray Ferrara is a true master of his craft, passionately committed to delivering exceptional results. Raised within the suburbs surrounding Washington, D.C., Ray's deep-rooted connection to the area fuels his passion for helping individuals and families find their perfect place to call home. Ray's achievements speak volumes, with a portfolio of over $40,000,000 in closed transactions within the past two years alone. This is a testament to his unwavering commitment to his clients and his innate ability to navigate the competitive DMV market with finesse. His expertise extends far beyond the confines of traditional real estate, as Ray forged invaluable relationships with the most influential agents, developers, and builders in the region. This extensive network allows him to stay one step ahead, providing his clients with exclusive access to upcoming listings and off-market homes, giving them a distinct advantage. Ray's clients consistently praise his dedication, transparent communication, and strategic approach to buying or selling homes. His ability to build lasting relationships and connect with individuals from all walks of life sets him apart from the rest. Whether you're a first-time buyer searching for that perfect home, a seasoned investor aiming to maximize your returns, or a seller seeking a top-tier representation, Ray Ferrara is the real estate partner who will ensure that your journey will be nothing short of extraordinary.
title: Realtor®

description: About Peggy Peggy Murdock Ferris is a recognized leader in DC real estate, with 40 years of experience. She is a co-founder of the Compass Chevy Chase office, where she is known for excellent timing and negotiation skills, pricing acumen, tasteful staging and a deep understanding of how the housing market moves. Peggy has a large network of devoted clients, often multiple generations in a family. She works almost entirely on referrals, a testament to her high quality of service and tireless efforts to meet the needs of buyers and sellers in the Washington area. When researching potential agents, prospective buyers and sellers typically hear that Peggy's personal touch transforms a transaction into a positive experience. They hear: "she's available 24 hours a day", "she listens and hears my needs and priorities", "I knew that Peggy acted in my best interests", "she treats me like a dear friend", "my kids love her". Those are also the reasons why other Compass agents look to her as a mentor and adviser on tough issues. Before her real estate career, Peggy taught art and photography in Montgomery County and DC public schools. She holds a masters degree and is a sixth-generation Washingtonian. She volunteers regularly at the Interfaith Works Women's Center in Rockville and she supports many local causes. Client Testimonials Scroll down for more ★★★★★ " Peggy was absolutely wonderful to work with. She knew how much we loved out home and wanted to find the right buyer. She helped us figure out the best time to list our house and used her amazing contacts to find the perfect buyer (and the perfect price). She expertly walked us through the whole process so that even in the midst of all the change, we did not feel any added stress. Would absolutely recommend Peggy to anyone. " ★★★★★ " Wonderful. " - Lori ★★★★★ " Peggy Ferris was first-rate! We interviewed several realtors as we painfully moved forward to sell the house in which we had spent our growing-up years, and which had served our parents well for some 65 years. Peggy was the perfect choice because of her proposed market strategy; her personal identification with the character of the house and its location; her warm friendship which expressed her generosity of spirit and her awareness and respect of our emotional ties to the house. Her recommendations for renovation and staging were modest, but creative, and beautifully reflected our family’s happy years there. The house and property clearly had an aura. Moreover, Peggy achieved a sale during the rising pandemic in the Spring of 2020, a feat to be sure. We got our asking price; the buyers got a house they loved and could afford; closing was achieved virtually and without a hitch. No better result could have been hoped for. " ★★★★★ " We could not have asked for a better experience start to finish, from selling our TH in Rockville to buying a replacement property in Alexandria. Peggy is thoroughly knowledgeable and gave us clear, straight and accurate information. Highly recommended. " - Elias ★★★★★ " Peggy was great to work with on the sale of our home and purchase of a new home. She provided great advice on preparing for the sale during the time that we first started planning to sell. She alerted us to small, low-cost changes to make that we wouldn’t have thought of without her expertise. She explained various approaches that we could take to listing our home and helped us to decide on the approach that best met our timeline and comfort with risk. She was patient and helpful as the parameters changed for the search of our new home. She was an excellent advocate as we navigated some more tricky issues with the sale that ensured that we didn’t lose our dream place. With both transactions being finalized at the outset of pandemic restrictions, she was very communicative and helped us to understand and navigate the many new procedures that were just being developed at that time. She was a pleasure to work with, and we highly recommend Peggy Ferris! " - Jedidah
title: Senior Vice President

description: About Ferris Levin Collaborative We are a collegial and award-winning team of real estate consultants and sales experts. Proudly working under the Compass banner in the Washington DC metropolitan area, we provide exceptional, personalized service rooted in honesty, reliability, creativity, and data-driven analysis. Each partner in the Collaborative provides full-service home marketing, staging, and sales representation, as well as buyer consultation and representation to a wide range of clients. As team partners, we also pool our knowledge and perspectives to benefit every client. Together, we offer deep experience and neighborhood knowledge. Our unique skill-set also helps us wear many hats, with backgrounds in communications, economics, management, law, architecture, art, photography, accounting, sustainability, and international relocation. This experience informs every aspect of our work. When you hire one of us, you get expert individual attention as well as the power of the entire team behind you.

About Mark Mark Finkelpearl knows DC inside and out; he’s lived here since the mid-1990s, raising three kids who all attended DCPS and renovating two homes. With a long career as a nonfiction television producer and executive, Mark worked for National Geographic TV and Discovery Communications, where he honed the creativity and customer service skills that make him a success in real estate. Like television, real estate is a collaborative endeavor, and Mark’s project management skills ensure his clients achieve their real estate dreams. Using his visual creativity, Mark helps his clients see the unlocked potential of every home. He works from a place of compassion and understanding, simplifying what can be a difficult and emotional process. Employing his talents as a producer, Mark keeps each real estate transaction on schedule and on budget. Originally from Pittsburgh, Mark bleeds black and gold. He plays guitar in a garage band that jams out at neighborhood block parties. He also writes about music for guitar magazines and supports Operation Understanding DC, a social justice training program that brings the civil rights movement to life for high school juniors. Mark's greatest achievement was raising three kids into successful adults - and be sure to ask him about his years following the Grateful Dead.
title: Realtor® | Licensed in DC

description: About Bridgit Bridgit represents luxury buyers and sellers whose busy lives and limited availability require a representative they can trust implicitly to place their needs above all else. Bridgit's genuine care for her clients sparks her desire to find the perfect home for them and she relentlessly works to do so. Bridgit gives the utmost attention and care to each and every client resulting in a distinctive level of service for both buyers and sellers. With a consistent focus on client's overall goals and needs, Bridgit makes what is often seen to be a burdensome task a pleasant experience, allowing her to earn tremendous loyalty, referrals, and repeat business. Known for her likable down-to-earth character, creative problem solving and tactful negotiating skills, Bridgit’s primary objective is not only to please her clients, but to make their experience as stress-free as possible. During negotiations she focuses on the key drivers for all parties to ensure that the deal doesn’t get sidetracked over minor points and that clients are thrilled with the final result. Bridgit continues to cultivate great working relationships with other real estate professionals in D.C. Metropolitan area. Through these relationships she often has access to choice properties before they are publicly marketed. Drawing on her 20 year background in luxury goods coupled with excellent go-to teams for design, contracting and staging Bridgit is able to easily guide her buyers and sellers through this process creating a win-win situation for all. What Bridgit's Clients Are Saying: Having used several real estate agents in the past, Bridgit stands head and shoulders above all of them. I think the thing that separates her from others is not only her knowledge of the market, but her keen eye and ability to turn a property into a masterpiece. She dramatically renovated our condo, all while keeping our budget in mind. I was expecting major hiccups during this venture, but was pleasantly surprised that everything went very smoothly thanks to her handling every aspect from working with contractors, to selecting materials to even handling deliveries when needed. I couldn't be more thankful! Bridgit is a dedicated and hard worker that I would recommend to anyone looking to sell or buy a home. - Matt in Glover Park Purchasing my home was among the largest financial commitments I will ever make. I would have been unable to navigate the DC market were it not for the efforts of Bridgit Fitzgerald. I would recommend her to anyone considering purchasing a home. - Alex H.
title: Realtor

description: About Maura To appreciate DMV Realtor Maura Fitzgerald’s proven track record of success, all you need to see are the transformative results she delivers for her clients time and time again. A dedicated professional with over 15 years in the industry (and 10 as an agent specifically), Maura arms her clients with the strategies, knowledge, and guidance they need — from the day they decide to list or sell to the moment the contract is signed. Thoughtful and detail-oriented, Maura is regarded as a savvy communicator whose strong interpersonal skills and reliability have resulted in her continued ranking as both a Washingtonian Top Agent and Bethesda Magazine Top Producer. Although for Maura, it’s not about the accolades or numbers — it’s about being there for her clients no matter what. And while she’s passionate about advising first-time buyers and sellers specifically, Maura’s vast expertise allows her to meet clients at every price point and phase of life. Born and raised in the DC area, Maura brings a deep understanding of and care for the neighborhoods she serves to everything she does. This commitment to her community shines through as she helps clients discover the intricacies of the vibrant DC/Maryland area she calls home. When she’s not creating winning outcomes for her clients, you can find Maura doing pilates, enjoying dinners and wine nights with friends, traveling to Charleston or New Orleans (where two of her kids currently attend college), and spending time by the water at her family home in Southern Maryland. Her life motto? Carpe Diem, which she embodies personally and professionally by living each day to the fullest and finding the humor in every setback!
title: Realtor®

description: About James As a real estate agent, James works and lives for the love of home. He is your trusted advisor, your practiced negotiator, your skilled house-hunter, and your neighborhood expert. Whether you’re buying, selling, renting, or just looking, he will diligently work for you every step of your journey home. Working with him, you’ll also gain the backing of Compass. That’s a family of real estate professionals across the Mid-Atlantic and Northeast, from North Carolina to New Jersey. A family of brokerages around the world via corporate affiliations and partnerships. And a family of companies, from mortgage, title, and insurance to relocation, property management, and vacation rentals, all working together to help you find that place to call home.
title: Realtor®

description: About Susan Susan is a recognized leader in Potomac, Maryland, raising the standard of service for sellers and buyers in the greater Washington, DC area year after year. Her real estate career began in 1986, and through working smart, being determined, and placing her clients' needs as the top priority. Susan has always valued education. She received her Bachelor's degree from the University of Maryland and her MBA from Johns Hopkins University. Because of the growing demands of the real estate profession, Susan continues to seek out the most timely and relevant real estate education, most recently earning her CDPE designation (Certified Distressed Property Expert) from the Distressed Property Institute. Because of the unique scenarios that people encounter during the relocation process, Susan felt it important to get trained as a Relocation Specialist. She carries an active license in three states and the capital – Maryland, Virginia, Washington DC, and North Carolina – allowing her to be of service to her clients at a level many agents don't aspire to. Because of her repeat business and her expanding clientele, Susan recognized the need to form a professional team educated and trained to consistently provide her loyal clients outstanding service. She chose her key team member because of her sharp ear to listen to clients' needs as well as her desire to serve others. You can count on Susan to deliver above and beyond, consistently. Put your home buying and selling decisions in her very capable hands.
title: Team Leader | Realtor® Licensed in DC, MD, VA, NC & CO

description: About Lynette Licensed in DC, MD and VA Lynette Flavien came to the District of Columbia to attend GWU and quickly fell in love with Washington and the surrounding area. She made her status as a Washingtonian official with the purchase of a NE DC home in 2010. Her passion for helping others and community engagement was strengthened by degrees in both Psychology and Human Services and over a decade of working for DC Non-profits. These skills continue to prove invaluable while assisting her clients. Lynette believes every client deserves the highest level of customer service and she works hard to provide it. She prides herself in being up to date and knowledgeable about all of the amazing programs the area has to offer like, Home Purchase Assistance Program (HPAP), DC Open Doors, and Maryland Smart Buy to name a few. Lynette’s favorite place to be when she is not in the DMV is the beautiful island of St. Lucia. She visits often as much of her family still lives there. Some of her favorite things to do when on the island include, relaxing on the beach, hiking through the rainforest and of course enjoying the local cuisine.
title: Realtor®

description: About Marc Widely recognized as one of the premiere real estate professionals in the Washington, DC metropolitan area, Marc is a seasoned industry leader with over 40 years of experience. Peers and clientele alike cite his unparalleled market insights, extensive industry connections and vast client network. With over $4 billion in career sales, Marc’s sales volume earned him the title of the #1 Top Producer in residential sales for much of the past 20 years in the DC Metro (Montgomery County and Washington, DC). Over the course of his career, the Wall Street Journal recognized Marc as one of the top 10 Realtors in the nation. Leveraging his extraordinary achievements, Marc has now transitioned day-to-day leadership to his son, Travis Fleisher, who has worked hand-in-glove with his father for over 15 years. Their powerful partnership is built on shared trust, deep history and an appreciation of their unique but complementary skill sets which seamlessly bridge the generation divide Marc is actively engaged with our team and clients on all levels. He plays an active advisory role, with Lee now leading the team. This transition allows Marc to continue his passion for real estate, while leveraging his long and illustrious career.
title: Executive Vice President

description: About Travis A local Washingtonian, Travis grew up in Potomac, MD the son of an award-winning real estate agent and a real estate marketing director. Quickly taking to the industry, he joined the family business while obtaining his B.A. in Economics from the University of Maryland and transitioned to a full-time role immediately after graduating. Over his 15 year career, Travis has closed over $100M and been directly involved in north of $500M of transactions, having represented a diverse pool of clients ranging from first-time home buyers to high net worth individuals - including those in the sports, entertainment and political spheres. Through working with many of the area’s top builders, he developed a passion for investing which led him to complete his Masters in Real Estate Development and Finance at Georgetown University and subsequently found a development firm, R Street Development, specializing in multi-family projects in historic DC neighborhoods. At the core of Travis's philosophy is the conviction that his role is not one of traditional "sales" but rather to foster a collaborative environment with each client to provide them with singular and unparalleled advice on how to achieve their unique real estate goals. He understands the weight of the legacy his name carries and strives to honor it through conducting himself with the utmost integrity, honesty and fairness in every interaction. He currently resides in Arlington and in his free time loves playing in competitive basketball leagues, golfing at many of the country's top courses and exploring the city with his wife Sam and pup Luka.
title: Realtor® | Member - Sports & Entertainment Division

description: About Carmen Carmen has ranked among the top real estate agents in the DC Metro area for the last 10 years in a row. She is recognized for her passion in real estate, attention to detail, and for her sharp negotiation skills. Carmen began her real estate career in 2005 after a 20-year career as a land development civil engineer. She achieved early success even during the harshest market conditions in decades. She developed a specialty in selling high-priced homes during those tough conditions. That experience—coupled with her prior career—makes her one of the most knowledgeable and versatile agents in the region. Carmen’s repeat clients and network of referrals consistently cite her hard work and approachable style as some of their favorite attributes. But mostly they appreciate that Carmen pledges to make the home selling and buying experience a gratifying and enjoyable one. Whether Carmen’s clients are purchasing their first home, downsizing or upgrading, moving in or out of the state, Carmen is passionate about helping them improve their style of living. She serves many functions for them besides being their Realtor. Her clients have become her friends and fans for life. The DC metro area has been Carmen’s home for over 30 years. She currently lives in Bethesda and enjoys traveling with her family to the beach and to different parts of the world. Team Agents
title: Executive Vice President | Licensed in DC, MD & VA

description: About Kalonji With a bachelor’s degree in Communications from Temple University and later pursuing a master’s degree in Multicultural Education from Eastern University, Kalonji is a multi-faceted Realtor®. He is passionate about continued self- improvement. Having taken online classes at the Wharton School of the University of Pennsylvania in Corporate Finance, Kalonji continues to take advantage of opportunities to educate himself to remain ahead of his competition. This type of know-how helps him to better serve his clients when he is evaluating the time value of money and how it affects his clients' bottom line. As a seasoned and educated real estate professional with over 20 years of acquisition, renovation and field experience, Kalonji approaches every transaction with a client- centered focus in the hopes of exceeding expectations. He is adept at educating all of his clients on the most beneficial steps to take when purchasing or selling. Kalonji can communicate and negotiate effectively with all types of professionals, especially those situated on the opposite side of his clients’ transactions. Over the course of Kalonji’s real estate career, he has positioned himself as one of DMV’s most trusted and respected agents. From initial acquaintance, through close of transaction, Kalonji acts with fervent commitment to his clients and their best interests. An educator at heart, a transaction extends beyond the contract, but represents an opportunity to educate on the pillars of real estate, finance and investment. Clients leave with much more than a settlement, but keys to assist in their continued pursuit of generational wealth. Kalonji’s depth and breadth of experience, coupled with his know-how, make him useful to any type of client. He is currently licensed in Washington DC, Maryland, Virginia as well as Pennsylvania. With this reach, Kalonji represents clients from all over the metro area.
title: Senior Vice President

description: About Sean Sean Forschler has been living in the Washington, DC, metropolitan area for more than 40 years, and he’s been a Realtor® since 2001, making him a seasoned professional and a local, with in-depth knowledge about the complexities of a vibrant, diverse real estate market. Add to this his enthusiastic and engaging personality, and you have a recipe for the perfect agent to attend to your real estate needs in the DC area. Buyers and sellers choose Sean for his knowledge of the market and the business, and they come back to him because of personal attention and targeted support. He has a network of business connections that give his clients resources they can trust. Buying and selling real estate is never a simple transaction. But a few simple principles -- thorough research, clear communication, and commitment to customer happiness -- guide Sean's approach to every client and have led to over two decades of success. That's what you can expect to get when you choose to work with Sean. FOR BUYERS SEAN WILL Guide and navigate you through the entire home buying process. Provide expert negotiation due to an extensive network within the local Realtor community as well as my years of experience. As your advocate, provide a list of licensed professionals, translate and interpret the vast amount of paperwork involved, and save you time with proven systems. FOR SELLERS SEAN WILL Examine and analyze market conditions to collectively create a pricing strategy that works for you. Assist in preparing your property to appeal to the widest range of buyers. Use traditional marketing as well as an innovative approach through video, social media, and data mining to get the most amount of money for you in the least amount of time. In his free time, Sean can be found pursuing his passion for the performing arts, volunteering as a tour guide with the John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts, and delivering prepared meals and groceries for Food & Friends, a nonprofit group that provides healthy meals to homebound people with chronic and terminal illnesses in the greater Washington metro area.
title: REALTOR®

description: About Peter With 20 years of experience in Washington real estate, I’ve had the privilege of guiding clients through every stage of buying and selling in DC, Maryland, and Virginia. Along the way I’ve built a strong foundation from past roles in property management and new home sales, which gave me valuable insight into how homes are built, marketed, and maintained. That background now helps me better advise clients, whether they’re first-time buyers, seasoned homeowners, or investors looking for their next opportunity. At Compass, I focus on making the process both strategic and seamless. For buyers, that means finding not just a house, but the right home for their lifestyle. For sellers, it’s about creating tailored marketing that highlights a property’s strengths and drives results—while making sure every step feels manageable. My clients describe me as approachable, down-to-earth, and committed to details, and I take pride in earning their trust through clear communication and strong negotiation. Having lived in several states and three countries and traveled to more than 25 countries, I connect easily with people from all backgrounds, and I love being part of the diverse community that makes Greater Washington so dynamic.
title: Realtor®

description: About Kate <br> For Kate, real estate is not just a job but her life-long passion. Working as an agent represents the culmination of a dream that started in 7th grade at Career Day. There is nothing she enjoys more than matching buyers and sellers to the perfect home. Kate prides herself on her ability to listen to her clients' wants and needs and translate them into reality. Her years in real estate management and development gave her an eye for detail and the ability to find creative solutions to any issue. Known for her effervescent personality, she is committed to making each interaction with her clients a positive one. Kate is also a firm and assured negotiator who gets results. Whether upsizing to a single family home in Chevy Chase or downsizing to a condo in Arlington, Kate has the skills and resources to successfully bring your transaction to closing. Kate graduated from the University of Notre Dame where she met her husband, Rob. After starting their careers in Chicago, they relocated to D.C. in 2006. They now live in American University Park with their four children and dog. Kate loves seeing the world and tries to travel somewhere new each year. She counts eating as her favorite hobby and enjoys trying new restaurants and cooking for friends. Kate loves to read and wishes she had more free time to do so. -Best of Washingtonian - 2017, 2018, 2019 and 2021-2026 -Greater DC Diaper Bank - Ambassador -Janney Elementary PTA - Winter Market Co-Chair -St. Columba's Mother's Group - Programming Co-Chair -St. Andrew's Episcopal School - Parent Rep
title: Realtor®

description: About L. Kent Kent has enjoyed a dynamic career in Sales, & Business Development for over 25 years. After graduating from the University of Evansville with a Bachelor's degree in business, Kent worked in the telecommunications and technology industry for over 15 years, including MCI, GTE (now Verizon), Southwestern Bell (now AT&T Wireless) and CMGI. He began investing in Real Estate in the metropolitan DC area in 1994; as an outgrowth of his success as an investor, Kent followed his passion and obtained his Real Estate license in 2005. Kent specializes in working with sellers, developers, & international buyers. Kent works in both the DC market & NYC market for Compass where his wife & children are. Kent is & has been a parent & volunteer for Bank Street School for Children where his children attend. Kent has been interviewed as a subject matter expert for several mediums including CNBC and The Wall Street Journal over the past several years. Kent is licensed in DC/MD/VA/NY.
title: Realtor

description: About Jonathan Jonathan has called the Washington DC Metropolitan area home for the past 30 years, where he grew up in a real estate family in Montgomery County Maryland. After graduating from the University of Maryland, College Park Jonathan partnered with a 40 year top-producing realtor and spent over eight years learning everything about the industry while managing hundreds of luxury transactions. In 2015 Jonathan decided to branch out on his own, and where in less than 18 months he emerged as one of the area’s top performing agents and subsequently launched The Fox Group in 2016. Throughout his career Jonathan has been interviewed by numerous media outlets including WTOP Radio, and regularly writes for multiple national publications, including a regular column in The Washington Post real estate section. As a real estate professional Jonathan holds one objective – to save your time and protect your interests while tirelessly working to achieve your real estate goals with a level of service far beyond the industry standard.
title: Realtor®

description: About Leslie With 20 years of award-winning real estate experience, Realtor Leslie Friedson has earned herself a stellar reputation in the industry. Delivering world-class service coupled with savvy negotiation skills, her success is demonstrated in the fact that nearly 100 percent of her clients are repeat customers or referrals. As the leader of The Group of Compass, Leslie is proud to serve everyone from first-time buyers to empty-nesters, from Washington DC downtowners to Maryland and Virginia suburbanites. "I love what I do," she says. "I'm really proud that many of my clients are from the same families, and that I’ve been able to buy and sell multiple houses for them over the years. In real estate. Loyal, satisfied clients are the best reward." A former Montgomery County school teacher, Leslie excels at patiently walking buyers and sellers through each step of the real estate process. Even after two decades in the business, her enthusiasm for helping people find their special place in the world shows no signs of stopping. When she's not hard at work helping clients, Leslie enjoys traveling, cooking, and spending time with her husband, children and grandchildren.
title: Realtor®
