description: About Kevin Kevin Friend attended Georgetown University where he was a walk-on for the Division 1 Men's Basketball team. He received his MBA from the Smith School at University of Maryland. Realizing real estate was his true calling, Kevin left the management consulting world to combine his data-based decision making with his passion for helping people achieve their goals. With prior experience in managing complex transactions, negotiations and change, Kevin is able to identify with clients on a personal level, and ensure that their goals are his top-priority. Kevin is interested in developing long-term client relationships, not simply transaction-based interactions. Known for his integrity, creativity, and diligence, Kevin is trusted to deliver unmatched client service. Clients marvel at his ability to negotiate flawlessly on their behalf. Kevin is a perennial Washingtonian Top Producer and Top 100 Agent. His community efforts revolve around youth sports and child-focused charities. He currently resides in Chevy Chase, Maryland. “I've lived in the DC Metro area for the past 20 years and I understand how the local landscape has changed. I focus on uncovering value for my clients, whether they live locally or abroad. I would be honored to represent your interests.”
title: Senior Vice President

description: About Penelope Penelope specializes in fine homes and condominiums throughout the greater DC Metro area. Her goal is to provide her clients with savvy business advice and represent their interests with the highest level of professionalism, integrity, intelligence and sensitivity. She has a strong commitment to hands-on customer service, boundless energy, extensive DC Metro market knowledge and excellent negotiating skills. Penelope is passionate about providing the best service possible to her clients and establishing relationships for life. She maintains a roster of trusted contacts (contractors, painters, landscapers, handyman, professional stagers, title attorneys, lenders) and colleagues that ensure a smooth, targeted and well-planned purchase or sale. Nothing is left to chance. She is prepared to handle your needs and meet the expectations that are reserved for only the very best of real estate agents. Her personal service, professionalism, knowledge, enthusiasm and integrity ensure a successful and smooth real estate transaction.
title: Realtor®

description: About Adam Adam Fry loves D.C. Not only has he called D.C. home longer than anywhere else, but he’s also a local business owner. With ten years in the hospitality industry, Adam has owned bars and hospitality technology platforms all with the mantra of supporting local businesses and bettering the community. For Adam, real estate is a way to help other people make D.C. home. He brings his hospitality background and a love of community to his real estate work. With his innate understanding of human nature, Adam builds authentic relationships with his clients, listening to their needs and creating a customized approach to achieve their real estate goals. In his rare time off, Adam is a baker, pizza-enthusiast, traveler, and fitness nut. He loves to surround himself with smart, interesting people with different points of view especially when his two dogs can join.
title: Realtor® Licensed in DC & MD

description: About Michael Since beginning his career in real estate in 2008, Michael Gailey has quietly become one of the most highly regarded Realtors in the DC metro area. He credits simple things like genuinely caring about his clients, understanding the market, communicating effectively, and paying attention to the details. Michael loves details. He also really loves helping people achieve their real estate dreams, and he is now the #1 individual Compass agent in DC, Maryland, and Virginia. "Buying or selling a home is an extremely important life event - both personally and financially," Michael says. "It is a huge thing to be entrusted with, and I treat it with the appropriate amount of care and respect. The two most important things to me are for my clients to be very happy with the end result and very happy with all of my efforts to get us there. That drives everything else. Nobody cares more about doing a great job than I do.” Michael was born and raised in Indianapolis and attended Miami of Ohio for college where he studied marketing, management, and classical literature. This makes him a Midwesterner at heart, but DC is very much his home now. He spent his first seven years working in real estate here as an agent with one of the top producing offices in the entire country, and he moved to Compass in 2016 for its innovative technology and unparalleled agent support. In his free time Michael enjoys playing with his daughters, exploring the city, seeing live music, and traveling to see old friends. After several years in Montgomery County and in Mount Pleasant, he and his family now live in Glover Park.
title: Realtor ® | Senior Vice President

description: About Avi galantigroup.com Avi Galanti has helped hundreds of clients buy and sell properties across Bethesda, Chevy Chase, Potomac, and NW DC over the past 15 years. As the #1 agent in Sales Volume in the Bethesda office, he has personally exceeded over $600MM in sales, while his team, Galanti Group, has sold over $1 Billion collectively. His goal is to get his clients to the closing table in the most efficient and professional manner, ensuring as little stress on all parties as possible, and striving for the highest return and best results. Avi constantly analyzes the real estate market and has unparalleled knowledge of the data that drives home values. He gives expert advice on how to prepare and position a home effectively, utilizes cutting-edge technology and an in-house team, and draws upon his deep network of professionals and colleagues. He strives to deliver the highest level of professionalism, dedication, expert advice, and service to his clients. Born and raised in Israel, Avi Galanti came to the United States in 1997 after 4.5 years of active duty in the Israel Defense Forces. An entrepreneur at heart, Avi started a consulting firm in 2001 located in San Francisco, CA. He got involved in real estate in 2004, moved his real estate expertise to Bethesda, MD in 2005, and launched his own firm, Galanti Group, in 2015. Avi is married to Karen, a talented freelance graphic designer, and father to 3 amazing kids: Ella, Maya, and Leo. Everyone in the Galanti household is a Tae Kwon Do Black Belt... except for Avi, who is too busy selling houses. Avi currently serves as a board member of the Israeli-American DC Council and is a former Co-chair of the Real Estate Committee at the Bethesda-Chevy Chase Chamber of Commerce. Until recently, Avi served as President of the Board of Rebuilding Together Montgomery County, a local non-profit that is dedicated to helping low-income homeowners maintain healthy and safe homes.
title: Executive Vice President

description: About Galanti Group Galanti Group sets itself apart in the residential real estate market by delivering exceptional customer service tailored to the individual needs of our clients. With a combined experience of over 50 years in the industry, we have successfully helped hundreds of clients buy and sell properties in Bethesda, Chevy Chase, Potomac, and NW DC, surpassing a remarkable $1 Billion in Team Career Sales Volume. Galanti Group consistently applies marketing techniques that are highly effective, utilizing both cutting-edge technology and our deep network of professionals and colleagues. This means sellers and buyers can expect the highest level of professionalism, dedication, expert advice and service from us! Selling a home is not a matter of luck! It’s having the right real estate professional to help you devise and implement a winning strategy.

About Julia Born and bred in the DC area, Julia has been lucky enough to call the metro area home her entire life. She hails from Chevy Chase, graduating from the University of Maryland, College Park, while experiencing the metro area's growth firsthand. Now settled in Northwest DC with her husband and their two dogs, Julia is excited to show clients the charm, innovation, and opportunity that are the lifeblood of the city. Julia’s family instilled in her a passion for service through real estate: her grandfather was a real estate attorney in Boston, her grandmother is a retired REALTOR, and her mom and aunt continue to work as business partners selling real estate in Cambridge, MA. Building connections in the DMV and helping people “find their place” is second nature to her. Having spent the first chapter of her career focused on customer success and digital marketing, Julia puts clients’ goals first, prioritizing their needs and creating actionable solutions. Whether you're a first-time home buyer or are searching for a new home, Julia will expertly guide you through the buying and selling processes, making sure you're comfortable every step of the way.
title: Realtor®

description: About Madeline Born and raised in New York City, Madeline brings a scrappy, determined attitude to every real estate transaction. She is deeply committed to providing a highly personalized, luxury experience for every client, no matter the size of the task at hand. With nearly a decade of experience as a TV news and documentary producer at CNN, ABC, and NewsNation, Madeline has covered some of the most significant events in recent U.S. history. Her background in storytelling, talent management, and navigating high-pressure, deadline-driven environments gives her a unique skill set in negotiating deals and ensuring her clients stay competitive. Madeline’s passion for home design and real estate led her to work for an interior design media company, where she discovered her true calling: helping people find and create their dream homes.
title: Realtor® | Licensed in DC

description: About Caryn 📍 Licensed in MD, DC & VA 🎥 YouTube Channel Caryn Gardiner isn’t your average real estate agent—she’s a third-generation pro who’s helped hundreds of buyers and sellers feel confident (and even excited) about the process. A Maryland native with 23 years experience and a past life in the film industry, Caryn knows how to tell a story, market a home, and keep things calm when the stakes are high. Her approach? Smart strategy meets human connection. Caryn’s clients love her for being honest, sharp, and unshakably calm—even when things get complicated. She breaks down the details, advocates fiercely, and somehow makes the whole thing feel easier. Before returning to Maryland to build her real estate business, Caryn spent a decade in Los Angeles, learning how to market things visually and think like a director—skills that now come in handy whether she’s staging a listing, negotiating a deal, or creating content for her growing YouTube audience. Licensed in Maryland, D.C., and Virginia, Caryn blends local expertise with modern marketing to help her clients win in competitive markets. If you want an agent who’s as invested in your outcome as you are (and who actually makes the process enjoyable), Caryn’s your person.
title: Realtor®

description: About Tyler With over twenty years of experience in the DC Metro real estate market, Tyler Garrison is consistently recognized as one of Washingtonians Best Real Estate Agents in DC, known for his deep local knowledge and steady, client-first approach. Tyler began his real estate career at a leading DC title company, where he built a strong foundation in the legal and financial aspects of property transactions. He later worked closely with prominent developers on condominium conversions throughout DC, gaining firsthand experience in the city’s evolving neighborhoods and housing trends. As an experienced Realtor, Tyler's knowledge, dedication and professionalism have helped him build an incredibly loyal client base. Amongst his clients, he is known for his local market expertise, dependability, understanding of complex transactions, and low pressure approach. He ranks in the top one percent of Realtors nationwide and is licensed in DC, Maryland, and Virginia, with particular depth of market knowledge in neighborhoods such as Logan Circle, Shaw, Columbia Heights, and Dupont Circle. Tyler is an alumnus of Lewis-Clark State College and has a unique background as a former Minor League Baseball umpire. As a proud resident of the U Street Corridor, he passionately embraces the Washingtonian lifestyle, in his spare time cheering on the Nationals at the ballpark and cruising the Potomac on his boat. Client Testimonials ★★★★★ "I recommend Tyler with enthusiasm and without reservation. I had very high expectations of Tyler, and he exceeded them on all fronts. I was a first-time home buyer, with some anxiety about the process, and so interviewed several realtors, all of whom were highly-recommended referrals from friends, before making my choice. All of them were great, but Tyler stood out with his deep understanding of the market and cool, easy demeanor, both of which were critical to the smooth running of the process." – Young L ★★★★★ "I am not exaggerating when I say that using Tyler to find our new home was the best decision that we made all year. We found his information on Yelp and had high expectations based on all of the positive reviews. Tyler exceeded those expectations ten-fold. If you are considering using him: do it now! You won't regret it!" – Jonah P ★★★★★ "Tyler is everything you want in a realtor: patient, attentive, responsive, diligent, knowledgeable and not at all pushy or overbearing. He has extensive knowledge of DC and surrounding areas, and was able to pinpoint several places that appealed to us. We started off clueless about the process of buying a condo and wound up in a place that is absolutely perfect for us. He walked us patiently through each step and made sure we felt completely comfortable along the way. His personality is very calming in a process that could otherwise be nerve-wracking. I wholeheartedly recommend Tyler to anybody looking to find the perfect new home." – Chelsea P ★★★★★ "Working with Tyler on our DC condo purchase was an absolute pleasure! Through every step of the process - from our initial introduction to closing - Tyler was always incredibly clear, patient, honest, thorough, and hardworking. We had a lot of questions as first time home buyers, and Tyler was always available at a moment's notice to address our needs (I swear the guy doesn't sleep!). Look no further than Tyler when buying a home in the DC area - highly recommended!" – Jeff L.
title: Senior Vice President

description: About Genie and Ilia Team &lt;br&gt; Since 2005, we’ve worked to build a business that addresses any and all of your real estate needs—whether you’re a first-time buyer or a seasoned seller. With diverse skills that span the worlds of design and data, together, we provide clients with a full-service solution that’s made stronger by the cohesion of our partnership. And although our professionalism and commitment to our clients is well-established, we also like to have fun, and we pull out all the stops to ensure our clients enjoy the journey as much as the destination. Wherever your real estate journey may take you next, you can rest assured that with Genie & Ilia by your side, you’ll always be in great hands. Buying or selling your property is a major undertaking. Whether you are buying your first home, relocating to start a new chapter, or purchasing an investment property, you need someone with insight into the market and expertise to guide you through to the right decision for you. Having lived in the DC area for over 36 years, and worked in real estate for close to 20 years, I bring you a deep knowledge of the community and the many unique aspects the area offers. In my process I take the time to listen and get to know you as I research the market. My goal is to attract the very best offer. I will provide you with market data that will guide our decisions, and I will be open and honest throughout our entire partnership. At Compass, the technology-driven real estate company, I have access to top producing tools and industry specialists that allow me to elevate your experience and provide you with the best service possible. When selling your property, I will consult with listing and marketing specialists to put you and your property at the best advantage. And when you are searching for your new home I will tap the exclusive Compass network so you have the advantage of looking at every single home available on the market. I know that a real estate decision takes a great deal of time and thought. I am here to guide you to make the best decision with knowledge, dedication and discretion necessary for a successful and enjoyable experience. My priority is your happiness. ​​ Whether you are buying your first home, downsizing, moving up, looking for a smart investment, ready to sell for the very best price, or shopping for the perfect rental, I’ll bring persistence, enthusiasm, and deep local knowledge to our partnership. I have lived, worked, and raised a family in our area for more than 25 years, in homes large and small. I know the latest market trends, the schools, and each area’s own special feel—from Washington, D.C.’s vibrant emerging neighborhoods to Maryland’s legendary suburban communities. Through years of experience in retail sales and interior design with a premier home decorating boutique, I’ve also developed a unique vision of what any home, condo, or townhome can become—both the potential and the pitfalls. A lifetime filled with many moves (international, national, and local) helps me appreciate it all from your point of view. Since I grew up in Mexico; have lived for decades in the U.S.; and am fluent in English, Spanish, and French, helping international clients navigate the buying and selling process comes very naturally to me. I'm backed by the tremendous resources of the top-producing technology-driven real estate company, Compass. That means I have access to news about properties even before they hit the market; and a team of seasoned experts in Marketing, Contract Law, and IT at my fingertips. Let my knowledge, experience, and persuasive negotiating skills make your process less stressful—and far more successful. You are my priority. Craig joined the team of Genie & Ilia of Compass after a 30+ years in professional theater leadership in major cities across the country, including at the Historic Ford’s Theatre. For nearly two decades, Craig has lived in the heart of Adams Morgan in Washington, DC. He has owned, renovated, and/or managed multiple properties, including houses, cooperatives and rental properties, in the DC metro area and California. At Compass, Craig’s team uses tools to modernize both sides of the real estate experience—comparing properties, measuring marketing performance with sellers, and offering buyers exclusive access to listings. In his years of leadership in the theater field brokering relationships among artists and producers, Craig managed modest budget shows to multi-million dollar productions, keeping his eye on the big picture and the small details, and creating an atmosphere where all parties were able to produce their best work. Shifting from artist to owners & buyers, and from theaters to homes, the job is the same: to listen to your needs and meet your life goals, on your timeline and on your budget. After working with exceptional, high-profile artists including Julie Andrews, Maya Angelou, Renèe Fleming, James Earl Jones, and Trisha Yearwood, Craig will bring you the same level of care.

About Christopher When Christopher began selling real estate, he headed to the top of his class. In his consecutive and illustrious 30+ years as a licensed Realtor®, Christopher has received distinctive recognition and top honors from the Greater Capital Area Association of Realtors®(GCAAR), Maryland Association of Realtors® (MAR) as well as top agent awards. Christopher’s talent, expertise, enthusiasm, and strong ethical standards have given him an unbeatable reputation for integrity and exceptional customer service. Christopher is no stranger to DC. As a Washington, DC native, he grew up in the North Bethesda/Potomac area and currently resides in Potomac. Christopher graduated from The American University in Washington, DC with double major in Public Relations and History. Christopher credits most of his success to his familiarity with the local real estate market. His goal is to match every buyer client with the perfect home and to help sellers achieve their objectives. He has extensive knowledge of the region, combined with effective communication and an understanding of the business of real estate is the key to his many accomplishments and successes. Christopher is a member of the Kensington-Wheaton Chamber of Commerce and is currently licensed in Maryland and the District of Columbia.
title: Realtor®

description: About Ken Ken Germer has invested and lived in the DMV over 30 years. With a real estate law and consulting background, he provides clients with refreshingly frank, informed advice to help buyers and sellers clarify and achieve their goals. With over $190M in sales and 200+ transactions across DC, MD and VA, Ken's experience adds real value to the selling or buying process. “I pay careful attention and work to build an effective plan, negotiate a strong deal, and simplify the sometimes overwhelming settlement process. The fun is getting a surprising price for my sellers or helping my buyers find a home that fits them perfectly. I love that I get to be a part of these big moments in my clients’ lives.” Ken is an avid skier, photographer and cook, and enjoys exploring the ever-expanding dining options near his home on Swann Street. Click here to view Ken's website
title: Senior Vice President | Realtor® Licensed in DC, MD, VA

description: About David David prides himself on his fierce devotion to his clients, treating each transaction as if it were his own. For David, real estate isn’t just about a house; his goal is to understand his clients’ lives and long-term dreams. With an unparalleled work ethic, David is committed to his clients and believes that no matter the price point everyone deserves exceptional service. He imparts that to the agents he directly mentors. With a deep knowledge of contracts and the DMV micro markets, David brings a thoughtfulness and ease to the process. Known for his wit and honesty, David doesn’t hesitate to tell a client when to keep a house as an investment or when to walk away from a purchase. He exceeds his clients' expectations, as evidenced by his long-term relationships with homeowners, investors, and developers who turn to him time and again for his invaluable real estate advice. Before moving to real estate in 2002, David worked in the hotel industry, ran a call center, and helped launch multiple startups. This entrepreneurial spirit and fervent customer service were a natural fit with Compass, where David helped expand the brokerage to its second market as a founding member of Compass D.C. With experience in large and boutique real estate firms, David chose Compass for the unique way they integrate technology into the process of buying and selling for the benefit of his sellers and buyers. David is truly local, having grown up in northern Virginia, attended college in nearby Fredericksburg, and makes his home, with his partner Brad, in vibrant Logan Circle. When he is not on the job taking care of his clients, he loves to travel, to dive into a good book, and enjoy the amenities of the various neighborhoods throughout the DMV. David is still proud to be an Eagle Scout.
title: Executive Vice President | Realtor® Licensed in DC, MD & VA

description: About Chaudry www.ChaudryGhafoor.com It's been 10 years for me now in the real estate world. My sales volume and track record has led to being awarded as a Top Producer by local associations. I've worked in new construction sales, home renovations and house flipping, as well as the general resale market with buyers and sellers. My love for homes formed when I was young. My parents and I would visit these gorgeous open houses on the weekend after lunch as a sort of family outing. My father immigrated here with absolutely nothing and was a serial entrepreneur who dreamt of success. I didn't realize this at the time, but going to large, luxury homes over the weekend was his version of visiting the goals he would ultimately achieve one day. My mom has a love for artistry and loved interior decorating; For her, it was simply enjoying the trips to see the latest trends of new homes and how they were designed. She truly enjoyed (and still does to this day) seeing the new styles that emerge within interior styling and decor. The blend of my parents' appreciations for homes really formed my own personal intrigue and love for the realm. Working with people in a real estate setting fits very naturally for me; It combines two elements which I very much enjoy...Visiting homes and engaging with people. This environment allows clients to feed off my energy since I'm so content with going through homes all day, and I feed off their energy since they're happy to see I'm happy. It becomes very cohesive and therefore a win-win. Outside of real estate, I do have other interests like trading equities within the financial markets, fitness, reading, and exotic vehicles.
title: Realtor®

description: About Toni Perhaps your typical heart-warming immigrant story, from humble Lebanese beginnings to a successful well-respected Real Estate Agent in our Area serving the International Local Communities. Some of Toni’s clients have included First-Time Home Buyers with modest incomes to discerning buyers from the World Bank, IFC, IMF, IBD, UN, Amazon, US State Department, White House, Middle Eastern Royal Families, Global Businessmen, and many other organizations. Toni has buyers, sellers, investors as well as renters. Above all, Toni believes in being ‘yourself,’ in whichever way ‘that’ self is. Toni prides himself on being extremely professional, ethical, caring and above ALL judge-free. He connects with everyone on a deep humane level – a level that pushes newly found client relationships to a higher level of friendships that lasts forever. With more than 16 years in the Real Estate arena from commercial development to residential sales in the Washington Metro Area, Toni has excelled – especially in the residential field and has proven repeatedly that this niche of business is ‘his’ home and his passion. Skilled in the art of communication and negotiation, and having the ability to speak multiple languages from 4 continents (English, Spanish, French, Arabic and currently learning Mandarin Chinese), Toni brings a multi-cultural perspective that enables him to understand nuances and business practices related to the international cultures within the Washington Metro Area – an edge he employs to deliver his clients a globally-appreciated high-quality level of service. Toni believes in giving back to his community and helping others – he serves on the Board of KEEN Greater DC for young kids with disabilities. An owner of 5 rescued-dogs, Toni is a huge supporter of the Human Rescue Alliance in Washington, DC St. Croix Animal Welfare Center, in the US Virgin Islands. He also supports many local, domestic, and international artists including the Caribbean Museum Center For The Arts. Last year, Toni helped raise funds to complete the building of a Church in a remote village of Indonesia – the chapel will be a spiritual home for less than 25 poor and traditional peasant families. And he is a supporter of the La Clinica Del Pueblo supporting the health of the Latino immigrants in our community. Toni lives with his husband Craig Hollinger in the Spring Valley Community of Washington DC and calls St. Croix, USVI his second home. In his spare time, Toni meditates, channels his higher-self and other beings of love light, inspires and coaches others to be themselves and to do whatever it is that excites them the most. Client Testimonials Scroll down for more Toni helped my partner and I rent our first apartment in DC and then purchase a home in Capitol Hill two years later. All of his five star reviews will tell you how great of an agent he is (so true). But moreover, Toni is a great person, and that is the reason why I loved working with him and will recommend him to any of my friends who are looking for a home in the area. 1) Toni is judgement-free. Of all the places we saw, he was supportive, whether we liked the place or not and genuinely wanted us to be happy. He was never judgmental about our budget for our first home and didn't try to push us out of our comfort zone. He stuck with us until we found what was right for us. 2) I wanted to take one last look at a house on a Sunday evening before I put an offer in. I ended up changing my mind after seeing the house again, but Toni dropped what he was doing and rushed from the gym to the house to help me. The house we were looking at was abandoned mid-reno and was a bit of a disaster. He helped me figure out all of the houses' quirks for two hours-- if there were original wood floors under the laminate, if we could salvage any of the trim work, etc. He could've been doing something much more exciting on a Sunday night than lifting up dirty old flooring with me. He always took his time with us, and you would never think that he had several other clients. 3) He'll advocate for you and be on your team. There are countless times where I didn't think to ask for something, but he was always one step ahead of us and went above and beyond what I would've expected. Thank you, Toni! - Allyce M - November Toni is a reliable, knowledgeable, friendly, patient and resourceful agent! We have been working with him for over 2 years, he first helped us find a condo for and later another one for purchase. During the search, we were pressed for time and he saw 10+ condos with us less than 2 days and helped finalize all the paperwork within the same time - super efficient! During the buying process - he patiently saw 50(??)+ with us all across DC and Arlington, spread out over 6 months - he listened carefully and always always responded to all our needs and preferences, answered our countless questions and put with all our idiosyncrasies with a smile! Super thankful for all his help and hardworking in working with us and will always appreciate his efforts- couldn't have asked for a better agent! - Bratiral D -September . We just purchased our second home with Toni and he was absolutely amazing to work with. He left no detail behind and was so on top of every part of the process. In fact, we had a lot of difficulty with our lender being behind and he was terrific with helping stay on top of them for deadlines to make sure we were protected throughout the process and that our closing was not pushed back. Toni is not only know knowledgeable and experienced, but he is a true pleasure to work with. We wouldn’t want to have anyone else at our side and on our side when we buy a home. - Amanda D – September Toni was a great help, from start to finish. He is experienced, kind and helpful, and works seemingly all the time around the clock to help you. But he is also not aggressive or pushy with you as his client. I trusted him completely, which in the end is the most important trait when choosing between the 100s of realtors out there. I also really appreciate how non-judgmental he is - of your choices, and your timing, and ultimately of what works for you. He takes big shot clients and normal people clients, and works just as hard for everyone. I would highly recommend him - Genevieve C - September OH MY GOD! What an absolute pleasure it was to work with Toni to sell my tony Capitol Hill townhome. He is very professional and was able to provide me with an honest assessment of my property and needed updates to make it more attractive. Tony managed the renovations, the staging, the , and the an exceptional manner. I left town and relied on Toni to manage the entire process - I am so glad I did! Toni - thank you; thank you; thank you!!!! I cannot fully express my appreciation for all that you did for us!!!! - Scott C – September Working with Toni was absolutely wonderful. I have the utmost respect for and confidence in Toni's knowledge, experience, skill, ability and expertise in the real estate world. At one of the worst times, he was able to successfully, and in an amazingly short period of time, sell my elderly sister's condo. In addition to his professional excellence, I found him to be very caring, compassionate and understanding. He always lifted my spirits. Additionally, his response time to my calls, emails, texts was almost immediate. I can't say enough good things about Toni and I highly recommend him. - Nita T. – August Toni is an amazing realtor and wonderful to work with. As a first-time home buyer, I was anxious before beginning my search, but Toni put me at ease right away. I knew instantly I was in the best hands. I had a million questions, and Toni answered every single one, within minutes of me calling/emailing/texting. He is extremely responsive and not only arranged showings for anything I wanted to look at but also asked great questions to understand better what I was looking for. He was there for me every step of the way, and I am so grateful to Toni for making home buying a smooth and exciting process! - Emma P. – August,
title: Senior Vice-President | REALTOR® • Principal

description: About Jonica Jonica's experiences and interests in real estate began as a child. By the time she was 18, her family moved four times, each time packing and selling their home, and then moving to different parts of the country. As a child, she always loved the hunt for their new home and adjusting to her new environment, which was exciting and daunting. There were a lot of lessons learned. This trend continued while she was in college and graduate school studying Civil Engineering, where she moved each year and sometimes twice a year. After college Jonica moved to Washington, DC area, where she experienced shopping for a home as a single person, with roommates, married without children, and married with children. Through these experiences, she understands how important it is to balance a budget with the desired house size, reasonable commute times, and desired neighborhood amenities, and also how to consider that these needs may change over time. She still enjoys the thrill of the hunt for a home and attracting the right buyers to a home, and she is excited to work with clients to help them navigate through this experience. Jonica has lived in the Washington, DC area for over 20 years and brings this experience along with her years of experience working closely with clients on significant projects as an engineer and project manager to working with people on their own significant homeownership project. She looks forward to working with you!
title: Realtor®

description: About Matt Matt was born and raised in Montgomery County, Maryland and currently lives in Washington, DC. After graduating from Syracuse University with a degree in Supply Chain and Marketing, Matt was excited to return to his favorite city. As an agent and native Washingtonian, Matt wants to help others make the DMV their home, too. He knows how to help his clients through every step of the process. Matt builds authentic relationships with his clients, listening to their needs and creating a customized approach to achieve their real estate goals. In his free time, you can find Matt enjoying a concert at the 9:30 Club, hiking the Billy Goat Trail, or perusing local farmers markets.
title: Real Estate Salesperson

description: About Robin DMV Realtor Robin Goelman has earned her reputation as a top producer who consistently delivers winning outcomes for her clients. Whether you’re buying your first home, moving up to accommodate your growing family, or downsizing amidst a life change, Robin leverages her expert knowledge of the community she’s called home for more than 20 years to help you make the right move for your lifestyle, goals, and future. Beyond her local insight and industry experience, Robin also has a specialty designation in Divorce Real Estate, arming her with a knack for strategic negotiation that helps buyers and sellers get ahead in today’s fast-paced market. To Robin, there’s nothing more important in life than the concept of home — a place where you can build wealth, forge independence, and find belonging all at once. Robin works tirelessly every day to help her clients accomplish all three. With Robin’s ever-present tenacity and hands-on knowledge, it’s no surprise that she’s been selected as a top-producing agent by Bethesda magazine and the Washingtonian for five years running. Although for Robin, the only numbers that matter are the ones that make a difference in the lives of her clients. Powered by an enduring commitment to superior customer service, Robin’s mission isn’t to execute transactions, but to create clients — and friends — for life. And since the nature of Robin’s work (and service style) is so personal, she goes to great lengths to infuse every experience with a healthy dose of laughter and fun. After all, who said real estate had to be boring? In her spare time, you can find Robin catching up with her three daughters, teaching early morning exercise classes for Equinox in DC, frequenting the theater, or traveling.
title: Realtor®

description: About Goelman Fitzgerald Group of Compass We are the Goelman Fitzgerald Group of Compass , a full-service real estate team known for delivering exceptional results through expertise, strategy, and service at the highest level. With decades of collective experience and thousands of successful transactions, our team has built a reputation for excellence in one of the region’s most competitive markets. Our results speak for themselves. We’ve been thrilled to be consistently recognized as a Top Real Estate Team by Bethesda Magazine and Washingtonian , an honor that reflects both our performance and our unwavering commitment to our clients. Buying or selling a home is a major financial and personal decision, and we approach every client relationship with precision, care, and intention. From pricing and negotiation to marketing, analytics, and execution, we offer a truly full-service experience designed to anticipate needs, minimize friction, and maximize outcomes. No detail is overlooked, and no challenge is met without a plan. Our success has taught us that the market is always evolving and so are we. At Compass we have access to the most innovative technology, data, and marketing capabilities which elevate our ability to serve our clients at the highest level. With industry-leading tools at our fingertips, we deliver smarter insights, stronger exposure, and a more strategic approach tailored to each client’s goals. Whether representing first-time buyers, seasoned sellers, or long-term investors, we provide a personalized, hands-on experience backed by proven results and trusted expertise. Here’s to informed decisions, confident moves, and a redefined real estate experience — delivered by a team recognized for excellence.

About Christal Christal Goetz offers a truly high-touch, white-glove real estate experience that goes well beyond just getting a deal done. Clients appreciate her straightforward, honest approach and her willingness to have candid conversations, even when the information isn’t always easy to hear. Her goal is simple: to help clients make smart, confident decisions with clarity at every step. Strategy, marketing, and communication are at the core of how Christal works. With a background that spans real estate, construction, investing, and years in marketing and PR for global brands, she brings a thoughtful, well-rounded perspective to every transaction. She understands that real estate is deeply personal, but also one of the most powerful financial tools people have to build long-term security. Whether preparing a home for market, negotiating on behalf of a buyer, or guiding clients through closing, Christal is a steady advocate who focuses on maximizing value while minimizing stress. She works with a wide range of clients, from first-time buyers to seasoned investors, and takes the time to truly listen. Understanding her clients’ goals, concerns, and motivations allows her to tailor a strategy that fits not just the market, but their lives. Outside of real estate, Christal is happiest being active and outdoors. You’ll often find her running along the National Mall, hiking local DC trails, enjoying coffee at a neighborhood spot, or spending time with her husband, two kids, and their golden doodle, Coco.
title: Realtor®

description: About Shelley Shelley started her career real estate 1998. Previously, she received her degree from the University of Maryland Biology/Zoology. Shelley was pursuing her master’s degree in public health when she fell in love with helping people navigate the adventure of buying and selling property. She loves putting all the pieces of the puzzle together from what type of property her client wants, the negotiations, following all the details through to closing and maintaining the relationship afterward. Shelley works to make the process fun and personable yet very professional her clients. She is both diplomatic and conscientious, with a strong “can-do” attitude. Managing people’s expectations is a core value Shelley, along with helping her clients understand the real estate process based on existing market conditions. Shelley specializes in people – her clients and their referrals – and not neighborhood. As a result, her business is 99.9 percent referral based, reflecting the quality of the long term relationships she builds. She works with all types of clients from first-time buyers & sellers to seasoned investors and across all levels and prices of properties. When not working, Shelley enjoys yoga, kickboxing and spending time with her two children. Shelley also has a great love of animals, especially dogs, and donates 1 percent of all of her commissions to the Humane Society. Her beloved chocolate Labrador Maddie, who died in 2012, was often pictured in her business cards because Shelley believes that everyone, human or canine, deserves a good home. Client Testimonials: “Shelley Gold is the real deal. When I say she goes above and beyond the of duty, I'm not just offering up a meaningless cliché, I mean it with bells on. I have never had the pleasure of working with someone who manages to balance a drive perfection, extreme professionalism and genuinely personable warmth as a human being with such success. . . I have joked with her since that she's not just a real estate agent, she's a therapist, life coach, and all-round resource expert! Seriously, this lady has the answer everything. If she can't do it herself, she absolutely knows someone who can. When it comes to selling our home the next , we won't trust it to anyone else.” - Laura & Peter “Shelley has helped me buy two homes and sell another. She is, a word, extraordinary. She is smart, detail-oriented, knows the local market, and is a skilled negotiator. At every step of the process, she was extremely responsive and helpful. She provided great advice, politely and knowledgeably helped me reframe my expectations when they were excessive and was tireless once we developed and agreed-upon game plan. Perhaps most importantly, I trusted her to give me great advice without pushing me in a direction with which I wasn't comfortable. I felt she was on my side in making critical decisions about a very important decision for me financially and for my and kids. I would highly, highly recommend her.” - John “We have worked with Shelley on 6 transactions over the past 16 years. I have consistently used her because of the combination of knowledge, skills, and business savvy that she brings to each transaction. She anticipates our needs, is thorough in the largest to the smallest details, and reduces stress in every transaction. I always feel like I have a strategic advantage with her representing me.” - Jennifer & Jonathan
title: Senior Vice President/Realtor

description: About Mark Mark is a third generation Washingtonian, growing up in D.C. and Bethesda. His clients appreciate his hometown perspective and in-depth community knowledge. He is a recipient of The Greater Capital Association of Realtors Outstanding Sales and Service Lifetime Achievement Award, as well a multiple recipient of the Association’s prestigious Top Ten Producers designation. He was also a member of the distinguished Gold Team Chairman’s Club at his prior brokerage. Mark is ranked among the top 1% of Realtors nationwide. A few of his personal interests include Scuba diving, white water rafting, travel, jazz and the arts.
title: Realtor®

description: About Orlando The old adage that “home is where the heart is” resonates for Orlando, and therefore he understands how important real estate decisions can be. His goal is to ensure that clients feel confident and excited about their choices buying or selling. Orlando has bought and sold properties of his own over the years and has enjoyed working with friends and family, helping them navigate the real estate purchasing and decision-making process. A patient and goal-oriented partner, Orlando enjoys learning about a client’s goals in order to help find a good fit for their investment. He’s excited and interested in helping his clients succeed in real estate and beyond. Orlando has diverse professional experience and a tireless work ethic. He has excelled in the publishing and public health industries. His success has been attributed to his ability to relate to people at all levels and focus on the mission at hand. His responsive nature has helped his clients feel a sense of trust. He prides himself on devoting meaningful time and service to his clients, even while managing as many as 256 accounts simultaneously. He’s looking forward to building on his past professional success and experience in the real estate sector. Orlando has a deep appreciation for live music, outsider art, food and wine. He enjoys entertaining friends and family and exploring cities around the world. He has been fortunate to live and work in some of most vibrant metropolitan places in the USA, including the San Francisco Bay Area, Miami, New York and Washington, DC. Orlando is fluent in speaking, reading and writing en español.
title: Realtor®

description: About Maggie Maggie Gonzalez, is a Northern Virginia native and raised in Falls Church, Virginia. Being a true local she knows the value, people and what makes the Northern Virginia and DC move. Her vast experience in selling urban to suburban markets gives her an advantage in translating her clients wants and needs to realistic results. It takes an experienced agent with vast real estate acquisition to navigate the vicissitudes of the ever-changing housing market. Maggie’s experience in real estate development, property presentation, marketing, and negotiation have undoubtedly procured top tier results. Even though a property can be a primary residence, her expertise in those areas provide a keen focus on obtaining the highest return on investments. Whether you're a prospective buyer, seller, or investor Maggie's expertise can adjust to your needs. Maggie lives by a great quote by Thomas Edison, "There is no substitute for hard work". Searching for a new home or selling your current home can be a complicated and tiring experience. It is absolutely essential to find a real estate agent that is multifaceted and well connected, a love for work, that can ensure satisfying in the competitive real estate market. This industry is really about relationships and attuning to your client’s individual goals. There are many methods in acquiring real estate and negotiating deals. Something she has been known to do is advise her clients to walk away from a deal if the expectations can't be met. “It's not about telling the clients what they want to hear but providing them with the best advice, service, and present creative options to produce the desired outcomes”.
title: Realtor®

description: About Sue Licensed DC, Virginia, Maryland, Sue has been devoted to the real estate profession for more than 30 years and an area resident for over 40. Today, she's the CEO of The Goodhart Group, a powerhouse team combining cutting-edge real estate technology with unparalleled DC area know-how. But don't be fooled by the title. Sue is hands-on with all her clients and has a strong administrative team to make sure every detail is attended to. As a listing specialist, she works with people relocating, downsizers, and move-up buyers who need to sell. Her team of buyer agents knows the metro area extremely well and has successfully guided buyers through today's fast-moving market. The Goodhart Group has been named among the top teams in the country by the Wall Street Journal and Sue is recognized as a top producer by Washingtonian Magazine, Northern Virginia Magazine, Arlington Magazine, and DC Living to name just a few. Prior to her career in real estate, she earned a Master's Degree in Urban Planning from Harvard University and spent 14 years as a small business owner in Old Town Alexandria. Because of their love of Community, The Goodhart Group was named the Alexandria Chamber of Commerce Overall Business of the year in 2019. Sue and her team specialize in Alexandria, Arlington, McLean, Springfield, Falls Church, and Fairfax in Virginia as well as the District of Columbia and the Maryland suburbs. Rest assured you will be in caring hands with Sue and The Goodhart Group. <br>
title: Executive Vice President

description: About Stephen As a licensed real estate expert in the DC area for over 13 years, Stephen brings extensive industry knowledge to every transaction. A third-generation Washingtonian, Stephen has lived and worked in the area his entire career, and loves helping clients discover the place he calls home. Thanks to his previous career, Stephen offers an impressive range of finance and media marketing expertise that allows him to seamlessly guide clients through the home search and sell process. Stephen has bought, remodeled, and sold properties all over the Metro region, and has earned his clients’ trust by helping buyers, sellers, and investors alike do the same. With a fierce dedication to his clients above all, Stephen has forged a reputation as a thorough and trustworthy expert on all real estate matters. Stephen grew up the oldest of five boys, helping to hone his leadership skills at an early age. He attended Thomas S. Wootton School in Rockville, Maryland, and earned his Bachelor of Arts degree in English from the University of Maryland at College Park. He loves all things Maryland Terrapins and DC sports. When he’s not assisting clients, he’s spending time with his wife and coaching youth sports for his three young children.

About Alec Alec is a DC native. Before real estate he specialized in historic preservation at The Charleston Museum and The Museum of Fine Arts, Boston and then established his own firm in Boston and DC helping museums and private clients with their collections. Earning the trust of clients and helping them make difficult decisions have always been the most rewarding part of Alec’s work. His mission is to make buying or selling a home a positive, stress free experience. Alec and his family live in the charming town of Glen Echo, close to the Kent neighborhood of DC where his wife grew up and his mother-in-law still owns a home. Both of his sons attended Clara Barton preschool, Bannockburn ES, Pyle MS and Whitman HS.
title: Realtor

description: About Ellen Ellen has lived and worked throughout the DC area for over thirty years, and she's proud to call the DMV home. She has a deep knowledge of the city's neighborhoods and the surrounding suburbs. She uses her client-first attitude and straightforward approach to make deals happen. She's successfully built a referral-based business by giving exceptional service to each and every client. Ellen is a member of District Property Group at Compass. The award-winning team is active in buying and selling, but also has diverse real estate knowledge in development, property management, and leasing. In addition to real estate, Ellen is construction and renovation savvy, having managed multiple projects, including serving as the general contractor for an addition to her own home. She's obtained building permits, hired & supervised subcontractors, managed construction budgets, and purchased all sorts of building materials. Ellen’s a pro at top-notch customer service, skills she honed in an earlier career working with major donors at the Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts. She put her strategic thinking, attention to detail, and people skills together to build a volunteer board of America’s top corporate CEOs. In addition to being a theater fan, she’s an avid runner and swimmer, having competed in marathons and swims across the Chesapeake Bay.
title: Realtor®

description: About James My personal philosophy is that Real Estate defines your lifestyle. Where you live defines you, where you go on Sunday morning for a stroll, what farmers you go to and what coffee shop you pass every day on your way to work. After selling over $1 Billion in real estate I have taken the time to reflect on, and understand, what people really want when they search for a home. They want a feeling or an emotion, everyone wants to be inspired and live the best version of themselves. They want to wake up in a home they love. People do not buy bedroom counts and bathroom counts, they long for a place where they can picture their loved ones and families making great memories. The cornerstone of The Grant Group is James Grant himself. With over $1+ Billion in career sales and team sales, James is one of the area's producing realtors and a leading expert for Real Estate in the Nation's Capital. Working with our team of agents, covering all of the Washington Area, supported by a full-time support staff, ensures specialized care for each step of a real estate transaction including: marketing, negotiation, managing the contract process, settlement and your needs following the sale. A forward thinking approach to marketing for both buyers and sellers, using resources exclusive to The Grant Group associates, virtual tours, renderings, email drip campaigns, and custom print material, meticulous agent and client follow up - while also leveraging exceptional relationships within the Brokerage community. The Grant Group has built an unparalleled network both locally and across the country.
title: Realtor®

description: About Kevin After building miniature neighborhoods and cities that spanned his parents' basement floor, Kevin knew he had a keen interest in real estate and built space. Since graduating from The College of Wooster with a double major in Urban Studies and Studio Art, he's had an invaluable array of real estate and sales experience: first with an established agent in Bethesda's most successful brokerage that grossed over $1B a year; then with a top-producing duo in the Mid-Atlantic; and finally with the highest-grossing agent in Georgetown before joining Trent in 2007. Since then, Kevin has consistently been a high-volume producing agent, garnering awards (including Washingtonian's "Best Agent" accolade every year since 2015) and selling over $40MM in 2021 alone. Whether it's single-family detached homes in Suburban Maryland and Upper NW DC, co-ops and condos throughout Washington's four quadrants, or rowhomes in Columbia Heights, Dupont and Capitol Hill, Kevin has had a varied real estate sales and around DC, representing clients in all three jurisdictions and in all price ranges (and all points of life). Currently a Chevy Chase DC resident, Kevin's greatest strengths are his area knowledge (as a Bethesda native), his effective persistence, a formal and career-related education in architecture and design, and his easy-going disposition in what can be a difficult arena.
title: Vice President

description: About Vincent Carlos Vincent Carlos Gray is a fourth generation Washingtonian, whose multifaceted professional career in real estate has contributed to his evolution as a leader in the industry. Mr. Gray’s experience spans roles overseeing sprawling mixed-income community redevelopments, renovating luxury single-family homes, and managing the sales/leasing process of numerous residential housing product types. Mr. Gray’s depth of knowledge of the full real estate development lifecycle provides an advantage to his clients who are driven by the balance of architectural design aesthetics, superior engineering, high-quality construction, and the ability to seamlessly close deals. Throughout his career, Mr. Gray has worked on approximately $482,000,000 in real estate transactions. Consistently delivering the highest level of integrity and professionalism is the cornerstone of Mr. Gray’s relationship with all clients, while exuding deep industry knowledge, and an unwavering goal of earning trust by always exceeding expectations. This includes intertwining innovative marketing strategies with creative technology, and delivering top tier guidance for buyers, sellers, and investors of residential real estate. Mr. Gray earned a Master’s Degree (magna cum laude) in Real Estate Development Finance from Georgetown University and a Bachelor of Arts from the University of Virginia. He also completed graduate studies in Digital Media Production/Marketing at the Corcoran School of the Arts & Design at George Washington University. Having lived in various neighborhoods throughout the District of Columbia, including historic Shaw and historic LeDroit Park, which are located in the city’s Northwest quadrant, Mr. Gray now resides in Bethesda, Maryland, a suburb of the nation’s capital.
title: Realtor®

description: About Jordan As a (NW) Washington DC native Jordan Graye spent most of his youth being involved in highly competitive sport while attending Annunciation Catholic Highschool (DC) and DeMatha Catholic Highschool (MD). He received a scholarship to the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill where he played Division 1 soccer for 4 years while pursing a degree in Economics and Sports Administration. Upon the completion of his collegiate career Jordan was drafted by DC United of Major League Soccer and spent the better part of a decade playing for teams all over the United States. After returning to DC and going through the process of buying his first home in Dupont Circle, Jordan immediately gravitated toward Real Estate. Upon joining the Rustein Group his ambition is to create a home buying process that is as personable as possible for clients. Jordan is a self-motivated professional who manages time efficiently, prioritizes accuracy and attention to detail and excels in high-pressure situations. Around the city Jordan can be found running around Rock Creek park or training in the the gym where he is Master Train at Vida Fitness Logan Circle. His hobbies include playing soccer and basketball and riding his motorcycle along Beach Drive. Learn more about Jordan and the Rutstein Group at DCRealEstate.com .
title: Realtor®

description: About Kyrsten Kyrsten is a Principal and fully licensed agent with the Green Littlepage Group of Compass, covering Washington, Maryland, and Virginia. Her love for the industry stemmed from her mother, who has been a Broker for over 40 years. Growing up, she witnessed firsthand the thrill and hardwork it takes to assist clients in their most coveted and significant transactions. With more than 12 years sales experience, she continues to provide exceptional service, honed negotiation skills, and utmost professionalism when working with her clients. Kyrsten's non-real estate career began at ESPN where she worked in television production, writing and editing, at its Connecticut headquarters. Following her move to Washington, she joined WeddingWire Inc, the international leading wedding website based in Chevy Chase. There, she was responsible for developing and selling marketing strategies to small businesses in the wedding industry. She uses her sophisticated writing and communication experience and knowledge for technology to create a competitive edge for her clients. Graduating first in her class, Kyrsten was awarded the School of Journalism's Top Scholar award at West Virginia University. When she is not serving her clients, Kyrsten spends her time volunteering for the Make-A-Wish Foundation, the Alzheimer's Association, and traveling to Malawi, Africa with the Hamels Foundation, where she assists in building schools and bettering the education system for Malawian children. She is also involved with the West Virginia University Alumni Association's National Capital Chapter and has been a long time supporter of the DC Arts scene. A ballet dancer for over 22 years, Kyrsten engulfs herself in the Washington city life, popping in dance classes, and attending local theater performances. Kyrsten resides in Chevy Chase, DC, where she lives with her family.
title: Principal

description: About Valerie Originally from Paris, France, Valerie has lived in the United States since 1992, and been a resident of and business owner in Washington, D.C., for nearly two decades. She has resided in Dupont Circle, Penn Quarter, U Street, and Clarendon, before settling down in Chevy Chase/Bethesda with her husband and son. Valerie is highly motivated, responsive, and passionate about helping her clients find the right home for them. She works tirelessly to ensure that the experience of buying or selling a home is a positive one for her clients, and that they have all the information they need to make the best decision for themselves. Valerie prides herself in negotiating the best offer and home repairs for her clients, and her analytical and problem-solving skills are an important asset when deciding on an offer or asking price. She was recently quoted in the Washington Post on how to write competitive offers and win! Valerie’s relationships and connections with local agents also help her locate hidden inventory for her clients. Valerie holds an MBA in International Management from Thunderbird, the American Graduate School of International Management, in Arizona. She is also an accredited home staging professional (ASP), and is passionate about showcasing your home’s best features to sell it faster and for more money. Valerie is licensed in Washington, D.C., Maryland, and Virginia.
title: Realtor® | Momentum Group at Compass

description: About Arnita Arnita Greene is an award-winning Realtor® and influential leader with a mission to empower clients and colleagues to achieve lasting success through real estate. As the Immediate 2025 Past President of the Prince George’s County Association of Realtors® (PGCAR), 2025 Realtor® of the Year, and a top producer with over $200 million in career sales, Arnita leads with vision, integrity, and an unwavering commitment to excellence. Recognized as a respected voice in the industry, Arnita has been featured in Washingtonian Magazine, Fox 5 News, and numerous other publications highlighting her leadership, expertise, and advocacy for homeownership and equity. With nearly two decades of experience, Arnita has built her business on market knowledge, exceptional negotiation skills, and a deep dedication to client success. Her proven track record and personal touch have earned her the trust and loyalty of buyers, sellers, and investors throughout Maryland, D.C., and Virginia. Beyond her sales achievements, Arnita is passionate about shaping the future of real estate. During her presidency at PGCAR, she championed professional development, diversity, and ethical standards, elevating the voice and value of Realtors® across the region. A firm believer in paying it forward, Arnita founded Greene Light Agent Coaching, a program designed to equip real estate professionals with the tools, confidence, and strategies to grow thriving businesses. When she’s not negotiating deals or leading initiatives, Arnita can be found networking, mentoring, or inspiring others to live boldly and reach their highest potential.
title: Realtor®

description: About Green Littlepage Group of Compass Real estate is personal… more so than almost any other kind of transaction. A home is where you spend most of your time, the community to which you connect, and the center of daily life. The Green Littlepage Group of Compass makes your home buying or selling journey just that — uniquely yours. Responsive, professional, and accomplished, these elite agents bring to the transacting table over 15 years of combined experience, gained from the ground up and sharpened from every angle. Employing a three-pronged approach, we use our industry relationships, profound understanding of local markets, and expert negotiation skills to make your home search or sale easier, and ultimately more rewarding and profitable. Whether your goal is to sell with satisfaction or find your dream home, we’ll represent you with the right advice and guidance through every step of the process.

About Craig Meet Craig, a vibrant Brooklyn native who made a bold leap to Washington, DC in 2000! For fifteen years, he thrived in the dynamic world of information governance, but it was his move to the nation’s capital that ignited a passion for building construction and real estate. Inspired by his roots as the child of Jamaican immigrants, Craig embodies the spirit of hard work, ambition, and resilience—principles that guide him in helping others achieve their dreams, especially in the ever-evolving housing market. As a proud homeowner, Craig is intimately aware of the rollercoaster ride that is the home buying and selling process. He knows it can be an emotional journey, but with his expertise, he transforms the experience into something truly enjoyable. His transparency and dedication to educating clients make him a trusted partner in real estate. With his unwavering commitment and enthusiasm, Craig is determined to turn your buying or selling journey into a fun and memorable adventure. Whether you’re navigating your first home purchase or selling your beloved property, Craig is here to make your experience not just successful—but an exciting chapter in your life!
title: REALTOR®

description: About Bob Bob Gregorio’s strong client focus and over 20 years in marketing, sales and project management enable his home sellers and buyers to achieve their dreams. Numerous clients and awards attest he is professional, thorough and thoughtful. A Top Producer, Bob is proud to have joined Compass, enabling an ever-higher level of service. Bob brings order to a seemingly endless list of tasks, showcasing his attention to detail as well as the big picture. Whether a client is selling or buying a home or both, Bob has a strong record for consummating the deal, and getting for his client the most favorable price and terms possible. Growing up in the foreign service and later working internationally for both the US government and large corporations, Bob easily connects with the greater DC area’s highly diverse sellers and buyers. Serving DC, Maryland and Virginia, Bob has lived in the area over 30 years. He holds an MBA from The University of Texas at Austin, a BS in Marketing Management from Virginia Tech and is a certified Project Management Professional (PMP). Aside from his native English, he speaks Spanish and Russian. In his spare time, he enjoys the outdoors, especially jogging along some of the area’s most inspiring paths. For outstanding service, call Bob 703.282.6053
title: REALTOR®

description: About Cameron Cameron Griffith is a trailblazer in real estate innovation and the force behind Griffith Property Group, co-founder of Abstract Investment Group, and founder of HRHO Benefits. With more than a decade of experience and over $100 million in transactions, Cameron merges data-driven insights, a network of top advisors, and a client-first approach to help individuals and businesses achieve financial independence. His newest venture, HRHOBenefits.com, is the nation’s first digital homeownership resource platform for employers, offering thousands of employees personalized guidance, financial incentives, and discounted services. Recognized as one of DC’s top real estate leaders, Cameron attributes his success to embracing trial and error, lessons in empathy from his mother, and people-focused leadership from his father. Beyond his professional pursuits, he invests in the future of his community by serving on the auxiliary board for the Washington School for Girls, helping shape the next generation of leaders.
title: Realtor®

description: About Griffith Property Group Griffith Property Group is a premier real estate team serving the Washington, D.C. metropolitan area, specializing in luxury, boutique, and custom homes. With over a decade of experience and more than $100 million in successfully closed transactions, our team is dedicated to delivering exceptional service and tailored solutions to every client. Our expertise extends beyond residential properties, drawing on a solid background in real estate development and commercial projects—particularly multi-family investments. By merging deep local market knowledge with a robust national network of industry professionals, we are uniquely positioned to guide buyers and sellers through every stage of the real estate process, whether they’re purchasing a dream home or expanding their investment portfolio. At Griffith Property Group, we believe in building lasting relationships, placing our clients’ needs at the forefront, and bringing extensive expertise and personalized attention to each transaction. Our team’s commitment to excellence, innovative marketing strategies, and unwavering advocacy ensures that your goals become our goals—and that your real estate journey is seamless, successful, and rewarding.

About Jesse Jesse Grimste is a seasoned real estate advisor known for his sharp market insight, strategic negotiation, and unwavering commitment to his clients. As co-founder of The Phoebe and Jesse Team, he specializes in helping buyers, sellers, and investors navigate the D.C. market with confidence. A DMV native, Jesse brings an insider’s perspective to the region’s most sought-after properties, from historic townhomes to sleek modern estates. His ability to anticipate market shifts, identify value, and execute winning strategies has earned him the trust of clients ranging from first-time buyers to experienced investors. Jesse’s approach is straightforward: provide honest advice, deliver exceptional results, and make the process as seamless as possible. His clients appreciate his discretion, attention to detail, and ability to turn even the most complex transactions into smooth, successful deals. Backed by Compass’s industry-leading technology and marketing reach, he ensures that every listing stands out and every purchase is a strategic investment. For a tailored real estate experience that prioritizes your goals, Jesse is the trusted advisor you want on your side. Licensed in DC, MD, & VA.
title: Realtor® Licensed in DC, MD & VA

description: About Sarah Sarah was born and raised in the DC Metropolitan area. She has a Bachelor's Degree in Psychology and Art from Towson University as well as a Master's Degree in Special Education from Johns Hopkins University. For 7 years, Sarah worked as a special education teacher in the schools of Montgomery County. As a result of her education and work experience, Sarah brings to real estate strong communication and organizational skills, attention to detail, and a friendly but direct demeanor. Couple this unique mix of skills with Sarah's endless positive attitude, and it is easy to see why Sarah exceeds the needs and expectations of home buyers and sellers alike. Though a tough negotiator, Sarah always seems to make it look easy! What's more, her love of interior design led her to get a degree in it so she can even lend some vision to the design of your new home!
title: Mollaan Babbington Group | Realtor®

description: About Claudia My Mission: To inspire a positive and lasting impact in people’s lives. I hope to advance the experience of buying and selling real estate by cultivating a spirit of discovery and abundance.  - Connected. Relationships are everything to me; I aim to connect people to their dreams, living space, and to their communities.  - Passionate. I believe that working with “all heart” can change the world.  - Knowledgeable. I am constantly learning; I strive to understand the market and the needs of my clients so I can best help them.  - Playful. I love what I do and I hope it shows.  - Upstanding. My clients’ best interests are at the heart of everything I do. I am committed to excellence and act with integrity. What Do I Do? I build relationships; obsess over prices, the market and the newest, hottest listings; sell homes & make them pretty; problem-solve, negotiate, strategize, research, analyze, go into scary basements, get dirty, and help clients during change. About Me : I have long been captivated by all-things real estate and home design, and love connecting with people in a meaningful and purposeful way. After 20 years managing high-level acquisitions in the aviation & aerospace sectors, I decided to follow my passion. I bring my skills in planning, pricing, and negotiation to my real estate business. I also know how crucial it is to have a trusted advisor and advocate, whether you are interested in buying a property in this competitive market or selling your home for the best price that market conditions allow. I love spending time with my clients and seeing this process unfold as they make new discoveries about themselves and their environment, build wealth, and in many cases, make dreams come true! I have lived abroad for long stretches in Mexico and Brazil, and I’m fluent in both Spanish and Portuguese. If you’re most comfortable doing important transactions in either language, please give me a call – and if you want a vacation home or a tropical paradise for retirement, look no further! I have a strong network of top-notch attorneys and agents in Mexico. I live in the 16th Street Heights neighborhood with my husband and children. Maybe I’ll see you hiking Rock Creek Park, shopping the local farmers’ market or hanging out at Moreland’s Tavern!
title: Realtor®

description: About Shari Shari Gronvall came to Washington DC at the age of 18 to attend the George Washington University and never left. Here she began her career in real estate, made lifelong friends and together with her husband is raising their three children in an historic home in American University Park in Washington, DC. For over 21 years, Shari has built her career on impeccable client service, which is why her business thrives on loyal repeat clients and referrals. Combining exceptional negotiation skills with her warm and energetic personality, Shari makes the complex process of buying or selling feel smooth, supportive, and, most importantly, personal. This relationship-first philosophy has placed Shari among the Top 1% of agents nationwide, a testament to her dedication and work ethic. When she is not working, Shari's favorite activities include tennis, travel, skiing, hiking, and spending time with friends and family.
title: Realtor® Licensed in DC, MD and VA | Senior Vice President

description: About Graham With over 13 years of real estate experience in Capitol Hill, Washington, DC, and the surrounding Maryland and Virginia markets, Graham is known for a calm, strategic approach and a deep understanding of homes beyond their surface appeal. A longtime Capitol Hill resident, he brings hands-on experience in rehabbing and renovating properties and specializes in guiding first-time homebuyers through complex decisions with clarity and confidence. Nearly half of his business comes from helping first-time buyers navigate the complex path to homeownership, and all of it is built on repeat clients and organic referrals from past clients.
title: REALTOR®

description: About Tammy Selling or buying a home can be an overwhelming process and is also one of the most important decisions of your life! ​In an ever-changing real estate market, it is important to work with someone you trust and is experienced in the industry to guide you to the best decision. Tammy has been a residential real estate advisor in the DC Metropolitan Area for 30 years as an Associate Broker. Her experience gives her the perspective and knowledge to navigate through market changes and offer unparalleled expertise in negotiating the best terms for her clients. Tammy is a nationally recognized real estate professional with the market knowledge to help you find exactly the right home or successfully prepare your home for sale, while negotiating the best deal with honesty and integrity.​ Tammy’s clients are her top priority and​ she believes that every real estate transaction has a “formula for success.” She knows that by using her skills and preparation your experience will be smooth and rewarding. At the technology-driven real estate company, Compass, Tammy has access to innovative tools and industry specialists that allow her to elevate her client experience and provide them with the best service possible. When listing a client’s property, she is able to consult with listing and marketing specialists to position your home to sell it efficiently and effectively to reach your desired results. And when her clients are searching for their new home, she has access to the internal Compass nation-wide network of agents where she can see every home available on the market, giving both buyers and sellers a competitive advantage. Tammy grew up in Michigan, but has called the DC Metro area home for over 30 years; moving here immediately after college. Her mid-western values and commitment to excellence provide her a solid foundation for her career success and professional reputation. Tammy gives back to the community she loves and is an active volunteer for many organizations, including the Fort Sumner Citizens Association, A Wider Circle, The CF Foundation, and The Dwelling Place. Tammy loves spending time with and friends, and as a travel enthusiast, she revels in finding adventure anywhere she goes. She loves to exercise, hike, bike, walk her dog, ski, boat, cook and read. She is devoted to contributing to her community’s excellence and is enthusiastic about sharing her passion for real estate. Neighborhood Market Snapshots Click below on a neighborhood to view all active, under contract and recently sold listings.
title: Vice President, Licensed in MD & DC

description: About Alex Alex is a sales consultant/Realtor with Compass serving Washington DC and Charlotte. He graduated from NC State University with degrees in Business and Communication before pursuing a Master's in Real Estate from Georgetown University in Washington, DC. With a lifelong interest in real estate and development, Alex has since obtained his NC, SC, and DC licenses and has made helping people achieve their goals through real estate his passion.
