Alex is a team player and sold 38 properties in his second full year of business. In his spare time, you can find him training for long-distance running races, globetrotting, golfing, staying up-to-date on the latest trends in business, and spending quality time with friends.
title: Realtor® | Marketing Consultant

description: About Philip Phil Guire, born and raised in Michigan, “Bleeds Maize and Blue.” A master of the ever-changing market, he is a seasoned and excellent negotiator, is well-respected by peers, and maintains a broad and diverse network of contacts that has benefitted clients in surprising ways. He is known equally for his ready smile and for wearing shorts year-round, while his knowledge of the DC metro area would rival that of any cabbie. Phil enjoyed stints in the non-profit world and politics on Capitol Hill before his career in real estate.
title: Realtor / Vice President

description: About Janaina Top producer Janaina Gutu is an astute and dedicated real estate agent renowned for her remarkable market knowledge and elite customer service. She leverages her skills, experience, and the support of Compass' state-of-the-art tools to deliver unparalleled value in every home search and sale. This dedication results in a long list of loyal, satisfied clients, enthusiastic referrals, and industry recognition. Janaina is not just a real estate advisor; she is an excellent negotiator, great at solving problems, proactive, and skilled at remediating situations. As a real estate investor herself, she has a deep understanding of the real estate investment world, making her an invaluable resource for investor clients. Licensed in the District of Columbia, Maryland, and Virginia, Janaina consistently delivers resounding success and enjoyable experiences for buyers and sellers throughout Fairfax County, Montgomery County, and the Northwest D.C. area. By sharing her profound knowledge of the city and its surroundings, Janaina helps each client make informed decisions throughout the real estate process. She is a Certified Luxury Home Marketing Specialist and possesses a deep understanding of general contracting work and home renovations, supporting her clients through each stage of the homeownership life cycle. Whatever your real estate objectives, you can count on Janaina to lead with passion, integrity, and unwavering dedication to your success. Originally from Brazil, Janaina earned a business degree from PUC Brazil and speaks English, Portuguese, and Spanish. She currently resides with her husband and children in Alexandria, Virginia.
title: REALTOR®

description: About Sarah As a resident of the DC metro region for over 30 years, Sarah knows this real estate market exceptionally well. Sarah’s clients are the recipients of best-in-class service, superior results, and her unyielding dedication to meeting their needs. She excels in helping buyers and sellers navigate the hurdles and details of real estate in this competitive, often confusing market. Whether formulating the winning strategy to help buyers land their dream home or effective marketing and listing plans to maximize the yield for her seller clients, Sarah delivers. As someone who lived internationally growing up, Sarah has the unique skills and experience to work with the international community interested in buying and selling homes in the Washington, DC metropolitan region. In her spare time, you'll find Sarah with her family on the Potomac River competing as an outrigger canoeist and stand-up paddler. She has completed the Chattajack race five times – an endurance race that covers 31 miles on the Tennessee River and raises money for the Tennessee River Gorge Trust, an environmental conservancy organization. Sarah is also proud of her volunteer work with Anchor Fund, Habitat for Humanity and Spirit of America. With every transaction, Sarah makes a donation to the Anchor Fund to help people rebuild after experiencing domestic violence. She is a member of the Greater Capital Area Association of Realtors, the Washington Canoe Club in Georgetown and the Sulgrave Club. Client Testimonials ★★★★★ " We definitely not only found our perfect condo we gained an amazing friend. Sarah stuck with us throughout this pandemic for about a year. She is so knowledgeable about the market and isn’t afraid to speak her mind (which is a great thing when you’re relying on someone for their professional expertise). She ALWAYS made sure to tell us every piece of information throughout our process. We literally trust her with everything when it came to finding us not only what we wanted but what we needed. We cannot say enough positive things to describe working with such an incredible realtor. Professional, stylish, funny, kind and above all Savvy when it comes to real estate! If your looking for a home … RUN to Sarah! " ★★★★★ " Sarah was excellent as a buyer's agent. She provided regular listings as both inspiration as well as serious options. She was available any time of the day or night for questions that we had as we were thinking through where to purchase our next home. When it came time to put in an offer, we had complete faith in her ability to represent us as if she were making her own personal home purchase. She offered shrewd advice, complete transparency, a high level of experience, and patience. " ★★★★★ " We weren't intending to purchase a new house and when the perfect property dropped into out lap, Sarah helped up lay out the necessary steps, structure a competitive offer, and then helped up to stay patient through the four month closing process. Her initiative with the sellers' agent kept the process moving and us informed. Definitely recommended, especially for complicated purchases involving long-time tenants and remote owners. " - Joseph ★★★★★ " We absolutely lucked out when we found Sarah on Zillow! She showed us a wide variety of places in DC, and we ended up purchasing a house that was a little tricky- it wasn’t listed on the market yet and it was for by owner. Sarah kept frequent contact with the seller to make sure renovations were being completed on time, and she negotiated our purchase so that the house never went on the market and we didn’t have to get in a bidding war. Sarah is professional, kind, quick to handle any issues that come up, and extremely helpful. I would recommend her to anyone. " - Amanda ★★★★★ " Sarah was fabulous - knew the DMV market, was effective at identifying neighborhoods that worked us. She knows the process, explained it patiently and clearly. Her responsiveness was almost immediate. Finally - she was very effective and engaging constructively with the opposing realtor. " - Mary ★★★★★ " We were introduced to Sarah with very high recommendations by a close friend. We found her extremely easy and pleasant to interact with, a consummate professional who is clearly very knowledgeable about the DMV area but at the same time who also invests time and effort to better understand and serve her clients’ needs. After we decided to work with her, she promptly exceeded expectations in every conceivable dimension. We could not have hoped for a smoother or more hassle-free of our home. It was truly a pleasure working with her, and we would recommend her very highly to prospective homebuyers and sellers alike. " - Elena ★★★★★ " Sarah is truly an awesome, full service realtor. She is excellent at helping at every stage of the process (including post closing renovation technician recommendations). I highly recommend her services to everyone. " - Mary S.
title: Senior Vice President Licensed in DC | MD | VA

description: About Margie Margie is ranked among the top 1% of Agents in the US. In 2023 the readers of Bethesda Magazine voted Margie the winner of “Best Realtor”. Washingtonian named her in the Top 100 Realtors of 2023. Regardless of the number of homes sold or awards won, the people matter most. Over the years, The Halem Group has grown into a one-of-a-kind force in this competitive market. The team is creative, works tirelessly, has a great eye for design, staging accreditation, and experience working with local builders. Margie and her Team of top agents include Harrison Halem, Courtney Halem, Lori Silverman, Elizabeth Meltzer, Matt Gloger, Benjamin Pate, Danielle Mannix, and Kristen Wendel. Their relationships with clients run deep and they treat each and every client as if they are their only client. The team prides themselves on providing the highest level of service to their clients and fellow agents. They strive for a seamless experience and work hard to ensure that each transaction runs smoothly. These seasoned agents and savvy marketers craft an all-inclusive plan for each home they market. That background has allowed them to combine high-level marketing tactics with proprietary systems and processes that bring buyers and sellers together. The Halem Group’s extensive knowledge of real estate is beyond comparison and brings a combined 70+ years of practice in the industry with thousands of completed transactions and over 1 billion dollars in real estate sold. Margie is also committed to community causes and has served as chair for the National Walk for Autism Speaks and the former Open Your Heart Campaign Co-Chair for the American Heart Association. Click here Margie's website
title: Senior Vice President

description: About Harrison Harrison's attention to detail, knowledge, personality, and enthusiasm, paired with a strong background in regional development and housing, help him evaluate and serve his client’s needs in today’s market. Harrison believes that maintaining a high level of personal service and striving to exceed the client’s expectations are fundamental throughout the home sale process. His focus is on the first-time home-buying process and guiding clients through every step. Harrison is a graduate from the University of Arizona with a B.S. in Regional Development and a Minor in Business .
title: Real Estate Salesperson

description: About Susan With over 25 years in the real estate business, Susan Hand’s passion is people -- listening to their needs, making suggestions and exceeding their expectations. She provides expert guidance for the first-time buyer, for those selling a home that has been in the family for generations, or others looking for an investment opportunity. She has been consistently recognized as a top 1% real estate producer nationwide, with millions in sales annually and countless satisfied clients. Most recently, she has become known as the “go to” real estate agent for National Landing, Amazon’s new HQ2 Headquarters in Northern Virginia. Susan’s listings have been featured in the Washington Post, Wall St. Journal, New York Times, Arlington Magazine, and Washingtonian Magazine which honored her as one of the top producing in the Washington DC area. Client Testimonials ★★★★★ "In a sellers market, our first realtor had 88 days to sell our home. They failed. We found Susan and she turned things around very quickly. We had multiple offers after our first open house despite the slowing down of the market. Susan is in a class all her own. She is a smart, strong, capable woman with a great sense of what it takes to get the job done. We loved working with her. We truly felt as if she was on our side and not solely in it for the commission as we had felt with our previous realtor. We wholeheartedly recommend her to anyone who wants to buy or sell a home. Without hesitation, we would use her again. " - Susie & Bill Z. ★★★★★ "Susan’s advice and guidance got me the best price possible for my home. Her suggestions gave me maximum return on my investment and the closing price exceeded my expectations!" - Jaime F. ★★★★★ "As first time homebuyers, we were completely overwhelmed to even think about a home search. When we met Susan, she instantly put us at ease, saw what we wanted, and warned us about issues that she saw in potential properties that we were interested in. Closing was a breeze and we were absolutely thrilled to have a phenomenal home. After closing, Susan went above and beyond to help us turn the house into a home. She listened to what we needed done and put us in touch with workers who have done a beautiful job. When we found someone on our own who was giving us a hard time about a project with our floors, Susan put us in touch with a company that fixed everything perfectly. Throughout this entire process, we truly have been taken care of every step of the way. Susan has been a life saver, and we cannot imagine how we could have gone through this process without her." - Hope & Jason B. ★★★★★ "Susan is a fantastic realtor. She expertly delivers results and anticipates your needs and delivers! I would highly recommend Susan and have to numerous friends and colleagues. She is exceptional and a true professional!" - Karen J. ★★★★★ "Having known Susan for a number of years but having worked with her just recently I can confirm that what they say is absolutely true – Susan is one of the most positive and enthusiastic people I have ever met. Her experience in real estate coupled with her personality makes her easy to work with and guarantees that you will see results. If you are thinking of buying or selling a home, I could not recommend Susan Hand more. She really does go out of her way to provide “Over The Top” service to ALL of her clients." - Nicole M. ★★★★★ "Susan Hand was referred to my family from our Selling agent in Seattle and was introduced as the “local expert” among other things. Our move was complex leaving Seattle for Arlington as part of a relocation for my family with two young children and having to do most of this virtually. Susan from the very beginning was warm, friendly and incredibly knowledgeable on the local market. It was clear from my initial expectations and requirements that I was not thinking about the areas correctly and Susan was quick to advise me on the areas and homes that would work best for me and the family. Susan visited multiple properties on my behalf, shared findings and was quick to rule out areas and homes that didn’t fit our requirements. Through her local knowledge she found what would soon to become our dream home and a new build home in North Arlington. Susan negotiated a very complex contract, worked diligently across the parties and helped me acquire the home in a very competitive market. Susan didn’t stop there, she helped my family fully customize my home, find other suppliers and referrals for me and has been with us all the way through, including meeting me and my young family from the airport on arrival to help us settle in to our temp home. Susan is quite simply one of the best real estate agents I’ve met, a true professional but with a genuine deep sense of care and sincerity for her clients. I would be happy to recommend Susan to anyone and able to provide further references should be required." - David G.
title: Realtor®

description: About Han Peruzzi Team Our Mission is to serve our clients and provide them with the advantages of experience, honesty and insight. We ensure that our clients have all the knowledge and resources that they need to handle their most important transactions. Whether you are looking for that dream home or building a real estate investment portfolio, we are obsessed with achieving the best possible outcome for you as if it were our own. As a team, we have built a reputation and many valuable relationships over the past 10 years that will provide you with conveniences and advantages in both buying and selling. Our expertise, knowledge and insights about the market make it possible for us to provide professional analysis and consultation for buyers and help them get the dream homes they desire. At the same time, our experience and success in renovating and staging existing homes has brought profound benefits to our clients. In addition, whether it is staging your home for successful sale, or coordinating financing, renovations or moving, our team will make every effort to provide relevant resources and coordination services. We will work with you to make your transaction an end-to-end success. Our team is licensed in DC, VA and MD. We speak English and Mandarin Chinese and welcome all clients!

About Blake A local to the DMV area, and a real estate professional, I recognize and value the trust my clients place in me. Hospitality is a trait that comes natural to Blake as he continued post graduation to the mortgage industry at The Federal Savings Bank as a Mortgage Banker. Blake joined The Oracle Group of Compass in 2021 and is currently licensed in Washington, D.C. Outside of real estate, Blake coordinates two golf organizations throughout the DMV area. The Veterans Golf Association (VGA) where his partner is the Virginia State Director and Lambda Links, an LGBTQ+ golf organization throughout the Washington D.C Metro Area.
title: Realtor®

description: About Theo Theo Harding is a true DMV local, a partner whose family roots in this region stretch back to the mid-1600s. This is more than history—it’s an unrivaled understanding of the Washington, DC Metro area's diverse neighborhoods, rich culture, and market nuances, making him the ultimate local expert for your next move. For 30 years, Theo honed his commitment to service as the owner and operator of the sole delivery service on Capitol Hill. This experience instilled the principles of promptness, logistical mastery, and meticulous attention to detail —invaluable skills he brings to every real estate transaction. Theo doesn't just manage contracts; he manages the entire journey with the reliability of a trusted business owner. Theo is passionate about helping clients establish their own roots here. He loves the DMV’s unique blend of history, diversity, and magnificent parks, fueling his dedication to ensuring your real estate journey is a success. Whether you are a first-time buyer or a seasoned investor, Theo is committed to serving the community and helping you transform your home into a new and exciting opportunity. As a proud member of one of the Top Real Estate Teams in the DMV, nationally ranked in the top 50 by the WSJ, Theo’s track record reflects his commitment to delivering exceptional results for his clients. Beyond his professional life, Theo is a devoted husband and a proud father of two sons. When not serving clients, Theo is out enjoying the DMV, whether he's skiing, biking, or exploring the region's culinary scene with his wife, a trained chef—a true local enjoying the place he calls home.
title: Realtor®

description: About Marjory Marjory is a native Washingtonian with multigenerational roots in the community. Born in Washington, DC, and the oldest of three girls, she was raised on a farm on The Eastern Shore of Maryland and later educated in Virginia. Marjory returned to Washington after college, where she began a career in marketing and sales for Hyatt Hotels and The Homestead. She has raised her family in several DC neighborhoods including Georgetown, Massachusetts Heights, and presently resides in The Palisades. Marjory is also an accomplished photographer and for the last 15 years has managed her own business, specializing in event photography and family portraiture. Her photography experience is a crosswalk from capturing that special moment, to assisting her clients in capturing that perfect home. Marjory wants to hear your story, whether you are first time buyer, upsizing, or downsizing, she will work hard to earn your business and find that home that fits you and your family. From start to finish she is a service-oriented realtor and dedicated to providing her clients a high level of service from start to finish. Marjory is dedicated to serving her clients with honesty and integrity in all of her transactions. Licensed in District of Columbia, Maryland, & Virginia
title: Realtor® | Licensed in DC, MD, & VA

description: About Sara Sara is a native Washingtonian who has lived and worked across the city her entire life. She prides herself on being solution-driven, and loves thinking outside the box to help her clients achieve their real estate goals and dreams. Throughout the entire transaction, she works hard to provide constant guidance and wants to ensure her clients view her as a trusted advisor. The combination of her love for the D.C. area, her passion for helping others, and her entrepreneurial spirit is what lead her to a career in real estate. In Sara's first year in real estate, she hit the ground running selling $10.9 million. She has continued this strong track record and tries to create an experience that is personalized, informative, rewarding, and, most importantly, fun! Her clients consider Sara to be extremely responsive, patient, knowledgeable, and honest- and these are traits Sara carries with her in every new client relationship and their real estate journey. Sara enjoys testing and ranking all sushi restaurants in the DMV, dreaming of the next renovation project to do on her house, and looking at kittens to adopt. She can be spotted walking around Capitol Hill with her husband, daughter, and dog, Wiley.
title: Realtor® | Licensed in DC, MD, & VA

description: About Avery A native of McLean, Avery Harries knows the DC area inside and out. After studying history at Trinity College in Connecticut, Avery worked in luxury sales for Tiffany and premium sales for the Washington Nationals (she even has the World Series ring to prove it). Through this experience, Avery learned that personal relationships are the foundation of her career, and she brings those values with her to real estate. It is Avery’s goal to make the real estate experience exciting for her clients as she helps them find their ideal home and plan for their future. Avery lives in Old Town Alexandria and travels frequently to visit her husband, who serves in the Navy submarine force. She enjoys cooking, especially Japanese food, for her family and friends, and takes her dog George with her everywhere. In her spare time, Avery enjoys traveling (she’s visited 21 countries) and is learning French.
title: Realtor® | Licensed in DC

description: About Jeanne One of Compass DC’s founding agents, Jeanne Harrison has proudly called Capitol Hill home since 1985. Her desire to help create a sense of “community” began decades before she became an agent 20 years ago, and continues today. A past co-president of the Stanton Park Neighborhood Association and former board member of CHAMPS, she is currently on the Board of the Capitol Hill Community Foundation. Always active in her neighborhood, she is a longtime volunteer at innumerable community events, including the Capitol Hill Classic bike brigade, The Literary Feast, and as a bike marshal for Hill Family Biking. She and the Jeanne Phil Meg Team support and sponsor just about everything that happens on the Hill, and their annual client gingerbread decorating party is legendary. A CUA Architecture grad, Jeanne shares insights to help buyers and sellers alike envision possibilities in their homes, and knows first-hand how sweat equity works, having spent years of weekends restoring houses with her husband. She is particularly passionate about staging properties and after seeing her transformations, more than one seller has joked about reconsidering their decision to move. Extremely knowledgeable about how best to position a property, and equally comfortable helping first timers or seasoned veterans, she has a special affinity for helping sellers downsize and all that entails. Sellers have also benefitted from her ability to successfully pitch seemingly-insignificant items about their homes to the press, generating additional buzz and improving sales prices. Jeanne is a skilled negotiator, knows the importance of details, and is adept at creating “win-win” situations. Named one of the 100 Best Real Estate Agents by Washingtonian Magazine (and with her Teammates has been named a Washingtonian Best Team every year since 2016), her business is almost exclusively from referrals by other satisfied clients. She and the Team are particularly honored that many real estate colleagues have referred to and chosen to work with them personally, locally and across the country. Featured in Forbes as “the realtor who uses pedal power to sell houses,” Jeanne sports a jaunty in-town polka dot helmet when getting around or showing property by bike. She is actually a very serious cyclist who has toured extensively by bike with her husband throughout Western Europe and the US, cycled from DC to Canada, in Chile/Argentina, across Costa Rica, and has ridden several of the major summits to watch the pros ride the Tour de France (2013 Men’s, 2023 Women’s). She also enjoys sailing, snorkeling, and supporting the Washington Spirit and DC United. Prior to real estate Jeanne spent 15 years honing her excellent customer service skills in luxury hotel management.
title: Realtor / Vice President

description: About Gordon Through his highly professional, informed, and diligent approach, Gordon Harrison provides outstanding expertise and professional representation to his valued clients. As principal of THE GORDON HARRISON GROUP, Gordon exhibits his proficient counsel, keen insights, and the highest level of integrity and resourcefulness when advising his clients on all real estate matters. As a specialist in the Acquisition and Marketing of Residential, Condominium, and Luxury Properties, and as a proud native, he is intimately connected, knows the trends, and truly enjoys sharing his insights into the rich and charming character that the DMV real estate market has to offer! Gordon elevates the real estate experience by offering his clients a smart, solution-oriented, consultative approach. Recognized for his astute and accurate assessment, he offers a more complete perspective and in-depth evaluation of the current market trends. When working with sellers, he designs and executes an impactful presentation that skillfully heightens each listing’s visibility, helping it stand out from the competition by utilizing professionally produced photography and video imagery, together with a presentation in print and on numerous websites and social media platforms. When working with buyers, he carefully listens and diligently aligns and applies himself so that he may locate a residence and distinguished setting that meets their lifestyle requirements. Gordon excels at serving each client with exceptional first-class service, true advocacy, and full-service resources that significantly help each client accomplish their real estate goals. He is very thorough in providing constant communication and is always extremely attentive, accessible, and responds promptly to his clients. When met with a tough challenge, multiple offers, or a possible deal breaker, he is highly skilled in negotiating the critical contractual components of the transaction and is masterful at finding creative and equitable solutions. Delivering responsive, confident results with a compassionate, impactful approach is all part of Gordon’s distinguished style, always achieving truly elevated accomplishments for his clients. Contact Gordon to serve you and your personal real estate interests.
title: Principal of Gordon Harrison Group

description: About Anne Anne Harrison is a distinguished leader in the Metropolitan Washington, DC Metro luxury real estate market, renowned for her expertise in exclusive properties across McLean, Washington, D.C., and Maryland. With a strong academic foundation from Georgetown University and Georgetown Law Center, Anne combines deep local roots with unparalleled market insight, making her a trusted advisor in the industry. Integrity, approachability, and a commitment to excellence define Anne's approach. Supported by a dedicated team and strong industry relationships she consistently delivers exceptional results for her esteemed clientele. Fluent in French and a licensed pilot, Anne embodies versatility and refinement. Known for her daily swims, love for horseback riding, and passion for literature and travel, she leads a lifestyle that balances professional success with personal fulfillment. Anne's generosity underscores her dedication to exceeding expectations in every aspect of life. Anne and her husband are proud parents of three adult children and the devoted owner of Seamus, their beloved Scottish Terrier. Anne's dynamic lifestyle and her client commitment cement her reputation as a luxury real estate leader. She is the preferred choice for discerning clients seeking exceptional properties and unparalleled service.
title: Realtor®

description: About Tommy As a very experienced agent on the DC metro real estate scene and a member of the top team, Trent & Co, Tommy Hart has been guiding his clients with ease and insight since 2002. Tommy combines unrivaled market knowledge, best-in-class service, and industry-leading technology to both simplify and streamline the search and sell process for every client. Thanks to his professionalism and attention to detail, Tommy has cultivated an impressive network of referrals and repeat clients. And as a DC resident since 1993, Tommy’s local expertise is unrivaled in the DC, MD, and VA areas, being licensed in all 3 states. Although Tommy specializes in residential real estate, he advises clients at all price points and in all stages of life. Whether you’re a first time buyer or a seasoned seller, or looking to buy or sell new construction condos, Tommy will work tirelessly to deliver a seamless experience, and most of all—the results you deserve. Just check out his many Zillow Reviews, true reviews left by clients, to the left! Tommy is originally from Maplewood, NJ, a small town outside of New York City. Having grown up with a love of horses, Tommy spent his younger years competing in the equestrian arena until graduating with a B.S. degree in political science from Drew University. He then moved to DC, where he found his passion selling real estate. Tommy currently lives in the Logan Circle neighborhood of DC. When he’s not working with clients, Tommy enjoys horseback riding, traveling, baking desserts, cooking, trying new restaurants, and enjoying raising his two kitties, Koaty and Storm.
title: Realtor®, GRI

description: About Tyler Introducing Tyler Hart- Clients flock to Tyler for his honesty, and relentless drive to secure the best deals. He is a seasoned negotiator and expert marketer, consistently exceeding client's expectations. Tyler's compassion and dedication to helping others stems from his previous career working on a Neurosurgery/Epilepsy floor at a Children's hospital. Tyler brings a innovative yet personal touch, making finding your next home smooth and enjoyable. Tyler is originally from Atlanta Georgia, and the southern hospitality can be seen in his day to day actions. He also understand first hand what it is like to move to a new area making him an excellent choice for anyone relocating. When Tyler is not working with clients. He enjoys anything to keep him Active such as tennis, Hiking, working out, or walks with his rescue Koda. He also enjoys cooking and entertaining with friends.
title: Realtor® | Licensed in VA, DC & GA

description: About Patrick Through his extensive knowledge, expertise and thorough understanding of the trends throughout the Washington DC, Maryland and Virginia real estate market, Patrick is committed to providing his clients with a truly impressive real estate experience. As a native of the region (Rockville, MD), he is very connected with its distinct communities and it is his joy to share his insights into the region. He is committed to delivering high-quality service and representation that ensures his clients’ best interests are protected - and that they have a partner who will go above & beyond before, during, and after the transaction. He is committed to helping his clients make the right move! Patrick and his wife Catherine have three young children & two goldendoodles! Outside of Real Estate, Patrick referees men’s college basketball and enjoys spending time with his family.
title: Realtor®

description: About Kari Meet Kari Hatcher, a passionate real estate professional who has called Washington DC and Maryland home since 2009. With a love of design and the thrill of matching clients with their ideal properties, Kari brings a fresh perspective to the industry. Kari's love for the area is evident in her enthusiasm for its international flair, bustling restaurant scene, and endless opportunities for exploration. She sees real estate as a way to connect people with the vibrant energy of this region. As a valued member of a high-performing team licensed in Washington DC, Maryland, and North Carolina, Kari has achieved success, leveraging her local expertise and market knowledge to serve a wide range of clients. Beyond her professional accomplishments, Kari leads a fulfilling personal life. She treasures family time and enjoys discovering new restaurants with friends. Her passion for yoga, travel, and sports adds an adventurous dimension to her vibrant personality. When you work with Kari Hatcher, you not only gain a dedicated real estate expert but also a compassionate and relatable partner in your real estate journey. Her unwavering commitment to serving the community reflects her genuine passion for helping others achieve their real estate dreams.
title: Realtor®

description: About David David’s real estate practice is one of Washington’s fastest-growing for a reason: trained as a lawyer and raised in a local real estate family, David’s sophisticated and client-centered approach has earned him the trust of attorneys, tech executives, and Senators alike. A native Washingtonian, David's inspiration for success came from his parents, who owned a large portfolio of residential and commercial properties. From a young age, David worked alongside real estate agents to identify, negotiate and close the purchase and sale of property for their portfolio. David earned an MBA from Duke and a JD from George Washington University and practiced as a transactional attorney for a global law firm, where he represented corporate clients in connection with billion-dollar transactions. The sophistication in client service and excellence in work product cultivated by way of advising large corporations on critical, time-sensitive legal matters has been indispensable to his success in Washington’s luxury residential market. David has sold nearly $100 million of real estate over his career, earning national recognition from Tom Ferry and RealTrends as one of America's Best Real Estate Professionals, as well as local recognition from each of the Washingtonian and DC Modern Luxury magazines as an industry leader. While David is not advising clients and listing property, David enjoys exercise and tennis. He is a tennis enthusiast who competed in the Mid-Atlantic Tennis Association as a youth, ranking #3 in Maryland and #5 in MATA. David is avidly engaged in the community, including at the National Child Research Center (at which he serves as a Trustee), Maret, the DC Bar, and the Greater Capital Area Association of Realtors. Client Testimonials ★★★★★ " Working with David is a dream! We were new buyers to the DC real estate market with minimal knowledge but David expertly guided us through each step of the process. Always following up, answering calls/texts and patiently showing us many listings, David was the reason we were able to purchase the condo we wanted this spring. His negotiating skills helped everything move smoothly from purchase to close. David also goes above and beyond- he was super helpful with everything from cost savings to paint color suggestions- and is thoroughly enjoyable to work with. Can't recommend him enough!! " - Caitlin R., Buyer ★★★★★ " David guided us through selling our house after we found our dream home. He quickly identified the touch-ups that would help our home stand out and attract the most offers. David knows the market well and was able to advise us throughout the entire process – we felt well taken care of. Not only is David a pleasure to work with, but he also gets results. David’s brilliant marketing helped us sell our home quickly with multiple competing offers well above asking! David is a service-focused professional, partners with his clients to really understand their needs and advocates for them throughout the process. David will be the first person we call for future real estate needs! " - Delfina R., Buyer & Seller ★★★★★ " Professionalism matters. With so many realtor choices, it's easy to get overwhelmed when buying your house. David Hatef is a trusted professional who took the time to understand us, listen to our needs, and then helped guide us through the housing market. When it came time to put an offer on a house, he was the skilled negotiator we needed to ensure we walked away with our dream home at a fair deal. Being a realtor is more than handing out business cards and showing properties. A professional like David takes the time to know you, your needs, and then backs it with skilled knowledge in real estate pricing, negotiations, and market trends. We cannot thank him enough for guiding us through this process and recommend him to anyone looking to work with a professional who is authentic and genuinely cares. " - Rob G., Buyer & Seller ★★★★★ " If you’re looking for an experienced real estate agent who is a pleasure to work with, David Hatef is a real pro. He has excellent judgment and he will go the extra mile for his clients. I got to know David first as a buyer and then as a seller. He knows the DC area real estate market inside and out and he provides exceptional support and service for his clients. As a buyer looking to relocate in a very competitive market in 2020 David guided me through the steps to make a winning offer on a great property after an exhaustive search. Then, I hired David to help sell my former primary residence. You might think that selling a property is easy. Trust me, it’s not. I followed David’s professional advice and he had several useful tips and suggestions to increase the value of the property. He also does the work to maximize value and he does the research to find the best and most cost effective ways to present your property in the best possible way. The results speak for themselves as my house sold in 4 days at more than 8% above list price. Everything that David anticipated came to fruition. I can’t thank him enough for all of his assistance. Do yourself a favor. Hire David Hatef and follow his advice. " - David C., Buyer & Seller ★★★★★ " I unreservedly and enthusiastically recommend David Hatef. From start to finish, David was responsive, knowledgeable, an expert deal maker and tireless in his attentive client service. David clearly took pride in providing a concierge level of service and treated our relationship as one that will last a lifetime. A small example is when I wanted to move power lines in the backyard of the house - not a small undertaking, David tirelessly pursued Pepco until he was able to connect with an engineer who could make it happen. His attention to detail and knowledge were game changing. If you are looking for the most capable agent to represent you, then David should be your first, and only, call. I am recommending David to my entire network! " - Buyer
title: Vice President

description: About Sheila I love real estate and I can't believe I have been in the business for over 25 years! Having started out as an agent in the suburbs of Chicago, I moved to DC 20 years ago and was thrilled to discover the many vibrant neighborhoods the District has to offer. As an agent, my favorite part of the job was finding a home that perfectly matched my client's personality and needs. I went on to open my own brokerage and until recently, ran one of the largest female-owned brokerages in the DMV. The experience of managing 45 agents was an incredible learning opportunity. I became involved in their sales and truly saw the good, the bad and the ugly of this business. My goal was to help them minimize any bad experience and create a seamless transaction for their clients. The knowledge I gained as a broker was invaluable. After 12 years I realized I was ready to return to my true love--helping buyers and sellers. I am so excited to work with my close friend and amazing business partner, Craig Cobine, as the other half of The Sheila and Craig Group. We share a rather obsessive need to provide the ultimate client experience!
title: Realtor®

description: About Ryan Ryan has lived in the Washington DC area since 2002 when he began attending Catholic University. The slower pace of the city compared with his hometown New York enticed him to stay in the area after graduation. Subsequently, he spent 15 years in the non-profit sector serving the people of Southeast DC, gaining intimate familiarity with some of DC’s most off-the-beaten-path neighborhoods and untold history. Ryan took his first foray into real estate in 2015, when he began purchasing rental properties in Baltimore. From there he expanded into managing rentals for other investors and family members in the area, until he was ultimately managing 19 units. He decided to switch gears, however, when he realized the day-to-day work of property management kept him from his first love - helping first time home buyers and new investors purchase homes. Now, with a solid clientele of both buyers and sellers, he has built a unique, relationship-focused strategy to help his clients win in competitive offer situations and sell their homes quickly and easily. Ryan is 100% client-focused, with an emphasis on fast and clear communication. He is always available for a free consultation, and happy to talk at length through any issues his clients are experiencing. Make sure to ask for a copy of his Complete Homebuyers’ Guide, which he wrote personally based on his clients’ experiences in the marketplace.
title: Realtor® | Licensed in DC and MD

description: About Trent Trent Heminger leads Trent & Co, one of the most successful teams in the DMV. He specializes in construction resales in DC, Bethesda, and close communities. Trent has been named one of "America’s Best Real Estate Agents” by Real Trends over ten years straight. Additionally, Washingtonian Magazine has named him as a "Top Producer Agent" the Washington Metro area time and time again. In 2021, Under Trent's leadership his team had $258+ million worth of sales and 332 transactions. Heminger began his career in the real estate industry in 2000. From 2003-2008, Trent worked as a sales manager at McWilliams|Ballard, Inc. This experience honed his professional expertise in the successful selling of large-scale condominium communities. As a result, Trent became one of the highest producing agents in the area and consistently closed upwards of 100 properties annually. In 2008, he moved to TTR Sotheby’s International Realty, where Trent’s business evolved as his clients’ lifestyles evolved, resulting in an increased number of single-family home sales, adding to his existing multi-family client base. Being recognized as part of the Top Team at TTR Sotheby’s in 2010 is a testament to his success and far-reaching business. In 2011, Trent helped start a new brokerage known as Beasley Real Estate. His business continued to grow throughout the 3 years his team was with Beasley. In October of 2015, he moved his team to Compass. Trent’s passion for the real estate business, together with his experience, work ethic, and follow-through, has earned him both a great deal of repeat business as well as respect among his colleagues in the industry. When Trent isn’t doing a walk-thru on a construction site consulting with developers, or helping his clients pick out new light fixtures and paint colors, he can be found driving his twin daughters all over the DMV as they conquer the world of basketball and dance!
title: Executive Vice President

description: About Ira With over 25 years of experience in the DMV real estate market, Ira Hersh is a name synonymous with exceptional service and results. As a lifelong resident, his deep roots and extensive network are a powerful advantage for his clients. He's not just a realtor; he's a trusted advisor who navigates every detail of your transaction with an unmatched level of care and ethical values. Ira's approach is simple: he puts your needs first. This commitment has made him a top producer, with a business built almost entirely on referrals from happy clients and colleagues. Whether you’re buying or selling, he leverages his sharp negotiating skills and deep industry connections—the same ones that helped him solve a complex trust issue for a deal he wasn't even on—to ensure your transaction is seamless. For Ira, success is measured by your satisfaction, and he is committed to building a relationship that lasts long after the closing.
title: Associate Broker

description: About Sylvia A native Belgian, Sylvia has lived in Mount Pleasant for over 20 years. Having moved from Brussels in 2003, she understands the emotional nuances of leaving one’s ancestral roots to embark on a new stage of life. To her, buying or selling a home is more than a transaction – it’s a journey. Sylvia is personable, honest, communicative, responsive, and patient, with an excellent eye for detail and design. Her holistic understanding of the DMV real estate market is unparalleled, and she’s known for going above and beyond for her clients. Before becoming a Realtor, Sylvia launched her own design firm, worked at the Belgian Embassy as a Visa Officer, organized events for Toyota Formula One, managed a hostel in Honduras, and traveled the world. She graduated from Vrije Universiteit Brussel and is fluent in English, Dutch, French, and Spanish. When she’s not working, you’ll find her exploring the District, walking in Rock Creek Park, or relaxing on the porch of her 109-year-old row home with her husband, three kids, and dog.
title: REALTOR®

description: About Andy Andy Hewitt is a full-time real estate agent licensed in Virginia, Washington D.C. and Maryland. Andy's authenticity, integrity and achiever-mentality have led to a loyal clientele that has helped her achieve status as a NVAR Platinum Producer (2021-2024), NOVA Real Producer Magazine Rising Star (2024), a Washingtonian Magazine Best Agent (2022-2024), Top 2% Agent in NoVa (2024), and a Northern VA Magazine Top Producer (2023). She ensures a smooth transaction by developing trusted relationships with not only her clients, but with her fellow agents, lenders, title experts, and skilled and reliable contractors. Andy became a successful agent after an eight-year career in creative marketing and business development. She is an empathetic, highly relational agent with a passion for educating and empowering her clients to maximize their investments. Her experience in residential real estate, marketing strategy, content creation, project management, event planning, and public relations makes her a force in the industry. Andy, her husband, Roy, and their two dogs reside in the charming and historic Del Ray, Alexandria, where her business is based.
title: REALTOR®

description: About Carrie Great to meet you!! Carrie Babbington Hillegass is a fourth-generation Washingtonian with a lifetime of experience working in every neighborhood across this great city and surrounding regions in Maryland and Virginia. Growing up, Carrie supported her mother’s real estate business, and learned at a young age that the hard work that goes into real estate is worth the reward: the joy realized when individuals, couples and families buy and sell their homes. Prior to her real estate career, Carrie worked for twenty-two years as a teacher and educator in some of the city’s leading public, private and public charter schools. She has witnessed firsthand the tremendous growth in Washington’s real estate market and explosive opportunities for investors and individuals. Her unique perspective on the evolution of this city, its neighborhoods, school systems, and politics enables Carrie to provide insights that few real estate agents can match. Year after year, Carrie is consistently recognized as one of Compass Real Estate’s Top Producers, with total sales exceeding $200M working with the #1 brokerage in the DMV market. As a wife, mother of three girls, and resident of D.C., Carrie is passionate about helping her clients navigate one of the most important decisions of their lives: buying and/or selling their homes. Carrie is pleased to be part of the Mollaan Babbington Group of Compass and is licensed in Washington, D.C., Maryland, and Virginia.
title: Mollaan Babbington Group | Senior Vice President

description: About Patricia Patricia is a lifelong resident of the Metro area, and she knows just the perfect neighborhoods that would fit your specific housing needs. She is licensed in MD, DC and VA and is a graduate of George Washington University with a Bachelor of Arts degree in Psychology. Coupled with the completion of her real estate coursework, she is well equipped to focus on you, whether you are purchasing a new home or selling your current home. Patricia listens to your needs and will work tirelessly on your behalf, whether it’s finding a serious buyer to purchase your home, utilizing an expert stager and a professional photographer to present your home at its best for a quick or assisting you in locating a new home that fits the lifestyle of you and your family. Being computer savvy and having excellent research skills, she utilizes the internet to match her buyers with their specific criteria in order to maximize their choices while minimizing the time needed to put you in that perfect home. Patricia is a leader, a listener and a results-oriented professional.
title: Realtor®

description: About Jamie Jamie Hilmi is truly passionate about providing exceptional, professional, and comprehensive real estate services to her valued clients. Through her genuine dedication to her clients seeking to acquire or sell properties within the charming communities of the DC Metro real estate market, Jamie specializes in Residential and Luxury Properties. As a member of The Mollaan Group and through her insightful counsel and extensive knowledge, Jamie excels at serving each client with exceptional first-class service and creating a fully engaging and personal experience. Jamie is passionate about real estate and exceedingly proficient at educating and creating value as she skillfully leverages each opportunity to the benefit of her clients. Highly experience in owning and operating a portfolio of investment properties; she is uniquely qualified to advise her clients on the critical issues involving their potential real estate investments. In having studied design at the University of Maryland and Fashion Institute of Technology in New York City, she has a deep understanding of aesthetic composition, construction, and value. She excels at helping her clients visualize a home’s potential by advising them on how to enhance the living space to meet their personal requirements. Through her advice and insightful vision on modifying the floor plan and/or adding additional key design elements; she is able to create additional value and equity through presenting cost-effective modifications or specific upgrades to the property. Whether it’s the joy of working with first time home buyers or helping a client understand the full scope of a renovation or stylishly appointing their residence; Jamie’s applied expertise and access to a full array of craftsmen is part of her full service that makes all the elements come perfectly together. Deeply valuing the special connection with her clients, Jamie constantly orchestrates the most rewarding real estate experience possible. Her immediate accessibility, answers to timely questions and trusted counsel makes her invaluable to her clients. Skillfully leveraging each opportunity to the benefit of her clients is all part of the design that allows Jamie to always orchestrate the most rewarding real estate experience possible. Contact Jamie to serve you and your personal real estate interests.
title: Mollaan Babbington Group | Realtor®

description: About Elizabeth Elizabeth has been recognized as a Washingtonian Magazine “Top Producer” since 2018 and has sold over $100M in real estate across the DC Metro area. As a full-time real estate agent licensed in Virginia, Maryland, and D.C., Elizabeth is committed to her clients. With an expertise in local markets as well as a keen understanding of the contract, she guides them through the buying and selling processes from first contact to final signature. Elizabeth is available for their needs at all times, and nothing makes her happier than providing hundred percent customer satisfaction. Elizabeth grew up in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania but has called Virginia home since 2011. After earning a degree in psychology from James Madison University, Elizabeth relocated to Arlington, where she lives today.
title: Licensed Real Estate Agent

description: About Hive Residential We thrive on the challenges of our daily work, offering innovative and out-of-the box solutions to make our clients’ real estate dreams come true. Purchasing and/or selling a home is usually the largest personal transaction an individual encounters in their lifetime. It can be filled with competition, stress, and anxiety - it doesn’t need to be that way. We manage the overwhelming nature of the process by listening to our clients’ needs, staying ahead of trends, understanding market dynamics, and leveraging our networks. There is no better feeling than when clients thank us after helping them acquire their dream home, or exceed expectations for the sale of their house. Every day is different, every sale is different, and we wouldn’t have it any other way.

About Leyla Leyla discovered her passion for entrepreneurship while co-owning a restaurant in downtown Washington, D.C. Her interest in real estate emerged during her time in the restaurant industry, where she and her husband began restoring and renovating older homes. This experience became a pivotal turning point, leading her to sell the restaurant and transition fully into real estate. In addition to property acquisition and sales, Leyla has hands-on experience staging homes, further strengthening her expertise and attention to detail. She is known for her personalized approach to working with both buyers and sellers, offering thoughtful, tailored solutions informed by her diverse background. Her commitment to understanding each client’s unique goals and delivering exceptional service sets her apart in a competitive market. Outside of her professional work, Leyla enjoys walking along Sligo Creek and ice skating with her two young children. For Leyla, real estate is more than a career—it is a passion. Her focus extends beyond transactions to creating meaningful connections between people and the spaces that support their lifestyles and aspirations.
title: Realtor® | Licensed in MD & DC

description: About Nicole Nicole Holland began her real estate career in the Washington DC metro area and eventually migrated to working in the Austin luxury real estate market. Her passion for connecting people and careful attention to her client's needs have catered to her ability to provide excellent service in every transaction. With strong language skills, Nicole is bilingual in English and Spanish, conversational in Portuguese and Korean, and dabbles in many other languages, which is a huge asset in the two multicultural markets of Austin and the DMV. Nicole’s clients value her work ethic and interpersonal skills. She understands how to patiently explain the real estate process to her clients and she is extremely adaptable. Through hard work and perseverance, she conquers everything she sets her mind to. Nicole resides in Austin with her husband, Jonathan. She is a passionate foodie and enjoys trying out new restaurants and takes pride in providing the best recommendations for her friends and clients. When she’s not working in real estate, she’s likely at a Pilates class or running the lake trails with friends.
title: Realtor® Licensed in DC, MD, TX & VA

description: About Ben Since 2003, Ben’s high client-retention and referral rates illustrate his successful partnerships — he quickly becomes a trusted advisor and advocate for his clients and their families; he genuinely wants people to do well. From working with first-time homebuyers, to buyers and sellers who are upsizing or downsizing, no two days, projects, properties or clients are alike, and that’s exactly what he loves about his job. A 25-year DC-metropolitan resident, Ben has personally bought, sold, renovated and rented scores of houses over the years, so all of his advice comes from first-hand experience. He is keenly aware of the emotions and difficult decisions involved in buying or selling a home, and he works overtime to ensure his clients feel genuinely listened to and taken care of. From the initial consultation to closing day and beyond, Ben stands by his clients’ sides, guiding them through the process and offering his considerable expertise along the way. A life-long musician, Ben began playing drums as a child and spent 15 years after college touring and traveling the world as part of a band. Being immersed in diverse cultures and environments equipped Ben with the ability to be highly adaptable and to communicate effectively; it also instilled him with a passion for meeting and helping other people. That’s why his transition into real estate felt more like a natural progression rather than a career change. Originally from Connecticut, Ben hails from a family with a history steeped in architecture and home building — it’s not only his surname that reflects his passion, it’s in his blood. When he’s not playing drums or performing live, he can likely be found enjoying the outdoors, specifically downhill skiing in the winter and fly fishing on the Potomac river whenever possible.
title: Associate Broker

description: About Home Keys Team Formed by DC natives Lukas Iraola and Phoenix Wright, the Home Keys Team of Compass prides itself on providing clients with local real estate expertise. The team’s knowledge of the District, Maryland, and Virginia is unparalleled. All team members are committed to upholding the highest standard of excellence from start to finish. Each transaction is personalized in order to exceed the needs and expectations of clients. The Home Keys Team’s success rests in its strong and enduring relationships rooted in communication and transparency. This foundation fosters trust with clients and communities well past the completion of the transaction. Engagement with and empowerment of individuals across the DC Metro Area embody the core values that fuel the team’s love for real estate.

About Craig &lt;br&gt; Craig joined the Genie & Ilia Team of Compass after a 30+ years in professional theater leadership in major cities across the country, including at the Historic Ford’s Theatre. For nearly two decades, Craig has lived in the heart of Adams Morgan in Washington, DC. He has owned, renovated, and/or managed multiple properties, including houses, cooperatives and rental properties, in the DC metro area and California. At Compass, Craig’s team uses tools to modernize both sides of the real estate experience—comparing properties, measuring marketing performance with sellers, and offering buyers exclusive access to listings. In his years of leadership in the theater field brokering relationships among artists and producers, Craig managed modest budget shows to multi-million dollar productions, keeping his eye on the big picture and the small details, and creating an atmosphere where all parties were able to produce their best work. Shifting from artist to owners & buyers, and from theaters to homes, the job is the same: to listen to your needs and meet your life goals, on your timeline and on your budget. After working with exceptional, high-profile artists including Julie Andrews, Maya Angelou, Renèe Fleming, James Earl Jones, and Trisha Yearwood, Craig will bring you the same level of care. &lt;br&gt;
title: Realtor® Licensed in DC

description: About Brad Brad brings to Compass over 15 years of real estate experience from the multifamily rental sector to single family real estate sales. He has worked with real estate partner, Patrick Chauvin, over 10 years earning numerous recognitions including Top 100 Teams in Real Estate the Wall Street Journal. Together they have both buyers and sellers in some of the largest real estate sales in DC. Brad brings not only strong organizational skills, customer service and knowledge of local markets, but his past experience in the multifamily sector included positions in finance and . In addition to representing Compass and his clients, Brad serves on the Board of House Realty Trust and is a devoted fan of all DC sports teams which shows, if nothing else, he is loyal and patient. A Loudoun County native, he currently resides in Arlington.
title: Real Estate Agent

description: About Sarah Sarah is a top producer and is in the top ½ of 1% of agents nationwide. She is licensed in DC, Maryland and Virginia, and has been in the real estate arena for over twenty years. The Washingtonian has recognized her as a top agent in 2016, 2017, 2018, 2019, 2020, 2021 and 2022. Sarah works with sellers, buyers and investors in Washington, DC, and surrounding suburbs. She sells homes of all sizes, price ranges and locations. Sarah is deeply committed to understanding each client’s needs and providing an excellent experience. Her integrity, attention to detail and ability to navigate complex transactions allows her to support her clients to achieve the results they want. She has a strong network of experienced loan officers, inspectors, contractors, and settlement lawyers. As a native Washingtonian, Sarah has a vast knowledge of the DC, Maryland and Virginia areas. She has sold homes in various parts of DC, and the local suburbs, including Berkley, Foxhall, Wesley Heights, Spring Valley, Glover Park, American University, Dupont Circle, Logan, Petworth, Shaw, Bethesda, Chevy Chase, Arlington and McLean. Whether her clients are moving down the block or from across the globe, Sarah’s market expertise and familiarity with the Metropolitan area helps land her clients their dream home.
title: Vice President, Realtor®
Realtor® Licensed in DC, MD & VA

description: About Ty Ty has been a top-producing agent in the DC metro market for more than 20 years. In addition, he worked in Los Angeles for several years where he was also recognized as a top-producer. Ty, along with his business partner Sheila Mooney, are consistently ranked in the top tier of real estate agents; their awards include Washingtonian's Best Agents 2015-2023, Washingtonian's Top Agents 2015-2023, among others. Plus, Ty and Sheila are THE top agents in the Woodley Park neighborhood. Honest, resolute and knowledgeable, Ty’s focus on customer service and up-to-the-minute market tracking have earned him a sterling reputation as one of the industry’s finest. Ty and Sheila are known for saving their clients’ valuable time thus resulting in an effortless experience. Ty has lived in several DC neighborhoods including Dupont Circle, U Street, Capitol Hill, and Adams Morgan. Being a resident in these areas provided him a comprehensive knowledge and an insider status in the neighborhoods he serves. He currently resides in the Kalorama neighborhood in Washington, DC with his husband, Jay and their 2 boys (of the Canine sort) - Willy and Frankie. Ty received his Bachelor of Fine Arts Degree, graduating with honors from The University of Michigan's famed Musical Theatre Program in Ann Arbor. He was fortunate to have worked professionally as an actor appearing in leading stage roles throughout the country. Further, he earned his Master’s Degree in Elementary Education from The George Washington University and taught third grade at Somerset Elementary School, Montgomery County MD. Hailing from a small town in Ohio, Ty is the youngest of 6 children and grew up in a blue-collar family where he nurtured the value of hard work – a key driver in his dedication to integrity and professionalism with his real estate clients. Ty is involved in many local charities including the Whitman Walker Clinic, Martha’s Table, and the SITAR Center for the Performing Arts.
title: Senior Vice President

description: About Beth After finishing college and moving to DC, Beth followed her passion for cooking as a chef for various restaurants and catering companies. She eventually started her own catering and became one of the top caterers in DC and was featured in the Washington Post food section and various other local and national publications. She sold her in 2006 and went into real estate as a "temporary" career while also teaching cooking. Several years later she realized her second passion was in real estate and development and she became a top producing agent in DC. Beth specializes in investors/developers, off-market sales, first time home buyers and move-up buyers/listers. Because she has lived in DC and owned various businesses here since the early '80s, she knows the city and surrounding areas better than most natives. She brings the business talents that she learned as an entrepreneur to every deal and has become a proven negotiator and closer. She feels her job is to be your advocate throughout the process and that the more you know and understand, the more power you have when buying or selling a home. Her goal is to provide you with that knowledge and with the resources to make the whole process transparent and less stressful. Beth leads her team, Domo, which is a group of agents with diverse experience and knowledge of the DC Metro area. Their goal is to always be available to meet their client's real estate needs and to have the combined knowledge and experience of a team to support those clients. They have been part of Washingtonian Platinum Top Producer teams for the past 4 years. When Beth is not immersed in real estate she spends her time working on renovation projects, boxing, traveling, hanging out in Rehoboth with her labradoodle and cooking for her friends. One of the bonuses of working with her is she has an endless supply of bridezilla stories!
title: Realtor®

description: About Kevin Kevin Hughes is a Realtor and Vice President at Compass, who is licensed in DC, MD, VA. He grew up in Maryland and graduated with honors from University of Maryland, College Park, with a B.S. in Marketing. Following college, Kevin lived in New York City for 7 years where he had a successful career in advertising. In these positions, Kevin was known for his strong communication skills, his impeccable attention to detail, and his outstanding ability to build long lasting client relationships. Kevin has had a lifelong passion for real estate and home design, and he decided to turn that passion into a career as a Realtor at Compass for the last 6+ years. Since then, he has helped 150+ people to buy and sell their homes across DC, Maryland, and Virginia and was named a "Top Agent" at Compass in 2019-2023 Kevin prides himself on helping his clients achieve their dreams—whether selling their house or helping them find the perfect new one! One of his greatest strengths is his tenacity to do right by his client -- he is an excellent communicator, strong negotiator, and is focused on making the process as stress free as possible for all of his clients. Kevin now calls the U-Street Corridor home, with frequent visits across Maryland to see his family. His latest endeavor has been renovating his house that was originally built in 1890! Kevin also loves to cook, try new restaurants, watch any and all reality TV, and of course spend time with his dog, Sophia!
title: Real Estate Advisor

description: About Edward Edward was born in Annapolis, Maryland and spent time traveling between Odenton and Annapolis while attending Arundel High School. He has many fond memories of hopping on the New Carrolton Metro, riding in to watch Nats games, visiting museums, and going to restaurants. Edward played football at Monmouth University and graduated with a degree in psychology with a minor in biology. After college, he came back to D.C. and fell in love with the field of education. As an alumnus of City Year and Teach For America, Edward taught in D.C. schools for seven years and received his Master’s of Science in Education from Johns Hopkins University. Edward fell in love with real estate when he and his fiancee' bought their condo with the Just BE team. He enjoyed the process so much that he decided he also wanted to become an agent! After living and working in D.C. for so long it has truly become his home. Edward brings his background of education and teamwork to Just BE to ensure that his clients learn everything they need to find the perfect place where they can truly Just BE.
title: Realtor®

description: About Katri For DC-based agent Katri Hunter, real estate is all about transforming what’s normally an intimidating process into one that’s approachable — and rewarding — for every client. Pairing compassionate customer service with a mastery of transaction management, Katri has made it her mission to find the right solution for buyers and sellers at every price point and phase of life. Katri was raised in Northern California and the UK. After receiving her undergraduate degree from the University of Vermont, Katri moved to DC to get her Masters in Forensic Science at George Washington University. While applying her degree to a career in Computer Forensics, she bought her first property with the guidance of an agent-turned-friend who noticed Katri’s knack for the business and encouraged her to pursue a real estate career of her own. Never one to waste valuable time, Katri got her license in DC, MD and VA and never looked back. Today, Katri is a dedicated agent and the trusted advisor you can always turn to. Recognizing just how momentous a decision it is to buy or sell, Katri is as detail-oriented as she is driven. She takes pride in managing every aspect of the transaction for her clients — from corresponding with lenders to presenting competitive offers to negotiating the optimal outcome. Whether you’re a first-time buyer or a seasoned seller, Katri will get to know you, recognize your goals, and design a personalized experience centered exclusively on your terms. Her unrivaled local knowledge encompasses a distinct understanding of the many DMV neighborhoods where she’s lived over the years — including Alexandria, Bethesda, Capitol Hill, and Logan Circle (to name just a few). Regional expertise aside, she’s also the proud owner of multiple rental properties, making her uniquely positioned to counsel landlords on the complexities of DMV tenant law. Over the years, Katri’s penchant for people and industry knowledge have produced a lifetime sales volume of over $340M, but at the end of the day, it’s the milestones she helps her clients reach that matter most. When she’s not going above and beyond for her clients, you can find Katri riding horses competitively, traveling on a new adventure, playing with her pitbull, and spending time with her husband. In 2015, Katri donated her kidney to a friend. She has since been actively involved in the National Kidney Foundation as a member of their board and an advocate for living donors ever since.
title: Executive Vice President

description: About Katie Katie Hunter, Your Northern Virginia and DC Real Estate Expert. Whether you are thinking of selling or buying, Katie is your expert resource for residential real estate in Northern Virginia, and DC. Katie is a seasoned Realtor and consistently ranks as a top producer in the DC Metro area. You can count on detailed market knowledge and strong negotiation skills to help you accomplish your real estate goals. Serving people and guiding clients through the buying and selling process is something she is passionate about. Whether people are looking to buy the ideal match for their budget and family’s needs or want to sell their longtime residence for the highest return, Katie prides herself on leaving nothing to chance. Throughout the process Katie works side by side with each client, giving them the attention and personalized service they want and deserve to eliminate guesswork and maximize results. Katie lives in Vienna with her husband, Nic, and two sons Miles and Matthew. They have a sweet goldendoodle, Molly and Aussiedoodle Ellie. She loves to check out local breweries with friends and family, play tennis, ride her Peloton, and spend time in the Outer Banks at the beach. If a move is in your near future, you owe it to yourself to work with a trusted confidant and consummate professional that you can count on. When you combine resourcefulness, drive, and dedications It All Adds Up to Your Success. Call Katie Hunter today for a free consultation and put the expertise and experience to work for you.
title: Realtor®

description: About Hunter | Davila Residential Hunter Davila Residential is a professional real estate team based in Washington, DC. With extensive market expertise, we assist buyers and sellers with their real estate needs. Our personalized approach, backed by trust and open communication, ensures clients receive exceptional service and achieve their goals in the dynamic DC market. At Hunter Davila Residential, we are dedicated to transforming your real estate dreams into reality through our expertise, integrity, and personalized care. We aim to build meaningful connections with our clients, guiding them through every step of their real estate journey with unwavering trust and transparency. Our motto is clear: Your home, your happiness, and our dedication to you.

About Henderson Buying or selling a home is much more than just a simple transaction of sorts, especially when relocating to area. If you are eager to connect with an agent who works with a local network of trusted lenders, title companies, and vendors alike, then Henderson Hunter III is the realtor for you. 15+ years of post-Sewanee, real-world experience rooted in legal contract management and direct customer sales, have supplied Henderson with the foundation to successfully guide his buyers and sellers through the fast-paced Washington, D.C. real estate market of today. Rest assured, that smile is no coincidence. Helping people upgrade their address, and enter a fresh, new chapter in their lives is why Henderson is thrilled to have you as his newest “forever” client!
title: Realtor®

description: About Stefanie Stefanie’s unique portfolio ranges in sales from $185K-$4M allowing her to provide clients with guidance from a professional point of view from all angles. Her expertise, drive, and constant commitment to staying educated on current market trends is key to helping her clients strategize and create value – whether they are buying or selling, and no matter what kind of market we are experiencing. Providing clients with a seamless experience while on their journey to fulfill their real estate goals is Stefanie’s top priority. If you are looking for an agent who knows how to get the job done, all while having a little fun along the way, Stefanie is your girl! During her free time, Stefanie loves spending time with her husband Kyle, baby girl Reese, puppy Bo, friends, and family. She enjoys wine tasting, cooking, traveling, and staying active (but also lounging on the couch on a rainy day). Stefanie is licensed in Virginia, Maryland, and DC and a certified Military Relocation Professional (MRP). Client Testimonials ★★★★★ "Stefanie is one of the most effective, kind, and dedicated professionals I’ve ever worked with. We were juggling a lot when we bought our home and we’re first time home buyers, but Stefanie made the process of looking and buying easy. What is more, I’ve often heard that realtors need to be pushy in “this type of market” but Stefanie never felt pushy yet super effective. We had a home within about a month of looking and a true teammate in Stefanie. Also, home buying is more than just your realtor, it’s also who they know. Stefanie has a expansive, awesome network of home inspectors, mortgage brokers, etc. She always “knew a person” and they were always kind, responsive, and professional. Needless to say I HIGHLY recommend Stefanie. She’s the best!" - Matthew L. ★★★★★ "Stefanie was amazing throughout our home buying experience. As a first time home buyer, I would not have been able to navigate the market without Stefanie's guidance and expertise. Stefanie was with us every step of the way and was always available to answer any questions we had. Highly recommend!!" - Chris B. ★★★★★ "Stef is the best!! She is the only realtor we trust with our real estate needs. This is our 3rd transaction in 3 years. Works hard…always available…delivers extraordinary results. Highly recommend her!!" - Jim B. ★★★★★ Stefanie was incredible! She was aggressive without being pushy. I truly felt like I was the priority. She looked for what I wanted and not what she thought was best for me. She was extremely responsive, upfront, and realistic. I never felt strung along or ignored. She continued to stay in contavt months after closing to see how we were settling in. I have already recommended her. I hope they are wise enough to use her! Keep doing what you you do Stefanie!" - Trina R. ★★★★★ "Stefanie was the best. She came out and met us at our home and went over all the selling information and answered all of our questions. Once the house was listed, she worked extremely hard to get it sold for us. We listed close to the holidays which was a difficult time to sell, however, due to her hard work and advertising we had steady foot traffic the whole time. She communicated almost daily with updates and progress. She was so responsive throughout this process including weekends and nights. She is so professional and knowledgeable to this process. You will not be disappointed if you use her as your realtor." - Randy N.
title: Realtor®

description: About Carolyn Carolyn Hurwitz is not just a real estate agent; she's a seasoned professional with an unwavering commitment to serving the diverse real estate needs of Maryland, Virginia, and Washington, DC. Since making the area her home in 1992, Carolyn has immersed herself in the local real estate market, building a reputation as a trusted advisor and expert negotiator. What sets Carolyn apart is her genuine love for working with people and her passion for solving problems. She thrives on the art of negotiation, always advocating fiercely for her clients' best interests. Carolyn's dedication to her craft is matched only by her deep appreciation for the area. From the abundance of cultural experiences to the vibrant culinary scene and the excitement of the sports teams, she never tires of her love of the region. With an illustrious career spanning over three decades, Carolyn has consistently raised the bar, earning the prestigious Top Individual Agent Award for an unprecedented six consecutive years from 2018 to 2023. Her unparalleled market knowledge and local expertise have cemented her status as a go-to real estate professional in the region. Beyond her professional achievements, Carolyn finds joy in the simple pleasures of life.
