When she's not navigating the real estate landscape, you can find her indulging in her love for theater, concerts, travel, and honing her culinary skills. Family holds a special place in her heart, as she cherishes her enduring marriage since 1986 and the delightful company of her two children, Harper and Carson, alongside their beloved Cavalier King Charles pups, Archie and Lola. Carolyn's unwavering dedication to her clients and her genuine passion for real estate make her the perfect choice for anyone seeking a trusted advisor in their real estate journey. Whether buying or selling, Carolyn's commitment to excellence ensures that her clients' needs are not just met, but exceeded.
title: Realtor®

description: About Elsa Elsa moved to Capitol Hill from New York City in 2007, and swiftly became engaged with the neighborhood and community. She now specializes in real estate on the Hill and its surrounding neighborhoods. She is very proud of her client testimonials , where clients consistently call out her knowledge, resourcefulness, and friendliness. She enjoys getting to know people and diligently helping them find the perfect home to love. Helping sellers present their homes and negotiating on their behalf is another aspect of the business she finds energizing and interesting. She prides herself on her comprehensive problem-solving skills, keeping the temperature down on high stakes transactions while getting buyers and sellers to the table on time and in good humor. Elsa serves her community on the board of Celebrate Capitol Hill, the non-profit arm of CHAMPS, the Hill’s Chamber of Commerce. She also participates in local political and civic fundraising efforts. She lives north of Lincoln Park with her husband, Sam, and two kids, students at Basis DC and Maury Elementary. Elsa started working in real estate in 2012. Previously she was director of communications at a national non-profit focused on preserving national historical collections, worked in sponsorship and event planning for the Tribeca Film Festival, and was a household manager for a philanthropist and art collector in New York. She graduated from St. John’s College in Annapolis, Maryland, in 1996. View Elsa's Website

About Maya If you don’t think real estate can change the world, you’ve never met Maya Hyman. Maya made the switch to real estate after spending many years in the corporate and non-profit worlds. During her time in those roles, she honed the skills she would use throughout her career: listening to others to understand their needs, advocating those needs, and developing realistic strategies to effectively meet goals and timelines. When she applied those skills in real estate, she ended up finding her true calling: helping to promote positive change in the lives of others, starting with finding them the right home. Rather than fixate on a single transaction (Buy! Sell!), Maya focuses on the long-term, positive life changes that occur when someone is in a home that suits their personality and lifestyle, a place where they find peace and comfort every time they open the front door. Maya loves helping her clients make decisions that will positively impact their lives and believes that being in the right home serves as a catalyst for all good things in life. It’s this mindset that informs every interaction Maya has with her clients, who appreciate the personal attention she lavishes upon them and praise her ability to understand what they are looking for long before they realize it themselves. Maya’s extensive experience advocating for others guarantees that her clients have someone in their corner and acting in their best interests at all times. Maya is more than a just seasoned professional. She is a trustworthy advisor and friend who is on a mission to make people happy in their homes—now and for years to come. My Website
title: Realtor® Licensed in DC & MD

description: About Daniel Daniel Hynes is an NYU graduate and D.C. native who has spent the last 32 years specializing in the changing real estate market. His knowledge and professionalism led him to over 400 million in sales over his vast career and continue to guide him through the ever-evolving real estate market. Daniel knows the history, he knows the value, and he certainly knows the future trends that are taking shape. Daniel is an expert in a vast array of property transactions ranging from residential sales to large scale developments and new home development. He holds himself and his team to the highest ethical and professional standards and always goes above and beyond with all of his business endeavors. After joining the Compass team as a Vice President, Daniel and Andrew Riguzzi proudly launched their newest endeavor, District Property Group. The goal of District Property Group is simple and direct: we use the latest technology and proven real estate expertise to deliver our clients the best results. Given their proven record and unparalleled knowledge, along with the team's tireless customer-centric dedication to service, Daniel Hynes of District Property Group should be your first call for any and all real estate needs.
title: Vice President

description: About Mary Mary Illes is here to help you. “I want my clients to be overjoyed, not overwhelmed, when buying or selling a home,” she says. “And I’m dedicated to making that happen.” Known for her authentic and cheerful nature, as well as her kindness and discretion, Mary is also a skilled communicator, a loyal and compassionate client advocate and a fierce, high-stakes negotiator. “I love getting out there, being with people, and helping them get the home they want,” she says. “I have a fire in my belly every morning when I wake up, and I am ready to go!” She developed and honed that fire during two decades in the tech industry, followed by more than ten years in real estate. Both experiences provided her with an expertise in getting things done in the most challenging of environments and delicate of circumstances. For Mary, the smallest of details matter, as does matching her approach to the comfort level of each client. “Everyone prefers different methods of communication,” she says. “Some are fast and furious, and others like to get things in small doses. I am happy to accommodate.” But her true specialty—and passion—is helping people transition from one phase of life to the next. Whether that means assisting first-time homeowners find their starter house, locating a vacation home for new empty nesters, or aiding seniors by navigating and facilitating their downsizing. Mary quickly becomes a trusted advisor to her clients while using her depth of knowledge and experience to ease anxiety and decrease emotional distress. In addition, Mary is in the process of obtaining a certification as a Certified Senior Housing Specialist (CSHP), so she can guide seniors along the often-difficult path of downsizing their homes and their lives. “Many people become overwhelmed when even thinking about downsizing,” says Mary. “There are a lot of moving parts, and I can help organize, streamline and get things done. I can also just help get the process started. Sometimes that’s all someone needs.” Collaborating with her fully vetted team of service providers (including: plumbers, painters, contractors, organizers, move managers, estate attorneys, etc.), Mary works overtime to find the best, and most comfortable, process for each client, and walks them through every step. Her goal, she says, is simple: “I want to make people’s lives easier and better.” When she’s not working, Mary loves to travel, cook, go on long walks with her dog, Finn, and spend time with her two grandchildren. She also loves being on the water and recently joined a women’s crew team and took up rowing. She currently lives and works in Annapolis, MD, but spends half her time in DC where she maintains a thriving and robust business in the DMV – sometimes finding properties for clients in both locales.
title: Associate Broker

description: About Alinda . Social Media Instagram Facebook LinkedIn Alinda's Concierge Page Client Testimonials Scroll down for more ★★★★★ "Alinda is an excellent realtor, I would highly recommend her. She is patient, professional and extremely knowledgeable in all aspects of buying a new home. I have purchased a couple of homes with Alinda's assistance and have always felt extremely satisfied with her guidance." - Bought a Condo home in 2020 in North Bethesda, MD ★★★★★ "Alinda helped me navigate through rental issues when searching for units in Prince Georges County. She offers many years of experience in which I feel assured I'm getting a worthwhile input and has simply been a pleasure to work with." - Showed home in 2019 in Downtown, Silver Spring, MD 20910 ★★★★★ "Alinda amazes me every time we tour properties with her ability to point out distinct features and quality craftsmanship. She shows property rain or shine and has been incredibly patient with a first-time home buyer who has with distinct taste and needs in a home. She’s personable, relatable, and joyful to work with. I highly recommend her to represent any buyer looking in the DMV." - Showed home in 2019 in Silver Spring, MD ★★★★★ "Great service, integrity and knowledge. Excellent knowledge of the neighborhood and schools. Highlights pros and cons of properties and offers helpful suggestions. Highly recommend especially to those who are first time buyers." - Showed home in 2018 in Somerset, Chevy Chase, MD 20815 ★★★★★ "Alinda is absolutely the best, most sincere, and cunning realtor I’ve met. She listens to what you’re looking for and then finds it. When your dream home is found, she closes that deal. In the DMV market that we have today where people are paying well over asking, she is a shark at negotiations. I think highly of her skills and it’s worth noting she’s a great person as well. I would suggest her and the team at Carmen Fontecilla to anyone looking for a realtor with true follow through. " - Bought a Condo home in 2018 in Hyattsville, MD Alinda Durand Iman brings nearly two decades of diverse experience to her real estate practice. Her mission is to make the process of buying and selling real estate as stress-free as possible for her clients. With extensive knowledge of emerging market conditions, evolving regulatory requirements, and local community trends, Alinda ensures her clients make informed decisions about their real estate investments. Her approach is built on trust, honesty, and integrity—the cornerstones of her success. Alinda holds both a bachelor’s and a master’s degree in Chemical Engineering and Engineering Management from the Catholic University of America in Washington, D.C. Her background has honed her communication, strategic planning, and teamwork skills, all of which she applies in real estate to develop customized plans for her clients and achieve win-win outcomes in every transaction. Her ability to anticipate and resolve issues ensures smooth transactions from start to finish. A resident of the Chevy Chase area for the past 38 years, Alinda lives with her husband, an aerospace engineer, and their three sons. When she’s not immersed in real estate, she enjoys honing her culinary and baking skills, walking the family dog, reading, cycling, and hiking in Rock Creek National Park. A passionate cyclist, Alinda completed her first century ride (100 miles) in 2010 and participated in the Civil War Metric Century in 2011. On sunny, brisk days, you may find her riding through Rock Creek Park.
title: Licensed in DC/MD/VA

description: About Yannick Specializing in residential real estate in the Maryland/District of Columbia and Virginia areas for over ten years, Yannick primarily works with first-time home buyers, investors and new construction properties. He earned a degree in Information Technology, and has perfected the art of customer service with over a decade of experience in the hospitality industry. The successful purchase, or rental, of your residence is Yannick's priority, and no one will work harder for you. His mission is to make the real estate process a seamless and rewarding one, by listening to your needs, arming you with information and helping you assess your options to assure the best outcome. His clients find him to be extremely personable, patient, prompt & diligent with follow-up. Most importantly, Yannick's clients appreciate his trustworthiness and commitment to ensuring guidance through major lifestyle and investment decisions. Originally from the beautiful Caribbean island of Saint Lucia, Yannick has called Maryland home since his early teenage years. He is based in Montgomery County where he resides with his beautiful wife, Emily, and two wonderful children, Lillian and Theodore.
title: Realtor®

description: About Infinity Group - DC Throughout this process, we will be your TRUSTED ADVISORS, your PRACTICED NEGOTIATORS, your SKILLED HOUSE-HUNTERS and your NEIGHBORHOOD EXPERTS. Whether you are buying, selling, or just looking, we will diligently work with you every step of the way. ABOUT JANICE | Janice has lived in Washington, DC for over 23 years and has been a Georgetown homeowner for 15 years. She spent much of her childhood traveling the world as the daughter of a military family with Panamanian roots. Her love of travel, languages and culture remained with her throughout her life and inspired her to obtain a bachelor’s degree in international finance and a master’s degree in Latin American Studies. She worked on wall street for several years in institutional sales, and traded equities with some of the largest mutual and hedge funds in Spain, Germany, Switzerland, Belgium, and Saudi Arabia. This past experience has easily translated to real estate, where partnering with clients and negotiating properly on their behalf is essential to every transaction. She believes strongly in education and now partners with her real estate clients to expand their knowledge of the housing market, while she strives to understand and meet their unique real estate needs. Janice has found that her clients appreciate this and find it helpful to the process of buying and selling a home. In addition to her role as your agent, she is a trusted resource and prides herself on promoting growth and development within the community. As a result, her relationships with her clients continue long after buying or selling their home. Janice is a wife and a mother of two daughters, enjoys traveling with her family and writing. She is fluent in Spanish and proficient in French.

About Lukas Lukas is one of the principal agents of the Home Keys Team of Compass. Lukas, who currently resides in DC, grew up in downtown Silver Spring and attended school in Bethesda. He prides himself on being a local expert having lived and worked in the area his whole life. With over 200 lifetime sales, mostly in the investment / development space, Lukas now partners with developers and syndicates deals. Lukas also owns a local landscaping company, Home Keys Landscaping. He purchased this business at the start of 2023. Since then, he has doubled the size of the company the past two years. The business has grown from 8 employees and ~130 maintenance contracts to 27 employees and ~350 maintenance contracts. Committed to the community he serves, Lukas strongly believes in supporting and contributing to local and national nonprofits. In 2013 he helped organize a cross-country bike trip from DC to San Francisco. He and his friends raised over $20,000 for the Alzheimer's Association along the way. Since 2020, Lukas and his real estate team have donated over $10,000 to the Alzheimer's Association National Capital Area Chapter. In 2019, Lukas ran in the NYC Marathon and raised over $2,500 for AKTIV Against Cancer. As a real estate agent, Lukas continues the tradition of giving. One hundred dollars from each of his sales are donated to the Alzheimer's Association, Breadcoin, or a charity of his client's choice.
title: Realtor® Principal | Home Keys Team

description: About Mikel Certified yoga teacher and full time Realtor. Serving Real Estate clients in the Washington DC, Maryland, and Virginia Real Estate markets. Providing a level of service that is unmatched; with regard to my work ethic, focus, knowledge, and integrity. I'm a people person-- and I also happen to sell houses. Namaste
title: Realtor® | Licensed in DC & MD

description: About Susan Agency. Advocacy. Authenticity. It's my privilege to guide home buyers and sellers through some of the largest transactions of their lifetimes. For me, 'agency' is synonymous with 'advocacy.' My clients' best interests are always top-of-mind throughout the entire transaction cycle, with the goal of assuring informed decisions and avoiding potential downsides. Because each of you is unique, there's no 'one size fits all' approach in real estate. That's why I combine personalized strategies with a trove of knowledge and experience, d elivering solutions that align with your particular goals and aspirations. Successfully navigating one of the nation's most complex and sophisticated markets means getting the details right. So let's begin our real estate relationship with a personalized consultation in order to establish a mutual understanding of your wants and needs. Building on that foundation, we'll explore the market, discuss the tools and strategies available to achieve your goals, then create and execute our plan for success! Your transaction is not a 'one and done.' I provide ongoing support as you navigate various life stages and goals. Whether it's upsizing, downsizing, investing, or adapting to changing circumstances, I remain your partner in aligning real estate strategies with your evolving needs and aspirations. Professionally, I look for logic + upside in every situation, am a little obsessive about market conditions & data (just check my DC market webpage!), a 'consumer real estate coach' for buyers-sellers-investors, someone who thinks renovation and home improvement are fun, and a bit of a pricing savant (she said modestly). DC & NVA are my locations. You'll find me in Georgetown, West End, Dupont Circle, Logan Circle, Wesley Heights, Burleith, Woodley Park, Eastern Market, The Wharf and Navy Yard in Washington DC. In Virginia; Old Town, Taylor Run, Del Ray, Rosemont and Westover in Alexandria, VA., and Arlington too! Request information on off-market properties. See my 5 Star Reviews on Zillow Get market updates on my DC Market page Read about my real estate practice on my About page
title: Realtor®

description: About Asma Asma has a Bachelor's degree in Information Technology and Network Security. She has worked in IT, and has more than 18 years experience in Property management & Real Estate. In addition to her native Turkmen language, Asma is fluent in English, Arabic, and Kurdish. Asma is also a seasoned event designer and has been professionally trained in floral design. Asma brings passion, dedication, hard work, integrity, and commitment to everything she does. She will be relentless in helping you find your forever home. Raised in Harrisonburg, VA, Asma moved to NOVA nearly thirteen years ago and currently resides near Dulles Airport. As a young professional, she explored and learned to love all that Northern VA has to offer. As a new move she has chosen Loudoun county to plant her family’s roots. Asma’s love and energy for the real estate industry began as a child through a variety of moves in her early childhood, the building of a custom home, and selling/purchasing two homes as a young adult. This passion has grown exponentially while working in the real estate field. Asma enjoys spending time with family and friends, exploring nature, trying different types of food, hiking, and traveling abroad with her husband. Asma can’t wait to help families such as her own find the home of their dreams.
title: REALTOR®

description: About Chris As a former educator and scientist, Chris knows firsthand the rewards of helping people achieve personal growth and success. He excels at research and problem-solving. His career in real estate blends these professional skills with his appreciation for aesthetics and design. Chris understands buying and selling real estate can be stressful. Should you choose Chris as your real estate agent, he’ll work diligently to guide you through the process, minimizing stress and confusion. He will accomplish this by being accessible and patient, providing clear and consistent communication, and supporting you throughout the process. Whether you’re buying or selling, Chris will be by your side to ensure a smooth and successful outcome.
title: REALTOR®

description: About James Wu Team - MD Buying and selling a home is an emotional investment, the team strives to be a trusted advisor as they guide their clients through the process with ease, insight, and compassion. The James Wu Team is one of the top producing teams in the DMV area. They are an experienced, innovative and smart group of people licensed in Maryland , Virginia and DC with years of combined experience and have helped hundreds of clients who've become family and friends. It’s important to bring a diversity of experiences from working with local and foreign clients, various local contractors/builders to senior communities. To cater to a plan that is customized to different individuals to achieve the maximum result. They emphasize working closely with their clients providing services in detail to sell or purchase properties throughout the region. The team operates with a mission in caring for the community they work with, leveraging each member's strengths; sales, services, administration, and marketing.

About Susan As a native Washingtonian and seasoned real estate professional, I always strive to exceed my clients’ expectations. I recognize and value the trust they place in me. I was the #1 Realtor in my office for the majority of the 31 years I was affiliated with a different firm. Now I can offer my clients the same committed service along with the power of Compass. My sales consistently have ranked in the top 1% nationwide. I grew up on Yuma Street and attended Janney, St. Ann's School, and Immaculata Preparatory School at Tenley Circle. I fondly remember whiling away afternoons at Friendship Playground (Turtle Park) playing basketball and other sports. After college in Boston and graduate studies in France and Spain, I returned to Washington, DC and began my professional career. I started as an Interpreter for the United States Department of Commerce assisting Customs and Immigration officials at Dulles International Airport. Subsequently, I was a Personnel Officer at the International Monetary Fund. I resigned in order to spend time at home with my firstborn. I launched my real estate career because of my interest in interior design, architecture, and helping people achieve their housing dreams. It has been an honor to serve so many friends and neighbors from Potomac to Georgetown to Capitol Hill, with a focus on Upper Northwest DC,Bethesda, and Chevy Chase. My business has grown successfully and consistently thanks to the repeat calls from happy clients and theirreferrals to family, friends, and neighbors. It is truly an honor when clients come back to me, sometimes years later, because of their positive real estate experiences. Outside of real estate, I take pride in giving back to the community—schools, Turtle Park, Community Council for the Homeless, and various charities. And I still love basketball!
title: Realtor®

description: About Jay Barry Group Motivated a desire to deliver premium service and an educational approach to real estate, the Jay Barry Group is an elite team of experts ready to make your goals a reality. Balancing determination and tenacity with patience and a fun-loving attitude, team members Jay Barry, Kelly Kelley and James Brooker, specialize in listening to clients and creating a supportive, collaborative environment for success. They have a flair for analyzing market insights and trends, and they're known for pricing listings appropriately and evaluating opportunities for value. Authentic and realistic, they are passionate about counseling their clients through each step of the process. Their long track record of success has also earned them a remarkable network of satisfied clients, respected peers and the requisite professionals — from mortgage and attorneys to designers and — who make closing a deal and creating a dream home effortless. As devoted members of the community, Jay, Kelly and James are also in-the-know resources for everything from restaurant recommendations to volunteer opportunities. The Jay Barry Group specializes in working with clients moving across town or across the country, from first timers to seasoned investors, throughout the District of Columbia, Northern Virginia and Maryland.

About Eliot Hubbell Eliot Jeffers is a seasoned professional in the real estate industry, bringing a unique blend of integrity, care, and expertise to her clients. Her passion for real estate was sparked at an early age when she accompanied her father on listing appointments in Hudson Valley, NY. With almost a decade of experience as a licensed Realtor and a proud mother of twin daughters, Eliot specializes in guiding families through seamless transitions into their new homes. As a Partner Agent with the Wydler Brothers, one of the leading Compass teams in the nation, Eliot collaborates closely with Hans Wydler, leveraging their combined expertise to provide exceptional service to their clients. Based in Chevy Chase, she possesses an in-depth understanding of the local market and is energized by the ongoing development of the area and its surrounding neighborhoods. Eliot majored in Journalism at Ohio Wesleyan University and began her career at the Chicago Tribune. This background enhances her ability to communicate effectively with clients, ensuring their needs are not only heard but also met with professionalism and care. Outside of the office, Eliot treasures spending quality time with her family and loves sharing the cultural treasures of the Washington, DC area with her husband and daughters.
title: Realtor® Licensed in DC & MD

description: About Nicole Nicole is a 4th generation native Washingtonian who is passionate about the growth and development of a community so deeply ingrained in her roots. Her in-depth knowledge of the area comes from growing up in Bethesda and residing in various neighborhoods in the District for the last 30 years. Prior to joining Compass, Nicole worked for decades in hospitality at some of DC’s finest restaurants. She brings an exemplary level of service to each of her clients, taking the time to discern the varying priorities and needs of each. Her degree in Business and Marketing at George Mason University gives Nicole a deep understanding of the current market and the most up to date channels in which to list your home. Nicole resides in Glover Park, with her husband and young son. She enjoys photography, staying abreast of all the latest restaurant openings, and being an active member of her community.
title: Realtor®

description: About Jenn Smira and Co Ranked among the top 50 large real estate teams in America by the WSJ, The Jenn Smira Team brings over 50 years of combined industry experience to each transaction. Together, Jenn and her team seamlessly merge savvy negotiating skills, astute diplomacy, and five-star service that’s unrivaled in the industry. A one-stop shop for all your real estate needs, Jenn's team offers an impressive range of in-house expertise — from marketing and PR prowess to staging and listing guidance. Together, the team is every client's advocate, working tirelessly until each has found the best home or sold for the highest price. A founding agent team at Compass DC who ranked #1 there in 2019, 2020 & 2022, Jenn's group is known throughout the DMV as one of the top real estate teams in the region, widely recognized for their industry knowledge, local insight, and an unyielding dedication to their clients above all. As the team’s fearless leader, Jenn has assembled a team of proven professionals who reflect the diversity of the areas they serve, and who are united by the same drive to succeed that guides Jenn in all she does. Revered as one of the most trusted names in DC real estate, Jenn’s team partners with clients from all different industries and walks of life — including professional coaches, restaurateurs, journalists, entrepreneurs, and architects, to name just a few. Fittingly, the team has also established a vast local presence that spans the entire DMV area, which explains why they are ranked among the top 10 in no less than eight different zip codes throughout the region. Whether you’re a first-time buyer searching for your urban escape or a seasoned seller relocating to the suburbs, the team’s mission is to help everyone find their place in the world. It’s no surprise, then, that their business is 80% referral-based, or that they’ve been named the 41st highest-producing large team in the country for 2023 by The Wall Street Journal. Through a unique blend of local insight and unparalleled market knowledge, The Jenn Smira Team is redefining the real estate process in DC. And the best part? The results speak for themselves; in 2021 alone, they notched $281 million in sales and have been awarded Washingtonian's Best Agent Platinum Award for 7 years running. Beyond their far-reaching success in the industry, the team is passionate about giving back to the communities they call home. Jenn herself is a previous board member of the DCAR Public Policy Committee, and the team as a whole focuses on making the world around them a better place every chance they get. Visit www.JennSmira.com today for more information about the team’s top producing agents and to learn how they can help bring your real estate goals to life.

About Aaron With over 19 years of experience in real estate sales, finance, management, and development, Aaron is recognized for his comprehensive knowledge of the industry and of the Washington area marketplace. Born and raised in the area, and a graduate of The University of Maryland, Aaron has a loyal client base within the region, ranging from first-time homebuyers to local . He's personable, yet diligent style and unwavering commitment to superior service have earned him high regards from buyers and sellers alike. Aaron currently resides in Potomac with his wife Danielle and their daughters Jordyn and Ella. He is licensed in MD, DC, and VA and specializes in the areas of Southern Montgomery County, Northwest Washington, and Northern Virginia.
title: Realtor®

description: About Jeweler Burton Group The Jeweler Burton Group is led by two top-producing veteran agents within the DC Metro Area, Aaron Jeweler, and JT Burton. The foundation for developing the group was straightforward, fundamentally reimagine their roles as agents to more accurately reflect the needs of today's savvy home buyer or seller. By harnessing the best practices they developed over their careers, Aaron and JT have developed a service model that focuses on creating a completely transparent client experience, offers a more comprehensive level of data-driven consultation and advice, and is focused on developing an actionable plan to help every client to achieve their real estate goals. There are no magic wands in real estate; exceptional outcomes result from a strong partnership between a diligent agent and an informed and educated client. The Jeweler Burton Group would love the opportunity to be your trusted partner through the process.

About JH Fine Homes Jennifer Halm and Jennifer Hyatt, known as JH Fine Homes, have over 35 years of combined real estate experience in the Northern VA and Washington DC area. Real estate (while not rocket science) can be complicated and notoriously stressful; we’ve all experienced some form of this either ourselves or by proxy. We’re here to shift that narrative by doing the heavy lifting for you with hopefully a little fun and a few laughs along the way. With a focus primarily on the luxury market in our area, we aim to provide a curated, personal experience that stands above the rest. We are committed to delivering the most value possible with an intentional and strategic process, so that your transition is seamless. We’ve served hundreds of happy clients, receiving numerous awards as top realtors from notable publications such as: Washingtonian, DC Luxury Magazine, Northern Virginia Magazine, and Virginia Living Magazine. With us, your home journey is just the start of a partnership that we believe lasts a lifetime.

About JLC Team Our backgrounds in interior design (Jackie), communications (Libby), and finance (Crystal) allow us to offer unique insight and approach to the buying and selling process. We work as a collective team for each of our clients giving them our varied insights which allows our clients to make incredibly well informed decisions. We are fierce negotiators, fighting to get the highest price for our sellers and the best price for our buyers. Having been in real estate since 2004, we know it is vital to listen to your needs so that we can attain your goals, effectively communicate with you throughout the buying and selling process, identify creative solutions, and present you with our honest, professional consultation. We feel very lucky to be in the real estate profession: we love helping people, we love houses, we love our city, and we love guiding clients through the home buying/selling process. We all have lived in Washington, DC for many, many years and have each renovated multiple homes during that time. We are licensed only in Washington, DC so we know the city like the back of our hand. We look forward to helping you achieve your real estate goals!

About Deirdre Deirdre moved to Capitol Hill almost twenty years ago after living in thirteen states and two foreign countries in her former life as a sales executive at IBM. Deirdre loves the neighborhoods of DC, MD and VA and the many options they offer to her clients. It's no surprise Deirdre has found success as a Realtor -- over the years, she's bought, sold and renovated over a dozen of her own homes and has helped hundreds of clients do the same. Deirdre has an intuitive understanding of what makes a home the "perfect fit" and her skills as a seasoned negotiator and her straight-talk approach resonate with clients who seek a professional to entrust with their personal and financial real estate goals. Deirdre's personalized services exceed clients' expectations at every stage from initial in-depth consultation, curated properties to perfectly match your lifestyle, private viewings, and seamless transaction coordination. Deirdre's commitment extends beyond the sale offering pre- and post-purchase support and referrals for financing, legal, architectural, contractor and design services. With a focus on dedicated search and private off-market listings Deirdre ensures a stress-free, confidential and exceptional real estate experience.
title: Realtor® DC | MD | VA

description: About Dare A 3rd generation Washingtonian and 20+ year Capitol Hill resident, Dare specializes in helping her clients buy and sell homes in great urban DC neighborhoods like: Capitol Hill, Hill East, Southeast/Southwest Waterfront, Atlas District, H Street, NoMa, Trinidad and beyond. Prior to real estate she spent nearly 15 years at AOL in client services, business strategy and business development. The skills she acquired and honed at AOL such as strategic planning, making data driven decisions, deal negotiation and leveraging technology to drive results have served her well in her real estate career. At her former brokerage, Dare was consistently recognized as a top tier producer. Dare is on the ball and known for being resourceful, flexible and unflappable. She distinguishes herself delivering outstanding customer service with quick response times and an eagerness to help no matter the issue. She is honest and tells her clients what they need to hear. Incredibly well connected, Dare has an enormous network of local resources she leverages to help guide her clients through all sorts of challenges. These include but are not limited to: anything and everything related to raising a child in Washington DC; resources for short and long term rentals and recommendations for any type of home service provider imaginable. Dare lives halfway between Union Station and Eastern Market with her husband, young daughter (a 4th generation Washingtonian!) and Chihuahua dachshund mix. She is a volunteer coach for Girls On The Run during the season; co -owns a small DC based wine business and is a commissioned portrait artist.
title: Realtor

description: About Christopher With a deep-rooted connection to Washington DC dating back to 1997, Chris is more than just a real estate agent; he's a dedicated advocate for this vibrant and historic city. As a Partner at The Rockwell Group, Chris brings his wealth of experience and passion for real estate to every transaction, helping clients turn their dreams into reality. What Chris loves most about the real estate industry is the opportunity to meet fascinating people from all walks of life, each with their unique stories and aspirations. He thrives on making meaningful connections and guiding clients through their real estate journeys in the nation's capital. Chris's admiration for the DC area extends beyond his professional life. He's enamored by its rich history, the beauty of its four distinct seasons, and the captivating architecture that tells a story at every turn. With years of experience under his belt, Chris has earned a reputation as a trusted advisor and expert in the local real estate market. His achievements in the industry are a testament to his dedication, sharp market knowledge, and commitment to delivering exceptional results for his clients. Beyond his career, Chris finds joy in the finer things in life. Golf and travel are his passions, providing a well-deserved break from his bustling real estate endeavors. Chris shares his life's journey with his loving family, including his wife, Amy, a skilled real estate attorney, and their two wonderful daughters, Maggie and Bryn. Maggie is currently embarking on her freshman year at Wellesley College, while Bryn is a junior at Bethesda Chevy Chase High School. In every facet of his life, Chris embodies dedication and excellence. He is your go-to real estate professional for all your needs in the Washington DC area. Whether you're buying or selling, Chris is here to guide you through every step of the process, ensuring you achieve your real estate goals.
title: Realtor®

description: About Evan Evan Johnson has been a proven top producing real estate agent in the Washington, DC, metro area since 1999. His dedication to helping home buyers and sellers meet their real estate goals is best shown through the glowing reviews past clients have happily written about their experience with him. Evan thoroughly loves real estate negotiations and positioning homes through innovative . Now Compass, Evan is a part of Wardman Residential, a strong force in the DC Real Estate market with sales of over $225 million and 500+ homes .
title: Realtor

description: About Cathy Cathy Johnson, a Bethesda native, has been working in and around real estate for over 35 years, first as an Interior Designer, and for the last 12 years as a successful Real Estate Agent. Cathy’s ability to create exceptional results for her clients stems from both her personal connection with her clients, along with the professional skills and market expertise she’s developed over the years as a small business owner. Cathy listens deeply, and understands that buying and selling a home is a personal experience for each individual client. She prides herself on a strong sense of professionalism, a commitment to make sure her clients are prepared at every stage of the process, and building lasting relationships. Cathy’s decades of experience as a small business owner have enabled her to hone many skills that prove valuable to her clients today, including marketing, sales, contract negotiations, project management, concierge services, and an in-depth knowledge of the local housing market. On top of that, Cathy brings a strong aesthetic sense and creativity to the buying and selling process that stems from her background in interior design, architecture, and home renovations. Now, she uses that same same eye for detail to help sellers prepare their homes for sale and to help buyers appreciate the potential in new properties that may need a “little love”. Cathy’s strong base of loyal returning clients is a testament to the passion, commitment and intelligence that Cathy brings to each and every one of her clients. Cathy is very involved in the community, lending her time to various local charities, alumnae associations, and her church. When she’s not working, Cathy loves traveling and spending time with family and friends.
title: Realtor - Licensed in MD, DC & VA

description: About Traci Your Neighborhood Realtor serving DC, Maryland and Virginia. I’m proud to help buyers and sellers navigate the DMV real estate market. In a fast-paced, competitive real estate market, there is nothing more important than working with a real estate agent you can trust. That’s where I come in. Reliable and resourceful, my focus is on building a strong relationship with my clients, while helping them find their dream homes. Primarily serving Washington D.C. and the surrounding areas of Maryland and Northern Virginia, I have many years of experience helping my clients navigate the real estate market while providing them with five-star customer service. While I’m originally from Colorado Springs, I’ve lived all over the country, including Maryland, Georgia, and my current home city of Washington D.C. My real estate career began in the 1990s as an accountant for a property management company in Bethesda, Maryland. I, then, became a property manager for a number of properties throughout Atlanta before switching careers to consumer marketing. In 2018, I decided to blend my collective skill sets and become a full-time real estate agent. With my extensive market knowledge and keen problem-solving skills, I provide my clients with top-tier representation while helping them achieve their real estate goals. As an industry expert, I have built my business around the foundations of integrity and trust. That means from the first meeting to beyond the closing table, I provide my clients with personalized care while serving their individual needs . Whether I’m working with first-time homebuyers, buyers who are moving into their forever home, or sellers who are ready for the next stage of their lives, I go above and beyond to ensure I’m setting my clients up for success. I work exclusively with buyers, sellers, and investors throughout the Washington D.C. Metropolitan Area, Maryland, and Northern Virginia. I’m also a Certified Military Relocation Professional . I proudly serve veterans and active duty military buyers and sellers to ensure that homeownership is not only affordable and accessible, but easy to navigate. I work with local lenders who are experienced in working with VA loans. And together, we ensure that we meet your specific needs and timetable to make your transfer easier, faster and less stressful. Not only am I passionate about my real estate career, but I’m also dedicated to serving my community. I advocate for a number of causes, but children, the elderly and animals hold a special place in my heart. As the oldest of five children, I’m part of a large extended family, and while we live all across the country, we are incredibly close. I’m a self-proclaimed outdoor enthusiast and travel junkie who is always up for a new adventure. In my spare time, I enjoy hanging out with my dog Shimi, baking, hiking, kayaking, and jet-setting around the world. So whether you’re new to the area or simply relocating within the region, I’m here to get you moving into your next home.
title: Realtor®

description: About Erin Originally from Colorado, Erin’s interest in real estate began at an early age when her family moved four times in ten years, eventually settling in Northern Virginia. After graduating with honors from James Madison University, Erin pursued a career in finance at a top consulting firm in Washington DC where she excelled serving multiple clients in a fast-paced, deal focused environment. Erin then transitioned to a Finance and Operations role with a Fortune-500 apartment developer in Arlington. During this time, Erin succeeded with her strong attention to detail and her ability to seamlessly deliver for senior management. Turning her passion for real estate into a career in 2013, Erin is a licensed agent in Virginia, Washington DC and Maryland with career sales in excess of $140 million. Erin has been recognized as a top producer in Arlington Magazine and Washingtonian Magazine. She loves helping her clients find the perfect home, leveraging her deep knowledge of the local market and proactive strategies to find the best on- and off-market opportunities. Believing buying a home should be enjoyable, Erin always has a positive attitude and a smile on her face, thinking a step ahead for her clients to take the stress out of the process. A resident of Arlington, Erin enjoys playing tennis, cooking, and spending time with her husband Mike and rescue dog Rugby.
title: Realtor®

description: About Reggie Once you are around Reggie for any length of time, you will understand his determination for the pursuit of excellence. His background is one in which accountability was a must and his attention to detail impacted lives daily. His professionalism, selfless dedication, and attentiveness to his clients' needs and concerns are just a few things that support his "Make it Happen!" philosophy. It is his work as a real estate professional and genuine concern for people that provide an oasis of comfort while your real estate transaction is being facilitated. Don't hesitate another moment, contact Reggie and you too can "Make it Happen!"
title: Realtor®

description: About Jesse Originally from Frederick, Maryland, Jesse has proudly called Washington, D.C. home for the past 15 years. His deep-rooted connection to the city and firsthand experience navigating its evolving neighborhoods allow him to offer clients invaluable insight and guidance in every step of the home buying or selling process. A strong work ethic has defined Jesse's career from the start. He graduated from the University of Hartford debt-free—an achievement made possible by his success selling Cutco knives, where he earned a place in the company’s Hall of Fame by age 23. His journey in sales eventually led him to the nation's capital, where he has spent the last decade sharpening his skills in a city he’s proud to serve. As a key associate of the Synergy Group, Jesse is known for his reliability, transparency, and unwavering commitment to results. Whether you're buying your first home or upgrading to your next, working with Jesse means partnering with someone who truly gets the DMV market — and gets the job done. Amid market uncertainty, Jesse’s consistent professionalism and well-informed counsel have led to long-standing client relationships and a thriving referral-based business. When he’s not working with clients, Jesse enjoys D.C.’s vibrant theater scene and is a member of the Washington National Opera's BravO Council and the Washington Ballet's Jete Society. Whether he’s hosting brunches, throwing dinner parties, or perfecting his crab cake recipe (a nod to his Maryland roots), Jesse is known for his warmth, drive, and natural ability to connect with people. Client Testimonials ★★★★★ "We were recently successful in buying a single-family home in the very challenging DC market. Jesse was our realtor, and he was amazing through every step of the process. We hit a few glitches along the way, but Jesse provided the support and guidance needed to make the transition happen in the time frame we needed. He has a super positive attitude, which we really appreciated. He was very responsive to our calls/texts and always available for viewings. He answered our many questions with patience and always provided the needed information. We appreciate everything he did, and highly recommend him to anyone needing a kind, flexible, knowledgeable, and fun realtor." ★★★★★ "Jesse was a great resource. Always helpful, never pushy, and gave honest feedback and advice. He made everything easy. In addition, he knows a lot about DC which is helpful in considering locations." ★★★★★ "We worked with Jesse Johnson at the Synergy Group to buy our first property. Jesse was excellent; he guided us through the whole process and was a tremendous help. He was an advocate for us as a buyer and as a result the process couldn't have gone more smoothly." ★★★★★ "I f you want a kind, hardworking and respectful Realtor Jesse is your guy. I cannot begin to express how grateful we were to have his guidance through every step of the way with purchasing our single-family home. He went above and beyond our expectations especially with the obstacles we had to get over in this very limited MD market. He is absolutely wonderful and there’s no way we could of done it without him. Jesse truly made all our dreams come true!" ★★★★★ “ Thank you so much for helping us through this process. Thank you for your kindness and understanding. Thank you for the many hours you put into making sure all our questions were answered, all our concerns clarified, and the entire process so clearly explained. You kept us informed every step of the way and we very much appreciated it. All of this you did with thorough knowledge of how the housing market works and as a result we got the top price for our house! “ ★★★★★ “ Working with realtor Jesse Johnson was an absolute delight! His professionalism, efficiency, and knack for providing fantastic leads made my home buying journey an exciting adventure. Jesse's commitment to earning my trust, every step of the way, even after the sale was finalized, truly exceeded my expectations. I enthusiastically recommend Jesse to anyone seeking a passionate and trustworthy realtor. “ ★★★★★ "Jesse immediately inspires confidence. He clearly knows what he is doing in the real estate market and I feel very fortunate that I was able to benefit from his advice and assistance. My property sold more quickly than I could possibly have imaged and I am still marveling at how smoothly everything went. I would definitely recommend him to anybody looking for a talented, hardworking agent." ★★★★★ “ I was discouraged by a prior listing agent's inability to sell my condo unit. Due to the condo unit not selling, I chose to make it a rental until market conditions became more favorable. Given the market, I was apprehensive about listing the condo unit for sale at the conclusion of the rental; but Jesse's expertise in dealing with a challenge is unrivaled. Starting with preparation of the unit for sale, (an arduous task that involved a tenant), to the cleaning, repairs, staging, and listing, Jesse was able to anticipate my needs and the needs of the market. He was keenly able to identify the most likely buyer for my unit and targeted that market with weekly open houses. After engaging potential buyers and receiving feedback, Jesse was able to pivot and sell my condo...just like that!!! It is not hyperbole when I say that if it was not for Jesse, I do not think my condo unit would be sold. I cannot recommend him enough! “ ★★★★★ “ Working with Jesse for my first home purchase was a wonderful experience. From the start, Jesse was able to leverage his deep knowledge of DC properties to help set up a showing for what became my first home purchase in a matter of days. Jesse also facilitated an incredibly smooth closing process and he helped refer me to contractors to do my renovations immediately after closing. Overall, it was a great experience working with Jesse and I highly recommend his services to others! “ ★★★★★ “ Jesse and his entire team were fantastic to work with! He was attentice and helped us through one of the most stressful situations a person can go throug. We cannot thank Jesse and the entire Synergy Group enough for helping us fin a home that we absolutely love! “ ★★★★★ “ Jesse is the most attentive realtor we have worked with. We met at an open house and were pleasantly surprised when he offered to show us another home immediately after. After discussing our interests, we toured about 15 houses together. Jesse constantly kept our ideas in mind and reminded us throughout the process which properties/areas would see the most appreciation and where we could add value-our largest concerns moving to DC. His knowledge of the DMV area was incredibly helpful and he found a great off-market deal that had everything we were looking for. “ ★★★★★ “ Being a first-time home buyer, it was intimidating to navigate the process of looking for a home. Jesse Johnson made the entire experience better than I ever could have hoped for. He was open and honest with me from the start, and he listened to all my questions and concerns. Jesse made me feel heard with what I was looking for in a home and never made me feel like I had to compromise on my non-negotiables even in the competitive DC market. Jesse is an exceptional realtor, and I am so thankful for all the amazing work he put into helping me find my home. He is professional, knowledgeable, dedicated, and an all-around delight to be around. It was an absolute pleasure to work with Jesse and I look forward to working with him again in the future when purchasing a home. “ ★★★★★ “ This is the first property I've ever purchased and it was even more daunting because my mom couldn't be with me, but Jesse brought a huge sense of relief and peace during this whole process. He answered every phone call, text, email -- whatever needed to be done, he made sure it got done. He gave me contact information for everyone and anyone I would need before, during and after I closed. Jesse made a very big, intimidating process feel not so scary which is something I definitely needed and appreciated. If anyone needs a realtor, I recommend Jesse 100%! “ ★★★★★ “ First time buyers, just started renting in DC, we quickly found our home with the help of Jesse. He made sure to get to know us, what were our must-haves and helped us sift through all the overwhelming options. He was always very responsive and pushed for our best interests during negotiations. Once we found the place, he made the closing process very smooth and easy for us as first time buyers. “
title: Realtor® licensed in DC, MD & VA

description: About Regina Regina Johnson is a highly committed REALTOR® with an unwavering commitment to providing personalized services and solutions to clients in Washington, DC and Maryland. Combining her experience as a construction manager and real estate investor, Regina is devoted to providing equitable opportunities for her clients and firmly believes in helping them reach their ownership goals in the DMV. Offering a unique perspective with an expansive network of professional partners, Regina proactively works with her clients to empower them tonavigate the real estate industry and make strategic decisions that are tailored to their real estate goals. A passionate educator on asset leveraging, Regina frequently engages with the local community by participating in workshops, speaking engagements, webinars, and podcasts. Contact her today. Regina looks forward to the opportunity to serve you and anyone you know with their real estate needs! (regina.johnson@compass.com). Licensed in DC & MD.
title: Realtor®

description: About Bruce Building and revitalizing communities and helping create new generational wealth is Bruce's primary purpose. For the last 20 years, Bruce has resided in the greater Washington DC area. Having lived throughout Maryland, DC, and Virginia he is knowledgeable about the area and incorporates his personal experiences to help his clients navigate the region. Bruce has spent his career working and connecting to his community and has a unique ability to find the perfect neighborhood to match his client's needs. Prior to real estate, Bruce had a successful career in the hospitality industry, which sharpened his attention to detail and ability to solve complex problems. Bruce uses his keen eye to identify up and coming neighborhoods and helps his clients find their perfect community to compliment their perfect home. Bruce has a natural desire to cater to others and always puts his clients first, making sure they are comfortable, confident, and secure in their home buying search. Bruce resides in the Congress Heights area of Washington D.C. with his wife Barbora and their 2 daughters. When Bruce is not working he is most likely to be found hiking with friends or family.
title: Realtor® | Bruce Jones - DC

description: About Matt A native of Northern Virginia and a DC resident since 2012, Matt is an expert when it comes to the real estate market in DC, Maryland and Virginia. Through his knowledge of the area and passion for helping others, Matt is committed to making sure his clients find the right place to call home. He prides himself on his ability to build strong relationships and empathize with others, a skill that extends to his clients. Matt understands that the home-buying process can be difficult to navigate whether you're a first time homebuyer or not. He understands the complexities and ever changing nature of the market so that he's prepared to guide you through every step of the way. Matt is close with his family and lucky to be able to watch his niece and nephew grow up in DC. He enjoys spending time outdoors but is equally content checking out a new museum exhibit. He likes taking his dog on long walks through the city or taking him to the park for a game of fetch. Matt likes to travel when he can and is always eager to get that next stamp in his passport.
title: Realtor®

description: About Liz My real estate career started at 18 under the sweltering sun of Phoenix, Arizona. I am a proud University of Richmond alum (Go Spiders!), and my passion for real estate and city living has landed me in our nation’s capital. As a resident of the District, I live the life that I work to sell. Whether buying or selling, it is important to have an advocate on your side that understands each step. With over a decade in the business, I understand the emotions and dedication that go into making a move from the first time you see the blank canvas potential, to the moment the keys are in your hand. The process can come with its share of challenges, and I work to make the process as smooth and enjoyable as possible. I truly believe that buying a home and selling a home are true accomplishments that are meant to be celebrated. Personally, there is nothing better than a good pair of cowboy boots, the cherry blossoms in bloom, an arm full of bangles, getting your passport stamped and a pop of color. When I am not found selling real estate, I am busy taking in all that Washington, DC has to offer or relaxing at my cabin in Virginia. My husband and I live in the Rosemont neighborhood of Alexandria with our one-year-old daughter, Stevie Louise, and a life-size cow statue in our front yard. I firmly believe it is important to always have fun in life and celebrate the things that make you happy. I look forward to helping you find not only the right home for you, but the perfect neighborhood, ultimately creating your dream lifestyle.
title: Realtor®
REALTOR® | Licensed in DC, MD & VA

description: About Jennifer Jennifer enjoys 20 years of sales experience in the real estate industry. She has been a licensed Realtor® in the DMV since 2003, and currently holds licenses in DC, Maryland and Virginia. Jennifer has a passion for helping her clients achieve their real estate goals. She works hard to stay aware of residential developments in and around the DMV. It helps that one of her favorite pastimes is exploring new communities and neighborhoods. In addition to exploring, Jennifer is proud to have called the following cities home: Washington, DC; Falls Church, VA; Arlington, VA; Gaitherburg, MD; Frederick, MD; Greenbelt, MD; and Potomac, MD. Jennifer's intimate familiarity with neighborhoods in the DMV and all their nooks and crannies gives her clients an enviable advantage when determining the perfect property. As a daughter of a Realtor, Jennifer inevitably grew up reading business and real estate investment books, from which she developed an entrepreneurial spirit. When she was 23, Jennifer bought two properties of her own. In 2013, she bought a third in Capitol Hill, D.C., which she fully gutted and renovated. She has been a landlord since 2006 and enjoys managing another one of her properties on Airbnb.com. It is apparent to anyone who meets Jennifer that she LOVES her career as a REALTOR®! As the only person who can hear in her immediate family, Jennifer has developed strong ties within the Deaf Community. She is very involved in the signing community and treasures her relationships with its members.
title: Realtor®

description: About Caitlin Although Caitlin is a Michigan native, she has been calling Washington, DC home for the past 18 years. She is most known for her attention to detail, passion, honesty, drive, and customer service. Caitlin loves advocating for her clients! Even in the midst of a fast-paced, high-strategy real estate transaction, you will most always find her with a smile on her face, laughing, and sporting her contagious, up-beat personality. She has a high level of integrity, a strong work ethic, and is both excited and dedicated to working hard for you!! Caitlin loves volunteering and serving the local community; most regularly with Three Roots International, ASPAN, and CASA Chirilagua. She also really enjoys spending time with her husband, Kyle, and their 3 kids! In their "spare time" they they can be found hiking, spending time on the water, watching a sunset (her favorite!), playing league volleyball, golfing, pickleball, cooking, entertaining, and spending time with their family and friends. Her home team is the Detroit Tigers, but she has willingly become a Washington Nationals, Washington Caps, and DC United fan.
title: Realtor® | Licensed in DC | VA | MD

description: About Janet With over a decade of experience selling real estate as a top producer, Janet recently joined the team and brings with her an abundance of real estate knowledge and experience. While earning a BA in Journalism at the University of Maryland, College Park, she worked in sales full-time and a passion for selling; this experience helped to hone her interpersonal and customer service skills. Janet is a dedicated Realtor who is committed to ensuring her clients’ success through care, personal attention, accessibility and service. Janet lives in Fairfax, VA with her husband, Tim, their son, Mason and daughter, Ella. In her spare time she enjoys traveling, cooking, golfing, taking guitar lessons and keeping up with the latest home and fashion trends.
title: Realtor®

description: About Kate A New York City native, Kate has called the DMV home for over 20 years. She and her family have lived in DC and Arlington and now call McLean home, where they reside in their custom-built home in Salona Village—a project she helped manage. With a background in interior design, Kate brings a trained eye and a steady hand to every stage of the buying and selling process. In addition to guiding traditional homebuyers and sellers, she has extensive experience helping clients identify and procure land , evaluate tear-down vs. renovation potential , and partner with reputable builders to create custom new construction homes. Kate understands the full scope of the build process and knows how to advocate for her clients every step of the way. Kate’s commitment to excellence has earned her industry recognition, including Arlington Magazine Top Producer (2025) , Compass #1 Agent on a Team in Virginia (2025) , and GCAAR Platinum (2025) . Her clients value her market knowledge, transparency, and ability to make complex real estate decisions feel clear and approachable. Whether preparing and staging your home for market, navigating competitive offer situations, or guiding you through the intricacies of new construction, Kate focuses on clarity, confidence, and truly personalized service. Real estate is personal—and her priority is finding (or creating) the home that is just right for you.
title: Realtor®

description: About Paras Paras is a proud resident of the D.C. Metro area. Over the past two decades, he has lived in a number of neighborhoods across the District and Virginia, making him one of a handful of real estate agents who know the area well enough to offer in-depth knowledge of the DMV’s cities, counties, and neighborhoods. Paras speaks and acts with knowledge and passion when it comes to sharing information about the DMV and its beautiful houses, rich heritage and dynamic neighborhoods. Whether you are a first-time buyer, a seller, or an investor/developer, he is well equipped to guide you through one of the most important decisions of your life. He is knowledgeable and deft in navigating negotiations, exploring financial opportunities, and attending to the nitty-gritty details of the overall transaction to make the process easier for you. Paras is also a licensed contractor in DC with an experienced construction and design team and helps his clients with their design and renovation needs. He also provides assistance with rental services. Paras’s clients, many of whom are repeat clients, often describe him as honest, strategic, and a creative problem-solver. He is known to be engaged, positive and fun to be around – and through and through a people-person! Paras has dual degrees in Electrical Engineering and International Relations from Virginia Tech. He has had prolific careers in the private sector ranging from a project engineer to leading operations, quality, and management at an aerospace component manufacturing company and Amazon. Most recently he worked at the United States Patent and Trademark Office as a Patent Examiner in touch screen, augmented reality, input devices, display drivers, and gesture technologies. When he is not doing real estate, Paras still finds himself happily talking, reading, and exploring real estate. He loves spending time with his wife and his two daughters, and in his spare time is found playing soccer, riding his road bike, cooking, traveling, and building new relationships.
title: Realtor®

description: About Jonathan Jonathan grew up in Bethesda, Maryland and attended the University of Maryland at College Park. He graduated in 1996 with a Bachelor of Arts in Psychology. After college, he initially worked at Comcast SportsNet where he learned how to successfully market products through advertising and internet tools. This allowed for a smooth transition into real estate, where he found he could use both his people skills and his marketing experience to enhance his real estate career. Jonathan has been a realtor since 2002, serving clients in the entire DC metro area…he is licensed in Maryland, DC, and Virginia. With his vast experience in residential real estate, he excels in supporting his clients through the buying and selling process. When he’s not at work, Jonathan and his wife Alison are busy with their two young children. He has remained a fan of the University of Maryland athletic teams and continues to hold season tickets to the men’s basketball games.
