title: Realtor®

description: About Kim Recognized by RealTrends in 2025 as the #2 top agent in the DC metro area by number of transactions, Kim has deep roots in the region. For four decades Kim's family owned a real estate agency in the Maryland suburbs of Prince George's County. After living around the country and overseas, now Kim is serving and living in the community where she grew up. She brings experience, order, and calm to the buying and selling process. Before launching her real estate career, Kim's education and early professional work were in the fields of journalism, marketing, and the book trade. That solid grounding in communications serves her real estate practice well as she represents and markets properties with real flair, and she negotiates with clarity and effectiveness. For several years Kim and her husband lived and worked overseas in the Middle East. During that time she conducted multiple real estate transactions for her own household. That experience fueled in her an understanding of the extra details and logistics that must be handled when working with expat and international clients, having been one herself. Kim lives with her husband and rescue dog and cat in Greenbelt, Maryland. She is a founding member of the Greenbelt Business Alliance, a board member of her local co-op grocery store, and a co-founder of the Greenbelt Farmers Market. She is a longtime practitioner of yoga, an enthusiastic home cook, and enjoys sailing on the Chesapeake. Recognized as a top agent by Washingtonian Magazine in 2022, 2023, 2024 and 2025, Kim is based out of the Compass Capitol Hill Office located at 660 Pennsylvania Ave. SE #401, Washington, DC 20003.
title: Realtor®

description: About Katie Bocock Team The Katie Bocock Team of Compass: Trusted, loved, full-service real estate advisors for Washington DC and Montgomery County, MD. Specializing in Takoma Park/Silver Spring, Chevy Chase/Bethesda, Rockville/Potomac, Hyattsville/College Park, and Washington DC itself, we deliver expert real estate guidance and exceptional service, empowering our clients to achieve lifelong success in buying, selling, and investing. Backed by Compass's cutting-edge tools and a global network, we provide local expertise with a world-class reach. Whether you’re looking to find your dream home or maximize the value of your current one, let us help you make the most of every opportunity. Our mission is to provide unparalleled service and value to contribute to the long-term prosperity of our clients. Check out our Reviews on Google !

About Gitika As a six-time Emmy Award-winning television producer turned sought-after luxury Realtor, Gitika Kaul brings a rare blend of creative vision, strategic insight, and unrelenting determination to every client relationship. Her nearly two decades at ABC News—navigating high-stakes, fast-moving environments in both domestic and international settings—shaped her signature ability to anticipate challenges, pivot with ease, and deliver exceptional results under pressure. Today, Gitika applies that same precision and ingenuity to help discerning buyers and sellers navigate the competitive real estate market with confidence. Her clients trust her to uncover extraordinary opportunities—including exclusive off-market properties—and to position their homes for maximum impact in a crowded marketplace. Known for her eye for design, deep market knowledge, and strong negotiating skills, Gitika ensures every detail is flawlessly executed from contract to close. With a proven track record of achieving record-setting sales and cultivating lasting relationships, Gitika has built a thriving referral-based business driven by her clients’ loyalty and trust. She understands that a home is more than just an asset—it’s a reflection of lifestyle, legacy, and dreams—and she approaches every transaction with discretion, care, and a relentless commitment to excellence. Gitika holds a B.S. in Journalism from Boston University. She lives in Bethesda, MD with her husband, two young sons, and their cat, Chutney. Outside of work, she enjoys discovering D.C.’s vibrant culinary scene, curating memorable gatherings, and finding joy in life’s every day moments. Client Testimonials ★★★★★ " Five stars across the board- Gitika did not disappoint as a trusted guide, counselor and advisor during the daunting journey of homebuying in a pandemic-charged, absurdly-priced real estate market. Having worked with other agents, I'd say one of Gitika's differentiating qualities is that she has mastered the art of playing the long game but knowing when time is of the essence. We engaged her before we even moved to DC and she was always full of insights and inspiration. Specifically, she had us slow our roll when we were anxious to buy in a hot market, suggesting we wait to see if the madness died down. As luck would have it, the surge of sales subsided just as interest rates were poised to go up and Gitika helped us seal the deal for a wonderful property that checked almost every box on New Year's Eve Day. What many agents who dabble in the rough and tumble world of real estate may see as a paycheck, Gitika sees as a privilege, and it's because she recognizes the significance of her role that she has so many satisfied clients. " - Buyer | Rockville ★★★★★ " Gitika is incredibly knowledgeable, responsive, and personable. She made the home-buying process very smooth, and we felt very confident in our decision because of how thorough she was with providing us market insights. We highly recommend her! " - Buyer | Bethesda ★★★★★ " Gitika helped my husband and I purchase our first home and we couldn't be happier! She made the process as seamless as buying a home can be and was always there throughout the ups and downs. We are SO glad we were able to work with her and will continue to refer all our family and friends! " - Buyer | Arlington ★★★★★ " If anyone is thinking about buying or selling a home in the DC/MD/VA area, I strongly encourage you to reach out to our real estate agent (and now friend) at Compass, Gitika Kaul. Gitika was extremely patient and understanding as we traveled throughout the entire region, oftentimes changing course multiple times as we went. She has an uncanny ability to pick up on her clients' preferences and was able to expertly guide us through the offer negotiation and closing process once we found the right home. In short, Gitika made a stressful and challenging process more pleasant than we ever imagined possible. " - Buyer | Bethesda ★★★★★ " Gitika is wonderful to work with and represented my interests and feelings about what type of house I wanted to buy. She provided valuable input into the market and characteristics of the houses we considered. During negotiations and closing, she and her team made the process flawless and smooth. She is also an incredible communicator, responding to my emails and texts within minutes. A valuable trait in this fast-paced market. " - Buyer | Capitol Hill ★★★★★ " We had the pleasure of working with Gitika as our realtor, and we couldn’t be happier with our experience. From our very first meeting, it was clear that Gitika was the right choice. She came prepared with a comprehensive book detailing everything about the area and even knew intricate details about our home before we had discussed anything. Her knowledge and expertise were evident from the start. Gitika’s understanding and flexibility regarding our family’s timeline and needs made the entire process smooth and stress-free. When it came time to sell our home, she went above and beyond to help us stage it in such a way that the photos were simply breathtaking—honestly, the house didn’t even look like our home! Thanks to her staging expertise, the house showed beautifully. Throughout the entire process, Gitika was always available and responsive, answering our questions usually within an hour. Her professionalism, kindness, and willingness to go the extra mile for us truly set her apart. We couldn’t have asked for a better realtor and would highly recommend Gitika to anyone looking to buy or sell a home. " - Seller | Clarksburg ★★★★★ " Gitika is a rockstar! Not only is she an incredible, savvy real estate agent, she also has a heart of gold. I can say that with all sincerity, having worked with her closely through our entire home selling experience. Gitika has incredible insight into the local real estate market. She isn’t one to look over a simple comparative market analysis and come up with a proposed listing price for your consideration. She actually knows the market intimately and what buyers are looking for so well, that she can hone in on what are the most crucial necessary improvements and suggest additional enhancements that will provide a very impressive return on investment. She does this in a very sincere manner — at all times being deferential to the homeowner, never any high-pressure. It was a pleasure developing our relationship with Gitika both personally and professionally. We interviewed a number of potential listing agents and once we met with her we knew in our heart that she was the one that would best represent our values and goals. She did that and much much more! We had already purchased a property out of state and on our moving day we literally handed Gitika our house keys and our complete trust. We knew she would develop a great product, maximizing our eventual selling price. She has an incredible bullpen of contractors, landscapers, movers and stagers that is evidence of the trust that many others have placed in her. It is with this team and her hard work and vision that really delivered for us! She’s an exceptional person and an incredible real estate agent! She did countless seemingly small acts of kindness for us during the process; we didn’t expect that level of service and attention. Her marketing tools, although seemingly simple approaches to developing interest, are very effective. We could not imagine a more efficient and stress-free financial transaction, than the eventual closing process that she engineered for us. Gitika is a true artist, but what really makes her a rockstar is her ability to envision the perfect lyrics and orchestration, backed by an entire ensemble of exceptional artists — together Gitika and her entire ensemble provided us with an incredible, enriching and life-affirming performance and we will be forever in her de bt! " - Seller | Bethesda ★★★★★ " Gitika made selling our house so easy! It was the smoothest/quickest process, it happened while we were on vacation and by the time we got back everything was taken care of. It was a pocket listing that went very quickly and we got our exact asking price. Gitika also helped us quickly find our new dream home (new build) and worked closely with us every step of the way. It was a long journey to closing so it was great to have Gitika's help throughout. She's very responsive, attentive and thoughtful. It was really helpful to have her experience when going through this process. I would highly recommend her as a realtor! " - Seller | Cabin John
title: Senior Vice President, Compass | Licensed in DC, MD & VA

description: About Donnell Donnell, a Virginia native, graduated from the prestigious College of William & Mary, and moved to Washington DC where he ventured into the world of professional finance. His extensive career in the Financial Services industry saw him master various financial sectors, from retail banking to investment and insurance services, enriching him with a myriad of skills that now benefit his clientele. In 2001, Donnell broadened his professional horizons by obtaining a real estate license, tapping into his financial acumen and personal experiences. This wealth of expertise enables him to provide clients with insightful guidance for making informed decisions on property-related matters, including location, financing strategies, and property renovation for personal or investment purposes. Notably, Donnell generously extends his network of contacts and experts to his clients and sphere of influence, ensuring they have access to invaluable resources. This includes connecting home buyers to reliable contractors who transform their re-sale into a home that’s uniquely theirs, or connecting sellers with a trusted title company guaranteed to make the closing process easy and convenient. A quick Google search for Donnell will reveal his clients’ experiences; Donnell has received numerous five star reviews from his sellers and buyers and most of his business today comes from client referrals or clients who partner with him again and again. With nearly 15 years of experience as part of a top team in DC, Donnell has also been an active mentor, guiding others to manifest their own vision within the real estate industry. His dedication to community service is unwavering, as he generously donates time, skills, and financial resources to support numerous local and international organizations, with a particular focus on those dedicated to the well-being of women, children, and marginalized individuals. In his leisure time, Donnell is an enthusiastic traveler, frequently visiting South America and South Africa, and enjoying summers on Martha's Vineyard. He and his husband reside in the Northeast neighborhood of Brookland where he purchased and renovated a home almost 20 years ago.
title: Senior Vice President | Realtor® Licensed in DC, MD & VA

description: About Kelly Kelly Kelley works closely with her clients throughout the DC/MD/VA area and has earned a stellar reputation for her extensive knowledge of the , strong negotiation skills, and smooth transaction processes. Kelly‘s clients enjoy exceptional service and a client-focused, educational approach to buying their next home or investment . Kelly has lived and worked in Washington, DC and Northern Virginia for over 15 years. Thanks to her localized knowledge of the area and experience in executive , Kelly positions her clients to have the competitive edge when navigating DC’s complex real estate . Kelly loves DC’s restaurant and music scene and is a die-hard DC sports fan, with strong allegiances to the Washington Capitals and Redskins—she can often be found cheering on both teams in-season! Kelly and her family live in the U St/Shaw neighborhood.
title: Realtor®

description: About Terrilynn Terrilynn is a full-time Associate Broker living and working in the Northern Virginia and Metropolitan Washington Area. Her real estate background is inclusive of selling residential property from luxury homes to condos, land, and unconventional transactions. Terrilynn spent more than 10 years in consumer marketing in the Telecommunications industry. She went on to become a Managing Broker for top producing offices and agents in Great Falls and Arlington, VA. Her broker experience gives her an edge over others with a vast understanding and knowledge of the contract, and strategy of the contract depending on who we are representing. As a full-time Associate Broker with a marketing background, she understands how to position your property for sale and establish a pricing strategy to obtain the best price for your home while managing the complexities of a transaction. Terrilynn prides herself on being a good listener, gaining an understanding of what you want in a home and the reasons why, and then providing you with the best options available. If you’re looking for an experienced, tenacious agent, with tough negotiating skills, who knows the area and understands the challenges that come along with a real estate transaction, contact Terrilynn. Terrilynn is the founder of TKsellshomes, a service-oriented team that makes it their mission to provide a one-of-a-kind, stress-free, and financially successful real estate experience for each of their clients.
title: Associate Broker

description: About Karen Karen Kelly, originally from Michigan, has lived and worked in the DC area for nearly 40 years. A graduate of The George Washington University, she has dedicated herself to the sales profession. Spending most of her career in high tech sales to Fortune 500 companies, Karen has consistently achieved top sales honors performing in the top 1% of her peers. Achieving record sales growth year after year, Karen has sold over $250 Million in real estate since 2017. Karen is known for her dedication to her clients and history of success in client relations. With keen attention to detail, her focus is on meeting her client’s needs with an emphasis on negotiating and customer care. Karen has been voted Top Producer by Bethesda Magazine and has received the distinguished honor of being named Washingtonian Magazine Top 100 Agents every year since 2019. Recent Reviews: Alton Barber 10/28/22 Karen Kelly, and the entire team at The Dana Rice Group, went far above and beyond the normal duties in making the sale of my home in Chevy Chase happen in the most efficient manner at my target price. She helped me give away, helped me pack, helped me clean, helped me with repairs, helped me at every stage of the process. She even helped me find a temporary place to stay during busy showing times! I've interacted with over 100 realtors in my 30+ years in real estate investing, and she is, without question, one of the best. Truly a joy to work with! Tony Morse 8/27/22 Karen was the best, from helping us rent the house two years ago all the way through staging and selling. She went above and behind helping with every aspect of the process and explaining what was happening. She was always available with help and insight and coordinating contractors etc… Daniela Ochoa Gonzalez 8/19/22 Karen is great, she helped us make the bold choice at the right time and took us by the hand through the whole process of transitioning from being city mouses into starting our lives as country mouses :). We are so grateful! Laura Okpala 8/16/22 Karen is an excellent realtor and found me an amazing home! It may have taken a while, but Karen was patient and upbeat throughout the process, despite getting outbid multiple times in a hot market. She is knowledgeable about the area and informed about industry trends and knows the right people to take care of your needs whether its the right inspector or a handyman or decorators. Would highly recommend!
title: Senior Vice President

description: About Maria Maria grew up in Northern Virginia and has lived there nearly her entire life. Growing up in a family of home builders (the Yeonas family) and real estate law specialists, she has a great foundation for real estate and an appreciation for well-built homes which she applies to every client she represents. Maria focuses her real estate practice in Northern Virginia with a strong emphasis on the McLean, Great Falls, and Vienna marketplaces. Whether helping clients find the perfect home or sell their most valuable asset, Maria’s in-depth knowledge of the local markets aids her in delivering superior results for all her clients. Maria truly cares about what is in the best interest of her clients. A communicator at heart, you will find her listening to her clients’ needs, wants, and values, as well as taking the time to understand the “why’s” and benefits of what’s important for them in their next real estate move. She prides herself on understanding the needs of potential buyers and exceeding every clients’ expectations. Her customer-focused attitude and enthusiasm for helping others are evident to everyone she meets. Maria is a graduate of Randolph Macon College who had a successful corporate sales career, before returning to her real estate roots. When she isn’t busy helping clients buying and selling homes, she spends time with her husband and two grade-school daughters, exercising, traveling, spending time with family and friends, and volunteering at her girls' school, charities, and local organizations. Maria is a Corporate Ambassador of Doorways in Arlington, VA. Doorways is a local organization creating pathways out of homelessness, domestic violence, and sexual assault leading to safe, stable, and empowered lives. Doorways is the only shelter in Virginia, and one of nine in the country, to offer safe shelter for people and pets fleeing violence.
title: Realtor® | M&M Properties Group

description: About Tamara A collaborative problem-solver with such a shrewd business acumen . Tamara possesses a natural repertoire of dynamic qualities that sets her apart. Her exceptional real estate knowledge, astute negotiation, and diplomacy skills enable her to take a hands-on approach with the clients she represents to successfully achieve their goals. As a native of the National Capital Region , Tamara has always felt a strong appreciation for everything this amazing area has to offer and a familiarity that cannot be replicated. She understands the intangible benefits of living in this area with its rich culture, unique diversity, and historical significance. Tamara has a keen eye for detail, epitomizes integrity, and excellent service in real estate. She maintains a complex understanding of the housing market and takes the time to get an intrinsic understanding of her clients so she can learn exactly what they desire and expect in a home. She regards the purchase of a home as more than just the place you reside but a tangible investment. A true lover of life, Tamara strongly accepts as true that travel broadens the mind, reading heightens the imagination, and music soothes the soul! She cultivates her personal lifestyle through traveling, engaging in community activities, and spending quality time with family and friends.
title: Realtor® licensed in DC, MD & VA

description: About Alexa Alexa began her career in real estate in 2004, after spending her early career in the telecommunications and tech industries, holding positions of progressively higher levels of leadership in Verizon Communications. Alexa's previous position as Senior Director of and Marketing Strategy gives her a unique opportunity to use her market analysis and expertise as she positions her clients' homes in the marketplace through highly effective and proven programs. Starting with thoughtful analysis of the market, then providing specific recommendations for home staging and small improvements that will add value to the property, her considerable sales expertise provide a winning package. Alexa provides her clients with the utmost personalized service and focusses on their needs, both when selling or when purchasing a new property. She is licensed in Maryland, Virginia and D.C. Experience and Professionalism matter!
title: Realtor®

description: About Tala Tala Kerman is a REALTOR® (licensed in DC, MD and VA) who strives to build long lasting relationships by demonstrating the highest level of integrity and commitment. Having resided in the DMV over 25 years, Tala’s intimate knowledge of this region along with her experiences of having lived here brings clients a guided perspective as their wants and needs are heard. She will make you feel supported as a trusted advisor by your side each step of the way. Tala will work hard to achieve the best possible outcome in every transaction, while ensuring that the process is enjoyable and hassle free. When Tala moved to DC from Dubai in 2000 to pursue her degrees in Finance, she fell in love with the charm and history of this beautiful city. She chose DC over NYC although NYC is where she was born and raised her early years (most of her family resides in Manhattan). After graduating from university, Tala met her husband - a dedicated residential developer (SSR Development) - at the iconic Georgetown restaurant, "Bistro Français." Some years later, they started their family and custom designed and built a forever smart home in their favorite DC neighborhood. Tala’s appreciation for the design and development processes allows her a perspective that can be shared with clients as they seek a place to make their own while creating value to grow their wealth. During her free time, Tala enjoys playing tennis and basketball with family and friends. She also loves to travel.
title: Realtor® licensed in DC, MD & VA | Licensed as Banafshe Kermanshah

description: About Claudia From the start, Claudia has leveraged her knowledge to advise clients on all aspects of the home buying or selling process - from prioritizing their needs to negotiating the deal - to make the experience smooth and satisfying. She recognizes that every client’s needs are different and customizes her approach to meet their requirements. She builds relationships that last for life, which has been her approach to doing business. In particular, she has substantial expertise with expatriates and their unique requirements, assisting them with the sometimes-overwhelming process of relocating to a different area or country. She has been consistently named NVAR Platinum Top Producer and been recognized as a top producer in the DMV area by Washingtonian Magazine, Northern Virginia Magazine, Arlington Magazine, and Bethesda Magazine. Before becoming a REALTOR®, Claudia worked as a Banker and a Management Consultant. She is originally from Venezuela, has an MBA from Georgetown University, and is fluent in Spanish, English, and German. Claudia has lived in Vienna, VA, since 1999, with her family. When not working on real estate, you'll find Claudia walking her dog Astro, reading, exploring new restaurants throughout the DMV area, and working on her non-profit organization Latinas4Latinas.
title: REALTOR® – Licensed in VA, DC & MD

description: About Keystone Capital Group Your partners in real estate success. Led by founders Edwin and Hector, Keystone Capital Group is a dynamic team of passionate professionals who share one mission: to make real estate accessible, rewarding, and empowering for everyone. With a mix of seasoned expertise, local insight, and forward-thinking strategies, the team works collaboratively to ensure every client experience is seamless from start to finish. At Keystone Capital Group, it’s not just about closing deals — it’s about building lasting relationships and helping clients find confidence and opportunity through real estate.
title: Keystone Capital Group

description: About Keystone Property Advisors keystone ( noun) /kee-stohn/ 1. the central principle or part of a plan, system, etc., on which everything else depends. 2. something on which other things depend for support 3. the central supporting element of a whole Today's buyers and sellers need a trusted resource that can guide them through the complex world of real estate. Our name, Keystone Property Advisors , underscores the pivotal role we play in every real estate transaction, our extensive market experience, and our unwavering commitment to guiding you through each step of your real estate journey. Whether you're selling, buying your first home, upgrading, downsizing, or investing, you can rely on Keystone Property Advisors to manage your transaction with your best interests at heart and ensure the best possible outcome. With over 50 years of combined experience, we have navigated various market conditions throughout the DMV area – from buyers’ markets to sellers’ markets, and everything in between. We know what can go wrong because we have seen it, and we know how to manage your transaction so it doesn’t happen to you! It is our pleasure to not only make your real estate experience look easy, but feel easy, too. We take great pride in the relationships we build and always work relentlessly on our client's behalf to help them achieve their real estate goals. Our mission statement: Our philosophy is simple, clients come first. We pledge to be in constant communicationwith our clients, keeping them fully informed throughout the entire process. We believe that if you're not left with an amazing experience, we haven't done our job. We don't measure our success through achievements or awards, but through the satisfaction of our clients. We look forward to advising you in your next real estate transaction!

About Olivia Ever since Olivia Kibler can remember, real estate has been a part of her life. As a third-generation Washingtonian Realtor, Olivia grew up attending open houses with her mom day and discussing market trends around the dinner table night. What Olivia didn’t know at the time, however, was that she would go on to pursue a real estate career of her own. Initially envisioning a future in finance, Olivia received her degree from the University of Delaware, only to realize after graduating that her true passion was back where it all started, at the center of her family’s collective story. The truth is, there’s nothing that Olivia finds more rewarding than guiding others through the complex yet momentous process of buying or selling a home. Today, Olivia is a successful DC Realtor in her own right, having forged a notable path within the industry while upholding the family legacy of excellence. Over the past 10 years, Olivia has built a hands-on, all-inclusive real estate experience, providing white-glove service for every client—regardless of price point or location. Olivia is best known clients for her uncompromising attention to detail, ability to fast, dedication to finding stress-free solutions, and her insistence on exceeding expectations at every step of the way. Above all, Olivia believes that knowledge is power. She recognizes that buying or selling a home is one of life’s most pivotal milestones, and she’s all too familiar with the anxiety that can often accompany such a transformative decision. That’s why Olivia strives to be every client’s advocate, leveraging her data-driven outlook to educate both buyers and sellers arming them with the necessary facts and information to make the choices that are right for them. Olivia offers extensive insight into the entire DMV area, and loves helping her clients explore all the twists and turns of the place she’s called home all of her life. Having been born and raised in the area, it’s no surprise that Olivia has curated a vast local network over the years—one that she attributes to the enduring connections she’s formed, and that she harnesses in her work for both buyers and sellers. She’s also a proven expert on a variety of specialized industry topics such as home renovation, interior design, historic preservation, and landlord representation—to name a few. And since Olivia herself owns three Shenandoah properties, she partners with many clients hoping to find second homes or investment properties in that area, often helping them navigate the nuances of the Airbnb world in addition to their home purchase itself. When she’s not hosting open houses or touring with buyers, you’re likely to find Olivia getting involved in the greater DC community through her work with Martha’s Table and SMYAL. And as the proud owner of a Bernese Mountain Dog, Rocco, Olivia is actively engaged with local dog rescue organizations, which she supports hosting various pet-friendly fundraisers throughout the year. She’s also on the board of Historic Mount Pleasant, where she resides today.
title: Director of Operations | Realtor®

description: About Keilah Keilah is originally from Kentucky and went to college at Mercer University in Tucker, Georgia where she has received her Bachelor’s Degree in Business . After her graduation, she worked at her family’s title where she has obtained her foundational knowledge of real estate. Keilah has been living in DC over four years. She is licensed MD, VA, and DC. Her clients truly value Keilah’s insight into the market and her straight forward and honest approach.
title: Realtor®

description: About Jennifer Jennifer is a fourth-generation Washingtonian and possesses a deep knowledge of the DC metro area. The daughter and granddaughter of local builders, Jennifer spent much of her childhood at construction sites and model homes. She grew up in Potomac, Maryland and attended The Holton-Arms School followed by Tulane University and The Smith School of Business at The University of Maryland. Prior to launching her residential real estate career at Compass, Jennifer worked as both a leasing agent and a lease administrator for large national commercial real estate companies. In these roles, Jennifer sharpened her contract negotiation skills and developed an exceptional eye for detail that has proven paramount to her clients today. Jennifer forms a special connection with each and every one of her clients and aims to offer both buyers and sellers an unparalleled level of customer service from their first meeting to closing and beyond.
title: Realtor®

description: About Jennifer Compass Executive Vice President Jennifer Knoll is a distinguished real estate agent in Washington, boasting nearly 20 years of experience. Renowned for her intelligence, diligence, and loyalty, she expertly guides clients through every step of the home-buying process. Jennifer specializes in luxury homes in Northwest Washington, Capitol Hill, Chevy Chase, Bethesda, and nearby suburbs. With over 25 years in the region, she offers unmatched industry knowledge and neighborhood expertise, assisting buyers, sellers, and investors of all levels in the DMV area. Recognized as the #1 individual agent at Compass in Washington, D.C. by Real Trends, Jennifer has also been named a Very Best Agent and Top Producer by Washingtonian annually since 2015. She was voted Best Agent by Washington City Paper readers in 2015 and 2017 and is a regular on Bethesda Magazine's best agent lists. Her personal sales exceed half a billion dollars, and she personally handles all client interactions. Before her real estate career, Jennifer was a journalist covering news and politics from Washington, D.C. to Tel Aviv. She lives in Northwest Washington with her three children and actively supports local schools and various charitable causes, including environmental, civil rights, and women's rights organizations. Jennifer is licensed in D.C., Maryland, and Virginia, ensuring comprehensive service for her clients' real estate needs.
title: Executive Vice President

description: About Greta Licensed in VA and DC, Greta Kohlhagen has been in real estate since 2005. Over the course of her career she has supported and seen all aspects of the real estate business from the inside out. An area native, she graduated from Mclean High School and has lived in Arlington for over 20 years - from group house to condo to her current 'forever home' with her husband and two children. Greta received her B.A. from The College of William and Mary and loves to travel and play golf.
title: REALTOR® - Licensed in VA & DC

description: About Gretchen Almost a native of the Washington, D.C. area, Gretchen has lived in the Maryland suburbs of Washington, D.C. since she was four years old. In her other lives, Gretchen worked on Capitol Hill as an administrative assistant to a Member of Congress, in a non-profit agency monitoring state and federal elections, and at a private school in the development office. Gretchen has over 25 years experience in residential real estate. While consistently ranking in the top 1% of all Realtors nationwide, Gretchen takes most pride in awards/acknowledgments that take client satisfaction into account -- like the Masters Club or Extraordinary designation. Gretchen provides unparalleled 'hands on' service to her clients both during transactions and after the deal is done. For this reason most of her business is referral based, as former clients excitedly share her expertise with family, friends and colleagues.
title: Licensed Real Estate Salesperson

description: About Kevin A Washington DC native, Kevin grew up in Chevy Chase View in Kensington. In high school, he attended Georgetown Day school in Northwest, DC. An avid soccer player, Kevin was recruited to play at Stanford University . While in the heart of Silicon Valley, he took great interest in the blossoming Internet start-ups. He decided to pursue a degree in e-commerce and while minoring in Spanish. After graduating in 2002, Kevin joined Gretchen, and started applying some of the same successful models he had studied and witnessed first-hand to real estate. What has evolved is a program of highly successful customized campaigns. With over 20 years of experience, Kevin’s tremendous success speaks to his people skills and his quick grasp of this complicated business. While specializing in greater Bethesda luxury residential sales , Kevin is also involved in development projects in D.C. and Montgomery County.
title: Realtor®

description: About Jason Jason brings a true D.C. area insider’s perspective as well as a passion for customer service to the real estate industry. Born and raised in Montgomery County, he has worked and lived across many neighbors in both DC and Maryland. From Petworth, to Capitol Hill, and from Rockville to Chevy Chase, chances are good that Jason can tell you his favorite blocks, the commute time to different areas, and his favorite restaurants close by! His negotiating skills combined with superior client relations keep him in high demand, but he prides himself on his ability to treat every client as if they were his only one. With nearly a quarter of a billion dollars in real estate sales over the course of his career, he has been recognized as a Top Agent in The Washingtonian, Bethesda Magazine, Washington City Paper, Real Trends, and more. He has also been quoted in Forbes as well as The Huffington Post in regards to his valuations of historic DC landmarks including The Smithsonian and The White House . Outside of work, Jason is a passionate supporter of the DC area dining scene and an avid studio cyclist and yogi. He also works with local animal rescues in his spare time where he and his wife, Armanda, foster and train dogs. They currently reside in the Randolph Hills area of North Bethesda with their two Bull Terriers, Maya Jane Bulls and Avon "Piggy" Barksdale.
title: Realtor

description: About Andrea A lifelong Washingtonian, and a licensed realtor in DC, MD and VA, Andrea provides exceptional insight into the real estate market in our community. Her love for real estate stems from long family ties to the industry. Her Grandfather was a long-time broker and real estate investor; her mother had a successful career as a realtor, earning top agent in the DMV. Growing up helping her mother, Andrea quickly learned the ins and outs of the buying and selling process, what it takes to be a successful realtor, and most importantly, how to exceed above and beyond clients’ expectations. Prior to becoming a realtor, Andrea graduated with Honors from University of Maryland with a Master’s Degree in Severe and Profound Disabilities. Andrea taught special education at several local schools and provided animal assisted therapy to our nation’s veterans. These experiences taught her how to be a staunch advocate for those she represents in a wide variety of circumstances. Her transition to real estate was a natural evolution in taking those advocacy skills to represent clients in her most enduring interest. Knowledge and drive allow Andrea to ensure her clients reach their goals whether selling their home or finding and securing their next one. Andrea strives to provide a seamless, full-service approach to the buying and selling process. Her team and relationships with local vendors will put you at ease and provide you the confidence that everything will be addressed. Andrea’s keen attention to detail, creativity and eye for design helps her clients prepare their home to maximize value and envision themselves in their new home. She lives in Alexandria with her husband and two French Bulldogs, Grizzly and Bella. In her time off, you can find Andrea running, walking her dogs, volunteering with children with disabilities and at Warrior Canine Connection, traveling, and being first in line to try the new restaurants in town.
title: Realtor®

description: About Esther As a proud resident of Capitol Hill, Esther settled in to the neighborhood after spending time living in the NW quadrant of Washington, DC. She prides herself on taking the time to guide and educate her clients on the diverse and ever-changing communities in DC, paying special attention to individual lifestyles. Esther’s career in real estate was born out of a deep passion for home and interior design, stemming from her many years as an interior designer. She has a unique eye for beauty and appreciation of style that gives her a unique ability to assist her clients in finding the right home. Being responsive, confident, and creative make her an invaluable asset to her clients and a coveted real estate professional. An avid fan of design and food, she’s inspired Washington, DC, NOVA, and MD's constant expansion in both realms. Known to blog about her dining experiences, Esther pays special attention to the food and aesthetics of every restaurant she visits. Esther is a member of all the major museums, and volunteers actively for the Annual Fundraising Gala benefitting School without Walls, the institution where her sons are current students and alumni. She recently renovated a home just blocks from Eastern Market, and enjoys spending time with and friends, traveling, and walking her Weimaraner, Lucy, at the nearby Congressional Cemetery.
title: REALTOR®

description: About George With a resolute commitment to excellence, George Koutsoukos is a distinguished real estate professional who personifies integrity, diligence, and innovation in every facet of his practice. As a devoted Washingtonian, George's exceptional journey spans a remarkable 25 years, during which he has orchestrated real estate transactions totaling over a billion dollars. Consistently acknowledged as a preeminent agent in the dynamic DC metro area, George embarked on his career in 1989, initially making waves in New Home sales before seamlessly transitioning to residential sales in 2001. His expertise extends to serving sellers, buyers, builders, and investors across the diverse landscapes of DC, Virginia, and Maryland. HIGHLIGHTS: - Over a Quarter-Century of Distinction in Metropolitan Real Estate - Facilitated Collaborations with Over 10 Custom Builders from 2001 to 2008 - Achieved Coveted Top 1% Nationwide Sales Ranking, Specializing in New Home Sales and Builder Partnerships George's unwavering dedication, coupled with his deep industry insights, positions him as a trailblazer in the real estate realm, consistently delivering unparalleled results and elevating the experience for clients across the region.
title: Senior Vice President

description: About Ned A native Washingtonian, Ned was born and raised on Capitol Hill, where his passion for real estate took root early. His father owned Kraemer and Company, a Hill-based brokerage, instilling in him a deep appreciation for local architecture and design. After attending St. Peter’s Interparish School and St. Anselm’s Abbey School, Ned studied at St. Mary’s College of Maryland before returning to his beloved hometown. Prior to real estate, he managed several well-known local restaurants, honing his skills in customer service and community connection. Since launching his real estate career in 2010, Ned has built a reputation for his market expertise, strong negotiation skills, and a practical, even-keeled approach to helping clients achieve their goals. Whether buying or selling, his in-depth knowledge of DC’s neighborhoods and housing market is an invaluable asset. Ned lives on Philadelphia Row on Capitol Hill with his wife, Lauren, and their two daughters, Viola and Addie. They recently completed a full down-to-the-studs renovation of their home, giving him firsthand experience in the ins and outs of home construction and design. When he's not helping clients, he enjoys barbecuing with friends, playing golf, and walking his dog, Howie. A devoted DC sports fan and supporter of the local music scene, Ned is passionate about the vibrant culture that makes Washington, DC, feel like home.
title: Realtor®

description: About Rina Meet Rina, a seasoned real estate professional with over 20+ years of industry experience and a remarkable track record of $310 million in property sales. Recognized as one of the area’s premier agents, she has earned accolades such as the Washingtonian’s "Best Local Real Estate Agents" year after year, and the esteemed "100 Top Agents" award since 2023. With Rina as your REALTOR®, you can expect a seamless experience whether buying or selling a home. Her extensive expertise in accurately pricing properties, adept negotiation skills, and innovative marketing strategies ensure that client satisfaction remains her top priority. In today's digital age, Rina and her dedicated team leverage cutting-edge techniques to give her clients a competitive edge. From utilizing digital predictive analytics to targeted social media campaigns and strategic email initiatives, she maximizes online exposure across national and local real estate platforms. Attention to detail is paramount for Rina. She oversees every aspect of the listing preparation process, ensuring that each property is presented in its best light. With her meticulous approach, she aims to make her clients' listings stand out in the market. Rina holds prestigious designations including the Graduate REALTOR® Institute (GRI) and Certified Residential Specialist (CRS). Additionally, her specialized training in assisting older adults with their real estate needs, reflected in her Seniors Real Estate Specialist® (SRES) designation, underscores her commitment to providing tailored solutions for every client. Rina is a Compass Plus Certified Senior Advisor (CSA) . A native Washingtonian, Rina's deep roots in the area and extensive local knowledge are invaluable assets to her clients. Her background in education and counseling equips her with the skills to educate and guide clients through the real estate process with clarity and confidence. Rina represents buyers and sellers in all price points and property styles, in DC, Maryland and Virginia. For Rina, delivering exceptional service is non-negotiable. With professionalism and dedication, she strives to exceed expectations and ensure that each client receives the highest level of care and attention.

About Cheryl After graduating from Smith College, Cheryl attended the Boston University Law School and earned her JD. She then practiced law for many years before becoming a Realtor. Cheryl’s legal training makes her an outstanding advocate for her clients. She is well versed in contracts, titles, title insurance, and the transfer of property rights. She is detail oriented, diligent and thorough in her research, and a great problem solver. You can always count on her tenacious negotiating skills, yet she is a seasoned mediator as well. Born and raised in NY, Cheryl moved to the DC area 30+ years ago and has raised three children and many rescue dogs in the intervening years. She has a great passion for life, for people, for helping others. While savvy at marketing, she knows intimately the neighborhoods, the schools, the businesses, and the qualities of life that make a real estate transaction so personal. Cheryl was consistently the top agent in her former office and has won numerous top producer awards. She was named Washingtonian Magazine as a “Top Residential Real Estate Agent” in the DC Metro area. Her partner, Moose, is a standard poodle from a rescue organization, a former client who worked with Cheryl to find a home and now works on Cheryl’s team. Cheryl gets results at every price range!
title: Vice President

description: About Daisy “My job is to create the best real estate experience for you, tailored to your unique needs.” Daisy's passion for real estate is driven by her talent for matching buyers with properties that align with their desires and needs, as well as helping sellers prepare their homes for sale in the most effective manner. With an extensive network of reliable contractors and lifelong connections in the DMV, she provides her clients with the resources necessary to make well informed decisions, ensuring the best possible outcomes. A native of Arlington, Daisy now calls Falls Church, Virginia home. When she’s not selling real estate, you can find her spinning records for her monthly WFMU radio program, restoring her mid century modern home, and spending time with her husband and two cats.
title: REALTOR®  DC | MD | VA

description: About Elizabeth Elizabeth Landeros has the attention to detail to make selling and buying a home a stress-free process. She is a successful negotiator and has participated in more than 1000 transactions throughout her career in residential real estate. Elizabeth takes pride in sharing her extensive knowledge base and delivering results to her clients. Elizabeth believes communication and honesty are the foundations of a successful relationship; she understands how important it is to sell and buy a home in today’s market. She welcomes the opportunity to work with new clients, share her expertise, and ultimately help you through every step in the home selling and buying process. Elizabeth holds a bachelor’s degree in Psychology. Prior to working in residential real estate, Elizabeth was a member of a Top 100 Team Worldwide with CBRE working in commercial real estate. Elizabeth lives in Arlington, VA and can be found spending time with her family outdoors in her spare time. She loves to serve and be part of the amazing community!
title: Vice President

description: About Traudel Traudel’s passion for success, tireless commitment to her clients, and more than 25 years of experience in the Greater Washington DC Area means that working with her will be nothing short of exceptional. From the first walk-through to closing, her strong work ethic, unparalleled expertise, and unwavering perseverance provide clients with an unmatched level of service. Traudel prides herself on expertly navigating the nuances of the real estate market in order to provide you with the most seamless, pleasant home buying or selling experience possible. Year-over-year she has ranked consistently among the Top 1% Real Estate Agents nationwide, an achievement she owes to her focus, energy, and dedication. She will be your strongest advocate throughout the entire buying or selling process because she genuinely cares about her clients. Ultimately, Traudel makes your goals her goals as she takes great joy in guiding her clients to achieve their ideal outcomes. Born and raised in Germany, Traudel majored in Finance and Economics and minored in Art History. She worked as an investment consultant at a major bank outside of Munich and eventually moved to Ecuador. For five years Traudel worked for the Foster Parents Plan as an English to Spanish translator while raising her two children. From there, she and her family relocated to Malawi, Africa where she continued to contribute to humanitarian efforts. Pairing her compassion and benevolence with her business background and market savvy is what she attributes to her success as a real estate professional today. " ★★★★★ " Traudel is the best agent I’ve ever worked with. She got my home photographed and listed quickly and sold it several weeks later Furthermore, it was a complicated closing, and she not only spent a considerable amount of her own time on the closing, she brought all the right resources to bear to get the job done. I highly recommend Traudel! " ★★★★★ " Officially SOLD and settled on my mom's house today. Traudel Lange and her assistant, Amanda got the job done!!!! Truly professional and a pleasure to work with.
