She was at all times well informed, knowledgeable of the market, pleasant to deal with, always available and made what could have been a painful process a smooth transaction. I recommend her without the slightest hesitation. “ -Robert, Arlington, VA ★★★★★ "Katie is our Top Number One agent. She knows the ins and outs of real estate, she can size up the property and give you her (real) opinion, and she is phenomenally pleasant to work with. Also - poor woman - she is on call 24/7, which makes hand-holding and contract-writing a pleasure. She is THERE FOR YOU. You can't go wrong with Katie!" -Gila & Judy, Reston, VA ★★★★★ "We interviewed multiple realtors before choosing Katie and it really paid off. We have now used her for buying two homes and selling one over the last 6 years and we will absolutely use her again if we ever need a realtor. Katie is professional, not pushy, and gives you the information and the space to help you make the right decision for you. She has also assembled the right team to assist with every detail from preparing the house and your listing through the open house to the closing on the selling side, as well as setting up your search, finding great properties and managing the other parties on the buying side. Her recommendations on contractors for work that needed to be done were stellar as well. No small feat. Katie always works to ensure everything is as smooth as possible. You will be in good hands with Katie Loughney!" - Sarah & Mark, Springfield, VA ★★★★★ " Katie has been my realtor through one home sale and two home purchases. I wouldn’t use anyone but Katie. In my most recent home purchase this spring - in a ridiculously competitive market - she made herself available as soon as anything I wanted to see hit the market, she advised me properly on how to make an offer, she coordinated urgent pre-offer inspections, walked through inspections with me and pointed out things to be aware of I may have missed otherwise. She held my hand through the entire process and made a daunting and scary situation manageable and doable. Months later Katie still responds immediately to my requests for referrals for service people. She’s just incredible!!! " - Melissa, Arlington, VA ★★★★★ " Katie Loughney is truly the best real estate agent we have ever worked with. She found us a house within our price range in a seller’s market when virtually nothing was coming on the market. She sold our condo to a buyer that offered to sign a contract “sight unseen” before it hit the market. Her advice was spot on and she knew exactly what the right selling price was and how to negotiate the best price for our purchase. She was in constant communication with us and responded quickly and patiently to all our questions. Katie seems to have very good relationships with her peers, which we’re sure was helpful in negotiations. We were out of the country in the middle of the sale of our condo and she made sure everything went smoothly, which lifted a big weight off of our shoulders. Even after the sale and purchase, we have kept in touch and Katie has helped us with referrals for work in our new house. She truly cares about her clients and we are so appreciative of everything she’s done for us. We very highly recommend Katie to anyone looking to buy or sell a home! " - Gustavo & Jill, Arlington, VA ★★★★★ " Katie and her team are true professionals. Her calm and caring manner is just what I needed as I downsized from my home of 38 years to a two bedroom condo. With her excellent knowledge of the housing market, she guided me through every step from getting the house ready to sell, setting the right price and advising on financing. She patiently answered every question and never pressured me to make a decision. When looking a condo, she quickly assessed what I wanted and only presented me with the right options. I found exactly what I wanted the condo I purchased. Katie and her team are the BEST! " -Antoinette, Alexandria. VA ★★★★★ "Katie was referred to me by a good friend who said "I wouldn't buy real estate with anyone other than Katie." As usual, this friend was correct in every way. Katie was always there to answer my calls, helped my husband and I navigate the difficulty of selling and buying at the same time, and went above and beyond to get our house ready for listing while we were away on vacation. She is a trusted partner and I will only refer her to anyone looking for an agent. She's not pushy, will give you her honest opinion, she's never looking for the quick sale, but for your best interest. I will only be working with her for my real estate needs in the future. She got us above asking on the home we sold (which set a record for our neighborhood) and got us the best possible deal on the home we purchased, even when we were fine with the closing costs, she still managed to save us an extra 2K!" -Jasmine & Brian, Lorton & Great Falls, VA ★★★★★ " Katie was absolutely wonderful to work with during our search and purchase of our first home. She was responsive, patient, and kind throughout the entire 5-month process. We confidently put our trust in her and never felt pressured in any way. Her wisdom, knowledge, and determination were invaluable as we navigated the competitive market of Northern VA. I can’t recommend her highly enough! " - Stephanie & Matt, Falls Church, VA ★★★★★ " I highly recommend Katie. She was extremely professional, and a very calming presence during the hectic home buying process. She always made herself available to attend showings and provided helpful information. I already referred Katie to friends and she was able to help them quickly find a great home as well. " - Michael, Annandale, VA ★★★★★ " If there was an option for an A+ rating we would have selected that instead of just "A." Katie was such a delight to work with. We didn't know what to expect, not having purchased/ a house 25 years, but Katie made this process so easy, transparent, and successful! Questions were answered promptly and thoroughly, the process was laid out advance and updates were timely, and best of all Katie, and her assistant Liz, were upbeat, positive, and great to work with. You won't go wrong working with them! " - Nanci & Bryan, Alexandria, VA ★★★★★ " Katie is a consummate professional and my spouse and I had the good fortune of being referred to her through a friend. Three attributes in particular make Katie an exceptional real estate agent: she always kept our best interests in mind, which means that she never pressured us and took took her role as an impartial advisor very seriously; she was exceptionally responsive on all matters large and small, even going so far as to arrange for a member of her team to show us a new listing in very short order during her brief absence; and her calm and unflappable demeanor is downright refreshing. Stop searching and choose Katie Loughney. You'll be working with the very best in the business. " - Brad & Miguel, Arlington, VA ★★★★★ " Katie is an outstanding realtor. We've worked with Katie on two home purchases and a Arlington and have been consistently impressed with her professionalism, competence, and integrity. Katie provided relevant market research and guidance without ever making us feel pushed or pressured to make a particular offer. She was responsive and patient in response to our questions and moved us smoothly to closing. We recommend her enthusiastically! " - Jen & Mike, Arlington, VA ★★★★★ " Katie and her team were an absolute delight; the quality of their work is outstanding. Katie is truly a knowledgeable professional --- and a quiet force. She comes prepared, she provides thorough and informed answers to all of your questions, and really aims her professional advice on what is best for YOU -- not in getting the deal, like we have experienced with other realtors. We first saw Katie selling the house across our street. It was remarkable the amount of effort she and her team put into getting the house ready. In less than five days. Soon thereafter, we decided to start working with a new realtor (we had been working with our previous one years) -- having seen the standard that Katie set her clients' first-hand. We interviewed five different realtors before we made an informed decision to work with Katie. Here's why -- each of the other realtor's showed up and gave us lip service. They claimed they would find us the perfect house and sell ours at the perfectly high price. Why? Because. Trust them, they said. See, but here's where Katie was different. She showed up with spreadsheets, market analysis, sample marketing material, and an entire presentation designed around the of our unique property. Who knows how long it took her to make, but the work she did earning her MBA became apparent then. We weren't in a rush; in fact, we wanted to take it slow and make the right decision, which is difficult in this market. We looked at a few homes, and she took notes. Yes, literally, she took notes. Then she started pulling listings that she'd though we'd like -- and we told her what we liked and didn't about each listing. She listened, like really really listened. We then saw some more properties, and wham... she found one that was coming on the market in a couple of weeks. She reached out to the selling agent and was able to get us into the house to view, pre-market. She took us back time and time again that week, as we made our informed decision. We brought in contractor after contractor, literally spending countless hours there, to see if we could add the addition that we wanted. Thankfully we could and went forward with the . The purchase of our new home went off without a hitch -- thanks to Katie. And, the of our old house was so quick and easy, it is surreal that it even happened. Again, it was pre-market at an above-market price -- and again, Katie acted in our best interest, not hers. Potential buyers and sellers, I can not recommend Katie and her team highly enough. She really has set the bar at a whole new level residential real estate this market. We will gladly work with her again. " - Carrie & Charlie, Arlington, VA ★★★★★ "We just closed on our second house with Katie. The first time, she provided amazing service to help us sell a house, this time she helped us buy one! Katie is the ultimate professional -- walking us through every step of the process, providing excellent advice, and always with her calm, reassuring manner. We felt like we were in excellent hands every step of the way! She made the entire process smooth and uneventful. If you are looking for a Realtor, we highly recommend Katie!" - Christine & Christian, Arlington, VA ★★★★★ "My fiancé and I just closed on our first house and went with Katie at a recommendation from a family friend and we couldn't be more satisfied with our decision. From walking us through the entire process step by step to helping us navigate the feeding frenzy of the current market, Katie's experience and professionalism helped us secure a beautiful home. Katie showed us dozens of homes and helped us put together several offers before one was finally accepted. Her good humor and near constant availability for after-hours questions, contract writing, and last-minute showings were crucial in making the whole home-buying process as painless as it could be at a time when buying a home can be extremely stressful. Additionally, a variety of thoughtful personal touches made it clear why she's one of the most awarded realtors in the region. We would wholeheartedly recommend Katie (and her excellent team!) to anyone looking to purchase a home in the DMV area. " - Chris & Ariel, Annandale, VA ★★★★★ "Working with Katie was a lovely experience. Her calm demeanor and highly organized approach provided us with a very informed and pleasant experience in a market that is extremely difficult for buyers. She is incredibly responsive and thoughtful. We never once felt out of step with her. I highly recommend Katie if you are searching in the extremely competitive Alexandria market." - Nicole & Greg, Alexandria, VA ★★★★★ "Like the others who left a review, my experience with Katie and her team was beyond expectations! She was highly recommended by several people in the area, and guided me through selling one home and buying another. She knows tons about all of the pieces of the buying and selling processes. I would recommend Katie Loughney to anyone and everyone!" - Carol, Arlington, VA ★★★★★ A trusted friend highly recommended Katie Loughney, who had done a couple of transactions for him. It was an entirely justified recommendation. Katie sold my condo with multiple offers and a quick cash settlement during a stagnant market with mortgage rates hovering over 7%. Katie is an exemplary real estate professional. She understands the residential real estate market well based on her long experience in the sector and an extensive network of contacts. She is diligent in following leads. Katie is a caring person who puts the client's best interest first and foremost. She is ethical, trustworthy, and exceptionally well-organized. She and her assistant, Liz, were always available to update me and respond to questions. As a result, the sale process went smoothly, from listing to closure, with no unanticipated requests or surprises. Katie is a good marketing strategist. She has a keen sense of what will capture potential buyer's interest and how to make the property show in the best light. The few improvements Katie recommended paid off well. She also has a good eye for interior design. Together with her talented colleague, Jan, they staged the condo beautifully. It was a genuine pleasure working with Katie and her team. Besides being an exceptional realtor, Katie is an outstanding individual. I recommend her without reservation. -Tufan, Chevy Chase, MD ★★★★★ Just recently I had the fortune to work with Katie Loughney, who is the best agent I ever could have imagined. She was recommended by a close friend and is with Compass realty. When Katie and I first talked, in mid-April, I felt right away that she was the right agent for me and I did not need to look further. I told her that I was green and had not moved in a very long time. She took that into account and patiently explained everything about the process. She showed time and time again that she valued me as a client. Over the next 6 weeks she took me to numerous condos that I selected from her online database, which pulled listings from the criteria I provided and was very easy to use. The database allowed us to comment back and forth on a listing, which was extremely helpful. She always picked me up at a metro and dropped me off at a metro when we were done for the day, which I appreciated because we were going to areas and neighborhoods that I did not know. I could always tell that she understood my preferences and looked out for me to be sure I was selecting places to see that met my criteria. Whenever I had questions I always received a prompt reply. When I thought I was ready to make an offer on a place, she wanted me to be sure. I had questions, and she obtained the answers quickly. With all of the paperwork that followed, which was always available for me to review and sign electronically, she made sure to explain up front what the documents were and why they were important. When we learned the day before closing that there was a building problem that caused some damage in the condo I was purchasing, she supported me every step of the way. She had just that evening returned from vacation, yet she insisted on going to the condo to check the damage and condition. She took photographs and texted them to me to help me decide whether or not to postpone the closing. I felt that I was in the best of hands the entire time. So now that I have closed on my new home, I feel so blessed to have had Katie’s expert guidance to be sure I was making the right choice and the right decisions. I love my new home, and I’m grateful to Katie Loughney for everything she did to make it possible. She also continues to remind me that she is available if I have any questions or need any assistance. Talk about service after the sale! Our professional association has not ended. She is going to sell my long-time condo and I have every faith that she will be as determined and dedicated in that process of readying the condo and finding a buyer as she was in helping me find my new home. Team Katie! -Debbie, Washington DC & Arlington, VA ★★★★★ "The best way to portray the experience working with Katie is to describe it as an optimized combination of being readily available as a representative, advocate, consultant, guide and real estate professional I had confidence every step of the way that she was equipping me and enabling me to make the best decisions You should not work with anyone else; rather, wait in line -- if you need to -- and work with Katie!" -Rich, Reston and Jeffersonton, VA
title: Senior Vice President | MBA | Associate Broker VA | Realtor DC/MD

description: About Loughney Residential Hoping to sell or buy a home in Northern Virginia, Washington DC, or Maryland? Turn to Loughney Residential for the best results! Known for providing the highest level of service, the team is committed to guiding clients through the complexities of the real estate process more seamlessly than ever before. With a strong knowledge of contracts, a sophisticated understanding of the market, and proven marketing and negotiation strategies, Loughney Residential exceeds client expectations as we seamlessly guide our clients through the complex real estate process. Our glowing testimonials, 5-star reviews and numerous repeat clients and client referrals are a testament to our success at putting our clients first. Meet our Team Katie Loughney - Katie is a seasoned real estate professional with more than 18 years of experience in the industry. Katie's impressive professional credentials speak for themselves. She has earned the esteemed title of Associate Broker in Virginia, and serves as a Senior Vice President at Compass Real Estate, a testament to her expertise and leadership within the industry. Katie is licensed to practice in all three jurisdictions (Virginia, DC, and Maryland), making her a valuable resource for clients throughout the region. Katie received her MBA from The Kellogg School at Northwestern University in 1999, and brings with her a wealth of experience in strategy consulting. As a Realtor, Katie is known for her exceptional work ethic, motivation, and reliability. She conducts her business with honesty and integrity, and her clients are always her top priority. Katie takes a comprehensive and thorough approach to her work, drawing upon her extensive knowledge of the Washington DC metro area, which she has called home since 1990. She keeps up-to-date with the latest technologies, market research, and business strategies, and is always striving to meet and exceed her clients' expectations. Above all, Katie is a great listener who works tirelessly to find tailored solutions for her clients. She understands that buying or selling a home can be a significant life event, and is committed to making the process as smooth and stress-free as possible. Katie is a Realtor who truly cares about her clients. Read Katie's reviews. Louisa Gilson Davis: A native to the D.C. metropolitan area, Louisa is licensed to practice real estate in Virginia, D.C., and Maryland. She has lived in Arlington and Fairfax for most of her life and has spent time working in Washington, D.C., including on Capitol Hill. Louisa began her career in real estate when she was 24, and she uses her homegrown knowledge of and passion for Northern Virginia and the D.C. metro area to help each of her clients meet their distinct goals. Louisa’s mission is to be there for her clients at every step of the way—always ensuring she provides timely updates throughout the real estate process. Louisa specializes in working with US government employees, including those who are already local and those who are relocating for the government. Louisa can personally assist clients whose agencies are located in Virginia and Washington, D.C., and she can help connect clients to a strong network of agents in any part of the country. Read Louisa's reviews. Liz Fried: Meet Liz, a long-time resident of Arlington with a passion for project management. For more than a decade, she has been an indispensable part of Loughney Residential, orchestrating seamless logistics for their valued clients. From meticulously handling paperwork to coordinating essential services like cleaners, photographers, and handymen, Liz operates behind the scenes to ensure an exceptional experience for each and every client. Her dedication extends beyond mere coordination. Liz takes pride in effectively communicating with agents, lenders, and title companies, streamlining the entire process. When it comes to client satisfaction, Liz's commitment is unwavering. Her project management expertise, combined with her personable approach, has garnered her a reputation for excellence in the industry. For all your real estate endeavors, you can trust Liz to deliver results that exceed expectations.

About Love Live DC Love Live DC provides clients with the highest level of comprehensive real estate services in Washington, D.C. and the surrounding area. Our knowledge and experience gives our clients a competitive edge in the fast-paced market and ensures quality and consistency for the best possible real estate experience. Composed of dedicated, accomplished, and enthusiastic professionals, the Love Live DC team not only has a well documented track record of success in achieving results, we also exceed expectations of what real estate agents should be by strategically aiding clients through their real estate transactions. Since 2014, Love Live DC has helped hundreds of buyers and sellers achieve their real estate objectives. Demonstrating professionalism, creativity, and leadership, we are dedicated to our clients’ satisfaction and turning their dreams into reality. With team members who live in and are licensed in MD, DC, and VA, we are ready to help everyone find their place in the DMV area. In addition to drawing on the knowledge and experience each member contributes, we introduce homebuyers to our extensive network of service providers, meaning moving to the district is a comfortable, hassle-free process. With service and advice that extends far beyond settlement, our promise to clients is to be a resource for life! Please visit our website at: lovelivedc.com

About Lindsay From a young age, Lindsay—a reputable agent on the Bethesda scene—knew she wanted to be in real estate. Growing up, she would drive the many picturesque houses in her Potomac neighborhood and pick the one she hoped to live in someday. Though the time, her dream home would change, her burgeoning love real estate never wavered. Today, Lindsay serves her clients with unrivaled expertise, tenacity, and an enduring professionalism that shines through in all she does. After graduating from The University of Richmond, Lindsay moved home to Washington, DC to work at a large private equity firm. Later, she joined her family's insurance business in Bethesda, which focused on the needs of both homeowners and businesses. After years of helping people properly protect their real estate investments, she decided to pursue her true passion: guiding people through the entire real estate process from start to finish. As a lifelong resident of the Washington, DC area, Lindsay cherishes her role as a trusted advisor who helps people discover all the wonderful communities in and around our nation's capital. She specializes in Bethesda & Chevy Chase neighborhoods, where she calls home today, although she works with clients in all jurisdictions and at every price point. Lindsay is known her commitment to her clients above all, and leaves no stone unturned finding solutions to even the toughest of roadblocks. sellers, Lindsay leverages a tailored strategy and innovative tools to help her clients sell their homes faster and more money; buyers, Lindsay provides a full-service approach to finding just the right home to match every prospective homeowner’s lifestyle. Lindsay also helps her clients navigate the new construction process seamlessly thanks to the relationships she has forged with builders across the city, in addition to her experience building her own custom home in the area. Lindsay has consistently been named to Washingtonian’s magazine “Top Agents” and has also been featured in Best of Bethesda publication. If she is not selling real estate, Lindsay can be found spending time with her two sons, playing tennis, and giving back to her community through her position on the Sibley Hospital Young Professional Board and her children’s school.
title: Senior Vice President

description: About Evelyn Evelyn launched her successful real estate career over 35 years ago, becoming a cornerstone of the DC Metro area's real estate market. As one of the founding agents of Compass Real Estate, she helped propel the company to become the #1 brokerage in the Washington, DC metro area. Teaming up with her sister, Connie Lopez Parker, Evelyn co-founded the Lugo Parker Team of Compass, operating out of the Georgetown office in Washington, DC. Evelyn's approach to real estate is rooted in empathy and expertise, understanding that buying or selling a home can be an emotional and stressful experience. She positions herself as a trusted advisor, guiding her clients with ease, insight, and compassion. Evelyn is renowned for her innovative business strategies, staying ahead of industry trends and leveraging cutting-edge technology to deliver unparalleled service. Licensed in DC, Maryland, and Virginia, Evelyn resides in the SW Waterfront neighborhood of Washington, DC, where she has dominated the market, ranking #1 in units sold since 2015. Her prowess extends beyond transactions; she is adept in home renovations and property development, benefiting both her portfolio and her clients'. Recognized repeatedly within Compass and the industry, Evelyn has been celebrated as one of Washingtonian Magazine's "Top Producing Real Estate Agents" for over ten consecutive years. For all your real estate needs, connect with Evelyn today—her expertise is your greatest asset in navigating the real estate market. Client Testimonials Evelyn saved the day. The thought of selling our condo was overwhelming -selling from out of town, pricing it competitively, legal issues with the sale of parking spaces, selling in the off season, renovation decisions, the dreaded process of interviewing contractors, and worrying that we would not be there to supervise the work. She took care of all of this and made the entire process seamless She made solid recommendations regarding pricing, timing to list and what updates would be cost effective to help sell it. She has her own contractors who did beautiful work. She kept us updated, so we always knew what was going on, always responded quickly when we had questions, listened and made time for us whenever we needed to talk. If you want an organized realtor who will work hard for you, is at the top of her game regarding worry free renovation, experienced with the market, readily - Gretchen Hempen Evelyn Lugo did absolutely a great job for my sister Mary! Mary returned to Illinois and Evelyn assisted with the remodeling and selling of her condo in Washington DC. In every conversation I had with Evelyn, I could tell she was experienced and knowledgeable of the DC market. We had many bumps along the way, but Evelyn smoothed them out and made it happen. Our confidence in Evelyn proved true. If you are buying or selling in DC, you cannot go wrong with having Evelyn and The Lugo Parker Team on your side. She makes things happen. Thank you Evelyn. My sister, myself, and our family in Illinois owe you a great deal of gratitude! -Richard Vollmer Having a realtor is part "friend", part "advisor", and a whole lot of "life coach"! Evelyn showed tough love, a tender heart, and a guiding hand to get the best deals for us. We have both buying and selling experiences with her and her team, so we got to see both ends of the deal. "We initially "found" Evelyn the old fashioned way...calling the agent. But, wow, were we impressed. This was way more than a "deal" for her. It was finding the right fit for us. She was available, responsive, knowledgeable, strategic, considerate...you know, all the things one needs in a realtor (but, one rarely gets)." Evelyn worked diligently on both of our deals, which were very different. With our first interaction, we bought a place in a "hot" area in DC. The transaction was seemingly straightforward, but there are always glitches. She didn't flinch through any of it. She handled each situation with aplomb and made us feel that we were getting the best value. - Michelle Catlin "The second deal she handled was the selling of a rental we owned. The previous renters did us no favors trashing the place before they left, but Evelyn helped us find the best option. Even though our place was in a more sedate area (and far from model home condition), we found a buyer in less than three weeks. Then....the closing process. It was difficult. Negotiations took what seemed like an eternity; the buyers' mortgage was weeks behind schedule; and a client (that would be me) was always on travel. Honestly, we could not have done this without Evelyn's experience, tenacity, and fortitude. Even when she went on a previously planned vacation she managed to stay appropriately connected." - Justin Scott "I put my condo on the market with very little interest shown from perspective buyers. Well I was referred to Evelyn Lugo in late I immediately switched realtors. Evelyn Lugo brought a different reality to my situation. We immediately adjusted the price of the condo, she had me get rid of some of the clusters in my unit, sent her professional photographer, and published new photos and a FABULOUS flyer. Within a day of the new posting, I had interest shown almost everyday! Evelyn is knowledgeable, approachable, personal, patient and incredibly generous with her time. She responded to my many texts and e-mail in record time. (And, I can be overwhelming at times, if I must admit so myself.) Needless to say, we went to closing within 30 days of me meeting Evelyn. I highly recommend her, and have done so." -Maggie V "Evelyn is an extraordinary agent! She is here to educate, support and provide the best service. As a first time home-buyer I was very impressed and I truly knew she had my best interest in mind. Evelyn is an agent you can trust." -Enisa "Evelyn represented us when we bought and when we sold. She is no nonsense and professional, and she went over all of our options with us so we could make informed decisions. She also has a huge and impressive network of professionals she works with, and she only works with the best. She was able to get us the best possible price for our condo, in part because she knew exactly what we should focus on before putting it on the market, and in part because she regularly works with contractors that she knows can get the job done."
title: Vice President | Managing Partner | Licensed in DC/MD/VA

description: About Lugo Parker Team As founding members of Compass, Evelyn Lugo and Connie Lopez-Parker lead the highly successful Lugo Parker Team, one of the foremost real estate teams in the DC Metro area. With over 60 years of combined real estate sales experience across Washington, DC, Maryland, and Virginia, Evelyn and Connie have established themselves as top-producing agents known for their commitment to excellence. Their passion for the real estate industry is driven by a deep appreciation for the dynamic nature of the market and the opportunity to make meaningful impacts on their clients' lives. They are particularly drawn to the DC Metro area's rich history, diverse culture, and vibrant communities, which they believe offer unique opportunities for every homebuyer and seller. The Lugo Parker Team is renowned for their dedication to client service and satisfaction, placing these as their highest priorities. This commitment has cultivated a loyal client base, resulting in a high percentage of repeat and referral business. Evelyn and Connie's local expertise and market knowledge are unparalleled, allowing them to provide insightful guidance and achieve exceptional results for their clients. Their dedication to serving the real estate needs of the community is unwavering. Whether you are selling your current home or embarking on the journey to purchase a new one, the Lugo Parker Team's experience, expertise, and energetic approach ensure a seamless and rewarding experience.

About Sofia Sofia is a DMV native, born and raised in Northern Virginia. After graduating with a bachelor's degree in Marketing from Coastal Carolina University, Sofia moved to Washington DC and spent the next 4 years working in the nonprofit sector. Freelancing for a real estate team on the side, she fell in love with the industry. Sofia became a full time agent in 2021. In her first year, Sofia helped over 20 families to buy and sell. From first time home buyers to new construction, she is well versed in the DMV market. Sofia is passionate about educating young professionals on how to build their wealth through real estate. Contact Sofia Luna for your real estate needs.
title: Mollaan Babbington Group | Licensed Real Estate Salesperson | Licensed in DC & VA

description: About Winton When considering a move to the Nation’s Capital, selecting the right guide is crucial. As a native Washingtonian, I prioritize a client-focused approach that emphasizes trust, education, and empowerment. I take pride in helping to create generational wealth while strengthening communities. I build strong, genuine relationships with my clients, treating them like family. As a licensed Realtor®, I bring added value to families on their journey to homeownership. My reliability, communication skills, and personable nature ensure a smooth and successful real estate experience for my clients. I graduated from Pennsylvania State University (PSU) in 2018 with a bachelor’s degree in science. As a member of Kappa Alpha Psi Fraternity Inc., I apply the lessons learned to my professional life. At 25, I purchased my first home in the River Terrace neighborhood of Washington, DC. In February 2025, I made the most important decision of my life by marrying my wonderful wife, Jordan Evian Matthews. Being a local, I leverage my extensive neighborhood knowledge to enhance your real estate experience. I am dedicated to serving community organizations, volunteering at church, and I am excited to join the Chadwick Residential team! Just as I serve my community, it would be my pleasure to serve you. Environmentalist, local historian, and your helpful agent. Reach out to me to learn more about achieving your personal real estate goals!
title: REALTOR® | Licensed in DC

description: About John Mr. Mahshie is a 46-year resident of the District of Columbia and has had a life-long interest in architecture spanning Vitruvius through van der Rohe. He has worked on numerous renovation projects including his Washington, DC, residence and his former winter residence in Miami Beach, Florida. He has worked with architects and developers throughout the city and sold condominium projects totaling more than 100 units. A project he sold at 1401 Q Street, NW, received a merit award from the American Institute of Architects (AIA), and the Washington Business Journal nominated his project for “Real Estate Deal of the Year.” He was the top individual producer at his firm for three consecutive years. In 2008, he was appointed by Mayor Adrian Fenty to serve on the Board of Real Property Assessments and Appeals. As Senior Vice President, he works with the Compass leadership and associates to increase their knowledge and understanding of residential and commercial architecture. Mr. Mahshie is the managing partner of the Mahshie Fazio Partnership. From 1981 - 2002, Mr. Mahshie held positions at the Embassy of Malta and the U.S. Department of Housing and Urban Development. He served as Counsel in the Litigation Section at the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC) and worked as an Assistant United States Attorney in the District of Columbia. While at the FDIC, Mr. Mahshie also served as a Steward for Chapter 207 of the National Treasury Employees Union. He has been an active member of the Virginia State Bar for the last 34 years. Mr. Mahshie was Senior Vice President at TTR Sotheby’s International Realty from 2002 - 2021. His clients comprise individuals as well as corporations, foundations, and 501(c)(3)s. Mr. Mahshie graduated from Georgetown University in 1981 with a B.S. from the School of Languages and Linguistics. He received his M.A. from the School of Foreign Service at Georgetown University in 1983. In 1989, he received his J.D. from the College of Law and an M.P.A. from the Maxwell School of Citizenship and Public Affairs at Syracuse University. He is a former board member and Chairman of the Education Committee of the Washington Mid Atlantic Chapter of the Institute of Classical Architecture & Art (ICAA). He has developed programs relating to commercial projects for the Wharton Club, and his penultimate program for the ICAA was “The Legacy of the Roman Empire’s Building Traditions on the Development of Islamic Architecture in Spain,” held at the Cosmos Club. Mr. Mahshie is a regular contributor to Traditional Building. In 2024, the partnership planned, developed, and implemented the ICAA’s “New Heights” program, conducted from April 17-19 for 25 select students from the Washington Latin Public Charter School. The program included lectures by well-known local architects, landscape architects, designers, and academics and comprised lectures, field trips, and studio exercises to help the students gain an understanding and appreciation of the classical architecture tradition. The Mahshie Fazio Partnership has also represented several developers including Dilan Homes. In March, we completed working with Dilan and architect Christian Zapatka on three new luxury residences in Georgetown. Both Messrs. Mahshie and Fazio have served as docents for the Georgetown House Tour for several years. Mr. Mahshie is licensed in DC, Virginia, Maryland, and Florida and is an American Institute of Architects Associate Member.
title: Senior Vice President

description: About Kenny An accomplished agent on the DC real estate scene, Kenny Maites brings over two decades of experience to each transaction. Adopting a high-tech, high-touch approach, Kenny harnesses the right tools to drive the best results, while remaining a trusted advisor to every client he serves. Kenny is also known as a fierce negotiator and works tirelessly to bring each client's aspirations to life. As part of the reputable The Group of Compass, Kenny assists clients at all price points, and in all stages of life. A lifelong Washingtonian, he provides unparalleled insight into an impressive variety of neighborhoods spanning the DC/MD metro area. Whether you are looking to buy your first home or sell your empty nest, Kenny is there to advise and maximize results at every step of the way. When he's not working, Kenny enjoys spending time with his family and taking advantage of all that his community has to offer. He is passionate about cooking and wine, and can often be found dining at the latest addition to the city’s booming restaurant scene or sampling wines at a nearby vineyard.
title: Realtor®

description: About Kyle With a professional background in engineering, land development, construction, and real estate, Kyle brings a strong combination of multi-disciplinary expertise into every client relationship that he forms. His ability to provide comprehensive guidance through his uniquely diverse, and well informed professional perspective, makes Kyle an all-in-one, essential resource for his clients. In addition to his cross-industry expertise, Kyle is extremely analytical, detail-oriented, and forward- thinking. As such, his clients benefit from his ability to conduct and guide them through smooth negotiations and into successful deals and positive results. Kyle prides himself on being a dedicated partner and true advocate for those he represents, and on providing close guidance throughout every step of the process. Kyle was born in Washington DC, and was raised in Prince George's County, Maryland. In his free time, he enjoys working out, attending live events, and frequenting local restaurants. Kyle’s familiarity and knowledge of different local markets and neighborhoods on both a personal and professional level allow him to provide truly thoughtful and authentic recommendations to his clients based on their interests and real estate needs. Kyle graduated Magna Cum Laude with a bachelor’s degree in civil engineering from Alabama A&M University. After graduating from Alabama A&M, he went on to obtain a master’s degree in engineering management from Duke University. Kyle is a member of Kappa Alpha Psi Fraternity, Inc. and recipient of their top two awards for a young member within the organization.
title: REALTOR®

description: About Ishika Born and raised in the charming town of Potomac, Maryland, and now a proud resident of the vibrant city of Washington, DC for the past 7 years, Ishika has thrived in the diverse and ever-evolving real estate landscape of the DMV area. As a first-generation child of immigrants, Ishika brings a unique perspective and an unwavering dedication to helping clients achieve their homeownership dreams. What sets Ishika apart is her genuine passion for real estate, evident in the lasting relationships she builds with clients, ranging from first-time buyers to seasoned homeowners and astute investors. Her stamina to get the deal done and provide consistent service beyond closing reflects their commitment to ensuring a seamless and rewarding real estate experience for all. One of the things Ishika loves most about the DMV area is its versatility, offering a blend of city living and suburban tranquility, ensuring that there's something for everyone. Her local expertise and market knowledge have allowed her to help multiple individuals realize their dreams of becoming first-time real estate investors, while also guiding buyers and sellers through the complexities of the post-pandemic market with resounding success. With an unwavering dedication to serving the real estate needs of the community, Ishika is poised to be your trusted partner in navigating the dynamic DMV real estate market. Whether you're a first-time buyer, a seasoned homeowner, or an astute investor, Ishika is committed to helping you achieve your real estate goals with unparalleled expertise and a friendly, professional touch.
title: Licensed realtor in DC, MD, VA

description: About Eleanor Originally from Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, Ellie returned to her hometown after living in the DC Metro Area since 2014. She graduated from George Mason University and, prior to joining the world of real estate, was deeply immersed in the arts scene in Washington, DC. Ellie worked as a Professional Dancer, Faculty Member at The Washington School of Ballet, and Company Manager for the contemporary ballet company Chamber Dance Project. Ellie’s background includes experience in operations, marketing, and client relations, making her a well-rounded addition to the team. Now living in Pittsburgh with her husband Christian and their dog Millie, Ellie enjoys discovering new recipes to recreate from The New York Times , taking her introverted dog to the park for some awkwardly adorable socialization, and exploring all the hidden gems Pittsburgh has to offer. Ellie is licensed in the District of Columbia, Maryland, and Virginia.
title: Realtor® | Licensed in DC, MD & VA

description: About John John has been a Washington resident for over 20 years and a real estate agent for over 15 years. He has built his business on referrals and returning clients who trust his expertise, attention to detail and outstanding negotiation skills. John is known for his sincere business approach, team work with his clients and open communication throughout the real estate transaction. John credits his parents for his dedication to hard work and entrepreneurial spirit. Thanks to his family’s construction and real estate investment businesses, John was raised with the notion that hard work, smart business decisions and loving your career are the ingredients for success. John holds a Bachelor of Arts degree in Political Science and a minor in Business Administration from Arizona State University. His prior years of working in corporate Finance and Project Management prepared him to seamlessly handle complex transactions in real estate. John’s interests include renovation projects, design and architecture. He takes inspiration from his travels through Argentina, Brazil, Costa Rica, England, France, Spain, Mexico, Italy, Czech Republic and Hungary. As an animal lover, John is a supporter of The Humane Society.
title: Realtor

description: About Donna Donna Mank has teamed up with Compass, the leading technology real estate firm in the country, in order to give clients an ideal selling and buying experience in the luxury real estate market. As the face of DCCondoBoutique.com, Donna has sold over $200,000,000 in luxury real estate in DC metro neighborhoods. Moreover, Donna has consistently been named a top producer in Washingtonian Magazine (2015-2024) and was awarded in 2018, 2019, 2020, 2021 as a Best Agent (100 Best Agents you want on your side!) and 2021 - 2024 REAL Trends ‘America’s Best’ list. While these accomplishments speak to Donna’s ability as a salesperson and entrepreneur, what truly sets Donna apart is her approachable, relatable personality that guides her in helping her clients make wiser decisions. While calling DC home for more than 25 years, Donna’s eclectic career shifted from corporate sales, to volunteerism while raising 3 rambunctious children, to finally finding herself in the real estate profession that enabled her to combine her warm and gracious demeanor with her passion to make her clients the focus. This combination of skills offers her sellers a competitive technological edge coupled with years of on-the-ground market knowledge to develop a comprehensive marketing plan to secure top dollar for their properties. With an exceptional work ethic, Donna benefits buyers with her direct knowledge and experience of buildings, properties, neighborhoods, and agents. This competence, teamed with Compass’s powerful technology platform, provides clients from all over the nation and world with unparalleled resources and expertise. By building strong, enduring relationships with clients, Donna truly is able to aid clients in making thoughtful, worthwhile, and most importantly, well-.informed decisions.
title: Realtor®, Licensed in DC, VA and MD, Team Lead

description: About Mank & Olin The Mank & Olin Team brings over 40 years of combined experience in Washington, DC, Maryland, and Northern VA. The combination of our energy, refinement, discretion, and commitment to each of our clients, is what sets us apart. If you are looking to buy or sell your home and want a true neighborhood expert, you've found the right group! We will help you sell your property quickly for a high price or purchase your new property in our competitive market, focusing on your individual needs and ensuring the process is all about you. We would love to meet you for a consultation and show you how our experience paired with Compass' innovative technology and marketing will lead to an easy and stress-free experience.

About Carrie Carrie Mann is a high-touch real estate agent known for her extensive market knowledge and unmatched devotion to her clients. Carrie's success is based almost exclusively on positive referrals, thanks to her amazing clients, friends and business associates. For the past 20 years, she has worked tirelessly on their behalf and has always given them honest and candid advice. Having been born and raised in Indiana, Carrie has been told many times that her Midwestern friendliness is a very effective combination with her East Coast tenacity. She wins for her clients, not only with strong negotiation skills and expert strategies, but also with a calm demeanor and a smile. As a former social worker, Carrie's focus has always been on a high level of individual care, so she listens carefully to her clients and, together, they find their way home.
title: REALTOR®

description: About Nancy Nancy has been helping people find (and sell) their dream homes in the DC Metro area for over 30 years—and she’s just as passionate about it now as she was on day one. She's a true local expert with an instinct for pairing people with places that feel like home. Nancy specializes in everything from stylish condos for first time buyers or downsizers to high-end luxury homes, bringing her signature blend of market savvy, attention to detail and client focused service to each and every transaction. She’s also got a powerful network of industry pros—lenders, designers, stagers, inspectors—and a great rapport with other agents, which can help her clients in competitive situations. When she’s not touring homes or sealing deals, you’ll likely find Nancy on the pickleball court, golf course, at a mahjong table, or spending quality time with her family. Because for her, it’s not just about houses—it’s about home. Ready to relocate or find a second home? Our nationwide network of top realtors is here to help. Contact me to get connected.
title: Realtor®

description: About Danielle Danielle became a full-time Realtor in 2006 after purchasing her first home. As a Montgomery County native, and now a resident of Friendship Heights, DC, Danielle offers unparalleled local insight into the communities she serves. Relentless dedication to her clients, unwavering integrity, and unrivaled expertise are the keys to her success. Danielle's mission? To empower buyers and sellers to navigate the real estate process more seamlessly than ever before. When she's not working, Danielle can be found spending time with family/friends, watching DC sports, or hosting fundraisers for the Leukemia Lymphoma Society. As a Hodgkin's Lymphoma survivor, Danielle is thankful for every waking day and gratefully donates a portion of all real estate commissions.
title: Realtor® | Licensed in MD, DC, VA

description: About Evan Evan Lee Marbury is a young agent with a keen eye for design, a willingness learn, an -depth knowledge of technology social media. Evan makes it his job is make the -buying process clear simple. Evan has worked with all sorts of clients a variety of properties across the Washington D.C. area. From young families looking to into their first , business professionals searching for a spot in the heart of the , immigrants needing a place live quickly, homeowners selling upgrading their homes. The gifts of such a diverse experience base helped Evan accumulate several "best practices" in the services he provides. From strategic of homes for extensive experience negotiating purchase agreements. Evan has honed his skill set best serve present future clients with innovative practices, an open mind, a willingness fight for his clients.
title: Realtor®

description: About Marga + Justine Marga Pirozzoli and Justine Pope have been consistently named "Top Agents" by Washingtonian Magazine; "Top Producing Agents" by Northern Virginia Magazine; "Top Producers" by Arlington Magazine and the Northern Virginia Association of Realtors (NVAR). Marga is an Associate Broker in Virginia and the District of Columbia. Marga has nearly three decades of experience in residential real estate sales, rentals, and purchases. Prior to working in the real estate industry, she worked as a successful attorney in Fairfax, VA. Marga earned her undergraduate degree from Boston College and Law degree from George Washington University. With her clients, she practices attention to detail, provides reliable service with an easy and relaxed manner, and focuses on what matters most - helping each client find their place to be while having fun doing so. She has represented both buyers and sellers in the District of Columbia, Arlington, Falls Church, McLean, Alexandria, and the greater Northern Virginia area. Her personal and individual approach to serving her clients is complemented by her experience and negotiation skills. Many of her clients are referrals and repeat customers as Marga genuinely forges relationships with each person well beyond the real estate transaction. Marga is a proud member of the Northern Virginia Association of Realtors® Lifetime Top Producers and enjoys her continued involvement within the industry. Over the past 30 years, Justine has lived throughout Virginia in Arlington, Alexandria and McLean. She is focused primarily on these areas in particular as she guides buyers, sellers, owners, and tenants through the real estate process with ease and insight. Prior to becoming a Realtor, Justine spent over 20 years working at Fannie Mae in a number of positions that provided her with unique perspective into the home-buying experience. She previously worked in the White House in a variety of positions including Associate Director of Cabinet Affairs. Justine is a member of the Northern Virginia Association of Realtors, and is a graduate of Marymount University. When she is not working with her clients, she moonlights as the Vice President for Human Development for her four children. Client Testimonials Scroll down for more ★★★★★ Marga and Justine are a phenomenal team who exemplified professionalism, poise, and expertise when helping us find and secure a home we love in an incredibly competitive market. The benefit of collaborating with these two agents was evident from day one—they exude an unwavering commitment to quality communication and excellence throughout the home buying experience. We were also ecstatic to learn they offer a suite of real estate services that expand opportunities to partner with them in the future. We are grateful to them both! - Elly & Jared ★★★★★ Marga and Justine helped us buy our first home at the height of spring selling season and in an extremely competitive area! I first worked with Marga 3.5 years ago when my then fiancé and I were looking to rent our first apartment together. Marga Pirozzoli was very communicative, kind, and responsive. I knew from just a week and a half of working with her to find an apartment that she would be my realtor when my husband and I were ready to buy a house. We met Justine Pope as we began our search for houses and got to experience what an incredible team Justine and Marga are! Their expertise and dedication helped us find our dream home in Arlington and receive a ratified contract within a week of our search. Justine and Marga did everything to ensure that our needs were met and answered any questions we had throughout the process. That included constant communication, sometimes even late at night—calls, texts, emails—all to ensure that we were completely satisfied. On closing day, we were beyond satisfied—we were overjoyed! I would highly recommend Marga and Justine to anyone looking to buy or sell as they were such a pleasure to work with. We will be sending several referrals their way for years to come! - Alana & Harley ★★★★★ Marga and I have been friends for years! When I made the decision to sell our family home of 30 years I knew Marga was my go to realtor! She was very sensitive and understanding of how bittersweet it was to sell after so many years of family history and she gave very sound advice to help make the decision easier. Her professional knowledge of the marketplace and insights on timing, pricing and preparing the house for market were impeccable. Marga’s style is very methodical, practical, and organized which gave me confidence and solace every step of the way. She was able to recommend professional handymen, roofers, masonry’s, cleaners, stagers, and even muscles to move furniture when needed. Her fun, witty personality lightened the stress and added an element of fun to the whole process. Marga introduced me to Justine and we were instant friends. Justine’s warm, calm approach instantly reduced the stress level of selling the house. She too understood the difficulty of selling a family home of 30 years and was sensitive to the emotions that go along with the decision. The communication between Marga, Justine, and myself was always very clear and anything that came up throughout the process was promptly handled. Marga and Justine are a great team! They made sure every I was dotted and T crossed! Together as a team Marga and Justine go above and beyond their responsibilities as realtors. They held my hand every step of the way and it made the journey so much easier for me and it means the world to me. If you’re looking to sell your house, you can’t find a better team than Marga and Justine! - Jane R. ★★★★★ After a two-year search on our own for a weekend home (during which Marga frequently and generously shared her expertise), she agreed on short notice to take us to central Virginia to tour a house that caught our interest. Having been charmed by the house and surroundings at first sight, turns out we had only a few hours to submit a contract in a competitive bidding situation, and Marga helped us make the strongest possible offer, beating out three other parties. Once our offer was accepted, the "fun" of buying a small farm with an 18th-century house in a distant county began. Marga called on her extensive contacts to help arrange thorough inspections of the home and outbuildings and answer legal questions about agricultural zoning and development. At the last minute a potential deal-breaker popped up but Marga calmly talked us through our options, stayed in constant communication with the listing agent, and kept the purchase on course with an outcome that was highly beneficial to us - all over a holiday weekend. Behind the scenes, Justine arranged numerous inspections, surveys, and meetings. We wouldn't have known who to turn to for these things, and we didn't have to - Justine and Marga took care of them. Marga even came to closing with us. Her years of experience, professional network, attention to detail, and professionalism balanced with humor got us through a stressful process. We couldn't be happier with our country house or the experience of working with Marga and Justine. - Mark and Mia ★★★★★ We are repeat customers! We've sold two home sales and purchased two with Marga and her team and each time had a truly wonderful experience. While this can be a very stressful process, we felt 110% confident by partnering with her. She was candid, provided great feedback, helped explain clearly all details and managed the actual negotiations brilliantly. Her expertise and knowledge of the Northern Virginia and DC area was invaluable during our home searches. In addition, she was extremely responsive to every one of our questions, no matter how small. It was truly a pleasure working with Marga and we always felt she kept our best interests in sharp focus. - Brad & Jessica ★★★★★ We were referred to Justine and Marga by a family friend when we were living in Syracuse, New York and looking to move to the DC area. Within one day, both began sending us a number of houses from the local area that not only met all of our criteria but were in our price range. Over the next several weeks we were able to execute several offers in a highly competitive area. Eventually, with the tireless help from Justine and Marga we found a house that far exceeded all of our expectations. Our journey to finding our dream home would not have been possible without Justine. She was able to work with us seamlessly despite the physical distance between us., as well as. navigating our busy schedule with one toddler and one infant. She responded to every call, text and FaceTime without fail while always being supportive, positive and validating. This was especially apparent when in the midst of our home search and placing multiple offers, COVID-19 changed our military travel plans and placed us in quarantine in New York. Knowing that Justine was working on our behalf several states away allowed us to continue our transition to the DC area and gave us a sense of comfort in uncertain times. Words cannot express how grateful we are to have met such a power team in Justine and Marga! - Joe & Marisa ★★★★★ I was referred to Marga and Justine by a very close friend who spoke so highly of both of them. I took his recommendation and reached out to them when I began my journey to buy my first home. It was probably the best decision I made in my home buying process. Looking to buy your first home can be an intimidating and daunting task. I was so lucky to have Marga and Justine by my side from the very beginning. My journey to buy my first home in Arlington spanned just over a year. Marga and Justine were there with me every step of the way. Whether it was responding to a text late at night, drafting offers quickly and efficiently, coming up with innovative and creative ways to be competitive in a super competitive market like Arlington, or meeting with me late at night to see a unit, they always had my back. Thanks to them I was able to buy a condo that met all my criteria and was centrally located exactly where I wanted to be. I can’t thank Marga and Justine enough. I highly recommend them to my friends and family. If you’re looking to buy a home, Marga and Justine would be an amazing addition to your team. I am forever grateful for their help. - Anthony P.

About Meredith Meredith Margolis’ love affair with the DC area inspired her to become a real estate agent in 2006. Since then, she is known as one of DC’s top , using her keen sense of judgement and negotiating skills to assist her clients write the winning or attract the best and highest her sellers. Before pursuing a career in residential real estate, Meredith was a Business Development Manager for the law firm of Arent Fox LLP. Prior to that, she pursued her combined love for art and retail to a paint-your-own pottery studio located off of Dupont Circle. Meredith is a past Board Member for the Washington Project of the Arts. She is a member of the Board of the Edlavitch DC JCC. Originally from Baltimore, and an American University alumna, she resides in Dupont Circle with her husband and her two children. When she is not selling real estate, you can find Meredith at Teaism and practicing yoga at Down Dog Yoga Studio. View Meredith's Video Bio
title: Executive Vice President, Realtor®

description: About Goran I’ve spent the last 25 years focused on meeting my clients' needs – first in the broadcast news business and now in real estate. I realize that buying and selling a home is a monumental event in people's lives and I want to make that process as smooth, simple and stress-free as possible. I grew up in a family where building was close to home. My father worked as a manager in a building company and my mother, as an administrative assistant. I spent my teenage summers working on building sites and developing a real appreciation for what goes into a quality home – and the people that make that happen. I’ve tried to instill that same affection in my two teenage sons, but somehow they seem to be more interested in sports… Being a real estate agent marries my passion for building and people, as well as my dedication and commitment to my clients. I would love to help you buy, sell or rent a special place that will be a part of you and your ’s memories for a long time to come. As your agent, I will bring passion, dedication and commitment to making that happen.
title: Realtor®

description: About Michael Back 1995, Michael’s passion real estate was ignited while living in Salt Lake City, Utah. After attending the University of Utah in Business Administration, and owning a variety of local businesses, he joined a small boutique in Park City, Utah. With lots of hard work and determination, Michael earned the prestigious “Rookie of the Year” in 1996. In 2006, he moved to DC and affiliated with Coldwell Banker Dupont. Then in 2011, Michael and Stanton found that they shared similar passions real estate. With a desire to help people with the buying and selling experience, Marriott + Schnepp was formed. In 2015, we were offered a unique opportunity to join the newly formed real estate offices. Stanton was offered a role in management, so the MM Group was formed. Since becoming an agent in 1995, the real estate market has had its challenges. Each upswing and downturn has given Michael the opportunity to unique solutions. Instead of saying, “We can’t do that,” Michael’s response is always, “How can we do that?” This positive attitude is what draws people to want to work with him. Besides being a dedicated realtor, Michael takes time for family, friends, and fun for a healthy balanced life. Michael and his partner of 28 years (and husband of 8), Juan, live with their dogs, Sasha and Dash, in Logan Circle. Michael loves cars–especially his all-electric Mercedes, traveling the world with friends, spending time in their home in Puerto Vallarta, and working with various charitable and equal rights causes. He has served on the Board of Governors of the Human Rights Campaign, he was a founding Board member of Equality Utah, he served on the Board of Trustees of Ballet West and the Salt Lake Acting Company, and loves to support local neighborhood community organizations like Friends of Mitchell Park, the Logan Circle Community Association, The National Gallery of Art, and SMYAL. He is especially proud of his work as the Executive Director/Trustee of the B. W. Bastian Foundation, a private family foundation based in Utah. http://www.bastianfoundation.org
title: Vice President I Realtor DC/VA

description: About Meg Meg became a licensed Realtor® after many years of commercial construction management experience. With a degree in Sociology from the University of Virginia and a depth of knowledge in project management and sales, Meg brings compassion to her clients throughout the process of buying and selling. She understands that sometimes the need to buy or sell is fueled by complicated changes in life and her goal is to ease anxieties by developing game plans that will meet her clients’ needs. With a solid plan, anything is possible! Meg has a unique approach to client care and fully embraces negotiating on all levels. Licensed in DC and VA, she loves the dynamic market in the DC metro area. Her track record for winning competitive bids for buyers is proven and her ability to help sellers choose the strongest offer in a seller’s market results in trusted success for her clients. Ultimately, she has a passion for finding all the possibilities available, giving her clients the most thorough analysis, and helping guide their decision-making. Authenticity is her trademark and her positivity is a consistent winning approach. She has been listed as a top agent in Northern Virginia Magazine and in the Washingtonian Magazine , is an NVAR Top Producer , and takes great pride in the knowledge and experience gained from this success. Meg grew up in Alexandria and graduated from the University of Virginia in 2002 . She has lived in Arlington, DC, and now Reston since 2005. She enjoys life with her husband, two daughters, two beagles, and a fun-loving family that spans the East Coast. Her mantra in work and in life is “possibility is the gateway to action." Learn SO much more at http://www.megmarshhomes.com !
title: Realtor®

description: About Marian Marian Marsten Rosaaen has established a real estate practice that pays attention to every detail, provides knowledgeable advice, successfully guides each client to achieve their unique quest and does so with consistency, all while having fun. She is dedicated to understanding her clients’ individual needs and providing them with exceptional real estate experiences — putting each unique client at the center of the process, delivering superior service with insight, innovation, honesty and integrity. She has earned the reputation of providing prompt, personal, effective attention and the devotion and flexibility that every consumer should demand. In addition, Marian brings over 12 years of domestic and international corporate business acumen to each transaction. She helps clients develop a real estate strategy to reach their financial goals using current market data, cost-to-value comparisons and quantitative analysis. With extensive experience in finance and negotiation, she is able to cut through complex issues and help guide decisions with professionalism and focus. With intentionality, she has successfully developed a relational, referral-based practice — one that offers discreet, friendly professionalism. Her approach and unwavering work ethic have helped to establish and maintain ongoing relationships with talent and family office representatives. These relationships, along with a nationwide referral network, allow her to develop and execute real estate acquisition and strategies throughout the country. Born St. Louis, Missouri and raised in Indian River Shores, Florida, Marian has called the Washington, DC area home since 1999. When she’s not reading the latest business, financial or real estate book, she can be found training for triathlons and working in earnest, although not effectively to spend more time on the golf course. Marian is honored to be ranked as one of America's Best Agents by Real Trends and the Wall Street Journal. She is ranked among the top 1.5% of all agents, nationwide and #42 in Washington, DC based on volume. She has been recognized by Washingtonian Magazine as a 2018-2024 "Top Agent." She is a member of The George Town Club and the Top Agent Network. <br>
title: Vice President | Realtor, GRI

description: About Catie Catie, a D.C. resident of 8 years, joined Dana Rice Group in 2019. She is a graduate of American University with a degree and background in finance and marketing. She comes from 12 years of sales as well as 4 years of Real Estate experience and is ready to help you find your dream home. She lives in Chevy Chase, DC with her husband, their combined five kids and two dogs. She’s a new mom to her son, Luca, and daughter, Emery. In her free time, she loves traveling, trying exciting restaurants in and around DC, and volunteering around the community.
title: Realtor®

description: About Kisha Kisha Martin-Burney, a.k.a The DMV Real Estate Diva, current Realtor with Real Estate, Chevy Chase Md. Kisha has been a licensed realtor in DC and Maryland since 2002. Kisha founded the Martin-Burney Group in 2014. A native Washingtonian, Kisha has celebrated many awards both at work and in the community. Kisha has received several awards with Remax Realty Centre, who she was Licensed with from 2007 -20019, with the latest, the Platinum Club in 2017 & 2018 and Remax Hall of Fame in 2018, other awards and recognition include consecutive months as Top Producer for Individual and Team, including being recognized in Remax Million Dollar Monthly Club. Kisha was also featured in the Washingtonian Magazine in 2018 as one of the Top in Washington, DC. Not only is Kisha a phenomenal Agent, but also a model humanitarian. She was a top contributor to the Children Miracle Network, and committee member of volunteers for the Children Miracle Network Silent Auction Gala. Passionate about giving back to the community, she has her first homeless blanket drive in December of 2014. She also walked 39 miles in 2013 for the Avon Breast Cancer Walk in 2013. Kisha is also a Co-Chair for Public Relations with the non-profit organization “Black Girls Rock, DMV”. Kisha is also a Co-Author in a book Collaboration to be released in June 2018 “Faith for Fiery Trials”. Kisha brings a wealth of knowledge and experience to Real Estate, specializing in first time home buyers, short sales, probate, estate, foreclosures and investment properties. She is mother of 5 children, 3 grandchildren and happily married to her soul mate, Sherrod. When she is not trail blazing and giving back to the community, she enjoys cooking, catering, and assisting her daughter Jada Chanel, with her music career. Is there such a thing as “renaissance women”? Kisha is it!
title: Realtor®

description: About Martin & Jeff Group When we founded The Martin & Jeff Group in 1995, we pioneered the team approach in Washington real estate, bringing together complementary strengths from different backgrounds. With over $1 billion sold, our proven high touch approach and instincts in negotiations ensures our buyer and seller clients in every price range can achieve their real estate goals. There is no substitute for experience when navigating the complexities of the Washington market. We believe in educating and guiding our clients to sound real estate decisions. In representing our clients throughout the Washington Metropolitan Area’s three jurisdictions, we are proud to partner with Compass Real Estate to provide the best in industry technology and marketing. As founding members of the Power Players of Washington, DC, we collaborate with our most respected colleagues across the area to continually advance the local real estate community. The Martin & Jeff Group leads the industry - Washingtonian Magazine has named Martin Toews & Jeff Brier as Top Agents annually since the rankings’ inception. As technologies and markets change, our philosophy remains: Commitment, Service & Results. Check out The Martin & Jeff Group's website by following this link!
title: The Martin and Jeff Group

description: About Peter Peter Maser is a top-producing real estate agent, specializing in Montgomery County, DC, and Northern Virginia. Recognized as one of the area's leading agents, Peter earned the #2 spot for units sold in 2022 and ranked #4 in 2023 at a large Mid-Atlantic brokerage. His outstanding performance has earned him accolades from Bethesda Magazine and Washingtonian Magazine as a top producer in 2022, 2023, and 2024. Additionally, Peter was named to the DC Metro Real Producers Top 1000 list for 2023, ranking among the top agents in a market of over 22,000 Realtors. A passionate advocate for his clients, Peter is dedicated to providing exceptional service and seamless experiences throughout the buying and selling process. As a native Washingtonian with over 19 years of real estate expertise, he is deeply knowledgeable about the local market and understands the nuances of each neighborhood in Montgomery County, DC, and Northern Virginia. Whether you're searching for a dream home or preparing your property for sale, Peter is there to guide you every step of the way. Peter made the transition to full-time real estate in 2019 after a successful career as a Senior Manager in the federal government. He holds an MBA in Finance from the University of Rochester and a BA in Economics from the University of Vermont. Licensed in Maryland, DC, and Virginia, Peter brings a unique blend of financial acumen, market expertise, and dedication to his clients' success.
title: Realtor® Licensed in MD, DC, & VA

description: About Craig As a top producing Realtor® with over 25+ years’ experience, Craig has proven time and again that he can provide a comprehensive level of service to buyers and sellers in the new and resale home markets in Northern Virginia and Washington, DC. Craig’s business background, market knowledge, networking skills and professional relationships throughout the Metropolitan DC area qualify him as an excellent choice as a real estate consultant. If you are planning to buy or sell a home in Northern Virginia / Washington, DC, Craig would appreciate an opportunity to work with you. As a professional Realtor® who has worked in both markets for over two decades, Craig’s focus is to keep abreast of factors that influence the sale and purchase of local homes as well as the value and stability of the local real estate market. As a Compass Realtor, Craig utilizes the comprehensive services available to him on the Compass technology platform to develop customized solutions for each client. Working with sellers and buyers, Craig highlights how the advanced technical aspects of the Compass platform provide him the advantage of delivering advanced solutions to his clients. Software applications such as Compass’ Coming Soon listings, Compass’ Concierge Services and Compass’ Collections virtually keep Craig and his clients in touch, in real time, with factors that impact the local real estate market. In today’s competitive marketplace, technological leadership is a decided advantage for companies and clients. Craig has access to these highly developed technical tools in his tool-box. Craig's primary goals are to assure that his buyers’ and sellers’ expectations and interests are always met with superior results. During his professional Realtor career, Craig has been recognized and nominated for awards such local publications as Washingtonian magazine, Arlington magazine, and Northern Virginia magazine. Craig’s proven track record as a top producing Realtor, coupled with the technology platform offered Compass, highlight why one should give serious consideration to contact him to discuss specific real-estate interests.
