title: Senior Vice President

description: About Kurt Kurt understands that buying or selling a home is one of the most important events in his clients' lives, and he truly lives by his motto “Trusted. Transparent. Always on your side.” Everything he does is with his client’s best interests in mind, and the result is a relationship built on trust - one that lasts long after the deal is done. Kurt focuses on guiding his clients through every stage of the real estate process, from start to finish, with a white-glove service experience that covers every detail so you have nothing to worry about. He is committed to exceeding all your expectations and adding more value than you thought possible, allowing you to focus on the most enjoyable aspects of the process. The most meaningful part of Kurt’s job is seeing your dreams become reality, and that motivates him to give his all for you every single day. Real Estate has been a central part of Kurt’s life for as long as he can remember. His family built homes for a living, so he grew up exploring construction sites and newly built homes. He moved to D.C. in 2003 to attend Georgetown University, where he received his Bachelors degree and later earned his Masters in Business Administration. Since becoming a licensed realtor Kurt has focused on treating his clients like friends and family. It is his goal to be the antithesis of the stereotypical salesman agent. You’ll never have any doubt that Kurt is on your side and always has your best interests in mind. A native of Sag Harbor, New York on the east end of Long Island, Kurt is passionate about travel and experiencing other cultures. He loves virtually any kind of physical activity, from running and hiking to playing basketball, flag football, softball, soccer and tennis. Kurt also enjoys DIY projects and is frequently tearing down and replacing something in his house, much to his wife’s dismay. A dual American and Polish citizen, he is a native English speaker, fluent in Polish and proficient in Greek. Kurt lives in Shaw with his wife, young son, and their dog – a Boston Terrier named Riley. Client Reviews ★★★★★ “Kurt is so dedicated to building business that he goes way above and beyond what other agents would typically do. As we were preparing to list our home for sale we met with other agents who made different (more expensive) recommendations for what to update in the house. Kurt’s suggestions were thoughtful, unique, and actually added value without making us spend a ton of unnecessary money. He helped us sell our home quickly and for more than any of the other agents told us we could get.” -Julia Sarnoff | Seller | Shaw ★★★★★ “There are over 3000+ realtors in the District alone, and another 40k+ when you include the greater DMV region--it's a daunting task to find one that is truly working for YOU and not just for a commission. Kurt is where your realtor search should end. He went above and beyond throughout the entire process, from helping us get ready to move out, prepare for listing, coordinating a exceptional staging company, checking in on the property every day to water plants, pull weeds, sweep the sidewalk, etc. If I didn't know better, I would think Kurt was selling his OWN house. His advertising and open houses were huge successes and despite record high interest rates, Kurt was able to get us under contract within 2 weeks of listing. This was not my first rodeo buying or selling, but Kurt was an absolute standout in the process and I could not recommend him more.” -Ben Szulanczyk | Seller | Hill East ★★★★★ “Kurt was absolutely the best agent you could hope for. I was incredibly busy, and he went above and beyond to manage many of the details that should have been mine to handle so that we could sell and close quickly. He knew the real estate laws well -- and most of all -- was always friendly!” -Nancy Barnes | Seller | Shaw See for yourself what Kurt's clients have to say on Google and Zillow .
title: REALTOR® | Licensed in DC, MD and VA

description: About Brian Brian is a native Washingtonian, having been born and raised in the Bethesda and Potomac areas. Brian graduated from the University of Maryland with a degree in Business and a Master of Business Administration with a concentration in Finance. Brian comes from a long-standing family real estate tradition in the area. His grandfather was a real estate in the 1920s and his father, Deane, co- Stuart and Maury in 1956. Brian worked alongside his father and older brother Matthew 10-years where Brian was honored as Rookie of the Year Montgomery County his first year the business. Brian later earned his ’s license and gained valuable experience renovating and building new homes.
title: Associate Broker | Vice President | Maury Home Team of Compass

description: About Amy With 20 years of experience, Amy is a licensed residential real estate professional Maryland and DC working as a partner with Brian Maury at Maury Home Team at Compass. Amy's real estate experience has involved serving as an independent real estate professional as well as an office manager and training director in Seattle before joining with Brian Maury and forming a real estate team in Bethesda. Prior to Compass, Brian and Amy owned a boutique real estate brokerage , Maury Real Estate. The tools, technology, support and vision of Compass, created an ideal opportunity to continue to grow their thriving business and collaborate with other successful professionals in the DC area and throughout the US. Brian and Amy serve the greater Bethesda and DC market where they live and have raised their family. They emphasize contact, open communication, attention to detail and excellent service for their clients. They use their complementary skills to ensure that every client has the best possible home buying or selling experience. In addition, clients relocating the Bethesda area receive full-service assistance with their real estate and relocation needs.
title: Associate Broker | Vice President | Maury Home Team of Compass

description: About Lisa " Love Where You Live" Lisa, a motivated self-starter, fell in love with real estate while pursuing her master’s in business administration. It was then that Lisa began understanding generational wealth through real estate and realized the possibilities were endless. Living by the saying “leave them better than you found them,” Lisa has a passion for helping clients from all over the world realize their homeownership and real estate investment goals. Lisa is committed to providing home-buyers and sellers with professional, responsive and attentive real estate services. Want an agent who'll really listen to what you want in a home? Need an agent who knows how to effectively market your home so it sells? Give me a call! I'm eager to help and would love to talk to you.
title: REALTOR® | Licensed in DC, MD, and VA

description: About Parker As a Washington, D.C. real estate expert and Top Realtor in D.C. and Coastal Delaware, I approach every client relationship with both professional excellence and genuine compassion. Whether helping a seller with home valuation and selling strategy in D.C., guiding a first-time homebuyer, or assisting a buyer in finding their dream beach home for sale in Delaware, I understand that real estate is one of life’s most personal decisions. My experience spans everything from luxury homes and condos in D.C. to Rehoboth Beach and Lewes homes for sale, and I take pride in tailoring my guidance to meet each client’s unique goals. With strong skills in marketing, strategy, and local market knowledge, I am dedicated to serving as your trusted Realtor®. My career is built on fostering meaningful connections, and I never lose sight of the immense trust my clients place in me. Grounded in honesty and integrity, I bring a deep understanding of both the DMV and Coastal Delaware real estate market. Whether you’re searching for a home in Dupont Circle, Capitol Hill, Logan Circle, or Petworth, exploring Delaware waterfront property, or planning to sell your home in Coastal Delaware, I’m here to provide the insight and strategy that lead to success. Approaching each transaction with meticulous attention to detail, I am committed to making every step of the buying or selling process as seamless as possible. My strong negotiation and communication skills give my clients a competitive edge, and I believe deeply in balancing data-driven strategy with genuine care. Real estate is never just about the property—it’s about people, families, and the next chapter of life. Beyond my professional pursuits, I find balance in time spent with my husband and children, as well as being active in the communities I serve. In 2025, my approach to real estate reflects a blend of expertise, compassion, and personal connection. By combining trusted knowledge of the Washington, D.C. and Coastal Delaware real estate markets with a commitment to advocacy and care, I provide my clients with the confidence they need to make one of life’s most important decisions.
title: Realtor®

description: About Sean Sean has an extensive, successful business background which has allowed him to hone keen organizational, management and negotiation skills. These are invaluable capabilities when facilitating one of life’s most important transactions, buying or selling a home. description: About Tricia When Tricia began her real estate career more than 15 years ago, she was named Rookie of the Year. Since then, those same principles of hard work, integrity, and high ethical standards define her as a Realtor. This professionalism has earned her the trust of Buyers and Sellers alike. Tricia brings a diverse professional background to residential real estate, having honed her considerable negotiating and communication skills in the media and hospitality industries. She began her professional career as a producer of affiliate relations with CNN, negotiating newsgathering partnerships with local news stations across the country. Over the next ten years, Tricia’s successful negotiations helped build one of the news industry’s strongest affiliate networks. Upon arriving in Washington, DC, Tricia transitioned to another 24/7 industry, becoming Director of Public Relations for the Four Seasons Hotel in Georgetown. There she perfected the fine art of impeccable service coupled with complete discretion. Tricia expertly guides buyers and sellers through the very competitive Washington, DC-area market. Her personal network, market knowledge, and ability to put people at ease during what can be a stressful time drives her success as a Realtor.....success that led Washingtonian Magazine to recognize Tricia as a Top Realtor. Who You Hire Matters, Especially in Divorce Real Estate Adding to my nearly two decades of experience and certifications, I have become a Certified Divorce Real Estate Expert (CDRE). A CDRE is a REALTOR who has passed a rigorous certification program taught by attorneys, mediators, certified mortgage professionals, real estate professionals, and judicial officers. As a crossover expert between real estate and family law, a CDRE is trained to prevent and resolve real estate disputes that may arise in family law cases. Attorneys and clients can rely on a CDRE to help resolve their cases. The Importance of Neutrality In a traditional real estate transaction involving a family, the sellers are typically one team united in their objective. When divorce is added into the mix, the sellers may not have the same end goal and may be on hostile terms. Communication is often extremely difficult. Since there are two sides to every story, neutrality becomes exceedingly important. A divorce-trained CDRE always listens to both sides, stays neutral, finds point of leverage, and creates a path to getting the house sold. This is a complex role that traditional real estate agents, lawyers, therapists, family, and friends simply are not trained to navigate.
title: Realtor®, CRS, CDRE

Kate participates in local long distance running races and welcomes an invite to a 5K any day. She enjoys cooking international dishes, working out, swimming, traveling, and learning about other cultures. Kate is fluent in Russian, speaks Portuguese, and is learning Spanish. Kate’s goal is to give every client high-quality service in Washington DC, Maryland, Northern Virginia, and Delaware. A Washingtonian for over two decades, Kate owns a second home in Ocean City, MD which allows her to serve clients along the Atlantic coast in addition to her home base in DC. Kate is excited to bring her extensive knowledge about home renovation to make sure you get the most out of your sale or rental, and, if you are looking to buy, to find the home that fits your needs the best. TESTIMONIALS: ★★★★★ "Kate is extremely dedicated, knowledgeable, responsive, a great communicator and highly professional. She is easy to work with, cares about her clients and acts in their interests. Our condo was in an up-and-coming area with a tough seller’s market. She was our 3rd realtor, and thanks to her dedication we sold! And we got two offers with Kate. To help us to sell the condo, she did a thorough research. For example, she actually visited similar properties to have a better understanding of the area and the market. She came up with a thought-through strategy, that also included some financing offers and city programs. She provided frequent updates and we revisited the strategy as needed. Can’t recommend her enough" Natalia ★★★★★ "I had a wonderful, trouble-free experience with Kate. She came recommended by friends and they were absolutely right. Kate took care of all the aspects related to the sale and the entire process ran smoothly. She advertised the property ahead of time inside the agency and among her network, spiking the interest of potential buyers. We had several offers before the official open house and sold above asking on the day. Everything, from moving my stuff to staging, correspondence with the title company and navigating the system as an international was taken care of with great professionalism. Yes, if you are employed by an international organization in the DMV area, Kate is the person to work with!" - Inga ★★★★★ "I was selling my Foggy Bottom Washington DC apartment in a remote mode (I was in Europe), and I would highly recommend Kate. She is cheerfully (yet unobtrusively) proactive and resourceful in proposing solutions which wouldn’t have occurred to you otherwise. Ideal for an inexperienced buyer or seller. For instance, she proposed to repaint and unclutter the apartment, which paid off beautifully. She also helped to fix many minor things in the property, as well as in getting rid of tech trash (massive amount in my case). She is a trusted mentor and guide in finding relevant service providers (if needed) from the first to the last step. I have not only done a long postponed sale with a good price, I enjoyed the experience and leant quite a bit in the course of it. Again, highly recommended." - Yevgeny ★★★★★ "Kate is a wonderful real estate agent. She is very knowledgeable of the real estate market dynamics and helps her clients navigate very effectively through this super competitive environment. Kate is very pragmatic and offers very valuable insights and advice that go above and beyond the regular TORs for a real estate agent (she helped us with contacts of mortgage reps, insurance agents, contractors, gardeners and even gave us ideas and advice on home decoration). She is punctual, detail oriented, proactive and very resourceful." - Edon ★★★★★ "When we decided to put our house in NW DC on the market, a colleague had referred to Kate. She has returned our call immediately and we set up an interview. While we had given her no information besides the house address, she has come fully prepared. A year ago we went through a sales of the house in VA experience with what turned out a terrible agent, and Kate was the total opposite at every step of the way. What was a nightmare experience in selling the house in VA was quite an easy and fun process with Kate. All in all, I highly recommend Kate. Not only she is a delightful person, she will also get the best deal for your money, whether you are buying or selling it. She had been a super successful professional in her previous carrier and she has brought that attitude and professionalism into her new business of real estate." - Maria ★★★★★ "Fantastic professional service -- first to sell the house at an amazing price and with no hassle and then -- to buy a new one in a very tough market. Extremely efficient knowledgeable on a variety of important subjects and putting her knowledge to action in a non-self-imposing way: from market analytics to helping at all pre- transaction transaction and post-transaction stages. Very easy to work with and very reliable." -Leo ​​★★★★★ "Kate was very helpful and caring when organizing the sale of our townhouse. She was very attentive to detail and tried her best to understand our exact needs. She consulted with her colleagues on our specific case because our home was in unusual neighborhood that had its own specifics. She made the process of the sale very clear and took a lot of burden away from our shoulders. Recommended a reliable contractor that did great job with painting the home also a great decorator who didn't charge much but made out home look attractive to the perspective buyers. Throughout the whole process she was very professional punctual and genuinely caring. I would recommend Kate to anyone looking to sell buy or rent a property in DC metro area! Thank you Kate!" - Vee ​​★★★★★ "I first met Kate because she sold my neighbor's house. He highly recommended her as an agent. When I hired her I had tenants in my house and Kate new all of the legal documents that needed to be produced. She found a buyer for my house before it was listed because of her networking skills. Kate is smart honest professional and knowledgeable. She was with me every step of the way no matter how often I contacted her. We have become friends. I highly recommend using her as your agent." - Vera ★★★★★ "Kate helped me to sell my DC coop. A lot of work went into getting my place ready for sale. Kate worked as hard on my little co-op apartment as she would for a million dollar property. She guided me through the extensive renovations and relieving me of the hassle of being a landlord. My life is so much simpler now!" - Esther ★★★★★ "I had the opportunity to work with Kate over the summer when she put on the market my unit. The experience was great: Kate went out of her way to have the property ready was always available and made the process as smooth as possible. I would definitely recommend Kate to anyone selling or renting out a property. Thanks again!!" -Andrea
title: Realtor®

description: About Christina Christina has grown up with real estate in her blood. Many of her family members are in the industry, which makes her no stranger to the competitive and fast paced nature of the business. Christina understands where her clients are coming from and gets them where they want to be. She partners closely with sellers to navigate dynamic market trends and achieve financial goals and timelines, and works collaboratively with buyers to help define home searches, write competitive offers, and tactfully negotiate price. Raised in Bethesda, MD, Christina attended Georgetown Visitation Prep School and went on to graduate with a business degree from Miami University of Ohio. She currently resides in Glover Park where her central location allows her to fully understand the dynamic of the downtown market but also the suburban market. When Christina is not selling real estate, she enjoys playing golf, traveling and spending time with family and friends.
title: Realtor® - Licensed in DC, MD & VA

description: About Ryanna When it comes to real estate, Ryanna Miller is so much more than a Realtor to her clients. She’s a trusted advisor, advocate, and friend all in one, stopping at nothing to ensure every buyer or seller gets the experience—and the results—that they need. Originally born in DC but raised in Alaska, Ryanna always knew she would find her way back to our nation’s capital. After receiving her bachelor’s degree from A&M University, Ryanna attended American University’s reputable graduate International Relations program, where she sharpened her problem-solving skills and aptitude for foreign affairs. In the years since graduating, Ryanna has opened a hair salon, obtained her Grant Writing certificate from Emory, aided in poverty reduction, worked in international relations, and led teams operating in the global finance space—to name just a few. Ryanna also bought her first home in DC, which ignited her passion for real estate that burns just as bright three years on. Ryanna recognizes that real estate is about so much more than buying or selling a house, it’s about finding a place to call home. To do that, you need a trusted agent by your side who’s committed to making your dreams a reality. Ryanna found that dedication in her own Realtor, and she promised herself that her clients would never have to settle for anything less. That’s a promise she’s kept ever since getting her license, guiding every client with compassion, expertise, and the drive to make a difference. Today, Ryanna is known by clients as the Realtor they can always count on. To Ryanna, every transaction is an opportunity for negotiation, and she’s not afraid to advocate for her clients’ best interests at every turn—and at any cost. As a hands-on teacher, Ryanna leverages her first-hand knowledge of the real estate process for her clients’ benefit, providing the valued understanding of what to expect along with the reassurance that they are not alone. As a DC resident, Ryanna loves getting lost in the vibrant sights and sounds of the city to help her clients find their own place there time after time. She works with clients in all price points and phases of life, although she has a particular penchant for helping first-time home buyers since she knows from experience just how rewarding it can be to make that initial investment in your future. Ryanna was selected by the US Department of State and the Institute of International Education as the 2019-2020 Gilman Alumni Scholarship Ambassador, a role that empowered her to connect with underrepresented college students, university officials, international education leaders, and congress through the power of speech. As a proud Deanwood resident, Ryanna can often be found making her community a better place, thanks in part to her work with Diplomatic Perspective, a non-profit she founded that partners with high school students to enhance their exposure to international affairs. She’s also involved with the Brookings Institute, and is a member of Alpha Kappa Alpha Sorority, Inc. In the rare moments when she’s not giving back to the people and places around her, Ryanna loves traveling, practicing a plant-based lifestyle, and spending time with family and friends.
title: Realtor®

description: About Dina Real Estate is in Dina’s blood. A third-generation Realtor and 2023 National Association of Realtors ‘30 under 30’ award recipient, Dina has been immersed in residential real estate all her life. She has an understanding and sensitivity to the various stages and challenges of home ownership well beyond her years. Dina is a leader at Wydler Brothers, working closely with Hans Wydler as a Partner Agent. She also successfully launched the Miller Sisters team in May 2023, along with her sister Christina, which operates alongside Wydler Brothers. Raised in Bethesda and currently living in Glover Park, Dina knows the region well and loves sharing her enthusiasm for Washington, DC and the surrounding neighborhoods with her clients. Her rigorous attention to detail, work ethic, and communication skills complement the genuine commitment she gives to each and every client. Dina attended Georgetown Visitation Prep School and went on to graduate from the University of Dayton with a B.S. in Marketing and Communications. When Dina is not assisting clients, she enjoys playing golf and paddle tennis, spending quality time with family and friends and traveling with her husband, Brett.
title: Realtor® Licensed in DC & MD

description: About Tamara Start your search today! Tamara Miller is an expert realtor at Compass. Relocating to the district, in order to attend Howard University, was one of the greatest decisions of her life. Tamara has been a resident of DC for over 20 years and has enjoyed witnessing the transitions of our nations capital. After a decade of selling service and luxury experiences at the Four Seasons Hotels and Resorts, Tamara decided to take the leap and enter the world of real estate. Her in depth understanding and experience in sales, client relations, and operations translate seamlessly to the home buying process. Tamara enjoys playing the piano, cycling on Peloton and traveling the world. In her downtime she loves playing with her Boston Terriers and catching a good Western on Netflix. Visit Tamara's Website
title: Realtor®

description: About Mandy An Executive Vice-President at Compass, founding principal agent Mandy Mills has been selling real estate in the Washington-DC area for over 20 years. Known for her generosity of spirit, broad market knowledge and ability to see the promise in a property, she is an honest and trusted advisor in assessing and forecasting value. Sensing an opportunity to provide a broader, white glove, full-service experience, Mills co-founded MDT Real Estate (formerly The Mandy & David Team) in 2005 to better serve her growing list of buyers and sellers. The team’s ability to manage their clients’ experience through every aspect of a transaction, build upon their shared market knowledge and serve clients in every neighborhood and at every price point quickly made them a local leader. The following year Mills was approached by the upstart real estate brokerage, Compass, and her group became the brokerage’s first signed team outside of New York City. With career sales of nearly $3 Billion, MDT has been one of DC’s top producers for the past decade and is consistently recognized in the Wall Street Journal’s annual Real Trends The Thousand and Washingtonian Magazine’s Top 100 Agents. Mills is a champion of local causes, co-founding DC Wise and serving as a board member for the capacity-building non-profit, Fair Chance. She has created multiple fundraising initiatives to support her neighborhood public school, including the community-enhancing Mount Pleasant House & Garden Tour. A nationally-recognized figure in real estate, Mills has spoken on panels with industry luminaries such as Compass CEO, Robert Reffkin, and top national producers, The Jills (Miami) and Jade Mills (Beverly Hills, no relation). Mandy is a proud graduate of The University of North Carolina and lives near the National Zoo with her husband and three children.
title: Executive Vice President | Realtor® Licensed in DC, MD & VA

description: About Keith As your trusted advisor, I work diligently on your behalf, sharing my processes with you and always putting your interests first. I aim to understand your desires and concerns, to provide consistent and courteous service, and to create a memorable and engaging experience together. I am expert at visualizing the possibilities to use and customize space to ensure you find a home that suits your unique lifestyle. Having lived around the world, working in engineering technology, land development and education, I apply my breadth of knowledge and extensive experience to the dynamic DMV market and an international client base.
title: REALTOR®

description: About M&M Properties Group Both Northern Virginia natives, Madeline Middlebrook and Maria Kelly have a combined 11 years of real estate experience and have worked closely together for 4. With 5 star customer reviews, they have a proven track record of guiding clients through this dynamic and competitive market. Both Madeline and Maria are customer driven, focused and dedicated to making the buying and selling process easy and fun. For a tailored experience in buying, selling, or investing Madeline and Maria are ready to help you with your next transaction in DC, MD and VA. Get to know us: Maria loves traveling with her husband and girls, seeing friends and family, entertaining and adores her dog, Teddy, a Kooikerhondje who is from the Netherlands! Madeline and her husband Brad welcomed their son, Forrest this year and are in love! In her free time Madeline loves to spend time with family, read, travel, hike and visit local wineries. Madeline and Maria support SOME - So Others Might Eat, Leukemia and Lymphoma Society, Doorways, McLean Project for the Arts, BRAWS "Bringing Resources to Aid to Women Shelters", Georgetown Visitation Preparatory School National Center for Children and Families through donations and volunteering. Looking to buy or sell in the DMV? Let us help you navigate through the process and stay informed with our Buyer Guide or Listing Guide . The best part? These guides are both free and downloadable for all the information you will need right away!

About Altaf As a resourceful, self-motivated independent professional, Altaf strives to work for your best interest relying on his 22+ years of experience, knowledge, and expertise in real estate. He is a detail-oriented, team player who will diligently help you walk through your real estate transaction from start to finish. Altaf's goal is to offer a productive, yet stress-free experience to his clients, and he builds relationships through trust, professionalism and confidentiality.
title: Realtor® | Principal, TurnKey at Compass

description: About Alan With over two decades of experience in the real estate industry, Alan Moin has been a trusted advisor for clients navigating the dynamic markets of Washington, D.C., Maryland, and Virginia since 2002. Known for his commitment to exceptional service and delivering outstanding results, Alan approaches each transaction not merely as a sale but as an opportunity to build lasting relationships. His dedication has cultivated a business largely driven by referrals from satisfied clients. Fluent in English, Farsi, French, and Spanish, Alan effectively serves a diverse clientele, ensuring clear communication and personalized guidance throughout the buying or selling process. His expertise spans various property types, including investment properties, new constructions, historic homes, and condominiums. Beyond his professional endeavors, Alan is deeply committed to community service. He actively volunteers with local organizations supporting the homeless. Residing in Chevy Chase, D.C., since 1998, Alan remains an engaged and active member of his community. Whether you're a first-time homebuyer or a seasoned investor, Alan Moin offers the expertise, dedication, and personalized service to help you achieve your real estate goals.
title: REALTOR®

description: About Anthony Anthony Mokabber is truly dedicated to providing exceptional, professional, and comprehensive real estate services to his valued clients. As a specialist in the Acquisition and Marketing of Residential, Luxury, Townhome and Investment Properties, his trusted counsel and thorough and competent representation is highly valued. He is meticulous in monitoring the current trends and truly enjoys sharing his insights into the rich and charming character that the North Virginia, DC and Montgomery County real estate market has to offer! Anthony fully indulges his clients with impeccable, first-class service and true advocacy, and excels at creating a heightened real estate experience. At every interaction, Anthony’s proficient counsel, strategic insights and deep commitment are clearly exhibited. In personally working with each client and upon understanding their specific priorities, he diligently aligns and applies himself in order to accomplish their real estate goals. With a Bachelor’s Degree from the University of Maryland in Economics, he executes on behalf of his clients with very deliberate, strategic, and skillful measures that achieve impressive results. Whether it is educating first-time buyers on each step of the home buying process, analyzing current market data, or conducting further research to disclose all facts that may affect or influence a property; being proactive, Anthony delivers a smart, solution-driven, collaborative approach. His access to contractors, painters, designers or attorneys, lenders and more, is his touch in heightening each facet of his service and making all the elements perfectly come together. For Anthony personal relationships in life are paramount and he considers it an honor that his client’s value and trust in his expertise and professionalism to represent them. He is very thorough in providing constant communication and is always extremely attentive, accessible and responds promptly to his clients. When met with a tough challenge, he is highly proficient in working through the issues. Delivering responsive, confident results and finding creative and equitable solutions are all part Anthony’s distinguished style in providing exceptional representation and orchestrating the most rewarding real estate experience possible. Contact Anthony to serve you and your personal real estate interests.
title: REALTOR®

description: About Emeka Emeka Mokwunye is a seasoned real estate agent with over a decade of experience in the Washington, DC and Maryland markets. Having lived in the area for over 20 years, Emeka has completed more than 170 successful transactions and helped over 200 clients achieve their real estate goals. Specializing in sought-after locations like Washington, DC, Rockville, Bethesda, Silver Spring, and Takoma Park, Emeka’s local expertise and market knowledge have made him a trusted advisor. With a total sales volume exceeding **$81 million**, he’s consistently recognized as a top producer in the region. Emeka is known for his ability to anticipate market trends and deliver optimal results through strong communication and negotiation skills. His client-centered approach ensures buyers and sellers receive clear, informed guidance throughout the process. Currently residing in Mt. Pleasant with his wife and son, Emeka enjoys exploring DC’s vibrant neighborhoods and discovering new pho spots. With a deep appreciation for the DMV’s diverse community, he remains dedicated to helping others find their perfect home in this thriving region.
title: REALTOR®

description: About Sina Through his highly professional, informed, and diligent approach, Sina Mollaan provides outstanding expertise and professional representation to his valued clients. As principal of The Mollaan Group, Sina exhibits his proficient counsel, keen insights, and the highest level of integrity and resourcefulness when advising his clients on all real estate matters. As a specialist in the Acquisition and of Residential, Luxury, and Investment Properties, he is intimately connected, knows the trends, and truly enjoys sharing his insights into their rich and charming character that the DC Metro real estate market has to offer! Through his genuine dedication to his local, national, and international clientele, Sina indulges his clients with sophisticated, first-class service while delivering a personal and enduring lifestyle real estate experience. Sina elevates the real estate experience offering his clients a smart, solution-oriented, consultative approach. He is exceedingly adept at and creating value as he skillfully leverages each opportunity to the benefit of his clients. In representing his clients with a high level of personalized service, he truly values the rich and personal interaction with each client and is extremely attentive and responsive to their requirements. Sina is meticulous in monitoring the specific trends of the region and provides his clients with real estate advice based on a more complete perspective and careful analysis of the market. Sina excels at serving each client with true advocacy and full-service resources that markedly result in each client accomplishing their real estate goals. His clients trust in his integrity, valued perspective, and highly personal and diligent approach. He is very thorough in providing constant communication and is always extremely attentive, accessible, and responds promptly to his clients. With a global upbringing and perspective, Sina’s life journey has taken him from Iran to Italy to now the capital of the United States. Delivering responsive, confident results with a compassionate, impactful approach are all part of Sina’s distinguished style in providing an unprecedented depth of real estate expertise. Contact Sina to serve you and your personal real estate interests.
title: Real Estate Advisor

description: About Mollaan Babbington Group - DC Ranked by RealTrends as the top Mega Team in DC, the Mollaan Babbington Group is a top-performing real estate team proudly serving the DC, Maryland, and Virginia markets. For over 15 years, we’ve been committed to delivering a real estate experience defined by integrity, transparency, and exceptional results. Buying or selling a home is more than a transaction—it’s a major life moment. That’s why we built a team of local experts who combine strategic marketing, deep market knowledge, and genuine care for our clients. With decades of DC living, we offer a rare, boots-on-the-ground perspective of the local market and a true passion for helping people find their place in it. Our Promise Whether you’re buying your first home, moving up, or selling a property, we’re here to guide you from start to finish with expertise, care, and a relationship-first approach. Our results reflect our values, and our clients remain at the heart of everything we do.

About Momentum Group of Compass Our team's mission is to develop long-term, collaborative, trusted relationships with our clients and deliver highly personalized service —rooted in integrity, reliability, and data-driven analysis. Whether you are buying your first home, or preparing to sell, we are committed to exceeding your expectations and achieving your goals in an ever-changing market. W e pool our marketing, staging advice, PR knowledge and perspectives to benefit every client. When you hire one of us, you get expert individual attention, as well as the power of the entire team behind you. As a result, a large percentage of our business comes from referrals and satisfied, repeat clients. Together, we offer over 30 years of combined real estate experience and deep neighborhood knowledge across the District of Columbia, as well as the Maryland and Virginia suburbs. For an unparalleled real estate experience, look no further than the Momentum Group at Compass.

About Sherine In 1997 Sherine decided it was time for a drastic change in her life and she moved to the US here in D.C., where she had strong roots established by her father who studied here and where her brother was born. Sherine grew up in a family of architects and after much soul searching, she decided to go back to school and earn her master’s in interior design. Interior Design skills can help clients when selling their home. Because she specialized in residential design, she has the resources to help clients prepare their homes for sale. She can guide you to what appeals to most buyers! Sherine works with clients to help them prepare their home to put on the market. She uses what they already have and if needed, adds to it to make clients homes look appealing. Sherine is a hands-on agent and will help her clients with many staging tips. She will walk you through the process from beginning to end and she will work closely with other agents to resolve any hurdles her clients may encounter along the way. Sherine prides herself on prompt follow up so that clients are aware of the status. Sherine became a Real Estate agent because she loves working with people and the challenge of finding the right home that fits their needs and budget. Her philosophy is to never say no to an offer, instead, negotiate. Sherine is always available to answer your questions throughout the entire process. Buying or selling your home can be stressful, but that's why she is there, to guide you through it and make it as easy a process as it can possibly be. Sherine listens to her clients' needs and budget and makes it a reality. The best moment for her is at closing, to see that her clients are happy when they close and have ownership of their new home.
title: Realtor®

description: About J.P. J.P. is Managing Partner with the Capital Estate Group and Vice President with . Born Georgetown University Hospital, J.P. is a true native of the area, having lived in many areas of the District of Columbia, Maryland, and Northern Virginia. J.P. attended the University of Michigan after graduating from the Maret School of Washington. J.P., who is fluent in both English and Spanish, studied business at the University of Salamanca, Spain. He completed his formal study of business at Johns Hopkins University, receiving his Masters of Business Administration. He became a senior executive for International Solutions, an international economic consulting firm specializing in North-South trade, with clients including IBM and the U.S. Department of Commerce. Over his 20 years in real estate and real estate development, he has been a Top Producer agent at Prudential Real Estate, Sotheby's International Realty, and , and was Executive Director of Luxury Homes for Keller Williams Capital Properties and a member of the Agent Leadership Council for Keller Williams Realty. He has served on important committees and strategic planning groups for MRIS, the Greater Capital Area Association of REALTORS®, and the Maryland Association of REALTORS®. He has a Certificate in International Real Estate for Local Markets offered the prestigious Certified International Specialist network. He is experienced at understanding national and international relocation needs, having worked with corporate, governmental, and non-governmental clients in relocating employees and executives alike. He is an associate in ' Sports Entertainment Division, understanding the special needs of athletes and entertainers. J.P. is also an experienced renovator and developer, having restored and renovated many properties and assisted numerous clients in the renovation and restoration of newer, older, and historic properties alike. He is a principal in several developments, construction, coaching, and wellness businesses. View all of Capital Estate Group's transactions here .
title: Senior Vice President

description: About Sheila A former trial lawyer in the Tax Division of the U.S. Justice Department, Sheila has spent more than 30 years developing her expertise in the DC real estate market; specializing in single family homes, condos and co-ops in Woodley Park, Cleveland Park, and surrounding neighborhoods. She has represented buyers and sellers in more than 800 real estate transactions, totaling some $750 million in transaction value, in every kind of market. She has won numerous “top producer” awards in DC and the mid-Atlantic region, and, along with her business partner, Ty Hreben, has been the TOP agent in Woodley Park since 1995. Sheila has been recognized as one of America’s Best Real Estate Agents, a prestigious annual ranking of agents in the Wall Street Journal and as “BEST AGENT and TOP PLATINUM PRODUCER” in 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, 2019 and 2020 by Washingtonian Magazine. Sheila has lived with her family in Woodley Park for 35 years. Sheila supports the Woodley Park Community Association, Mary’s Center Maternal Child Care in Adams Morgan, Oxfam, Children International, Doctors Without Borders, SPCA, among others. During the time that her 2 daughters attended Oyster Bilingual Elementary School, Sheila served 4 years as elected Parent-Representative on Oyster’s Re-Structuring Team. She also served on the Principal Selection Committee and was Chair of the Oyster Fiesta auction for 3 years. Client Testimonials: “Sheila is a gem! This is my 6th real estate transaction and I have never had an agent that came close to the knowledge, devotion, enthusiasm and honesty that Sheila has. She went above and beyond for me and my family.… There is no end the superlatives I could use to describe her and my happiness for her work for us.” “[We] would like to thank you for your excellent representation on the sale of our home. As you know, I interviewed several agents before asking you to represent us. We wanted you because I thought your years of deep knowledge of the market and our community would serve us well. I also liked having another lawyer-mind in the process. Boy, did we pick well. Your grasp of both the larger market issues and the detailed issues was impressive. You drew qualified buyers to our place at a time when other houses struggled to find a market. As a result, we had choices in a market that others did not, and you found us a buyer who valued our home as much as we did. We have sold many houses in our life. None involved higher stakes; none was as well handled.”
title: Senior Vice President

description: About Trevor Real estate is Trevor Moore’s passion: he’s done it all, from brand-new luxury builds to bank-owned properties and even embassy properties. No matter the space, he sees its story. Walk through a door with Trevor, and you’ll find focused intention, inviting texture, and the essential heart that makes every home one-of-a-kind – down to the very last detail. Trevor has lived the American adventure, building an intimate understanding of national market trends, regional real estate, and the particular nuance of countless home styles from coast to coast. This rich experience informs Trevor’s already keen eye to create lasting impressions and lock in striking sales. Trevor is a Swiss Army Knife of tactical real estate savvy with a skillset as diverse as his area codes. His expertise covers world-class real estate industry technology, agent training and development, team management, firm operations, and award-winning marketing strategy. When he came to the DMV, Trevor joined one of the country’s top brokers: the Leo Pareja team. He eventually grew and led the team, building up the firm’s business and elevating its market share over seven years. In January of 2017, Trevor came to Compass, where he worked to acquire the Pareja group. At Compass, he joined forces with John Eric. The rest? That’s history. Combining 26 years of experience and sales topping half a billion dollars, the John Eric + Trevor Moore team now leads the region with top-tier service and unmatched skill. Trevor enjoys every relationship he creates along his real estate journey. He’s had the joy of joining communities in the South, American West, Southwest, Pacific Northwest, and Mid-Atlantic, gaining a genuine appreciation of each unique place, its architecture, and its people firsthand. If being outside and moving is an option, Trevor is on board. The current Ironman and former state championship wrestler competes in ultramarathons and triathlons as well as playing ultimate frisbee, and flag football. He takes great joy in sharing nature with his wife and kids on camping trips. As a dad, Trevor’s favorite charities are committed to kiddos: he volunteers with Home Stretch, an organization built to empower homeless families and children on their search for permanent homes, as well as Child Help, an organization committed to victims of child abuse. He also regularly supports the American Red Cross and Feed America. Client Testimonials Scroll down for more Trevor went above and beyond helping us buy our first home! Before we met with him, my husband and I had been looking for a home for over a year and a half with no luck and we were really overwhelmed by the daunting process of home buying. That is when Trevor came highly recommended by multiple people and made our first home buying experience the absolute best it could possibly be. We appreciate how much Trevor cared to take the time to get to know us, our exact wants, our timeline, and he executed at the exact pace we felt comfortable with. He always made himself available to answer all of our questions over the phone or in person and was so easy to get along with. You absolutely want Trevor and his team to be in your corner for when you are looking to buy a home, especially in such a competitive market. We are so grateful for this experience and to start this next chapter in our dream home thanks to this wonderful team – I highly recommend them!!! - Claire and Tommy We can not say enough great things about our experience with Trevor! He was recommended to us by a good friend and he did not disappoint. We were first time home buyers and had some other friends in the market and when we compared our realtor experience, Trevor clearly went above and beyond! He always made himself at all hours of the day/night. Every house we toured he would point out technical details that were very useful to know (ie. age/quality of windows, AC unit, heating, roof, etc.). It only took a couple of houses for Trevor to really grasp exactly what we wanted and he found our perfect house. Not only did he find it, his aggressive negotiation skills got us the house and we weren’t even the highest offer. In Northern Virginia market, that says A LOT! If you are looking for a fantastic realtor that really has your best interest at heart, don’t look any further! We couldn’t be happier in our new house and we wouldn’t be here without Trevor! - Christy and Josh We had the extreme pleasure of working with this team during the purchase of our first home this past spring. I began casually looking several years before and I never felt the slightest rush while working with this team. Once it became clear that our time was near, we picked up the pace and worked directly with Trevor. He made it EASY. Even before I completely knew the entire process or was ready to pull the trigger, Trevor went to every Open House with us to help narrow down our interests (even at the drop of a hat!). When touring these homes, we were lucky to utilize Trevor’s expertise in estimating contractor costs and always gave it to us straight. It was like walking around with your very experienced brother. He had our complete trust and we genuinely enjoyed working with him at every turn. We ended up putting a total of 4 offers down on different houses. For each and every offer Trevor was highly communicative, effectively educated us on any terminology that was foreign, and made the extra effort to give us advice and go to bat for us during negotiations. Currently it’s been 6 months since our closing and we still have open lines of communication! You don’t find that everywhere. His network of other professionals is expansive and we have already utilized 3 of the connections he helped us make. We can’t wait until after COVID when we can have an official house warming party to celebrate with Trevor! – Melanie Trevor and his staff were amazing. I was completely overwhelmed by the prospect of moving. I had moved into my condo 18 years ago and had barely done anything to it, so I was very worried that I would be losing a lot of value when selling the house. All Trevor asked me to do was trust him, which I did. At times was more of a general contractor than a realtor, overseeing a kitchen renovation, 2 bathrooms and all new flooring basically “the works”. He aggressively quoted several different contractors, and I paid waaaay less than I was expecting for these upgrades. When it came time to sell my house, we listed it for about 5% higher than I expected (the renovations came out very well), yet it still sold the first weekend for OVER listing price. I CAN NOT STRESS ENOUGH how awesome Trevor and his team were. THANK YOU THANK YOU THANK YOU! – Rick Working with [Trevor’s Team] was an excellent experience from our initial questions about house buying through actually buying a house. They were responsive to all of our initial questions and provided a good sounding board that allowed my partner and I to feel more comfortable with the process and to hone in on what the best situation was for us. It was never pressure about buying and focused on what made sense as they provided us information to enable us to make a choice appropriate for our family.
title: Vice President

description: About Michael Michael Moore, Real Estate Advisor | For over 30 years, Michael’s focus has been clear: it’s about doing good work for people through each step of the buying and selling process. For him, the client experience is the heart of the business, and his commitment to investing in the longevity of those relationships defines his career. Michael’s true gift is in his ability to empathetically navigate the hectic real estate market with a calm efficiency that brings order—and a sense of humor—to any situation. Michael lives in Eckington. His passion is philanthropic projects, and he’s been a longtime advocate for AID Life Cycle bike rides, Caron Treatment Centers, and Food and Friends. When he isn’t working, you can find him driving one of his classic cars down the parkway, adding stylish touches to his own home, or spending time in the company of good friends. About Michael Moore Homes | Whether you're an experienced or first-time homebuyer, seasoned investor, or developer, our personalized and adaptable service means we're always doing what's best for our clients. Our team is a group of subject matter experts and advisors who strive to connect with and exceed the needs of our clients. This means that our business is about building relationships to deliver meaningful, effective real estate services. Our consulting general contractor and interior designer understand how people live and how important it is to invest to create resale value and invest in the environment of your entire property aesthetic. And they also know that creating a long term sustainable asset with classic, timeless luxury and features for living needs to be conceptualized with an eye for functionality above all else. We think about how you live, and how you dream of living, through your aesthetic.
title: Michael Moore Homes | Senior Vice President

description: About John Falls Church resident and Illinois native, John headed West college, earning his B.S. from Oregon State University in 1996. He called the Pacific Northwest home nearly 15 years, working in both the real estate and natural resource fields the entire time. His experience included a seven year stint with Plum Creek, which at the time, was one the nation’s largest Real Estate Investment Trusts. It is in Oregon, where John’s passion real estate development and home renovation projects really blossomed. He completely rebuilt his vintage bayfront home hand and later acquired and converted a 40-acre forestland parcel into rural residential building lots near the Pacific Ocean. John moved to the Washington DC area in 2010 to assume a leadership role in the Federal government, serving as National Program Manager for the U.S. Bureau of Land Management, our Nation’s largest landlord. Though, it wasn’t until he moved to Arlington, where John was finally able to pursue his lifelong dream of a full time career in real estate. Full-time REALTOR® since 2015, John is licensed in both Washington, D.C. and Virginia, where his expertise ensures his clients sell their homes for the most amount of money in the least amount of time, with the smallest amount of hassle. In his spare time, John enjoys sharing his love of fly fishing and the outdoors with his wife Maria, kids, Alex and Madison, and their dogs Rocky and Gracie.
title: REALTOR®

description: About Alex D.C. area resident since 2010, Alex got bit by the real estate bug early on. No real surprise, since he grew up in the same household with two [real estate] mentors--his dad, John Moore, and stepmom, Maria Fernandez Moore, local real estate veterans who have guided him on his real estate journey. Licensed REALTOR in Virginia since 2020, DC since 2021, Maryland since 2024, and associate broker since 2024. Alex has helped clients buy, sell and rent their homes with service that goes beyond the closing table. His passion for real estate expanding with each show he shadowed and with each open house sign he speared into the ground. Alex’s unbridled enthusiasm to go the extra mile for every client shows every day. In addition to real estate, Alex also has a profound love of automobiles. In his free time, he works on restoring his classic BMW. An Oregon native, Alex currently lives in Arlington and enjoys all that Westover has to offer. When he's not servicing his clients, you can find Alex exploring the outdoors or flyfishing one of our area rivers.
title: Associate Broker VA | Realtor DC/MD

description: About Moore Homes - DC Moore Homes is a boutique real estate team that provides truly extraordinary service. We expect every client to be wowed. We are not an industrial-scale real estate team intent on dominating the world. We are Maria, John, Alex, and Charlotte Love We love what we do and it shows. We are NOT driven by production numbers. Our one and only goal are to have our clients be our fiercest and most loyal cheerleaders. We achieve that by providing the very best, first-class service. Value Real estate service is not a commodity. Comparison shopping works best for appliances and cars. With our listing services and buyer representation, we pride ourselves on giving our clients the very best advice, service, and maximum value. Character We will wow you. With kindness, patience, and respect. We put family first, including yours. This is a family business. We do NOT sell ourselves. There is no puffery. Just dedication and sincerity.

About Eldad Meet Eldad—A Calm Hand in a Chaotic Market With more than 20 years of experience helping clients buy and sell homes across DC, Maryland, and Virginia, Eldad brings a rare combination of deep market knowledge, analytical thinking, and genuine care to every transaction. His clients know him as a steady, calming presence—especially when deals get stressful. That’s no accident. With a background in mechanical engineering and a second-degree black belt in Brazilian Jiu Jitsu , Eldad thrives under pressure and approaches every challenge with clarity, strategy, and a cool head. Eldad’s approach is grounded in education and transparency. He believes the best decisions come from understanding all the options—and his gift for breaking down complex real estate processes into clear, simple terms means clients always feel informed, empowered, and in control. His philosophy is simple: I educate, they decide. And once a decision is made, he’s all in—following through, communicating proactively, and always doing what he says he’ll do. What truly sets Eldad apart is how he makes people feel. Clients often remark on his integrity, responsiveness, and sense of humor—qualities that turn stressful transactions into smooth, even enjoyable, experiences. He treats people the way they want to be treated, taking the time to understand their needs and deliver personalized service that feels both high-touch and deeply human. A longtime resident of Washington, DC (since 1990) and active in the Chevy Chase neighborhood, Eldad knows the local market inside and out. He’s licensed in all three jurisdictions and has worked with buyers and sellers at every price point, giving him a well of experience to draw from. While he doesn't rely on flashy sales stats, his results speak for themselves—most of his business comes from referrals, which he credits to one guiding belief: when you put the client first, success follows. As a Compass agent, Eldad leverages industry-leading tools, marketing support, and local market dominance—but he never lets the brand do the talking. “At the end of the day, it’s me they’re hiring,” he says. “And I take that responsibility seriously.”
title: Realtor®

description: About Douglas Douglas uses his past experiences in consulting and financial services to bring unique value to his clients. A strong attention to detail and personal touch define how Douglas approaches his business. He works to understand client needs and matches those needs to potential homes and neighborhoods. Douglas has experienced Washington from many neighborhoods that have been home through the years including Foggy Bottom, Glover Park, Capitol Hill, Friendship Heights, the West End and his current location in Dupont Circle. He is familiar with many other areas of the city as well and recognizes the uniqueness of each. He is excited with the changes that are making Washington an amazing and diverse place to call home whether it’s a studio in a glass high-rise or a renovated row house in an up and coming neighborhood. Prior to his real estate career, Douglas worked at Fannie Mae and gained valuable insight into mortgage financing and the housing market. This experience also helped solidify his attention to detail and strong customer service focus working with all levels throughout the organization. He has experienced the ups and downs of the mortgage market and understands how important it is for clients to make the right decisions when buying or selling a home. When not working with buyers and sellers, Douglas spends his time honing his cooking skills while entertaining friends and family. He spends as much time as possible with his dogs, Sundae and Camden, and he and his partner travel whenever there is an opportunity with Paris being a favorite city.
title: Realtor

description: About Patrick Patrick's success in real estate is attributed to experience, professionalism, and commitment to service in an area in which he enjoys living. Helping individuals find the right property is one of Patrick's strongest values. With extensive knowledge of the real estate industry and the local marketplace, Patrick takes pride in his attention to detail and puts all of his efforts into understanding your needs. Patrick constantly educates himself on the latest trends in the marketplace, as it is his goal to be able to provide you with top-notch service, all the time. Buying or selling your home should be a memorable and pleasant experience. Real estate is one of the most exciting investments one can make and Patrick would love to help you find the communities and properties, which suit you, best. Should you also need help valuing and selling your home, Patrick would be honored to help. With Patrick, you will be able to find everything you need to buy or sell a home, as well as learn about the market value of homes in the area. Please contact Patrick today so that you can begin this exciting journey. Patrick looks forward to servicing all of your real estate needs.
title: Realtor®

description: About Rachel With her various networks and background in corporate housing, Rachel quickly felt a calling to work within the real estate industry and became a licensed realtor in 2017. Rachel is dedicated to helping clients in Virginia, Maryland, and the greater Washington D.C. area and her ability to coach buyers and sellers in a competitive market continues to set her apart. With over $100M in sales and over 175 homes sold, past clients cite Rachel’s patience, negotiation skills, and effective communication as reasons why they chose her and why they will continue to refer Rachel to friends and family. Originally from upstate NY, Rachel has lived in the DMV for just about 20 years, and resides in Old Town Alexandria, where she purchased her home in 2021. Prior to real estate, Rachel held various positions to include Director of Public Relations, and Events and Strategic Communications Lead within the federal consulting space at PricewaterHouse Coopers LLP. When she is not working, you can find Rachel spending time with her two dogs, Sadie and Hope, traveling to upstate NY to hang with family and her four nieces and nephews, singing at weddings, or hanging out with the upstate NY natives at an any of the local “Buffalo Bills” bars in the area. A pizza fanatic, you can also find Rachel’s top recommendations for pizza in the DMV by checking out her pizza tour on Instagram, @piemetothemoondmv.
title: Realtor® | Licensed in DC, MD & VA

description: About Rhonda Growing up, I dreamed of two things: to live in Washington, DC, and to become a Realtor. Although I was raised in Redlands, California, I was always drawn to our nation’s capital, a place steeped in such history and splendor. And as a self-described people person, the idea of working closely with clients to help them navigate a momentous life event like buying or selling a home was irresistible. So, after a career in Human Resources — where I learned the invaluable art of listening — and a stint as a small business owner, I decided that it was time to start living the life I had always envisioned for myself. And while my previous experiences prepared me well for the world of real estate, once I made the transition, I never looked back. Today, I’m proud to say that I turned my vision into reality. Over the past 22 years, I have built a successful real estate business that’s virtually 90% referral-based, a fact that I attribute to the enduring relationships I’ve formed here. When I first moved to the DC area, I didn’t know a single person; now, I have a community of clients that truly feels like a family, like home. I treasure my role as a trusted advisor who helps others find their place in DC just as I have found mine. Above all, I believe in creating personalized, seamless experiences for my clients that are tailored to their distinct needs and goals. I also believe that when it comes to real estate, honesty is always the best policy. Whether you’re buying your very first home or downsizing, my mission is to arm you with the knowledge you need to make the decision that’s right for you and to have some fun along the way. After all, who said real estate had to be boring? I’ve moved several times in my life — including my relocation from California — and as a Realtor, I’ve sold close to 1,000 homes to date. It is these personal and professional experiences that help me to relate to those I work with not just as clients, but as people. Real estate is, after all, a uniquely human profession, and I carry that understanding with me day in and day out. When I’m not hosting open houses and chasing down leads, I enjoy traveling, spending time with my husband and children, and getting involved in the Silver Spring community, where I call home today. I’m also known amongst friends as a wine connoisseur, and can often be found doling out advice on the perfect bottle to buy for any given occasion.
title: Vice President | Realtor®

description: About TJ Guided by a client-first philosophy, TJ brings this perspective to every aspect of the residential real estate journey, encompassing both the buying and selling process. Having served as the Manager at Big Wheel Bikes in downtown Bethesda for many years, TJ developed a genuine desire to help people in discovering their ideal solutions. Drawing upon this experience, he understands the significance of posing the right questions and attentively listening to responses, as it plays a pivotal role in assisting clients in identifying their specific needs. Although TJ calls Van Ness home, he can often be found riding along one of the many bike trails throughout the region. During his free time, TJ enjoys cycling, going to concerts at the 9:30 Club and The Anthem and catching up with friends.
title: Licensed Realtor® DC & MD

description: About Teresa Teresa Mueller brings a strategic and personable approach to the home buying and selling process. After 25 years as a division manager in package operations UPS, she extended her family real estate and contracting business from Richmond, VA to the Washington, DC area. With 12 years of experience as a real estate agent and as a long time District resident, Teresa offers unparalleled insight into the neighborhoods of DC and the surrounding areas of Maryland and Virginia. Teresa is committed to building client relationships based on trust, integrity, and exceptional service. As a tenured agent, Teresa understands that buying or selling a home is an important life decision, which is why she consistently delivers experiences based on each client's distinct needs. Teresa specializes in buying and selling single-family homes, as well as investment, luxury, and multi-residential properties. Teresa is licensed in DC, Maryland, and Virginia.
title: Realtor®

description: About Sondra Sondra Mulheron, a third-generation Washingtonian, has dedicated 21 years to her real estate career, driven by her deep-rooted commitment to the DC region and her clients. Leading the S&P Homes of Compass Team, she has consistently achieved top producer status, with over $260,000,000 in sales. Sondra's local ties and reputation have cultivated a vast, community-driven network, enabling her to connect clients with the right resources and people. Her marketing prowess and valuable relationships with local builders ensure that each listing shines. With a flawless 5-star rating on Zillow, Sondra is the agent clients across the DMV can count on. Beyond real estate, Sondra is passionate about giving back to her community, volunteering to donate and put together Thanksgiving baskets and organizing donation of toys and items for local families in need. In her leisure time, Sondra can often be found walking her 2 dogs on the Capital Crescent Trail, enjoying the outdoors, exercising, gardening, cooking, and spending quality time with her two older sons. Meet my team - S&P Homes of Compass Vince Sbarra, Sondra Mulheron, Pam Schiattareggia, Cathy Johnson "Sondra went above and beyond as our selling agent to ensure our home was properly presented, priced, and marketed. She applies her expertise in the Kenwood Forest community and Bethesda area when speaking to potential buyers. Sondra is an extremely personable, accessible, and savvy agent who flawlessly guided us through our first experience selling a home. It was a joy to work with her and we would highly recommend her to anyone seeking an experienced and committed agent.” - Megan & Todd: Sellers, Chevy Chase, MD "What is there to say? Sondra was 10/10 stars on all points from start to lengthy finish. we had a great house to sell but it definitely needed work and Sondra was always professional and thoughtful not just to us as sellers but also about what was best for any potential buyer. do not hesitate to use her or her partner for the sale of your home!" - Kavita & Basit: Sellers, NW, Washington DC
title: Team Leader, S&P Homes of Compass | Licensed Realtor in DC & MD

description: About Molly Molly brings a wealth of knowledge to real estate providing a superior experience for her clients. Her understanding of market trends coupled with her passion for luxury homes afford her clients a high level of sophistication and dedication. Her distinguished career as a fundraiser and event planner at the National Gallery of Art, The John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts and Suburban Hospital provided her a keen sense for detail, excellent communication skills and an extensive network of contacts. A 30-year resident of Chevy Chase and a people person at heart, Molly exudes excellent interpersonal skills, always with a positive and polished demeanor, while maintaining a passion for closing the deal. When not selling real estate, Molly enjoys playing tennis and golf, going on long walks, and gathering with family and friends. Her three adult sons are her pride and joy.
title: Realtor®

description: About Erin Erin brings 20 years of real estate experience to her clients. Whether on the buy side or the sell side, Erin has a knack finding value, and is known going the extra mile to advocate her clients. Erin grew up in a real estate construction family. Although she has worked large firms all over the country, her heart has always been with residential real estate in the Washington, DC area.
title: Realtor

description: About Julie Julie grew up surrounded by the real estate industry and became a licensed agent in 2007. For her it's always been a family affair - her father is a commercial real estate broker, her mother a retired residential agent and her sister a real estate economist. Julie came to join the team after being a client of Mandy and David's and experiencing their expertise, values, and commitment to their clients. Julie's previous experience includes positions with the United States Senate and US Department of Labor. She is a graduate of the University of New Hampshire and a native New Englander. Julie resides in the Anacostia neighborhood of Washington. She enjoys watching NFL football, running, and volunteering with the Junior League of Washington.
title: Realtor® Licensed in DC & VA

description: About Shaun &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;br&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;gt; If you are thinking of buying or selling in the Alexandria, Arlington, or Washington DC metro area, Shaun would love the opportunity to work with you. He prides himself in maintaining close contact with his clients and paying close attention to details. Shaun loves working with different people and he still gets excited about each and every transaction. Shaun is an educated professional with more than 18 years of experience in this market, and he thinks he has seen almost every trick and turn of the industry already. He also has experience with properties in most DC metro neighborhoods, making him an invaluable person to talk to when it comes to relocation to the DC metro area. He is confident that he can save you not only tens of thousands of dollars but a great deal of time and emotional energy as well. You may have noticed that many real estate take a transactional approach to sales, identifying clients, closing the deal, and then moving on to the next one. Shaun chooses not to work that way because he believes you deserve more from the professional you decide to work with. That is why he works referral. Since his primary source of new business is referrals from people who know and trust him, Shaun doesn’t have to spend precious time prospecting. He can dedicate himself fully to the activities that benefit you most, and always deliver truly exceptional service. Shaun knows that he must earn your future referrals, so he aims to exceed your expectations. He has a vested interest in making sure that you are completely satisfied at the end of your transaction together. Shaun’s job is to represent and protect your interests from start to finish. He will take the time to find out what you really need most from him as a professional real estate agent. This is usually far more than just helping you sell your home or finding a new one; it means informing and advising you, protecting you, and looking for the best opportunities for a smooth transaction and happy result. If you would like to know anything about Shaun’s services, or if you'd like to hear about the local market from a human voice, please contact Shaun at your convenience. Several of his clients are employed with the government, including many who are moving to the area because of transfers. Shaun often receives referrals from past clients within The United States Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO), Amazon, INOVA Hospitals, the FBI, State Department, the United States Air Force, Army, Navy, the Department of Defense (DOD), and many other government employees. Shaun has helped numerous clients who commute to the Pentagon. Shaun graduated from West Virginia University with a degree in Business Administration. His current hobbies include golf, traveling, pickleball, working out, going to sporting events (especially to see the Nationals, WVU, and his beloved Steelers in action), and spending time with his family and friends.
title: Senior Vice President | Realtor®

description: About Matt Matt Murton has over 17 years of experience in the real estate industry and a proven track record of delivering exceptional service to sellers and buyers. His expertise in using cutting-edge technology and social media as marketing tools has earned him a reputation as one of the market's top agents. His business is built on repeat clients and referrals from satisfied customers, a testament to his ability to go above and beyond in the buying and selling process. In 2020, Matt joined forces with Compass, the nation's most tech-driven brokerage, and rebranded as the Smart Living Experts, a highly successful and client-focused real estate team. Our team's impeccable track record as top producers, our experience, our relationships within the brokerage community, and our unwavering commitment to our client's best interests have made us one of the top teams in the area. With over 49 years of living in the Washington Metropolitan Area, Matt possesses an extraordinary knowledge of the local real estate market. He lives in Chevy Chase, Maryland, with his wife and their 19-year-old twins(now away at College). In 2022, Matt's team, The Smart Living Experts of Compass, was recognized by Bethesda Magazine as one of the Best Real Estate Agents
title: Team Leader at Smart Living Experts |  Realtor®

description: About Lou For Lou Muscarella, an esteemed DMV Realtor, every real estate transaction is a new adventure. With over 20 years of dedicated industry experience, Lou pairs invaluable insight with an enduring passion for his work that shines through day in and day out. Whether he’s helping first-time buyers start their search or advising seasoned investors on how to grow their portfolio, Lou guides every client with the same level of enthusiasm, expertise, and unwavering commitment to making their dreams a reality. Lou is consistently recognized year after year as a top producer in the DMV region, having sold more than 500+ properties to date. He’s best known by clients for his vast market wisdom, tireless work ethic, and his dedication to providing a world-class experience powered by service. No matter how busy Lou may be, his goal is always to treat every client as if they’re his only client. That philosophy of personalization also informs his capacity to see every situation through the lens of each buyer or seller, taking the time to understand and prioritize their needs over every other factor involved in a transaction. To ensure his clients walk away from a deal happy, Lou will do whatever it takes, a habit he formed years ago while earning his Bachelor’s degree. Over the course of 21 years, Lou persevered through night classes and distant learning—all while working full time—to ultimately receive his degree from the College of Management and Business at National Louis University. He brings that same determination to each transaction, relentless in his quest to help every client achieve their own goals. As a 35-year resident of the greater DMV area, Lou offers extensive insight into its many vibrant neighborhoods, and he loves helping clients discover the nuanced charm of DC, Maryland, and Virginia alike. In addition to his sweeping local knowledge, Lou’s experience spans virtually every type of transaction and style of home—from downtown condo sales, to farmhouse estate purchases, new construction projects, military relocations, and beyond.
