Lou has even partnered with many of his former clients’ kids as they look to buy or sell, a testament to the trust he’s built, the network he’s forged, and the lifelong connections he’s made along the way. When he’s not working for his clients, Lou is usually working to stay ahead of the ever-changing real estate industry, and polishing his own skills by training with some of the leading coaches in the business today. His happy place is the beach, but he also loves nature hikes, and walking Angel, his rescue lab-golden mix. By participating in Compass Cares, Lou donates $200 from every closed transaction to JDRF, an organization that helps fund type 1 diabetes research.
title: Realtor® & Alliance Home Group of Compass

description: About My DC Agent Team Eddie and Steve have been selling homes in the District of Columbia for more than 20 years. Our seasoned industry experience enables us to navigate through real estate transactions with ease. We’re equally comfortable guiding our clients through buying or selling single family homes, condos, and co-operatives -- as well as short sales, foreclosures, estate sales, 1031 exchanges, tenanted properties, and trustee sales. Licensed only in Washington, DC, we know the District. We have worked and lived in Cleveland Park, Downtown, Dupont Circle, Eastern Market, Forest Hills, Georgetown, Southwest Waterfront, and West End. We have helped our clients buy and sell homes in every corner of DC. We operate at the intersection of professionalism and enthusiasm -- making the process of buying and selling a manageable experience, while always keeping our focus on our clients’ best interests. When you work with us, you don’t just deal with one or the other. We both work on our clients’ behalf putting our combined strengths to work. When we speak with our clients, we each provide our own distinct opinion. When we represent our clients, we speak with one voice. - Eddie Rangel & Steven Dean

About Dorothy L. Dorothy has lived in the Washington DC Metropolitan area for 35 years and has earned a reputation as a professional with a solid record of generating significant sales revenue & overachieving goals in the high end/luxury goods market to both residential & commercial clients. Since beginning her real estate career in 2011 with Long & Foster Real Estate, her approach has always been to empower clients with the information, tools and understanding of the process, the parties involved and the market. She believes that by empowering her clients with the right information, they will be able to make the most informed decision for their situation. As a member of the Temple Group, their philosophy in working with clients is simple - "deliver superior, unbiased market insight for making informed decisions on home purchases and sales, while providing the highest level of customer care and elevating the client experience. Her goal is to always provide a high level of integrity and trust with each client and with each transaction. All of this only enhances Dorothy's experience as a professional interior designer. With over 25 years of experience providing innovative and creative interior design and renovation to residential & commercial clients, Dorothy can assist her clients with invaluable insight to make their dream home a reality. In her spare time, Dorothy is a true foodie so you can often find her checking out the latest new restaurant opening in DC, visiting museums, supporting her beloved Howard University, supporting community service projects with her sorority, Delta Sigma Theta Sorority, Inc., reading books or rummaging through estate sales and flea markets. Client Testimonials ★★★★★ " I cannot recommend Dorothy Myers highly enough! From start to finish, she made the entire process of selling my home seamless and stress-free. Her deep knowledge of the market, attention to detail, excellent communication skills, and unwavering professionalism stood out at every step. What impressed me most was her ability to advocate for me. She has sharp negotiation skills and clearly outlined options I had not considered. Dorothy indeed went above and beyond to ensure that I felt confident and supported throughout the journey. If you’re looking for someone who genuinely cares about your needs and will work tirelessly to achieve the best results, Dorothy is the one to call! " - Barbara H. ★★★★★ “We cannot recommend Dorothy highly enough! From day one, she was always available, incredibly communicative, and truly invested in helping us every step of the way. Dorothy was an amazing ally when working with our builder, advocating for us and ensuring everything was done correctly. She wasn’t afraid to call out issues or push for solutions, giving us the confidence that we were in the best hands. Thanks to Dorothy, we navigated our home-buying process feeling completely supported. We are so grateful for her expertise and dedication.” - Travis H. ★★★★★ " Dorothy Myers is a consummate professional who helped us find our condo in downtown Washington. She not only knows Washington DC neighborhoods better than anyone, she is patient and listens to what you are looking for. Once she understood not only what we needed in a condo but what we wanted as well, she found or home in short order and guided us through to a smooth closing. We couldn’t be happier to have had Dorothy Myers representing us.” - Jacqueline G.
title: Realtor®

description: About Brian Whether someone is buying or selling a home, Brian uses his extensive skills and market knowledge to effectively work in the best interests of his clients. He carefully listens to his clients to understand their needs, preferences, and budget concerns. One of his core goals is to significantly reduce the stress of buying or selling a home so clients can enjoy the process. Brian sympathizes with the apprehensions and conflicting emotions during this transition, and he strives to create a calm and supportive environment for his clients. Brian is passionate about working with both buyers and sellers and recognizes the importance of that balance to keep a pulse on the ever-changing real estate markets. Brian’s additional professional experiences offer even more to his clients. After completing his BA in Communication at the University of Maryland, Brian started a sixteen-year decorated career in the Medical Device industry where he thrived as a sales professional, Regional Manager, and National Trainer. His success can be attributed to truly understanding the goals of his clients as well as his expertise in communication and negotiation. Over the years, Brian also acquired extensive knowledge in home construction, providing a rare specialty to his clients: Brian can identify the assets or problems with a home. He can also assist in making educated decisions and sharing strategies to extract maximum value out of a home. Born in Washington, D.C., Brian has lived and raised his family in the DC metro / Bethesda area. As the father of three incredible athletes, Brian can be found on the pitch, at the lacrosse fields, or in a gymnastics arena when he is not with his clients.
title: Realtor®

description: About Stuart Stuart Naranch's journey to becoming a distinguished real estate agent in the Washington, DC area is as unique as it is inspiring. After moving to the area in 2007, Stuart transitioned from the non-profit sector following his time as a Peace Corps volunteer in Bangladesh. This rich background fuels his passion for real estate, where he thrives on meeting new people and exploring diverse homes. Stuart's love for the Washington, DC, Maryland, and Virginia (DMV) area is contagious. He appreciates the region's extensive transportation options and often encourages clients to explore properties as they live, exemplifying this by biking whenever possible. His approach is one of many reasons he has been recognized as Washingtonian's Best for several years in a row, a testament to his market expertise and client-focused service. In addition to his professional accolades, Stuart is a creative soul with a penchant for photography, crafting, forging, casting, and welding with his family. His curiosity and problem-solving skills are reminiscent of "MacGyver," allowing him to tackle challenges with innovative flair. Stuart resides in Manor Park with his wife, two boys, two dogs, and a few small fish, where he enjoys integrating his personal passions into his professional life. His dedication to his family and hobbies complements his commitment to serving the real estate needs of his community. Stuart Naranch continues to make a significant impact, driven by a genuine love for helping people find their perfect homes in the vibrant DMV area.
title: REALTOR®

description: About Sam From a young age, Sam was fascinated with Real Estate architecture, a passion that eventually led him to choose Real Estate as his profession. Today, as a successful agent working in Virginia, Maryland, and DC, Sam offers honest, balanced, and educated support to his clients, from first-time buyers to seasoned sellers. It is of paramount importance to Sam that his clients are as confident about each step of the sales process as they are about the end result. Sam gives his clients the attention they require, Sam has learned to listen closely to what his clients need and how to offer specialized instruction to help them achieve their distinct goals. ​Sam received his bachelor’s degree in Computer Information Systems from the University of Maryland in 2004. He entered the Real Estate industry after twelve years as a corporate executive in the hospitality business, where he was actively involved in running trainings for new managing talent across the United States, including an exciting overseas adventure in Dubai, where he worked to build restaurants alongside celebrity chefs José Andrés and Richard Sandoval. Sam gained invaluable leadership and problem-solving skills during those years, skills he puts to work for his clients each day as their trusted advisor. Above all, Sam treasures the relationships he cultivates his clients, and works tirelessly to turn their dreams into reality. Together with his wife, Shadia, and their four wonderful children, Sam has lived in the Metropolitan Washington, DC the past 20 years and has an in-depth knowledge of the market, the local neighborhoods, and it’s culture. Please visit our website at NassarGroupRealty.com <br>
title: Vice President

description: About Nassar Group of Compass As DC and Northern Virginia’s premier dynamic duo, Sam and Shadia have built a full-service solution to the real estate process. They specialize in all facets of the business, offering expertise for every client---from those navigating the process for the first time, to clients trying to score that perfect distressed property, to those seeking guidance in the luxury space. Their appreciation for architecture and real estate development were ignited at a young age, thus contributing to their enduring passion for what they do and the impressive results they deliver. They strive to provide honest, balanced, and informed instruction for every customer they work with, realizing that each one offers a different set of needs to be met. Known as thought-leaders in their industry, Sam and Shadia are catalysts for progress, and work to leverage the latest tools for their clients’ benefit. And although they often focus on the Northern Virginia area---where they call home today---they have worked and lived all over the greater DC Metro area, and therefore supply a wide range of local expertise. Above all, Sam and Shadia believe that real estate is about far more than the bottom line, and cherish their role as trusted advisors who are there to guide their clients through some of life’s most notable milestones. Please visit our website at NassarGroupRealty.com <br> Client Testimonials Scroll down for more Where do I even begin with Sam and Shadia Nassar. These two are among the most kind, caring, professional and attentive real estate agents my wife and I have ever had the pleasure of working with. I believe what sets them apart from most other real estate professionals is a combination of their vision and energy. With every interaction we had, we were left with the feeling that they *absolutely* love what they do, and believe in their work. This was motivating and encouraging! We welcomed them into our home and they immediately could see the end result while we initially couldn't. At every step of the process they continually checked in on us to make sure all of our concerns were handled. The team made sure we had what we need in the home to maximize our efforts/sale. This resulted in our home selling within 24 hours!! A few weeks later they were able to get my relatives house under contract before the house went to market! The Nassar group is the real deal! We've not only gained A++ contacts within the real estate industry, but we've made friends for life. We are and will continue to recommend them to all of our friends and family.- The Fowlers " Sam Nassar and his entire team are top-rate professionals who also really listen to their clients’ needs and goals. As a first time home buyer, I wasn't sure of when I'd be ready to start the home buying search and really needed some initial basic guidance. Sam never once pushed getting out there and buying the first chance we got, in fact he put us on a passive listing email that was tailored to our initial budget, neighborhood, and home preferences and let us come to him when the time was right and we were ready to start looking at properties. Sams amazing level of tailored service really shines once you begin searching for homes and putting down offers. From his negotiation skills to his detailed approach to assessing comps and specific properties you like, we never once felt like we were making an ill-informed buying decision. Our search began in earnest at the beginning of July, and despite the insanely competitive buying market, we had found our dream first home and closed by mid-August. This would have not been possible had it not been for Sam. He was tuned in to our wants and needs and found this property through his real estate firms aggressive buying strategy; We didn't even have it on our radar, and it ended up being the best one we had come across - hands down. An ideal neighborhood with immediate equity gains from rising comps and everything + more that we wanted. Sams service is comprehensive, holistic, and forward thinking, and he has an amazing network of professionals within the industry that he works with and it can really make a huge difference when it comes to setting you up for success with your new home. I can't emphasize enough how great Sam and his team are, they will be our first call when we grow out of this home and into the next! – The Waling’s.

About James James brings to the Capital Estate Group a unique blend of both professional and life experience. Fresh off a decade during which he lived abroad and traveled extensively, James’ intrepid spirit and willingness to take on any challenge serves both his clients and the team well. The world of knowledge and lifetime of experiences he gained on this epic adventure are further strengthened the ten years he spent working a global ﬁrm where he integrated, highly targeted, and experiential campaigns nonproﬁt and corporate clients. His intuitive understanding of how to inﬂuence and an audience make him a poised and conﬁdent advocate—ensuring that his clients’ voices are heard. James leverages an in depth knowledge of real estate and strong analytical reasoning skills and combines them with balanced judgment and a keen insight into his clients and their goals. He has a reputation being calm under pressure while seamlessly navigating complex and high-stress situations. Having graduated from George Mason University with a B.A. in Economics, before moving into the District in 1999, James is the consummate Washingtonian. His credentials also include stints on Capitol Hill, owning and restoring a classic Victorian rowhouse in Columbia Heights. His love of Washington, DC stems from his appreciation of the cultural diversity of its residents, the stunning architecture, and the city’s European livability.
title: Realtor®

description: About Sina As a dedicated real estate professional, I bring ethical practices, strong negotiation skills, and meticulous preparation to every transaction. In today’s dynamic real estate market, my commitment is simple: to guide clients toward their goals with clarity, confidence, and care. Specializing in the fast-paced DMV market, I serve buyers, sellers, investors, and international clients with a client-first approach, deep local insight, and a strong strategic mindset. I believe in empowering clients through education, ensuring they understand every step of the process and feel confident making informed decisions. With over 20 years of experience in graphic design and marketing, I bring a creative edge that helps position listings to stand out and connect with the right audience. Every client’s priorities are unique, and I tailor my services to meet those specific needs. Real estate is more than a transaction, it's a relationship built on trust. My mission is to be the advisor clients can count on for honest guidance, creative solutions, and lasting support. I genuinely love what I do, and helping clients realize their dreams is what drives me every day.
title: REALTOR®

description: About Collins Collins Ndipmon goes beyond the traditional role of a real estate agent. He is a visionary fueled by an unwavering passion for making a positive impact on lives and assisting individuals like you in discovering their perfect home. With his friendly and approachable demeanor, Collins guarantees a seamless and delightful journey throughout the process. Collins distinguishes himself through his sincere concern for his clients. He recognizes that buying or selling a home is not solely a financial transaction, but a profoundly personal voyage. Collins dedicates his time to attentively listen to his clients' specific needs, dreams, and aspirations, treating them as part of his own family. Through building strong and genuine connections, he ensures that his clients' objectives are met with customized solutions that yield exceptional outcomes. Collins holds a license in Maryland and Washington, DC. This makes him capable of helping clients in both the Maryland and Washington DC real estate markets. He possesses a deep knowledge of market trends and upcoming prospects, enabling you to make well-informed decisions and take advantage of the most favorable investment possibilities. Collins works diligently to obtain the greatest deals for you. Through his creative marketing techniques, he presents properties in a unique and captivating way, ensuring that you find your perfect home. Embark on an exciting journey to discover your dream home or the ideal investment property in the bustling heart of Washington DC. Select Collins Ndipmon as your reliable and knowledgeable real estate expert, and let's work together to unlock the doors to your new home!
title: Realtor® | Licensed in MD

description: About Nadia Nadia Nejaime has lived in the nation’s capital for more than 30 years; she came to college, stayed for law school, and never left. She received her Juris Doctor degree from George Washington University Law School in 1994 and practiced law for more than a decade, holding positions as in-house counsel at an international satellite telecommunications provider and as an Associate, and then Counsel, in a prominent national law firm. Nadia’s clients included international organizations and large national and multinational corporations. Her practice focused on structuring, drafting, negotiating and executing contracts for complex transactions, usually in the technology, outsourcing or telecom sectors. Nadia purchased her first home in 1999 and that awakened her passion for real estate. After several purchases and sales of personal and investment properties, in 2005, she decided to make her passion for real estate her career and took a huge leap of faith to leave the practice of law to follow that passion. It was the best decision she’s ever made and she’s never looked back. Nadia’s real estate clients now benefit from the many skills she acquired from her legal practice, including a keen understanding of contractual documents, professional negotiating skills, and the highest level of attention to detail and client service. Ultimately, Nadia aims to arm her clients with all the necessary information to make informed decisions and is their advocate every step of the way. Nadia’s mission statement (and the key to her success) for her real estate practice is to always deliver the highest level of professional, ethical real estate services to her clients and to always keep their best interests paramount throughout the buying and/or selling process. She feels it is a true honor when someone chooses her as their Realtor, as they are placing their trust in her to help them navigate through a major life milestone that can make a significant and even transformative impact on their lives.
title: Vice President, COMPASS

description: About Andrew Andrew is a top-producing agent at Compass. He is noted among both colleagues and clients for his exceptional specialty work in the most significant segments of our industry in the DC metropolitan market: highly discerning buyers, international family relocations, first-time purchasers, home modifications, and residential development. Whether marketing the sale of a historic Capitol Hill home, or a newly constructed condo project in Columbia Heights, Andrew has a reputation as a consistently client-focused, hands-on agent. What he offers, well beyond usual expectations of a professional Realtor, is an adept and practical understanding of the entire development process -- for condominium and dual-use projects – in neighborhoods whose distinct character he (as a native Washingtonian) has fully mastered. Although a native Washingtonian, Andrew’s cosmopolitan bent was cultivated through his early childhood abroad in Italy, Germany and the Middle East. After returning to Washington DC, he attended Saint Andrew's Episcopal High School and George Washington University. He began his real estate career at Sotheby's International Realty, generating immediate and impressive results. Andrew later joined the highly respected Trent & Co, a team at Compass, and in 2016 he earned top Sales Agent of the Year Award. Acclaimed widely for his extraordinarily custom-crafted, creative and productive marketing strategies, as well as for the stellar personal service each of his clients enjoys, Andrew has won an increasingly prominent niche in the intense, demanding, and nationally important DC real estate sector. One thing is clear, Andrew's relentless commitment to his clients keep them coming back.
title: Realtor

description: About Yessenia Born and raised in the DMV, Yessenia Nieves brings a deep-rooted knowledge and authentic appreciation for the DC metro area to every client interaction. Her lifelong connection to the region gives her a unique edge in helping buyers and sellers navigate the area’s dynamic neighborhoods with confidence. Yessenia’s passion for real estate is fueled by a genuine desire to support clients through one of life’s most meaningful milestones. Known for her calm demeanor, patience, and proactive communication, she takes the time to educate and guide her clients at every step, ensuring they feel informed, empowered, and cared for throughout the process. Whether it’s a first-time homebuyer looking for the perfect starter home or a seller ready for their next chapter, Yessenia is committed to delivering an exceptional experience rooted in trust, professionalism, and local expertise. When she’s not helping clients find their dream home, you can find her exploring new spots around the DMV, enjoying time with family, or staying active in her local community.
title: Mollaan Babbington Group | Realtor®

description: About Anousha My clients gain tremendous value from the connectivity of my past 10 years of in depth experience within the DMV Real Estate Market, along side my local network and knowledge from being a DMV Native. From buying my first primary condo in my early 20's to managing almost 200 units of luxury rentals with a team, to wholesaling, flipping, section 8 rentals, and Airbnb Set-ups, I have learned a lot, to say the least. I understand the pulse of todays property positioning, marketing strategies, negotiating tactics, finding a home off market, and so much more. The first step is research, and I am a here as resource to get the conversation started. I look forward to talking mindset, strategy, planning and execution for all things Real Estate!
title: REALTOR® | Strategist, Advisor, Designer & Investor

description: About Andrew Andrew has been a Baltimore-area transplant since 2013, having lived in Minnesota and California before settling in the area for good with his family, wife Laura and daughter Birdie. They're currently living in the Caves Park area of Owings Mills. After earning his Master’s degree in Psychology from the University of Maryland and his B.A. in Psychology from Clark University, Andrew became a Realtor in 2017. Prior to working in the real estate world, Andrew spent several years in the psychology field as both a therapist and researcher. This time allowed Andrew to hone his skills and become an astute listener and advisor, making him uniquely qualified to support his clients through the complexities of a real estate transaction. Andrew prides himself on his remarkable ability to build rapport and trust with each of his clients. He specializes in Baltimore and its surrounding counties. In his free time he enjoys collecting and listening to music, traveling and spending time with his family.
title: Realtor®

description: About Jay Jay is a native Mississippian but has called Washington, DC his home for the last 4 decades. He fell in love with real estate after buying his first condo in Adams Morgan in 1999. Even though the search was over, he kept attending open houses and exploring developing neighborhoods. Eventually he found himself spending his weekends helping friends find places to live. So he decided to transition from a career in public relations and television to real estate. After starting as a realtor with another outlet, Jay joined a brand-new Washington, DC brokerage named Compass in 2015. Jay believed this then up and coming brokerage offered new opportunities for him and that the resources offered by Compass would complement his own skills as an agent to help him better serve his clients. Over the past few years Jay has been recognized for his hard work and devotion to clients by being named a Washingtonian Magazine "Top Agent," chosen by the Greater Capital Area Association of Realtors for their "Recognition Award Winner" prize and selected as a "Top Producer" by Compass. Not only is Jay sought after by buyers and sellers, he is also an in demand expert having been interviewed dozens of times by television outlets such as the BBC News, ABC News, FOX 5 DC, NBC 4 Washington, and Washington's cable access channel. One of Jay's passions is photography and he loves taking photos around the city and when traveling to destinations far and wide. You might also catch him singing at Shaw's Tavern on Wednesday nights.
title: Realtor

description: About Mary With over $200M in career sales, Mary has a proven track record supporting Buyer and Sellers in the DMV. As the Trent & Co Maryland specialist, she’s known for her diligence in supporting Buyers with a keen understanding of neighborhoods, commutability, and digging in to details that help her buyers achieve their goals. Mary's transition from a successful career in luxury retail to real estate speaks to her adaptability and desire to leverage her skills to better serve her community. Notably, her marketing efforts contribute to the success of schools and neighborhoods, underscoring her dedication to giving back to the community she serves. For Sellers, she supports her clients with an unparalleled presentation giving clients a maximum return and competitive edge. Mary adds a personal touch that gives depth to her professional profile. Drawing from 11 years of corporate retail buying experience, her negotiation, strategy, and sales success all add to her value as an agent. Consistently recognized annually as a Compass ‘Top Agent’, in 2022 she was named in the top 3 of all DMV Agents on a Team — all these rewards reflecting her unwavering commitment to delivering exceptional results for her clients. Like Trent, Mary’s a native of Ohio, their work ethic and mid-west values give buyers and sellers the success and comfort needed in downsizing, right-sizing or relocating. After college, her NYC Fashion Career included training in the luxury buying offices of Saks Fifth Avenue, moving to DC as a Buyer for Hecht’s/Strawbridges, with numerous success stories in the world of retail, she shifted to Real Estate where she could better use her skills to support her community. When she's not hard at work, Mary enjoys precious moments with her family and can often be found strolling around town with her beloved German Shorthaired Pointer, Whistler.
title: Realtor

description: About Linda As a native Washingtonian and a life-long resident of Bethesda, Linda knows the ins and outs of the local real estate market. She knows the hidden neighborhoods and is well connected in the real estate community. Linda is dedicated to protecting her client’s interest and works as trusted advisor to her clients helping to guide them through the real estate process. She is a savvy negotiator and has great in-sight into the local market. With clients ranging from first time home buyers, move-up buyers, investors and those looking to downsize, Linda delivers personalized experiences that yields each of her client’s the best results possible. Linda is a graduate of the University of Maryland and has over 25 years of business experience. She has been working in real estate since 2006 years and is the Team Leader for the TurnKey at Compass Group. She is an Associate Broker in Maryland and is licensed in both DC and Virginia. Linda is deeply connected in her community and has volunteered with the neighborhood swim team, the Little Falls Penguins, for the past 19 years. She lives in Bethesda with her pug, Gilbert. Traveling, baking and spending times with her friends are how Linda likes to spend her free time. TurnKey at Compass is proud to recognized consistently by the Bethesda Magazine and Washingtonian Magazine as a top-producing team. With over 75+ million in sold volume annually, they are know for service and results.
title: Associate Broker

description: About Irina Working with a dedicated real estate agent in Washington, DC can make all the difference. Especially if you are a first-time home buyer in search of your Washington, DC dream home, a seller looking to downsize, or an investor looking for a great opportunity. I am an entrepreneur and real estate professional with seventeen years of experience in International Real Estate Investment and Small Business Development. I am a knowledgeable, dedicated and laser focused realtor, a committed ally ready to negotiate on your behalf by using my company’s vast resources, local market- specific knowledge and analytical skills. I pride myself in making the real estate selling and buying a much simpler process for my clients. I go the extra mile for every client, and my goal is to make clients for life, not just for one transaction. In my spare time I enjoy reading, sport activities and volunteering. Am particularly interested in gender and youth empowerment and local government. I am originally from Moldova, am fluent in English, Romanian, and Russian.
title: Real Estate Advisor

description: About Andrew A proud Washingtonian and Co-Leader of the Norris Warren Partners Team, Andrew (or Andy as many call him) blends deep industry expertise with a warm, client-first approach. With a background in Architecture and Fine Arts, extensive building science experience, and sharp business acumen, Andrew specializes in matching exceptional people with exceptional homes. His integrity, attention to detail, and commitment to hospitality have earned him a loyal network of clients and a reputation for success. Recognized as one of DC’s top agents by The Washingtonian for five consecutive years, Andy helps clients in DC, Virginia, and Maryland. Before transitioning into real estate sales, he managed the construction and renovation of over 300 homes in Washington, DC, spanning historic and modern styles. This extensive experience provides a distinct advantage to sellers maximizing return on investment and buyers seeking expert insights on property value and condition. Known for uncovering hidden opportunities, clients have affectionately nicknamed him “the truffle pig.” Andy conducts about 1/4-1/3 of his transactions off-market through business built on trust, relationships, and referrals. His appreciation for global cultures has made him a sought-after advisor for international buyers and sellers, but Andy also enjoys guiding local first-time buyers, market returnees, and downsizers. Outside of real estate, Andy enjoys being a dad, cooking, entertaining, the arts and kayaking on the Potomac with his friend and business partner, Zach.
title: Realtor® | DC, MD, & VA

description: About Marie-Claire Marie Claire Ntam is not your typical real estate agent. With over 18 years of experience in the bustling Washington, DC area; she's a trusted expert in the field, a guiding light, and a compassionate advocate for positive change in the community. A native of Cameroon, and daughter to diplomats, Marie Claire brings a global perspective to her work. After earning her degree in Electrical Engineering from Morgan State University, she had the opportunity to explore the world, from Africa to Dubai, Europe, and Asia to the Virgin Islands. Yet, she always found herself drawn back to the Washington area, where her family settled when she was just eight years old. Marie Claire's commitment to her clients goes beyond just buying or selling a property. She's all about customization, ensuring that each client's unique needs are met. Whether it's helping a local family find their dream home or assisting international clients remotely, Marie Claire is dedicated to making the process seamless and hassle-free. But what truly sets Marie Claire apart is her passion for housing advocacy. She doesn't just sell homes; she empowers her clients with knowledge, making sure they understand every step of their real estate journey and the power of homeownership: establishing generational wealth, and leaving a legacy. She's known for donating a portion of her commission to support housing initiatives in Wards 7 & 8, actively advocating for solutions to housing challenges. As an active board member of Lydia's House, Marie Claire works tirelessly to transform homeowners' lives for generations to come. Her expertise shines in new construction projects, where she collaborates with developers to bring vibrant communities to the market, overseeing every detail from inception to completion. Some of her recent successes include projects like Park27, The Overlook at Anacostia, and Barry Reserve at Anacostia. Marie Claire's dedication to excellence is evident in her professional designations, including RENE and IZADU certifications. Her outstanding achievements and leadership were honored with a 2024 RISMedia Newsmakers Crusaders recognition, 2024 GCAAR Gold Award Winner, GCAAR Pathways Award- 2024, 2023. Outside of her real estate work, Marie Claire enjoys reading and the outdoors, whether it's hiking, running, gardening, or exploring the vibrant restaurant scene in the DMV with her 10-year-old son. She expresses herself through timeless fashion, and her style continues to evolve. In Marie Claire Ntam, you don't just find a real estate expert; you find a dedicated advocate, a global citizen, and a compassionate leader ready to help you achieve your real estate dreams in the nation's capital and beyond.
title: Realtor®

description: About Andrew Andrew is a passionate, problem-solving REALTOR who grew up in Hyattsville, Maryland. After graduating from Towson University, Andrew worked in Property Management as a Multi-Site Leasing coordinator before obtaining his real estate license and becoming a full-time Realtor. Andrew understands the complexities of representing both Buyers and Sellers in various and changing market conditions. His experience working with each has resulted in his ability to skillfully guide clients, whether they are buying their first home, moving up to their dream home, or downsizing to a simpler lifestyle. His familiarity with (different types of real estate) throughout the metro area, partly due to his property management background, combined with his intimate knowledge of the power of social media, allows him to deliver an incredibly high level of service to his clients regardless of price point. As the industry moves toward new tech, Andrew is committed to leveraging the latest tools, approaches, and trends to maximize results across the board. In addition, Andrew prides himself on being an exceptional listener, communicator, negotiator, and one who's willing to go above and beyond in any situation. In his free time, Andrew enjoys going out with friends, whether for a show or trying a new restaurant here in the District; he loves to be out and about. In addition, Andrew is a huge Washington sports fan, as painful as that can be, and competes in numerous basketball leagues throughout the DMV. He also co-founded and runs an expansive alumni network for his high school, DeMatha Catholic, which aims to give back to the school and community that helped make him the man he is today. Word on the streets is he's also the #TallestRealtorintheDMV
title: Realtor®

description: About Jesse For Jesse Oakley, a DC Metro area realtor with over 14 years of top producer experience and over $100 million in sales, the needs of his clients always come first. Jesse offers a personalized and seamless solution to the real estate process, customizing each client’s experience with creativity, compassion, inclusivity, and keen expertise. Jesse brings a wealth of knowledge and industry relationships to every transaction—from his extensive insight into our vibrant neighborhoods, to his background in architecture and construction. Jesse’s mission? To arm his clients with the knowledge they need to make informed decisions while advocating for their best interests to maximize the value they’re getting when it matters most. When he is not selling real estate, you can find Jesse in the Brookland NE neighborhood of DC with his husband, friends, and our two cats "Linus and The Coconut." He prides himself on his gregarious and friendly nature and looks forward to being an advocate for your goals. REVIEWS: "Since my partner and I had never owned a house before, there many aspects of buying a home that were very unclear. Jesse was incredibly helpful and patient, thoroughly walking us through the process and responding to our numerous questions. Something that I found particularly helpful was that when we would go on house visits he would volunteer a lot of helpful information and suggest things to look out for (i.e., HVAC, roof, drainage issues, asbestos, etc.). His insights were incredibly helpful. For me, as a first-time buyer, I was really glad to have retained Jesse's services as he helped me to establish a solid understanding of what to be on the lookout for when buying a new home. He also had an extensive network of contacts to whom he was able to refer us in order to undertake some minor work that we wanted for our new home. Jesse is an outstanding, top-notch real estate agent who provides full service from start to finish throughout the home-buying process. I think this could have been very problematic and potentially filled with a lot of pit falls; however, Jesse guided us step-by-step and really made it a pleasure. I would highly recommend working with Jesse, especially for first-time buyers like we were!" ----- "I have bought two and sold one home with Jesse, and will continue to have him be my real estate agent. Jesse is the consummate professional, approachable, and very knowledgeable about the DC real estate market, necessary qualities for a good agent in this competitive market. I would definitely (and do) recommend him to anyone looking to buy or sell a home in the area." ---- "Jesse is an ultra-responsive, knowledgeable champion. He guided us through the home-buying process, using his relationships and deep reservoir of DC knowledge to give us the advantage we needed to buy the house we wanted in an insane market. He dotted every i, crossed every t, and was a world-class nag when the situation warranted it. Someone wise once said that there are realtors and there are REAL-tors. I never understood that phrase, but Jesse is a walking, talking five-star home-buying experience." ---- "Working with Jesse as my seller's agent was absolutely wonderful! He is organized, thoughtful, prepared, and everything you need in a Realtor. i appreciated his insights into all parts of the process and trusted his recommendations and judgment. I highly recommended working with Jesse as a buyer or seller. " ---- "I had an excellent experience working with Jesse. Jesse allowed me to search for a home at my own pace, without pressuring me, while continually providing me with properties that met my criteria as they popped up. Jesse’s knowledge of the DC-area market is a great asset, and he was very helpful at every step of the process. I would highly recommend working with Jesse - he was wonderful to work with as a first-time home buyer." ---- "My partner and I just purchased our first house in the DMV area. We were introduced to Jesse through a former colleague of ours, and he highly recommended him. Now, we know why. Jesse's customer service is phenomenal, he knows the market, and most importantly, he tries to understand his clients. He was very patient with us, since we were first time home-buyers, and provided as much information as we needed. He goes the extra mile, and makes this stressful process as easy as possible. We are SO happy Jesse was our real estate agent, and we cannot recommend him more! Thank you, Jesse! "

About David David is a fifth-generation Washingtonian with an extensive knowledge of the city and its suburbs. He loves all that the region has to offer and has always had a natural ability to help people. Real estate was a natural fit for him. During the course of his 10- year DC commercial real estate career, he developed a proficiency in real estate contracts, finance, and project management. David made the move to residential real estate to combine his mastery of DC metro neighborhoods with his passion for helping and connecting people. Whether buying or selling, David’s thoughtfulness and attention to detail ensure an efficient sale every time. His candor, proactive drive to meet clients’ needs, and ability to anticipate potential issues set him apart from other agents. David grew up in Potomac, Maryland, and currently resides in Chevy Chase, MD. In his free time, he enjoys hosting friends for dinner, playing golf, and exploring the metro area’s evolving dining scene.
title: Realtor®

description: About Patti With over 35 years in sales and 25 years as a Mortgage Loan Officer, I've spent my career guiding clients through some of life’s biggest financial decisions. After decades of collaborating with real estate agents from the lending side, stepping into real estate myself felt like a natural transition. Now a licensed Realtor® in DC, Maryland, and Virginia, I bring a deep understanding of the full home buying process—from both sides of the table. My background allows me to anticipate issues before they arise, communicate effectively with all parties, and keep transactions on track. Above all, I strive to truly listen to my clients, understand their goals, and deliver a smooth experience that ends in a happy closing.
title: Realtor® | Licensed in DC

description: About Shannon Shannon O’Farrell was the very first agent to join the Mandy & David Team after Mandy helped her buy her first home. Her previous work as a commercial property manager and in residential construction informs her work as a realtor. Shannon recognizes a good investment and understands what it takes to renovate any home. Thanks to her vast experience and marriage to a general contractor, she has compiled a long list of contractors that she refers to her clients. Well known for her patience and knowledge of the D.C.-area market, she really cares about her clients, who become part of her life and circle of friends. Licensed in D.C., Maryland and Virginia since 2007, Shannon lives with her husband and two kids in Brookland, a neighborhood that she loves for its sense of community. An avid Nats fan with season tickets, you’ll often find Shannon at the ballpark with her family. She also spends time at her vacation home on the Eastern Shore and visiting family in northern Michigan. A graduate from James Madison University with a degree in journalism, Shannon grew up in the Virginia suburbs. Shannon's children attend Washington Yu Ying, a Chinese immersion school in Brookland, where Shannon volunteers. Shannon is particularly proud of the block parties the Mandy & David Team hosts to raise funds for the school’s PTA.
title: Realtor® Licensed in DC, MD & VA
Realtor® | Licensed in DC, MD & VA

description: About Brian Brian is a licensed real estate agent in Washington, D.C, MD, and VA, residential real estate developer and property manager for the last decade. Brian turned his passion for real estate into a full-time career when he obtained his license in 2015. He originally hails from Dublin, Ireland, and spent much of his career prior to entering real estate in the world of elite competitive squash, as both a beloved coach and a player who competed at the highest levels globally. He served as a professional squash coach in the Washington area 15 years and simultaneously enjoyed traveling far and wide to compete, achieving a peak world ranking of 178. Brian earned a Bachelor’s of Science degree in Exercise Physiology from the University of Wales Institute Cardiff.
title: Realtor®

description: About Elizabeth After graduating with a degree in Psychology and a minor in Neuroscience from the University of North Carolina, Wilmington. Elizabeth decided to move back to Maryland to pursue her career in real estate. As a Maryland native with an extensive background in customer service, Elizabeth is your go-to resource for all your DMV real estate needs. Her vast knowledge, coupled with her love for helping people, has provided her with valuable skills that she uses every day in real estate negotiations, educating home buyers and sellers, and effectively marketing listings. Elizabeth's genuine desire to see your property goals come true makes her the best agent to have by your side. She truly prides herself on going the extra mile and providing the best quality of service possible. When Elizabeth isn’t working on real estate, you can find her exploring a new city or cooking up a new recipe. If you’re looking for exceptional service, look no further!
title: REALTOR®

description: About Matt A lifelong sales professional who’s always on the move, Matt’s experience includes the ability to operate and negotiate with people on all sides of the table that ultimately have the same expectations; demanding quality, best-in-class services, and desirable results. Through collaboration, he understands how and when to engage the necessary resources in an attempt to make every client experience a great one while delivering positive results. Matt’s passion as a real estate professional is to be recognized as a personable, knowledgeable and enthusiastic leader; one that can be trusted to fulfill and exceed the goals and expectations at every level of a client relationship. He has built a solid reputation as a hard-working, highly adaptable, attentive and responsive agent. Matt lives in Old Town Alexandria. When not working in real estate, he enjoys being outdoors, golfing, skiing, travel and of course, engaging in the many activities that our DC Metro area has to offer with his full-time partner and associate, Donna Gilbert Mank, also a member of our Compass team.
title: Realtor® | Team Lead, Mank & Olin Team

description: About Casey Casey O’Neal – Associate Broker, Compass | Arlington, VA Real Estate Expert With nearly 40 years as a licensed Realtor® in Virginia and over 1,800 homes sold , I’ve built my business on one principle: put the client’s interests first, always. As a longtime resident of Arlington Forest , I know the Northern Virginia market inside and out—from historic Arlington neighborhoods to sought-after Falls Church, Alexandria, and Fairfax communities . As a Senior Transition Specialist , I provide personalized guidance for homeowners and families navigating downsizing, relocation, and estate sales. My team and I support every step of the process, connecting clients with trusted contractors, movers, and estate resources to make life transitions seamless. Our philosophy is simple: consultative, no-pressure service. We’ll tell a buyer not to purchase a home if it isn’t a smart investment, and we’ll help sellers unlock hidden equity through pre-sale project management , staging, and remodeling strategies that maximize return. What sets us apart? Proven Results: 1,826+ successful transactions through 2024. Deep Local Roots: 64 combined years living and working in Northern Virginia. Specialized Support: Senior Transition Specialist services for downsizers and families. Client-First Advocacy: Education, transparency, and guidance that empower you to make confident decisions. Full-Service Support: From pricing strategies to renovation oversight, we manage the details so you can focus on your move. When I’m not serving clients, my wife Colleen and I share our passion for music, performing across the Washington, D.C. area for more than 40 years—a reminder that real estate, like music, is about creating harmony and connection. Whether you’re buying your first condo, moving up to a larger home, or preparing for a downsizing transition , we’ll provide the clarity and strategy you need for a successful outcome. 📞 Let’s start with a conversation—your goals, your timeline, your next chapter.
title: Realtor®

description: About Tom Tom is a fourth-generation Washingtonian, with a love for all things DMV, real estate, and home-related. As a native of the dc region, and a recent first-time homebuyer himself, Tom is uniquely positioned to coach homebuyers through the process. He appreciates the complexities of the DC marketplace and understands the differences and benefits of its beautiful neighborhoods. After joining Compass in 2020, Tom teamed up with the Rebecca Weiner group in 2022, bringing his experience and long-time expertise in personal and lifestyle coaching and motivational interviewing to this incredible team to further his real estate career. He approaches his role as an agent with compassion, market insight, and an appreciation for how challenging the home buying process can feel for first-time buyers and previous homeowners alike. Using his experience in lifestyle coaching, Tom is able to better understand his client’s motivations and needs, so he can ensure they find a home that suits them in the best way possible. Tom's goals are always to put his clients' interests first and to help make the process as seamless as possible for them, guiding them through every step of the home buying process with knowledge and compassion. Tom prides himself on his consistent and clear communication, knowing how important it is to be timely, informative, and accurate in his discussions with home buyers. Time and again, those who have worked with Tom and the Rebecca Weiner Group have been thrilled with their experiences and leave the process feeling not only satisfied with their outstanding service but most importantly, well cared for throughout the process. Tom, his wife, and their two dogs live in chevy chase village and are very active in their community. You can often find them running on the capital crescent trail, exploring their neighborhood, and taking their dogs to breweries in Montgomery county. Tom is dedicated to building a referral-based business by delivering exceptional personal service to his clients, both throughout a transaction and whenever his clients have real estate concerns.
title: Realtor® | Licensed in DC, MD & VA | Rebecca Weiner Group of Compass

description: About Gabriel Bringing years of experience in both real estate and customer service, Gabriel’s true passion is helping people. With resources, contractors, and vendors, Gabriel will create a plan to sell your house maximizing your return on your investment! With strengths in attentiveness, effective communication, and adaptability, Gabriel strives to help individuals and families balance finding a house that will become their home and making wise financial investments in their future. Gabriel makes sure that he is always acting as a champion for his clients. Gabriel prides himself on having a strong grip on the ever-changing market, while actively engaged in off market opportunities. Gabriel was raised locally in Silver Spring, Maryland. He attended Boston University, graduating with a degree in Political Science. Gabriel has lived in the DC neighborhoods of Adam's Morgan, H St., Columbia Heights, Dupont, Bloomingdale, and the Maryland neighborhood of Mount Rainier. Gabriel currently resides in the Bethesda Maryland with his beautiful blended family, wife Sam and kids Logan, Lilly, and Bowie. In his free time, Gabriel enjoys traveling, snowboarding, basketball, golfing, working out at Equinox in Downtown Bethesda/Mint Health club in downtown DC and most importantly spending time with his family. Gabriel would love to hear from you to help you sell your current home, find your perfect home, and chat about all things real estate and not.
title: Realtor® Licensed in DC, MD & VA | CDRE®

description: About Christine Originally from Allentown, PA, Christine has lived and worked in vibrant Capitol Hill since 1990. After having a successful career at the Smithsonian Institution and then raising her family locally, she embraced real estate as a seasoned professional, joining the Jeanne Phil Meg Team at COMPASS in 2022. A skilled Team Manager, Christine deftly handles team transactions, team members, contractors, and clients (each presenting a multitude of personalities!) ensuring that every Team Agent and Client receives top-notch service and attention to detail. From marketing strategies to listing prep to event planning, Christine is a Jill of all trades, adept at orchestrating successful real estate endeavors with a friendly and laid-back demeanor.

About Devon *Northern Virginia & DC Realtor® | “Trustworthy & Skilled” | 5-Star Reviews | Global Perspective* "Devon was an absolute pleasure!" Laura - DC Seller "Devon O'Reilly is simply first class." Chima - Alexandria Buyer " Devon O'Reilly will slay that real estate market beast, while providing you with the most professional, personal, and caring service one could hope for." Josh - Herndon Buyer Meet Devon O'Reilly – your trusted and skilled Arlington-based Realtor® with the Terra & Tide Homes Team, known for providing expert guidance and seamless real estate experiences. With 5-star reviews and a passion for helping folks connect with their ideal community and find their dream home in Northern Virginia or Washington DC, Devon brings a unique blend of local expertise and global perspective to every client interaction. Before becoming a Realtor®, Devon honed her skills in digital marketing and communications. She also has a Master's in Science from New York University in International Relations and Human Rights. Devon has always been led by her passion to learn about the world and the core elements of human rights and dignity, giving her a keen understanding of the diverse needs of today's buyers and sellers. Having grown up on Nantucket Island and lived in Spain, Devon appreciates both small-town charm and high-end luxury, and is thrilled to offer her expertise to Spanish speakers and those relocating to the area. When she's not guiding clients, Devon enjoys exploring the DMV's best beer gardens and playgrounds with her family. Let Devon's expertise, dedication, and personalized approach guide you home. Her commitment to growth and education has continued throughout her real estate journey, as made evident by her involvement and designations: * Northern Virginia Association of Realtors Committee Member: International Business Forum (2025); Young Professionals Network (2025); NVAR Cares Committee (2026); Real Estate Finance and Settlements Forum (2026) * Accredited Buyer's Representative - ABR® designation
title: Realtor® licensed in VA & DC

description: About Dawn As a native of the DC area, I have extensive knowledge of local neighborhoods and developments. Practicing real estate since 2001, I represent buyers and sellers in every price range; selling in Maryland, DC, and Virginia. While consistently achieving sales awards, my philosophy is to balance the number of clients I work with to ensure clients get the full attention they deserve. Most of all, I am really fun to work with! I was born and raised in Annandale, Virginia and grew up in the real estate business. My father was a real estate investor, buying foreclosure properties, fixing them up, and re-selling them for profit. When I was a child, my father took me throughout Northern Virginia to look at the different homes for market evaluation, and I observed countless open houses, contract negotiations, and settlements. After earning a Bachelor of Science in Business from Mary Washington College, I worked for a multi-family real estate lender. During this time, I began to purchase my own investment properties. Becoming a realtor was just a natural extension of being a real estate investor: I use the skills I learned from my father and my background to help buyers and sellers achieve their goals. I now live in Potomac, Maryland. As a native of Virginia and resident of Maryland, I have extensive knowledge of the DC metropolitan area, and do equal business in both states and DC.
title: Realtor®

description: About Mike Mike is originally a Maryland native, growing up in Ellicott City. He later moved to Florida and graduated from the University of Florida with a BA in Economics and Masters in International Business with a specialization in tourism and hospitality management. Coming from a customer service and management background, Mike has a genuine, empathetic approach to building lifelong relationships with his clients to fully understand their wants and needs when it comes to home buying and selling. For every transaction, he will devote whatever time and energy is needed to help secure the best deal at the right time. With a business acumen and a passion for helping others, Mike works tirelessly to ensure the process is as smooth as possible for his clients in every regard of the transaction. Outside of work, Mike likes to golf, play games with friends, and travel- he’s even lived abroad in Paris and Seoul! Mike is from a big, Italian family, so home (and a good red sauce) is important to him!
title: Realtor®

description: About Danielle Danielle is a licensed salesperson and investor/developer in DC, Virginia and NY and has over $130M in sales since starting in real estate in 2011. Danielle believes that real estate is a wealth building tool and prides herself on making real estate approachable and attainable by getting to know her clients’ and sculpting a strategy that will help them achieve their specific goals. “It’s important to me to understand both my client’s immediate and long-term goals. I guide clients on thinking past just this transaction to help make sure what they want now will help get them to their future goals as well. We create a plan together that gets them to where they want to go!” Danielle has helped clients with a wide variety of real estate transactions; including new construction developments, condo conversion projects, cosmetic and major renovations, vacation and short-term rental purchases and business planning, buy-and-hold landlord strategies, and helping homeowners plan on either upsizing or downsizing their current home. She views every property as an investment, whether you reside in the property or not. Many of Danielle’s clients are those who are looking to buy or sell their own home and plan out the best way to grow their wealth through real estate long term. When not Danielle is helping clients, you can find her kayaking, wine tasting, cooking, gardening, or spending time with her wife, Hillary, and their cat Mia. Danielle was honored as DC’s Finest Young Professional 2012 by the Cystic Fibrosis Foundation and has been on the Marketing Advisory Board for the CFF’s Long Island and Metro DC Chapters.
title: Realtor®

description: About Anshul After graduating from Virginia Commonwealth University with a Homeland Security and Emergency Preparedness major, Anshul began his career at an IT Tech Software company geared towards empowering the Hospitality industry. He learned to use understanding and problem-solving skills to translate products to real-life benefits for his clients. He can use his experience to help different businesses reach their goals back to his clients; through education of the current market, managing expectations about the buying process, and being efficient with their time. Anshul understands that everyone has their unique style and dream home; his patient and calculated approach allows his clients to express what is most important and optimal to them. When not on the clock, you can find Anshul playing tennis, hiking, and being a true lover of food; experiencing different D.C. cuisines.
title: Realtor®

description: About Coco As a real estate professional my goal is to help individuals and families buy or sell their homes in a seamless process. By providing my clients with extensive information, numerous options, and a wide array of services, I ensure that all their needs are covered. I chose the real estate business because I love working with people and helping them through complex circumstances. I am originally from Spain and Washington DC has been my home for the past 28 years. I speak fluent Spanish and English and am proficient in French. Strengthening community ties and connecting people to one another has always being a passion of mine. I fulfill this passion in different ways. As a realtor, through the connections I make with my clients, many of whom become friends. As a volunteer, I fulfill this passion through my work with different organizations throughout the city, including the Rock Creek Conservancy, Catholic Charities Immigration Legal Services, the National Cathedral School, and the Cystic Fibrosis Foundation among others. I have a Law degree, a Master of International and Comparative Law, and a certification in executive coaching. I started my professional career as a consultant helping European companies export their products to the USA. That experience laid the foundation upon which I then built my own company to import and distribute natural supplements. When my twin daughters were born, I decided to focus on my family, while finding opportunities to be of service to others. I worked as a substitute teacher in different schools throughout the city and became an active member of the Parents’ Association at my girls’ schools. I also volunteered as a coach helping a group of adults with learning disabilities improve their social and executive functioning skills. In addition, I used my language abilities and legal background to assist immigration clients in the legal service department of Catholic Charities and took on many other philanthropic endeavors in which I am still involved today. Through my background in law, business, coaching and community service I have developed many skills which made my transition to real estate, effortless. By providing home-buyers and sellers with thoughtful, professional, and attentive service, I have built my real estate business in Washington DC and the surrounding area and earned glowing testimonials, repeat business, and many referrals. When you choose me as your Real Estate agent, you are working with a highly trained and experienced Realtor who is backed by a professional network and family of companies with worldwide reach. Compass Real Estate’s services include lending, title and escrow, insurance, home inspection, renovations and moving companies therefore putting all your needs under one roof. My experience, dedication to serve you, customization of service and powerful network make me a Real Estate Adviser that you can trust to help you sell or buy a home quickly, efficiently and professionally. I can’t wait to get started!
title: Global R.E. Advisor  Serving DC, MD, VA & SPAIN

description: About Shaunte Over the past 20 years, I’ve built a reputation as a top-producing agent, specializing in residential real estate, distressed properties, and investment property management. My career began in 2005, and since then, I’ve been recognized as one of the area’s best real estate professionals, with accolades from publications like Washingtonian Magazine and DC Modern Luxury Magazine. This success is rooted in my commitment to delivering unparalleled service, my deep market knowledge, and my passion for helping clients achieve their real estate dreams. Compass provides me with state-of-the-art technology and innovative solutions, enabling me to streamline transactions and offer personalized, data-driven insights. Their exclusive programs, like Compass Concierge and Coming Soon listings, give my clients a distinct advantage in the market, whether they’re buying, selling, or investing. As a DC-area native, former educator, and lifelong advocate for community engagement, I bring a unique perspective to my work. My love for learning and drive to stay “in the know” about everything real estate—special programs, development projects, communities, and loan options—ensures my clients have access to the most up-to-date resources. In honor of my father, a Vietnam veteran and U.S. Army serviceman, I’ve founded House Keys for Vets, a program dedicated to helping veterans achieve homeownership. At Compass, I’m excited to expand this initiative further, combining my passion for service with the company’s mission to empower communities. Outside of real estate, I’m proud to be a mom to my young daughter, an avid traveler, a published author, and a committed supporter of education. Through every transaction, I continue to donate a portion of my earnings to local schools and my alma mater, Spelman College, as part of my commitment to giving back. Joining Compass allows me to elevate my business while staying true to the values that have defined my career. Whether you’re buying a home, selling a property, or exploring investment opportunities, I’m here to guide you every step of the way. Let’s work together to achieve your goals—contact me today to get started!
title: Realtor®

description: About Suzanne Suzanne is not your average real estate professional. With over 30 years of experience in the industry, she has mastered the art of delivering unparalleled service to her clients. Her dedication to each and every project is second to none. Whether you're buying or selling a property, Suzanne is there to listen, act proactively, and take a hands-on approach to ensure that your transaction is completed efficiently and effectively. With her professional background as a real estate attorney, energy efficiency advisor, project manager, and developer, Suzanne brings a unique and diverse skill set to each transaction. Her related degrees and certifications in law, architecture, energy efficiency, and real estate development allow her to provide expert negotiating acumen, creative design sensibilities, keen problem-solving abilities, and exceptional organizational and communication skills. Suzanne is passionate about incorporating modern design elements, maximizing functionality, and implementing sustainable practices, equipment and materials into her projects. She specializes in mid-century modern and sustainable homes and is committed to helping her clients find the perfect property that not only meets their needs but aligns with their values. With licenses in MD, DC and VA, Suzanne primarily serves the Southern Montgomery County, Northwest DC, Prince Georges County, and NoVA areas. Originally from New York, Suzanne has lived in the Washington Metro Area for over three decades. She is a longtime resident of the charming Town of Chevy Chase, where she resides with her husband, son, dog and cat. If you're looking for a full-service real estate professional who is honest, reliable, creative, and data-driven, look no further than Suzanne. She's not just a real estate agent, she's a partner who will go above and beyond to ensure that your real estate dreams become a reality. Client Testimonials Scroll down for more ★★★★★ " Suzanne has been immensely helpful in our home-finding process--patiently walking us through each step of the search. She was very flexible, able to accommodate our busy schedules, providing virtual visits while the COVID pandemic initially hit and offering her valuable opinions and insights, given her background in architecture. Suzanne loves what she does as a realtor--she walked us through numerous options, suggested what could be possible to meet our needs in each particular house, and what we would need to do to make those changes happen. She also patiently guided through the process of making an offer, helping us make informed decisions and going out of her way to helping us. We highly recommend her--we hope you enjoy working with her as well! " - Crystel & Chris ★★★★★ " Suzanne provided excellent service throughout the entire home buying process. She provided clear instructions, explanations and had my best interest every step of the way. Suzanne was responsive to all my requests for information and dealt with issues as they arose almost immediately! I was purchasing an older home and her knowledge of this market was impressive and helpful in making decisions. Most important to me was that Suzanne was professional, knowledgeable, supportive, friendly and excited about my major life investment. I would absolutely consider Suzanne again either as a buyer or seller. " - Carrie ★★★★★ " Suzanne is the best in the business. Suzanne helped us sell our townhouse and purchase our single home during the start of the pandemic. She is extremely organized in helping navigate through scheduling inspections, contractors and other services that were way above and beyond. She is the most thorough Realtor I’ve seen. When our buyer fell through due to COVID the night before closing, she was able to give sound advice, help us complete our purchase transaction, and re-list our departure home quickly. We got multiple offers at the original asking price within weeks. I will also add that the Compass experience all together - from the marketing strategy to the app to Concierge - is second to none. " - Tim & Christina ★★★★★ " We LOVED working with Suzanne and are so grateful to her for helping us to get the perfect home for our . We hope we will be in it for a long time, but if it ever comes time to sell we would definitely use her again. Suzanne responded to all of our questions and concerns promptly and went above and beyond on multiple occasions as we conducted our search from afar due to the pandemic. She was patient, resourceful and an advocate for us. Highly recommend. " - Anne & Jessica ★★★★★ " My daughter moved out of state on short notice for her dream job, without time to deal with selling her small mid-century modern house. She was dreading the idea of dealing with a real estate agent by phone instead of face-to-face. She also knew that her house would be very difficult to sell without a lot of interior improvements prior to listing, and she did not know how to get that work done when she was living 200 miles away. And worst of all, the COVID-19 pandemic and resulting quarantine and business shutdowns arrived just as she was ready to face the daunting task of selling her house. Selecting the right listing agent for the house turned out to be very easy. Suzanne Parmet is widely known in the real estate community for her special affinity for MCM houses and MCM style. She also had in-depth knowledge of MCM houses in my daughter's immediate neighborhood and had represented a number of sellers and buyers of MCM houses in that neighborhood. Suzanne also was a great fit for selling this house because her concierge services included acting as the project manager for the renovations that had to be done before the house could be listed. I am writing this review because I worked closely with Suzanne during the renovation process and saw what a difference she made. She was at the house almost every day as she dealt with contractors, recommended solutions when snags arose, and kept the project on track for timely completion of the work... In addition to her project management skills, Suzanne had an even greater impact on the success of the renovations through her eye for style and architectural detail. She recommended opening walls between rooms to add light and improve sight lines and flow between primary living spaces, and she even provided architectural drawings for the contractor to carry out those structural changes. She redesigned the layout of the kitchen cabinets and appliances for increased storage and workspace for the cook, and to add new breakfast bar seating. Her recommendations for... fixtures and finishes transformed a small, dark, cramped kitchen into a bright, sleek, and open modern kitchen... And she topped everything off with stylish MCM staging that made the entire house look like something from a home design show. Finally, I appreciate Suzanne's professionalism and respect for my daughter as the key person in the sale of this house.... Suzanne's discussions with my daughter about pricing the house, marketing strategy, and selection of the best offer among multiple offers received were all confidential between Suzanne and my daughter. The success of selling this house through Suzanne Parmet is best illustrated by the fact that the house had 75 showings and sold during the pandemic quarantine period in five days with 14 offers and for [significantly more than the] listing price..., and [quite significantly] ... more than the price we expected it to sell for if no renovations were made. " - Debbie ★★★★★ " Suzanne went above and beyond in helping us sell a mid-century modern home. She assisted with all facets including improvements, budgeting, decor, marketing, and negotiating the final offer. Highly recommend! She is very conscientious, skilled at real estate transactions, and pleasant. " - Margaret
title: Realtor

description: About Susie As a third generation Washingtonian, Susie brings her local knowledge of all 3 jurisdictions (Washington, DC, Maryland, and Virginia), prior experience in real estate marketing for Compass, and strong interpersonal skills to the real estate industry. Raised in Reston, VA with family in Bethesda, MD and Arlington and Alexandria, VA, Susie grew up getting to know the wide variety of neighborhoods that the DC Metropolitan area has to offer. Introduced to the world of real estate while serving as a Marketing Advisor to Compass agents in the DC region, Susie realized her passion for guiding others and her proactive personality would serve her clients well as a real estate agent. What truly sets Susie apart is her approachable, patient personality coupled with her thirst for knowledge of knowing the current situation of each property her clients are interested in. Susie works tirelessly on behalf of her clients, whether they are buying, selling, or renting, to help them find the perfect place to call home. Susie has partnered with the Mank & Olin Team of Compass, an award-winning top producer in the DC Metropolitan area who has sold over $200 million in luxury real estate. Susie’s knowledge of the DMV stems from both being raised in northern Virginia and her high school education at Georgetown Visitation Preparatory School. Susie quickly became involved in the close-knit Visitation community and currently serves on the Visitation Alumnae Board. Susie graduated from James Madison University in Harrisonburg, Virginia and is an alumna of Zeta Tau Alpha sorority. Outside of real estate, you can catch Susie at a live music show or spending time at her family's shore house in Ocean City, NJ. Susie lives in Old Town Alexandria along with the rest of the Mank & Olin Team - which allows her to both "work and play" in one of her favorite neighborhoods outside of DC and stay up to date with the newest restaurants and local happenings.
title: Licensed Real Estate Agent in Washington, DC | Maryland | Virginia, Mank & Olin Team

description: About Cara With over two decades of industry experience, Cara possesses an extensive knowledge of the local real estate market. Her expertise allows her to guide and counsel each client through the process of buying or selling a home with confidence and success. Whether it's negotiating on behalf of first-time buyers or representing luxury sellers, Cara serves as a powerful advocate for all her clients. Cara began her career in 2003 and in 2010 was honored as one of Realtor Magazine's "30 Under 30." From 2016 to 2023, she earned the distinction of being named one of Washingtonian's Best Agents, a testament to her consistent excellence and dedication in the real estate industry. Most recently, she was recognized as The Face of D.C. Suburb Homes in Washingtonian's Faces of Washington feature. In 2023, Cara achieved a remarkable milestone by successfully representing the seller of DC's most expensive listing, the 12,200-square-foot Swedish Embassy Estate. As the leader of the Cara Pearlman Group, Cara and her team have assisted over 300 buyers and sellers in achieving their real estate goals, completing more than $500 million in transactions. Their listings typically sell within an average market time of 13 days and consistently achieve an impressive sales price, often exceeding the asking price by 105%. Recognizing the importance of collaboration, Cara has cultivated a network of trusted partners, including lenders, inspectors, and settlement attorneys. By assembling this team of professionals, she ensures that every aspect of the real estate journey is handled with utmost care and expertise, always keeping her client's best interests at heart. Licensed in Maryland, D.C., and Virginia, Cara resides in North Bethesda with her husband, two children, and two dogs.
