In her free time, she loves to cook, learn about wine, explore new restaurants, hike, and spend time with her kids. &amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;br&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt; &amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;br&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;
title: Executive Vice President

description: About Pearlman Meekin & Co Pearlman Meekin & Co's mission is to "help everyone find their place in the world." Over the past 20 years, team leaders Cara Pearlman and Megan Meekin and their team have had the honor of assisting more than 230 buyers and sellers, with the goal of helping them find their place in the Washington D.C. Metro area. Cara and Megan ensure that their team keeps their clients' best interests at heart. Cara began her real estate career in 2003 and was honored in 2010 as one of Realtor Magazine's "30 Under 30." Megan is a 5th generation Washingtonian and is celebrating her 9th year in real estate this coming summer. More recently, Cara and Megan were honored as one of Washingtonian Magazine's Top Agents of 2024, and has been named such since 2016. Pearlman Meekin & Co. is comprised of vibrant, knowledgeable professionals from all over the DMV area which earned us the 2021 GCAAR Platinum Small Team award. Cara, Megan, and team are licensed in Maryland, D.C., and Virginia.
title: Pearlman Meekin & Co

description: About Andy With more than 20 years of experience in real estate, Andy has always made sure to start each relationship with his clients by understanding their goals and decision-making styles. His approach involves getting to know his clients and then anticipating their needs. Andy aims for smooth transactions, where nothing falls through the cracks and surprises are kept to a minimum. Andy has helped hundreds of happy clients find more than 450 new homes, totaling more than $280+ million in sales. Andy values the relationships he has made and the referrals his clients have given to friends and family—the highest compliment in his book. In Andy's 25+ years in DC, he has lived in Chevy Chase, Wesley Heights, Eckington, Georgetown, and calls SW Waterfront home. He loves experiencing historic charm along with new developments that contribute to the vibrancy of DC's ever-changing city. Featured in "If You Lived Here" on PBS WETA
title: Senior Vice President | Realtor

description: About Peers Residential At Peers Residential, our mission is to meet the needs of our clients every step of the way to ensure that they have the best possible experience. In fact, our clients have told us that we have an intuitive sense of their needs around making a major decision to buy or sell a home. We pride ourselves on listening and making recommendations to our clients that support their vision for the future. Our expertise in DC, Maryland and Virginia comes from our broad real estate background, personal connections within the communities and our keen understanding of the areas we serve. We are confident that we will find the right fit for our buyers and provide the best listing experience for our sellers. We are consistently recognized by Washingtonian Magazine as one of the DMV's Top Teams. From 2019 to 2020 we earned a top team honor for our work in the Southwest Waterfront. We understand that the decision to buy or sell a home does not come easy. Often it is a life-changing experience and can come with complexities. Andy, Steven, Jeremy, Arash and the team at Peers Residential are here to listen and support you every step of the way. We pride ourselves on developing a trusted relationship to ensure a successful experience.

About Katherine Katherine Pennington is a seasoned Real Estate Agent in the Washington metropolitan region with extensive experience in the high-end residential market. She has been part of more than $500 million in closed real estate transactions with the top three brokerage firms in the Washington area. Working alongside the region's top brokers, Katherine has helped manage negotiations for a broad range of clients, including industry leaders and top foreign and domestic government officials. She is passionate about handling every aspect of the transaction down to the smallest detail, allowing her clients to feel confident in their choices and at ease with the process. Katherine also has deep experience with first time homebuyers, helping them to navigate the complexities of such an important investment, especially in a competitive market. A Maryland native, Katherine returned to the Washington area after graduating from Elon University in 2017. She also attended local preparatory school Saint James in Hagerstown, MD. Katherine grew up in a family of real estate and housing entrepreneurs where she saw firsthand the excitement of helping each person or family find a place to call home. When she’s not thinking about real estate, Katherine is active in her community and serves as a board member for WGIRLS DC, a nonprofit organization dedicated to empowering women and children in underserved communities.
title: Realtor®

description: About Renee As a native of the DC suburbs and now a resident of Bloomingdale, I’ve spent my life getting to know and love DC for the thriving, diverse, monumental city it is. There’s a home and a lifestyle here for everyone, and I find such joy in sharing my love of this place with home buyers, sellers, investors, and developers. I’ve come to from a top-producing brokerage in Washington, DC where I gained valuable experience specializing in residential sales, commercial sales and leasing, investment/acquisition, and condo conversion. For more than a decade, I’ve grown to learn the unique nuances of this business while building foundational relationships with clients and partners across the metro area. Jen Angotti and I are the founding of Arrow Group, a team of six professional realtors. Arrow Group works with a wide range of sellers, buyers, investors, and . Arrow Group provides clients with access to off-market properties and opportunities that most can’t provide. The success of Arrow’s Group approach is evident in consistent annual sales of $90-$100 million and yearly nominations as Washingtonian’s “Best Of.”
title: Senior Vice President | Realtor®

description: About Andre As the founder and principal of District Partners at Compass , Andre Perez brings a wealth of expertise from both the real estate and financial sectors, crafting exceptional client experiences that go beyond traditional transactions. With over 25 years of experience in the Washington Metropolitan region , he has established himself as a premier specialist in luxury real estate , with a particular focus on modern, mid-century, and contemporary architecture , as well as commercial real estate transactions . His ability to blend market intelligence with a refined appreciation for design ensures that every client receives a highly personalized and strategic approach to buying and selling. Born and raised in Guatemala , Perez immigrated to the United States at 18 years old , driven by a deep entrepreneurial spirit. Just four years later, he launched his real estate career with RE/MAX Horizons and RE/MAX Allegiance , serving clients in Washington, D.C., Maryland, and Virginia . His natural talent for the industry quickly propelled him to Top Producer status , earning him recognition for his exceptional sales volume and market acumen. In 2003 , he expanded into the financial sector, joining Saab Financial before becoming Vice President of Emerging Markets at Pinnacle Financial . There, he excelled as the company’s No. 1 producer , surpassing $144 million in sales annually and developing a sharp analytical approach that would later enhance his real estate strategies. Perez returned to real estate in 2009 , founding District One Properties in Alexandria, Virginia . This boutique real estate firm was built on a foundation of innovation and bespoke client service , embracing the rapidly evolving residential market with a fresh, interactive approach. In 2017 , District One evolved into District Partners Real Estate , a next-generation platform focused on progressive representation, design-forward marketing, and high-touch client experiences . Today, District Partners is a premier sales team Compass , the fastest-growing and most innovative real estate brokerage in the nation. Perez and his team continue to redefine luxury real estate by blending cutting-edge technology with a relationship-driven approach . They serve clients across nation , while also maintaining a strong presence in the international market , offering advisory services to global investors and relocating clients. Andre Perez resides in Alexandria, Virginia , with his wife, Anastasia , and their three daughters. Deeply connected to the cultural vibrancy of the region, he enjoys sports, family activities, and exploring the area’s rich architectural heritage . His passion for modern design and lifestyle-driven real estate elevates his service, ensuring that his clients receive more than just a home—they receive a carefully curated experience. With a strategic mindset and an in-depth understanding of both local and global markets , Perez remains at the forefront of the industry, offering a sophisticated and holistic approach to luxury real estate.
title: Executive Vice President

description: About Christopher A successful real estate transaction doesn't happen by accident. It's the result of expert negotiation, market knowledge, and—most importantly—a powerful network. I'm Chris Perry, a top REALTOR® in the Washington Metropolitan Area, and my entire business is designed to provide a seamless, stress-free experience for you. I pride myself on providing truly excellent customer service, which means I anticipate your needs and manage the entire process. My clients receive an immediate advantage: my strong relationships with colleagues and high-quality vendors. From lenders and inspectors to stagers and contractors, I have a trusted team ready to ensure your transaction is smooth from start to finish. Whether you are a first-time buyer or an experienced investor, I will handle the details so you can focus on your next chapter. Looking for a real estate partner who will truly manage the process for you? Let's connect today.

About Han About 15 years ago Han was buying, selling and managing her own properties and realized that she has a deep down passion for real estate. With about 9 years under her belt as a full time agent, Han brings something very special to the table in the way of being able to maximize the potential of every deal. She is driven by the design to help others buy, sell or build their own homes and makes the process enjoyable and fun. Whether you are a buyer or seller Han is obsessed with achieving the best possible outcome for you as if it were her own transaction. Han has a creative ken eye and that persistence that will insure that you will have all the knowledge and resources that you need to handle that most important deal. Offering the advantage of experience and honest insight, having Han on your team will make a profound difference! Han is fluent in Mandarin Chinese and welcomes international buyers. She is recognized as a Washingtonian Top Agent, NVAR Top Producer and Long and Foster Gold Team Member. Han has called Northern Virginia her home for the past 15 years where she lives with her husband.
title: Licensed Real Estate Salesperson

description: About Molly From the beginning, Molly has had an entrepreneurial spirit and would sell almost anything that was not nailed down; her lunch or her sweaters: sold! With booming businesses in babysitting, gardening, dog walking, and housesitting, at the age of 11 she had earned over $1,000 in one summer alone. She was reluctant to go to summer camp because she knew her market share would be diminished greatly by going to camp in the Poconos. Molly grew up in Norwalk, Connecticut, and attended the performing arts high school Interlochen Arts Academy in Traverse City, MI where she was awarded the distinguished honor of winning the Young Artist Award of 1969. She earned her B.A. at Sarah Lawrence College where she was a Rockefeller Fellow in Women’s History. Molly’s post-grad move to Washington, DC was generated by her passion for women’s equity concerns. She worked for several non-profits dealing with pay equity for women. This led to being invited to develop the first political column in a national women’s magazine and becoming the first Washington editor of GLAMOUR Magazine. That year she was highlighted as one of GLAMOUR’s 10 Women to Watch. Later, Molly went on to produce the Washington-based Charlie Rose television program. Molly honed her business acumen by owning and operating five David’s Cookie stores in the DC area. Between locating, leasing, and negotiating on all the storefronts, she discovered her passion for real estate and thus began her career in 1987. Since day one she has brought her patience, listening skills, and friendly demeanor to every transaction. She has remained a top producer and notable member of the Washington area real estate community for over three decades. Molly’s love of problem-solving, strategic planning, market knowledge, and becoming a partner with her customers – helping them find their place in the world — continues to delight her. Molly is married to Jeffrey Jay, a psychotherapist, with whom she has four children, and they live in Bethesda. She is actively involved with the giving group Many Hands, hiking, rug hooking, storytelling, and the arts community.
title: Senior Vice President, Realtor®

description: About Peter Ferguson If you're searching for a group of Real Estate professionals who are not only masters at navigating the DC, Maryland, and Northern Virginia Real Estate market but value your interests above all else, you've found them. The Ferguson group's primary focus is making your home buying or selling experience as seamless and pleasant as it can be. Whether you are buying a home or selling one, our mission is to provide you with an outrageous service level that relieves you of the stress involved in the process. You can trust us because we know this is one of the most significant decisions of your life. We'll express our thanks by showing you our business's human side through patience, sincerity, and responsiveness. Regardless of our engagement scope, we're familiar with the weight of the responsibility you are entrusting to us and will always strive to give you the most favorable outcome. Our team is a dynamic and personable group with extensive knowledge of the Real Estate market in the DMV. Our aim is always for you to get the most out of our relationship. We want you to depend on us and feel comfortable as we build a level of trust and reliability you can count on. Getting to know you, your lifestyle, and your expectations set the bar for how we represent your interests. We always endeavor to wow you with our expertise and professionalism while at the same time keeping you engaged and informed throughout the entire journey. Headed up by seasoned Real Estate agent Peter Ferguson, The Ferguson Group has been recognized as a top Real Estate team in the Washington DC area and honored as premier agents in The Washingtonian Magazine and Bethesda Magazine. We understand this gives us a reputation to maintain, but that's not the only reason we work as hard for you as we do. We know what a privilege it is to represent our clients and want to build lasting relationships in the community at large. We love what we do, and delivering you to the door of a successful experience is always our primary goal.

About John John was born and raised in Oklahoma, attended college in Nashville, Tennessee and finally chose Washington, DC as his adopted hometown in 2000. Seeking a wide breadth of professional experiences, John worked in the banking, small business and IT fields before finding his career passion in helping people with one of the most important financial transactions in their lives - buying and selling homes. John’s client-centered approach to his business has set him apart in the industry by making his clients feel at ease and informed throughout the process. John believes that expertise, honesty, communication and responsiveness are the keys to a successful relationship with his clients. John began his real estate career with a national real estate firm in 2011 where he quickly rose to become one of the top-producing agents in the region. John has experience representing clients in transactions throughout the DC metro area. In 2015, John affiliated his business with Compass to bring unmatched technology resources to his clients as a complement to his first-rate customer service philosophy. Outside of work, John loves to travel has visited 40 countries across the world and lived the south of France for one year. John’s other hobbies include cooking, dining out and collecting local handcrafted art pieces each place he visits. John lives in an historic Victorian in DC’s Bloomingdale neighborhood with his husband Jonathan.
title: Vice President

description: About Tim Maryland, DC, and Virginia REALTOR® /Associate Broker Tim Phelps is not your average real estate agent. With a genuine passion for the industry and an unwavering commitment to his clients, Tim has become a trusted guide, counselor, and teacher in the DMV real estate market. Raised in Washington, D.C., Tim's roots run deep in the community he serves. His intimate knowledge of the area, its neighborhoods, and its unique characteristics allows him to provide invaluable insights to his clients. From the bustling streets of the District to the serene suburbs of Maryland and Virginia, Tim understands the diverse needs and desires of those looking to call this region home. What sets Tim apart is his relentless dedication to his clients' success. He approaches every transaction as an opportunity to bring his clients' real estate visions to life. Whether it's helping first-time homebuyers find their dream home or assisting sellers in achieving top dollar for their property, Tim is there every step of the way. His commitment to excellence and client satisfaction is evident in the countless success stories he has accumulated over his nearly decade-long career. Tim's expertise extends beyond the traditional realm of a real estate agent. With a background in project management and estimating, he possesses a unique skill set that allows him to navigate complex negotiations, gauge accurate price points, and build strong relationships with clients and industry professionals alike. Tim is a problem solver at heart, always willing to explore innovative solutions and think outside the box to ensure his clients' needs are met. Outside of real estate, Tim finds solace in his beautiful family. He is a loving husband to his wife, Christina, and a proud father to their two exceptional children, Katya and Luka. When he's not assisting clients or spending time with his loved ones, Tim can be found pursuing his passions for hiking, snowboarding, golfing, playing soccer, or track riding his motorcycle. Tim's dedication to serving the real estate needs of his community is unwavering. As a member of the Greater Capital Area Association of REALTORS® and the National Association of Realtors, he actively participates in industry organizations and serves on the GCAAR Grievance Committee. Tim's commitment to mentorship is also evident through his organization of training courses for real estate agents of all experience levels. For Tim Phelps, real estate is more than just a career—it's a calling. With his local expertise, market knowledge, and genuine care for his clients, Tim is the real estate professional you can trust to turn your dreams into reality.
title: Realtor®, Phelps Group | Associate Broker, Compass

description: About Daren Daren Phillips grew up Charlotte, NC and discovered early on that he thrives on challenge, forever strategizing how to overcome obstacles and achieve his goals. An athlete by nature, Daren has found himself running in four marathons, including one on The Great Wall of China, six 200-mile relay races (yes, six), including the ultimate relay race from the timber line of Mt. Hood Oregon to the sea, “Hood to Coast”. He often (just ask his partner) says, giving credit to his mother, “As a junior in high school, my mama was finally able to purchase her first home. Through her, I saw first-hand what it means to dedicate yourself for years to a goal and never waiver until you’ve arrived. The look in her eyes when she was handed her keys for the first time is impossible to describe. This was her own personal ‘marathon’ and she just crossed the finish line.” And so, the real estate seed was planted. As an adult, Daren lived in Atlanta, Los Angeles, and Austin working on various political campaigns, making the District of Columbia a natural place to eventually call home. In 1996, after working on Harvey Gantt’s 1996 Senate race in North Carolina, he moved to the District to work for the Victory Fund PAC and then at the United States Trade Representative’s Office as the Director of Scheduling. Years before Michelle Obama and the “Let’s Move” program, Daren and Dan Barlow, head trainer for Real Salt Lake City, a professional soccer team, created a boot camp called Body Recondition. Daren was the star of that boot camp for 12 years and strengthened not just other peoples’ bodies, but also his own devotion to improving lives in every career choice he has made, from politics and government to physical fitness and real estate. Daren uses his perseverance and motivational personality to pro-actively address issues before they become problems. Co-workers have joked that Daren probably runs to the top of the stairs of a four-story walk-up cheering on his clients with a bottle of water and a protein bar. When it comes to considering the emotional aspect of the buying and selling process for his clients, he always asks himself one very simple question, “How would I feel if I were in their shoes?” Daren holds a BA from Winthrop University and thinks his dog, Sadie, is just about the sweetest thing on the face of the earth.
title: Realtor® | Senior Vice President

description: About Katrina With 20 years of experience in corporate Information Technology sales, and 18 years as a well-respected real estate agent, I have a passion for counseling, advocating, and leveraging my negotiation skills for my clients. I've developed a keen sense of what negotiation strategies work best for each unique scenario to give my clients a competitive advantage. As a longtime Washingtonian, I love this city and can expertly guide you through the unique housing market in D. C. Whether as a buyer's or as a listing agent, I have consistently maintained a track record of success for the clients I represent. You can count on me to be a tireless advocate, relentless negotiator, and predictive problem solver, but ultimately, I hope to become your trusted friend.
title: REALTOR®

description: About Clarence Clarence Pineda Real Estate Advisor at Compass Washington, DC · Northern Virginia · Delaware Beaches “Behind every move is a story — my role is to guide yours with clarity, intention, and care.” If you’re looking for real estate guidance that feels calm, strategic, and deeply personal, you’re in the right place. I help clients navigate the Washington, DC, Northern Virginia, and Delaware beach markets with a level of clarity and attentiveness that turns a complex process into a confident, meaningful experience. A Practice Built on Trust, Strategy & Experience My advisory style is grounded in long-term relationships, thoughtful strategy, and a steady, composed approach to decision-making. I’ve had the privilege of guiding clients through more than $65 million in residential real estate — a reflection of the trust they place in me and the partnerships that continue long after closing. At Compass , I bring a refined, service-driven approach supported by advanced technology, elevated marketing, and data-driven insight, helping clients excel in competitive and evolving markets. My focus is always on clarity, preparation, and creating a seamless experience from start to finish. Where I Work — And Why Clients Choose Me I’m grateful to serve clients throughout: Washington, DC Arlington, Alexandria & Northern Virginia Rehoboth Beach, Lewes & the Delaware beaches Clients rely on me for: Strategic pricing and negotiation Elevated staging and pre-market preparation Seamless transitions between DC and the Delaware coast Access to Compass Private Exclusives and off-market opportunities A steady, informed presence from first consultation to closing My approach is intentional, relationship-first, and grounded in genuine care. I guide clients to choices that feel thoughtful and right — never rushed. Who I Am Beyond Real Estate Community connection is central to who I am. I proudly support New Hope Housing , Sitar Arts Center , and CAMP Rehoboth , championing housing stability, arts education, and LGBTQ+ advocacy across the region. Outside of work, I cherish time with my husband and our dog in Rehoboth Beach , where we enjoy our second home. Our weekends often include exploring new restaurants, walking through town, or relaxing by the coast. I also enjoy hiking , attending live shows , catching the latest films , and spending quiet time reading or meditating — moments that bring balance and clarity into my life. Your Next Chapter If you’re exploring a move — in DC, across Northern Virginia, or along the Delaware coast — I would be honored to guide your next chapter with the clarity, confidence, and care it deserves.
title: REALTOR®

description: About Isabella Isabella has lived and traveled all over the world, but D.C. won her heart and became her home. Isabella worked years in her family’s real estate and construction firm in South America, and she uses her global experience to help her many international clients manage the intricacies of buying and selling in D.C. Her law degree allows her to navigate through any type of transaction with her clients. Isabella’s zest life and love of real estate are contagious, and her clients benefit from her energy and due diligence in every transaction. Helping more than 60 families throughout her career, Isabella's business's is built 100% from referrals! Isabella has studied international business and art history and holds a law degree. She lives in D.C., where she can be found playing tennis, trying new restaurants with her friends and her husband, and walking her puppies, Sia and Pipa.
title: Realtor
Realtor® | Licensed in DC, MD, VA

description: About Marga Marga is an Associate Virginia and the District of Columbia. Marga has nearly three decades of experience in residential real estate sales, rentals, and purchases. Prior to working in the real estate industry, she worked as a successful attorney in Fairfax, VA. Marga earned her undergraduate degree from Boston College and Law degree from George Washington University. With her clients, she practices attention to detail, provides reliable service with an easy and relaxed manner, and focuses on what matters most - helping each client find their place to be while having fun doing so. She has both buyers and sellers in the District of Columbia, Arlington, Falls Church, McLean, Alexandria, and the greater Northern Virginia area. Her personal and individual approach to serving her clients is complemented her experience and negotiation skills. Many of her clients are referrals and repeat customers as Marga genuinely forges relationships with each person well beyond the real estate transaction. Marga is a proud member of the Northern Virginia Association of Realtors® Lifetime Producers and enjoys her continued involvement within the industry. Marga and her husband, Jim, are the parents of four children and are volunteers their community.
title: Associate Broker, Realtor®

description: About Giovanna A premier agent for the Washington DC Metro area, Giovanna is a global real estate professional who sets the standard for an exceptional client experience. Born and raised in Peru, Giovanna came to Fairfax, Virginia, in 2004. She made the transition to full-time realtor in 2006 and through hard work and dedication, she has obtained some of the industry’s highest honors. Best known for her honesty, loyalty, and professionalism, Giovanna goes above and beyond for her clients, providing them with the best real estate experience imaginable. As a bilingual agent, Giovanna’s fluency in Spanish and English is one of the many ways she puts her clients at ease. With her unparalleled credentials and unique background, Giovanna specializes in relocation services, working with international clients relocating to the DC area for international organizations, including the World Bank, IADB, IMF, PAHO, United Nations, OAS, diplomats, and other G4 visa holders. In addition to her extensive domestic services, Giovanna holds one of the industry’s rarest designations — Certified International Property Specialist (CIPS). With her extensive connections and industry savvy approach to real estate, Giovanna is making global citizenship more accessible than ever. When she isn’t conducting domestic and international real estate transactions, you can find Giovanna exploring the city, jet-setting around the world, and spending quality time with her friends and family, including her beautiful twelve-year-old daughter.
title: Realtor®

description: About Melanie Melanie grew up in Germany and felt the desire to explore the world at an early age. Her academic and exciting professional career in international development, political strategy, and international higher education took her to countries throughout Europe, Japan and the United States. With each move, Melanie carefully studied the real estate market and learned the complexities and nuances of establishing oneself in a new community. Melanie launched her real estate career in Northern Virginia in 2018 and has since developed an extensive knowledge of the wide variety of neighborhoods and advantages this area has to offer. She has expanded her geographical reach and has been licensed in Maryland and DC as well, being able to help clients throughout the entire DMV region. She excels at carefully listening to her clients, understanding their needs and providing them with the very best options. Additionally, she brings to real estate an exceptional cultural sensitivity, the ability to clearly communicate complicated matters and a rare level of honesty. She is fluent in English, German, and Italian. Melanie has been married to Zia, whom she met while working at the United Nations in Vienna, Austria, for 13 years. After living in Charlottesville, Virginia, for a number of years, they have found their dream home in Annandale, where they chase around their kids Juno, Max and Gus Gus and their two dogs Sparkle and Dazzle. If Melanie is not serving a client, she enjoys walking her Schnoodle Sparkle, loves to cook, and is an avid baker. In fact, she has won the 2012 Gingerbread House competition in Charlottesville, VA, and loves to teach kids about healthy foods as a volunteer at her kids’ schools.
title: Realtor®

description: About Polaris Advisors Group Polaris Advisors is a dynamic real estate team based in South Florida, led by the experienced professionals Milton Andrade and Leon Damjanovic. With a combined experience of 30 years in the Miami real estate market, Milton and Leon bring a wealth of knowledge and expertise to their clients. Committed to providing exceptional service, Polaris Advisors combines their individual strengths in negotiation, sales, and marketing to create a strong team approach. They prioritize building relationships with their clients and offer personalized support to meet their unique real estate needs. Specializing in the South Florida market, Polaris Advisors caters to a diverse clientele, including first-time homebuyers, renters, and individuals seeking luxury properties. They are dedicated to assisting their clients at every step of the real estate journey, offering guidance and expertise to ensure successful transactions. Polaris Advisors focuses on delivering professional and attentive service to all clients, regardless of their real estate goals. With a deep understanding of the local market and a commitment to client satisfaction, Milton Andrade, Leon Damjanovic, and their team at Polaris Advisors are ready to assist you in navigating the South Florida real estate landscape with confidence and success.

About Scott Scott is a perennial Top Producer and is ranked in the top 5% nationally for residential sales with a history of being a top agent in his office. Scott has been a successful realtor for over 20 years as well as a long term Foxhall Village resident. He served in the U.S. Navy from 1973 to 1993 as a Naval Aviator in operational assignments around the world. Following his service he became active in local D.C. politics, as a Georgetown Advisory Neighborhood Commissioner and started his real estate career.
title: Realtor®

description: About Dan Your Expert Washington, DC Real Estate Agent Dan leverages his deep Washingtonian roots and steady, savvy demeanor to provide exceptional real estate services in the local market. Specializing in first-time homebuyers, Dan’s mission is to align clients’ aspirations with the dynamic realities of the Washington, DC real estate market, ensuring a seamless and satisfying experience with every interaction and transaction. Raised in Montgomery County and a resident of Washington, DC for 15 years, Dan now calls Chevy Chase, MD home, where he lives with his beloved golden retriever, Walter. When not helping clients find their dream homes, Dan enjoys supporting Washington sports teams, playing golf and tennis, cooking, traveling, and spending quality time with friends and family. ★★★★★ “ My wife and I had a fantastic experience working with Dan as our realtor! Buying from out of town and unable to see the property ourselves, Dan's guidance and local market expertise was absolutely invaluable. He helped us secure an incredible deal under the list price, beating out the competition. We're thrilled to have found the perfect place for a family member to live while finishing their degree, and as a long term investment. We felt like Dan really helped us absolutely knock it out of the park! His communication throughout the process was world class and we couldn't be happier!! We can't recommend Dan highly enough to anyone needing a realtor in the Washington, DC metro area! “ - Matt & Rebecca, Buyers from Rochester, NY.
title: Realtor®

description: About Janice Janice has lived in Washington, DC for over 35 years and has been a Georgetown homeowner for over 20 years. She spent much of her childhood traveling the world as the daughter of a military family with Panamanian roots. Her love of travel, languages and culture remained with her throughout her life and inspired her to obtain a bachelor’s degree in international finance and a master’s degree in Latin American Studies. She worked on wall street for several years in institutional sales, and traded equities with some of the largest mutual and hedge funds in Spain, Germany, Switzerland, Belgium, and Saudi Arabia. This past experience has easily translated to real estate, where partnering with clients and negotiating properly on their behalf is essential to every transaction. She believes strongly in education and now partners with her real estate clients to expand their knowledge of the housing market, while she strives to understand and meet their unique real estate needs. Janice has found that her clients appreciate this and find it helpful to the process of buying and selling a home. In addition to her role as your agent, she is a trusted resource and prides herself on promoting growth and development within the community. As a result, her relationships with her clients continue long after buying or selling their home. Janice is a wife and a mother of two daughters, enjoys traveling with her family and writing. She is fluent in Spanish and proficient in French.
title: Executive Vice President

description: About Edward Known his extensive knowledge of the real estate market and his commitment to delivering exceptional customer service, Edward is one of the area’s most experienced agents. A DC resident since 1990, Edward began his second career representing buyers and sellers of Washington DC luxury real estate in 1995. One of seven brothers, Edward was born and raised on Long Island, NY. After graduating from St. Louis University, Edward had a 20 year career in the hospitality industry and began buying real estate as a hobby in 1988. His keen insight and knowledge of real estate combined with his hospitality background, has proven very advantageous his clients and his real estate career. 2000, he formed the Edward and Stewart team conjunction with his business partner, Stewart Coleman. The group has since become Team Vantage, and Edward is proud to lead one of the longest-running and most successful teams in the DMV, with a reputation outstanding professionalism and service. Edward’s philosophy is simple: the real estate buying process is not about salesmanship. Instead, it is about educating and sharing information. In real estate — like many other aspects of life — success depends on experience and knowledge. His clients return again and again because they value the peace of mind that comes from knowing they've made an informed decision in partnership with an experienced top producing Realtor. Edward is licensed in Washington, DC and Maryland. When he is not helping his clients, Edward enjoys globe-trotting, cooking, and spending time on the Potomac River with his family.
title: Realtor®

description: About Gerri Gerri combines energy, enthusiasm, and extensive knowledge of the DC real estate market into a tiny package of confidence and Converse sneakers. After working in the world of defense for a number of years, Gerri purchased her first home in Washington, DC, and decided to make a career change as she fell in love with real estate. Given her experience on all sides of the table, Gerri enjoys working with first time buyers to help them find their perfect home. She has a passion for architecture, and loves how every neighborhood has a different and unique vibe. Together with her wife and adorable rescue pitbull Koda, Gerri resides in the Capitol Hill area of Eastern Market/Barracks Row. When she isn't out supporting clients, she can be found traveling, cooking, or relaxing at home.
title: Realtor- Seth Turner Group

description: About Amanda Client service is ingrained in Amanda's DNA after being trained at leading management consultancy The Boston Consulting Group. She applies her 20 years of experience in the business world to guide clients through the strategic and financial implications of one of the largest purchases most clients will make, with an analytical and data-driven approach. Amanda is unflappable in the face of -stress situations, and understands the importance of clear and responsive communication to make clients feel comfortable and taken care of throughout the buying or selling process. The daughter of a real estate developer and an interior designer, Amanda also understands the "art" of real estate – beyond the numbers, how to create welcoming and functional spaces that allow busy Washingtonians a breather at the end of a hectic day. Having invested in and multiple homes in the area, at client's request, she also consults in renovation and design, providing a total project management turnkey solution. Amanda has a Bachelor of Commerce with a Major in Accounting from her native Canada and an MBA from the Harvard Business School. She now lives in North Cleveland Park with her husband, son, and twin daughters. She knows many of DC's hottest neighborhoods as a former resident, from Dupont Circle (with one baby) to the U Street corridor (before kids). In her downtime, Amanda enjoys Orangetheory and a glass of rosé while watching HGTV.
title: Realtor

description: About Ben Ben got his license to sell real estate 2003 and has been involved in hundreds of deals in the Washington, DC metro area. In the past he has worked for two of the largest franchised brokerages the DC area. He works as the lead on strategic business planning. Since 2008, banks and financial institutions have relied on Ben's expertise in the DC area real estate market to sell their foreclosed and distressed properties. Ben was born and raised in Syracuse, New York and then went on to study at St Lawrence University in Canton, New York. Ben currently lives in a row home in 16th Street Heights with his wife Melissa, daughter Sydney, and collie Julep. When Ben is not selling real estate he enjoys hiking in Rock Creek Park, camping in Shenandoah National Park, and gardening. Ben is a huge Syracuse basketball fan.
title: Realtor®

description: About Laura Laura is a real estate professional with over 25 years of sales and management experience. A second-generation Realtor®, she loves working with clients through the home sale and purchase processes. She knows how to ease clients through life transitions, including moving to a new area, buying a first home, or downsizing. After working with family members who needed to downsize and move to senior living communities, Laura became a Certified Senior Housing Professional and a Certified Senior Downsizing Coach so she could better assist others facing similar challenges. She has demonstrated the necessary knowledge and expertise to counsel clients through the major financial and lifestyle transitions in relocating and selling the family home. Laura recently completed the Certified Senior Advisor (CSA) designation, which is the leading certification for professionals serving older adults. In addition, she is a founding member of Compass Plus, the division of Compass dedicated to assisting senior clients. Her motto is “be overjoyed, not overwhelmed” during this next phase of life! With a positive, detailed approach and extensive knowledge, Laura strives to make every transaction stress-free for her clients. A former executive in the telecommunications industry, she brings a management and operations background to her business. . Originally from New York, Laura relocated to the Washington DC area and lives with her husband in Bethesda. She is an empty-nester who enjoys cycling, skiing, and relaxed meals with family and friends on the porch. An avid hiker, Laura has walked the French and Northern routes of the Camino de Santiago. Client Testimonials ★★★★★ " Laura is highly professional, very personable, knowledgeable about the home buying process. She is committed to understanding her clients' needs and pursuing their interests. In our case, we wanted a highly desirable neighborhood but could not compete with the cash buyers' truly deep pockets. Other realtors might have given us lower-class service, while focusing their energies resources their higher-end clients. Laura did nothing of the kind, with patience and persistence she helped us find a home at just the right price point. We could not have done any better than the house we bought and could not be happier our realtor! " - A.L. ★★★★★ " I want to thank Laura for the very considerate and competent way she helped me through the successful sale of my home. She kept me and my four children up to date every step of the way. This was a seriously important decision for me and I am truly grateful for Laura. Her sincere consideration, knowledge, and expertise made this a positive event. " - J.R. ★★★★★ " From assisting me staging my home, producing a beautiful tour, developing outstanding sales materials through being a gracious host at my open houses, Laura did it all with flair. She was realistic about pricing, helped me recognize a serious buyer, and guided me through the negotiations. " - D.A. ★★★★★ " Laura was referred to me by a colleague and she immediately impressed us. She patiently explained the steps in the process and the various legal requirements in clear simple terms. She also went to great lengths to understand what we were looking for in a home. We never felt rushed or pushed into something we were unable to afford. The homes she proposed were well-researched solid targets. We found the perfect home and Laura guided us skillfully to closing. " - K.C.
title: REALTOR - LICENSED IN DC and MD

description: About Michelle Michelle Quinn has called the Washington DC metro area her home for almost 40 years, following her early childhood spent on US Naval stations abroad. She has lived in all three jurisdictions: DC, Maryland and Virginia and has thorough knowledge of the metro’s beautiful neighborhoods. Michelle holds an undergraduate degree in Psychology from Georgetown University and a master's degree in education from St. Joseph’s University. Transitioning from a successful career in education, Michelle was drawn to real estate due to her comprehensive knowledge of neighborhoods, local amenities, and the complexities of relocation. As a former educator, Michelle takes the time to explain every aspect of the transaction. From understanding market trends and property values to navigating inspections and appraisals, she ensures that her clients fully grasp the process and feel at ease every step of the way. Michelle offers personalized guidance. She strives to make the process as smooth and stress-free as possible; providing clear, concise information and practical advice, so her clients can make decisions that align with their personal and financial objectives. Recently, Michelle co-launched Next Step Living, a one stop resource to empower clients to make the right decisions for their evolving housing and living needs as they consider right sizing their homes. As a certified Senior Real Estate Specialist (SRES), a Certified Senior Advisor, a volunteer at Chevy Chase at Home, The Village of Kensington, and a member of GROWS, Michelle specializes in assisting clients with downsizing and rightsizing decisions, facilitating their next steps in the real estate journey with care and expertise. When she is not working in real estate, she enjoys Italian language lessons, hiking with her husband and adopted pup, Sam, and spending time with her two daughters. Client Testimonials Scroll down for more ★★★★★ "We have worked with Michelle three times (purchased two homes and sold one home) and there is no one we would rather work with! Michelle knows the area extremely well, works hard to understand the needs of her clients, and goes the extra mile to make sure the buying and selling process isn't too stressful. Michelle personalizes each experience to the families she works with, including responding quickly to ensure offers and contingencies rapidly and smoothly through the process. Michelle has taken good care of our family, and we love our new home. We are so lucky to have found Michelle and recommend her to anyone looking to have an awesome home buying/selling experience!" - Sold a Single-Family home in 2019 in Germantown, MD ★★★★★ "Working with Michelle was a delight. She was very professional from beginning to end. She is absolutely efficient, hardworking, and very knowledgeable of the business. Great attention to all detail. Her ability to connect with the client is commendable — she is a very good listener and understands quickly the needs of the client. She made the whole process feel like a breeze!" - Sold a home in 2019 in Wingate, Bethesda, MD 20817 ★★★★★ "I was relocating to the Kensington area and wanted to be in a specific building. We looked at multiple units, strategized, and Michele went above and beyond to get local intel and help me be knowledgeable and fell confident in my process and final purchase. Anything I do in the future will involve Michele and I will recommend her to anyone in need." - Bought a home in 2017 in South Kensington, Kensington, MD 20895 ★★★★★ "Michelle deserves a 10-star rating. She goes above and beyond for her clients and I would highly recommend her as a realtor. She listed a condo for me in Oakton, VA that had been a rental property for years. Since I reside in Florida, I was not able to be in the area to meet with and get work done on the property. Michelle went above and beyond what most realtors would do to help me get the property ready to sell. She helped me with scheduling and coordinating , meeting the property, and making sure that everything was done to get the condo show ready. She also hired a professional photographer and provided high quality photos for the . Michelle has excellent communication skills and kept me up to date throughout the process. She is extremely detail-oriented and is able to keep track of the many nuances and important details of a real estate transaction. She is also knowledgeable about the laws and the process of a real estate transaction. She is also very professional. Real estate transactions can be stressful, and I appreciate that she always was able to remain professional and level-headed in all aspects of the sale of my property. Michelle helped to negotiate a very good price for my condo, and we were able to do a quick close which is what I wanted. Michelle is truly a pleasure to work with and very knowledgeable in her field. Most realtors do not provide the same level of service and have the experience that Michelle has. I highly recommend her both as a buyer's or seller's agent." - Sold a Condo home in 2017 in Oakton, VA
title: Licensed in DC/MD/VA

description: About Anthony Anthony J. Quiroz Olivares brings a wealth of experience and a passion for real estate to his clients. With a keen eye for detail and a dedication to providing exceptional service, Anthony specializes in helping both buyers and sellers navigate the complexities of the real estate market. His comprehensive understanding of local neighborhoods, combined with his strategic approach to marketing and negotiation, ensures that his clients achieve their real estate goals seamlessly. Whether you're looking to find your dream home or sell your property for the best possible price, Anthony's commitment to excellence and personalized service makes him a trusted partner in your real estate journey.
title: Realtor®

description: About CJ CJ’s passion real estate began as a child growing up in a small town in Wisconsin. She watched as her mother meticulously restored their historic 1904 cedar shake childhood home. She has since renovated two of her own DC homes while taking pride in maintaining the historic charm of each. CJ came to DC to attend American University and received a business and degree. She started her real estate career in 2012 and quickly realized this is what she was meant to do. In 2014, CJ was selected as one of REALTOR Magazine’s 30 Under 30 and received her local association’s Rookie of the Year award. In 2022, CJ and her family moved to the Annapolis area and she currently lives in Ulmstead Estates with her husband and four children. She and her husband also own and manage rental properties in Northeast, DC and Reading, PA. When she’s not selling homes or wrangling kids, CJ enjoys traveling and spending time with her extended family. With a passion exceeding her clients’ expectations, she enjoys working with buyers and sellers as they make one of the most important decisions of their lives.
title: Realtor - Licensed in MD, DC & VA

description: About Lavina "Tenacious," "tireless," and "strategic" are just a few of the glowing descriptors clients use to describe Lavina. Known for her exceptional negotiation skills, responsiveness, and unwavering attention to detail, Lavina’s expertise was honed during her former career as a news producer, where she excelled under pressure and tight deadlines. A native of New Jersey, Lavina moved to the DC metro area after attending the University of Maryland, and has made it her home ever since. She deeply understands that a real estate purchase is often the most significant investment many will make, and she is honored to guide her clients through that process with expertise and care. Outside of work, Lavina is an avid fan of international vegetarian cuisine and has a particular fondness for all things sweet. She also dedicates her time to giving back, volunteering with local organizations like Iona Senior Services, where she delivers groceries to seniors, and Dress for Success, where she supports women in need.
title: Vice President

description: About Eddie Eddie grew up southwest Texas and graduated from The University of Texas at Austin. Since the mid-1990's, he has lived and worked in the District. Working in real estate for the last 20 years has given Eddie a broad and colorful experience that he loves to share with clients. His enthusiasm for his work shows in the attention he dedicates to every client at every step of the home-buying and selling experience. Eddie is fluent in English and Spanish, and has an above-average understanding of French. He enjoys traveling to the Berkshires in summer, Cape Cod in autumn, and in winter, the Sangre de Cristo mountains in Santa Fe, NM are a boost to the system. Gardening and gatherings with friends are favorite pastimes.
title: Realtor®

description: About Kaushik World-class service, unrivaled marketing, an impeccable work ethic, and his unwavering commitment to provide clients with exceptional service have powered Kaushik's success in the DMV real estate market. Named the "Best Agent" in the DMV by The Washingtonian, a "Real Estate Power Player" by DC Modern Luxury, "Top Agent" by Compass, and "The Best of Zillow," Kaushik has a stellar reputation in the community. Having lived and traveled across the globe, Kaushik chose to make D.C. his home after moving to the city to attend Georgetown Law and falling in love with the DMV area. Before law school, Kaushik worked in New York City's ultra-competitive real estate market, but it was his move to the District that reignited his passion for the field. With years of experience navigating the DMV’s residential and commercial markets, Kaushik brings invaluable insight to his clients—whether they are buyers, sellers, investors, developers, or business owners. His legal training as an attorney provides a distinct advantage in negotiations, and his tireless advocacy ensures that his clients' interests are zealously represented in every transaction. Combining local expertise with a global perspective, Kaushik delivers exceptional service tailored to his clients' unique needs. Beyond real estate, Kaushik is a licensed attorney and an avid sports and culinary enthusiast. When he’s not working on real estate deals, he enjoys playing tennis, watching soccer, and exploring the DMV’s ever-evolving culinary and mixology scene. Representative Commercial Clients:
title: Senior Vice President | Realtor®

description: About Cameron Cameron has called the DC Metro area home since the mid 90s. Having been raised from McLean to Cleveland Park with extended family all throughout the beltway, he truly feels native. After graduating from the University of South Carolina with a B.A. in Real Estate Finance & Startup Management, Cameron worked with an advertising group in NYC while managing property rentals and renovations of varying scales here in the DMV. Part of his work in NYC involved multiple community outreach projects aimed at providing after school educational programs to underserved youth in Washington Heights, one of the proudest moments of his early career. He gained sales experience and book building skills at several other real estate startups that worked both locally and nationally before making his best move. He joined Compass in the Spring of 2019 to leverage their seamless end-to-end technology, support, culture, and brand name to grow his network within our area. Combining his expertise in selling, renovating, advertising, and the importance of community, Cameron has worked his way to multiple top performing teams at Compass - all while having the privilege to expand with the company to be an industry leading brokerage. He currently lives in Rosslyn and likes to spend his free time at local eats, on the basketball court, working on his cars, hanging out with family, friends, his fiancee and following F1 Motorsport. Favorite Sit-Downs: Rumi's Kitchen - DC dleña - DC Lyon Hall - Arlington, VA Delhi Dhaba - Arlington, VA Kazan Restaurant - McLean, VA J. Gilberts - McLean, VA Peking Gourmet - Falls Church, VA Ada's on The River - Alexandria, VA Gemma, The Bowery Hotel - NYC __________________________________________________ The Mom and Pops: George's King of Falafel - Late Night DC Tacos Los Primos Food Truck - Arlington Park Casual McLean Family Restaurant - Best Breakfast in McLean Madison Deli - Mid-day Delight in McLean Jerk N Jive Caribbean Kitchen - Frederick, MD Anthony and Son Panini Shoppe - Brooklyn, NY
title: Realtor®

description: About R Collective R Collective was formed with a mission to provide an unparalleled level of client service where technology, luxury, and high-touch hospitality intersect. As founders and a husband and wife team, we value the collective of relationships and friendships we have created as native Washingtonians for over forty years. Our shared passion for real estate mirrors our shared life journey, and we created R Collective to extend our amazing collaboration to our clients. With our combined twenty years of experience in real estate and a deep understanding of the Washington, DC area landscape, we offer our clients a truly unique experience through our dynamic partnership that forms the cornerstone of our approach. Choosing R Collective means you don't just benefit from the expertise of one agent--you harness the collective strength of two individuals who complement each other in skills, knowledge, and dedication. Our clients are able to optimize on our individual experiences, and leverage the opportunity of our dual efforts to navigate the sale or purchase of their largest asset. Imagine the strength of two working seamlessly as one for you. With R Collective, you're not just choosing a team; you're choosing a dynamic partnership committed to turning your real estate aspirations into a shared triumph. ​ Our team values is our north star at R Collective. We view each property as a time capsule that carries with it an imprint of treasured memories and life experiences. We celebrated our life’s biggest milestones in our homes: from our engagement, to the announcement of our growing family, to our children’s first-ever words and steps. We invite you to join our collective and look forward to working together on your next home story.

About Kelvin Agent-Attorney with nearly two decades of Washington, DC area real estate experience. Kelvin practiced law and owned his own motorcycle apparel company early in his career, before transitioning to real estate. His legal and entrepreneurial backgrounds, combined with his involvement in development, have made him extremely familiar with the finer points of a deal. Kelvin understands real estate "holistically" and possesses a keen sense for all aspects of a transaction, including contract negotiations and anticipating/dealing with potential issues quickly and efficiently. Valuing trust above all else, Kelvin enjoys working with first-time homebuyers and crafting complex deals for seasoned investors alike. Kelvin is an entrepreneur at heart, an avid golfer and sports enthusiast, a proud member of Kappa Alpha Psi Fraternity, Inc., and a prouder father to a middle school-aged son.
title: REALTOR®

description: About Maryam Maryam Redjaee is a seasoned real estate professional who brings a unique blend of creativity, sales acumen, and a deep commitment to community service to her role at Compass. Joining Compass in February 2017, Maryam has quickly made a name for herself as a realtor with a keen eye for spatial design, color, and organization. Her enthusiasm for the process of getting homes "market ready" is unparalleled, ensuring that each property she represents shines in its best light. Before embarking on her successful real estate career, Maryam honed her sales expertise in the competitive world of Pharmaceutical & Biotech sales for over 14 years. Her outstanding sales performance was not only recognized nationally but also internationally, culminating in the prestigious Novartis International Sales Excellence Award in Basel, Switzerland in 2009. This recognition stands as a testament to Maryam's unwavering dedication to achieving excellence in everything she pursues. Originally hailing from Iran, Maryam is fluent in Farsi, adding a valuable linguistic skill set to her professional repertoire. Her relocation from northern Virginia, where she resided for 20 years, to Chevy Chase Maryland in July of 2017, demonstrates her deep understanding of the local market dynamics and the unique needs of her clients in the Maryland area. In her free time, Maryam is an avid advocate for community involvement and giving back. She has dedicated her time and expertise to serving Fairfax County Public Schools as Vice-President of the Chesterbrook PTA for four years, exemplifying her commitment to education and community empowerment. Currently, Maryam serves as the Compass Co Chair to A Wider Circle's Food Drive, embodying her passion for making a positive impact in the lives of others. Beyond her professional and community endeavors, Maryam finds joy in staying active through her love for tennis, pilates, and yoga. When she is not busy being a proud mom to two college-age kids, you will find Maryam traveling with her husband of 25 years. Her well-rounded lifestyle reflects her dedication to both her professional and personal pursuits, making her a relatable and trusted partner for her clients. With a proven track record of excellence, a heart for service, and a genuine passion for real estate, Maryam Redjaee is the ideal ally for anyone seeking to navigate the complexities of buying or selling a home in Maryland. Whether you're looking to make a move or simply seeking expert advice, Maryam is committed to guiding you with integrity, creativity, and unwavering dedication. ---
title: Realtor®

description: About Charlotte Charlotte is a seasoned communications professional who excels in making her clients feel comfortable and confident as they navigate the complexities of buying, renting or selling in a highly competitive environment. As a senior executive with more than 15 years experience in business and integrated marketing, she is a strategic client counselor who thinks pragmatically about her clients’ needs, taking a proactive and solutions-oriented approach to every engagement. Born and raised in Northern Virginia, Charlotte and her husband returned to Old Town Alexandria in 2016 to put down roots near family. Over the past decade they’ve lived in and become intimately familiar with many of Alexandria’s unique neighborhoods and love exploring the history, local businesses and community events that each has to offer. Having owned, renovated and property managed homes across Alexandria and Arlington, Charlotte has a strong understanding and passion for real estate investment. With a love of design and transformation, (and a contractor husband), Charlotte enjoys finding hidden gems and helping clients see the potential in each property. Drawing on both her personal experience with remodels as well as her deep knowledge of the area, Charlotte is uniquely positioned to help clients consider value-add opportunities and identify ways to maximize returns on their real estate. Outside of helping her clients, Charlotte prides herself on being active in her community, serving as the varsity gymnastics coach at Yorktown High School in Arlington, a yoga teacher (RYT-200) at CorePower and a volunteer at her daughters’ preschool, St. Clement. She is also a certified sommelier. Charlotte holds Bachelors degrees in Business Marketing as well as Sports Management from Indiana University in Bloomington, and a Masters in Public Relations from the University of Miami. She currently lives in the Clover-College Park neighborhood of Alexandria with her husband, two young daughters, father-in-law, and Puerto-Rican rescue pup.
title: Realtor® | Licensed in DC

description: About Tracy As a Michigan native and avid sports fan, Tracy’s down-to-earth but competitive personality has allowed her to make many connections with clients and professionals in the real estate industry. After degrees from Central Michigan University and Michigan State University, she moved to the DC area 18 years ago and fell in love with the unique neighborhoods that DC had to offer. She has personally lived in Maryland, DC and now currently resides in Virginia. Her vast knowledge of multiple offer situations and contract structure has made her an invaluable resource to those contemplating a home purchase in this competitive market. Tracy’s number one goal is providing the best client service and consultation before, during and after the transaction process - the number of past clients and referrals she works with represents the level of her professionalism. She is a hard-working, trustworthy, and respected agent in the DC area who is available at any time should questions or concerns arise. When not working with her clients, Tracy enjoys sports/fitness, live music events and many outdoor activities.
title: Realtor®

description: About Tiffany From Alexandria, VA to Baltimore, MD and every place in between Tiffany brings an enthusiasm to representing homeowners and future homeowners. Tiffany is committed to listening to her clients wants and needs and utilizing her keen negotiation skills to ensure a successful transaction. A local graduate, Tiffany understands why the DMV is the most incredibly interesting and motivating place to live. As one of the most diverse communities, full of culture and life, there is no lack of zeal from Tiffany on connecting people and allowing her clients to discover the area in a new way. With a Bachelor's of Science Degree in Marketing from Hampton University and a PMP from Georgetown University, Tiffany has the business savvy and creativity to produce results. An esteemed realtor who is not only highly regarded by her clients and professionals in the field but has also recently obtained the award for the The Top 10 Best Real Estate Agents by the American Institute of Real Estate Professionals. A current Brookland resident, she is well-connected and actively involved in the community. A member of The Junior League of Washington, Alfred Street Baptist Church, and Longterm advocate for The Children's Defense Fund it is Tiffany's lifelong goal to support the underserved and promote wealth.
title: Realtor®

description: About Lisa Lisa Resch, originally from Ohio, has called Washington DC home for more than 30 years. Her love of the area and its housing stock grew out of her own experience of lovingly renovating her 1913 home, which she shares with her family in her beloved Chevy Chase, D.C. neighborhood. Long before she became an agent, she worked in and around the housing industry, laying the foundation for her next career. Lisa brings more than 20 years of communication and skills to Compass, having worked in the new homebuilding industry with the National Association of Home Builders’ flagship Builder Magazine and with the EPA’s Energy Star Homes Program. For the past 27 years Lisa has been a committed resident of Chevy Chase, D.C., volunteering and supporting Lafayette Elementary (previously serving as a board member and president of the Home and School Association), Jackson Reed High School and Alice Deal middle school, Cap City Little League, St. Paul’s Shelter, the Avalon Theatre, the Chevy Chase Library, Chevy Chase Citizens Association, Main Street Chevy Chase, among so many others. Known for her organization skills and attention to detail, Lisa has the ability to creatively, thoughtfully and efficiently solve problems and bring people together. With innate good taste and a great sense of style, she has the vision to help her clients present their homes in the best possible light. She is proud to be part of Compass, the #1 Broker in the DMV where she can guide both buyers and sellers through one of their most personal and important decisions. Read on for Lisa's 5- Star Reviews from Happy Clients: Scroll down for more ★★★★★ " I am giving Lisa Resch and her Compass real estate team an A+ rating based on the outstanding job they did selling my house. Lisa and her team are incredibly easy to work with, great communicators, and developed a winning strategy for selling my home. This included: (1) having their interior designer stage the house; (2) creating floor plans; (3) creating beautiful printed and written promotional materials; (4) developing an extensive social media marketing campaign; (5) recommending contractors to paint and freshen the inside/outside of the house; (6) conducting a weekend open house; (7) managing offers; and (8) staying on top of, and communicating to me, all of the countless other details that needed to be taken care of during the process. AND, best of all - the house sold in 4 days for 1.45k over the list price. I would definitely use Lisa again, and highly recommend her." - Glenn M. ★★★★★ " I worked with Lisa on both sides of my transaction (selling and then buying) and I can't recommend her and her team highly enough. She's thorough, efficient, extremely knowledgeable, an effective negotiator, and a great hand holder. No question or issue was too large or too small for her full attention. Her staging as a selling agent was impeccable and her instincts as buying agent invaluable, including pointing out pros and cons of listings and potential contract issues that I would never have thought of myself. Her team was exceptionally capable at leading me through every step from contract negotiation through closing on both transactions. I'm immensely grateful for all of their guidance. A well-deserved five stars." - Gail B. ★★★★★ " We're so appreciating you for managing the of our beloved Barnaby Woods home. From the start you inspired confidence. You're creative, pragmatic, wise, and well-organized. We imagine your enthusiasm for our home and Barnaby Woods did a lot to sell it in a blink. I couldn't imagine who would come along and buy a house in December. Fortunately, we trusted you and your fine tuned instincts." - Nancy R. ★★★★★ " I appreciate everything you did to make selling my condo such a breeze. I am pleased it so quickly and that wouldn’t have happened without your help prepping the place!" - Kate A. ★★★★★ " Lisa came highly recommended to us as we embarked on relocating from New York to Maryland. As we had no idea where exactly we wanted to settle, Lisa became our beacon and presented many properties to us over the next several months. We couldn’t have been more pleased. Lisa presented herself to us in the highest professional way. She was punctual, polite and very aware of our needs which proved to us that she was listening. Lisa did an incredible job keeping us informed every step of the way which meant no surprises and a quick easy closing on the property!" - Dave E. ★★★★★ " Lisa is undeniably a super-hero. Her work ethic is unparalleled and the results speak for themselves. We are delighted with the forever home property she found for us, and she our condo despite an unbelievably competitive . We highly recommend Lisa for her steadfast ability to deliver results in the most professional and down to earth approach and style." - Daniel T. ★★★★★ " Lisa is remarkable. We could not have downsized (happily) without her. Lisa recommended pre- improvements for our old place, found a contractor, advised on construction, surveyed her colleagues on pricing, and helped us identify out-of-town buyers that fit the house and our timeline for moving out. Once our contract was accepted, she ramped up negotiations with a developer nearing completion on a place in our target neighborhood. Lisa handled detailed negotiations on finishings, all while helping us find a mortgage broker willing to meet our deadline. From start to finish, Lisa was generous, wise, poised, patient, and 100% on our side." - Jim D. ★★★★★ " Lisa was an amazing realtor! I wasn’t even sure if — given COVID — it was a good time to list my DC rental property. But a friend had strongly recommended her, so I called Lisa just to see what she thought. I loved her immediately — such a great combination of warm energy and knowledge. Flash forward six weeks later — my house , after ONE Open House, $35k over the asking price with no contingencies! Best of all, I really had to do nothing — Lisa did the staging, dealt with my tenants, my property manager, the title companies, and even engaged the landscaper who improved the house’s curb appeal. Such a pleasure to work with Lisa — I recommend her without reservation!" - Valerie P. ★★★★★ " Lisa is a true professional and a dream to work with. She's kind, responsive, pleasant and knows real estate in and out. I look forward to working with you again soon!" - Koki A. ★★★★★ " First rate! Attentive. Astute. Hardworking. Straight shooter. Best of all, my condo within days of its being posted on MLS-- and at full price. The place I purchased through Lisa suits us perfectly. And, it has already appreciated!" - James N. ★★★★★ " Lisa was unbelievably knowledgeable, helpful and supportive throughout our home buying process! Even after we closed, she continued to check in to make sure everything was okay. She is a consummate professional and we loved working with her." - Danielle A. ★★★★★ " Lisa was a joy to work with. She was responsive and on top of everything. She helped us sell our house in no time for more than the asking price. She managed everything from start to finish - we could not have had a better experience!" - Amanda F. ★★★★★ " Lisa is the best! She was incredibly res[ponsive and knowledgeable about the when helping us buy our new home. She took the time to really get to know what we needed. I would absolutely recommend her." - Jessica T. ★★★★★ " Lisa was a consummate professional - highly responsive, knowledgeable and upbeat. A pleasure to work with. Highly recommended." - John R. ★★★★★ " Lisa is the absolute tops. She helped us sell two condos in downtown DC and did so with great professionalism and brought home winning bids. I can't recommend Lisa highly enough!" - Tom K. ★★★★★ " Steven and I have bought and sold four homes together. All of our experiences have been positive, but this was the best. Lisa was creative, smart, patient and kind. She also suggested that we feature our house as coming soon without putting it… on the market given our time frame. It worked out brilliantly. She was recommended to me by a friend with a similarly strong experience. I hope I'm not selling the next house any time soon, but if I were I would choose her again." - Nancy
title: Senior Vice President

description: About Patrick Like most residents, Patrick is a DC transplant, by way of New England. Patrick immediately fell in love with the district and knew that this was his home. The uniqueness and soul of all the different neighborhoods is something that he enjoys taking in each day and working in real estate gives him the ability to appreciate that especially. Before becoming a Realtor®, Patrick worked in fitness helping people to achieve their health goals. He caught the real estate bug, after purchasing a distressed property and remodeling it into a beautiful multifamily home and has not turned back since. He loves every inch of the city and cannot wait to help you find your home within it!
title: REALTOR®

description: About Dana Armed with a degree in journalism and a deep history of sales success with Fortune 500 companies, Dana Rice brings a storyteller’s touch and a reporter’s insight to the marketing of homes. Dana Rice Group's growth in the Washington, D.C. market has been swift and significant. Dana and her team of top agents have grown to become the #1 small team in Maryland ( 2025 RealTrends / WSJ rankings ), with more than $1B in lifetime sales since its inception. Recruited as one of the founding Compass agents in Bethesda and Chevy Chase, where she serves as Executive Vice President , Dana launched and carefully curated her award-winning team by focusing on how to best serve clients . This means that DRG’s four full-time agents, listing coordinator, marketing director, operations director, and a dedicated stager/project manager, exclusive to Dana Rice Group, are all 100% committed to making the process a win-win for every client. In 2025, Dana Rice Group closed more than $180M in transactions , serving 124+ buyers and sellers —with 43 homes staged completely free ! Although Dana and her team represent buyers and sellers across the greater Metro Washington, D.C. area, her key focus is on the neighborhoods of Northwest Washington, D.C., and the surrounding areas of Montgomery County, Maryland . With over 35 years of experience in marketing, advertising, and negotiation, combined with her deep knowledge of the D.C. Metro area, Dana helps buyers and sellers make the best, most informed decisions about real estate. Dana has been recognized as one of Washingtonian's 'Top 100' Realtors and has been featured in Best of Washington ( 2015-2025 ), Bethesda Magazine's "Best of" Top Teams , and as the #1 team in year-over-year growth . She has received numerous Top Producer Awards , including being named DC Metro Top Producer “Rising Star of the Year” and one of RealTrends America’s Best . However, the awards she treasures most are the ones bestowed by her peers -- voted "Ms. Compass" and "Agent You'd Want to List Your Own Home" in an annual industry awards ceremony. Dana holds a B.S. in Journalism from the University of Maryland , where she graduated cum laude and was selected as the commencement speaker for her graduating class. She lives in Bethesda with her husband and three sons and prides herself on being the "go-to" resource for anyone who wants to talk real estate—or dive into other favorite topics like renovations, Godzilla, rowing, or raising men.
title: Executive Vice President

description: About Robin Robin has spent over 30 years in the DMV area – having grown up in Maryland and Northern Virginia, attended college in DC, and raised a family in Bethesda – and has a thorough understanding of local real estate. Her passion for real estate and dedication to building lasting client relationships inspired her to launch her real estate career after 15 years as a human resources consultant. Robin specializes in helping her clients explore and better understand their current and future real estate needs – and then creates and executes winning strategies to achieve these goals. By prioritizing open communication, transparency, and a thorough understanding of her clients’ unique real estate needs, Robin creates customized approaches that build strong rapport and yield successful outcomes. Her integrity, work ethic, and genuine concern for her clients has earned her the respect and admiration of colleagues and clients. Robin has a keen awareness of local market trends and a commitment to staying ahead of the curve. She continually provides clients with the most up-to-date information and strategic insights that are essential to making informed real estate decisions.
