Whether it’s navigating negotiations, leveraging market strategies, or offering valuable insight, Robin is a trusted and results-driven Real Estate Advisor. Robin and her husband, Steve, teenage sons Zach and Dylan, and very friendly yellow lab, Charger, are happy to call the DMV home. She loves spending time with family and friends, playing tennis, reading, and traveling (when she can find time to get away!).
title: Realtor®

description: About Jessica With 20 years of experience, Jessica Richardson specializes in providing highly personalized service to buyers, sellers, and investors. Her business philosophy is based on honesty, integrity and market knowledge. These principles, along with being an excellent negotiator and communicator, have resulted in hundreds of happy home buyers and sellers. Having experienced the market's highs and lows Jessica has the knowledge and expertise to navigate through even the most difficult of transactions. The daughter of a second-generation Washingtonian, Jessica has lived in the DC area most of her life. She is consistently ranked among the top Realtors in the DC Metro area. She is an NVAR Life Member, Top Producer and has been named a Top Realtor Washingtonian Magazine and one of American’s Best Real estate the Wall Street Journal and REAL Trends. Jessica lives in Alexandria with her husband and their two daughters. In her free time, she enjoys playing tennis, gardening, travel, running and trying out new local restaurants with friends.
title: Vice President

description: About Annie In her first three years in real estate, Annie closed over 63 transactions and a total of $37.5M of sales. She prides herself on being a true partner to her clients in navigating a competitive market and uses her deep knowledge of DC real estate and extensive network to give those working with her the edge to succeed. Her clients not only consider her an expert in her field (she is known to introduce her clients to some of the lesser-known neighborhoods!) but also extremely caring and loyal. Her favorite part of working with her clients is educating buyers and sellers on the many components of real estate. It makes her proud when she sees her clients looking out for drainage issues after only a few showings with her! Before real estate, Annie worked in sales support at a high-value product shipping company and in client relations at a boutique firm that specializes in online event management and concierge services. Prior to getting her real estate license, Annie learned the administrative side of the business in the role of Listing Manager for a busy real estate team. All of these experiences provided her with a deep understanding of customized client needs and the importance of partnership, networking, and meeting client expectations. Annie lives in NE DC with her son, Jesse and dog, Leo who make her smile ear-to-ear each and every day. In her free time, Annie takes full advantage of the wonderful amenities in the city she lives in, works in and loves dearly!
title: Realtor®

description: About Herbert At Riggs & Co., real estate is not about transactions—it’s about people, purpose, and the places where life unfolds. As Principal, I lead an award-winning team built on a simple belief: service first, always. Our “you first” approach means every strategy, conversation, and closing begins with a deep understanding of your goals, lifestyle, and long-term vision. With over 17 years of experience spanning law, finance, and negotiation, I bring a rare perspective that blends precision with empathy. My background—JD and BA from Brigham Young University, MS in Finance from Johns Hopkins, and a Harvard Negotiation Certificate—allows me to simplify complex decisions and help clients negotiate from a position of strength and clarity. Recognized among America’s Best Agents by Real Trends and The Wall Street Journal , I rank in the top 1.5% nationwide and the top 1% in Virginia, with over $400 million in sales. Honored as a Top Producer by Washingtonian and Northern Virginia Magazine (2018–2025), I’m also a proud member of the NVAR Diamond Club and Top Agent Network. From first-time buyers to federal executives relocating across the country, our clients trust us because we deliver—with integrity, insight, and results. At Riggs & Co., we don’t just sell homes—we craft strategies that move lives forward. Let’s build something extraordinary together. License in DC, Maryland & Virginia since 2008. Click HERE if you're looking to buy Click HERE if you're looking to sell You will receive a response within 24 hours.
title: Associate Real Estate Broker

description: About Riggs & Co Your Trusted Real Estate Team in Northern Virginia At Riggs & Co, we understand that buying or selling a home is a momentous journey in your life. As more than just real estate agents, we are your dedicated partners, committed to making this journey exceptional. Our mission is crystal clear: we strive to deliver the highest quality, innovation, and real estate experiences in Northern Virginia by consistently exceeding expectations. Our clients are our top priority, and we are devoted to nurturing enduring relationships that you will treasure.

About Andrew Andrew Riguzzi is a founding member of the District Property Group. He has spent his real estate career focused on building deep relationships with his clients and keeping his finger the pulse of the DC market. He not only understands what his clients need, but intrinsically what they want. He has in-depth knowledge of all things real estate. His diverse experience in the industry includes sales, development, property management and leasing. Andrew is committed to his career. He has a passion for the real estate industry and the role he plays in each sale. In many instances, his clients now also call him a friend. When a client works with Andrew, they consistently echo the sentiment that they feel they have his full attention. This exceptional experience translates to repeat buyers and satisfied customers.
title: Executive Vice President

description: About Rachel Rachel was born and raised in Pensacola, Florida, and now loves calling the heart of D.C. home with her husband, Trevor, and their Aussie puppy, Jax. Growing up in a family of real estate professionals and investors, she developed a passion for the industry early on. She went on to earn her Bachelor’s degree in Business Administrative Management from the University of West Florida. Rachel began her career as an interior designer, specializing in kitchen and bath materials and design. While navigating the process of becoming a homeowner and later a landlord with her first investment property, she realized her passion for real estate ran even deeper. She transitioned into the title industry as an account manager, where she gained valuable expertise in real estate contracts and title insurance. With her design background and love for woodworking and DIY, Rachel brings a unique eye for detail to every transaction. She has a strong appreciation for quality craftsmanship and a deep knowledge of home construction, which allows her to help clients see both the beauty and the potential in a property. Her ability to notice the finer details and envision the finishing touches adds a valuable perspective for buyers, sellers, and investors alike. As a military spouse, Rachel understands firsthand the challenges of relocating to a new city. Having experienced several moves herself, she is committed to advocating for and guiding her clients, especially military families, through every step of the buying and selling process. Outside of work, Rachel enjoys home projects, gardening, traveling, visiting local farmers markets, admiring the city’s architecture, and exploring D.C.’s vibrant restaurant scene with her husband. Her diverse experiences give her unique insight into the emotional side of home decisions, and she takes pride in offering both knowledge and empathy to clients looking to buy, sell, rent, or invest. Rachel also shares and upholds The Goodhart Group’s strong values of service, dedication, and community.
title: Realtor®

description: About Karen Karen Ringo is a real estate agent in the DMV area who has an authentic and relentless approach to buying and selling residential properties. Treating each property as if it was her own home, Karen helps her clients achieve their goals through honesty and building a trusting relationship. She provides ease of process, direct and healthy communication, and personalized experiences throughout buying and selling. Karen loves working with different real estate types and can handle any challenge put in front of her. She is very knowledgeable, personable, easy to work with and will be alongside her client every step of the process. The real estate market in this area is complex and she is dedicated to staying on top of every change in the market so you get the experience you deserve. When Karen is not at the table, she is spending time with her spouse and she is a mom to two beautiful little girls. Music, health and fitness are a big part of her life. She was a 5th grade school teacher for 3 years, and personal trainer for 15 years before she transitioned to real estate and still enjoys helping people seeing their hard work pay off. Karen looks forward to learning more about you!
title: Realtor®

description: About Oris O nce upon a summer, I managed a boutique hotel on the small island of Nantucket . Late one Saturday evening, I received a seemingly impossible request: a visit to Great Point, the island's northernmost tip, with an old iconic lighthouse, surrounded by a wild refuge of seals. Truly a must see! This would require a 3-hour round-trip, driving down a soft, 7-mile beach—a challenge not to get stuck, compounded by finding a driver and 4x4 vehicle on a Sunday morning, and a tight schedule that demanded the client return by 12:30pm to catch a taxi to the airport. With no availability of staff to spare the next morning, I offered to take the client. Having driven there the previous summer, I knew the route well. By 9am, I secured a jeep and we were on our way. The client was awestruck by the sight of the white, iconic lighthouse. We then turned the bend and gasped at the spectacle of hundreds of seals basking on the beach. Then unexpectedly, a large group of seals descended into the ocean and turned to swim towards us. The client was elated and cried out “Oh my goodness, did you plan this?”. We returned to the hotel just in time for the client to catch her taxi. As she waved goodbye she yelled “Next year I’m coming back with my family. Thank you!” “ The key is to set realistic customer expectations and then not to just meet them, but to exceed them — preferably in unexpected and helpful ways. ” – Sir Richard Branson Service " Customer needs may vary, but their bias for quality never does" - Bill Marriott, Marriott International With over 15 years in luxury hospitality, I’ve cultivated an unwavering commitment to excellence, discretion, and the art of exceptional service. Those same values now define my approach to real estate—where precision, creativity, and client satisfaction are paramount. Hailing from Florida’s Emerald coast, GO NOLES ! , my fluency in French and Spanish, I’ve traveled to 47 countries and recently returned to Washington, DC, after three inspiring years in Montana. My global perspective and passion for meaningful connections allow me to serve clients with sophistication and insight. Based in the heart of the nation’s capital, I bring refined service and market expertise to every transaction. Backed by COMPASS—the #1 brokerage in the U.S. with a premier international network—I am your dedicated real estate advisor, delivering an elevated experience. How may I be of service to you, today?
title: REALTOR® | Licensed in DC

description: About Bonnie As the leader of The Rivkin Group, Bonnie Rivkin works alongside her daughter, Courtney Rivkin , to help clients buy and sell property in northern Virginia and DC. Since moving to DC from Connecticut in 1979, Bonnie has called the DC metro area home, having raised her two daughters in Alexandria, where she has resided for 30+ years. Bonnie’s love for and depth of knowledge of the area have earned her a loyal following of clients, whom she has helped make dreams into realities. From first time buyers to seasoned purchasers and sellers, Bonnie is known for treating her clients like family, providing care, integrity, and a refreshingly candid perspective. A skilled negotiator with the ability to identify and adapt to market changes, Bonnie involves and educates her clients through open communication and a genuine concern for their interests. In today's ever-changing and increasingly competitive real estate market, Bonnie understands the importance of listening to her clients, providing top-notch service, and applying her notable expertise to helping buyers and sellers achieve their real estate goals. When she’s not assisting clients, Bonnie can be found walking her dog, Rocco in Old Town Alexandria, popping into some of the area’s fabulous boutiques, gardening, and spending time with her adorable grandsons, Brenner and Gray.
title: Realtor®

description: About Teddy With over 20 years of experience in customer relations, Teddy has built a reputation for delivering phenomenal client service. His passion for working with people shines through in every interaction, making him the ideal real estate agent for those looking to find not just a house, but a home. For Teddy, there’s nothing more rewarding than helping clients find their dream home—and seeing the joy on their faces at closing is exactly why he loves what he does. Teddy is no stranger to the real estate world. He began his career with one of America’s leading homebuilders, gaining invaluable industry experience from the ground up. His deep understanding of mortgage financing allows him to guide clients toward the right programs and support them every step of the way through the financing process—making homeownership feel less overwhelming and more achievable. As a native of the DC Metro area, Teddy offers a true insider’s perspective on the region—from market trends to emerging neighborhoods and the best local spots. His attention to detail and love for interior design help clients envision the full potential of each property they visit. Licensed in DC, Virginia, and Maryland , Teddy is equipped to serve buyers and sellers across the entire region. When he’s not working with clients, you’ll likely find him checking out local farmers markets, staying active at CrossFit, or relaxing at home with his dog, Ollie.
title: Realtor®

description: About Lauren Lauren Rondeau knows that no two clients are alike and takes a customized approach in working with each client. Her customer service background paired with the extensive research that she does for each transaction produces superior outcomes for home buyers and sellers. Lauren’s data-driven approach has been particularly successful with first-time condo and co-op buyers. Lauren earned her Bachelor’s degree from the University of Maryland and her Master’s from American University. Having resided in the DMV for over ten years, she has seen the city grow and is excited to help her clients navigate the ever-evolving DC market. Newly married, Lauren enjoys trying new restaurants and learning how to cook with her husband. She and her husband purchased a house in the exciting neighborhood of Trinidad, where you can find her chasing after their French bulldog, Snax.
title: Realtor®

description: About Marc Marc now serves at the Director of Listings and Growth at the Jenn Smira Team. Award-winning agent Marc Ross is a founding member of a top 5 DC team who’s best known by clients for his unrivaled market knowledge and one-stop-shop service philosophy. For sellers, Marc channels his design prowess to curate the right look and feel for each listing, ensuring that no detail is overlooked — from staging to photography, artwork, tiles, and beyond. And when it comes to buyers, Marc’s vast local expertise shines through in his work with clients at all price points and phases of life — helping first-time buyers and investors alike to find the home of their dreams. Marc has also built relationships with many of the area’s top developers, having taken part in the sale of several of DC’s premier new developments over the past six years. Throughout his career, Marc has cultivated a remarkably extensive local network, one that he attributes to the lasting connections he’s forged with clients who continually place their trust in him when navigating such a meaningful life milestone. It’s little surprise, then, that he sold over $260 million in real estate under the age of 40 ($43 million in 2021 alone!) or that he’s been involved in more than 275 homes sold to date. His accomplishments have led to rightful recognition; Marc has been named the Top Compass Team Individual Agent in the Capital Region for several years. Although for Marc, it’s the outcomes he creates for his clients that matter most.
title: Senior Vice President

description: About Kirsten &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;br&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;gt; Kirsten is a seasoned real estate professional with deep knowledge of the DC metro area and a reputation as a strong advocate and trusted advisor to buyer and seller clients alike. From new construction condos in DC neighborhoods to historic homes in Chevy Chase, from first-time buyers to experienced sellers, Kirsten has a track record of successful transactions and clients who praise her professionalism, dedication, strategic approach, and keen attention to detail. Based out of Compass’s Chevy Chase office and licensed in DC, Maryland and Virginia, she has a great appreciation for the beauty, vitality and variety of the area and loves serving clients throughout the DMV region. Kirsten understands that buying or selling a home is a significant decision and prides herself on listening, understanding her clients’ needs and goals and guiding them to make informed decisions through each step of the process. She strives to build lasting relationships based on trust and mutual respect. As a result, many of Kirsten’s clients have worked with her multiple times, and she earns their repeat business by consistently delivering positive results and exceptional service. Prior to her career in real estate, Kirsten worked as director of marketing for The Atlantic magazine and as a consultant for Booz Allen Hamilton, among other roles. Kirsten lives in Chevy Chase, Maryland with her husband, two daughters and dog. She is an active participant in her daughters' school community. Having grown up in the Annapolis, Maryland area racing sailboats on the Chesapeake Bay, Kirsten counts outdoor activities among her favorite personal pursuits. Although her work in real estate dominates her weekend time, she still loves to get out on the water whenever possible.
title: Realtor, Mary Lynn White Team of Compass

description: About Kevin Kevin was born and raised in Detroit and moved to the DMV area in 2007 after graduating Michigan State University with a degree in Marketing. Before he began his foray into real estate, Kevin spent eight years working in the marketing and finance department for National Geographic in downtown DC. Honesty, integrity, and attentiveness form the cornerstone of Kevin’s business. He will put himself in his clients’ shoes and tailor the home buying and selling experience to each individual. He knows this is one of the most important decisions a person will make in their lives, so he strives to keep the process as smooth, understandable, and transparent as possible. As a military spouse, Kevin has a wealth of experience working with current military and former military clients. He understands the unique circumstances and challenges faced by these American heroes and their families, and how to help them navigate the real estate market in the DMV area. In his free time, Kevin indulges his other great passion in life—traveling. He spent three semesters abroad in Thailand, Hungary and Greece while at Michigan State. When he is not traveling, you will find him spending time with family and friends, attending sporting events, playing tennis or going to the park with his border collie Winnie.
title: Realtor

description: About Austen From the Court to the Closing Table – Your Trusted Real Estate Expert After spending 14 years playing professional basketball across Europe—including time in France, Germany, Finland, and Austria—I brought the same discipline, dedication, and work ethic to my career in real estate. Over the past four years, I’ve closed more than 100 homes and generated over $43 million in sales volume. I take a hands-on, client-first approach—whether you're buying, selling, or investing. Every detail matters, and I’m committed to delivering a smooth, informed, and successful experience from start to finish. The values I developed during my athletic career—consistency, focus, and persistence—continue to shape how I serve my clients today. I approach every transaction with care, professionalism, and a strong commitment to helping you reach your goals. Let’s connect and take the next step toward achieving your real estate objectives with confidence.
title: REALTOR®

description: About Bradley Brad Rozansky has been selling homes in DC area for more than 40 years. In that time he’s watched metro area change drastically and has adapted to a business that is high tech, mobile and lightning fast. But in end, what sets one agent apart from another is that agent’s ability to understand the unique goals of every client and that agent’s skill and expertise in putting into action the processes to ensure success. Brad takes his time educating his clients about the market, developing plans for sellers to create more value, and he helps them put those plans into place. Having cultivated the best service providers and resources in the DC area, The Rozansky Group models their customer service after signature platforms like the Ritz Carlton. Brad and his team pride themselves on their extensive market knowledge and negotiating savvy. Real estate today requires mastering state-of-the-art technology, but it will never be without a personal connection. We know that our clients are entrusting us with their most valuable financial asset, and we know that buying or selling a home touches on many emotions. What we do isn’t just data-driven, it’s personal customer service at its best. When you are ready to make a move, contact The Rozansky Group--by pho by text, by email, or by any means you choose. It is our privilege to help you navigate complicated world of buying or selling a home, and we are dedicated to making it a seamless experience. It’s our goal to make you a client for life!
title: Realtor®

description: About Luke A Bethesda native turned DC resident, Luke, has been successfully finding clients their dream homes since 2014. After graduating from George Washington University with a major in Business Administration, he activated his license and joined his father's team, The Rozansky Group. Growing up around the industry, Luke has an innate ability and understanding of how the process works to ensure a seamless transaction and leave clients satisfied every time. Luke's outgoing personality, keen attention to detail, and ability to thrive under pressure makes him the perfect person to get the job done right. With an eye for design and smart business savvy, he will work endlessly to find the right fit for you, whether you are a first time home buyer or a seasoned expert. As a talented and energetic agent, Luke brings a creative flair to the DC Metro real estate market by utilizing the latest technology and innovative services to facilitate all your needs. Contact Luke today to start the conversation about buying or selling!
title: Realtor®

description: About Brett Navigating today's housing market can appear daunting, making it critically important to partner with a local Realtor who is both knowledgeable and willing to go the extra mile to ensure a smooth sales process and maximize the return on your investment. As a life long Maryland resident and Montgomery County native, I’ve been fortunate to cultivate strong relationships with hundreds of local realtors and industry professionals. Through the utilization of my professional network and a data driven sales approach to effectively and aggressively market your home, my team and I have become one of the top teams in the DMV and the nation. Whether you're a first-time home buyer, a seasoned property investor, or interested in selling your home, I’m excited to partner with you and look forward to helping you achieve all of your real estate goals. I'm proud to be the Vice President of the Bowers Group of Compass Real Estate, and of our team's accomplishment of being the top 1% in the nation. I believe that our shared success as a team stems from serving our neighbors with integrity, providing unique knowledge about the local housing market, and always abiding by the "Golden Rule". My background is rooted in all things real estate. Having worked as a mortgage lender myself for nearly a decade, I have the ability to provide buyers with a better understanding of the financing options available to them, helping to streamline the complexities of home buying. My personal experience with investing in real estate allows me to share valuable knowledge dealing with fix & flip, or buy & hold investment strategies and provide guidance to those looking to build wealth with real estate. Having personally lived in almost every major market in the DMV, I have a deep understanding of local neighborhoods & market trends. Clients who are looking to sell their home will receive a data driven market analysis of their property, allowing them to understand what pricing strategy will result in the highest possible sale of their home. My goal is to thoughtfully serve my clients with care and provide the professional guidance necessary to make every transaction a positive one.
title: Realtor®

description: About Jon My goal for every real estate transaction is to educate and strongly advocate for my clients so that I can help them make the best decision for their current and future situation. With more than 22 years of client service and negotiation experience, buyers and sellers alike count on me to give them the top-quality service and respect they deserve. Whether you are a first-time homebuyer, downsizing empty-nester, investor or anyone in between, any opportunity to make a client's life easier is a pleasure for me. As a regional Realtor®, I am licensed in DC, Maryland and Virginia to be able to give borderless possibilities to all of my clients. My favorite part about being a Realtor is getting to help people make the best real estate decision for them. I love sharing my expertise, experiences and advice to make the process go as smoothly as possible and it's important that you feel comfortable the whole way through. Making someone happy and knowing that I've made their life even just a little easier is one of the best rewards I get from being a Realtor. Being born, raised and educated in Pennsylvania by a teacher and small business owner, I understand that success comes from hard work, passion, and an entrepreneurial spirit. However, it all means nothing without compassion, integrity and trust. Having lived in DC for more than 19 years (with many more to come), every day I think, "Wow, I get to live here." I love dining out at the endless list of fantastic restaurants, sampling the latest craft beer on a rooftop bar, cheering for my favorite college football teams, playing kickball with amazing friends, learning about culture and history at the plethora of museums and just walking around this eclectic city.
title: Realtor®

description: About Rochelle With over 30 years of real estate experience and a deep understanding of the industry, Rochelle is a dedicated and skilled agent ready to guide you through every step of your real estate journey. Whether it’s preparing your property for the market, designing strategic marketing plans, managing multi-unit transactions, or helping you sell your current home, Rochelle is committed to making the process smooth and successful. For buyers, she excels at finding the perfect home, ensuring it aligns with their lifestyle, preferences, and financial goals. Rochelle takes the time to truly understand your unique needs, knowing that real estate is more than just finding a place to live—it’s about making a significant financial investment. Known for her persistence, encouragement, and sharp problem-solving skills, Rochelle has earned a trusted reputation in the real estate community. When she’s not busy helping clients, Rochelle enjoys spending quality time with her three grandchildren and three grandpups, who bring endless joy to her life.
title: Realtor

description: About Brynn After graduating from UCLA, Brynn began her sales career at an HR Tech Software company geared towards helping organizations retain their top talent. Having honed her skills in the tech industry, Brynn seamlessly transitioned from the fast-paced world of corporate sales to the dynamic realm of real estate. With years of a successful sales track record, she is equipped with impressive negotiation tactics, exceptional communication skills, and an innate ability to understand her clients' needs. With an unwavering passion for helping individuals achieve their dreams, Brynn has become a trusted and accomplished real estate agent serving the Virginia, Maryland, and DC area. As a dedicated advocate for her clients, Brynn goes above and beyond to ensure their satisfaction. She takes the time to truly understand their goals, whether they are buying their first home, selling a property, or investing in real estate. With her keen attention to detail and deep market knowledge, Brynn provides invaluable guidance throughout the entire process, ensuring her clients make informed decisions that align with their unique objectives. Brynn's commitment to excellence extends beyond her professional life. Known for her warm and personable approach, she builds lasting relationships with her clients based on trust, integrity, and open communication. Her genuine care for her clients' well-being is evident in every interaction, making her a preferred choice among homebuyers and sellers alike.
title: Realtor®

description: About Stephen Born California, Stephen moved to DC where he earned his Bachelors and Masters Degrees Sports & Event Management from The George Washington University. Stephen is a former Division I Cross Country runner and knows his way around DC by foot. Stephen is an active member in the community – he helped found the annual 17th Street Festival and assists in the planning of multiple city wide events. He also recently served on the board of the Shaw Dog Park Board of Directors. Stephen brings this inside knowledge to our clients and believes it isn’t just putting someone into a home, it is about finding a community to live in. Stephen has worked for multiple media and advertising firms and knows how to get our clients and listings the extra attention. In his free time Stephen loves to run and is working to complete the six Marathon Majors. He loves spending time with friends, watching sports, and taking his Great Dane, Alexis Rose to the dog park. Learn more about Stephen and The Rutstein Group at DCRealEstate.com .
title: Realtor

description: About Mark Born in Miami, Florida, Mark relocated to the DC metro region at the age of 8. He was raised by a hard-working waitress and an officer in the Army’s Paratroopers. His father served in WWII. Mark attended the University of Mary Washington and later became an expert in the hospitality industry. Transforming venues with declining sales became a passion. With that passion, Mark decided to help individuals achieve financial independence through home ownership, so in 2002, Mark became a Realtor. Mark Rutstein's various television appearances, as well as awards, support his love and success in the industry. You may recognize Mark from HGTV's "Get it Sold", Discovery Channel "Double Agents", Channel 7 News "7 on your Side", Fox 5 News and NBC 4 News. Mark is an active member of the community, volunteering his time with multiple community organizations and events. His involvement in the community brings knowledge of the local businesses, nightlife, museums, and transportation that is important while buying or selling a home. Mark leads The Rutstein Group of Compass, a team of 8 Realtors licensed in D.C., Maryland and Virginia and has been named of the Top Producing Teams by Washingtonian Magazine since 2016. Mark was voted one of the Top 100 Agents by Washingtonian Magazine in 2021. Learn more about Mark and the Rutstein Group at DCRealEstate.com .
title: Realtor

description: About Pam Pam began her career in real estate here in Washington, DC, in 1984 after a brief tenure in interior design. She has consistently been a top producer both regionally and nationally based on her commitment to meeting her clients' goals. Pam listens carefully, communicates concisely and follows up regularly with her clients to ensure the real estate process is a smooth one. Her experience in a variety of economic cycles gives her confidence in advising both buyers and sellers about what to expect in the current market. Pam facilitates and coordinates the many aspects of the real estate transaction so the experience goes smoothly from the first meeting to the settlement table. If you are looking for a full-time real estate career professional to help you in buying or selling your home in the greater Washington DC area, contact Pam.
title: Realtor®

description: About Dominique Providing exceptional customer service is the core value of my practice. I am consistently among the top agents in the area and pride myself on paying personal attention to each detail of my clients' sales and purchases. With more than 20 years of experience representing buyers and sellers, I have worked through every kind of real estate market and can advise clients with the best pricing, and negotiating strategies using current trends. I have a deep knowledge of the DC, MD and Northern VA markets. Buying and selling real estate is usually one of the most consequential investment decisions people make in their lives. I am honored to be a part of that process and can be counted on to provide honest and data-driven advice, always in my clients’ best interests. This is one of the reasons my clients come back to me and recommend me to their family and friends. I have often worked with several generations of a family from the down-sizers to first-time buyers. My background in social work has served me extremely well in helping people negotiate these life decisions and transitions, as well as in the art of negotiating a deal. My reputation as an extremely ethical agent who is great to work with can make the difference a competitive situation. I live Bethesda with my husband and three children who have attended school the Carderock, Pyle, and Whitman cluster from start to finish. I love hiking along the Potomac River, reading, art, travel and doing agility work with my dog. Service is a cornerstone of my life. I have lead numerous volunteer projects in the community including: Habitat for Humanity Women Build Teams, KindSoup and KindWorks Refugee Welcome Meals, Capital Area Interfaith Friends Youth Service.
title: Realtor®

description: About Miguel Miguel’s tenacity, integrity and knowledge of the market allows him to successfully help both buyers and sellers accomplish their real estate goals. A marketing expert with an engaging personality and infectious smile, he is able to use his past experience in Global Sales for Marriott International to create unique, proactive, and dynamic approaches in the home sales process. Miguel believes that there is no one way to buy or sell a home and makes it his priority to give each client a personalized yet effective home sales experience. In 2020, he earned Top Producer honors from Washingtonian Magazine. In 2021, he helped 51 clients buy or sell homes for over $25,000,000. Outside of his real estate work, Miguel spends his time with his family, reading self-help business books and golfing. And, even when the seller had things in jeopardy on the day of closing, they created an alternative strategy that morning to ensure we made it to the finish line.” - Dan & Liz ★★★★★ "We had the pleasure of working with Miguel in both selling our townhouse and purchasing our new home. Not only were they extremely knowledgeable, but they were always available to advise, answer questions, and guide us through the entire sales cycle. They turned what is a typically stressful journey into a seamless and enjoyable experience. We are grateful they were a part of our journey and we look forward to working with them on future investments. We highly recommend him to anyone looking to start a new chapter in their lives!” - A & A ★★★★★ "It is my pleasure and honor to review the services of Miguel Saba. From the very beginning, he was extremely helpful and knowledgeable in the field of real estate. His level of communication was superior in answering emails and texts within the hour. Thank you for everything you did for Matt & I-- we are happy to have you as a friend and realtor!” - Matt & Jessica M ★★★★★ “Not only did I get my closing cost covered I had loan officers telling me some of the pieces of my deal were unheard of. Not only does he know his stuff he has great resources as well! He is a great negotiator and made sure we got the most out of price and inspections on both homes (selling of our previous home and purchase of our forever home). And if that’s not enough Miguel had a on our house just 1 day of being listed! The whole process of selling and buying was so seamless and I seriously could not recommend him more.” - Nick & Kate C ★★★★★ ”Miguel is truly amazing! He was with me the entire way to purchasing my first home. Miguel is knowledgeable, patient, understanding, and hardworking. When I didn't understand or didn't know something, Miguel explained it in a way that made sense to me. He showed me homes with enthusiasm and worked with my schedule. If anyone asks for a realtor, I will recommend Miguel 100%." - Monica ★★★★★ “Miguel was superb and fun to work with! He's a great friend and realtor! We told him our needs for a new home and growing family and he delivered! He has great negotiation skills, fast and efficient in his work. He explained everything in its simplicity from the beginning to the very end. I would highly recommend Miguel as a realtor and friend! He even took on a babysitter role while signing papers at settlement :)” - Josefina ★★★★★ "I hope that all is well. I wanted to formally thank you so much for all of your help with both, selling and buying my houses this fall. I appreciate you going above and beyond. Thanks so much for jumping in and helping me see the light at the end of the tunnel during the times that I wanted to give up. Buying and selling at the same time can be overwhelming but you helped it all go over smoothly. We are so excited about our new home. We LOVE it here I’m Frederick! Thank you again. You’ve gained a lifetime client!” - T. Hill ★★★★★ "Miguel truly made selling our home so incredibly easy. Prior to putting our house on the market he gave us reasonable recommendations to increase our sales price and walked us through each and every step. Due to his marketing strategies our house had a on it the first day it was placed on the market. Miguel kept us the loop up to the day we went to settlement on every part of the inspections and appraisal processes. He kept in constant communication with us, which was very reassuring. He also somehow managed to negotiate up, and our ended at well over the original asking price. Miguel knows his stuff very well and I would highly recommend him to everyone!” - J & A ★★★★★ "We initially contacted Miguel as we considered browsing our market and getting a feel for what was available. Little did we know, we would be on the fast track to buying our first home within weeks. Miguel helped explain every step of the home buying process and even recommended our amazing loan officer. We had millions of questions and asked for clarifications often, but he never wavered in being supportive, available, and informative. I’ve already recommended him to a few friends and encourage anyone looking in the DMV area to reach out to him ASAP if you need a personable, knowledgeable, and incredible realtor!” - Amy & Bryan
title: Realtor® | Vice President

description: About Laura &amp;lt;br&amp;gt; Laura provides full-scale residential sales services for buyers, sellers, and investors in Northern Virginia, with a focus inside the Beltway. Born and raised in Alexandria, VA, Laura is a local expert with deep roots and strong market knowledge. A Licensed Agent for eleven years, Laura earned the following accolades in 2024: #1 Individual Compass Agent in Virginia, #3 Individual Compass Agent in the entire DMV Region, and DC Modern Luxury's Top 50 Agents in the DMV. Laura's success is no accident, as her parents were involved in starting a real estate company and then a construction company when she was growing up. At age 19, she was a homeowner herself and has since tackled a multitude of home improvement projects. Laura loves exploring the homes her clients want to see or list, and giving tips on how to make them shine. Her background in building, construction and real estate marketing give her a distinct advantage plus a keen eye for cost and quality. She also takes her fiscal responsibility seriously, and goes above and beyond to ensure that every client’s purchase or sale is the absolute best possible outcome for them. A dedicated partner in the buying and selling process, Laura will be at your side to answer your questions and help you be as fully informed as possible. Laura earned a B.S. in Economics , graduating Summa Cum Laude from George Mason University. She home schooled her four children in the past, worked as an education consultant, and has strong ties to her community. Currently residing in the Braddock Heights neighborhood of Alexandria with a menagerie of pets, Laura has always called Northern VA home. She donates to top-rated New Story Charity on behalf of every client, volunteers at the Carpenter’s Shelter for Homeless Families, and served as Treasurer and Board Member at her kids’ school. But most importantly, Laura can’t wait to learn how she can help you!
title: Realtor®

description: About Scott “We believe that Real Estate should be simple. We use service and marketing strategies that work to make sure our clients have an experience they'll love.” Scott is providing an unparalleled level of service and consultation for his buyers, sellers, and investors. His approach transcends traditional brokerage and affords his clients invaluable insight into market conditions, negotiating strategies and value-add improvements. Whether it’s a luxury estate, multifamily building or condo, Scott’s systematic approach to net seller’s more or add instant equity for his Buyer clients is well established. In addition, Scott prides himself on protecting his clients’ interests while remaining professional amongst his peers. Scott approaches every deal as if it were his own family member to ensure their interests are paramount and they know they are making informed decisions for a successful investment of that magnitude. A Washington DC native, Scott’s unmatched local area knowledge of the DMV coupled with his sharp business acumen provide an invaluable resource for his clientele. With over 20 years of brokerage, property management, and investment experience, Scott is continually growing his portfolio of repeat and referral clients in the residential, multi-family and commercial arenas. Utilizing his CIAS designation as a Certified Investor Agent and extensive educational background, Scott takes pride in advising his clients to ensure they make informed and successful decisions. "Real estate excellence, always" . It's what every client should expect and what Scott and his team deliver. When he’s not concentrating on real estate (rare), Scott enjoys spending time with his friends and family. Scott’s hobbies include golf, hiking, skiing, and investing and athletic manager for this kids sports! Client Testimonials ★★★★★ “Scott Sachs with the Synergy Group is the BEST. His knowledge of the Northern Virginia area is top notch. We could throw out any intersection or neighborhood, and he immediately was giving us the inside scoop. He has an extensive network of agents, contractors, and handymen that also helped throughout the process. He helped us navigate the offer process and eventual acceptance process smoothly, answering all the questions we had along the way. This included cost estimates for updates, advice on the cleanest offer to provide, information on school systems, etc. In such a crazy market, we would not have gotten our home without Scott Sachs. I would recommend Scott to any buyer looking to find their dream home in Northern VA/DC.” - Michael Gilmore ★★★★★ “Scott is just the top of the game, and not just because he can sell a house or find you one. He's deeply interested in making sure your needs are a priority. 💯” - Garret Lee ★★★★★ “Scott Sachs is truly amazing! Scott actually helped us purchase our first property in DC and our 2nd! Both were great investments and perfect for our situation. I trust Scott and he is incredible in terms of connections with a highly reliable and professional team of contractors to help with all aspects of home purchase, ownership and when you are ready to sell. When it did come time to sell, of course we called Scott. He provided thoughtful and professional advice on how to prepare our home for the market. He was spot on! 8 offers in a matter of days and thousands above asking! He also had ideas on how to make our move efficient and helped us make connections in our new community. I cannot say enough about Scott! He was one of the most important contacts we made when coming to DC. Scott is the best there is in the business. I would not hesitate to recommend Scott and The Synergy Group to all of my family and friends.” - Beth Wenstrom ★★★★★ “Scott was extremely professional and personable. He listened well to understand our needs and added value by pointing any pros and cons to the homes he showed us. He was also a great negotiator and very responsive. We would definitely recommend him.” - Vicki Leonardo ★★★★★ "We enjoyed working with Scott and his deep experience and knowledge of the market were crucial for locking down a great house in a very competitive market. In fact, our new house was not even on our radar until Scott suggested we check it out. We are very happy with how things worked out and appreciate the work of this team." - Brian Kenny ★★★★★ "Five Star experience all the way. The Listing process and photo's were done quickly and with expertise. The Open House and showings always kept us in mind and informed. Closing went smoothly thanks to Scott Sachs staying on top of several moving parts. Highly and without reservations recommend Scott and his Synergy Group team.." - Diana Mangano-Cohen ★★★★★ "We had a great experience with Scott Sachs and the Synergy Group. Scott has been our agent through two other home sales & purchases and his support during our most recent sale & purchase was fantastic. Scott went out of his way, completely above and beyond, to help us buy and sell in a crazy housing market. He was always in our corner, keeping our specific wants and needs in mind and we knew we could trust his advice and counsel throughout. In terms of communication, he and his team were always responsive so we were able to move quickly. Scott and The Synergy Group are the best!." - Sara Dickson ★★★★★ "Scott and the team are FANTASTIC! Amazing customer service and belief in doing what's right for the client and ensuring they are protected throughout the process of buying and selling a house. Thank you Synergy!." - Neetha Tangirala ★★★★★ "Scott invests time in identifying your needs as a customer to then narrow his searches and support and deliver your dream home. I have twice worked with him and I remain highly impressed." - Luis ★★★★★ "Scott helped us both sell our Adams Morgan apartment and buy a wonderful single family home in Reston, VA. He made the whole process as easy for as possible. He is professional, courteous, and reliable - he was always one step ahead of our questions. He was extremely knowledgeable about small repairs/steps we could take in selling our apartment and we ended up selling for over asking price! As first-time single-family home buyers, he was responsive to all of our needs. He walked us through the financing, inspection, and negotiated closing cost credit and seller repairs. We would highly recommend him to anyone looking to buy or sell in the DMV!" - Hally ★★★★★ "We have worked with Scott for our home Kalorama, and now out home purchase Reston. We have felt very comfortable working with Scott for the last two years. He is obviously knowledgeable as well as very professional. I would (and do) highly recommend him to anyone who is in need of a real estate agent." - James ★★★★★ "Scott really went above and beyond helping us buy our new home. He is extremely knowledgeable about DC properties, the quirks and expectations of older homes and what properties are worth the investment. I never once questioned Scott's opinions or explanations - he knows his stuff! Over countless showings and a number of fruitless offers made, he remained persistent and by our side. Not only that, but Scott worked over Thanksgiving day while writing the offer and negotiating the of our (now) home. I 10000% recommend Scott Sachs!" ★★★★★ "Scott's experience and patience were invaluable in our yearlong search as first time home buyers. title: Realtor®

description: About Danny Danny Sadoun is a highly experienced real estate agent with a strong background in the industry. Prior to joining Compass, he was a branch manager of a real estate boutique brokerage, where he gained valuable insights into the business. In addition to his management duties, he also provided real estate and business guidance to other Realtors. Danny decided to join Compass because he believes in staying up-to-date with technology to provide the best services and resources to his clients. He is passionate about offering his clients a seamless and stress-free experience, and he understands that utilizing the latest tools and technologies is essential in today's real estate market. Danny has been a Realtor in the Maryland, DC, and Virginia area since 1987, and he has successfully guided customers through the buying and selling process with comfort and confidence. Born in Israel and raised in the DC suburbs, he is fluent in English and Hebrew. Danny's in-depth knowledge of the Greater Washington area's market allows him to provide informed guidance to his clients when it comes to making one of the biggest investments of their lives. He approaches every transaction with a focus on carefully guiding his customers through the buying/selling process, from day one to close of sale. His goal is to educate his clients along the way, offering advice on staging, pricing, and marketing to ensure the best possible outcome. Beyond just selling homes, Danny is committed to providing his clients with a life-changing experience. He takes pleasure in listening to their wants and needs, goals, time frame, and everything in between. By conducting thorough research, he discovers properties that meet his clients' criteria and ensures their happiness throughout the journey. In his spare time, Danny enjoys being a sous chef to his wife (who is an excellent cook and loves to experiment with new recipes). Together they enjoy entertaining family, friends, and clients. He also enjoys fishing and dancing. Danny's dedication to exceptional, personalized service has earned him many 5-star reviews and over a decade of recognition as a GCAAR award winner. His success is measured through his clients' satisfaction, and he counts himself lucky to have a career he is passionate about and enjoys every day. If you're new to the area or a local looking to navigate the complex world of real estate, Danny would be honored to be a part of your journey. Let him help you make your home-buying dreams a reality.
title: Realtor® | Licensed in MD, DC & VA

description: About Mary Meet Mary Saltzman, a top-ranked real estate agent specializing in DC metro real estate with over 25 years of experience. Mary is dedicated to helping clients buy and sell homes in the vibrant DMV region, including Maryland and Virginia. Whether you're looking to buy or sell a home in the DC metro area, Mary offers expert knowledge of neighborhoods to ensure you find your dream home or lucrative investment property. Recognized as one of the top 100 Realtors in Washington, D.C., and nationally ranked, Mary provides exceptional service tailored to first-time homebuyers and luxury home seekers. If you're ready to buy a home in the DC metro area or need assistance to selling your home in the DC metro area, Mary takes on the burdens of the buying and selling process, allowing you to focus on your everyday life. With a deep understanding of market trends in DC real estate, Mary shares valuable insights through newsletters and social media, positioning herself as a knowledgeable resource. She also highlights luxury homes in DC and condos for sale throughout the area to attract a diverse clientele. Additionally, Mary is well-versed in first-time homebuyer programs in DMV, providing essential information to help new buyers navigate the market. A proud graduate of Saint Joseph’s University with a marketing degree and an MBA, Mary combines her educational background with her passion for real estate. In her free time, she enjoys baking, cooking, and playing tennis. Contact Mary today to experience a seamless real estate journey in the Washington, D.C. metro area, where your real estate dreams become a reality!
title: Realtor®
Associate Broker, CAM, CMCA l VA, DC & MD

description: About Bogdan Bogdan is a dedicated Realtor® who specializes in serving individuals and investors seeking the most desirable properties in Washington DC, Arlington, Alexandria, McLean, Falls Church, Bethesda, Potomac, as well as Fairfax, Rappahannock, Culpeper, and Warren counties. Renowned for his in-depth market knowledge and unwavering commitment to clients, Bogdan’s success stems not only from his passion for real estate but also from his keen understanding of the psychology behind buying and selling. He is known for his tireless work ethic and his honest, straightforward advice, which earns him the trust and respect of his clients. Bogdan’s clientele spans a variety of industries, including technology, finance, medicine, law, business, and the arts. His business thrives thanks to the loyalty of satisfied clients and their referrals to friends, family, and neighbors. This consistent growth is a testament to his ability to deliver both outstanding results and a positive experience. Having lived in the Washington, DC metro area for 19 years, Bogdan enjoys traveling, live music, outdoor activities, and spending quality time with his friends and family when he’s not working.
title: Realtor®

description: About Bianca Bianca Sancio was born and raised in New York City. Her family moved to Fort Washington, Maryland, a suburb just outside of Washington, DC, in 1996. Bianca holds a Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, but her passion for real estate led her to immerse herself in the real estate industry. Prior to working in real estate, Bianca worked for 20 years in the Federal government as a contractor and Technology Specialist where she held a Top Secret Clearance with Poly. There she mastered the skills of managing complex multi-million dollar federal contracts, large federal procurements, and acquisitions. These skills allowed her to submerge herself into real estate with a foundation of knowledge and the ability to navigate her clients successfully to homeownership from contract to close. Bianca prides herself on the ability to walk into any space and create harmonious details that her clients appreciate. Her considerable knowledge of design-build development and her friendly approach make working with her a joy. Bianca’s attention to detail, ability to analyze market trends and her extensive knowledge of winning strategies for buyers and sellers is critical in the highly competitive and fast-growing DC, Maryland, and Virginia real estate market. Bianca loves spending time with her family playing board games, enjoying outdoor activities, and weekend ski trips to local lodges.
title: Realtor®

description: About Heather Heather Sand is a real estate advisor and co-principal of The Reflect Residential Group at Compass. With over 16 years of experience, Heather helps buyers and sellers navigate important life transitions with clarity, care, and confidence. Heather believes real estate is both strategic and deeply personal. She takes the time to understand each client’s goals, communicates clearly throughout the process, and addresses potential challenges early so her clients feel informed and supported at every step. Based in Silver Spring, Heather specializes in Montgomery County, Washington, DC, and select areas of Northern Virginia, including Vienna and McLean. She brings strong local knowledge and long-standing relationships across the DMV to every transaction. A key differentiator in Heather’s work is her hands-on approach to preparing homes for market. She owns and curates her own staging furniture and specializes in both vacant and occupied home staging. This allows her to thoughtfully tailor each space to highlight its strengths, whether that means fully furnishing a vacant property or enhancing an occupied home with refined styling and layout adjustments. Her staging process is designed to elevate presentation, maximize appeal, and help homes stand out in competitive markets. With a trained eye for design and photography, Heather collaborates closely with professional photographers and trusted vendors to ensure every listing is positioned to attract attention and drive strong buyer interest. Clients value Heather’s integrity, responsiveness, and steady guidance. They appreciate her ability to combine strategic market insight with careful attention to detail, resulting in a smoother experience and confident decision-making from start to finish.
title: Realtor®

description: About Marcie Marcie Sandalow was destined to be a realtor, though she wouldn’t realize it until (let’s hope) roughly half-way through her life. She comes from a long line of realtors. Her mother owned and operated a popular boutique firm in the Chicago suburbs (Chambers-Cross in Winnetka, IL), and her grandmother was also a realtor. Before delving into real estate herself, Marcie worked in the marketing world, spending many years at National Geographic fine tuning her direct mail skills. Marcie has been selling real estate in the Bethesda/Chevy Chase/DC region since 1999, teaming up with Catarina Bannier in 2011. Marcie's prolific blog posts on every minute detail and aspect of Maryland and DC real estate transactions can still be found all over the web. Over the years Marcie has honed her prowess as a savvy marketer, diligent task-master and loyal advocate for both her buyers and sellers. She lives in East Bethesda with her husband, Marc, and has launched two grown sons into the world. She enjoys reading, walking, and longs to travel more, especially now that covid is easing up. Marcie is licensed in MD and DC and is a member of the Top Agent Network, T.A.N. Fun stuff to know about Marcie: - She has been in one book club or another for over 30 years. - As a kid, Marcie was a curler (yup, that olympic sport). - She recently travelled to the Galapagos Islands and swam with sea lions and sharks.
title: Realtor® Licensed in DC & MD

description: About Brantley Brantley is a native Mississippian who made Washington, DC home in 2009. After a successful stint in the trade association sector, Brantley made the transition to real estate in 2015. Brantley serves DC, MD, & VA and his clientele is nearly exclusively referrals and repeat clients. He takes pride in building relationships that last long after the transaction ends and regularly explores the many sights, sounds, and tastes of the DMV with his clients and friends. Brantley enjoys being able to utilize his background in Urban Planning throughout the home buying and selling process. He lives in Shaw with his partner Joseph and two goldendoodles, Kam and Luca. Capital Estate Group (CEG) is a team of real estate and business professionals brought together by a shared passion for real estate and a desire to positively impact the communities we serve. We strive to be a resource to our clients and communities everyday – not just during the sale. Whether with a community event, charity fundraiser, contractor referral or top flight real estate advice and advocacy, we serve our clients day-in and day-out not over weeks but years.
title: Realtor®

description: About Pee Jay Pee Jay is a Vice President at Compass and a Partner at Arrow Group of Compass. With professional backgrounds in wealth management from J.P. Morgan and business management from lululemon North America, Pee Jay's real estate practice is characterized by discernment rooted in data, unwavering advocacy, and commitment to the client experience. Currently a homeowner in the vibrant U Street Corridor, Pee Jay is a proud Baltimore native who has called Northwest DC home for over fifteen years. He graduated summa cum laude from the University of Maryland, College Park, earning both a BA in Public Relations and a BS in Finance. In his free time, Pee Jay enjoys traveling, lifting weights, walking his pug, spending time with his partner, and playing the flute. A former member of the National Concert Band of America, Pee Jay has studied under world-renowned flautists from the Peabody Institute, University of Maryland, Baltimore Symphony Orchestra, Baltimore Opera, and National Symphony Orchestra. Arrow Group of Compass is a top-producing team at Compass with 60+ years of combined experience. Their knowledge helps clients navigate the competitive DMV Market with outstanding results. They provide access to off-market properties and opportunities that most agents can’t offer. Working within a vast network of connections paired with exceptional service to their clients has allowed the team to focus on referral and repeat business. This is also reflected in over $100M in annual sales; yearly nominations in Washingtonian's "Best Of," Washingtonian's "Faces of Washington," Wall Street Journal's Real Trends, DC Modern Luxury; and most importantly: long-standing relationships with their clients. As a part-time resident in the Williamsburg neighborhood of Brooklyn, NY, Pee Jay is currently working on adding New York to his areas of service - in addition to continuing to service DC and Maryland.
title: Vice President | Realtor®

description: About Peter Peter has been a top-producing real estate professional for over 15 years! He is currently affiliated with Compass and he is licensed in three jurisdictions: Washington DC, Maryland, and Virginia. Peter’s priority is to provide excellent service to his clients and guide them to achieve their real estate goals. He works with both buyers and sellers across the DC Metro Area. Peter is a native of Washington DC, and he has extensive knowledge of the region. Peter’s intrinsic understanding of the real estate market has led to a consistent track record of success. From staging to pricing to finding that great deal - he knows how to get the job done! He loves working with clients! Achieving client objectives is his number one goal! Prior to real estate, Peter spent 15 successful years in Technology - held senior sales/management positions and a myriad of additional start-up firms. He holds a B.S. in Business from Virginia Tech and an MBA in from George Washington University. If you are interested in buying or selling property in the DC Metro Area, please reach out to Peter any time! He would be honored to help you in any way! Peter promises you hard work and professionalism every step of the way!
title: Realtor®

description: About Simon Experienced DC-area REALTOR Simon Sarver has built a business powered by the kind of results that speak for themselves. Not only is he among the top 1% of local agents, but he’s also been named one of Washingtonian’s Best for seven years running. For Simon, though, the results he creates for his clients are the ones that matter most. Since becoming a REALTOR almost ten years ago, Simon has helped hundreds of families find their dream homes or get top dollar for their most prized investment. Simon takes his work seriously, but never himself. In fact, his down-to-earth style and penchant for building relationships have resulted in a robust referral network that accounts for 100% of his business today. He has sold over $150,000,000 in real estate.
title: Senior VP

description: About Michele Serving Palm Beach County: Palm Beach Gardens | West Palm Beach | Palm Beach | Lake Worth Beach | Manalapan | Ocean Ridge | Boynton Beach | Delray Beach | Boca Raton | Wellington. Michele offers exceptional service and has closed more than $223 million in residential home sales. She has also represented developers on new condominium construction projects. A licensed real estate agent for 16 years and a former mortgage industry veteran, Michele is a full-time Realtor® and brings over 35 years of combined industry experience to her clients. Michele has worked in all facets of residential mortgage lending, including loan servicing, capital markets (MBS) for Bank of America, and nationwide wholesale lending at GreenPoint Mortgage (a division of Capital One). From real estate trends and planned developments to new restaurants and retail, Michele makes it her business to know what is happening in the communities she serves. Michele achieves this through intensive research, professional networking, and leveraging the leading-edge technology that Compass offers. Michele has a natural flair for connecting with people, and her high ratio of personal referrals is a testament to her client confidence, unparalleled work ethic, and professionalism. Accredited Buyer's Representative - ABR ® Seniors Real Estate Specialist - SRES ® Resort and Second-Home Property Specialist (RSPS) certification. Michele learned the value of hard work from an early age, working in the family business, a commercial apple farm in Upstate New York. She resided in Charlotte, NC, and Boston, MA during her mortgage banking years. Michele is a five-time marathoner, enjoys traveling, and has visited thirty countries on six continents. After sixteen years in Washington, D.C., Michele and her husband now reside in sunny Palm Beach County, Florida, where they enjoy all that South Florida has to offer. Proud supporter of Tunnel to Towers Foundation. Top 1.5% of Realtors nationwide.
title: Vice President

description: About Pamela Pam is a well-respected agent with more than 18 years of experience in home sales. She finds nothing more rewarding than working with clients - from maximizing the home seller's outcome with optimal preparation, staging, positioning and marketing of the property, to seeking out and obtaining the perfect abode for her buyers. Thanks to Pam, many many buyers throughout the Washington Metro Area have successfully purchased the home of their dreams. She is a true advocate for each of her clients, and she invests herself fully in making transactions work. Pam has lived in the Washington Metro Area for more than 30 years. She knows the ins-and-outs of the region and has deep roots in the community. Most of Pam's business comes from referrals from satisfied clients. And they certainly do have reasons to be satisfied - her listings sell faster than the industry average for the best possible prices. As a seller's and buyer's agent, she has sold many millions of dollars worth of real estate. If you're thinking about selling your home or are looking to purchase property, feel free to contact Pam. She will work with you to develop a real estate plan that fits your needs and your life, and she will be in your corner every step of the way.
title: Realtor

description: About Jeremy After growing up in Dublin, Ireland and rural Maryland, Jeremy graduated from UMD College Park in 2005 and put down roots in DC. He now lives with his wife and two boys in Kensington. As a realtor, he brings a unique and insightful perspective. His years of experience flipping houses and building his own rental portfolio allows him to provide clients with insights they may not otherwise learn until inspection or later. Jeremy also leverages his CPA background to ensure clients get the best value. Closely following market trends gives him the ability to advise sellers on pre-listing updates that truly maximize their return. In today's uncertain environment, clients can count on Jeremy to help them navigate the real estate market with confidence.
title: Realtor®

description: About Alex Alex Schindlbeck, team Buyer Agent, is a lifelong resident of Logan Circle who grew up with a front row seat to the changes in DC real estate. Alex, a graduate of Arizona State University, has also backpacked extensively around the world. She drills deep to get clients accurate market values in myriad neighborhoods as she guides buyers in their search for their perfect home. Beneath Alex’s seemingly-quiet exterior lies a quick wit and a shrewd business mind, and she is a consummate professional in representing buyers’ interests in transactions.
title: Realtor

description: About Greg www.MountainwestJH.com A lover of Jackson and resident of Rafter J Ranch, Greg’s passion for real estate and over 18 years of experience has led to a loyal client base that depends on him throughout their housing life cycle; from the first home to the “forever” home. Greg’s in-depth knowledge of market trends, the marketing process (including price, design, and investment maximization) have proven invaluable to his clients. Providing a competitive and trusted edge that is needed to be successful in the hyper competitive housing climate. Greg’s $550M + portfolio and having been licensed in multiple markets (Maryland, Virginia, Washington DC and Wyoming) provides his clients the ability to fully trust his knowledge and advice – regardless of market conditions or price point. When not working, he and his husband Jake enjoy being outdoors exploring everything that the Jackson has to offer, traveling to visit friends and family on the East Coast or working on design and renovation projects at their home. "Every home has a story, let me tell yours"
title: Realtor

description: About Stanton Combining extensive management experience and over 18 years of expertise in the DMV real estate market, Stanton proudly serves as Managing Director at Compass. Stanton’s love of real estate is rooted in his genuine passion for helping others succeed. His clients and colleagues particularly value Stanton's integrity, his commitment to achieving exceptional results, and his unfailing kindness and humor. Prior to entering real estate, Stanton worked as a creative director, owned a residential design firm, and enjoyed a successful career in acting. He is the proud recipient of a Gold Clio Award in Voiceover Performance. Stanton graduated from The University of Texas in Austin with a B.S. in Advertising. Outside of work, he enjoys traveling, working out and hanging out with his furry best friends, Clark and Jojo.
title: Sales Manager

description: About Steve Through his highly professional, informed, and diligent approach, Steve Schuck provides outstanding expertise and professional representation to his valued clients. As a partner of The Banner Team of Compass, Steve exhibits his proficient counsel, keen insights, resourcefulness and the highest level of integrity when advising his clients on all real estate matters. As a specialist in the Acquisition and Marketing of Residential Real Estate, he provides his clients with excellent opportunities that exist in the DC Metro Area real estate market. He is very connected with the region and fully enjoys sharing his insights into the rich and charming character of the distinctive communities found throughout the area! Steve clearly distinguishes himself by executing on behalf of his clients with very strategic, skillful and honest measures that achieve impressive results. In personally working with each client and understanding their specific priorities, Steve helps clients gain focus on their needs and then aligns and applies himself to accomplish their real estate goals. He is meticulous in monitoring the specific trends and current data of the region and provides his clients with real estate advice based on a more complete perspective and careful analysis of the market. Whether it is evaluating the pros and cons of each property, a review of the technical points of the transaction or conducting further research to disclose information that may affect or influence a client; in being proactive, Steve’s clients receive real estate advice based on a careful assessment and an intentionally mindful approach on their behalf. Steve’s clients trust in his in-depth perspective and timely guidance in addressing all aspects of the transaction with professional competence. He is very thorough in providing constant communication and is always extremely attentive, accessible and responds promptly. He is highly skilled in negotiating the critical, contractual components of the transaction and is masterful at finding creative and equitable solutions. Delivering responsive, confident results with a compassionate, impactful approach are all part of Steve’s distinguished style in always accomplishing truly elevated achievements for his clients. Steve further distinguishes himself with the following designations: MBA Finance, GW University Graduate of the Realtor Institute (GRI Seniors Residential Specialist (SRES) Contact Steve to serve you and your personal real estate interests.
title: Realtor®

description: About Daniel “We believe that Real Estate should be simple. We use service and marketing strategies that work, to make sure our clients have an experience they'll love.” As a 4th generation Washingtonian, Daniel's heart is ingrained in the fabric of the DMV. Coupled with his interests in housing, development and a background in architecture, he offers a unique advantage to his clients. As a high producing, referral-based agent, he prides his business on strong customer service, attention to process and detail, and great energy and enthusiasm for his client's goals. Daniel is an avid traveler both domestically and internationally. Exposure to a wide variety of cultures and people create an open mind and desire to understand each client's unique situation. He is also an avid DC sports fan, amateur soccer player, and die hard golfer. He spends most of his time with his wife and two kids constantly exploring DC's social and cultural scene. He believes you should remember where you started, so you can appreciate where you are and strive towards where you are going! He is here to help you get there. Client Testimonials ★★★★★ We moved in and out of five homes to and from different states - ten real estate agents over the course of 13 years. Thank you for your wisdom, advice, and guidance, Daniel - you were right on everything. You really are the most memorable (you look like Colin Jost) and the best real estate agent we have had. - Jonathan Dalamo ★★★★★ Daniel did a great job selling our home. He exceeded our expectations. The process went very smoothly and we're sure all of Daniel's recommendations payed off. He was a great communicator and very calm throughout. - Stephen Kearney ★★★★★ Best REALTOR in the DMV area!! Working with Daniel was AWESOME!! Looking to buy a house in this competitive market can be very stressful, but Daniel made the process smooth, easy and fun! He is very responsive, answered all our questions and provided smart and great recommendations. We enjoyed a lot working with such a talented person and will definitely recommend him to anyone who wants to get the best deal of their dream home. We are so HAPPY and excited with our new home and wouldn't be able to make it possible without Daniel's help. Thank you for everything!! - SG ★★★★★ Daniel & the team at The Synergy Group are phenomenal real estate professionals who I could not recommend more highly. As we were looking to buy, Daniel consistently was able to get us into houses right as they hit the market (and in some cases, before). His relationships and neighborhood expertise allowed us to get an offer in early and ultimately beat substantial competition. I can say definitively we would not have gotten our house if it wasn't for Daniel. I am very grateful for all his hard work for us and I cannot recommend him enough. - Matthew Filosa ★★★★★ "My family has relied on Daniel Schuler for buying, selling, and advice. He has delivered superior service and phenomenal results. Daniel helped our family plan and execute a that exceeded our very high expectations during a very difficult time following a death in our family. Despite being a high demand/high volume agent, he distinguished himself with his ability to listen with care and provide a personalized approach to the transaction. He took the time to understand our values and objectives. He demonstrated expertise and market insight to the strongest possible strategy to execute our vision. No detail was overlooked. He communicated with us at each phase. We felt like we were his only client. After another (very) successful transaction we consider Daniel Schuler to be a trusted fiend and advisor." ★★★★★ "Daniel is the best. He's very knowledgeable and communicative about every step of the home-buying process. He's also available around the clock, is incredibly cordial and sets realistic expectations for prospective home buyers. I very strong recommend him!" - Jon ★★★★★ "It takes a certain kind of expertise to navigate all the aspects of a home purchase and . Daniel handled both for me simultaneously and did it with professionalism, and an understanding of what we needed to accomplish personally and financially. He really knew how to structure both our offer and and we had a great process because of it. I highly recommend him." - Elizabeth ★★★★★ "Daniel was very knowledgeable about the entire home buying experience and was very responsive to questions and concerns. He was a great chaperone for my husband and I through the entire process of buying our first home. He found the house we ended up buying, and when the VA appraiser required that repairs be made and the seller dragged their feet, he stepped in and made sure the work got done and closing happened without much delay. We looked at quite a few homes, and offered advice when we asked, without ever pressuring us to buy. Not to mention, he's a great guy.
