Would definitely recommend him to first time home buyers, or any buyer for that matter." - Chelsea ★★★★★ "Daniel is an excellent agent! We were impressed with his knowledge of the community, ability to negotiate flawlessly, and dedication to customer service. He was in constant contact with us throughout our home buying journey and was a wonderful advocate on our behalf. I could not recommend him enough." - Lisa He believes you should remember where you started, so you can appreciate where you are and strive towards where you are going! He is here to help you get there.
title: Realtor®

description: About Aaron Aaron is a dynamic real estate professional with a track record of seamlessly merging creative vision with sharp business acumen to deliver exceptional client results. Whether guiding investors through the nuances of renovation and design or negotiating stellar deals, he provides steadfast support from the first showing to the closing table. Leveraging decades of executive-level business experience, Aaron built his foundation on understanding the consumer experience, which began in his family's retail business. His passion for branding and design propelled him into prestigious executive roles in the fashion industry, including President and Chief Creative Officer at Bruno Magli Group and President of Polo Ralph Lauren Footwear. This diverse background provides an unparalleled perspective on property aesthetics and market positioning. Prior to real estate, Aaron also became a top contractor for PricewaterhouseCoopers, advising world-renowned organizations like Keller Williams, Nordstrom, and Zappos.com on sales, branding, and leadership development. Today, clients trust Aaron's integrity, boundless energy, and extensive industry knowledge to help them achieve their real estate goals. He is known as a trusted advisor and a powerful catalyst for change.
title: REALTOR®

description: About Illia With a passion for houses and a background in interior design, Illia channels her love of helping others by pairing them with their forever home. As a resident of many D.C., Bethesda and Potomac neighborhoods, Illia knows the shopping, schools, and restaurants—and even the gyms and grocery stores—that help clients to make this major life decision. As a former lawyer, Illia thoroughly researches and analyses the market, and puts her negotiating prowess to work to maximize results every step of the way. Over the years, Illia has cultivated an extensive network of agents, contractors, and service-providers that she taps into for her clients’ benefit. She guides all her buyers through their purchasing journey - from first-time homebuyers to downsizing couples to families moving to the area. When it comes to selling a client's home, her project management skills to help sellers navigate the sale process efficiently and get top dollar for their homes. Illia takes a full service approach to real estate: overseeing all steps in the process, from home repairs, to upgrades, staging, home inspections, and settlement. In her free time, Illia likes to read or hang out with her husband David . . . and if they will let her, to also hang out with their three teenage sons and the family dog (Lucy) and cat (Athena). However, most of the time, the boys - and the pets - have little interest in hanging out with mom and dad. So, having been rebuffed by the boys and pets, you can often find her perusing home design websites and painting abstract canvases.
title: Realtor®

description: About Alison Alison and The RARE DC's full website here Alison approaches real estate and client service in the same manner that she attacks all things -- with creativity, passionate energy, and authenticity . With over 25 years as a DC-area resident, Alison has worked in client services and sales since her days at the GW including a long career in sports medicine, a hospitality tech start up, and leasing for a local developer, Ditto Residential. No matter the industry she has worked in, her guiding principle has always been a commitment to working with people and helping them attain their goals. Alison believes that truly getting to know her clients coupled with a quick wit, sincerity, and dedication to her clients' happiness is what has allowed her to be successful. Once you work with her, she is your forever realtor and is always eager to help her clients in any way necessary both during and after their real estate transactions have ended. She discovered her love of real estate when purchasing her first condo in Logan Circle in 2009 and began working in the industry full time in 2016. Since then she has been involved in sales throughout various neighborhoods in DC, MD, and VA and has a perfect 5/5 review score from past clients. She employs a total hands-on approach, is known for clear and frequent written and verbal communication, and has an incredible eye for detail both with properties themselves and in dealing with client wants and needs. She is a yearly volunteer with various arts and music festivals including Burning Man and DC's Funk Parade, lives out her former NCAA softball D1 athlete life on evenings and weekends, and regularly fosters and helps find adoptive parents for rescue puppies with K9 Lifesavers. A lover of street art, she enjoys walking around DC with her dog, Ringo, and her foster puppies exploring the nooks and crannies of the city and finding new pieces to photograph. With ties to the DC restaurant, arts, and entertainment scenes, she especially enjoys keeping a pulse on what's new and happening in and around the city and can often be found at a new restaurant, gallery opening, or frequenting the city's exceptional live music venues.
title: Realtor®

description: About Allison Allison has called many DC neighborhoods home since 1996—from Columbia Heights and Woodley Park, to American University Park and Chevy Chase. She is a resourceful professional who will provide frank advice and assistance whether you are prepping and selling a family home, buying that next place, or seeking a quick rental. She happily shares knowledge, data, context, connections, and creative ideas that will empower you to make great real estate decisions. Allison is a former executive whose marketing, advocacy, strategy, and negotiation skills were honed over more than 25 years in international business and nonprofit management. In 2018 she flipped her real estate hobby into a full time career and quickly established a track record of delighted clients and successful Buyer and Seller representation. At Compass, Allison is a partner in the Ferris Levin Collaborative , a much loved team of five women partners with decades of combined experience in DMV real estate. This unique team works together to ensure that each client receives amazing, personalized service while benefitting from all t he p artners ' skill sets, i ncluding in law, architecture, management, marketing, staging, art, economic analysis, entrepreneurship, and international relocation. Allison speaks fluent French, and can "get by" in Spanish and even Italian. She is a member of the World Bank Family Network and has lived in seven countries on three continents. She is plugged in with the city amenities and outdoor recreation scenes—try asking her about local cycling, hiking, canoeing or kayaking!
title: Realtor® | DC, MD & VA

description: About Michael A proud 7th-generation Washingtonian, Michael was raised in Potomac, Maryland and Spring Valley, DC. With over 16 years of experience leading operations in the retail pharmacy industry, Michael brings a strong business foundation to his real estate practice. In 2016, he earned his real estate license with the initial goal of helping close friends and family. What started as a side passion quickly grew into a calling. The joy he found in helping clients achieve their real estate goals—combined with the entrepreneurial opportunity—led him to make a full-time transition into real estate. Michael began investing in real estate at a young age and has deep roots in many of the area’s most iconic neighborhoods including Bethesda, Tenleytown, Petworth, U Street, Spring Valley, and Potomac Falls. His personal experiences as both a buyer and investor have given him insight into how to ease the emotional and often stressful process of buying or selling a home. He understands that real estate transactions are among the most significant investments in a person’s life, and he is committed to delivering a level of service that reflects that importance. Michael’s mission is simple: treat every client like family. He prides himself on providing honest, insightful, and transparent communication to ensure an exceptional experience from start to finish. Whether you're buying or selling, you’ll benefit from Michael’s local expertise, thoughtful approach, and deep commitment to client care.
title: VP, Compass | Realtor® Licensed in DC, MD, VA

description: About Michael Click Here to View Our Website Michael grew up in Spring Valley and has been a real estate broker in DC, MD, & VA for over 40 years. A real estate transaction is often one of the biggest investments in a person’s life, and he believes every client should receive a higher level of care. His mission is to treat all of his clients like family by providing insightful, honest, and clear communication throughout the process to deliver an exceptional real estate experience. Whether buying or selling a home, you will benefit from his unique and caring approach as well as his extensive knowledge of Washington, DC area real estate.
title: Realtor®

description: About Miriam Miriam exhibits an eagerness to serve each individual she meets. She strives to go above beyond expectations and provide individualize attention. Her knowledge of the DMV is valuable as she is licensed in DC, Maryland and Virginia. Miriam has always been passionate about real estate and the prospect of finding people a place to call home. Her upbringing in the military helped fashion her love for people. Miriam has lived on the west coast, mid-west, and east coast. Finding a home was always special for her each time she moved. She assists her clients by providing real estate knowledge, skills, and advice. Her clients appreciate her experience in Selling, buying, and leasing real estate along with residential relations, property management, sales, and event planning. Miriam enjoys traveling, the outdoors, hiking, martial arts, and spending time with her husband plus two Shih-Tzus. She looks forward to serving you, your friends, and your family.
title: Realtor®

description: About Noël Noel has a BA in International Studies and Economics from Towson University, and is also fluent in Russian. With a background in banking, Noel came into Real Estate in January 2004 and has been fortunate to experience a wide spectrum of the business throughout its many cycles, embracing both challenges and growth. Over his career, Noel has been able to adapt to this perpetually changing climate by combining his extensive experience in sales, finance, and customer service with creativity and diligence. Whether he is working with a first-time home buyer looking to purchase a studio, or a developer looking to buy a 20 unit multi-family building, it is absolutely imperative to him that all his clients feel as though they are the only ones he has. As a son of a Sierra Leonean diplomat, Noel has traveled and lived in many parts of the world. However, Washington DC has been home to him for most of his life and he holds a great love for it. Needless to say, with much excitement, he has witnessed it grow and flourish. From its vast architectural marvels, to its rich historic legacy, to the diversity of its population, Noel can attest that this is one of the best places to live in the world. Real Estate is an essential element of the "American Dream," and Noel is honored to play a part in it. There is no better feeling than helping a couple purchase their first home, or assisting in the revitalization of a distressed building or street corner. Noel is also an investor, developer, and home owner. He believes in and sincerely loves what he does.
title: Mollaan Babbington Group | Vice President

description: About Veronica Veronica is a veteran real estate agent with 19 years of experience under her belt. Born and raised in Barcelona, Spain, she grew up surrounded by her parents' real estate and construction business, which ignited her lifelong passion for the industry and her desire to help people achieve their dreams. Before pursuing a career in real estate, Veronica was a professional swimmer on the Spanish National team, where she discovered her love for meeting people from diverse backgrounds and cultures. Her athletic background taught her valuable lessons in discipline, perseverance, and teamwork, which she applies to her work as an agent. In addition to her athletic pursuits, Veronica also worked as a labor law consultant for Deloitte, leveraging her degree in Labor Law from the University of Barcelona. Her legal background enhances her skills as a negotiator and advocate for her clients. Throughout her 19-year career, Veronica has earned a reputation as a super agent due to her exceptional track record of success and her unwavering dedication to her clients. She is a skilled negotiator who always puts her clients' needs first and ensures that they get the best possible outcome. Veronica's local and international expertise, market knowledge, and deep commitment to her clients make her an invaluable asset to anyone looking to buy or sell real estate. She is passionate about helping her clients achieve their goals, and her tireless work ethic and attention to detail make her a force to be reckoned with in the industry. As a long-time resident of the DMV area, Veronica knows the region's real estate market inside and out, and she is always up-to-date on the latest trends and developments. Her commitment to staying informed and ahead of the curve has made her an invaluable resource for anyone looking to navigate the complex world of real estate in this area. Veronica's passion for the industry is matched only by her dedication to her clients, and her experience has given her a deep appreciation for the importance of building strong, trusting relationships. Her extensive network of contacts and her knowledge of the local market ensure that her clients receive unparalleled service and support throughout every step of the buying or selling process. Whether you are a first-time homebuyer or a seasoned buyer or seller, Veronica has the skills and expertise necessary to help you achieve your goals. She is a trusted advisor and a true partner, and she is committed to providing her clients with the best possible experience. Veronica lives in Arlington with her husband and three children, and is deeply committed to her community. She is an active member of various local organizations, including the Arlington Chamber of Commerce, and has a deep understanding of the DMV area's unique real estate market. To learn more about veronica visit her website: VSG HOMES
title: Realtor®

description: About Dito From a young age, Dito Sevilla was known as someone you could go to for real estate advice. Son of a diplomat and developer, Dito grew up exploring houses of all styles and in every corner of DC, imagining the lives that would be led within their walls, all the memories yet to be shared. Even as a kid, he recognized the importance of belonging, of having a place to call home. He also had an eye for design and a talent for relating to the people and places around him. So, it seemed fitting that Dito was often sought out as a design consultant, open house companion, and neighborhood expert all in one, providing valuable insight into the world of real estate long before he made a full-time career out of it. Prior to his official transition into real estate, Dito ran his eponymous award-winning, iconic DC bar for 15 years, where he leveraged his service-driven outlook and problem-solving skills to create memorable experiences for every patron who walked through his doors. And although Dito thrived in the field of hospitality, he was always drawn back to real estate, to his longtime passion for guiding others through the complex and pivotal process of buying or selling a home. Today, Dito and Olivia are devoted Realtors, empowering clients all over the DC area to find the perfect home or the right buyer. Dito is best known first-time buyers and seasoned sellers alike for his tireless work ethic, transparent approach, and meticulous attention to even the smallest of details. Whether it’s the way the sunlight streams in, the historic tiling in the bathroom, or the spot in the corner eagerly awaiting a certain succulent, Dito recognizes that it’s these seemingly insignificant features of a home that allow someone to envision building a life there. Dito also has the unique ability to see every transaction through the eyes of the client, taking the time to understand their hopes and preferences before translating them into reality. Born and raised in Washington, DC, Dito offers an encyclopedic knowledge of the city, and loves helping his clients discover all of its nuanced charm—from the bustling streets of Downtown, to the verdant sidewalks of Cleveland Park and beyond. He partners with clients at every price point and never shies away from a challenge, working to break down the mental and physical barriers that might normally prevent someone from reaching their home buying or selling goals. He’s also a savvy marketer, consistently employing the right strategy to best position each for maximum appeal and exposure. Thanks to Dito’s extensive local roots and gregarious personality, it’s no surprise that he has cultivated a vast referral network over the years, one that he attributes to the lasting connections he’s made here. For Dito, real estate has never been about simply closing the sale, but rather the lives he’s helped to shape and the meaningful relationships he’s formed along the way. Above all, Dito’s mission is to manage the entire search or sale process seamlessly, finding creative solutions to every roadblock while ensuring his clients are comfortable and confident in what their future holds. Dito is all too familiar with the stress that can often accompany a transformative life decision like buying or selling a home, which is why he strives to alleviate some of that emotional intensity with his storied sense of humor and commitment to finding the fun in any situation.
title: Realtor®

description: About Lily Lily is a member of Katrina Homes of Compass. Her passion for real estate is rooted in her family's history, inspired by her father's long career in the industry. A Virginia native from Rappahannock County, Lily has always cherished the unique charm and beauty of her home state. Licensed in both DC and VA, she is eager to help others find their perfect place in the areas she loves and knows so well. Staying up-to-date with local market trends and changes in the real estate landscape are cornerstones of Lily's business. She brings fresh energy and a proactive approach to her work, is committed to listening to her clients' needs, and delivers personalized service tailored to each individual. Her resourcefulness and enthusiasm ensure that every client feels valued and supported throughout the buying, selling, or renting process. The enthusiasm Lily has for the real estate business is palpable. She thrives on creating personable relationships built on trust and leveraging her people skills to connect with clients. Her passion drives her to tackle challenges head-on, always striving to deliver exceptional results. Lily's excitement for the business and her commitment to fostering connections with her clients are central to her professional career. When not working, Lily enjoys the scenic beauty of Virginia, spending her free time riding horses, hiking, swimming, and enjoying quality moments with friends and family. Learn more about Katrina Homes of Compass here !
title: Realtor®

description: About Ellen I'm a Real Estate addict and sure someday there'll be a code for this in the Psychiatric nomenclature! I love what I do & these days you can find me practicing my craft at Compass in the DMV. Even after spending years working in the New York City real estate market, I must admit that the DMV is as challenging and enervating a place to be a realtor as is the Big Apple. After graduating from New York University with a BA in Political Science and History and completing my graduate studies at Columbia University, I pursued careers in the advertising industry and in medical administration. And then my lifelong fascination with real estate prevailed and I started a real estate development company concentrating on single family properties in upscale markets in New York. This experience, combined with my years as a sales agent focusing on all aspects of the market including multi-unit developments in Manhattan, has provided me with a depth of experience and understanding that form the basis of the way I've been practicing my profession for these last 15 years here in the DMV. Knowing the nuances of both the market and my clients' needs forms the framework of all interactions with and for my clients, be they buyers, sellers, developers or investors. I view each client's needs in relation to their individual long and short term financial and lifestyle goals offering an integrated approach to each transaction. As an admitted workaholic I’m available by cell from 7:00am-11:00pm, text and email 24/7. I pride myself on being a rapid responder so If you don't hear back from me quickly, I'm probably out walking my latest rescue baby, a now 5 year -old Black Lab mix ,Evan or rather Evan is probably walking me! I’m an avid supporter of Animal Rights Rescue Groups, HRC, equal rights for all and…the beach, books and film! I'm proud to have been a member of the DCAR (District of Columbia Association of Realtors) Public Policy Committee for 12 years, as well as a member of the Affordable Housing subcommittee. Proud also to have been recognized as a Top Producer by Washingtonian Magazine and Northern Virginia as well. Look for me on Facebook and Instagram too!
title: Realtor®

description: About Joan Joan's award-winning credentials and accomplishments in the DC Metro/Northern Virginia real estate market are outstanding. With an attractive track record across all price segments, Joan has achieved notable recognition by Washingtonian Magazine and Northern Virginia Magazine as a top agent and The Shannon Group has achieved recognition as a top team in the DC Metro area since its founding. In HGTV's 2020 "Homes with a History" national competition, she listed, staged and marketed the Old Town Alexandria home located at 109 Lee Street which was voted one of the top ten national winners. She has attained the industry's highest levels of achievement with the Diamond Lifetime Top Producer designation awarded by NVAR (the Northern Virginia Area Realtors), the 2020 DC Modern Luxury Real Estate Award and has completed over $200 million in personal sales transactions in the Northern Virginia /DC real estate market. Joan uses her skills as an avid listener and negotiator to help her clients reach their real estate objectives. Her distinctive listings have drawn media attention, both social and traditional, through outlets such as "Where We Live" columns in the Washington Post and her writing professional articles for local online platforms such as AlexNow.com. She is best known for her 20 plus years of expertise, sweeping local knowledge and a dogged determination to achieve success for her clients. Joan says, "With you always in mind, I'll customize your buying and selling strategies to maximize your home value and provide the road map to your success." Since 2002, Joan has provided a caring approach, top-hat concierge & best-in-class service and unmatched local expertise to all of her clients, from first-time home buyers and neighborhood listings to ambassadors and leaders of major industries relocating in or out of the metro area. Joan advocates for the cognitively disabled through the National Autism Association and St. Coletta's of Greater Washington and is an avid supporter of her local faith community. When taking the rare break from helping buyers and sellers, Joan can be found in the kitchen, the garden or at the beach. She loves working with her son and husband who are also part of the Shannon Group.
title: Realtor®

description: About Megan Meg Shapiro is a Founding Member of the COMPASS Capitol Hill office, and a Principal on the Top Producing Jeanne Phil Meg Team. Licensed in DC, MD and VA, the Team helps clients in all price ranges buy and sell around 100 homes/year in the DMV area and beyond, utilizing their relationships with agents throughout COMPASS's nationwide network. A driven professional, Meg loves the challenge of helping each client get from point A to point B in their distinctive real estate transaction. She is an experienced, drama-free problem solver, skilled at the art of truly listening to get to the crux of any matter. Clients have also commented that if anyone can make the real estate process fun, it’s Meg! Meg grew up locally in Montgomery County, MD, and attended Georgetown Visitation in D.C. A Tulane University grad, she is enamored with all things New Orleans, and loves seeing live music. In past lives, Meg traveled the world working for CNN's Turner International, owned and ran a diner in Atlanta, and co-owned a local fine foods market in DC. Now residing with her family in the Capitol Hill neighborhood, she enjoys chatting with friends and neighbors while gardening in her Capitol Hill garden patch, devouring any and every book with her book club, and visiting with family and friends on the water at the Eastern Shore and Maine. Always up for a new challenge, she recently became a first-time dog owner to a sweet Porti, and became addicted to tennis and pickleball. The Jeanne Phil Meg Team supports over 40 local schools, sports and philanthropies, and dearest to Meg's heart is Everyone Home DC, an organization which helps people at risk of, and experiencing, homelessness. Find out more about Meg and the team at www.jeannephilmeg.com !
title: Vice President | The Jeanne Phil Meg Team

description: About Michael Michael Shapiro specializes in helping clients buy and sell modern and mid-century modern homes in Maryland, Virginia and Washington, D.C. Since 2009, Michael has sold more than $200 million in modern real estate, including several properties facing the wrecking ball that he helped save and redevelop. Michael’s website, Modern Capital (moderncapitaldc.com), has been recognized the Washington Post, Bethesda Magazine, DC Magazine, Washingtonian and other publications as the go-to source mid-century modern real estate the D.C. area. A former journalist and top-level strategic communications professional, Michael brings a personal passion for mid-century modern design and architecture and markets his listings directly to buyers seeking modern and contemporary homes by noted modernists such as Charles M. Goodman, Thomas Wright, Chloethiel Woodard Smith, Harold Esten and Keys, Lethbridge and Condon, among others. He started blogging 17 years ago about the area’s modern real estate when he and his family were looking for their own mid-century home and he could not find a resource to help their search. Michael is a proud supporter of Docomomo-US and the National Building Museum, and the biennial Hollin Hills and Garden Tour. He is a founding board member of Docomomo’s DC chapter, which is dedicated to increasing public awareness, appreciation and protection of modern architecture, landscapes, neighborhoods and sites in Washington, D.C., and surrounding areas in Maryland and Virginia. A native New Yorker, Michael has lived in Northern Virginia and now resides in Bethesda, Md., with his wife, Elissa, a fellow Compass agent, daughter, son and Italian greyhound, Illy. Visit my website Testimonials “If not for your creative, outside the box thinking on the offer, this would never have happened!!! Seriously, great work. Your deep experience, network and ability to see the business/investment side is a huge asset for your clients.” -Anne and Adam, buyers and sellers "When it came to selling my mother’s mid-century , we did not know what to do or how to price it. Michael was knowledgeable, friendly, helpful, and responsive. He made a difficult process so much easier. If you are buying or selling a mid-century modern in the DC area, he is your man. I recommend him enthusiastically." -Debra, seller “We’ve long been fans of Mike’s blog on mid-century homes, and no other agent can match his deep experience and appreciation for these homes. When Mike our mid-century gem, his research into its architectural history and his tailored strategy undoubtedly went a long way to a quick at full price.” -James and Shimica, sellers
title: Realtor®

description: About Kate A native Washingtonian, Kate was born and raised off Massachusetts Avenue in Bethesda, and her family goes back generations in Maryland. Kate offers intimate knowledge of neighborhoods, schools, and the history of the community. She has been a practicing real estate agent since 2004. Before that, she worked in politics for 15 years, including the White House, the Democratic National Committee, and statewide elections. She likes politics, but believes there is nothing more rewarding than assisting people who are in the midst of the hugely important and complicated process of buying and selling real estate. A proud graduate of Bethesda public schools, she attended Wood Acres Elementary, Walt Whitman High School and Mount Saint Mary’s College in Maryland. Kate currently lives in Chevy Chase with her husband Paul their sons Teddy and Charlie.
title: Realtor®

description: About Arash By the numbers, Arash Shirazi has had a remarkable career in sales. A former lecture agent, turned successful entrepreneur, to real estate agent, Arash can count upwards of $100M in sales revenue for his clients over the span of his career. He is a native Washingtonian, having grown up in Rockville, and has lived in Potomac, Arlington, and Washington, D.C. Arash was recognized a leading entrepreneur by “Fast Company” and the “Washington Business Journal”, among other notable business publications, and his combination of business acumen, tenacity, and commitment to client service has made him a sought after agent. Having managed his families portfolio of properties made him a natural fit for real estate with an understanding for each client’s individual needs. He believes a home sale is bigger than just a transaction and sees each property as something that carries with it an imprint of treasured memories and experiences. With this in mind, Arash works tirelessly for his clients with a mission to exceed expectations. During his down time, Arash can be found chasing his six year-old twins with his wife Sara.
title: Realtor®

description: About Nicole C. Nicole Shirley is a dedicated real estate advisor serving the Washington, D.C.–Maryland–Virginia metro area, known for her sharp market knowledge, meticulous organization, and unwavering commitment to guiding clients through one of life’s biggest financial decisions. With a strong track record at Compass marked by a 95% listing-consultation conversion rate, seamless transactions, and strategic pricing—Nicole brings clarity and confidence to every step of the buying and selling experience. Before launching her real estate career, Nicole excelled as an award-winning pastry chef, professional baker, and business owner. That chapter sharpened the same qualities she now brings to real estate: creativity, precision, problem-solving under pressure, and an exceptional eye for detail. Her background in operations management, compliance, and project oversight adds an additional layer of expertise that clients value—especially when navigating complex deals. But Nicole is far from all work and no play. She’s a wine enthusiast, a true foodie, and the first to find a great happy hour anywhere in the DMV. She has completed two marathons—although she’ll be the first to tell you she is absolutely not a runner. And when she’s not negotiating contracts or previewing homes, you’ll likely find her experimenting in the kitchen, exploring a new restaurant, or planning her next culinary adventure. Balanced, approachable, and deeply knowledgeable, Nicole blends professionalism with personality—making the real estate journey not only successful, but enjoyable
title: REALTOR®

description: About David David is a skilled listing agent who helps his sellers understand how to use the current market conditions to achieve the best sales price in the shortest amount of time. He also has an expertise in assisting out of town sellers, and estate sales providing them with white glove service, as well as tenant occupied properties, and cooperatives (coops) and condominiums (condos). With buyers, David uses a consultative approach to fully understand what his clients are looking for and matches that with the best properties for sale - including any off-market homes. David’s clients have consistently raved about his responsiveness, market knowledge, friendly approach, and fierce advocacy their behalf. David works all kinds of clients, from first-time buyers and sellers to seasoned investors, with a special focus on livable and walkable neighborhoods, and empty nesters as well as estates. Before he began his career real estate, David worked at AARP for 13 years, where he led national efforts to promote livable communities, including walkable neighborhoods, accessible housing, access to transportation options, smart growth, and mixed-use development. He is a Certified Aging-in-Place Specialist (CAPS), an Accredited New Urbanist from the School of Architecture at the University of Miami, and a member of The Congress for New Urbanism (CNU). David holds the Accredited Buyer's Representative (ABR), Seniors Real Estate Specialist (SRES), and At Home With Diversity (AHWD) designations and has completed graduate coursework in real estate as a Graduate, Realtor Institute (GRI). David is also a member of the LGBTQ+ Real Estate Alliance. He has also been quoted in numerous leading publications including Washingtonian magazine, The Washington Post, Amtrak's Arrive magazine and has been seen on NBC4 News. David takes his love of the city and its surrounding neighborhoods beyond buying and selling — since moving D.C. in 1998, he has lived Shaw; Logan Circle; U Street; Woodley Park; Old Town, Alexandria; and Del Ray. He and his husband currently live in DC's Bloomingdale neighborhood. David also owns a home in Rehoboth Beach, DE and has vacationed there since the early 1990's. David is hooked on real estate shows and blogs, but he isn’t always thinking about home. An avid traveler, David has visited all seven continents including, most recently, Antarctica. David is licensed to sell real estate in the District of Columbia (DC), Virginia (VA), Maryland (MD) and Delaware (DE). What David's Clients are saying: "I can’t recommend David Shotwell highly enough – besides his awesome personality, he brings great knowledge of the Washington D.C. market, 24/7 responsiveness, an excellent team of people with him. With selling, he helped me stage my place and came up with an excellent and comprehensive “out of the gate” strategy that helped me elicit multiple offers and close quickly. With buying, he was on top of new listings, some even before they hit the market, and provided options and insights – plus lots of patience – which helped me find my new home." - Dave, Observatory Circle (seller) and Columbia Heights (buyer) “I have used David Shotwell in my last two real estate transactions, the first for the sale of an attached row home in Columbia Heights, and the second, a condo in Dupont Circle. In both instances David was very knowledgeable of the local market as well as my specific properties versus the comparable inventory. This allowed us to develop an appropriate pricing strategy which David was extremely knowledgeable in both explaining and executing. In both instances we received multiple offers over the asking price and both transactions were closed short order with minimal stress my part. His team was more than competent in the coordination of the closing process, again eliminating for stress me. I would definitely recommend David and his team for any real estate transaction. And now that I have sold my two places, I will using him again shortly to purchase my next home.” - Frank, Dupont Circle (seller) and Columbia Heights (seller) "As a first-time buyer, I was looking an agent the industry intelligence, appreciation of my best interests and patience to walk me through the process from start to finish – and David encompassed all of that and more. Anyone will realize after chatting with him for a couple of minutes that David’s charm stems from a genuine desire to make sure that his client is happy - and that is hugely important when making this kind of milestone decision. I can't imagine going through the buying process without an agent like David who pointed out new opportunities, calmly explained lengthy loan documents, patiently listened to my concerns and provided thoughtful, intelligent and actionable feedback. My buying process was well-planned, swift and without stress, primarily due David’s diligent follow-up with all parties, his consideration of my needs and concerns, and his funny and lighthearted company throughout the entire process. Point being, David is someone you want on your side when buying a home. Whether it is your first or your tenth, he is someone who you trust to get the job done (and to make you laugh a couple of times along the way). I'm extremely happy with my experience." - Matt, Logan Circle (buyer) "David Shotwell was totally outstanding and a complete professional. As empty nesters, it had been a while since we had bought or sold a home. He worked us through the entire process of selecting the right home for our needs, guiding us through the complex process of offers and counteroffers, to the final procedure of closing the deal. We are very happy clients. We would recommend David to anyone who needs a person to make it happen and yet be a person who is also very easy to work with while finding a home." - Julie & Rob, Alexandria (buyers)
title: Vice President and Realtor

description: About Brian Brian started his real estate business in October 2013 after a difference-making career as a Washington, D.C. public interest lawyer. For 13 years, he worked for the Brady Center to Prevent Gun Violence, fighting to reduce the scourge of gun violence on a national level. He also worked for organizations to protect voting rights and advocate around federal judgeships and issues before the U.S. Supreme Court. Brian brings the same commitment and tenacity to helping clients buy or sell homes that he did when he battled the gun industry in court. His legal background is an invaluable resource for his real estate clients. Brian has received numerous honors as his business has grown. He was recognized Washingtonian Magazine as a Top Producer in only his third year, and has continued to receive that honor each year since. He has also been recognized as a Top Producer Arlington Magazine, and Zillow has awarded him Best in Customer Service, Master of Client Happiness, and Best of Zillow. One of Brian's greatest strengths is his responsiveness and communication skills. He puts clients’ interests first, always working to achieve the best results for them. He thinks strategically when it comes to writing contracts and negotiating the best deal for home sellers. When you hire Brian as your realtor, you know you have a strong and skilled advocate on your side. In addition to providing his own expertise, Brian has excellent connections with a wide range of industry professionals he can enlist to help clients buy and sell homes, including lenders, title companies, home inspectors, contractors, stagers, and others. "As a Realtor®, my greatest joy is helping people make the same life transitions that I have experienced." - Brian Siebel, JD. Client Testimonials Scroll down for more ★★★★★ " Brian Siebel found us the house that we thought was impossible to find! We were impressed from the get-go with the comprehensive list of requirements that he had prepared for us to complete. His subsequent streamlined research proved to be highly productive with us finding our home in less than two weeks! His due diligence made the process seamless and productive. " - Tenzin and Tashi ★★★★★ " We’ve worked with no one more diligent than Brian Siebel. We can’t imagine any realtor outworking him or giving more of himself to his clients. As first time homebuyers, we lacked experience, knowledge, and – at times – confidence. Throughout the process, though, we knew that we could always count on Brian to be there to guide and support us. That, for us, was priceless. " - Andy and Kate ★★★★★ " I really appreciated working with Brian. He was really patient working with us over the past year (we found him on Zillow last summer) as our home search criteria evolved during that time. He was able to help us both sell our previous home and buy our current home all within the same month! It was a tight turn, but he helped guide us through to a successful completion. He was a good, steady influence throughout the process that could otherwise have gotten chaotic. Thank you again Brian. " - Bill ★★★★★ " My wife and I had the pleasure of working with Brian to purchase our first home. Brian was incredibly patient with us as we continued to explore northern Virginia and adjust to the realities of buying a home in a very competitive market. No matter how busy he was, we always felt like his number one client. When it was time to put in an offer, he very clearly walked us through the process so that we understood everything – it was truly a great learning experience. You will not find a more attentive agent – more than six months after closing, my wife texted Brian with a question and he responded same day. That truly sums up our experience with Brian. I can’t recommend him enough. " - Don ★★★★★ " Brian negotiated a at a price higher than our expectations for our house in "as is" condition. Because we moved out of state as soon as the house , he also took care of arranging for cleaning and necessary repairs and yard work, thus saving us a tremendous amount of long-distance dealing with . We recommend him as an agent without reservation. " - Linda ★★★★★ " Dealing with Brian was an absolute pleasure. I met him at an open house. He listened to my requirements and started sending me listings. After a few, he found me the perfect condo. On my behalf, he drove a hard bargain and I got the place for $50,000 below asking and $66,000 below the county appraisal. He then my house. Selling is always a nerve wracking experience. Nonetheless, he provided me with lists of reliable repair people. He even cleaned up my basement for me. In the end, he drove another hard bargain and my house for $32,000 more than listing. I could not be more pleased. " - Jim ★★★★★ " I highly recommend those interested in buying/selling a home in Northern Virginia to use Brian Siebel. After years of renting apartments in the DC and Virginia area my wife and I decided we were ready to purchase our first home. We were recommended to use Brian from our mortgage and it turned out great. As first time homebuyers we were very unsure of the process. Brian was extremely patient with us and took the time to explain everything we needed to know. Further, Brian showed us several homes for and provided honest feedback. We never felt pressured Brian to make a decision; rather he suggested we take the time we need to make our decision. When it was time to make an offer Brian was very prepared and worked with us to structure an offer for our new home. I highly recommend Brian and look forward to working with him in the future. " - Andrew and Jane
title: Vice President

description: About Courtney Courtney Sieloff is passionate about helping people find more than just a house. She’s dedicated to helping clients discover the place where their lives actually unfold. She knows a home is where memories are made, whether you’re raising a dog or kids, building relationships with neighbors, or putting down roots in a community you love. But she also understands that the right home needs to make sense on paper. It's vibes and it's money. Courtney brings a sharp financial perspective to every search, helping clients understand both the immediate numbers and the long-term wealth-building potential. Whether it’s a first home or a forever home, Courtney is committed to finding the space that feels just right for each new chapter. As a longtime DC resident, Courtney knows the city inside and out, from hidden neighborhood gems to the best grocery stores, kids' events, and drinks' spots. With 20 years of experience in digital communications, marketing, and audience targeting , she brings creativity, strategic insight, and a passion for people to every real estate journey. Her background as the CEO of a consulting firm, combined with expertise in storytelling, strategic marketing, and understanding diverse audiences , translates seamlessly to real estate. Courtney excels at marketing homes effectively and helping clients find communities where their stories can unfold. Courtney lives in DC’s Sixteenth Street Heights neighborhood with her husband, Luke, and their two kids; Annie is a 5th grader at LAMB, and Teddy is an 8th grader at Deal Middle School. They also have a doodle puppy Cleo, who enjoys eating everyone's shoes. When she’s not working with clients, Courtney loves running, hiking, diving into a great book, spending time with friends, and tackling her latest knitting project, though her yarn stash tends to outpace her progress. She volunteers with neighborhood groups and participates in the Knit for Food Knit-a-thon each spring supporting four food insecurity organizations.
title: Realtor® | Licensed in DC, MD, and VA

description: About Lewis Lewis Silber was born in the District of Columbia, and raised in Montgomery County, Maryland. Mr. Silber graduated Springbrook High School in 1985, received a Bachelor of Science Degree in Accounting from the University of Maryland in 1989, and his Juris Doctorate Degree from University of Baltimore School of Law in 1993. Mr. Silber brings with him a wealth of experience to include over 28 years as the principal attorney of THE SILBER LAW GROUP, LLC, in which he dedicated most of his practice representing individuals in serious criminal and personal injury cases. Mr. Silber’s broad background enables him to be able to quickly comprehend the needs of his clientele, and he approaches every client with a focus on listening, understanding, and providing practical solutions for even the most seemingly insurmountable situations. Mr. Silber has now decided to affiliate with one of the top brokerage teams both locally and nationally, and looks forward every day to helping current clientele with one of the most important investments of their lives. During his spare time, Lewis likes to spend time with his family, as well as, ride motorcycles and dabble in classic cars and antiques.
title: Realtor® | Licensed in MD & DC

description: About Jarrod Jarrod’s main focus is on his clients' needs. He believes in building and sustaining lifelong relationships with clients and colleagues alike. Through his extensive past experience in sales, Jarrod is able to negotiate the best possible results for all parties involved. Born and raised in New York City, Jarrod has spent every summer of his life in the Hamptons, and has been able to experience the full extent of what the East End has to offer. Jarrod began his career with Compass in Washington DC, and currently resides in the Hamptons full time, and is a member of The Kulman Harrison Team at Compass. In his free time, you can find him trying new restaurants or returning to old favorites, exploring local shops, working out at the Sag Harbor Gym, or surfing Montauk beaches in the early morning.
title: Licensed Real Estate Salesperson

description: About Jacquelyn Having been raised in a family of investors and interior designers, the real estate industry has always felt like home to Jackie. Growing up, dinner conversations typically revolved around property aesthetics and valuations, and it was not at all uncommon for a renovation project to turn into a family affair. After graduating from Appalachian State University, Jackie put her degree in Textiles to use as an interior designer, a role she thrived in due to her staging and finishing expertise. In 2004, Jackie officially launched her real estate career, combining her passion for transforming spaces with unparalleled local insight and business acumen. Thanks to her unique experience navigating construction projects, Jackie seamlessly guides her clients through the renovation process, always ensuring that she brings their distinct vision to life. As a seller’s advocate, Jackie empowers her clients to stage their homes in ways that yield the maximum return on investment. Jackie has lived in Washington, DC on Capitol Hill for more than 20 years. When she isn't selling houses, she loves spending time with her family, volunteering in her community, writing her blog, Row House Refuge, and taking advantage of the beauty and culture of the city she calls home.
title: Realtor

description: About Tyler Tyler Siperko, a Vice President and Realtor at Compass, licensed in DC/MD/VA for over a decade. In that time, Tyler has proven to possess a savvy understanding of both the professional and personal sides of real estate- and his results show it. He has sold well over 500+ homes in his career and has consistently been ranked as a Top Agent throughout the DMV. Tyler is a trusted, down-to-earth ally, who brings his strong work ethic, white glove customer service and a broad base of knowledge & experience to every real estate transaction. His fresh perspective translates into a sophisticated tech-driven approach to buying and selling homes. Tyler has an analytic side, which seamlessly translates to real estate success for both his buyer and seller clients. In addition, Tyler is known for his strong sense of home design and is an industry expert when it comes to preparing a home for the market. He is a true expert in guiding his clients to the highest return on investment when selling. Because of his tenure and business acumen, Tyler is an in-demand resource for buyers, sellers, and investors across the region -- which is no surprise if you talk to any of his clients regarding his detail-oriented customer service approach and his extensive knowledge on the real estate marketplace & current landscape. He is a proud Co-Team Leader of the highly regarded "The Group of Compass", a diverse team of agents devoted to bringing a customer-centered attitude to transactions. In his free time, Tyler enjoys exploring the great outdoors, nightlife and shopping.
title: Real Estate Advisor

description: About Pamela As a Senior Real Estate Specialist and Certified Aging in Place Specialist with over 20 years of experience, I take pride in being a trusted advocate for my clients in every aspect of the buying and selling process. My extensive knowledge of real estate contracts and regulations, coupled with my expertise in catering to the unique needs of senior clients, enables me to provide my clients with valuable insights and guidance throughout their journey. My passion for marketing, coupled with my strong negotiation skills and uncompromising standards, enables me to consistently deliver positive outcomes for my clients. I approach each transaction with unlimited energy and dedication, ensuring that every detail is carefully considered and executed to perfection. My business background is rooted in marketing, event management, and community outreach, which makes me a natural fit for real estate sales and investments. Over the years, I have developed a wide network throughout metropolitan Washington DC, having spearheaded numerous communications and community service campaigns for high-profile clients such as Whole Foods Market, White Flint Mall, Golden Triangle Business Improvement District, Balducci's, the Corcoran Museum of Art, the National Geographic Society, and the Susan B. Komen Race for the Cure. I hold an MBA in Marketing from The George Washington University, as well as a Bachelor of Science from the University of Connecticut. Currently residing in Foggy Bottom/Washington, DC, I am committed to providing exceptional service to clients throughout the area. With me by your side, you can trust that your real estate needs will be met with the utmost professionalism, authenticity, and care.
title: REALTOR® | Licensed in DC & MD

description: About Diego Diego is a native to the DC Metropolitan Area. He grew up in Bethesda, Maryland’s quaint Greenwich Forest neighborhood and attended Walt Whitman High School & Robert Morris University. As a buyer’s representative, Diego can find a residence that will fit your unique needs and preferences. In addition to his local expertise, the relationships he and the group have forged with lenders, title experts, and home builders ensures every part of the home buying process can be as efficient as possible. As a seller’s representative, he brings a unique perspective due to his familiarity with what buyers in Lower Montgomery County and The District are truly looking for. Being a native, he possesses a comprehensive knowledge of the area. By previously working as a communications intern, pursuing his passion for politics and community involvement, he gained a great understanding of what it’s like to commute, work and play in the city. Diego is a quick study possessing a strong work ethic and personable nature. As a result, he was able to secure a position as an associate of the Galanti Group, a premier Real Estate team of professionals that has sold over 1 billion in properties in the DC area. He is committed to providing his clients with a focused, energetic and highly personalized service.
title: Realtor

description: About Mindy Whether you're relocating to the DMV or beyond, let's make your journey as smooth, exciting and stressfree as possible when looking for your dream home!
title: Realtor®

description: About SK Fine Homes SK Fine Homes, founded in 2006 by Eve Shapiro and Viveca Stahl Kazarian, is a team of committed professionals operating throughout VA, DC, and MD with over $150M in sales. With strong interpersonal skills and a sound understanding of local market conditions, this seasoned team provides their clients, whether buying and/or selling, with the skill set needed to successfully navigate through the intricacies of the transactions, remaining enthusiastic advocates and effective communicators every step of the way. With a record of stellar performance, this partnership brings you expertise in working with and alongside people, offering well-honed negotiating skills, as well as resourceful, knowledgeable, and dependable service in managing your real estate needs. Our principles are founded on hard work, trust and integrity. We show up and we roll up our sleeves whenever clients call. Going the extra mile is often where the difference is defined. We will earn the right to keep your trust at every turn from start to finish by our desire to show you that we care. Expect total honesty and straight shooting from us in every communication. Drawing from our wide network and resources, we offer a range of services including complimentary consultations on updates and staging, to cutting-edge technology for optimal sales exposure on a global scale. In addition, Viveca brings her extensive international background to include her fluent linguistic skills in Swedish, French, Arabic and German.

About Fran Fran moved from Ponte Vedra Beach, Florida to Alexandria, Virginia in 2008. Although, she missed the beach, she quickly fell in love with the Northern Virginia area and adopted Alexandria as her new home thanks to all of the local amenities and atmosphere. Prior to becoming a Realtor, Fran worked in the Adult Beverage Industry, managing various distributors for Beam Global. Her background in sales, management, marketing, and customer service provides a solid foundation for being a Professional Realtor. Honesty, integrity, determination, and dedication are the core of her beliefs. Fran knows that being a successful Realtor requires listening to client needs, and being an excellent negotiator and communicator. She is passionate about real estate and strives to make every transaction seamless to help her clients achieve THEIR real estate goals. As a result, she builds business relationships, and lifelong relationships with her clients. Fran is licensed in VA, DC, and MD and has extensive knowledge and experience throughout the region. In her spare time, Fran enjoys spending time with her husband and two dogs, Ember and Murphy. They like to go boating with the dogs of course, and play golf. She also enjoys gardening and exercise.
title: REALTOR®

description: About Smart Living Experts Meet the Smart Living Experts Selling your home can be easy. Let our experienced staff help you make it happen. Smart Living Experts is a proud member of the Nation’s most technology-driven brokerage, Compass. Their impeccable track records as Top Producers, their experience, their relationships within the brokerage community, and their unwavering commitment to their client’s best interests have made them among the top teams in the area. Smart Living Experts is a client-focused real estate team comprised of experienced real estate professionals. We are rooted in a solid foundation of client service, cutting edge marketing, and social media.

About Jennifer Meet Jenn Smira, a billion-dollar-producing agent and entrepreneur leading a luxury real estate team in the Nation’s Capital and surrounding suburbs. Originally from Portland, Oregon, Jenn transitioned from a career in technology to becoming one of Washington, DC’s top real estate agents known for her sharp market insight, strategic thinking, and tenacity. Beyond real estate, she has founded several successful ventures in the fintech and settlement sectors using her visionary approach to redefine industries. In 2014, Jenn was an original founding agent at Compass playing a key role in launching and expanding the brand across the DC Metro Area. She then went on to become the founder and CEO of Jenn Smira & Co., which became the #1 Compass team in the DMV in 2019, 2020, and 2022, and is currently ranked the #3 large team in all of DC as of 2025. Today, she leads a powerhouse team of 16 agents—local experts across residential real estate, commercial transactions, and new development sales. With over $2 billion in career sales, Jenn Smira & Co. is widely recognized for delivering results with a relationship-driven approach. The team serves hundreds of families annually, with over 80% of their business derived from referrals and repeat clients. Jenn is also a proud member of Compass Sports & Entertainment , a hand-selected network of just 170 agents across 75 markets nationwide. This elite group is dedicated to delivering a tailored, white-glove real estate experience for exclusive clientele. Jenn’s success stems from her unwavering commitment to helping each client achieve their unique goals. She believes her clients deserve nothing less than excellence, which drives her to continually push herself to new heights as both a businesswoman and a person. When she’s not working or honing her skills, Jenn enjoys spending quality time with her family, embracing the outdoors, boating along Delaware’s scenic shores, playing pickleball and basketball, and indulging her love for sports. Visit www.JennSmira.com to learn more about Jenn Smira & Co. and how they can help bring your real estate goals to life.
title: Realtor | Executive Vice President | Member - Sports & Entertainment Division

description: About Dominique Dominique Smith has been serving the DMV as a licensed realtor for over a decade. She is licensed in Maryland, Virginia and Washington, DC. As a PG County native, she’s witnessed its great transformation and growth. Her intimate knowledge of this region, and her experiences of having lived here all her life gives her enthusiasm and a desire to make her home, your home. She has a strong passion for real estate and helping clients achieve their desired goals. She has worked in various positions in the real estate industry before deciding to pursue her career as a licensed realtor. As a Realtor, her priority is to make her clients happy. She listens to her clients wants and needs to achieve the best outcome in every transaction and she strives to ensure that the home buying or selling process is fun, easy and stress-free. She is dedicated to educating her clients and providing high-quality service to exceed their expectations. Dominique is known for her extensive knowledge and unmatched devotion to her clients. She works tirelessly on behalf of her clients and always offering candid advice. Her clients can count on her any time of day when they have a question or concern. Her business is based on more than 90 percent referrals from satisfied clients. Most important to Dominique is providing the most excellent service to buyers and sellers in order to earn their trust, referrals, repeat business and build lifelong relationships. Dominique is also a wife, and mother of two children. She enjoys spending time with family, watching sports and traveling to new places.
title: Realtor®

description: About Courtney When you entrust your real estate goals to Courtney Smith, your success becomes her number one priority. Originally from The Washington Metropolitan Area, Courtney has been passionate about real estate since the beginning of her career in Property Management and entrepreneurial investments in 2011. Courtney always knew that she wanted to extend her path to helping others and found her true calling in real estate serving her clients and guiding them through one of the biggest investments of their lives. Courtney has seen the transformation of Development in the DMV area, This knowledge, coupled with her 10 year experience in Property Management, has provided her with valuable skills that she uses daily in real estate negotiations, educating homebuyers and sellers, and effectively marketing the team’s listings. “I believe that your home is your sanctuary, and should be treated as such. Whether you’re buying your first home or seeking that dream retirement residence, the experience should be nothing less than seamless. As a Mother and homeowner myself, I understand that your home is more than just a place to live—it’s where you make long-lasting memories, Lean on me—my team and I are here to keep the process fluid, successful, and as low-stress as possible.” Courtney is dedicated to providing a turnkey experience with exclusivity, confidentiality, and professionalism in every transaction.
title: Realtor®, Licensed in MD

description: About Karen Karen is a proud fifth-generation Washingtonian, deeply rooted in the vibrant and culturally rich environment of the metropolitan Washington, DC area. As the daughter of a WWII veteran, she carries a legacy of service and dedication, which fuels her passion for real estate and her desire to serve military families in their housing needs. Karen's love for real estate is driven by her commitment to client advocacy, where she leverages her extensive market knowledge to guide clients through the complexities of buying and selling properties. She is particularly drawn to the area's diversity and versatility, which she believes are key to its dynamic real estate market. Her expertise is further validated by her impressive credentials, including GRI Realtor, ABR, SRS, MRP, and RENE designations, which underscore her dedication to professional excellence. Beyond her professional achievements, Karen is a passionate advocate for mental health, often engaging in community events to raise awareness. In her personal time, she enjoys immersing herself in the local music scene, with a particular fondness for jazz and gospel. She also loves reading and attending cultural events, which enrich her understanding of the community she serves. Karen's deep-rooted connection to Washington, DC, combined with her professional expertise and personal passions, make her a standout real estate agent. Her dedication to serving the community's real estate needs, especially those of military families, is unwavering, and she is committed to helping her clients find their perfect home in this diverse and culturally rich area.
title: REALTOR®

description: About David David and Patty Smith have called the DMV home for over 45 years and have been helping families succeed in the DMV real estate market since 2006. With an average of $50 million in sales annually, our focus is in providing personalized service to every client that meets them where they are, whether their goal is to buy or sell a home in the DC Metro area. One of the things we love the most about our work is the opportunity to provide our years of expertise and our cutting edge knowledge of the market in a way that is customized to the personal journey of each client. When you work with us, you have an expert advocate that will source homes for you before they come to market and even those that are never advertised online at all. You will be the first to see a home, and you will have the most thorough information about that home's history, upgrade information and market value available. From Sunday to Saturday, we are there to consult with you by phone and in person when you're considering making a move. We'll educate you about every aspect that you should consider when it comes time to make that important decision about buying or selling a home. With over $500 million in lifetime sales, our production placed us in the Top 1% of Coldwell Banker Agents Worldwide from 2019 - 2025. We are also honored to be recognized as Top Producers by Northern Virginia Magazine, Washingtonian Magazine and are ranked by RealTrends America Ranked in the Top 1.5% Agents in USA as well as in the America's Top 100 Agents. Born in Detroit to a single mother, David is a cancer warrior and survivor who has lived in the DMV since 1976. Born in NY to an Army Veteran, Patty has lived in the DMV since 1981. She uses her own childhood experience of relocating often to connect to her clients, especially those who move into our area to serve our Country. From Generals to first time buyers, we help every client with the same level of expertise and dedication, because we have an in-depth knowledge of the communities in the DMV area. Patty was recently interviewed by the Washington Post, where she shared her expertise in how first time home buyers can successfully buy a home in this challenging market. We believe that community matters, so our goal is to help you find the community that feeds your soul. From there, we can find the house that speaks to you. We are thrilled to start our own new chapter by joining Compass! The unmatched technology and dedication that Compass provides to its agents enables us to provide the very best support to each of our clients.
title: Realtor®

description: About Sabrey Real estate is the latest career in a string of successes for Sabrey Smith. An accomplished hip hop artist — with albums, a European tour and all — Sabrey understands the benefits of collaborating with the right partner. A true people person, he decided to move to real estate after working in the restaurant industry to build relationships with his clients and help them fulfill their dreams. Sabrey wants his clients to know that he is truly invested in their growth. By focusing on their best interests, he makes real estate transactions a fun and easy experience. Recently engaged with a baby girl on the way, Sabrey loves to travel and enjoys live events, whether music, sports or theater. His beloved dog, a Boxer/American Staffordshire mix, is always by his side. Sabrey is originally from Chicago and has lived in D.C. since 2008.
title: Realtor® Licensed in DC, MD & VA

description: About David Born Oxford, England and raised Washington, DC, David Snider earned a degree in Photography and has worked as a documentary video producer and editor ABC News Nightline, National Geographic, HBO, Al-Jazeera and The Washington Post. He explored issues such as racial discrimination against black famers in the South, innovative military medical procedures in wartime, and the struggle for civil rights and independence the blind community. David's real estate clients enjoy the same commitment that he expressed as a dedicated Visual Storyteller. His passion, integrity, and focusing on his clients needs has created life-long friendships. Specializing in renovated homes in the DC metropolitan area, he works with clients who rely on his tenacity and negotiating skills. Vacations are rare, but he enjoys traveling with his family.
title: Mollaan Babbington Group | Realtor

description: About Ben Ben is a 4th generation and lifelong Washington, D.C. resident who has been involved in all aspects of the real estate industry. Learning the business from the ground up working for his father’s development , Ben honed his multi-level skillset concentrating on land acquisition, project , IT and sales. Known by his clients for his sincerity, dedication and excellent communication and negotiation skills, Ben is a full-service agent whose straightforward approach has brought success for his clients. His sales include condos, townhomes and single-family properties. Ben attended Ohio Wesleyan University where he played lacrosse and finished his college career at The University of Denver. Ben, his wife Kim, and their dog Parker now reside in Georgetown.
title: Realtor®

description: About Erin Erin is a trusted real estate agent to buyers and sellers of all price points and diverse investment goals. With more than 20 years in real estate, client services, marketing, and project management, she provides comprehensive services throughout the sales process. Her clients appreciate her professionalism and calm demeanor to provide enjoyable home buying and selling experiences. Erin’s broad knowledge of the DC metropolitan area is rooted in her upbringing in Rockville and experiences living in DC, Montgomery, Fairfax, and Arlington Counties. Now, she lives in the greater Georgetown area (Northwest DC) and plays an active role in community programs. Together with her husband and three young children, she enjoys taking advantage of the city’s amenities -- especially biking on the Capital Crescent, hiking in Glover Archbold Park and dining at neighborhood restaurants. Through these personal experiences, she helps her clients focus their goals and ensure that her clients’ needs stay a top priority.
title: Realtor

description: About Petra Petra Socolovsky has grown her business rapidly by expertly helping her clients navigate DC’s changing real estate market. With determination and caring, she prioritizes each seller or buyer’s unique situation and ensures an outcome that consistently outperforms the market. Born in Sweden, Petra was a foreign correspondent for Swedish Public Radio for almost two decades. She has lived in Spain, Germany and the Netherlands and speaks five languages. Petra has always been drawn to real estate, and with her distinct sense of style and eye for investment opportunities she renovated historic homes in four countries. Among her favorite projects are a canal house loft in the heart of Amsterdam and a mountain villa in Madrid that once belonged to King Alfonso XIII’s personal physician. In 2010, Petra relocated to Washington DC and instantly fell in love with the architecture and people of the city. In representing buyers and sellers primarily in northwest DC, Petra prides herself in providing personalized service and strategic advice. And in a city where market conditions can vary from block to block, and from week to week, Petra’s research skills and deep knowledge of the local market have proven to be great assets to her clients. Petra lives in Mount Pleasant with her husband and their two sons.
title: Realtor® Licensed in MD, DC & VA

description: About Luis Social Media Instagram Facebook Luis's Concierge Page Client Testimonials Scroll down for more ★★★★★ Luis was great to work with. He was always responsive no matter the day of week or the time of day. We saw so many houses and he always was available to fit in the showings and the couple pre-inspections we had. His guesses for the price houses were going to be sold for ended up being very close all but one time. We definitely would use him again and recommend him to friends." - Bought a Townhouse home in 2020 in Near Northeast, Washington, DC. ★★★★★ "Luis was amazing finding the right place for me! He walks me through the whole process and handle any possible problem! I am very thankful to have him as my real estate agent and make this possible! Thank you, Luis!" - Bought a Condo home in 2020 in Silver Spring, MD ★★★★★ "Luis was very helpful in getting us into the home we wanted, he worked tireless before, during and after the process to ensure that we were happy with our purchase. Luis is very professional, courteous, friendly and provides excellent advice in purchasing a home for the first-time buyer, and when it came to our business transaction, he handled it as if it was his own. We will highly recommend Luis to anyone!" - Sold a Single- home in 2020 in Germantown, MD ★★★★★ "I’ve always been skeptical with realtors, but he was AMAZING! Even though we were having trouble deciding he was very patient, friendly and honest! Me and my are so grateful I couldn’t be happier! He did a great job I recommend him 100%" - Bought a Single- home in 2019 in Germantown, MD ★★★★★ "Very knowledgeable of the area and ask’s what’s your preferences before showing you the home of your dreams. He also checks in on you without being annoying. He’s the real deal! Awesome guy! He showed us four homes on the first day we met, and we actually picked the first one. He knew exactly what we were looking for." - Bought a Single- home in 2020 in Waldorf, MD ★★★★★ "Luis was outstanding! He was extremely knowledgeable about the entire process and made my husband and I feel comfortable. We were nervous about buying a home, but Luis made us feel at ease right away. He was organized and very responsive to calls, emails and texts. Luis made this experience an enjoyable one even in the midst of a pandemic!" - Bought a home in 2020 in Bonneville, Waldorf, MD 20603. Luis's expertise extends across a broad spectrum of property types, from residential and luxury properties to condominiums, single homes, and townhomes. This versatility underscores his ability to cater to a diverse clientele and provide tailored solutions to meet their specific requirements. His comprehensive knowledge and experience in the Greater Maryland, Virginia, Washington DC, and Florida real estate markets showcase his expertise in multiple regions. This is crucial for clients who are seeking properties or opportunities in these geographically distinct areas. Luis's ability to provide localized knowledge and insights across these regions allows him to tailor his services to meet the specific needs of clients in each area. Whether clients are looking to buy or sell real estate in Maryland, Virginia, Washington DC, or Florida, they can benefit from his comprehensive understanding of these markets, ensuring a smooth and informed real estate transaction process. Luis's unwavering commitment to his clients is a central theme in his professional approach. He takes every measure to ensure his clients' goals are achieved and strives to provide the most comprehensive and distinguished real estate services possible. His extensive network of professionals and satisfied clients is a testament to his dedication to excellence and his ability to maintain lasting relationships built on trust and value. Moreover, Luis's negotiation skills and problem-solving abilities are highly regarded. He approaches challenging situations, such as multiple offers or tough negotiations, with creativity and strategy, ensuring the best possible outcomes for his clients. Ultimately, Luis's aim is to guide his clients through the real estate transaction process, ensuring they receive an exceptional and personalized experience. His commitment to excellence and the satisfaction of his clients makes him a trusted and valuable partner in the real estate industry.
title: Lic.in FL, DC, MD & VA

description: About Genesis Genesis is excited to utilize all her experience and knowledge to help navigate her clients through the multi-faceted world of real estate transactions. She is dedicated to providing round the clock attention, for a more personalized approach through the buying and selling process. Clients are meant to treated like family and she treats them as such. Genesis has a strong background in the title industry where she gained valuable experience in real estate transactions and the intricacies of property ownership. This gives her the upper hand in forseeing possible roadblocks that many others would not consider. In her free time Genesis volunteers for “CASA”, a non-profit organization that provides support and guidance for the youths of Washington D.C. She has a passion for giving back to the community and leaving smiles on the faces of those who cross her path. Would you like to be one of those people?
title: Realtor® | Licensed in Virginia

description: About Sam Sam's real estate mantra is Live Where Life Happens. It represents a commitment to work with clients who aspire to simplify their lives by choosing walkable neighborhoods or those just a short drive to vibrant city centers where great food, entertainment, and community engagement are readily available. Sam's clientele shares his belief that shorter commutes, and less driving in general, helps to cultivate a happy home where the surrounding community is an extension of the family residence. In 2015 Sam was the #1 producing agent at his prior firm's Chevy Chase office of 100+ agents, Sam's individual annual production reached $25M in the years before he moved to Compass. In the Fall of 2017, Sam accepted a position as Vice President at Compass, which is now the #1 brokerage by sales volume in the DC market. Compass is leading the way by providing cutting edge technology and services to their agents, buyers and sellers. Sam's Compass volume regularly averages between $20M and $30M per year. In 2019, Sam launched The Solovey Group at Compass and brought on seasoned agents Orysia Stanchak, Jon Solovey and Mary Zitello who each have long and successful track records in real estate. Sam works with clients at all life stages but especially enjoys first and second time buyers and sellers as well as those down-sizing from the house where they have lived many years. He also carves out time to work with investors who wish to expand their portfolio.
