Licensed in DC, MD, VA, and DE, Sam serves all facets of the home buying and selling process across the entire DC Metro region as well as the sought after beach towns of Rehoboth and Lewes, Delaware. Client Testimonials ★★★★★ " Sam was tremendous. We are first-time homebuyers and had a lot to learn about pretty much everything relating to home buying and ownership. There was no question or issue too small for Sam's full attention, and we knew right from our first interaction that he was someone who cares deeply about the people he's helping, not just making a sale. Our search lasted roughly three months and Sam's guidance was crucial during every phase of the search. Whether it was in formulating our priorities, digging deeper on property details, or final negotiations, Sam was always willing and able to provide all the information needed for us to make decisions. He would regularly say that these decisions were ours, but his emails were usually so thorough that we'd have been crazy not to follow his advice. This attention to detail did not wane even during the early days of the COVID-19 pandemic, although we would not have blamed Sam if it did! Ultimately, we are happy in our new home but we did have a tinge of regret after purchase knowing that we'd no longer get to work with Sam. " ★★★★★ " I enjoyed and appreciated working with Sam. Sam is smart, direct and honest. He thinks creatively about how to achieve the outcome one is looking for, and he has excellent resources to call upon. I also liked that Sam is very responsive to all forms of communication. The sale of our house was drama free, and Sam guided us smoothly through the process. Everything and more than we expected or hoped for! " ★★★★★ " We had an absolutely fantastic experience working with Sam to sell our condo. As a family with young kids, we were concerned about how time consuming the process would be. Sam took care of absolutely everything, from staging and getting the unit ready to helping us get the paperwork filled in via email and online platforms, and negotiating the best deal – he made it simple, efficient and quick. We couldn’t have asked for more, not to mention the great sale price. "
title: Vice President | Realtor® Licensed in DC, MD, VA & DE

description: About JoJo A native of North Carolina, JoJo Spallone brings a unique combination of real estate insight, design sensibility, and deep community involvement to her role at the Taylor Agostino Group at Compass. She began her career in private and mortgage banking at Branch Banking and Trust, where she gained valuable experience in the financial side of real estate transactions. JoJo later led strategic initiatives at EagleBank, managing high-profile projects such as the EagleBank Bowl and the bank’s sponsorship of the U.S. Open. Her professional accomplishments are matched by a strong commitment to community service. She has served on both the board and advisory board of Fair Chance, a D.C.-based nonprofit supporting underserved youth and families, and played a key role in growing Families4Families, an organization focused on addressing food insecurity in the DMV. At the Taylor Agostino Group, JoJo has found her stride as a trusted advisor, guiding clients through every step of the buying and selling process. With a sharp eye for design and a passion for helping homes reach their full potential, she works closely with sellers to identify thoughtful, cost-effective updates that highlight a property’s best features and appeal to today’s buyers. JoJo lives in Chevy Chase with her husband, Rob, and their two sons.
title: Agent | Licensed in DC & MD

description: About Janice Born in Virginia, and raised in Southern Maryland, Janice has been in the DC Metro region for her entire life. She has been building her real estate career for over a decade and believes in creating a smooth and low stress process for all of her clients. In 2018, Janice was named a 30 under 30 honoree given by the National Association of Realtors and Realtor Magazine. She works tirelessly to ensure that her clients are treated fairly, honestly, and recognizes that her value is in negotiating and managing her clients' real estate process from start to finish. Janice is a proud graduate of Elon University and an avid Washington D.C. sports fan. She loves to read thrillers + memoirs and when not working you can catch her with friends and family eating across the DMV. She is licensed in Maryland, Virginia and Washington D.C. and can help you buy, rent, or sell a home. Give her a call today!
title: REALTOR®

description: About S & P Homes of Compass The S&P Homes Team of Compass have successfully assisted clients in fulfilling their real estate dreams since 2003. With a combined 40+ years of real estate experience and over $325 million in career sales we have a proven track record. Our team members bring a varied background of experiences including sales, marketing, interior design and technology to help each client navigate the competitive real estate market. Living and working in the DMV area for the majority of our lives, we are able to provide invaluable local and neighborhood market knowledge. Buyers, sellers and investors trust our team to offer insight, solutions and exceptional client service. With 100% five star reviews and 95% referral and repeat business, the Sondra & Pam Team is dedicated to creating a seamless and successful real estate transaction for you. Meet the Team Sondra Mulheron | Pam Schiattareggia | Cathy Johnson | Vince Sbarra
title: Licensed Realtors in DC, MD & VA

description: About Danielle After graduating from the University of Maryland, Danielle fell in love with the DC area. For 16 years she worked as a Global Account Executive in strategic sales & operations for a publicly traded technology company, but in 2017 Danielle decided to take a leap of faith and follow her true passion for real estate. Danielle prides herself on hard work, preparation and dedication. She is recognized for her unparalleled work ethic, executive-level negotiation expertise, instinctive sense of design and well-honed listening skills. In her six years at Compass she has racked up numerous notable sales, but more importantly she has earned respect from her end-user and investor/developer clients as well as her peers. Danielle truly enjoys collaborating with colleagues and clients and works tirelessly to deliver individualized attention, energy and creativity each and every time. As an avid foodie, in her spare time Danielle heads to the kitchen to unwind and experiment with new recipes or cook up a feast for her friends and family. She enjoys traveling, exploring the restaurant scene, playing tennis, skiing, and finding her zen with a yoga class or meditation. Danielle has also spent close to a decade involved in fundraising projects in support of Multiple Myeloma Research Foundation (MMRF) and the Dana-Farber Cancer Institute, both very dear to her heart.
title: REALTOR® DC | MD | VA

description: About Kendall For buyers and sellers alike, Kendall will take the time to recognize your goals and help you achieve them. As a founding Agent of Compass DC, she’s well equipped with the experience and knowledge to provide the best service. While maintaining core values that transfer universally, she tailors each transaction to best obtain her clients’ goals. After receiving a B.A. in Communications from the University of Texas at San Antonio, Kendall moved to Washington, DC, and immersed herself in the community. Her decision to enter residential real estate came partly from her love of DC homes, design and decorating, and also from her previous experience in Commercial Real Estate Development. Early in her career, she began by purchasing, renovating, and selling investment properties. She then moved to longer-term holds, by purchasing several investment properties where she focused on high-end, historic row homes within walking distance to DC’s prime sightseeing locations. Within weeks of launching and forming a team to manage the properties, they were all ranked in the 99th percentile on VRBO and Airbnb. Kendall attributes a lot of her success to her knowledge of the market and the individual neighborhoods that make up the DMV, her ability to extend exceptional customer service and her genuine enthusiasm for real estate. She is uniquely suited to assist in all phases of buying and selling Real Estate, from the first-time homebuyer to the savvy investor. When much is given, much is expected. Kendall has heard this phrase from her father since she was a child, and it's her driving principle. Kendall appreciates that clients give much trust in her, and therefore, much is expected of her. Kendall serves on the board of DCWise, is a founding board member of Women Empower Global, and enjoys working on the fun, yet impossible goal of mastering golf!
title: Realtor

description: About Harrison Harrison Spurzem is a dedicated real estate professional living in Washington, DC. Before moving to DC, Harrison matriculated from the College of William & Mary in 2019 with a degree in economics. In college, Harrison was a member of the crew (rowing) team and purchased his first home so that he and his friends could all live together. Over the summers, he renovated the house himself. Harrison took pride in attending a liberal arts college. He supplemented his economics education by taking various electives in subjects such as Chinese culture, world religion, art history, literature, computer science, math, finance, speech, and piano. Between college and moving to DC, Harrison returned to his beloved hometown of Charlottesville, VA, where he worked as a leasing agent and maintenance manager at an apartment community. He then began working in construction for the historic Preston Court Apartments renovation and was soon promoted to project manager and superintendent. He moved to DC to be with his then-girlfriend in Spring 2021. Growing up, Harrison was always surrounded by real estate, as his father is an investor and developer. Harrison attended a Quaker middle/high school, where he played on the tennis team and practiced art in silversmithing, stained glass, and ceramics. Beyond his professional pursuits, Harrison finds joy in maintaining an active lifestyle. He also cherishes quality time with friends. Harrison's other hobbies include listening to music, reading the news, playing tennis, and gaming. Harrison is a lifelong sports fan who roots for the Virginia Cavaliers, Boston Red Sox, Boston Celtics, and New England Patriots. In the summers, he enjoys watersports and fishing at Smith Mountain Lake. Harrison prides himself on his honesty, forthrightness, and positive demeanor. With an eye for detail and an appreciation for each property's unique nature, Harrison is committed to helping clients find their perfect home or investment property in the dynamic neighborhoods of DC, Maryland, and Virginia. He also works as a property manager. Harrison lives in the vibrant 14 th St. Corridor with his Australian Shepherd, with whom he can often be seen on walks in Meridian Hill Park.

About Amy Amy is a licensed Realtor® servicing VA, DC, MD, NC and SC. In the real estate industry since 2012. Amy began her journey with a title company. As an often over-looked perspective, working in title provided a foundation and carefully built network she utilizes to benefit her clients. Over the course of her 12 years in real estate, Amy has mostly worked as a solo agent, personally attending to her clients' specific needs. She has been named in a number of publications as a "Top Agent," and recognized by the Northern Virginia Association of Realtors as a Multi-million dollar producer. She has sold well over $100m+ and done over 100 transactions to date. While continuing to build upon knowledge and experience, Amy has served numerous military families, first-time home buyers, investors of all kinds, move-up buyer/sellers, retirees and more. Amy is passionate about providing value to her clients and helping them achieve their real estate goals through strategy, direct communication and outside-the-box thinking. She is a proud mother of 2 children, military spouse, and Penn State graduate.
title: Realtor®

description: About Viveca Viveca is a transplanted Swede, well-integrated in the local community McLean and Falls Church. As an expat child, she spent her formative years in several countries across Europe and the Middle East. With a keen interest in Real Estate she began her studies in Sweden, after completing her B.Sc. in International Business & Marketing and an AA degree in Arabic at the University of Lund, Sweden in 1992. She jumped into the US real estate market in 2006 to realize her passion, which had already begun a few years earlier in Stockholm, and co-founded the SK Group with business partner Eve Shapiro, creating a premiere real estate team that offers unparalleled service for sellers and buyers of prime real estate in the Metropolitan DC Area with over 130M to date as they service VA, DC and MD. With her extensive travels, multiple language proficiencies as well as her exposure to several cultures, she acquired an aptness for the cultural play in business. Coupled with her adept social skills, keen sense for mediation and her persistent drive to perform, Viveca has the unique ability to overcome hurdles and difficulties that often arise in real estate transactions. Viveca is fluent in English, French, German, Arabic and Swedish. The SK Group has done more than $130M in home sales to date. Our principles are founded on hard work, trust and integrity. We show up and we roll up our sleeves whenever clients call. Going the extra mile is often where the difference is defined. We will earn the right to keep your trust at every turn from start to finish by our desire to show you that we care. Expect total honesty and straight shooting from us in every communication.
title: Associate Broker, REALTOR® VA | MD | DC

description: About Zabrine Before Zabrine was a real estate professional, she was an excited 22-year-old DMV native experiencing the home buying process for the first time. This process made her realize that buying or selling a home is more than just a transaction; it’s a life-changing experience. Her passion and love of people made her want to help families realize their real estate dreams, just as she had realized hers. Zabrine is a graduate of the University of Virginia Business School with a degree in and Management. With over 16 years of sales and experience, she has proudly an outstanding sales record and long list of satisfied clients. Her extensive sales experience includes, but is not limited to: new home construction sales, first-time buyers, sellers and real estate investors. Zabrine values education and she is constantly staying up to date with top-notch and negotiation techniques. With her involvement in over 300 real estate transactions and her wealth of area knowledge as a DMV Native, you can trust that she is an expert when it comes to navigating the entire sales process. Zabrine's personalized approach will help you identify all that you love about your home, or all that you are looking to find in your next home. Zabrine's past clients can attest, her personal promise to you is that she will make the home buying or selling process as easy and hassle-free as possible while still maximizing your profits and making sure you are completely satisfied and comfortable with your sale. Client Testimonials Scroll down for more ★★★★★ " Zabrine is knowledgeable, energetic and very conscious of the needs of her clients. My experience with her was one of the most memorable, fun times of my engagement! She is like . " ★★★★★ " We cannot say enough good things about Zabrine. Over a year ago, long before we were serious about a home purchase, she sat down with us and went over everything we needed to know about the , the process, what to look for, etc, despite us being some distance from a serious purchase. Over the next year, we were passively looking, but Zabrine was always quick to respond to any question we had about a type of sale or detail, and never once made us feel rushed or let us down. Finally, a full year later we found the right home for us and enlisted Zabrine's help for a highly competitive . She jumped into action right away, helping us arrange our documentation and assisting us with quick pre approval so that we could make a healthy offer. Within 36 hours of seeing the home, Z had us ready to make an offer that was right for us and still competitive in the circumstances. And with her hard work and a bit of luck, our offer was accepted and she landed us a home we love and cherish. On the backend of the buying process, she was just as a good, rapidly arranging everything needed for our so that it could be done within a matter of weeks per the seller's request. It was a whirlwind, but at no point did we feel stranded or in the dark because she always made herself available for any issue, large or small. It's a testament to her skill and the quality of the people she works with that there wasn't a single hitch in our home buying process, despite it happening so quickly. She has made us clients for life, and we cannot recommend her highly enough. Thank you Zabrine! " ★★★★★ " Zabrine helped us buy our home in Falls Church, VA. She is very knowledgeable, responsive and professional at all times. She provided us with helpful feedback when we went to different open houses. She is a great listerner and takes notes to make sure she knows what you want in a home. We took our time to search for the perfect home and she never put any pressure on us. I would strongly recommend her to any first time home buyers and any other person looking to buy a house. She made the home buying process easy for us and helped us find our first home. I really appreciate her help and the time she took. " ★★★★★ " Zabrine, is far one of the best realtors I've worked with. She is extremely knowledgeable of the and is equally as energetic and enthusiastic when it comes to working with her clients. " - Josh ★★★★★ " Zabrine was attentive, responsive, extremely patient, and extraordinarily thorough throughout the process of selling our current home and buying our next home. Would absolutely recommend her to anyone buying or selling in or around Arlington. " - Matt
title: Realtor® Licensed in VA, MD & DC

description: About Orysia Orysia’s passion for helping others led her to pursue a career in real estate. Combining her background with her one-of-a-kind approach to the business, Orysia has established herself as one of DC’s leading real estate resources. Known for her outside-the-box approach, Orysia has a track record of producing truly uncommon results for her clients. She understands that buying or selling a home is an extremely personal decision, and enjoys helping people through their journey. She prides herself on putting her clients first - making sure they feel confident and comfortable with every decision throughout the process. When working with Orysia toward the or purchase of your home, there is no set formula. She tailors a customized strategy to accomplish your goals based on what is most important to you - always making your best interests her first priority. The result of Orysia’s unique approach to real estate is clients who are completely satisfied with every aspect of their transaction. Originally from Boston, Orysia was raised in a Ukrainian community and instilled with a strong work ethic from a young age. After earning her bachelor’s degree from Northeastern University, she worked with the Boston Housing Authority. In 1995, she moved to Washington DC for a role with the Housing Research Foundation before serving as Executive Director for the YWCA National Capital Area, spearheading a program that taught indigent women the construction trade. These roles provided Orysia with valuable insight into handling real estate and housing issues, while confirming her passion to have a positive impact on people’s lives. Her personal experience with homeownership and renovation also provided Orysia with a strong grasp of construction principles. In her personal life, Orysia loves seeking out the different, the unusual, and the unique - from food and art to clothes and music. She’s a true individual who would rather carve her own path in life than follow the straight and narrow. It’s a pattern that carries into her professional life as well, making a powerful impact throughout DC.
title: Realtor®

description: About Dorothy Dorothy's dynamic background in marketing, fundraising, and development launched her successful career in real estate and she hasn’t looked back since. Her hands-on approach has attracted and amassed a vast network of clients, each with distinct home search and sell goals that dictate the personalized experience she provides. Dorothy's unparalleled vision and extensive resources empower her to surpass client needs and consistently achieve exceptional results. ​A native Washingtonian, Dorothy’s intrinsic knowledge of the DC region allows her to seamlessly connect her buyer clients with the perfect home for their budget and lifestyle. Well-versed in the intricacies of the market, home preparation and staging, she guides her seller clients seamlessly throughout the process to maximize their home's value. Thanks to her persistence, integrity, and market insight, Dorothy accurately assesses each transaction to deliver the optimal outcome for each of her clients. In her spare time, you will find her​ practicing yoga, cooking, spending time with her daughters or traveling the world.
title: Realtor®

description: About Annemarie With over 20 years of experience in the real estate industry, Annemarie Stephens is a dedicated agent who truly understands the dynamics of the market. Starting her career in the vibrant San Francisco Bay area, she made the move to the Washington, DC region a decade ago to better serve the diverse needs of her clients. An impressive 85% of Annemarie's business comes from repeat clients and referrals, showcasing her reliability and unwavering commitment to excellence. Her deep knowledge of the local DC market, paired with a broad network of contacts, allows her to help clients discover the perfect property investments tailored to their needs. Specializing in global residential property sales, Annemarie connects clients with homes across borders, ensuring a seamless experience for those looking to navigate the international market. As a passionate advocate for the DC community, she proudly serves on the Executive Committee of the DC Association of Realtors® (DCAR) and is an active member of both DC and Maryland’s Global Business Committees. Annemarie also contributes to the National Association of Realtors® (NAR) Consumer Communications Committee, helping to elevate the standards of real estate service. When she’s not busy helping clients, you might find Annemarie lending her skills as a notary or participating in the American Heart Association’s annual Heart Walk, raising funds for a cause close to her heart. With Annemarie, you’re not just getting a real estate agent; you’re gaining a trusted partner invested in your success.
title: REALTOR®

description: About Laura A third-generation real estate broker, Laura has been licensed in the Washington DC metro area for 29 years. She began her career in commercial real estate in 1997 then transitioned into residential in 2005, and has closed over $875 million in real estate transactions. She has lectured on Real Estate Investment and Marketing at her alma mater, Washington & Lee University in Lexington, Virginia, has been interviewed about the Washington market by The Washington Post and The Wall Street Journal, and has published articles about the DMV market. She has been recognized consecutively by "Trulia" and "Realtrends" as one of the top real estate agents in America, and by Washingtonian Magazine as one of “the top 100 people you need to know in Washington Real Estate.” Laura donates 10% of her income to her favorite charities (primarily those that support education in Washington's most underserved communities) and served as a four-year Co-Chair of the Bishop Walker School Annual Dinner at the Washington National Cathedral from 2022 to 2025. She is the Immediate Past President of the Parents' Association and a former member of the Board of Governors of St. Albans School in Washington DC, and has served on the Steering Committee of The Connelly School of the Holy Child in Potomac, Maryland. Laura was on the Board of Directors of the Washington Nationals Youth Baseball Academy from 2018-2020. She was President of the Washington Episcopal School Parents Association from 2015-2018, and a six-year member and Trustees Chair of its Board. She served on the Alumni Board of the Washington & Lee University DC Alumni Chapter, the Board of the Teen and Young Adult Health Connection of Montgomery County, and was a founding member of the Nursery Committee at the Washington National Cathedral. Laura lives in McLean, Virginia with her husband, two children, and two lab-mix rescues. When she is not working for and with her clients, you can find her volunteering at her children's schools and for her favorite causes. Client Testimonials: ★★★★★ "Thanks to Laura's knowledgeable counsel and acumen, my wife and I sold our house, on favorable terms, in less than two weeks. Laura then worked tirelessly to find us the perfect spot for our new home (she helped us negotiate a lease back of our old house and timed everything perfectly for our purchase). A great experience all the way around." ★★★★★ "We were incredibly grateful to leverage Laura's sharp market insights, extensive industry connections, and strong negotiating skills for two home purchases and a home sale in Maryland and DC. In addition to being an experienced and savvy agent, Laura is extremely warm and compassionate. She connects with her clients on a personal level, truly cared about meeting our family's needs, and makes the experience enjoyable and exciting." ★★★★★ " We absolutely LOVED working with Laura. She held true to a "no-pressure" approach and was such a wonderful listener. We always felt that she had our wants and needs at the forefront of her mind throughout the process. Laura helped us sell our home - working with us to showcase it in such a way that resulted in a bidding war and then a contract just 48 hours after we went to market! We were impressed with Laura's negotiation savvy and delighted that she reached a deal that was above our asking price. Laura also helped us find our new home on our dream street. We thought it was impossible, but Laura went above and beyond to make it a reality for us. She was, again, excellent at negotiating this transaction as well. We are still so thankful to her for her help and expertise with this process to this day! We couldn't have asked for a more responsive, attentive, and dedicated agent. She made what was a complicated and emotional process one that was easy and enjoyable - thanks to her hard work and because of who she is. Not only were we delighted with Laura as our agent, but we looked forward to every outing we spent with her. She is so warm, prepared, down-to-earth, and funny. We cannot recommend her highly enough! " ★★★★★ " Laura has sold a house for us and was also our agent for the purchase of our new home. She had clearly done her research on our submarket and she carefully priced the sale of our home. Her efforts were well planned and resulted in a bidding war, and ultimately in the sale of our home at a price above our asking price. On the purchase, Laura was realistic, but aggressive and was creative in crafting a unique offer that met our goals. On a more personal note, Laura was a pleasure to work with. She truly listened to us and focused on what was most important to us. She was knowledgeable and comforting during what could be a highly stressful time. I highly recommend Laura! Whether you are buying or selling, you will not be disappointed with Laura. She is a very hard-working, smart, creative, and fun person. " ★★★★★ "Laura was a pleasure to work with during our house hunt and did an excellent job walking us through the home-buying process. She has a great understanding of the neighborhoods in the NW DC area and can give you an excellent indication of what true home values are throughout the area. She took the time to gain an understanding of exactly what type of house we were looking for at the start of our search. Laura also has great recommendations for home inspectors and mortgage brokers to facilitate the closing process." ★★★★★ " I've had the privilege of working with Laura on two separate occasions - as a buyer and most recently as a seller. Both experiences were flawless and easy! Laura and her staff walked me through every step of the process, were available to answer any and all of my questions, and worked hard to get the job done. In fact, Laura was on vacation with her family when I purchased my current home! Despite being thousands of miles away, she managed to pull together a winning contract. I'm certain that without her knowledge and expertise, it never would have happened. I would recommend Laura Steuart to anyone looking for an agent without hesitation! " ★★★★★ "Laura assisted us with the purchase of our home in Chevy Chase, Maryland. There were several other offers in play and it was Laura’s sharp skills that secured the contract for us. Laura understands the MD/VA/DC area real estate market, is knowledgeable about the neighborhoods, and takes the time to understand her clients and what they are seeking in a home. Working in residential real estate myself, I knew Laura was the perfect balance of what we were seeking in an agent: warm and approachable, with a shrewd business sense and great communication throughout the process. Most importantly, she sincerely cares. Working with Laura made an experience that can often be stressful a very enjoyable one. I would highly recommend her."
title: Senior Vice-President | Associate Broker, GRI

description: About Shawnda I ntroducing Shawnda, a Philadelphia native who embraced the vibrant energy of Washington D.C. after attending Howard University. She graduated in 2006 with a degree in International Business and soon found herself captivated by the city, deciding to make it her permanent home. Initially, Shawnda lent her expertise to help others grow their businesses. However, she soon discovered her true passion for real estate sales and established her own successful enterprise. After six years of impressive experience and numerous satisfied clients, Shawnda joined the renowned Lugo Parker Team at Compass, a brokerage that not only ranks as the top in the US by sales volume but also stands among the top 1.5% of small teams in the nation, as per Real Trends. Shawnda's steadfast belief in fostering strong relationships with her clients has allowed her to quickly cement her reputation as a trusted advisor in the real estate sector. She prides herself on her unwavering commitment to client satisfaction, and providing top-notch service. Outside of her professional commitments, Shawnda enjoys immersing herself in her beloved SW Waterfront community. As a licensed realtor across DC, Maryland, and Virginia, she is the ideal resource for all real estate needs. Don't hesitate to connect with Shawnda, and let her warm, engaging demeanor guide you seamlessly through your real estate journey
title: Real Estate Consultant | licensed in DC, MD & VA

description: About Laura Laura is originally from West Virginia but has lived and worked in Arlington for nearly a decade. She graduated from West Virginia University (Let’s go Mountaineers!) with a Bachelor of Multidisciplinary Studies, with a concentration in Advertising, Business, and Communications. Laura began her career in sales for a national healthcare services , before transitioning to the hospitality industry where she honed her customer service skills. She enjoyed roles in event , operations and food, and beverage service. Laura has always been interested in real estate, interior design, and décor. That interest was heightened even more once she experienced the home buying process firsthand. She had such a great experience that it inspired her to become a Realtor®. Delivering excellent customer service experience is Laura’s top priority. She is dependable, responsive and attentive to her client’s wants and needs. Laura enjoys hearing live music, trying new things (like flying trapeze and skydiving), dining at locally-owned restaurants, and visiting Virginia vineyards.
title: Realtor® | Licensed in DC, MD & VA

description: About Riley As a native Washingtonian, licensed in DC, MD and VA, Riley is a real estate enthusiast. After graduating from Towson University, Riley decided to pursue her dream of working in the Real Estate field. As Administrative Assistant for the The Dudley Group, she is a vital team member in delivering an amazing home buying experience. Riley assists the team by applying her local insight, strong organizational skills, and passion for helping people realize their dreams by finding them the perfect home. When Riley is not busy working and assisting her team, you can find her spending time with her family, in the gym, or somewhere on a beach.
title: Realtor®

description: About Shelley Shelley Stuart is a trusted residential real estate agent serving all counties in Maryland and Washington, DC. She is known for her strong negotiation skills, local market expertise, and clear, supportive communication. Shelley works with buyers and sellers throughout all Maryland counties and the whole DC metro region. Shelley specializes in guiding clients through key life transitions: first-time homebuying, upsizing, downsizing, relocation to Maryland or DC, estate and probate sales, military PCS moves, buying and selling simultaneously, and competitive offer situations. Her approach is calm, organized, and focused on helping clients make confident decisions. She explains each step in simple terms, helps clients avoid common mistakes, and uses strategic contract writing to strengthen their position in fast-moving markets. Buyers rely on Shelley for her neighborhood knowledge, early access to off-market and “Coming Soon” homes, and her success winning homes in multiple-offer situations. Sellers choose her for accurate pricing, creative marketing plans, and smooth, timely closings. Her long-standing relationships with lenders, inspectors, contractors, and title partners provide clients with an added advantage, ensuring a reliable team throughout the process. Clients consistently describe Shelley as patient, responsive, knowledgeable, and genuinely invested in their goals. Her blend of market insight, strategic thinking, and dependable communication makes her a highly recommended realtor for a wide range of client needs across Maryland and Washington, DC.
title: REALTOR®

description: About Stacey Award-winning real estate agent Stacey is a negotiating powerhouse who brings experience, creativity, and fun to the process of buying and selling homes. A dynamic real estate agent who has used her expert local knowledge to help hundreds of families find the perfect starter home, upgrade to their dream house, or sell for top dollar. Whether you are a first-time buyer, in need of an upgrade, or ready to downsize Stacy's in-depth local knowledge and wealth of connections will help you find the perfect home.
title: Realtor® | Vice President

description: About Jesse Managing Partner, Venture Group at Compass Jesse Sutton is a seasoned professional in the real estate industry, proudly serving as Managing Partner at the Venture Group at Compass. With well over a decade of dedicated experience, he has honed his skills to provide expert guidance and unwavering support to his clients. Jesse's philosophy is simple: he doesn't merely facilitate real estate transactions; he functions as a consultant. He is there to guide clients through the intricacies of the process and ensure they are well-informed about their options at every step. Recognizing that every client is unique, the first step of every transaction is focused on gathering information and creating a framework of his clients’ specific goals. An action plan tailored for each client is a necessary step for ensuring success in today’s competitive market In his current role, Jesse has had the privilege of representing both buyers and sellers across a diverse spectrum of properties. His extensive transactional experience ranges from the sale of single parking spaces to the execution of marketing campaigns for multi-family buildings. What truly sets Jesse apart is his strong network of relationships with other industry professionals. Over the years, he has cultivated partnerships with lenders, appraisers, and fellow real estate agents, fostering a collaborative environment that benefits his clients. Negotiation skills are the cornerstone of his approach. Understanding what motivates both sides of a transaction allows for the success of his clients, while maintaining professionalism and integrity. With a keen eye for market trends and a dedication to staying updated on the ever-evolving real estate landscape, Jesse is committed to delivering exceptional results Outside of the real estate realm, Jesse leads a fulfilling life in McLean, Virginia, with his wife, daughter, and two canine companions. His passions extend beyond the office, as he is also an Ironman and endurance athlete, reveling in the challenge and discipline these pursuits demand. A West Coast transplant, Jesse grew up just outside of Seattle and is an alumnus of the University of Washington. His roots in the Pacific Northwest have shaped his deep appreciation for the unique beauty that can be found in nature and likely is responsible for him seeking both relaxation and adventure in the outdoors. For those seeking a real estate partner who is not only a dedicated professional but also a dynamic individual with a zest for life, Jesse Sutton is here to help make real estate dreams a reality.
title: REALTOR® – Licensed in DC, MD, & VA

description: About Dan As a tenured real estate agent, Dan guides his clients with a service-driven approach. He loves getting to know the clients he serves, and it's not at all uncommon for him to form enduring connections that last long after a transaction is complete. Skilled in the arts of renovation and staging, Dan masterfully transforms his sellers' properties to show in their best light in order to obtain the highest possible market price. For buyers, Dan is equally tireless in his attention to detail when following up and negotiating on their behalf. Whether he is working with first time buyers or seasoned sellers, each client benefits from Dan's personable, direct, and professional approach.
title: Realtor®

description: About Von Von is a realtor and property manager with the Brand Insider Group. Born in the D.C. metro area, Von has deep roots across Northern Virginia, Maryland, and Washington, D.C. He first learned the fundamentals of business by managing his family’s international importing business throughout high school and college. Von went on to attend Bard College and later earned his business degree from the Robert H. Smith School of Business at the University of Maryland, College Park. Over his years in real estate, Von has become a trusted partner for landlords and homeowners looking to list their properties for rent or for sale across D.C., Maryland, and Northern Virginia. He got his start managing apartment buildings, gaining hands-on experience with leasing, tenant relations, and maintenance which now inform his approach to preparing and marketing homes. Von specializes in helping property owners maximize their returns by handling everything from pricing strategy and staging to marketing, showings, and negotiation. Whether it’s a single condo or a multi-unit portfolio, he brings a system-driven approach that streamlines the entire process. He’s worked with individual landlords, relocating homeowners, and investors, ensuring their properties get leased or sold quickly and efficiently. In addition to his listing work, Von is a partner in ventures focused on real estate development, property management, and marketing, allowing him to bring both experience and strategy to every deal.
title: Realtor®

description: About Kim Kim Szakats is a dynamic real estate professional with a unique background in real estate operations and a passion for helping clients navigate the market. Kim began her career in real estate operations, where she honed her skills in market strategy and logistics. This foundation equipped her with a comprehensive understanding of the industry, allowing her to excel in various real estate roles. Kim made the strategic decision to transition into real estate sales a few years ago. Leveraging her extensive knowledge of market trends and client needs, she quickly became a trusted local real estate agent known for her dedication and personalized approach. Her ability to connect with clients and understand their unique goals has been pivotal in building lasting relationships and achieving successful transactions. At Compass, Kim specializes in real estate within the greater Washington DC area. Her background gives her a distinct edge in negotiating deals and managing the complexities of the buying and selling process. Kim is committed to providing her clients with exceptional service, ensuring a smooth and informed experience every step of the way - while also making it fun! Outside of her professional life, Kim is actively involved in the community and loves exploring local neighborhoods, playing tennis, and watching college basketball (Go Villanova!) With a keen eye for detail and a passion for real estate, Kim Szakats is dedicated to helping her clients achieve their real estate goals.
title: Realtor® | Licensed in DC, VA & MD

description: About Andrew Born and raised in Virginia, Drew studied history at Hampden‐Sydney College before beginning a career in the high‐end automotive industry. Working with the prestigious BMW Group brands, he guided clients through the selection process of their next fine new vehicle. Being a car fanatic himself, Drew thrived on translating his enthusiasm to customers in a consultative way, helping them make sound, satisfying purchase decisions. He easily transferred this ability to real estate, where he helps people with an even more substantial and meaningful process – choosing their special home. Drew brings this winning strategy to the Babbington Team, ready to guide his clients through the process. Whether you are buying, selling, renting or investing in real estate, he understands the critical nature of your business, and will navigate you through the market armed with vital information and confidence. A longtime resident of Washington, DC, Drew is excited to continue to enrich this vibrant community. As a fan of and contributor to the arts, he can be seen around town belting out show tunes, or trying to convince friends to accompany him to the latest musical productions. Drew also enjoys spending time with his extended and active family, on the ski slopes in winter and on water skis in summer.
title: Mollaan Babbington Group

description: About Keene Born and raised in Washington, DC, Keene grew up in a real estate family. Both of Keene's parents were in the business, founding an independent residential brokerage, Taylor Real Estate, in the late 1970's. After graduating from Rice University with a BS in Electrical Engineering, Keene worked for more than 6 years doing technical consulting work for Booz Allen Hamilton before joining the family business in late 1989. While with TRE, Keene was the firm's Property Manager and then Sales Manager, learning all aspects of the local D.C. market. In 1996 Keene formed a partnership with his brother-in-law, Steve Agostino, and purchased TRE from his parents, becoming the 's Principal Broker. Keene and Steve grew TRE, Inc. into a significant player in the close-in Metro market, eventually reaching about 30 agents in size. During this time Keene sat on the Board of Directors of both the local (GCAAR) and national (NAR) real estate associations, and he was also privileged to serve as President of the D.C. Association of Realtors in 2003. Keene and Steve also expanded the company's property business, eventually splitting that operation into a separate entity, Taylor Properties Ltd. In early 2003, they the sales brokerage business to the largest independent brokerage in the mid-Atlantic region. At this point, Keene and Steve formed a powerful sales team with his parents, who they worked with until Keene Sr's death in 2008. Since then, Keene has continued to work with Steve and his mother, Nancy Taylor, as the Taylor Agostino Group (TAG). TAG is proud to have made the move to Compass in early 2017, to take advantage of the cutting edge technology and forward thinking vision of this rapidly growing real estate company. Compass' data-driven tools and expert, top-shelf marketing help Keene serve both his buyer and seller clients at the highest level. Client Testimonials ★★★★★ Keene Taylor is a real estate agent par excellence—strategic, dedicated, caring, and immensely effective. After seeing Keene actively engage in showing us the intricate merits of a condo he was showing—a welcome change from most agents who just stand in the corner while you walk around – we hired Keene to help us find a new home and sell ours. Keene then faced the challenge of positioning our 135-year-old home, charming but showing its age, for the best possible sales price. He sought input from other agents and carefully set an optimal pricing strategy. Keene is an all-round great guy and amazing real estate agent. You can’t do better. Mary and Peter Robinson ★★★★★ We worked with Keene after running into him at an open house. We wanted to work with someone who was an expert in NW DC and Bethesda. In our first conversation it was clear that he was going to provide great customer service, leave no stone unturned, and keep us in the loop every step of the way. Keene demonstrated genuine empathy towards us at all stages of the process. We never felt rushed and although we knew it wasn’t the case, we felt like we were his only clients. He demonstrated contagious optimism, experience, and patience. Finally, it was clear Keene is honest and acts with integrity. His reputation and strong relationships with other realtors in the area can give you an edge in an extremely competitive market. We are now his biggest cheerleaders and we plan to refer him to anyone who is looking for a realtor. Dan C. and Jessica M. ★★★★★ Keene, now that the dust has settled from the big move away from Washington (425+ boxes unpacked!), I wanted to thank you for all the work you did-the time, the attention to detail and negotiation advice-to bring us such an excellent result. Please give our thanks as well to Kathy and the team-all are much appreciated! It was painfully hard to leave that house, but we are, at the same time, genuinely excited about the next chapter in our new home! And a pool is rather nice! I hope we can join forces again when we (inevitably) move back to DC! Until then, we wish you all the best. Satisfied Client
title: Associate Broker Licensed in DC & MD

description: About Emerald Emerald operates under the belief that every property acquisition is a strategic investment decision. Her mission transcends merely finding a home; it is about curating a residence that intertwines personal affection with financial growth. As a native of Alexandria City, Emerald possesses an innate understanding of the unique communities that constitute the DC, Maryland and Virginia metropolitan region. Approaching clients with real-time data, consistency, and market education, Emerald adopts a transparent approach, empowering her clients to make judicious decisions aligned with their investment goals. When she's out of the office, you can without a doubt find her at one of three places: the coffee shop, the dog park, or your newest D.C. restaurant! For a more down-to-earth peek into the world of local real estate and Emerald's adventures, check out her Instagram at @EmeraldtheRealtor.
title: Realtor®

description: About Roger Roger Taylor is an experienced real estate professional with a deep understanding of the Washington, D.C. market. Having traveled to more than 90 countries across all seven continents, Roger brings a global perspective to his real estate practice. This extensive international experience has given him a unique ability to connect with clients from diverse backgrounds and understand their varying needs, allowing him to offer a tailored approach to each transaction. Whether working with first-time homebuyers, seasoned investors, or relocating professionals, Roger’s global insights help him identify opportunities and solutions that others might overlook. His ability to navigate different cultures and markets enhances his strategic thinking, making him an invaluable resource in the fast-paced D.C. market. Roger’s clients benefit from his adaptability, problem-solving skills, and a broad vision that comes from his world travel, all of which enable him to guide them toward achieving their real estate goals. Roger is known for his client-focused approach, emphasizing education and empowerment. He is committed to helping clients make informed decisions, whether they are entering the market for the first time or expanding their investment portfolio. His negotiation skills, attention to detail, and clear communication ensure a smooth and successful real estate experience. With a passion for helping clients at every level, Roger combines his local expertise with a global outlook, delivering exceptional service and results. His ability to see real estate through a wide lens makes him a trusted partner for anyone looking to buy or sell in Washington, D.C. Reach out to Roger for expert guidance in achieving your personal real estate goals.
title: Realtor®

description: About Taylor Agostino Group The Taylor Agostino Group (TAG) has a long history in the Washington, DC metro area, providing personalized services for thousands of clients in our real estate market. For over 50 years, sellers and buyers alike have been working with this family-based business, which was started by Nancy Taylor in the 1970s. Nancy and her husband, Keene Taylor, grew Taylor Real Estate into a thriving locally-focused independent brokerage firm. In 1989, their son, Keene Taylor Jr, left his technology consulting career to support the expanding operation. As the company grew, they were joined in 1991 by Steve Agostino, who brought a background in urban planning and development to the team. Keene and Steve became business partners, as well as brothers-in-law, in late 1995, when they bought out Nancy and Keene to become the owners of TRE, Inc. After tremendous growth during the late 1990s and early 2000s, TRE joined forces with the largest independently-owned real estate brokerage in the country, providing clients with an even broader range of services and support. At that point, Keene and Steve formed a powerful sales team as they continued to serve clients as the Taylor Agostino Group. ​TAG is proud to have made the move to Compass in early 2017, taking advantage of the cutting edge technology and forward thinking vision of this rapidly growing real estate company. The outstanding search tools and expert, top-shelf marketing at Compass help TAG serve both their buyer and seller clients at the highest level. We were thrilled to add JoJo Spallone to our team in 2021. JoJo brings a wealth of real estate experience to our team, especially in design, construction and lending. 2024 saw the addition of Matthew Orgera to the team, as a dedicated marketing specialist and agent specializing in serving our condo & coop cleints. Over our decades of client service, TAG has become one of the area’s most experienced teams. Combining neighborhood expertise and a strong commitment to ethics and honesty has resulted in tremendous success for our sellers & buyers. Also, other agents know and trust us to be good collaborators on every deal, which really benefits our clients, too. With thousands of home transactions in DC, Maryland and Virginia, TAG remains one of the most knowledgeable and qualified one-stop real estate operations in the Washington DC market. Consistently cited in Washingtonian magazine as a Best in Washington real estate team, you can count on us to meet your needs!

About Team Vantage Team Vantage Real estate from your perspective. Buying or selling a home is a milestone in a person’s life. Whether you’re a first time homebuyer, a move-up seller, or an experienced investor, you can trust Team Vantage to expertly guide you through the process. Team Vantage believes developing meaningful relationships with our clients allows us to gain insight into their needs and goals for the future. Our philosophy is to educate our clients about the market and empower them to make informed decisions to accomplish their goals. Most importantly, we skillfully negotiate to promote our client’s best interests at every turn. Team Vantage is a diversely talented group of full-service Realtors with years of combined experience in real estate. Our founding members, Edward Poutier and Stewart Coleman (retired), established the team in 2000 with the fitting motto of "Excellence in Real Estate". By exceeding expectations for over 22 years, the team has grown to become one of the most successful and respected partnerships in DC, Maryland, and Virginia. We can’t wait to help you find your place in this world.

About James I’m a realtor with over 10 years of experience across New York, Northern Virginia, and DC—helping clients buy and sell with confidence, clarity, and ease. My approach is real: genuine connection, fierce negotiation, and clear communication every step of the way. Integrity is my foundation, and my goal is simple—deliver results while making the process feel effortless and authentic. Outside real estate, I’m a certified counselor and yoga teacher, blending mindfulness and balance into everything I do. I’m passionate about Ashtanga yoga, the arts, travel, and being a proud dad to four amazing kids. Let’s make your next move something extraordinary. James
title: Realtor®

description: About Maggie Maggie Tehan, a third-generation Bethesda native, has a profound understanding of the area's unique urban-suburban appeal. Her background as an actress and model endowed her with essential communication skills and a charismatic presence that enhance her real estate career. Eight years ago, Maggie started her journey under top-producing agent Cheryl, where she built a strong foundation and excels at guiding first-time homebuyers with her detailed, educational approach. With a personable and positive demeanor, Maggie creates a welcoming environment where clients feel at ease asking questions. She thrives on the diverse challenges real estate offers and often turns clients into friends. Whether you're buying, selling, or just exploring, Maggie is your dedicated partner every step of the way.
title: Realtor®

description: About Kristina Kristina Temple graduated with a degree in Structural Engineering from the University of Maryland. Prior to her career in real estate, she worked at one of the most highly respected Engineering & Construction firms in the world, Bechtel Corporation. Her mission is to represent each client with an unparalleled level of integrity, reliability, and trustworthiness. She has a tenacious desire to be the best and hardest working, all while serving our community with honor and dignity. Kristina's philosophy in working with clients is simple - deliver superior, unbiased market insight for making informed decisions on home purchases and sales, while providing the highest level of customer care and elevating the client experience. As an enthusiastic member of the DMV community and an avid foodie, Kristina makes sure to stay abreast of all the new restaurants in and outside of the District. A native of the area, she is licensed and well versed in DC, MD, and VA real estate inside the beltway.
title: Licensed Real Estate Salesperson

description: About Terra & Tide Homes Terra and Tide Homes is a dynamic and innovative real estate team that offers unparalleled expertise and personalized service to help clients achieve their property goals. With a focus on the unique needs and preferences of each individual, Terra and Tide Homes offers a comprehensive range of services, from property search and acquisition to marketing and sales. The team is comprised of experienced professionals with a deep understanding of the local real estate market and a passion for helping clients navigate the complex process of buying or selling a property. Whether you are looking to invest in a new home, sell your current property, or explore new opportunities in the real estate market, Terra and Tide Homes has the expertise and resources to help you achieve your goals. "Terra" represents our commitment to the deep roots we have established in the communities we serve. We understand the significance of community connections and the impact they have on the quality of life for residents. At Terra and Tide Homes, we prioritize building strong relationships with community members, local businesses, and organizations to create a sense of belonging and unity. "Tide" refers to the ebb and flow of the local real estate market. The real estate market can be complex and unpredictable, with prices and demand fluctuating based on a wide range of factors. At Terra and Tide Homes, we stay up-to-date on the latest market trends and use our expertise to help clients make informed decisions about buying or selling their homes. We understand that the real estate market is constantly evolving, and we are dedicated to helping clients navigate these changes and find success in any market conditions. With our community-centered approach, Terra and Tide Homes is not just a real estate team; we are a trusted partner dedicated to strengthening the fabric of the community. Through our involvement and commitment, we aim to make a positive and lasting impact, creating a place where residents can truly call home.

About Jamie Jamie Test is a Realtor and Vice President at Compass with more than $400 million in career sales. He has been recognized by Washingtonian Magazine as a Top Producer every year since 2016 and was recently ranked among the top 1 percent of real estate agents nationwide and the top 125 agents in Virginia by RealTrends, as featured in The Wall Street Journal . Jamie works with buyers, sellers, investors, and builders throughout Northern Virginia and Washington, D.C. Licensed since 2009, his experience spans every segment of the market. He has led sales for more than a dozen new construction developments, guided first time buyers as well as seasoned homeowners, and helped investors and builders identify opportunities to maximize long term value and profitability. His sales history includes everything from 200 plus year old historic homes to newly constructed, ultra modern residences, as well as urban condominiums and single family estates. Jamie is also a real estate investor with experience in the construction and renovation process having completed a gut renovation of his primary residence. He has even represented clients in commercial transactions. This depth and range of experience allow Jamie to provide thoughtful, strategic guidance tailored to each client’s goals. A native of the area, Jamie grew up in Alexandria, Virginia and attended Gonzaga College High School in Washington, D.C. He earned a degree in Business and played lacrosse at the University of Mary Washington. Before entering real estate brokerage, Jamie worked as a research analyst, advising real estate developers and institutional investors on market trends, pricing, and design strategy. Jamie lives in the Wakefield Forest neighborhood of Fairfax County with his wife and two children. Outside of work, he enjoys playing tennis and pickleball, working on his golf game at local courses, and is an avid Formula 1 racing fan.
title: Realtor | Vice President

description: About The Allison Collection Brittany and Peter Allison, the dynamic duo behind The Allison Collection, are synonymous with excellence in real estate. With a proven track record of selling over $350 million in properties, they bring unparalleled expertise and a passion for delivering personalized service to each client. As lifelong Washingtonians, Brittany and Peter offer a deep understanding of the region's most coveted neighborhoods, from Bethesda and Chevy Chase to Potomac and DC. The Allison Collection embodies more than just a name—it represents a philosophy centered on curating exceptional experiences and tailored service for every client. Much like curating a collection of fine art, each home they represent receives meticulous attention and distinctive care. Their dedication to advocacy is reflected in their keen negotiation skills and commitment to guiding clients through every step of the real estate journey. Driven by a belief in a high-tech, high-touch approach, Brittany and Peter leverage Compass's advanced technology to streamline transactions while providing steadfast guidance. Whether they're assisting first-time homebuyers, seasoned investors, or clients looking to downsize, The Allisons excel in crafting innovative solutions that transform aspirations into reality. Their clients benefit not only from their strategic marketing acumen but also from their genuine commitment to nurturing enduring relationships. Beyond their professional endeavors, Brittany and Peter prioritize family time with their two boys, relishing moments in their vibrant East Bethesda community. Their dedication to enhancing lives extends beyond real estate transactions, embodying their role not just as agents, but as trusted advisors and cherished friends.

About The Arbor Group The Arbor Group stands for growth in real estate through hard work, attention to detail, and education. Our buyer clients can count on neighborhood expertise and an eye for possibility in properties with room for improvement, while our seller clients can expect clear guidance on prep-for-market work that yields maximum return on investment. Our team of two brings over 10 years of combined experience to COMPASS and has helped clients through over 200 transactions in the second half of the 2010s alone. As owners of multiple investment properties, our experience extends far beyond. To complement our skills as real estate agents, we incorporate our past experiences playing professional sport, coaching at The George Washington University, and teaching in the DC Public School system. Hustle is in our DNA, and we honor the different styles through which individuals learn and communicate. If you’re considering a home sale or purchase, please give us a call. We would be thrilled to go to work for you!

About The Banner Team Led by Principal Agent Wendy Banner and composed of 13 accomplished agents, the team brings over 200 years of collective experience and a sales record of more than $2.03 billion in closed transactions. The Banner Team is known throughout the region for its personalized, full-service approach and expertise across the market from luxury homes and new construction to first-time home buyers, estate sales, and lifestyle transitions for “empty nest” clients. With over 3,500 homes sold and $188,500 donated to local charities through the team’s Pay it Forward Initiative, The Banner Team’s impact extends far beyond real estate.

About The Barnes Group at Compass Under the leadership of top Washington, D.C. Realtor Sheryl Barnes The Barnes Group at Compass brings over 20 years of real estate experience in the National Capital Region (DC, MD, VA). In her thriving referral-based business Sheryl puts her clients’ needs first no matter the kind of transaction, starter home for first-time buyers or a high end multi-million dollar resale. At The Barnes Group we follow Sheryl’s guidance and leadership carefully. With our deep commitment to integrity, transparency, and accountability, our clients trust that they will have our full attention and support at all stages of their home buying or selling process. We take pride in our commitment to provide a proactive solutions-oriented experience for each unique transaction. At The Barnes Group we tailor our real estate services to our clients’ needs that include listing, purchasing, staging, and marketing. We also provide guidance with financing, interior designing, landscaping and remodeling. Our clients become our family and friends, and we are happy to serve beyond the closing date. We are thrilled to work with you! Contact us today to share your plans and dreams, soon to become reality.

About The Bissey Team Every home has a story: when it was built, who has lived there, how it was cared for, what has changed over the years. Behind the charm of a home’s story are the details that affect day-to-day living: water pressure, adequate insulation, roof condition, and so on. We love the big picture story and all the tiny details. Simply put, we love real estate. As you get to know The Bissey Team, you’ll learn just how much we love these stories and invest in the details. Understanding properties, knowing values, and helping the people who build their lives and their livelihoods in those properties is what we do best. The Bissey Team’s Members : Stan and Todd Bissey are a father and son team with more than 60 years of DC-area real estate experience between them. Over the past four decades, Stan has been active in nearly every facet of the real estate business: ● renovating old apartment buildings, churches, and schools and converting them into condos for resale; ● owning and managing investment properties; ● owning and operating a construction company as well as a property-management company. The Bissey Team advises buyers, sellers, and investors with insight built on this lifetime of experience that other agents just can’t replicate. Todd brings another two decades of licensed real estate experience to the partnership. He has a passion for helping his clients achieve their real estate goals. Having renovated houses, including his own, Todd can educate others on the ups and downs of the process. He believes that the best Realtors serve their clients through deep expertise and focus, and he brings that focused attention to the streets, the neighborhoods, and the properties of DC. Using that expertise, he has developed an unrivaled ability to price properties for sale. In fact, Todd was recognized in 2018 as the best agent at pricing properties by his fellow DC-area Compass agents.

About The Bowers Group The Bowers Group is a team of experienced and licensed real estate agents serving the Montgomery County, MD and Washington, D.C metro area. They are recognized as being in the Top 1% of all Teams Nationwide with a proven track record of getting results quickly and with a direct line of communication at all times.

About The Calkins Group Trust. Honesty. Professionalism. These traits exemplify our approach to one of the largest transactions many people will experience in their lifetime. Our philosophy is simple: clients come first. We pledge to be in constant communication, keeping clients fully informed throughout the entire buying or selling process. We measure our success by the satisfaction of our clients. Let the Calkins Group help you find your next home or sell your current home in D.C., Maryland, and Virginia.

About The Capital Estate Group Capital Estate Group (CEG), a high-performance team under Compass, is a uniquely experienced real estate team with varied credentials. While most real estate professionals operate as individual agents, CEG operates as a true team, leveraging each team member’s strengths — sales, service, administration and marketing. CEG knows that our high-performance real estate team can help you in a valuable new way with a unique and complete package of services. We focus our efforts on our mission — to map paths to better lives and better communities through innovative and dynamic real estate service.
title: Real Estate Team

description: About The Charbonneau Group The Washington Metro area is the place to be. The Charbonneau Group are full time realtors whose main goal is to give the best service and experience to their client. With a passion for what we do, and over 50+ collective years in the residential and commercial real estate industry, we guide our clients to make the best financial and personal decision for their needs. We would be happy to help you discover the many neighborhoods the charismatic District of Columbia has to offer, along with the wonderful surrounding areas in Maryland and Virginia. Ready to make your real estate move in the DMV? Our dedicated team of experienced and trusting real estate agents are here to guide you in both Residential & Commercial real estate. We serve all three jurisdictions DC/MD/VA. Santé! We also speak French! On parle français! www.DMV-address.com

About The Donovan & Wye Group As DC natives, Chevy Chase residents, and parents of Lafayette Elementary students, Claudia Donovan and Pam Wye are committed to investing in the community in which they live and work. They are known as trusted real estate advisors and go-to names for advice and consultation, making them an invaluable resource to the community. They also offer unrivaled local insight, and are passionate about helping their clients discover all that their community has to offer. Claudia, and Pam are defined by the convergence of experience and innovation, and are grounded in their shared commitment to getting the best results for their clients, family, friends, and neighbors. Above all, The Donovan & Wye Group works tirelessly to bring each client’s vision to life — from first-time buyers to downsizers to forever home seekers. No matter where you are in life, they are poised to help you achieve the real estate results you deserve, every time. pam@compass.com 202.320.4169 claudia@compass.com 202.251.7011

About The Dudley Group For the Dudley Group, real estate is about far more than a single transaction, it's about guiding people through some of life's most notable milestones. Bringing a combined 18 years of expansive market knowledge, expertise in prepping and staging a listing, and savvy negotiating skills to the table, The Dudley Group delivers personalized experiences and unrivaled results. It's no surprise, then, that the team's business is comprised largely of referrals and repeat clients - in fact, it's not at all uncommon for Chad and his colleagues to work with clients spanning multiple generations of one family. Whether you're a first time buyer or a seasoned seller, The Dudley Group is poised to bring your distinct goals to life.
title: Licensed in DC, MD & VA

description: About The Foreman Properties Group The Foreman Properties Group aims to help clients build generational wealth by focusing on education, excellence, and an unprecedented professionalism that is immersed in a culture of authentic and committed camaraderie and teamwork. We facilitate individuals and companies in buying and selling real estate in the District of Columbia, Maryland & Virginia (DMV). With 20+ years of experience, we are knowledgeable about the DMV market. Our clients range from first-time home buyers to investors with multi-million-dollar portfolios. Our clients are our #1 priority. Professionalism, honesty, exceptional service and adding unprecedented value to every client’s transaction experience is our mission.

About The Goodhart Group To us, Alexandria real estate is about more than just liking a house – it’s about truly loving where you live. And after living in the DC area for over 30 years, it’s safe to say we love it here. Whether we are helping clients buy or sell, we always strive to match our clients with a home and community they’ll enjoy just as much as we do ours. And what better way to find your match than with the team who knows the DC area from the inside out? Neighborhood expertise, unparalleled service, and an award-winning work ethic; we’re the leading agents in the area, and we love what we do! We all bring something unique to the table to create a true powerhouse of a team that covers all the bases. And we’re only getting better; we always make sure we’re on the cutting edge of marketing and real estate technology to give you the best experience possible when you’re buying or selling a home.

About Roberta Roberta is one of the top performing real estate agents in the Metro DC area with more than 14 years of experience and over $100 million in sales. Roberta uses traditional marketing blended with the newest technology to exceed the expectations of buyers and sellers. She is rated as a Zillow Five Star Premium Agent, repeatedly noted as a Top Agent by Washingtonian magazine and the National Association of Realtor national ranking of Top 5% of Realtors. Her global presence attracts multinational clients from near and far, frequently referred to her by past clients. In addition to serving estate attorneys, sellers and buyers in the residential markets of Washington, DC, Virginia and Maryland, Roberta has helped developers acquire property for renovation, conversion and/or resale. Many online reviews by past clients’ compliment Roberta for her knowledge and experience. But more than her skills, clients consistently say that they felt like they mattered most in the transaction, above and beyond Roberta’s personal gain. Roberta’s attention to full service earns her the reputation of a sought after REALTOR. Born in Boston, Massachusetts, Roberta lives in Georgetown with her husband. Their two children, raised in the area, now live in DC and NC.
title: Realtor

description: About The Jeanne Phil Meg Team Every successful real estate investment requires a trustworthy and professional team to guide it home, and there is no better choice than the The Jeanne Phil Meg Team. Agents since 2004, Jeanne Harrison , Phil Guire and Meg Shapiro earned tremendous success at their respective brokerages. In early 2015, they were recruited to help launch the Capitol Hill office for COMPASS Real Estate's initial expansion from NYC into DC, and the three were named COMPASS Vice Presidents shortly afterwards. Earning numerous awards for excellent customer service and sales over the years, they were named Washingtonian Magazine’s Top Team, and Top Real Estate Agent consistently since 2016. They have cultivated a business that is based almost entirely upon recommendations and referrals from highly satisfied clients, and amassed an impressive production volume of $850 million in transactions. Capitalizing on these successes, The Jeanne Phil Meg Team was created in early 2018. As longtime residents of the DC area, The Team has strong connections to their neighborhoods and strives to improve them in every way imaginable, from longstanding philanthropic endeavors like sponsorships of many local events to the conviction with which they promote the communities they call home. Motivated, driven, and responsive, The Team enjoys helping clients to strategize and navigate their life plans throughout the DC/MD/VA region. The Jeanne Phil Meg Team brings a rare combination of expertise, authenticity, and fun to every client interaction, which in no small part accounts for their immense success. EXPERTLY HANDLING DC, Maryland, and Virginia Sales and Purchases Condos, Coops, and Single Family Homes Simultaneous Buy/Sell Transactions and Multi-Faceted Moves 1st Time Homebuyers Downsizing/Empty Nesters Divorce Transactions and Estate Sales Sale of Rental Properties/1031 Exchanges/TOPA Rights

About The Julia and Paul Team About Paul Paul’s guiding principle in real estate is “enjoy the process.” He is client-driven and dedicated to exceptional service and results. Paul's clients consistently cite his tireless work ethic, his keen eye for detail and design, and intimate knowledge of the area’s ever-evolving neighborhoods. Paul first moved to Washington DC in 2010 and spent time cultivating his negotiation and sales skills working at a leading procurement platform selling software to the military in DoD West. During that time, he fell in love with Washington, DC and spent countless hours getting to know each of the city’s neighborhoods intimately. He currently resides in a condo that he renovated in DC's U Street neighborhood. Having always been passionate about real estate, Paul joined Compass in 2018. Since then, he’s helped countless clients realize their dreams of purchasing their home in the DMV. About Julia Born and bred in the DC area, Julia has been lucky enough to call the metro area home her entire life. She hails from Chevy Chase, graduating from the University of Maryland, College Park, while experiencing the metro area's growth firsthand. Now settled in Northwest DC with her husband and their two dogs, Julia is excited to show clients the charm, innovation, and opportunity that are the lifeblood of the city. Julia’s family instilled in her a passion for service through real estate: her grandfather was a real estate attorney in Boston, her grandmother is a retired REALTOR, and her mom and aunt continue to work as business partners selling real estate in Cambridge, MA. Building connections in the DMV and helping people “find their place” is second nature to her. Having spent the first chapter of her career focused on customer success and digital marketing, Julia puts clients’ goals first, prioritizing their needs and creating actionable solutions. Whether you're a first-time home buyer or are searching for a new home, Julia will expertly guide you through the buying and selling processes, making sure you're comfortable every step of the way.

About The Kelvin & Dina Team Kelvin and Dina have nearly twenty-five years of combined real estate experience and understand that buying/selling real estate can be overwhelming and emotional. Coming from diverse backgrounds, they connect with a wide range of individuals, and their clients often become friends. With legal and entrepreneurial experience, they are industrious and will work tirelessly to seek the best possible outcome for their clients. While extremely driven, focused and detail-oriented, Team KD is also easygoing and able to put people at ease. Avid fitness (Peloton!) enthusiasts, they work as hard for their clients as they do in the gym, always striving to make the process efficient, smooth, and as much fun as possible! Kelvin is an agent-attorney with nearly two decades of Washington, DC area real estate experience. Kelvin practiced law and owned his own motorcycle apparel company early in his career, before transitioning to real estate. His legal and entrepreneurial backgrounds, combined with his involvement in development, have made him extremely familiar with the finer points of a deal. Kelvin understands real estate "holistically" and possesses a keen sense for all aspects of a transaction, including contract negotiations and anticipating/dealing with potential issues quickly and efficiently.
