Valuing trust above all else, Kelvin enjoys working with first-time homebuyers and crafting complex deals for seasoned investors alike. Kelvin is an entrepreneur at heart, an avid golfer and sports enthusiast, a proud member of Kappa Alpha Psi Fraternity, Inc., and a prouder father to a middle school-aged son. Dina was born in Queens, NY but raised in Rockville, MD. She attended Brown University, where she studied biology and economics before beginning a career in the financial services industry. A passionate at-home cook, she also ran her own Greek foods catering business. Dina combines her extensive knowledge of Montgomery County with her past personal and professional experiences to make all transactions as seamless as possible. Ingrained with an extremely strong work ethic that was reinforced by her close-knit family, Dina operates with passion and "grit" in all areas of her life. Dina enjoys the relationship aspect of real estate and treats clients like family, with "Greek hospitality," aiming to make each transaction as smooth as possible. She believes in hard work and "grit" and thinks that failure is a blessing. She is surprisingly competitive and loves a good challenge. A homebody at heart with a love of cooking and baking, Dina is happiest at home, in the kitchen, with a cup of tea and her family. An avid reader, lover of anything fitness-related, believer that movement is medicine, and a mom of two hockey-playing boys, Dina spends most of her free time freezing in ice rinks up and down the east coast.

About The Koitz Group The Koitz Group strives to deliver the highest quality experience in real estate representation for both buyers and sellers. With a primary focus on Greater Bethesda & DC luxury real estate, the Koitz Group achieves five star client service through a consultative, “hands-on” approach. True to Gretchen Koitz’s core philosophies, The Koitz Group is known by clients as trustworthy, patient, knowledgeable, friendly, and caring - a comfortable, seamless real estate transaction is paramount. With the Koitz Group, the results speak for themselves and there are many satisfied buyers and sellers who can attest to the success of their fundamental principles.

About The Kulman Harrison Team Evan Kulman, Susan Harrison and members of The Kulman Harrison Team are truly a dynamic group when it comes to the Hamptons and New York City real estate. They love what they do, know their business well, and really care about their clients – and it shows in their tremendous enthusiasm and success. They work with a diverse clientele which consists of first-time homebuyers to investors, major movie stars to business moguls. Everyone is important to them, and they’ll make you feel like you are their only client. No matter what your needs and “wish list,” Evan, Susan and members of the team will listen attentively and respond proactively to help you achieve your goals. Taking time to get to know exactly what every client wants is what has made them one of the top teams working in both NYC and on the East End of Long Island. “Real estate is a major investment, yet the experience of buying or selling doesn’t have to be stressful, tedious or overwhelming. We make it enlightening, exciting and enjoyable, as it should be for every client.” Evan, Susan and members of The Kulman Harrison Team are committed real estate professionals with lifelong careers in the business, and decades of experience between them as brokers, marketers, managers and investors. They are also longtime Hamptons and New York City residents with an unparalleled love for, and command of, these markets. Adriel Reboh’s passion for his profession, strong work ethic and deep devotion to his customers and clients have made him a diligent, trustworthy real estate professional. Having traveled the world, Adriel has a keen understanding of people’s unique and diverse needs. His background in photography, business, marketing and real estate have led him to cultivate an innate eye for detail, creativity and passion for Hamptons real estate. Jarrod Silver's main focus is on his clients' needs. He believes in building and sustaining lifelong relationships with clients and colleagues alike. Through his extensive past experience in sales, Jarrod is able to negotiate the best possible results for all parties involved. Born and raised in New York City, Jarrod has spent every summer of his life in the Hamptons, and has been able to experience the full extent of what the East End has to offer. Together, their knowledge and connections span from Manhattan to Montauk, and Southampton to Shelter Island. Plus they enjoy a loyal following of clients who work with no one else. For the ultimate in service and satisfaction, contact The Kulman Harrison Team today!
title: The Kulman Harrison Team at Compass

description: About The Luxury Collective DC The John Eric + Trevor Moore team is comprised of talented real estate agents, business minds, creatives and designers. For them, treating clients like family is a guiding principle and a way of life for the award-winning JE + TM Team. John Eric and Trevor Moore are dedicated to listening intently, getting the details right, understanding clients’ needs and hopes and making their dreams come true. Encompassing decades of experience in the real estate industry, coupled with deep roots in the DC area, the JE + TM Team excels in helping clients navigate the ever-changing terrain of buying and selling in the DMV. When it comes to real estate, and in life, John Eric and Trevor Moore have yet to meet a challenge they cannot overcome and, they do it with dedication, purpose and hard work. John and Trevor are passionate advocates for their clients and get deals done. Therefore, it is no surprise they are consistently ranked among the Top 1 Percent of agents in the DMV and nationally. The group has been recognized by the WSJ/REALTRENDS America’s Best Agent and Team Rankings’ list of the finest real estate agents in the United States. They are having also been awarded individually and as a team Washingtonian’s Best Realtor seven years in a row. The group has been recognized by Northern Virginia Magazine and Arlington Magazine with top team honors. When you work with the John Eric + Trevor Moore Team, the possibilities are limitless. As they say, Let’s Work Together! John Eric Home Magazine In 2021, we celebrate our ninth anniversary of producing John Eric Home, our award-winning magazine. Our online lifestyle publication provides fantastic articles and features covering the Washington, DC region and much more! Each issue is chock full information and great reads. It contains everything that you need to know and more. Scroll down to hear from our clients. I cannot stress enough what a pleasure it was to work with Trevor and the entire John Eric + Trevor Moore Team. This team is comprised of knowledgeable and experienced professionals. My condo sold within one day of listing and at list price. If you use Trevor as your listing agent, I guarantee a great sale. Smooth and rapid communication and explanations. Terrific advice and support from the first minute to the close date. Ease of mind regarding renovations and other repairs (not only did he plan and execute a kitchen renovation – which netted a much higher profit – he also oversaw other repairs from general wear and tear.) A calm, guiding hand in negotiations. Honestly, there is no better agent to have on your side than Trevor Moore. And Janis from the JE + TM Team was both extremely timely and friendly when helping with the transaction. Through the entire process, I felt incredibly positive and comfortable when working with this team – Bridget C. John Eric has a proven strategy for selling your house quickly and for the greatest return. The superb John Eric + Trevor Moore team can seamlessly handle every aspect of your move (or as much as you need them to), from pre-planning the sale through to the final close. And with the Compass Concierge program, any owner can quickly present their home in the best possible light. So just shut up now and do what he says! You'll be glad you did! – Bruce W. Be prepared to be wowed. We weren’t prepared. But, boy were we wowed. In the run up to prepare for selling our house, we invited a couple of agents to present to us. From our first encounter, John distinguished himself as a business professional with a business plan. A strategic analysis, supported by a lineup of tactics to accomplish each objective, separated John from his peers. John did his homework. He came prepared with an analysis of the neighborhood, its features and demographics. He shared his marketing plan. Based on his ideas of the target price point, this house will likely appeal to a certain customer profile. Large numbers of people are now flocking from Capitol Hill or Georgetown or other congested areas of the city, looking for more space for working remotely and enjoying an expansive private backyard yet not giving up proximity to the city. A second source of prospects would logically be government and large public companies. John’s team’s marketing plan had a development process for leveraging these known targets. Regionally targeted advertising, mostly social, focuses on precise neighborhoods. Good old fashioned networking has been most successful for well placed HR managers and recruiters. Lifestyle and opportunity is their common language. John’s profiling described prospective buyer types. The house had to speak directly to them. The kitchen needed cosmetic upgrades. The paint and carpet needed cosmetic refreshes. The staging all needed to complement what they see in the store showrooms. And to accomplish all this, Compass Concierge provides the house refresh financing, due and payable interest free upon settlement. Even better, the team of John Eric & Trevor Moore, take ownership of project management, driven expertly by Janis Hicks, overseeing contractor selection, workmanship quality and expeditious implementation. Slam dunk. I didn’t tell John that he had me at this point without yet having had the pricing discussion. As to price, John produced his analysis of comparables. John’s comparable review suggested a number significantly higher than the other realtors. Yes, this raised a concern but it was supported by a well reasoned argument. Supply and demand played strongly in his logic as did the emotional appeal of the house features. Don’t envision the house as it is now. Picture it as it will be. The strength of his argument was bolstered by his methodical process. John’s listing price, when brought to market, would be informed by multiple datapoints including his own evaluation, a formal pricing gaggle of high performing realtors in our market, plus John’s own contracted formal appraisal. When I asked other realtors to explain their marketing plan for our house, I was universally met with, “once we list your home on MLS, I will be the best negotiator you have ever seen…” John’s marketing, “The house won’t even make it to MLS. Any true buyer making it to the bidding discussion will be competing on maximum price or I haven’t done my job of preparing them to bid.” The result, 30 days from the day we gave the team of John Eric & Trevor Moore the go ahead, we settled on the sale. The settlement was wonderfully uneventful. We were wowed. – Howard and Gloria John and his team define a professional Real Estate office. They are attentive, responsive and available and turned what can be a stressful life experience into a pleasurable exchange. John went out of his way to ensure that the needs of my family were being met, and always with professional grace. Listing or buying? I could not recommend John and his team more! – Luke and Mary F. John Eric was wonderful! John was very helpful communicating all the necessary steps to get our house sold so we could move forward with our move across the country. He did everything and more to get us to the finish line. I am beyond grateful for everything John and his team did for us. I highly recommend them. – Kathie R. John Eric is an excellent realtor. We worked with John and his team to purchase and sell several homes in Northern Virginia and are always thrilled with his market expertise and flawless execution. John's attention to detail goes beyond a simple checklist. He takes ownership of the entire process, going above and beyond to help his clients find the perfect home and providing a seamless experience in the administration of documentation and inspections. We always felt like John's most important clients, and he goes out of his way to provide white-glove service and a positive attitude. Additionally, we always felt that we could trust John and his team to keep the process moving, providing incredible peace of mind during what could potentially be a stressful and draining time. We enthusiastically recommend John to any buyer or seller in the DC market, regardless of budget. Thank you John, Trevor, Janis and the entire Compass team! – Chip and Ali We recently made a quick decision to buy a home in Florida, but that meant selling our townhouse in Arlington, VA quickly. I knew of John and Trevor through other sales in our community, so decided to give them a call. They came right out, and took over from (in a good way) the start. Everything was explained in simple terms for us to understand. John and Trevor brought in a stager (Claudia) a delightful lady and they turned our townhouse into a magazine model. Each morning when I woke up, I did not know where I was, but the house SOLD in 2.5 days.Lots of papers to sign, and lots to do, but with their guidance it was done in a calming easy way. Then we were turned over to Janis, whom I believe is John’s assistant in their real estate office. Again, what a pleasure to work with her. She would email us things to read, ask questions about, and to sign. Every document Janis would send us was easy to understand and we were told to ask any questions, and then once we completely understood what we were signing, we would sign and send right back to her.I can not stress enough how hard it is to sell your home of 20 years, the emotions ran high, but this team made the transition smooth and easy. The emotions were still there, but they helped us through that time. - Tom and Bill A huge Thanks to John and Trevor @ Compass for selling our Arlington home in 3 days! Their team eased the stress of a fast corporate relocation and took care of everything for us on the ground while we were already relocated and living in Dallas. From staging to landscaping, they handled everything to maximize our sale! Super easy and highly recommended! - Chris Womack & Brandon Patchett We retained John and Trevor to sell our condo after 2 prior sales efforts had failed. Jointly, using their candid assessments of the condo market, we explored all options and set a sales goal. John and Trevor were efficient and effective in their marketing and soon identified and engaged potential buyers. They achieved a deal at our asking price in a very short time. All objectives for this sale were met and the closing was well-managed, which Shelly made happen. We would recommend this team without reservation. - Steve & Karen John Eric and his team were the perfect realtors. I do realize perfect is a strong word and I mean it. They responded almost immediately to every question or request. They priced the unit spot-on, recommended reasonable upgrades, coordinated getting those upgrades and a few repairs completed, and kept me up to date on everything. Because of these actions, the home sold quickly and at a great price. At every stop, they were transparent about options and actions, there were no hidden fees, and prices charged for work were completely fair. The team is professional and knowledgeable. I have closed (one side or the other) over a dozen times in recent years and this was by far the smoothest and most low stress closing I’ve ever experienced. - E. Nelson I just have to say that working with Trevor and John was a dream experience! They were professional, courteous and prompt in all his communications and actions. I couldn’t think of anything that just was not top notch about the whole experience! They even had recommendations for the moving company and handyman that I needed to complete the relocation process. I wouldn’t dream of using anyone else for all of my real estate needs! - Julie Siemers John Eric and Trevor Moore were outstanding in every respect! Incredibly helpful, efficient and responsive, everything went like a breeze and the house sold for exactly what they said it would despite lower initial estimates from other Realtors. They came warmly recommended by neighbors who were absolutely right! - Jean F. Delpech We worked with John Eric and Trevor Moore during our relocation to Virginia earlier this year. We were unfamiliar with the area and needed someone knowledgeable who could provide strong guidance. We hit the jackpot with John and Trevor. Relocation is complicated by the need for good schools, sports programs, a doable commute and all the little things that go beyond an actual real estate purchase. From our very first phone conversation with John, we were impressed by his knowledge of the areas we were considering. We met both John and Trevor when they showed us homes in various areas around Nova. As corny as it sounds, it truly was like getting two for one. They both offer unique talents and we always felt like we had someone holding our hand. We decided we loved Vienna which had low inventory. After they showed us every property available that met our criteria, we ended up purchasing a home that was not listed after Trevor scoured the area and found it. John and Trevor were able to manage the whole transaction and represented us well. We would definitely use them again and highly recommend them. - Jackie Vaughn John Eric Trevor Moore and Associates are realtors who go well above and beyond when it comes to selling your home. The amount of time, energy and effort that they put into selling our home is what makes them most stand out. Not only did they recommend improvements that we could do to help sell our house at a higher price, they had the vendors to do the work and even oversaw the changes. They will be as involved as you’d like… they will coordinate and oversee every aspect of selling your home, or they will work in conjunction with you to get the job done. JETMA had multiple homes that they were in the process of selling and not once did we feel like just a number, or as if they weren’t working 100% on selling our home. Very responsive, always attentive and also a fun group to boot! I enjoyed working with JETMA so much, I decided to join the team!- Colette Bryan John, Trevor and Janis are professional, friendly, helpful and very energetic. I highly recommend them. I bought a condo a few years ago where John was the selling agent. I was so impressed with John and his team that I recently had them sell a property for me. They made a complex sale easy for me. They ensured a top dollar valuation of the property by advertising it aggressively as well as helping with some last minute repairs. Truly, they helped across the full spectrum of what a top tier real estate team should do to help their client. I trust them implicitly. About The Mary Lynn White Team Mary Lynn White, Kirsten Rowan and Anda Plavnieks – known collectively as The Mary Lynn White Team of Compass – bring a fresh, contemporary approach to real estate, offering a rare combination of expertise, authenticity, and fun to every client interaction. Savvy negotiating skills, meticulous attention to detail, and dedication to our clients’ goals are our top priorities. Whether you are budget-conscious or luxury-focused, a first-time buyer or a savvy real estate investor (or anywhere in between!), we customize our approach to meet your needs on your timeline. We enjoy a proven track record, including generating top sales prices in the shortest time for our sellers in many of the neighborhoods we serve, and helping our buyers win many bidding wars in highly competitive markets. While we have been the recipient of numerous “Top Realtor” awards, our biggest and best reward is earning lifetime relationships with our clients, the true measure of success. Give us a call, send us an email or connect with us on Instagram - You won't be disappointed! EXPERTLY HANDLING: Residential Sales and Purchases in the DC Metro Area Covering DC, MD, & VA Condos, Coops, and Single Family Homes New Development Simultaneous Buy/Sell Transactions and Multi-Faceted Moves 1st Time Homebuyers Downsizing/Empty Nesters Estate Sales and Divorce Transactions Sale of Rental Properties/1031 Exchanges/TOPA Rights

About The Meridian Advisors Seth Feuer is a true real estate professional, with unparalleled expertise in luxury condos and a deep understanding of Miami Beach's diverse neighborhoods. With over two decades of experience, Seth heads The Meridian Advisors , a team dedicated to providing concierge service to clients across Miami. A native New Yorker, Seth's love for architecture and art began at a young age and evolved into a career defined by attention to detail, innovative marketing strategies, and an unwavering commitment to his clients. His unique ability to match buyers with the perfect property stems from an intimate knowledge of Miami's most sought-after buildings and his passion for the city's vibrant lifestyle. Seth leads a highly specialized team at The Meridian Advisors, each member bringing unique expertise to the table. From luxury waterfront homes to urban high-rises, the team’s collective knowledge spans the full spectrum of Miami’s dynamic real estate market. Together, they provide tailored solutions for every client, ensuring that no matter the neighborhood or property type, their clients receive unmatched insight and support. We believe in thoughtful, meaningful, full-service real estate - not only to get the best result, but the best experience along the way.

About The Navigate Group The Navigate Group consistently delivers exceptional service to our clients. Our goal is that every client is unconditionally satisfied with our work, and finds the home buying or selling process informative, collaborative, stress-free, and enjoyable! Behind the scenes, we take our work seriously! We’re marketing, research, and data fanatics who obsess over the details that position our clients strategically for their best outcome. With our team, you not only get three experienced realtors with over 25 years of combined work in the field, you get the benefit of our professional experience in other collaborative fields - law, architecture, professional coaching, residential development, and investments.

About The Nolan Team at Compass The Nolan Team at Compass is a dynamic real estate partnership led by mother and son, Lynne and Jake Nolan, now proudly joined by Team Agent Miki Scarfo. Combining their years of experience and shared core values, this cohesive group consistently delivers real estate guidance rooted in luxury-level service, thoughtful advice, and a client-focused mindset. Lynne, Jake, and Miki offer complementary skill sets that make the entire Nolan Team experience a sophisticated and tech-driven journey. They believe in teamwork and collaboration, and their unwavering integrity is key to nurturing trust and developing their impressive repeat and referral customer base The Nolan Team offerings: -A communicative, responsive style -Client focused and strategic marketing -Staging expertise -Market trend and data analysis experts -Deep involvement in the Westport community, offering an encyclopedic and extensive network -Not afraid to pull up their sleeves to get the job done. No matter what it takes. Client Testimonials Scroll down for more ★★★★★ "Lynne is the best!! She was so patient with me and found me the perfect house. She's so easy to deal with, has great taste and was able to weed through the junk to find what I was looking for. Don't go anywhere else, Lynne is your agent!! " - D. Breier "Outstanding. Lynne is affable, capable, and accommodating." - L. Kutcher "It was wonderful! Lynne is not only a well-informed and conscientious real estate agent but a wonderful person in so many ways. We were "telephone" introduced originally by our agent in California and he said that he thought we were a great match. He was absolutely correct. Lynne assisted us in so many ways. We arrived from California with little knowledge of Connecticut and certainly were not prepared for the house sale boom here. Lynne graciously arranged multiple property showings for us, including areas that were farther away for her. Lynne always did her "due diligence" and provided us with information about the property, the city, etc. There are attributes such as punctuality, determination, intelligence, and politeness to name a few that she certainly possesses, but it is her kind-heartedness and compassion that sets her apart. When needed, Lynne was always readily available with words of encouragement or sage advice. It is evident that she is an extraordinary person who not only is extremely knowledgeable in her field, but also a person who cares deeply about her clients. We feel extremely fortunate to have had her on "our side" representing our best interests. We would recommend Lynne in a heart beat." - S. Braz "As we began our search for a house in Westport, we met Lynne at an open house she was running and immediately knew that we wanted to have her be our buyers agent. She’s super funny, kind, wise and a straight shooter. As soon-to-be transplants from the City, she immediately “got us,” what we wanted and perhaps more importantly what we didn’t want. As we began our search, Lynne was super helpful and knowledgeable in explaining the pros and cons of each of the towns around Westport, including Weston, Fairfield, Wilton. But Lynne is a Westport gal at heart and her love of the town shines through. We spent probably 5 weekends with Lynne looking at houses. Not only was it super fun, but she was not pushy at all and stayed on top follow-up tours and continually refined the search as we went along. When we finally found the house that we loved, she worked insanely hard to to get the price down, ultimately securing us a very good deal on a historic home with a pool within walking distance of town — all things on our list of “would like to have but not dealbreakers.” We highly recommend Lynne and have in fact recommend her to numerous friends thinking of moving to the area. She’s good people and you could not find a better buyers agent in the Westport area. And if we ever sell our house, no question Lynne will be selling it." - S. Elliott "Fantastic! Lynne went above and beyond during our search - she was incredibly responsive communicating with us, and really proactive when it came to finding the perfect home for us despite trying market conditions! " - A. & S. Slade "To put it bluntly: Lynne is the best. Yes, that may come across as hyperbole, but the truth is that Lynne's depth of knowledge about Westport brought us a sense of calm and ease in what has been a relentless and hectic real estate market. Not only did she understand exactly what we were looking for, but she was proactive and helpful in showing us different parts of town and a variety of homes. Some which we didn't even think would be on our radar. When we found a place that we quickly fell in love with, her expertise shined further. She always acted in our best interest, gave invaluable advice, and educated us on the process: from finalizing our bids to referring vendors inspection/closing/etc. Lynne is someone that cares deeply about her clients and will go the extra mile to help. She's not just an excellent agent, but we also are lucky enough to now call her a friend!" - B. & B. Groat "Our experience with Lynne and Jake was perfect and they were such a pleasure to work with. We were searching for our first home during the very competitive Covid market, and they truly made this milestone a breeze. We were relatively new to the area and they took the time to show us all around Fairfield County to confirm which area was best for us. As we toured houses, Lynne and Jake always gave us their honest opinion and expertise. They made us feel like family, and it was a very personable experience. Their communication was top notch, and they were always available to talk every step of the way. Once we found our house, Lynne and Jake’s knowledge of the market made it easy to trust their recommendation for our initial offer, and guidance throughout the brief negotiation process. We had an accepted offer within a few days and had a seamless closing. They knew all the right people in the area to connect with from lawyers, inspectors, and general contractors. Whenever something came up, Lynne and Jake were there to take care of it. There was a point in which the garage needed to be further inspected, and instead of us traveling from out of state, they were able to handle it. Lynne and Jake went above and beyond for us, and before we knew it, we were officially homeowners! Lynne and Jake are the best team in Fairfield County, and we highly recommend them for anyone looking to have an enjoyable home buying experience!" - A. & J. Alleva "Lynne is wonderful. She genuinely listens to her clients’ requests, works so hard for them, and is a good-hearted, friendly person. Some people are just a perfect fit for what they do, and she is one of those people." - J. Betancourt "I cannot say enough wonderful things about both Jake and Lynne. Searching for our home while navigating a challenging market felt desperate at times. They made even the most difficult and disappointing days more enjoyable and hopeful. Their willingness to go above and beyond to support and guide our search made those days so much easier. Ultimately, they found us the home of our dreams and we could not be happier. We consider ourselves lucky to have found such a great team to take on one of life's biggest challenges. You really can't go wrong with this generous, dedicated and capable team. We love you Jake and Lynne!! Thank you for everything!!" - K. Ryan

About The Olivia & Dito Team As trusted Washington Realtors with a lifetime of industry experience, Olivia Kibler and Dito Sevilla are the real estate duo you want on your side. Licensed in DC, MD, and VA, Olivia and Dito have built a hands-on, all-inclusive real estate experience, providing white-glove service for every client—regardless of price point or location. Known for their uncompromising attention to detail, tireless work ethic, and dedication to finding stress-free solutions, they are every client's strongest advocates, persevering relentlessly until each has found their next home or sold for the best price. For Olivia, knowledge is power, and she leverages this data-driven outlook to arm clients with the facts and insights they rely on to make the choices that are right for their future. Dito, on the other hand, brings the unique ability to see every transaction through the eyes of the client, taking the time to understand their hopes and preferences before translating them into reality. Together, they form the ultimate partnership—united by their unwavering commitment to creating exceptional experiences for buyers and sellers across the DMV. Born and raised in the area, Olivia and Dito both offer an encyclopedic knowledge of the neighborhoods in and around our nation's capital, and they love helping clients discover all of its nuanced charm, just as they love helping them achieve their real estate goals. Get in touch with Olivia and Dito today to learn why when it comes to real estate, two is always better than one.

About The Phoebe & Jesse Team Meet Phoebe & Jesse, the ultimate DMV real estate dream team. Their journey began years ago when Phoebe, not yet a licensed agent, embarked on the path to homeownership with the guidance of a highly recommended agent—none other than Jesse himself! Today, Phoebe and Jesse form a dynamic partnership, offering unparalleled service to clients across all three jurisdictions. They are proud to announce that recently their team has expanded, welcoming talented new members into the fold. With Phoebe's corporate acumen and strategic planning paired with Jesse's decade-spanning real estate expertise, they bring a formidable combination to the table. Phoebe ensures seamless transitions through every stage of a deal, while Jesse's creativity, negotiation prowess, and empathetic approach ensure tailored results for each client. Together, Phoebe and Jesse embody the adage "two heads are better than one," providing clients with an intimate understanding of the real estate process. Education, transparency, ethics, and client satisfaction are their guiding principles. Experience firsthand why collaboration leads to superior outcomes. Get in touch today and elevate your real estate journey with The Phoebe and Jesse Team.

About The Rebecca Weiner Group Buying and selling a home should be an exciting time, whether you're a first time home buyer, a downsizer, or an investor. The RW group makes sure that excitement lasts regardless of the challenges that arise. Our expert knowledge of DC, savvy negotiating skills, and data driven analysis of the metro areas many markets guide you at every turn. The RW Weiner Group encompasses a unique set of skills. Led by top producer, Rebecca Weiner, the RW groups priority is ensuring their clients full understanding of all aspects of the buying and selling process, and empowering them to make educated decisions. With combined experiences in the fields of law, public relations, interior design, and professional organizing, the RW Group provide superior customer service while anticipating clients’ individual needs. We are equipped to provide the full auxiliary services one may require; from home repairs to upgrades, staging, organizing, and moving. The RW Group will change the way you buy and sell a home. Rebecca Weiner Group 2020 Rebecca Weiner Group 2021

About The Rockwell Group The Rockwell Group is a real estate team licensed in DC, MD, and VA who specializes in the luxury home market of downtown DC and surrounding VA and MD. The Rockwell Group caters to residential home buyers and sellers as well as commercial investors. With more than 30 years of collective experience and more than $300 million in career sales, the expert members of our team assist clients in every aspect of acquisition, stabilization and selling of real estate. When working with clients our focus is on design conscious branding and marketing with a client first approach. The Rockwell Group provides concierge real estate services, building ROCK solid relationships, with WELL respected results.

About The Rutstein Group The Rutstein Group, an esteemed collective with a solid track record spanning over two decades, is your definitive guide in real estate, catering to buyers, sellers, and developers alike. Infusing technology with a personalized touch, this team stands out at Compass, making use of their avant-garde platform to streamline listings, transactions, and client data— all seamlessly integrated into a comprehensive hub. The heart of their approach lies in customization— using advanced insights and intricate data to tailor recommendations, fine-tune negotiations, and enhance their service delivery, perfectly aligning with each client's unique needs. Their wide-ranging proficiency stretches across single-family homes, luxury estates, condo conversions, and new developments, offering an unparalleled level of expertise regardless of the property type. With licensure extending to DC, Maryland, and Virginia, The Rutstein Group not only ensures a seamless transaction but also a truly rewarding real estate experience. Guided by the stewardship of Mark Rutstein, this seven-strong team of licensed Realtors exhibits the perfect blend of local knowledge, professional acumen, and customer-centric ethos that sets The Rutstein Group apart in the real estate industry. Find out why The Rutstein Group is one of the most respected for buying and selling real estate at DCRealEstate.com .
title: The Rutstein Group

description: About The Sherif and Ali Group Sherif and Ali lead a dynamic team that enjoys working with local developers and homeowners in the high-end market. Above all, building relationships and providing best-in-class customer service are at the heart of their business.

About The Signing Group We believe in taking the time to understand who you are and what you want. Our experienced team of Deaf and hearing (CODA) professionals ensure full access to clear communication, which is so important for a positive, successful home-buying process! From start to end, we are there for you in an experience tailored to fit your needs. From the day you first sit down with us, we listen closely to your needs and wants. We help you develop realistic expectations and a clear understanding of the process. We walk you through the huge piles of paperwork that come with the territory, and we follow up on every little detail. We make as many visits and calls as it takes. We hold hands, offer Kleenex and hugs, climb roofs and crawl through basements, and celebrate with you when you pick up your house keys for the first time. We are passionate about working within the Signing Community. We always strive to find ways to give back, because we would not be where we are today if not for our close-knit community

About The Solovey Group Sam and Orysia each launched their individual real estate careers in the early 2000s at the same brokerage firm in Chevy Chase. We bonded over shared personal and professional values and a deep commitment to always put our clients’ interests above our own. Sam and Orysia transitioned to Compass around the same time in 2017. Our respective businesses continued to flourish, and it seemed natural to join forces to provide our best practices and complimentary styles of service. Thirty years of combined real estate expertise, we are proud to share our deep industry knowledge with a diverse set of clients. While we continue to work independently with our respective base of clients, we have a collaborative approach when it comes to utilizing the cutting-edge marketing and data driven technology that serves all of our buyers and sellers equally well. Sam and Orysia support one another, so that we can ultimately better support a growing network of clients. In 2022, The Solovey group welcomed Jon Solovey who is not only a successful Realtor, but also Sam's older brother. Jon had an amazingly productive 2021 at another local brokerage and decided it was time bring his success and momentum to our team in order to support our growing network of buyers and sellers. The Sam Solovey Group is proud to have achieved more than $40M in sales in 2021 and an equally impressive 2022 and 2023 as well. In 2023, the group welcomed Mary Zitello who has enjoyed a lengthy and prosperous real estate career in the DMV. In fact, she too worked with Sam and Orysia at their prior brokerage in Chevy Chase, so we have completed the "family reunion." Sam has been married 20 years to his wife Lori, and they have 3 boys aged 14, 12 and 9 as well as their 2 year old Aussiedoodle named Charlotte. In Sam's free time, he loves to run, bike, do anything and everything with his family and has recently discovered pickleball. Client Testimonials ★★★★★ " Sam was tremendous. We are first-time homebuyers and had a lot to learn about pretty much everything relating to home buying and ownership. There was no question or issue too small for Sam's full attention, and we knew right from our first interaction that he was someone who cares deeply about the people he's helping, not just making a sale. Our search lasted roughly three months and Sam's guidance was crucial during every phase of the search. Whether it was in formulating our priorities, digging deeper on property details, or final negotiations, Sam was always willing and able to provide all the information needed for us to make decisions. He would regularly say that these decisions were ours, but his emails were usually so thorough that we'd have been crazy not to follow his advice. This attention to detail did not wane even during the early days of the COVID-19 pandemic, although we would not have blamed Sam if it did! Ultimately, we are happy in our new home but we did have a tinge of regret after purchase knowing that we'd no longer get to work with Sam. " - Bobby H ★★★★★ " I enjoyed and appreciated working with Sam. Sam is smart, direct and honest. He thinks creatively about how to achieve the outcome one is looking for, and he has excellent resources to call upon. I also liked that Sam is very responsive to all forms of communication. The sale of our house was drama free, and Sam guided us smoothly through the process. Everything and more than we expected or hoped for! " - Susan B

About The Synergy Group “We believe that Real Estate should be simple. We use service and marketing strategies that work, to make sure our clients have an experience they'll love.” The Synergy Group is redefining how Real Estate is done. Daniel and Scott have combined their vast experience and knowledge across all types of real estate to innovate the experience for customers. As the field continues to shift towards a tech-driven approach, The Synergy Group is focused on how their skills complement digital tools to provide their clients with the most value, and the best results. They pride themselves on staying ahead of the curve, being experts in all facets of real estate, and above all else, hustling to keep their clients’ best interests at the forefront of everything they do. “As multigenerational Washingtonians we are actively involved in the community. We are the ones with the local knowledge to help you achieve your real estate goals. We're not just selling your home, we're building relationships. Everything from our marketing to our negotiation skills are a step above the rest. We're dedicated to bringing you a one of a kind real estate experience you won't find anywhere else.” - The Synergy Group Client Testimonials ★★★★★ “Scott Sachs with the Synergy Group is the BEST. His knowledge of the Northern Virginia area is top notch. We could throw out any intersection or neighborhood, and he immediately was giving us the inside scoop. He has an extensive network of agents, contractors, and handymen that also helped throughout the process. He helped us navigate the offer process and eventual acceptance process smoothly, answering all the questions we had along the way. This included cost estimates for updates, advice on the cleanest offer to provide, information on school systems, etc. In such a crazy market, we would not have gotten our home without Scott Sachs. description: About The Tom Buerger Team With a combined total of over 72 years of real estate experience in the. DMV region and over $1 billion in lifetime sales, our team-comprising Tom Buerger, Jonathan Reff, Kevin Rowe, Matthew Buerger, Kendall Splawn, and Anita Studgeon-stands as a cornerstone in the. industry. Team sales volume for 2024: $42,027,525 Number of households sold (2022 & 2023 & 2024): Seller Side: 50 Buyer Side: 76 Total: 126 Combined years of real estate team knowledge: 73+ Average team days on market: 25 Avg DOM Contact us today to learn more about how we can help you achieve your real estate goals. - Tom Buerger, Kevin Rowe, Mathew Buerger, Kendall Splawn, and Anita Studgeon

About The Toni A. Ghazi Group International and Domestic Buyers and Sellers have always sought out the Toni A. Ghazi Group for their multicultural perspective, unparalleled service, and attention to detail. Whether you are seeking a luxury condo in the city or a spacious property for entertaining, Toni and his team will put their combined 60+ years of experience to work for you. The team speaks Arabic, Spanish, French, Hindi, Italian, English (and learning Mandarin) and easily navigates the nuances of their clients’ cultural and business norms. In the past few years alone, the team has sold more than $110 million of residential real estate to discerning buyers from the World Bank, IFC, IMF, IBD, UN, Amazon, US State Department, White House, Middle Eastern Royal Families, Global Businessmen, and many other organizations. Recipients of multiple awards years after year (Washingtonian & America’s Top 100 Best/Top Producers and Real Trends to name a few), The Toni A. Ghazi Group continues to perform and out-performs itself consistently. Client Testimonials Scroll down for more Toni helped my partner and I rent our first apartment in DC and then purchase a home in Capitol Hill two years later. All of his five star reviews will tell you how great of an agent he is (so true). But moreover, Toni is a great person, and that is the reason why I loved working with him and will recommend him to any of my friends who are looking for a home in the area. 1) Toni is judgement-free. Of all the places we saw, he was supportive, whether we liked the place or not and genuinely wanted us to be happy. He was never judgmental about our budget for our first home and didn't try to push us out of our comfort zone. He stuck with us until we found what was right for us. 2) I wanted to take one last look at a house on a Sunday evening before I put an offer in. I ended up changing my mind after seeing the house again, but Toni dropped what he was doing and rushed from the gym to the house to help me. The house we were looking at was abandoned mid-reno and was a bit of a disaster. He helped me figure out all of the houses' quirks for two hours-- if there were original wood floors under the laminate, if we could salvage any of the trim work, etc. He could've been doing something much more exciting on a Sunday night than lifting up dirty old flooring with me. He always took his time with us, and you would never think that he had several other clients. 3) He'll advocate for you and be on your team. There are countless times where I didn't think to ask for something, but he was always one step ahead of us and went above and beyond what I would've expected. Thank you, Toni! - Allyce M - November 2020 Toni is a reliable, knowledgeable, friendly, patient and resourceful agent! We have been working with him for over 2 years, he first helped us find a condo for rent and later another one for purchase. During the rent search, we were pressed for time and he saw 10+ condos with us in less than 2 days and helped finalize all the paperwork within the same time - super efficient! During the buying process - he patiently saw 50(??)+ units with us all across DC and Arlington, spread out over 6 months - he listened carefully and always always responded to all our needs and preferences, answered our countless questions and put with all our idiosyncrasies with a smile! Super thankful for all his help and hardworking in working with us and will always appreciate his efforts- couldn't have asked for a better agent! - Bratiral D -September 2020. We just purchased our second home with Toni and he was absolutely amazing to work with. He left no detail behind and was so on top of every part of the process. In fact, we had a lot of difficulty with our lender being behind and he was terrific with helping stay on top of them for deadlines to make sure we were protected throughout the process and that our closing was not pushed back. Toni is not only know knowledgeable and experienced, but he is a true pleasure to work with. We wouldn’t want to have anyone else at our side and on our side when we buy a home. - Amanda D – September 2020 Toni was a great help, from start to finish. He is experienced, kind and helpful, and works seemingly all the time around the clock to help you. But he is also not aggressive or pushy with you as his client. I trusted him completely, which in the end is the most important trait when choosing between the 100s of realtors out there. I also really appreciate how non-judgmental he is - of your choices, and your timing, and ultimately of what works for you. He takes big shot clients and normal people clients, and works just as hard for everyone. I would highly recommend him - Genevieve C - September 2020 OH MY GOD! What an absolute pleasure it was to work with Toni to sell my tony Capitol Hill townhome. He is very professional and was able to provide me with an honest assessment of my property and needed updates to make it more attractive. Tony managed the renovations, the staging, the marketing, and the sale in an exceptional manner. I left town and relied on Toni to manage the entire process - I am so glad I did! Toni - thank you; thank you; thank you!!!! I cannot fully express my appreciation for all that you did for us!!!! - Scott C – September 2020 Working with Toni was absolutely wonderful. I have the utmost respect for and confidence in Toni's knowledge, experience, skill, ability and expertise in the real estate world. At one of the worst times, he was able to successfully, and in an amazingly short period of time, sell my elderly sister's condo. In addition to his professional excellence, I found him to be very caring, compassionate and understanding. He always lifted my spirits. Additionally, his response time to my calls, emails, texts was almost immediate. I can't say enough good things about Toni and I highly recommend him. - Nita T. – August 2020 Toni is an amazing realtor and wonderful to work with. As a first-time home buyer, I was anxious before beginning my search, but Toni put me at ease right away. I knew instantly I was in the best hands. I had a million questions, and Toni answered every single one, within minutes of me calling/emailing/texting. He is extremely responsive and not only arranged showings for anything I wanted to look at but also asked great questions to understand better what I was looking for. He was there for me every step of the way, and I am so grateful to Toni for making home buying a smooth and exciting process! - Emma P. – August, 2020

About The Wayfinders The Wayfinders are Carolyn Anderson and Douglas Blocker. Our team name reflects our ideals: Everyone deserves a great guide in the process of buying or selling. Buying or selling a home is a milestone in a person’s life. Whether you’re a first time homebuyer, a move-up seller, or an experienced investor, you can trust The Wayfinders to expertly lead you through the process. Our philosophy is to educate our clients about the market and empower them to make informed decisions to accomplish their financial and lifestyle goals. We are both second generation real estate agents. We know you are trusting us at an important juncture in your life, and we understand the importance of good communication and information. We have over 15 years of experience in the business and currently live, or have lived, in many of the neighborhoods we work in. Whether it is DC, Virginia or Maryland, we have the expertise to guide you home!
title: The Wayfinders

description: About Greylin Greylin Thomas is a second-generation Realtor with personal Real Estate experience of over 20 years! His customers love his gregarious personality, depth of knowledge, direct/honest advice, and advocacy. He holds real estate licenses in MD, DC, and VA and has specialized in many areas to include; Property Management, Mortgage Lending, Condo and HOA Management, Staging, Design, Renovations, Real Estate Investment Consultations, Foreclosures, Short-sales, and most often; traditional Real Estate Sales. His clients love working with him and consist of first-time homebuyers, investors, move-up buyers/sellers, and those who wish to downsize. Greylin grew up in what was the small town of Haymarket, Virginia (before its expansion/development) with his parents, on his grandparent’s farm. He spent the most recent 20 years in Northern Virginia (Alexandria, Arlington) and Washington, D.C. (Logan Circle, Dupont, and Capitol Hill). Fun times for Greylin could be hanging out with friends, cycling on local trails, working out, camping (ask him about his RV trip to Dollywood), traveling, spending time with his family, volunteering, meditating, buying and selling real estate, amateur painting, decorating, and reading. Greylin Thomas is a two-time Washingtonian Magazine Top Producer, has worked with HGTV, and personally sold over 200 homes. He loves what he does and it shows through his client’s reviews, his passion, and his dedication.
title: Realtor®

description: About Natalie At the heart of The Thomas Team is a commitment to our clients. Our philosophy is simple: Your success is our success. With over 30 years of combined experience and cutting-edge market knowledge, we ensure our clients stay ahead in a competitive landscape. Tammy and Natalie bring a hands-on, client-first approach to every transaction—offering strategic insight, tailored guidance, and personal support needed for a seamless real estate experience. When you work with us, you’re not just working with one agent—you’re gaining the full support of a collaborative team dedicated to your success. Whether you’re buying or selling, our mission is simple: To serve your best interests, exceed your expectations, and help you achieve your real estate goals. We’re more than agents—we’re your trusted advisors and partners every step of the way. Licensed in MD and DC.

description: About Marian Real estate is a second career and Marian loves it! It is multi -faceted and fascinating! The perfect vehicle for someone committed to professional excellence and who hates routine and monotony. Every day is different and every client brings a new perspective. Solving and negotiating unique problems that lead to the exhilaration of a win-win closing is what she strives for. Embracing change and innovation keeps life fresh! With an MBA from a top British university, Marian started out in Contracts, managing -million international ventures. Later she crossed over to marketing and after much experience, much international travel and many promotions, Marian ended up as Director of strategic planning for a major aerospace company. Having met that benchmark, Marian put her career on hold to raise a . Married to a diplomat that meant a lot of uprooting and moving and adapting to new environments around the world. This experience, in addition to being wonderfully enriching, is invaluable to understanding and helping clients embarking on a move. Marian knows a lot about moving, and about handling the complex transitions that are a part of modern life. She also has a solid understanding of the business side of real estate and how it relates to the overall economy. Consequently in both Marian’s professional and personal life, she has experience in working with all sorts of people at all levels, including meeting and hosting dignitaries. Marian has even been hosted by her Majesty, the Queen on four separate occasions! All of it is quite different from her early life growing up in Belfast, Northern Ireland during the Troubles -- an exercise in survival that taught her to be resilient and resourceful and to treasure tolerance above all else. Marian’s goal is to find the perfect home for the buyer, and the optimum price for the seller, so that everyone comes out ahead. She cares deeply for her clients and is always willing to go the extra mile to facilitate their moves. So if you’re looking to buy a new home, or sell your current one, or simply to brainstorm about where the market is heading - Just Call Marian!
title: Realtor®

description: About Brock An Arkansas native, Brock has called Washington, D.C., his home for over fifteen years. Prior to his transition into Real Estate, Brock organized poetry and literature events at the Library of Congress. While in higher education, Brock taught at the university level, earning a Ph.D. from King’s College, University of London. Adding a helpful, friendly demeanor and an astute knowledge of the area market, Brock plays an important role at Compass. He specializes in the Dupont, Adams-Morgan, Logan, Mount Pleasant, and Bloomingdale neighborhoods. In Virginia, Brock specializes in Alexandria, Arlington, and the surrounding suburbs. In Maryland, Brock has sold in Bethesda, Chevy Chase, and Takoma Park. Brock likes to spend his free time volunteering and contributing to a variety of local history groups, conducting an historic walking tour of Dupont Circle. In addition to that, he organizes events to raise funds for at-risk local youth as well as a yearly toys-for-tots drive. A former Jeopardy! contestant and published author, Brock always serves as a passionate advocate for his clients. Check out what people are saying: "I worked with Brock Thompson a few years ago on my first home purchase (a one bedroom). My husband and I were finally ready to upgrade to a bigger place, and we went back to Brock. He was really helpful throughout the process! We looked at places over several months and never felt pressured to go with something we didn't want. In the end, he negotiated a great deal for us in a bigger place in our neighborhood, and we are really happy here! He also helped with some guidance about renting our old place out. We're happy to be second time clients and would recommend him to anyone!" -Sean C. "Working with Brock made buying a home easier than I knew it could be. Highly professional and detail oriented, Brock aptly negotiated with the seller and made sure I was in good hands. Will happily use Brock again." -Chris Z. "Working with Brock made buying for the first time an incredibly smooth process. I was overwhelmed initially, but he made everything easy and painless, and got my first offer accepted only 2 weeks after starting my search." -George F. "Brock was great throughout the entire process! He didn't try to influence our opinions on places but had helpful insights when we asked. Highly recommended!" -Adam K.
title: Realtor® licensed in DC, MD & VA

description: About Sherese Sherese Thompson is a REALTOR® based in metro Washington, DC. Sherese Thompson is a dedicated real estate professional with Compass, helping clients navigate the dynamic DMV market, including Washington, D.C., Maryland, and Virginia. With a background in real estate as a real estate investor, Sherese is passionate about guiding buyers and sellers through seamless transactions. Known for her commitment to client satisfaction, she prides herself on providing expert market knowledge, clear communication, and a personalized approach to every transaction. Clients appreciate Sherese’s dedication, professionalism, and ability to make the buying and selling process as smooth as possible. She is particularly skilled at working with first-time homebuyers, ensuring they feel confident and informed every step of the way. Her expertise in relocations and investment properties also allows her to assist clients in making strategic decisions, whether they are moving to the area or looking to expand their real estate portfolio. Specializing in the DMV region, Sherese offers deep insights into the local market trends, neighborhoods, and opportunities that best fit her clients’ needs. Whether you're purchasing your first home, relocating, or investing, Sherese is committed to delivering results and making your real estate experience a success.
title: Realtor®

description: About Ashling Originally from Atlanta, Georgia, Ashling has called the Washington, D.C. area home since 2005. Over the years, she has built a diverse professional background, working in several Congressional offices, a nonprofit trade association, and ultimately discovering her passion in real estate. She is a proud recipient of the Accredited Buyer’s Representative (ABR®) designation from the National Association of REALTORS®. Ashling works with both buyers and sellers across Washington, D.C., Virginia, and Maryland, earning a reputation for being hardworking, honest, and approachable. She holds a Bachelor’s degree in History and Political Science from Wesleyan College—the first college in the world chartered to grant degrees to women—and a Master’s in Public Policy from American University. Ashling lives in Alexandria, Virginia, with her husband, their daughter, and their dachshund, Heidi. Outside of real estate, she enjoys traveling, cooking, and hunting for unique mid-century modern pieces. Client Testimonials Scroll down for more ★★★★★  Ashling is very professional and makes you feel like you're the one and only client. She's very responsive, understands the home-buying process very well, and makes you feel at ease and confident during what can easily be a stressful and chaotic process. I would definitely work with her again.  - Peter F. ★★★★★  We both bought and sold our home with Ashling. She's an amazing person to have in your corner. Our sale became complicated and she worked extra hard to get it closed. She was there offer advice every step of the way. I would not hesitate to recommend her.  - Jonathan M. ★★★★★  Ashling was super helpful in every step in our house sale: thoughtful approach to market, house prep and presentation, open house and communication with us and the prospective buyers. I would 100 percent work with her again.  - Mark H. ★★★★★  Ashling was tremendous during the whole process. She gave expert advice on where I should be looking for a house and how to make myself extremely competitive. I cannot say enough good things about Ashling. I have already recommended her to my sister and other family members looking for a home. She is extremely trustworthy, efficient, practical and just a great person all around! She even sent me a beautiful gift basket after I bought the house! She is the best real estate agent I've ever worked with!  - Tesfaye N. ★★★★★  I have very little experience in house buying. The availability of a specific house was the only reason I undertook the project. I was familiar with Ashling Thurmond, and felt confident in her skills and character. I was not disappointed. She first reviewed the entire process at an initial meeting and provided me with handouts to reinforce the information. She kept in steady contact. That included status reports and reminders of things I needed to carry out. Her contacts with firms needed for a purchase were also professional, competent, and thorough. That includes an inspector and a settlement firm. She was present at meetings with them. I am as pleased with my choice of Shaughn & Co as I am with the ultimate outcome -- the completed purchase I sought. ​​
title: Realtor® | DC, MD & VA

description: About Danny Born in D.C., Danny was raised in a Maryland suburb and brings a lifelong love for the nation’s capital to his real estate work. For as long as he can remember he has loved real estate, and he has warm memories of visiting open houses with his mother as a young boy. Danny got his Real Estate license, following five years as a successful designer and producer of high-end events. When Covid forced a career change, it offered the perfect opportunity to turn his passion for real estate into a career. As a former designer and producer, Danny brings an artistic eye to his real estate work. He is able to envision any home’s full potential and advise buyers on the creative use of space. Using his design skills, he works closely with sellers to stage their homes for maximum appeal to today’s buyers. A former theater major, he is personable and outgoing, bonding quickly with clients and earning their trust. Danny oversees transactions just as he did events– with meticulous attention to detail, carefully managing all parts from start to finish. Like event production, he enjoys guiding clients through a momentous life occasion – buying and selling their homes. In his free time, Danny is a passionate advocate for social justice, especially on issues affecting the LGBTQIA community. Danny lives in D.C. with his husband Ben and their dog Maisy.
title: Realtor®

description: About TKsellshomes of Compass Our Mission Our mission is to provide an outstanding experience for each of our clients by helping them navigate through one of the most complicated and important transactions of their lifetime. We are solution-driven, our resources are vast and exceptional, and we provide world-class service. Our goal is to create a one-of-a kind, stress-free, and financially successful real estate transaction for every client. About TKsellshomes Each person at TKsellshomes is rooted in integrity and driven by tenacity. We are a service-oriented team that always makes you our top priority. After decades of being in the real estate industry, Terrilynn Kelley, associate broker and founder of TKsellshomes, knows how to navigate through the varying complexities of our industry. Every realtor at TKsellshomes follows Terrilynn's lead and stands ready to ensure your experience feels like home. Our team is ready to package your home for the market and offer it as a premium product.

About John As a Realtor for nearly a decade (and a 30-year resident of Washington, D.C.), John has great knowledge of the area's diverse neighborhoods and an extensive, proven track record of helping buyers and sellers successfully navigate the sometimes turbulent, fast-moving D.C. sales market. John has worked extensively with an array of clients, including first-time homebuyers; short and long-term sellers seeking to establish their lives in a different neighborhood or outside of D.C.; parents seeking to move closer to loved ones; newlyweds seeking to upsize; empty-nesters seeking to downsize; seniors seeking to divest of their real estate holdings; diplomats seeking long-term housing during their multi-year tenures in the city, etc. John has managed 130+ sales transactions ranging from $350,000 to $2,100,000. Born in MA and raised in NH, John received his BA in English and Communications from Boston College. Prior to joining Compass, he gained 20-years+ in-depth experience leading sales, marketing, public relations and corporate communications efforts at publicly-traded companies such as JPMorgan Chase, Convera and Teleglobe (formerly Canada's largest international telecom company). In his spare time, John serves as Condo Board President of the 68-unit building where he resides, and manages the @AdamsMorganNews Instagram and Twitter/X accounts for his neighborhood. John also enjoys photography, travel, writing and arts/entertainment. He has travelled to nearly 30 countries and lived in Kuwait for three years following the first Gulf War. Since moving to DC in 1993, John has resided in Chevy Chase (DC), Cleveland Park, Dupont Circle, Mount Pleasant, Penn Quarter, and currently in Adams Morgan for 20+ years. In prior professions, he has worked out of offices based in Dupont Circle, Georgetown, McPherson Square and Logan Circle, as well as Dulles, Reston and Tysons Corner, VA.
title: REALTOR®

description: About Rachel I am a Realtor and I am proud to serve the DC Metro Area! Something I love about my work is my ability to empower my clients through education. I am especially passionate about empowering my clients to build wealth through real estate! I love that my role is changing the narrative; that we are no longer meant to wait, but can choose to write our own destiny through home ownership! I love that everyday, I am making a difference in the lives of my clients and in our community.
title: Realtor® licensed in DC, MD & VA

description: About Martin A tenured agent on the DC real estate scene, Martin Toews guides every client with compassion and unrivaled insight. Martin recognizes that buying or selling a home is one of life’s most significant milestones, which is why he strives to create experiences as rewarding as the results he delivers. Martin focuses on the and resale of historic homes, condominiums, cooperatives, and multi-unit buildings in particular, although he advises clients at all price points and in all stages of life. When working with buyers, Martin employs his knowledge of the market and tenacious negotiating skills to connect clients with their dream homes. For sellers, he leverages a vast, interconnected network to help clients sell their homes faster and for the highest possible price. Whether you’re a first-time buyer or a seasoned seller, Martin is poised to bring your real estate goals to life. A native of Nebraska, Martin has lived in Washington, D.C. since 1986. In his spare time, you might find him playing tennis with his husband Steve. Check out The Martin Jeff Group's website following this link!
title: Realtor®

description: About Aneta With a strong background in restaurant management and event planning, Aneta knows very well what it takes to be diligent and work hard for her clients. “To me there is nothing more gratifying than seeing clients delighted with the outcome of their event, which in most cases always faces some sort of obstacles or challenges. I love guiding people through the process and giving them options.” Her trustworthiness, dynamic personality and “go to bat” attitude is what she brings with her to the The Mollaan Babbington Group. In her spare time Aneta loves traveling the world and enjoys learning about different cultures, especially when it comes to the culinary side. She is also a big animal advocate.
title: Mollaan Babbington Group | Real Estate Salesperson

description: About Raquel Raquel Torres O'Brien, hailing from the picturesque Burgos, Spain, has seamlessly transitioned her professional journey into the realm of opulent wine and hospitality. Her family's ownership of a vineyard nestled in the heart of the revered Ribera del Duero wine region has undeniably contributed to her passion for wine. Raquel's journey began in Madrid, where she earned her degree in Advertising and Public Relations. In 2012, she ventured to the United States to further her studies and embark on a career that would combine her European sophistication with American opportunity. A significant milestone came when she earned her MBA in 2015, and given her background as a vineyard owner, she made a deliberate shift towards the world of wine. Since 2016, Raquel has donned the role of sommelier and wine director at some of Washington, D.C.'s most prestigious dining establishments, including Fabio Trabocchi's Del Mar and Enrique Limardo's Imperfecto. Here, she has cultivated invaluable relationships with discerning guests. Her entrepreneurial flair came to the forefront as she launched her own wine consulting company, further solidifying her reputation as a connoisseur and expert in wine. Raquel's entry into Compass marks an exciting new chapter in her career, as she brings her passion for service and astute business skills to the world of real estate. Her unique approach as a connector, adept at linking clients with the right people, positions her as a valuable asset in the competitive real estate industry. By merging her commitment to service excellence with her entrepreneurial acumen, Raquel is superbly positioned to assist clients in achieving their real estate aspirations. In her recent endeavors, Raquel has become a member of Women of Wine, a non-profit organization dedicated to empowering women in the wine community by fostering connections and opportunities. Her commitment to giving back and supporting her fellow women in the industry showcases her dedication to her profession and community. When she's not immersed in the world of real estate, Raquel resides in Washington, D.C., with her husband and one-year-old daughter. In her leisure moments, she indulges in her love for travel, frequently returning to Spain to visit her family while exploring the country's most exquisite wineries and vineyards.
title: Realtor®

description: About Jennifer As an experienced agent in the DC area market, Jennifer "Jen" wants her clients to WIN in every situation. She achieves this by asking questions that help uncover her clients' needs and priorities. By listening to their answers, she fully understands their respective visions and desires while managing expectations and offering thoughtful advice. Whether assisting first-time home buyers, savvy investors, or seasoned sellers, Jen is fiercely loyal to her clients and is dedicated to demystifying the process to help her clients reach their goals. Jen believes that owning real estate in the nation’s capital is a great investment, whether a client is a first-time home buyer or an investor. She has been a homeowner for more than 23 years herself. With over a decade of real estate experience in the DC metro area, including starting her own advertising firm, Jen brings a unique skill set to Your P&rtners team at Compass. She is dedicated to harnessing Compass’ best-in-class support and a suite of innovative tools to help her clients navigate the home-buying and selling process more seamlessly than ever before. For clients looking to invest in a property, Jen has unrivaled knowledge and familiarity with condo by-laws and lease restrictions – it is right in her wheelhouse. When she’s not working with The P&rtners team, Jen enjoys volunteering at one of the many local organizations she’s involved with, including Holy Trinity School and Church, Gonzaga College High School and St. John's College High School. Jen is a member of the Washington Canoe Club, and a board member of Best Buddies. Jen’s husband, Tim, is President of Attaché Corporate Housing. They have two children and live in Dupont Circle. The Touchettes all enjoy a passion for tennis, skiing and travel. View Jennifer's Video Bio
title: Senior Vice President Realtor® DC | MD | VA

description: About Treasury Homes of Compass With the utmost professionalism, resourcefulness and dedication, Treasury Homes provide an exceptional real estate experience that ensures that their clients receive outstanding personal service and professional representation. Treasury Homes offer their clients a smart, solution-oriented, consultative approach and fully enjoy sharing their insights into the rich and charming character that the distinctive communities of The Greater DMV have to offer! As specialist in the Acquisition and Marketing of Residential, Condominium, Luxury and Investment Properties, Treasury Homes is genuinely commitment to serving each client with exceptional first-class service, true advocacy and full-service resources that markedly result in each client’s real estate dreams coming true! Treasury Homes’ trusted counsel, acute discretion and highly responsive approach clearly sets them apart. Whether it’s a review of the technical points of the transaction, the joy of working with first time buyers, staging a listing to making it shine, analyzing current market data or applying new marketing applications, each member is extremely attentive in seeing that their clients’ needs are thoroughly attended to. The team is very thorough in providing constant communication about each important point of the transaction and are always extremely attentive, accessible and respond promptly to their clients. Delivering responsive, confident results and finding creative and equitable solutions are all part of Treasury Homes distinguished style in providing exceptional representation. Treasury Homes is truly a highly dedicated team of professionals who through their informed and insightful expertise provide an extraordinary and elevated real estate experience. Contact Treasury Homes to serve you and your personal real estate interests.

About Trent & Co With over 90 years of combined experience, Trent & Co is one of the most trusted and top-performing real estate teams in the Washington Metropolitan Area. Representing clients across all three jurisdictions— DC, Maryland, and Virginia — our team brings a deep understanding of the region’s diverse markets. Led by nationally ranked agent Trent Heminger, who has been named for over a decade to The Wall Street Journal’s REAL Trends + Tom Ferry’s “America’s Best Real Estate Agents,” the team has also been consistently recognized as Top Producers by Washingtonian and Bethesda Magazine. We specialize in guiding first-time buyers, growing families looking to upsize, and downsizers ready for their next chapter, handling everything from stylish city condos to expansive luxury homes with the same level of care and expertise. Known for market insight, responsive service, and a client-first mindset, Trent, along with Mary Noone, Kevin Gray, Rick Woler, Andrew Nelson, Jay Nix, Chaudry Ghafoor, Tommy Hart, Ilana Tanowitz, D’Ann Lanning, Kori Kamradt, and Laura Freedenberg, form one of the most respected teams in the region.

About Michelle Michelle Triolo has lived in Maryland & the DMV area for the past 30+ years and graduated from Severna Park High School. She relocated to San Diego, CA for a number of years to pursue her professional dance career as a performer, choreographer and instructor. It was in San Diego where she developed a passion for Real Estate and got her real estate license to begin helping Buyers and Sellers achieve their goals thru Real Estate. In 2004, family brought Michelle back to the DMV area where she continued her Real Estate career and is proud to be affiliated with Compass Real Estate in Annapolis, MD , Washington DC, and Northern VA. Michelle prides herself on providing top of the line service to all of her clients and she has built her business out of TRUST, LOYALTY, HONESTY and INTEGRITY. She enjoys helping people achieve the "American Dream "whether it's the first-time home buyer, seasoned buyer, investor, first-time home seller, or the savvy home seller. Her strong negotiation skills have helped numerous clients achieve the very best in their real estate transactions. Michelle has experience in both Buyer and Seller Markets and has worked with clients on a variety of properties from Condominiums to Townhomes to Single Family Homes to gorgeous Waterfront retreats! Her service areas include Anne Arundel County, Prince George's County, Baltimore City (Federal Hill, Locust Point, Canton, Fells Point), Queen Anne's County, Montgomery County, Howard County, Washington DC, and Northern VA. Michelle has a Bachelor of Arts in Dance from James Madison University. She resides in Annapolis with her son Evan and their two rescue dogs - Sadie & Rocco. She is also a former Sponsor to 6 USNA midshipman (class of 2020, 2023, and 2026)! Go Navy!!! Michelle practices yoga multiple times a week & is also a certified Yoga Instructor (200hr RYS). She is also an avid animal lover, volunteers, and donates a portion of every commission check to The SPCA of Anne Arundel County. She enjoys spending time in both the Annapolis area and Washington DC Metro areas!
title: Realtor®

description: About Emma Emma’s extensive market knowledge, dynamic negotiating skills, and unparalleled service make her an invaluable asset to her clients. From day one, Emma passionately pursues the interests of each individual, curating an enjoyable experience for all of her clients. With previous sales and customer service experience, Emma understands what it takes to achieve winning results for her clients and prides herself on being proactive, aggressive, and solution-oriented. Licensed and knowledgeable in DC, MD, and VA, Emma helps a wide range of individuals pursue their real estate goals, whether that be purchasing their first home, investing, or selling.
title: Realtor®
