description: About Jamie Jamie is a motivated agent who understands the dynamics and challenges many face on their path toward homeownership. She builds relationships with her clients based on trust and mutual respect, always looking for ways to better serve them. Jamie is an ally and advocate for homeowners, helping them through one of the biggest decisions of their lives. She believes in the power of building generational wealth through homeownership, empowering her clients, family, friends, and peers to become owners. As a native Washingtonian proudly serving the entire DC metro region, Jamie has vast knowledge of the residential neighborhoods and communities she’s lived within her entire life. With her expertise and guidance, Jamie helps her clients navigate one of the most complex real estate markets in the country with ease, prioritizing her client’s needs, customizing her approach and ensuring their success in the market.
title: Realtor®

description: About Hannah Hannah Tucker started her Real Estate career with the Kathleen Eder Group in early 2017 following a career in events management. As client coordinator, Hannah has created customer systems and generated marketing content for the team. Most notably, she has worked as a transaction manager, monitoring the contract to close process and ensuring that each home-buying experience moves as seamlessly as possible. Hannah’s work with Kathleen has sparked her interest to become an agent so that she could bring her passionate commitment to helping clients find the home that they love. She is dedicated to ensuring that all clients feel comfortable and secure in the all-inclusive services offered by The CityScape Group.
title: Realtor®

description: About Lynne Lynne has lived in the Greater Washington Area for over 35 years. Her children are graduates of Montgomery County public schools. As a result, she knows the area and the Montgomery County Public School system extremely well, having lived in the communities of Gaithersburg, Silver Spring, Garrett Park, Bethesda, Chevy Chase, and Potomac. Lynne has bought and sold homes, and even tried to sell by owner before becoming a real estate agent herself. She has rented, owned, lived in condos, townhomes, and detached homes. All of her experiences have provided her with an abundance of practical knowledge about being a homeowner, home buyer, home seller, and home renovator. As a top real estate agent in Montgomery County and the Washington, DC Metro area, Lynne’s goal is to exceed your expectations. In every interaction you have with her - from your first meeting to the transition into your new home - count on Lynne to be responsive, well informed, and professional.
title: Keystone Property Advisors at Compass

description: About Andrew Andrew believes in the basic principle that superior client service combined with the latest real estate technologies is the key to any successful real estate transaction. His experience in all aspects of the real estate industry including sales, development, and , is invaluable in guiding each client through the process and helping them obtain their real estate objectives. With over twenty years of experience and his MBA in Real Estate Finance, Andrew provides his clients superior financial analytics before making one of the most important financial decisions. Andrew is a Washington, DC resident who is an active member in the community including the local civic and business associations, Habitat for Humanity, Big Brothers / Big Sisters, and Martha's Table. Learn more at www.andrewturczyn.com
title: Realtor®

description: About Seth Seth Turner, Senior Vice President and Realtor at Compass, has more than 15 years of experience in the competitive Washington, DC real estate market with almost $400 million in lifetime sales. Leading the Seth Turner Group, he has established a reputation as a respected and knowledgeable real estate agent focused on relationship-building to help clients find their ideal home. Seth has been named one of Washingtonian magazine’s “Top Agents” based on sales volume for the past ten years and one of the region’s “100 Best Agents” four times during his tenure at Compass. Seth holds a BS in Finance from Berry College. He has leveraged his education, experience in the finance industry and deep knowledge of the DC market to become a tough negotiator, always getting his clients the best deal. Seth is further involved in DC’s real estate community by serving as a multi-term representative on the Compass Agent Advisory Council. He previously served on the District of Columbia Association of Realtors Communication Committee and taught real estate licensing classes. He is also a real estate investor and landlord for multiple properties he owns in the city. Though he now calls Bloomingdale home, he loves spending time in the Virginia countryside in Rappahannock County or exploring his interests of architecture and automobiles both around the U.S. and abroad. Seth is a member of Berry College’s Board of Visitors and is on the board of trustees for the Georgia 4-H Foundation.
title: Senior Vice President/Realtor

description: About TurnKey TurnKey at Compass is a collaboration of dedicated professionals working together to achieve one goal, making your real estate experience as stress-free and positive as possible. We believe communication is key and developing a trusting relationship is essential with our clients. We pride ourselves on our strong knowledge of the market and effective negotiation skills. With over 40 years of experience, we are proud to say we have stellar testimonials and reviews from your clients. Our clients include sellers, buyers, luxury sales, vacation homes, and investors. We cover Maryland (including the Eastern Shore), DC, Virginia, Florida, and California. For more information, check out our website at www.turnkeyteam.com.
title: TurnKey at Compass

description: About Rukaiyah Rukaiyah Tyler is The Millennial Agent, your trusted real estate expert born and raised in Prince George’s County, Maryland, and proudly serving the Washington, D.C. area. Having purchased her first property at 24, Rukaiyah intimately understands the needs of first-time homebuyers. With a passion for people and a love for real estate, Rukaiyah became a licensed Realtor in 2016. Specializing in guiding and supporting first-time homebuyers and sellers, she is currently licensed in Maryland, Washington, D.C., and Virginia, with established referral partnerships across the United States. Rukaiyah’s commitment to exceptional service and client education has earned her the distinction of being one of the top-producing agents for the Prince George’s County Association of Realtors for eight consecutive years. Recognized by Washingtonian Magazine as a Top Agent and featured in the DC Metro Top 40 under 40 list, Rukaiyah’s outstanding performance speaks volumes. Certified as a Military Relocation Specialist and Luxury Specialist, she also holds the Accredited Buyer’s Representative (ABR®) designation. Driven by her vision to reduce the wealth gap, Rukaiyah is dedicated to making a positive impact on her community, one home at a time. Trust The Millennial Agent for a seamless real estate experience tailored to your needs.
title: Realtor®

description: About Ryan Ryan is a real estate and legal professional with more than 13 years of experience advising clients in complex residential and commercial transactions. He began his career as an attorney and worked for more than ten years at large international law firms on complex legal matters ranging from international boundary disputes to multi-billion dollar project financings. Ryan began working as a Realtor® in 2008 and has since provided the full range of real estate services to his clients, from first-time homebuyers to savvy investors to luxury homebuyers. He is a top producing agent and is consistently ranked among the metro area’s top Realtors®.
title: Realtor®

description: About Donovan As an accomplished Accountant and former Fitness Instructor, Donovan has a knack for numbers and a proven record of connecting with individuals from all walks of life. Donovan’s past experiences in finance and fitness have taught him to take care of clients by catering to their individual needs. Today as a real estate professional, he utilizes those very skills and experiences to help clients end to end, securing and leveraging their most valuable assets. A data and solutions-driven agent who exudes confidence and a refreshing level of transparency; Donovan aims to make each transaction seamless and efficient. He considers time and relationships the currency of business and prides himself on providing exceptional and personalized client care. Known for approaching opportunities with tenacity, he’s the ultimate deal-maker – organized, thoughtful, and unequivocally honest. Whether working with a first-time buyer or seller or securing an opportune investment property, Donovan presents his clients with a spectrum of the best options; taking into account their budget, lifestyle, ‘nice to haves’ and non-negotiables. He also believes the search for a home should be an experience that is equally fun and memorable. Somewhere within a seven-day work week, Donovan makes time for the gym, financial wellness blogging, spending time with his wife, Ariel, and spoiling their one-year old Chocolate Lab, Bruno. A functional fitness athlete and marathoner, Donovan is proud to call Arlington, Virginia his home. It’s no coincidence that Arlington has been ranked “America’s Fittest City” for three years in a row. Outside of fitness, Donovan is a devoted volunteer and associate board member of education Non-Profit, BUILD Metro DC. From mentoring high school students in our nation’s capital to planning fundraisers across the city, Donovan has mastery within the classroom and the boardroom alike. Needless to say, Donovan hustles just as hard off the clock to provide his family a life filled with love and adventure, while building his community a little bit each day. Donovan is a man of his word who understands the value of time and the value of home, Donovan is the ultimate asset when it comes to securing your place in the world. Originally from Hampton, Virginia, Donovan has lived in the Washington Metropolitan Area for over a decade. Donovan received a B.S. in Accounting and B.S. in Economics from George Mason University.
title: REALTOR® | Licensed in DC, MD, VA

description: About Michael Michael lives in Northern Virginia with his partner, Ben, a FireFighter in Montgomery County, Maryland. He grew up in the suburbs of Boston where his family still resides. When he's not going to bat for his clients, you can find him boating on the Patuxent River, out to dinner in downtown DC (most likely at Filomena), or visiting his family in Cape Cod, MA. “Michael has an unwavering work ethic, coupled with a gift for negotiation that makes him an incredible asset. He is extremely reliable: he can pivot when necessary, handling unexpected challenges and changes with composure and a positive attitude. Our clients are fortunate to have him in their corner!” Michael graduated from a small high school called Thayer Academy and soon after sought to leave his Massachusetts comfort zone. With no travel experience, he spent his freshman year of college at NYU abroad in London, England. Sophomore year, Michael returned to New York City to NYU’s Schack Institute of Real Estate. At 19, he got his real estate license and started renting apartments to his classmates to help pay for school. After graduating NYU, Michael went into property management and leasing and later transitioned into commercial leasing with WeWork in NYC and Boston. In 2020, during the height of the pandemic, he picked up and moved to DC to start a career with Long and Foster Realtors. He's been with Compass since 2023 and helps clients around the DMV.
title: Realtor® | Licensed in DC, MD, VA

description: About Chris With over 20 years real estate experience in the Virginia, DC and Maryland Metro Area, Chris is passionate about helping his clients find their place. A graduate of the United States Coast Guard Academy and The George Washington University, Chris has called the DMV area home for 25 years and loves to bring his detailed knowledge of this vibrant area and market to help his clients meet their goals. When not working with his clients, Chris loves to be active and maintain a fitness lifestyle and has earned the Ironman triathlete title having completed the 2.4 mile swim, 116 bike and 26.2 mile run! Chris coaches his son's hockey teams with the Northern Virginia IceDogs and is an avid boater and sailor. You can catch him on the Chesapeake Bay enjoying the breeze, where Chris loves to take clients out on the boat. Chris resides in Alexandria, VA with his family.
title: REALTOR®

description: About Adrianna Adrianna Vallario joins the portfolio of dedicated Realtors at Compass armed with a creative eye and an extraordinary work ethic. A native Texan and (retired) military spouse, Adrianna has relocated to Arizona, South Carolina, North Carolina, and Northern Virginia, making her familiar with the excitement, stress, and emotions associated with selling and buying a home. Adrianna channels her personal experiences, work ethic, and love of home design into advising her clients, and values the importance of building lasting relationships by delivering excellent customer service. Working with an average of 40 households annually, she leverages her experience to successfully helping her clients reach their real estate goals. Adrianna holds a Bachelor's Degree in Public Health and is the mother of two children. Adrianna is also active in the Alexandria community. In 2020, Adrianna was selected as a recipient of Alexandria's "40 under 40" award and is an advocate of Breast Cancer Research Foundation and Girls on the Run. When she is not assisting clients, you can find her running local races, supporting local non-profits, and exploring all of the museums (and coffee shops) in the greater DC area.
title: Senior Vice President

description: About Ross With over 20 years of experience, Ross has honed his skills working in the greater Washington, DC real estate market. His empathy, honesty, experience, knowledge, dedication and passion help guide his clients through the buying and selling process with ease. Since 2015 Ross has been named one of America’s Best Real Estate agents, a prestigious top 1% ranking by REAL Trends and The Wall Street Journal; as well as Best Agent and Top Producer, Washingtonian Magazine. Ross has total sales over $500 million. He is the Founder and Managing Member of The Rockwell Group, a real estate team, at Compass Real Estate where he is an Executive Vice President. The team sales are over $700 million. Ross also manages acquisitions, repositioning and stabilization of multiple real estate investments where he is a partner. Ross has completed hundreds of real estate transactions, including residential and commercial sales and leases, relocations, short sales and foreclosures.
title: Executive Vice President | Member - Compass Sports & Entertainment Division

description: About Sean The Rockwell Group, was recently recognized as a Washingtonian 2023 Top Producing Team . Thank you to our repeat clientele, referral network, and clients for helping us achieve this milestone. -- With 15+ years of extensive transactional real estate experience in just about every situation that a buyer can encounter, from home inspection and title issues to negotiating competitive offers and successfully fending bids from competitors, I have been through it all, and I'm ready to be there for you. From the subtle macroeconomic changes to the region, to which neighborhoods are hottest, which are undergoing the most growth, and have the most significant upside potential down the road, I make it a habit of exploring every nook and cranny, not just as part of the job but out of genuine curiosity. After all, I'm an investor too, and believe in the value of property in the DC Metro region. My specialty is in the Hollin Hills neighborhood of Alexandria, VA. Nestled into a rolling, park-like setting, more than 450 mid-century modern houses are a part of a dynamic community on the list of the National Register of Historic Places. As you start your home search, one of the first things you'll notice is that I'm personable. I've been described as "an extrovert's extrovert, as at home around clients as with friends and family" . But, even more important, I get results for my clients. Check out my Google reviews and Zillow reviews online. I'd love to meet you. Let's connect. Sean Vann Resident of Hollin Hills , Alexandria, Virginia (202) 468-8653 www.sean-vann.com Sales Map Snapshot
title: Realtor

description: About Susan People ask what I like most about my job. I tell them I love being part of a person’s big life events. Moving is a big life event (involving big sums of money!) whether motivated by marriage, baby, up, down or right-sizing, geographic change or just a random urge. I pride myself on my ability to help my clients navigate the best path forward on this emotional journey. I tell them it is most certainly not like buying a car. Market and neighborhood knowledge, relationships with other agents, honesty and integrity, accessibility and enthusiasm – it is hard to quantify the essential characteristics of a good agent. With decades of experience I can say with confidence I have these qualities. I’m equally proud to say 95% of my business comes from personal client referrals. Consistently recognized as a top agent in my office as well as in the region, I will help you with speed, accuracy, professionalism and maybe most importantly, a dash of good humor. Want to know more about me? I’m a graduate of the University of Virginia, an avid gardener (and deer fighter) and a lunatic Bruce Springsteen fan. My two kids are grown and amazing. I live in an empty nest with my husband Kevin Ambrose just outside DC in Washington Grove, Md.
title: Senior Vice President

description: About Brian Brian’s practical experience distinguishes him from other Realtors and will help you buy or sell your home. He has worked construction, managed the gutting and renovation of his own Petworth, DC rowhouse, obtained construction permits, and managed construction permitting programs for the local government of Washington, DC. An accomplished negotiator and entrepreneurial problem solver, Brian designed and implemented the District’s ground-breaking Stormwater Retention Credit Trading Program, enabling the District to comply with federal Clean Water Act requirements while navigating the competing interests of the development community and environmentalists. For his leadership, Brian was chosen from among more than 30,000 DC government employees to receive a Cafritz Award for excellence and innovation in public service. Brian has lived in the DC area for 20 years, buying and selling homes as he transitioned from bachelor to husband to dad. Brian understands that where you are in your life, what you want from it, and your lifestyle are major factors in deciding when it’s time to buy a new home or list the one you currently own. Brian is licensed in DC, MD, and VA, and a part of the award-winning Clark & Van Wye team working in DC, MD, and VA. Prior to joining Compass, Brian was a senior manager in Washington DC’s Department of Energy and Environment. He has served as the Anacostia Riverkeeper, and he was a Peace Corps Volunteer in sub-Saharan Africa. Brian lives in Shepherd Park, DC with his wife, four daughters, and two dogs. To view the full Clark & Van Wye team page, please click here.
title: Realtor® Licensed in DC/MD/VA

description: About Todd Todd has been a trusted real estate advisor for 14 years and has helped hundreds of clients buy and sell property. He has been among the top 1% of Realtors nationwide for over a decade. As a former attorney, he has a unique blend of legal training, negotiation expertise, and drive to satisfy the most discerning clients. He has an eye for design, understands luxury at all levels, and has significant experience in preparing homes for the market - producing high returns with minimal investment. He provides unmatched candor and the highest standard of ethics to advocate on his clients' behalf. Todd lives with his family of 4 in Solana Beach in North County San Diego and also splits his time in Maryland. He is a licensed Realtor in 4 jurisdictions - CA, DC, MD, and VA - with significant experience in helping clients relocate in and out of state. He is a Founding Agent of the first Compass office outside of NYC and is still the Principal of the Vassar Broermann Group of Compass DC. A team of 4 agents that has closed over $900,000,000 in total team sales and assisted hundreds of clients. To learn more about Todd, take a look at his 5-star client reviews on Google, Zillow, and Facebook. Todd earned a degree in Political Science from Wake Forest University and his JD at Catholic University Law School. Along the way, he studied in London, England and Krakow, Poland. In his free time, Todd likes to travel, cook, run, ski, swim, and entertain friends.
title: Executive Vice President

description: About Vassar Broermann Group Integrity is the hallmark of the Vassar Broermann Group's client focused real estate services, serving the DC Metro region. Their professionalism, creative negotiation, and unwavering drive to satisfy their clients are what set them apart from other agents. Every agent has a genuine concern for their clients best interests and work tirelessly to ensure they are satisfied with their service before, during, and after closing. Both have been consistently recognized by Washingtonian as among the Top 100 Best Agents and Top Producers. The Vassar Broermann Group has closed over $850M+ in total team sales and assisted hundreds of clients successfully navigating buying and selling residential real estate. Todd's legal background and Eric's military background have provided them a unique perspective on what the role of an effective real estate agent should be: trustworthy, accessible, and professional. Todd and Eric never want the deal more than their clients. They have been recognized for their exceptional character and skills both locally and nationally. No matter your circumstances, Todd and Eric are committed to understanding your goals and helping you reach them.

About Jennifer For more than ten years, Jennifer Vaughan has helped buyers and sellers navigate the competitive Washington metro real estate market. Known for her down-to-earth demeanor, exceptional listening skills and extensive network, Jennifer makes the home buying and selling process seamless for first timers and experienced homeowners alike. From starter condos to multimillion dollar properties, she leverages her knowledge of the market and passion for the process into successful transactions. Having worked in journalism before making the leap to real estate, Jennifer knows the value of in-depth research and attention to detail. Clients appreciate her genuine warmth, responsiveness and tenacity at the negotiating table, as well as her ability to work easily with other agents to get a deal done. Jennifer’s standard of excellence and professional integrity infuse every step of the process. She has particular expertise in the following areas: D.C. and Maryland neighborhoods, market timing and price optimization, stress-free negotiation, fast turnarounds, and first-time home buyers. Jennifer also excels at helping families with kids understand schooling options, commute times and local amenities. Jennifer’s passion for real estate extends to her own home, a renovated 1928 bungalow in Chevy Chase, D.C., where she lives with her husband and two sons. When not working with clients, you can find her volunteering in the community, watching her sons play sports, or playing pickleball or tennis.
title: Realtor® Licensed in DC & MD

description: About Natalie Natalie is strongly dedicated to fulfilling her clients’ specific needs, and does so with an energetic, and professional approach that is backed confidently by her expertise and experience in the market. An area resident for more than 30 years and specifically in Arlington since 2003, Natalie has practiced real estate locally with excellent results since 2007. She has gained a wealth of intimate knowledge of the community, from schools to neighborhoods to local services, and her insider’s perspective is a huge benefit to her clients. She currently lives in Arlington with her twin sons and is highly involved in the community.
title: Associate Broker: Licensed VA  |  Realtor: Licensed VA + DC

description: About Ian It all started with a phone call. In 2003, Ian was convinced by his sister to move from Southern California to Washington D.C. and invest in his first home in the Mount Pleasant neighborhood. Not only was purchasing the home a smart investment, but it proved to be the starting point of a deep love for the Washington D.C area and making the area his forever home. Ian has spent the past 17 years building a successful career in technology and hospitality/hotel sales. Even though he was enjoying a steady and successful career, he couldn't ignore the strong entrepreneurial itch to build something of his own. With a passion for real estate and being a savvy investor himself, Ian decided to get his real estate license. Using all the best sales skills and home-buying experience he has acquired over the last two decades, Ian helps his clients find homes that are special, meaningful and smart financial investments! When Ian is not helping clients find the homes of their dreams, you can find him spending time with his wonderful wife, Kelly, and three sons, Levi, Asher and Noah or playing ice hockey in the local Montgomery county men’s leagues, or working out in his local CrossFit gym. Website
title: Realtor® | Rebecca Weiner Group of Compass

description: About Kayla Born and raised in Washington, D.C., Kayla built a strong foundation for selling homes dating back to 2010. While attending the University of Colorado at Boulder, she spent summers interning for one of the top luxury developers in Washington, D.C., assisting in the sellout of 22West, a luxury condominium project in the WestEnd. Her career was kickstarted during those summers working alongside her mother and successful real estate broker, Mei-Mei Venners. “I learned very early on what it takes to be successful in this industry- trust and communication, consistency, and knowing your product and market”, Kayla says. After graduating, Kayla worked as the Leasing and Marketing Manager for EdR Trust, one of the nation’s top Real Estate Investment Trusts specializing in the acquisition and development of student housing near university campuses. She was quickly recognized as one of the top associates and was awarded the 2014 EdR Star award for extraordinary job performance and professionalism. In 2016, she returned to her roots in Washington, D.C. and joined Eastbanc as a Senior Sales Associate for the newest $150M luxury condominium project- the Westlight. It is here that Kayla established her presence in the market, created an outstanding client and broker network, and developed a very high level of service to her clients. “I have worked with everyone from Vice Presidents to senators, fortune 500 CEO’s to empty nesters, and first time homebuyers to college students. Real estate is so much more than a transaction. We are in the business of people, and my clients know I am available anytime, anywhere. Relationships are my most valuable asset”. After successfully selling the Westlight project, Kayla joined the Chauvin House team at Compass in 2022. “I have worked with Patrick, Brad and DJ for years, and I knew it would be a seamless transition. I look forward to a long and successful future with this team”. When she finds time for herself, Kayla enjoys the local music scene and spending time outdoors with her German Shepherd dog. “It’s all about the little things”, she says.
title: Realtor®

description: About Venture Property Group The Venture Property Group prides itself on integrity, diligence, knowledge, and trustworthiness. Whether you're a first-time homebuyer, seasoned investor, or developer, their personalized and adaptable service means they're always doing what's best for their clients. Working with a team means the benefit of getting to draw on the availability, resources, and networks of a group, while the intimacy of a boutique team means you never get lost in the shuffle. Experienced in major renovations and interior design, The Venture Property Group can help you purchase the right property that will truly feel like home. Stuart Carragher | Stuart's a Brit with a great sense of humor who has traveled and worked all over the world, before landing in the U.S. After graduating in London, he worked in real estate for two years before changing tracks to pursue other client-driven work, including building a personal training business in London and working as a professional ski instructor. Talented in home renovations, interior design, and finding common ground with people from anywhere in the world, Stuart now lives with his wife (Wendi) and two children (Elijah & Amira) in Chevy Chase, Maryland. Jesse Sutton | Jesse has been actively involved in the DMV Real Estate market for the past 13 years. A West Coast transplant, Jesse has built a portfolio of experience that includes transactions ranging from home sales, to new development sales, to lot assemblages. Working across such a range of transactions gives Jesse unique insights and an understanding of the inner workings of the local market that only comes through years of hard work and experience. Marc Cowan | Marc's journey from a distinguished military and intelligence career to the world of real estate has equipped him with the perseverance, tenacity, and exceptional communication and negotiation skills required to excel in this arena. Marc's global experience during his military career provides a sound basis for understanding the challenges of relocation and has allowed him to adapt and deliver results across the DC Metro region. Today, Marc is a trusted real estate professional known for his integrity, diligence, and unwavering commitment to providing outstanding service. His contagious enthusiasm sets him apart, making him a standout in the industry. www.TheVenturePropertyGroup.com

About Denise Hey there, future homeowners and sellers! Denise Verburg here, your friendly neighborhood real estate agent extraordinaire. Picture this: you've been dreaming of finding that perfect home, a place where you can kick off your shoes, relax, and make memories that will last a lifetime. Well, guess what? I'm here to make that dream a reality! Let's talk about selling your home. I know it can be a daunting task, but fear not! I'm here to take the stress off your shoulders and turn your property into a show-stopping masterpiece that buyers won't be able to resist. With my keen eye for design and my knack for coordinating renovations, prepping, staging, and marketing, your home will be the talk of the town. Now, let me tell you a little bit about myself. I may have a posh British accent, but don't worry, I won't make you sip tea and eat crumpets during our house-hunting adventures. I've been in the real estate game for almost 20 years, and let me tell you, I've seen it all. From charming cottages to luxurious mansions, I've got the inside scoop on all the best properties in town. But what sets me apart from the rest, you ask? Well, besides being named one of the Best Agents in the Washington, D.C. region by Washingtonian magazine for the last few years, I've also been dubbed the "British bulldog" by some of my lovely clients. Why? Because I never back down when it comes to fighting for your best interests. Consider me your personal real estate warrior, ready to go to battle to find you the home of your dreams. Whether you're a first-time buyer or a seasoned luxury home connoisseur, I've got you covered. I'll hold your hand through every step of the process, from homebuyer seminars to coordinating house renovations and prepping and everything in between. And let me tell you, I've got an eye for design. I can turn any house into a jaw-dropping masterpiece that buyers won't be able to resist. But it's not just my expertise in real estate that makes me a top-notch agent. My multicultural background and global perspective give me a unique advantage in this cosmopolitan city. I've lived in London, I'm fluent in French, and I've traveled the world. So, whether you're from down the street or across the pond, I'll take the time to understand your needs and help you find the perfect place to call home. Now, when I'm not busy making dreams come true, I'm a devoted mom and wife. My son is an international ice dancer, and my daughter is a talented music composer and performer. We're quite the creative bunch! And speaking of creativity, I love to whip up delicious French cuisine for my family and friends. So, if you're lucky, you might just get an invite to one of my fabulous dinner parties. So, what are you waiting for? Let's make your real estate dreams a reality. Give me a call, and let's get started on this exciting journey together. Trust me, with me as your guide, you'll be sipping champagne in your dream home in no time. Cheers to your future!
title: Realtor® Licensed in DC, MD & VA

description: About Mark Mark's journey from North Carolina to the heart of the District in 2010 was driven by a passion for unique architecture and vibrant culture. With a background in interior and graphic design, paired with extensive customer service experience, Mark excels in nurturing client relationships. Licensed in DC, MD, and VA since 2011, he leverages his multifaceted expertise to guide clients through the intricate DMV real estate landscape. As part of an award-winning team since 2011, Mark offers his clients not only a profound understanding of the market but also innovative offer strategies and exclusive off-market opportunities. He thrives in the fast-paced environment of real estate, skillfully negotiating the best terms possible and taking pride in helping clients navigate one of life's most significant decisions. Mark's appreciation for DC's architecture is deeply rooted in his admiration for L'Enfant's city plan, evolving through the grandeur of federal buildings by Bacon and Hoban to the charming homes crafted by Wardman. His background as an art major ensures that no detail goes unnoticed, providing clients with an eye for aesthetics that enhances every transaction. Outside of real estate, Mark enjoys capturing the beauty of his surroundings through photography and exploring new places with his partner, Brian, their cat Sheila, and dog Gus. This balance of professional dedication and personal passion underscores Mark's commitment to serving the community with genuine care and expertise, ensuring each client's journey to homeownership is as seamless as possible.
title: Realtor® Licensed in DC, MD & VA

description: About Jackson A quick-witted district native, Jackson has combined his background in Economics and his love of real estate to build a business at the forefront of our growing markets. Jackson is focused on the client experience by ensuring the process is fun and by keeping his buyer and seller clients informed through market data and expert-level guidance. He understands that to succeed in our competitive markets, traditional sales techniques will not cut it and data analytics is the name of the game. Opportunity comes to those who seek it – which is precisely what Jackson does for his buyers. In a dedicated effort to find his client's perfect home, he strives to provide unparalleled access and knowledge of upcoming and pre-market opportunities. Beyond that, he imparts the tools to ensure his clients make sound decisions around their largest investments. Whether you're still occupying your home or have already relocated and are looking for a hands-off approach, Jackson has a proven track record of maximizing his sellers' returns. There's a saying that "all homes in DC will eventually sell", but not all homes will sell at their highest possible price. If you're looking for a trusted partner who will take the time to work with you to properly prepare your home for the market, Jackson is your Realtor. Jackson understands that real estate is ultimately the business of people and prides himself on fostering life-long relationships with his clients. Jackson calls Shaw home and supports a number of local charities and including St. Jude Children's Research Hospital, SMYAL: Supporting and Mentoring Youth Advocates and Leaders, and N Street Village. Additionally, Jackson is highly involved in his local University of Virginia Alumni Chapter.
title: REALTOR®

description: About Ashton Ashton is an experienced real estate agent for 20 plus years.
title: Realtor®

description: About Aahil Aahil is a dedicated real estate agent and a graduate from George Washington University, where he earned a double major in International Business and Real Estate. Growing up in a family of realtors, he has always been passionate about practicing real estate. He has seen the value of real estate in families and how it can transform lives, which excites him about helping others achieve their dreams of buying a home. His time studying real estate and working alongside seasoned agents in the DMV has given him a deep understanding of the market’s needs and how to accommodate clients in buying and selling properties. Additionally, Aahil excels in assisting people in finding rental units that perfectly suit their needs. His skills as a current property manager also give him extensive knowledge about homes, which is a significant benefit when representing real estate clients. This expertise allows him to offer valuable insights into the condition and potential of properties, ensuring his clients make informed decisions. Aahil is known for his adaptability to market changes and his unwavering commitment to providing exceptional service. His keen insight into the real estate market makes him a trusted advisor for anyone looking to navigate the complexities of buying, selling, or renting a home. He is quick on his feet, always adapting to market changes, with the goal of building lasting relationships with his clients. Whether you are looking to buy, sell, invest, or rent, Aahil is the real estate agent you want to work with. With Aahil as your agent, you can be assured that your needs will always come first. His genuine dedication to his clients ensures that he will always strive to deliver exceptional results.
title: Realtor® | Licensed in DC

description: About Kelly Kelly Virbickas is an experienced real estate professional, and has been a resident of the Washington, DC area since her graduation from the University of Massachusetts at Amherst , where she earned a Bachelor of Science Degree in Business . Over the years, she has leveraged her deep local knowledge and extensive real estate experience to provide exceptional service to her clients. With over 20 years of real estate experience , Kelly quickly gained a reputation for her expertise in helping sellers achieve the highest possible sale prices. Her dedication and results have consistently placed her among the top agents in the DMV area . Licensed in DC, Maryland, and Virginia , Kelly’s comprehensive understanding of the market is unmatched. In her current role as Senior Vice President and a proud member of the Cityscape group , Kelly continues to excel and push the boundaries of real estate success. Her commitment to excellence has been recognized with the prestigious #4 Agent on a Team Award for 2024 , underscoring her position as a leader in the field. Throughout her career, Kelly has been consistently honored with the Washingtonian Best Award from 2015 through 2024 , a testament to her unwavering dedication and superior service. Her achievements and accolades are a reflection of her passion for real estate and her clients' satisfaction . Residing in Chevy Chase with her husband, three daughters, and a beloved rescue dog, Kelly has lived in various vibrant neighborhoods including Arlington, Old Town Alexandria, Capitol Hill, and Logan Circle. Her personal experience in these areas enhances her ability to connect clients with the perfect home in the community that suits them best. In addition to her real estate endeavors, Kelly is an avid reader and has a keen interest in nutrition and fitness . She enjoys flower arranging and finds joy in traveling with her family , always eager to explore new destinations and create lasting memories. Client Testimonials ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ "Kelly was a complete joy to work with. She was extremely communicative and transparent with us throughout the process. She provided helpful tips, recommendations, and insights, which were invaluable for us as first time buyers in a tight market. Highly recommend working with Kelly." Staci ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ "If we could have given Kelly 6 Stars, we would have! Kelly is an outstanding real estate professional who knows her business and gets the job done. After being on the market for too long with another realtor, we hired Kelly, who worked her magic, which resulted in two offers within a short period of time. During the process, Kelly was always accessible, answered all our questions and gave us the advice we needed to make the right decision for our family. As an added bonus, Kelly is a really nice person!" Sheri ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ "Kelly has been our agent on 5 transactions. She is an excellent advisor on bidding and pricing strategy, and she knows the Washington, DC and Alexandria markets extremely well. We highly recommend Kelly." Eric and Ania ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ “My property was listed for 60 days with another broker, and we had no offers. Then I listed it for sale with Kelly Virbickas at the same price and we had 2 offers within 1 week! My neighbors said we’d never get our price, but with Kelly’s help, we got it!” Brian For more Client Testimonials, click here!
title: Senior Vice President, Realtor®

description: About Lou Lou Vivas | Real Estate Expert & Team Leader, Viva The Life Properties Washington, D.C. | Maryland | Virginia With over 20 years of experience in real estate, Lou Vivas leads Viva The Life Properties with a mission to create meaningful homes and healthier communities. A native of Montgomery County and graduate of the University of Maryland, Lou has built a trusted reputation across the D.C., Maryland, and Virginia markets for his deep market knowledge, refined negotiation skills, and commitment to client success. Lou’s approach blends luxury real estate expertise with a focus on family, well-being, and sustainability. As the founder of Viva The Healthy Life, he helps homeowners design spaces that enrich daily living—integrating solar energy, battery backups, EV charging, and passive design to lower costs, reduce carbon footprints, and increase long-term value. His work is guided by the Five Pillars of a Healthy Home: clean air, pure water, quality food systems, optimized lighting, and energy independence. Dedicated to community and family life, Lou helps run a parent group in Northwest D.C. and is an active commuter cyclist—often seen riding his e-bike through local neighborhoods he both serves and calls home. As a father of a 17-year-old daughter and a 9-year-old son, he understands that a home is more than a property—it’s the foundation for life’s most important moments. Fluent in English and Spanish, Lou offers a personal, hands-on approach to every relationship—anchored in transparency, care, and the belief that real estate is a long-term investment in family, health, and legacy. Ready to elevate your lifestyle, community, and investment? Connect with Lou and discover how to Viva The Life.
title: REALTOR®

description: About Jill Raised in Alexandria, Virginia, Jill began her career in real estate in 2004 after graduating from George Mason University. She began as an assistant to a top-producing agent in Old Town Alexandria which is where her love for Alexandria Real Estate blossomed. She has many times been a member of NVAR’s Multi-Million-Dollar Sales Club. Jill is a proud member of The Mank & Olin Team, one of Washington's top real estate teams. She specializes in sales from Arlington to Mount Vernon, with a particular focus in the Old Town, Del Ray and Belle Haven communities. She is a knowledgeable local market resource and a confident negotiator with a tireless commitment to helping her clients achieve their goals. She has experience selling all types of houses, from historic homes to new construction condos at every price point; and a reputation for honesty and integrity. Jill lives in the Riverside Gardens neighborhood of Alexandria with her two daughters and two dogs. As the mother to a child with autism, it is cause near and dear to her heart so in her free time she loves giving back to charities such as The Autism Society of Northern Virginia.
title: REALTOR®

description: About VSG Homes Expert Knowledge. Years of Experience. Passion for Real Estate. Our team specializes in providing luxury real estate services from start to finish. We have a proven track record for integrity, knowledge of the market, professionalism and results. We will be here as a resource for anything you may need before, during and after the transaction is completed. We are Real Estate advisors and want to make sure you make good informative decisions. We represent buyers and sellers throughout the DMV no matter your price point. With almost two decades of experience, our proven strategies and systems help our buyers strategize and obtain the best results, and help our sellers prepare their properties to maximize the highest and best sold price possible. We know how to customize the process depending on your needs, and our goal is for you to have an amazing experience from start to finish. We work almost a hundred percent by referrals and your happiness is our priority. Please review our testimonials. Over the years we have built a great US and global network of agents. If we don’t cover your area or area/s of interest, we are happy to connect you with a professional Realtor no matter where you want to sell, buy or invest.
title: VSG Homes

description: About Michael You probably know how important it is to find the right real estate agent when you are focusing on a financial investment as substantial and as personal as your home. What you should know about Michael is that, as a Realtor®, he believes wholeheartedly in the unique, personal nature of real estate. You will see that revealed in how he follows through on what he promises, as Michael carefully guides you through the many steps and decisions along the way. Michael provides you personal and knowledgeable service that is genuinely responsive to your needs. He promises a "neighborhood specialist's" familiarity with local communities, home values and price trends, top professional skills continually refined through training programs, respected industry-wide advice and guidance throughout the entire process. Michael can save you valuable time and effort in securing home financing, insurance and home connections. Feel free to contact Michael anytime, whether it's to get started on helping you realize your goals and dreams, or just to ask a question. Michael would welcome the opportunity to make a difference for you.
title: Realtor®

description: About Emily With customer-centric values, Emily takes great pride in ensuring that her clients enjoy the process of working together while being supported from start to finish. She understands that purchasing and selling real estate are some of the largest financial and emotional decisions that her clients undertake and makes it her goal to care for each transaction as if it were her own. This approach has allowed Emily the honor of building a business based on referrals. Emily grew up surrounded by family in York, Pennsylvania. She moved to Northern Virginia upon graduating with a BFA in Interior Design from James Madison University in 2005. Emily transitioned from Design to Real Estate in 2012 and has since grown to be a multi-million dollar producer year over year. With a substantial background in residential Interior Design and a keen eye for aesthetic detail, Emily brings a unique set of skills to the table for her buyer and seller clients alike. Working side-by-side with her clients, Emily understands how to style a to sell quickly for top-dollar as well as how to find the right home to satisfy a buyer's wants and needs. Emily is an Arlington resident and has established a vast knowledge of the neighborhoods surrounding her home and the District. When she is not selling houses, Emily loves being outdoors, cooking (and, more importantly, eating!), and spending time laughing with her family and friends.
title: Realtor

description: About Jason Originally from Connecticut, Jason relocated to the Washington, DC metro area in 2008 to run a local luxury retail business. Most recently, Jason’s proficiency in sales, client relations, and business led him to serve as Chief Operations Officer for a well-known local residential homebuilder and remodeler, specializing in modern design. This foray into the real estate world enhanced Jason’s knowledge in project management, overall operations process development, and most importantly client consultation services. His love of working with clients to conceptualize their dream homes led him to pursue a career in residential real estate sales. Jason currently lives in Falls Church, VA, with his wife, Alison, their daughter Emilia, and their two miniature dachshunds, Sophie and Gustav. Jason, an avid cyclist, has competed in both professional and amateur cycling races around the world. He enjoys a variety of endurance sports, traveling as much as possible, and experimenting in the kitchen.
title: Realtor®, Licensed in VA & DC

description: About Elyse Elyse fell in love with the Washington area while attending undergraduate and law school at American University. She decided to make the area her long-term home. After a varied and fascinating career as a lawyer, a lobbyist, and even a Colonel in the US Army Reserve, Elyse set her sights on real estate and found her true calling. Now entering her second decade in the industry, Elyse’s clients describe her as a talented and careful listener, a practiced negotiator, and an all around trusted advisor. She helps clients buy and sell their dream homes in the District, Maryland, and Virginia.
title: Vice President

description: About Ahmad Ahmad takes pride in helping his clients get into the home of their dreams. Whether you have questions about your financing options or about the state of the current housing market or if you want to look at houses, please let him know. You can reach him via email, text, or phone; he is here to serve you! His goal is to help you find the perfect house and to help you through each step of the process so that you feel informed and in control. Ahmad will make sure that your interest is protected at all times and he will relentlessly negotiate on your behalf. He is not here to sell you, he is here to provide the information that you need to make a confident decision. A decision that you can feel great about! Please let him know if there is anything he can do for you. Send him a quick email or give him a call, and he will get right back to you.
title: Realtor®

description: About Sam Sam was first introduced to the real estate industry at an early age by his mother, a DMV realtor. Starting in 1989 Sam would help her prepare for open houses, install signs, and stage homes. Now, a real estate professional himself, that know-how has been ingrained in him. Combining his real estate expertise with a passion for marketing and negotiating, Sam helps his clients to maximize results and achieve their goals. Sam began his career in politics and political advocacy for trade associations, allowing him to hone his skills in negotiation and communication. While Sam enjoyed his work in government relations on The Hill, he realized his passion for marketing and decided to pursue his interest in real estate. A DC area native, Sam is well positioned to advise clients on selling, investing, buying, or renting properties inside the beltway. Sam has the local knowledge and expertise to guide you to the best possible outcome. If you are looking for the best places to play golf, tennis, cycle, ski, need a recommendation for a local restaurant, or shopping in neighborhoods across the DMV, just give him a call. On his down time, Sam is out exploring the many attractions the DC Metro Area has to offer. Client Testimonials ★★★★★ " As a first time home buyer I was nervous about finding the right place in DC. I was referred to Sam who is truly a master of his craft. He has exceptional knowledge of the market in the DMV area. We must have looked at nearly 100 places together before I found the right place. Although I was probably a handful to work with, he was extremely responsive and always made himself available. Real estate runs in his blood. Great 5 star experience all around. " - Mark ★★★★★ " Sam was excellent to work with. He went out of his way to help my husband and I purchase our first home in Washington, DC. The process was new for us, and he made it as easy and seamless as possible. We would absolutely recommend him! " - Kelly and Kyle ★★★★★ " Sam was very knowledgeable of Arlington, having lived his entire life here. He was very responsive, attentive, and available. He gave honest assessments of properties and neighborhoods, and was aware of future development projects, local knowledge, etc. We were able to close on a house very quickly with Sam, even while conducting most of the process from our prior house in Seattle. I highly recommend Sam " - Jeff and Kim ★★★★★ " Sam is a true real estate professional - thorough, responsive, prompt, and knowledgeable. Throughout my entire process of shopping for a home, Sam stayed on top of things and was consistently one step ahead. While looking at homes, Sam took an active interest in understanding my requirements and repeatedly updated and tailored his parameters to my needs. During the negotiations, Sam provided sound recommendations, but still advocated my final decision when moving forward. While under , Sam kept me up to date on my closing checklist and was very prompt at scheduling the inspection, closing times, and the final walk through. I strongly recommend him to anyone interested in having a personalized and thorough home buying experience. " ★★★★★ " Just a quick note to thank Sam Wardel for his amazing help with every step of the process. I bought my house not long ago and Sam was extremely helpful with every aspect of the process. He helped me find the place and was extremely patient with my while I made my decision. I really appreciate his honesty above all else. He went the extra mile to ensure that I would be comfortable in my new home. I cannot thank him enough! I highly recommend him. " - Maryam
title: Realtor® | Licensed in DC & VA

description: About Wardman Residential Wardman Residential is committed to providing the most comprehensive and distinguished real estate services within the distinctive communities of the Washington DC real estate market. As the principals of Wardman Residential, Evan Johnson and Tom Bauer, through their expertise and leadership, are dedicated to elevating their team members so that they may provide the highest level of real estate services in a professional, competent, and ethical manner. Recognized for their insightful guidance and in-depth local market knowledge and with over $600 million in sales, Wardman Residential excels at creating a more beautiful real estate experience. With the objective of serving their clients with innovative resources, the Team provides each client with the critical access to the very best in technology, current market data and new marketing applications. Creating a personalized plan for each client’s specific objectives; the team excels at executing on their behalf with very deliberate, strategic and skillful measures that achieve impressive results. As highly qualified real estate professionals, the team serves their client’s specific priorities and real estate goals and is truly committed to creating a truly impressive real estate experience for every Wardman Residential client.

About Brandon Born and raised in Chevy Chase, Maryland, Brandon Warner has lived in the District, Maryland, Virginia(DMV) area his entire life. Coming from the area equips Brandon with an incredible wealth of knowledge about the region and the truly invaluable perspective of a born and bred local. "Being from the area gives me a perspective that is extremely valuable to my clients, especially clients newer to DC.” Buying a home for the first time is one of life’s big checkpoints. Brandon’s knowledge of the DMV, coupled with the work he does to understand each clients’ needs, helps him excel at making a seemingly confusing process almost elementary. “I enjoy being the reason people are having a good time! So part of what I do with buyers, is make sure I take on the stress and navigate the tougher parts of deals, this keeps the good times rolling for my clients in the meantime!” Brandon has also cultivated a vast network from volunteering and being an active participant with many LGBTQ organizations. Some of the many charities who have benefited from the work Brandon has done include SMYAL, DC Scores, and The Thurgood Marshall Center Trust. One of Brandon’s passions is soccer. In 2018, Brandon and his team had the incredible experience of playing in the Gay Games held in Paris, France where they won the Silver Medal. "It's wonderful to be able to walk around and know so many people. DC has everything any other major city has, but retains a small town feel. This creates a really rich sense of community and I enjoy sharing the love I have for DC with my clients. I've worked really hard to build my reputation locally and to foster great relationships with colleagues in every lane of the real estate industry. Because of this, in a business built on relationships, familiarity and name recognition being critical, I can better serve my clients."
title: Realtor®

description: About Zach Zach Warren is Co-Leader of Norris Warren Partners. A seasoned realtor, investor, and Certified Master Inspector, Zach has more than 15 years experience in all aspects of real estate. He has developed more than 50 single family homes and multi-unit buildings, inspected more than 1,500 homes, and even advised on a billion-dollar university expansion. An educator at heart, Zach values building relationships and sharing knowledge with humility. Known for his network of trusted contractors, he is expert at identifying and managing major issues before you list or buy. Utilizing data analytics, he tracks neighborhood housing markets and broader trends. Clients say they appreciate his industry expertise, empathy, and integrity. Outside real estate, Zach teaches "The Science of Happiness" at Georgetown University, enjoys kayaking with his team, and aspires to juggle 7 balls at once. He volunteers for several non-profits, and currently serves on the Board of Directors for the Mobile Mini Circus for Children , where he taught juggling and unicycling classes to refugee children in conflict zones. Norris Warren Partners - Zach | Renee | Andy
title: Realtor®

description: About Amy Amy has been helping buyers and sellers to reach their ownership goals since 2005 with approximately $250+ million in sales in DC, VA and MD selling single homes, townhomes and condominiums. In 2019 and , she was selected as one of America's Top 100 agents representing only 1% of all active real estate professionals in the US. She has also been chosen by Washingtonian magazine for the last 5 years as one of the top agents in the DMV, and recognized by DC Modern Luxury magazine in 2021 . By listening to her clients and being knowledgeable about market and financing conditions, Amy navigates her clients successfully through the entire buying and selling process and advocates passionately on their behalf every step of the way! Prior to her career as a home dream maker extraordinaire, Amy had the privilege of working at Washingtonpost.com during the advent of the internet age where she headed up public relations and marketing. She also has worked in communications roles at Suited for Change, a non-profit dedicated to helping low income women prepare for the workforce and the Center for Women’s Business Research, which empowers women business leaders. Amy graduated from Virginia Commonwealth University in 1998 with a BA in English and a BS in Communications. Amy lives in Arlington, Virginia a.k.a. “The Urban Village.” In her free time, you can find her sipping a chai latte at Northside Social or practicing pilates or playing American's favorite new sport, Pickleball. She considers “reading” a sport and wishes she had more time for it! Amy also believes in giving back and a non-profit near and dear to her is Pathways to Housing, a non profit dedicated to ending homelessness through housing first. https://pathwaystohousingdc.org She also donates to the Animal Welfare League of Arlington www.awla.org where she adopted most loved furry members, Midge and Abigail (aka Abby). Her favorite DC landmark is the Library of Congress (she would live there if it was allowed). Favorite First Lady: Hillary Rodman Clinton and Jackie Kennedy because its too hard too choose. Favorite Washington DC Park: Meridian Hill Favorite Yummy French Restaurant: Le Diplomate known to locals as Le Dip! Favorite Ice Cream Joint: Jeni’s Ice Cream Favorite Fancy French Macroons: Laudree (Georgetown) Favorite Cozy Fireside Chats: Chez Billy Sud Most buzzed about restaurant in DC she has never tried: Bad Saint Let's Connect Testimonials
title: Realtor®

description: About Maureen With a background in Marketing and Sales and a deep love for everything home, working in real estate was a natural fit for Maureen. After getting her license in 2012, Maureen's business grew quickly as she recognizes the importance of customer service and always putting her clients first. Through hard work and a proven track record, Maureen has received recognition as a Top Agent and her business continues to grow on a referral basis. Maureen is determined to provide top-notch service with quick results all the while focusing on her client’s bottom line. As a 5th Generation Washingtonian, Maureen is well-versed on the different neighborhoods throughout the DMV. She currently lives in Montgomery County and, when she is not busy running her real estate business, Maureen loves spending time with her family. She first met her husband, Sam, while in the 7th grade. So many years later, they have 3 amazing children: Shea, Madelyn, and Chase.
title: Realtor Licensed in MD, DC and VA

description: About Ashleigh As a West Point Grad Army Veteran, as well as a military child and spouse, Ashleigh has moved over 20 times, living in 18 different states, as well as Spain and Korea. She understands the stress and upheaval that can often accompany a move, be it across town or across the big blue ocean. She also understands the exhilaration of exploring a new town and the thrill and anxiety that often comes along with buying or selling a home. She’s been on both sides of the transaction and knows how it feels to sit at the settlement table. This also helps her know what buyers and sellers want and need from their agent. Ashleigh values honesty and integrity above all else. She understands the importance of listening and establishing an open line of communication. She’s your advocate and local area expert. Whether you are buying or selling a home, she is committed to ensuring you get the best deal possible. Ashleigh brings a variety of experiences to the table. After graduating from the United States Military Academy at West Point, she served in the Army as a Finance Officer. After leaving the military, she worked as a systems analyst at a systems engineering company helping her clients test and learn how to use a new database system at the Army Research Office. As a military spouse, she volunteered in civilian and military organizations, running programs and overseeing events. Ashleigh has taught writing workshops, written cookbooks, blogs, and explored her entrepreneurial side starting her own businesses along the way. All these experiences have taught her how to adapt to any situation and stay cool under pressure. She knows how to think critically, creatively solve problems, and provide service and support to those who need it. She holds many professional certifications and designations, to include Military Relocation Professional (MRP), Accredited Buyer’s Representative (ABR), and Certified Negotiation Expert (CNE). Ashleigh is among the Top 1.5% of all Agents nationwide and is recognized every year as a Top Producer by her Realtor Association and as a Best Agent year after year in local publications like, Arlington Magazine, The Washingtonian, and Northern Virginia Magazine. Ashleigh would be honored to be your Realtor®, representing you and your interests in your next real estate transaction. She personally guarantees she will always have your best interest at heart. Ashleigh currently resides with her family in Arlington, Virginia. When not working on real estate, you'll find her walking her dachshund, Sammy, reading books for her next book club meeting or singing with the West Point Alumni Glee Club honoring our nation's Veterans during funerals at Arlington National Cemetery and events around the DMV.
title: Realtor® MRP, ABR, CNE

description: About Rebecca As a knowledgeable advisor, Rebecca’s mission as a Realtor is to empower her clients to leverage the power of homeownership into an enduring investment. Rebecca’s love of real estate was first ignited after she herself purchased a home at 22. Although at the time she had cultivated a successful career in publishing, Rebecca soon realized that guiding others through the buying and selling process was her true passion. Unsurprisingly to those who know her, Rebecca hit the ground running and has since become known widely for her sharp instincts, masterful negotiating, and her disarming candor. She has been recognized for several years running as a Washingtonian Top Agent, a Bethesda Top Producer, an Arlington Top Producer, and among the DC Metro’s top 50 agents. Rebecca has only continued to expand her presence and expertise in the DC, Maryland, and Virginia real estate markets, surpassing $90,000,000 in sales volume with The Rebecca Weiner Group in 2024 alone. Licensed in DC, MD, and VA, she partners with clients at all price points and in all phases of life — from first time buyers to seasoned sellers. Unfailingly generous with her time, Rebecca works tirelessly to ensure her clients are fully informed in all aspects of each transaction and comfortable with each decision made along the way. When she’s not working, Rebecca can be found traveling, skiing, reading, entertaining, and serving on the Board of Trustees for the Imagination Stage. She lives in the Palisades neighborhood, where she and her husband Larry raise their two sons, Robbie and Josh, and their English bulldog, Sophie.
title: Realtor®

description: About Marty Marty Weitzel has spent his whole life in the DMV. He grew up in Potomac, MD, he attended high school in DC at Gonzaga College High School, and currently lives in the DelRay neighborhood of Alexandria, VA with his wife and their dog. Prior to joining RM Homes, Marty spent over a decade in Commercial Banking specializing in Real Estate Lending. He's excited to bring that experience to work for his clients, providing an extra level of advisory through financial acumen. When he's not helping his clients achieve their goals, Marty takes an active role in his neighborhood community by participating in the DelRay Business Association, and by sitting on his HOA Board. Neighborhood Engagement and Community Building are staples of Marty's "Grow Where You're Planted" attitude that he brings to his business, and his life. His primary goal - To help his clients put down Roots.
title: Realtor® | Licensed in VA & DC

description: About Christi Originally from North Carolina, Christi received a Bachelor of Arts degree from the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill with a degree in Psychology. Christi's education coupled with 20 plus years of experience in the real estate industry has provided her with invaluable skills that she uses daily to educate her clients. Her professionalism and individualized service exceeds client expectations, whether you are a first time home buyer or seasoned investor. Being a guide to her clients is something she takes very seriously and, therefore, she will be with you every step of the way! A resident of Northern Virginia for almost 30 years, Christi enjoys running, cooking, spending time with family & friends and watching Carolina basketball. Prior to becoming a Realtor, she spent 7 years honing her excellent customer service skills in property management.
title: Realtor®

description: About Kathy Kathy Whalen is an award winning agent with 30+ years of experience in residential real estate. She utilizes her deep understanding of the local markets, professional relationships, and her expert negotiation skills to achieve the best outcome for her clients. In addition to her other accolades, Kathy is a Washingtonian "Best Of" winner for six consecutive years, and she's sold more than 600 homes throughout her career. Kathy lives in Silver Spring, Maryland, and has been an active member of the community and in her four children’s schools. When she's not working she enjoys spending time in Bethany Beach with her extended family.
title: Realtor®

description: About Mary Lynn A native of the Washington metro area, Mary Lynn has loved houses for as long as she can remember. She renovated two homes before the age of 20. She obtained her real estate license at age 21 before exploring a different career path operating a chain of fashion merchandising schools and buying merchandise for high-end luxury goods. Over the past 25 years, Mary Lynn has devoted herself full-time to her true passion for real estate. Her in-depth market knowledge and expertise in ensuring seamless transactions have formed the foundation of her highly successful business. In addition, her keen eye for design, savvy negotiation skills, and ability to develop an immediate rapport with clients have enabled her to assist clients effectively at every stage of the search and sell process. No wonder she's ranked in the top 1% of real estate agents nationwide! Though her life's course has entailed traveling the world – and even getting her pilot's license – today, Mary Lynn keeps both feet on the ground at home in the Palisades where she lives with Alice, her 1-year-old Maltese. Testimonials: "No challenge is too big for Mary Lynn. Her market expertise, unparalleled attention to detail, and deep network delivered what seemed impossible in just one week. She meticulously prepared our home, listed it at the perfect price, and ensured we were under contract with multiple offers over asking. A positive, profitable process from beginning to end and we owe it all to Mary Lynn." -Andrew H. "Selling the beloved house we had lived in for fifty-one years was going to be one of the hardest things we've ever had to do. However, having Mary Lynn White as our real estate agent made all the difference. She had come highly recommended to us by a friend who had used her services and adored her, and after we interviewed her (she was one of three agents we interviewed), it was clear she was the right one for us. First of all, she loved and appreciated our house. Secondly, she was clear and straightforward in all her ideas about how and when to sell it. Every step of the way, from the moment we agreed to work together through settlement, she was accommodating, full of helpful suggestions, willing and eager to do whatever had to be done, and--this is not unimportant--delightful to be with. We would recommend Mary Lynn--gracious, tactful, and really good at her work--to anyone who wants to sell a house." - Judith and Milton Viorst "Thank you for your wonderful work selling our house. I will never forget how you made it all so stress-free when I was hundreds of miles away. You truly are a miracle worker. I will let anyone I know what a dream you are!" - Teri R. "This is the fourth house we've entrusted to Mary Lynn. Regardless of size and price, she treats our homes with the same level of attention, professionalism, and passion. Tom and I couldn't imagine buying or selling without Mary Lynn." - Tom and Loi "Mary Lynn White is the consummate professional and the most effective realtor I have seen. She has guided me through 11 home purchases or sales over 20 years. Mary Lynn does her homework regarding comparables and purchase prices. For sales, she stages in a highly effective way. For purchases, she understands market conditions and expertly guides the bid structure/process. In addition, Mary Lynn is very personable and easy to work with. In my view, one could not find a better agent." - Alan F. "I recently sold my home and knew I wanted to use Mary Lynn as my agent. I watched as she successfully staged and marketed five homes in my neighborhood, all getting multiple offers above similar sold homes. I was overwhelmed with the thought of getting rid of household items accumulated over the years. Mary Lynn put together a plan with a list of resources (organizers, contractors, donation pickups, etc.) that enabled me to accomplish everything quickly and efficiently. We staged my home with her guidance, and sure enough, the house sold over asking. She is the consummate professional, and I have recommended her to several friends who felt exactly the same way." - Diane S. "She provided exceptional service and allowed me to actually enjoy the selling process. She and her team covered all the bases, including preparing the house for the market and informing us of her many strategies. I would recommend her without any hesitation. She was the best!" - Craig H. "Rochelle, I wanted to express my thanks to you and Mary Lynn White for the wonderful work you did selling my current house and assisting in purchasing my new cooperative unit. Mary Lynn has been a great support for me during this whole process. I didn't even know if anyone would want to buy my house, considering that the house next door was to be torn down and an enormous new house built in its place over the next year or so. But Mary Lynn persevered and gave me hope. She brought in a stager to stage my house for sale. She brought in a yard person to spruce up the yard. She brought in window washers for the windows and skylights. In the end, my house looked like one that should be a TV show like the Property Brothers. And then, during the open house, she spent four days, Friday through Monday, showing potential buyers my house. By Monday afternoon, we had three offers. It was a miracle. And, the miracle continued. The next day, by luck, I found a cooperative unit for sale nearby. I offered to buy it a week later, and Mary Lynn immediately put together a sales contract for me and the seller (who was not represented by an agent). It was all a very smooth transition, including her assistance with the closing on both properties. And did I mention that she brought in an interior designer to help me choose the new paint colors for my new apartment? It will be beautiful. And she recommended a painter to me. Mary Lynn is one-stop shopping for all of one's real estate needs. I think she is great. I would recommend her to anyone seeking a Real Estate Agent. Thanks again to you both." - René Dupuy
title: Vice President

description: About Stephanie Stephanie joined Compass in February 2017 as Senior Vice President and is also a Founding Member of the Compass expansion into Northern Virginia. Prior to real estate, Stephanie worked in the worlds of hospitality, real estate finance and healthcare. Her unique set of analytical skills gives her the competitive edge in pricing properties and understanding emerging trends in neighborhoods and the local real estate market. Stephanie understands relocation first hand having moved with her family ten times in the course of ten years. She also assisted many employees with relocations during her previous career with Marriott. After finally settling in McLean for eight years with her husband and three children, Stephanie was intrigued by the urban living trend and convinced her family to move a mere 4 miles to Arlington. With the many stores, restaurants, and bike trails within walking distance, the community of Clarendon/Virginia Square has quickly become a top recommendation. Stephanie loves gourmet cooking and biking on the many trails throughout Northern Virginia.
title: Managing Director of Sales

description: About Kate Kate White is a DMV native. Originally from Silver Spring, MD, Kate has called many of DC’s neighborhoods home over the years. If you’re an animal lover and Kate looks familiar, perhaps you had the good fortune to meet Kate White, DVM, at Atlas Vet, where she worked for many years as a veterinarian, caring for our most precious companions. From age 12, Kate dreamed of becoming a veterinarian. She obtained her undergraduate degree in animal science from the University of Connecticut, and in 2016, earned her doctor of veterinary medicine degree from the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign, making that dream a reality. Kate’s dedication to animal health took her on an incredible journey, from China to Africa, from Grenada to California, finally landing back in DC’s H Street neighborhood. After much contemplation and soul-searching, in 2023 Kate made the bold decision to transition from veterinary medicine to real estate. Kate yearned for a new path that could bring people, and their beloved pets, a sense of well-being and tranquility. Guiding individuals and families to find their ideal refuge and place to call home became Kate's calling, a challenging privilege she wholeheartedly embraces. What sets Kate apart in the real estate industry is her unwavering passion for her clients—and the trust they place in her. (After all, you wouldn’t let just anyone care for your pet, would you?) Kate believes that real estate is not just about transactions, but about creating fulfilling experiences for her clients. With an acute understanding of the market and a medical professional’s eye for detail, Kate ensures that every client's needs are met with precision and care. Her local expertise and in-depth knowledge of the Washington, DC, area make Kate an invaluable resource for both buyers and sellers. Beyond her professional life, Kate finds joy in a multitude of interests. Whether it's horseback riding through scenic trails once or twice a week, indulging in the exquisite flavors of a cheese-tasting event (ask Kate about her love for mac ’n cheese!), or challenging opponents on the tennis court, Kate embraces every moment with enthusiasm—often with her beloved Australian Shepherd, Remy.
